column2: Abraham tuti Devit tanii ing Jesu Khrista ahungsuwhnii thiimziihbur.
Abraham ing Isak baringka, Isak ing Jakop abaring, amanche Jakop ing Juda re anaepa ae abaring,
Juda re Tamar ing embaring ae chuve Peres re Jerava amanche Peres sapa chu Hejaron amanche Hejaron sapa chu Raam,
Raam sapa chu Aminadap ka amanche Aminadap sapa inche Nashon vokhehkho Nashon sapa chu Salmon,
amanche Salmon re Rahap sapa chu Boas amanche Boas re Ruth ing Obet embaring vokhehkho Obet ing Jese baringka amanche Jese inche Devit Iruwngchu abaringpa.
Uria rumeechu Devit ing bika Solomon embaring,
amanche Solomon ing Rehobom abaring, Rehobom inche Abija abaring amanche Abija inche Asa abaringpa,
Asa sapa chu Jehoshaphet va amanche Jehoshaphet inche Joram abaringpa,
amanche Uzia inche Jotham abaring, amanche Jotham inche Ahaj abaring,
Hejekia i Manase ampa chuva, amanche Manase i Amon ampa va amanche Amon i Josia ampa chuva,
amanche Josia inche Jekonia re anae aechu Bebilon ting suwh ing enruwraenche abaringva.
Bebilon na suwh ing engonglae basenka: Jekonia inche Shaltiel abaring, amanche Shaltiel inche Zerubabel abaringpa,
amanche Zerubabel inche Abihud abaring, amanche Abihud inche Iliakim chu abaringpa, amanche Iliakim inche Ajor abaringpa,
Ajor inche Zadok abaring, amanche Zadok ing Akim chu abaringpa, amanche Akim ing Ilihud abaring,
Ilihud ing Ilijar abaring, amanche Ilijar ing Mathan baringka, vokhehkho Mathan inche Jakop chu abaringpa,
amanche Jakop ing Meri afhuwsar Josep chu baringka Jesu Khrista chu embaringpa.

Jinge ichii ing Abraham na ing Devit ipha ing mee hungpaar i suwnthar suum ariimanrii chakna, amanche Devit na ing Bebilon ting suwh ing enruwphachak ingkho suwn-thar suum ariimanriina vokhehkho Bebilon na ing Khrista ipha ikho suwnthar suum ariimanrii chakva.
Meri afhuwsar Josep abarungriir isa mee vakhaka Meri chu ningjak pining tamahka ynruwhjaeh ing ynsaefhuw ningka achiipa.

Changvakonchu Josep ing changche ichii ing amandenlae enruw, Thangnang tanii vaarmee ing Josep arumangna yndangka ariir, Devit tuti tanii sapa Josep, nang ing Meri ibuwh ynchikmah, yngkhaena ynchii imbe aven sungna areen i ynthiing laetha taniiva.
Ama ing sapa yngkheh baring vaata, nang ing arumingchu Jesu tataniika phuwvaanta, akhaechuve sapa inge amee vakhaechu isii icher tanii karvaata.
Havi Aafhuw ing Jaephar ningna amanriir chongchu ahungchumnii khaenava.
“Enruw lunghah ynthiing ing miknii naka sapa yngkheh baring vaata, arumingchu Immanuel tavaatae.” (Arutho chuve, Thangnang ing eenruwfhuwsa achiiniiva.)
Josep ing ynterka aningna vaarmee ing ariir inuwzii ing Meri chu abuwhpa.
Changvakonchu abaring-mahri raentaang Josep re Meri yntuwhmah ae; sapa chu omka Josep ing arumingchu Jesu taka aphuwpa.
Herot iruwng apaarlae Judia paam Bethlehem nache Jesu ajungom inuwna iniisuwhtah tanii ihaesing mee aeng Jerusalem nache theng aeka enriir,
“Jehudi ae iruwng ijungomchu unakhenva? Kenuw ing iniisuwhtah yntongting aesii kemu khaena atakchu irum ithengsahpung.”
Herot iruwng ing chongchu asii-tahna abarungriir jaasa vokhehkho Jerusalem mee vakhaekho nungae-mahsae;
amana aanchung jaethiim vakhaere thiimthang aechu mang-kongka eningna Khrista enchiichu unakhe omvachiiva taka asii ae?
Enuw ing embasang, Judia paam Bethlehem navaata; akhaechuve Jaephar ing abaziih vasah omna:
“O Juda paamna om Bethlehem, nangve Juda sungna aasiingseh mahvachii; akhaechuve ki kamee Isrel aechu ipuhnii khaena mee yngkheh naning tanii hungsuwh vaata.”
Amana Herot iruwng ing ihaesing aechu ynruwhjaeh ing eenka aesii yndangchu ynchii aphanava ichiichu ening tanii isajaeh ing amanghuwpa.
Amana Herot ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw vasinuwna naeduungchu isajaeh ing vajongruw amanche nenuw ing naeduungchu tuwhtanuwve kaning nakho ihenriirpeehruw amanache ki ingkho vakningka varumsava kata.”
Enuw ing iruwng chongchu ensiinuwna sisae vokhehkho iniisuwhtah tanii aesii inche naeduung aongnii aphamahri raentaangche emaana sika enjiipa.
Enuw ing aesiichu emutah nache ariirfhuwchah ing enrotha irohsah.

Amana vasiaeka evatungna naeduung jaarnii sungtingche envaruwh tahnache naeduungchu amnuw thohche emupa, amana enuw ing engkheerkhuwh mansin aeka enrumpa. Enuw ing engkikthuur buwrchu imong aeka sana, Gundru vokhehkho Gundras chu naeduung ningnache empeehpa.
Amana entakchu Herot ningting ynrimahruw ichii enrumangna emutah nache, lam asikting rep aeka empaamting yngkaesae.

Atii engaangkaenuwna, Aafhuw vaarmee ing Josep rumangna ariir, “Herot ing naeduung i ithehnii khaena ajongthongnah, chukhaenache hangiir nana naeduung re amnuw i ruwnana Ijeep lipah ting taenruw amanche ki ing kamanthang mahri raentaangchuw ama mapham nache ongjaehruw.”
Amana Josep ing hangngiirka naeduung re amnuwchu jaen nache ruwka Ijeep lipah ting taensae,
amana Herot athikmahri raentaang ama mapham nache ongsae. Havi Aafhuw ing Jaephar ajaarna amanriir vasahchu hungchumsa, “Ki ing kasapa chu Ijeep lipah tanii kavaruwpa.”

Herot ing ihaesing aeng ymman-chaepae ichiichu amanghuw tahnache inempak athir fhuwrsa. Chukhaenache ihaesing ae tanii isajaeh ing amanghuw inuwzii ing Bethlehem na ong vokhehkho akuurpaang paamna om naeduung pasar kumnii aderchaap ithehnii khaena mee jebathenka amanthehpa.
Jaephar Jeremia ing ariir chongchu hungchumsa:
Amachuve, “Rama tanii ijaachaam ichap iruur kasiipa, Racher ing asitiae khaena chapna; asiti aechu enthiktah nache abarungriir ijaachu chenmah.”
Herot athiknuwna, Aafhuw avaarmee ing Ijeep na Josep rumang nache yndangka ariir,
“Hangiirla, naeduung re amnuw kha ruwnana Isrel paamting yngkaera, naeduung thehkenta achii mee aekha thiksae.”
Amana Josep ing hangiirka naeduung re amnuw chu ruwka Isrel paamting yngkaesae,

changvakonchu Herot sapa Aarkelos ing Judia paamna ampa changdenna iruwng vika paarna ichii chong asiitah nache, Josep hungkaevachii ynchikka arumangna ariirpeeh inuwzii ing lam repka Galili paamting sisa.
Chutahnache Nazaret khuwruung nache hungpaarsa; havi Jaephar ing ariir vasahchu hungchumsa, “Atak i Nazaret na ong ynthiing mee chuvaata.”
Apha ichiinache Baptis Johon ing Judia paam nache thengka isa chong atong,
“Nenbarungriir huungruw, thangbaen iruwng paamchu ynneengsa,” taka ariir.
Hava mee khaene Jaephar Isaia ing jinge ichii ing ariir vasahva,
“Paamfhuw nache iruur yngkheh ing uungna,
Aafhuw lamchu seemruw, asiniichu manchiimruw.”
Johon ing ut vin peendiir ing ynthongka amanche adiirriim nache shavin ing ynchiim vokhehkho athaemin inche khaeruwng re lampa khiniingva.
Jerusalem tanii vokhehkho Judia paam aangkheng tanii amanche Jordan idaam akuurpaang tanii mee aangkheng aningting theng aeka
isii entuchaap enriirpa; amana Jordan iva nache enuwchu Johon ing baptais amantu ae.
Atii nenbarungriir mantehruw;
Kempa Abraham omna tanuwna nenbarungriir mangamjaeh mahruw; neningna kariirnah, Thangnang ing hava rung vakhae itanii Abraham siti ae abasuwchehsa,
amanche ataraen rapkho thingbur vakhae arajungna rii ynringka omna; aanla isa omah chaapchu ynfuwr naka mi sungting ynthuchir vaata.

‘Nen-barungriir nenghuung khaena ki ing chiina baptais kamantu vachuw, changvakonchu kaanuwna thengvachii chuve kachungna ruungsehna; Ama ing ynthiing laetha vokhehkho mi thohche baptais imantuvaata. Ki chuve ama akhingop rapkho ichi matik chamah ing.
Akikna amanthiingnii sisa achisa, sachiichu iheer naka iseeng gehuchu itomting thinvaata, changvakonchu arasiii chaap chuve ichen naemah ing ichuwh mi sungting bathuvaata.’ ”
Changlaenche Jesu ing Johon ningna baptais itunii khaena Galili tanii Jordan nache ivatheng.
Chang-vakonchu Johon ing Jesu chu khaamka ariir, “Ki i nangla ing baptais imantuva nachii vara, amachu nang ing kaningna ivatheng vachii!”
Jesu ing abasang, “Ataraennii khaena chembe rura, akhaechuve jinge ichii ing inuw ing ichum ynthiing nong aangkheng itu matik ichavamuw.” Chutahnache Johon ing arupa.
Jesu ing baptais tuka chiisung tanii hungsuwhsa; amana enruw, thangbaen ymmongka Thangnang laetha inche khunu vaang juwngka ataklina ijungchuwchu amupa.
Amana thangbaen tanii iruur yngkheh ing ajeriir, “Havi kaning kamansiihpak kasapa chuva, ataklina inempak kabarungriir pensakna.”
Amana Jesu ing inii nisommanrii, jaen sommanrii maaru atong aanuwna aven chaamsa.
Changlaenche umlae inche thengka Jesu ningna ariir, “Nang Thangnang sapa vataniive, hava rung ae i tar uurnii khaena nachong bathahra.”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing abasang, “Ynziihka omna, ‘Tar pang ing mee iring mahva, changvakonchu Thangnang nertanii hungsuwh chongsae chaap inche ringvaata.’ ”
Aanuwnache umlae ing Jesu chu ynthiing khuwruung Jerusalem ting ruwka rumniieen basuwr yngkaangpak tingche mangkarka
amana aningna ariir, “Nang Thangnang sapa vataniive jungkhuwngla, akhaechuve ynziihka omna,
‘Nakhi rapkho rung ing nasuhniimah khaena,
Thangnang ing avaarmee ae ningna riirnaka engkik ing nangchu ihengadom vaatae.’ ”
Jesu ing abasang, “Jinge ynziihka omna, nang ing Naafhuw Thangnang chu batheemmahva nachiiva.”
Athar umlae ing Jesu chu bung yngkaangpak ting ruwreehka iruwngpaam aang-kheng alaar isa vakhaechu amansiipa;
amana umlae ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Nang ing ki irum taniive, havana aangkheng i pivakachii.”
Jesu ing umlae ningna ariir, “Ongmahra, Umlae! Ynziihka omna, ‘Nang ing Naafhuw Thangnang chu rumva nachiiva vokhehkho ama chupang rukuum tuva nachiiva.’ ”
Umlae inche Jesu chu abathenpa amana enruw, vaarmee ae juwng aeka Jesu chu rukuum entupa.
Amana Nazaret jeraenka Jebulun re Naptali paam ruwrakna Galili chifhuw kuurna om Kaparnaum nache ongsa,
havi Jaephar Isaia ing ariir vasah chongchu ahungchumnii khaenava.
“Jebulun paam vokhehkho Naptali paam,
Jordon laar chifhuw yntongna ong ae,
reentaang mee ae paam Galili!
ynthimna ong mee aeng irengchu muvaatae amanche ynthim vokhehkho ithiinii paamna ong mee ae taklina iruungpak ireng inche aenvaata.”
Jesu ing Galili chifhuw kuurna ahungsirae ngaklah mee Pitar ichii Simon re anaepa Andru ing chifhuwna ichak endeengchu amupa.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Kaanuw ijiiruw, ki ing nenuwchu meesuwr mansuwhva kachuw.”
Enuw ing engachakchu bathen aeka Jesu aanuwchu enjiipa.
Amana topoh yndahhak ing eng-hungsirae unae reentaang ynniimeh Jebedi sapa Jems re anaepa Johon ruwkuwng sungna empa Jebedi thoh engachak engaphuwhchu Jesu ing muka a-eenpae.
Amana enuw ing enruwkuwng re empachu bathen aeka Jesu aanuwchu enjiipa.

Atii Jesu ajaechu Siria paam aangkhengna thangsa, chukhaenache enuw ing reentaang reentaang laena ing ina chaap vokhehkho ijachaam emphanii, umlae ichuwng ae, imur, hakchaang ithiipoh mee vakhae enveruwchu Jesu ing amandampae.
Chutahnache Galili, Dekapolis, Jerusalem, Judia vokhehkho Jordan laartanii mee inempak ing Jesu aanuwchu enjiipa.
Jesu ing mee inempakchu amutahna ama ing reen ting hangkarka aonglae asebok ae ing abuum ting vathengsae.
Amana Jesu ing mee vakhaechu ynchuw abasenpa:
“Laethana yntuur mee aechu bor aphapae,
thangbaen paamchu enrutum vaata!
‘Ichap ichuw mee aechu bor aphapae,
enuw ing rotharoh phavaatae!’
“Ynjuursah mee aechu bor aphapae,
laaruw paam enrutum vaata!
‘Ichum ynthiing khaena venchaam chiilaar apha mee aechu bor aphapae,
enuw ipendeh inche sipvaatae!’
‘Ningchuwh adeen mee aechu bor aphapae;
enuw ing ningchuwhchu phavaatae!
“Barungriir ynthiing aechu bor aphapae,
enuw ing Thangnang muvaatae!
‘Idae omnii khaena nong atu aechu bor aphapae;
enuwchu Thangnang siti tavaatae!’
thangbaen paamchu enrutum vaata!’
Nenrotha manrohruw vokhehkho nungaesaruw, thangbaen nache nenphafhuw iruungpak omna, nemaana hesivasah Thangnang Jaephar aekho changche ijachaam emphava.’ ”
amanche achuw ingkho jaemi barengka buruk mangkhummah; changvakonchu jaemi asiihnii nache siika eensung aangkheng aennah.”
Havi vaange neningna irengchu mee ae maana aenrasiing, amana chembe nenuw ing isa nong nentuchaap muae naka thangbaenna ong nenpachu manpah vaatae.
“Ki i vajeer chonghak vokhehkho Jaephar ae chongchu mamaangnii khaena ijuwngva ichii ing imanden mahruw; ki chuve aamaang ijuwng mahping changvakonchu ahungchum chirnii khaena ijuwngping.
Ki ing havi khaena neningna atatak ing kariirnah, thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paam achimahri raentaang vajeer chonghak tanii achiih tikho areer asuwhmahri taangche maangmahnii.

Chutahnache achuw yngkheh ing chonghak kaarna aasiingseh yngkhehchu bakhiinaka mee manchuw nave thangbaen paamna isiinghak mee chuvaata, changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing chonghak inuwzii ing mee manchuw nave ama meechu thangbaen paamna ruungvaata.
Neningna kariirnah, nenuw ing ichum ynthiing nache thiimthang aere Pharisi ae ichum ynthiing aechu kheermah tanga tanuwka utaraenkho thangbaen paam tungchehmah tanuw.”
“Mee itheh rumahnii, achuw yngkheh ing mee thehnave vajeer derna ijachaam phavaata ichiichu ajae nensii vasahva.

Ki ing neningna kariirnah, achuw yngkheh ing auw anae taklina ahuwnii denniichah ing athir fhuwrnave, vajeer derna ijachaam phavaata, amanche achuw yngkheh ing auw anaechu ningjak pinave, aanchungpuh ae vajeer phavaata, vokhekho achuw yngkheh ing ‘ipang nang’ tanave longkong mi sungna ijachaam phavaata.
Chukhaenache nang ing thiimkungna ipeehfhuw peeh pikata tataniika najechirae nauw nanae taklina nanungaeniimah om ynsii taniive,
napeehchu thiimkung maanache mara vokhehkho ynrinana amaensana nauw nanae thohche aanrunii tura, amanache huungnana napeehchu thimmkung nache pira.”

“Nangchu miraar ympeeh mee thohkhe vajeer itu nenphamah rirae ynrujapruw; changmahnave ama ing vajeer aafhuw kikting ipivaata, amanache vajeer aafhuw ing aarung mee kikting ipinaka kaeshum ting ynthin vaata.
Ki ing naningna atatak ing kariirnah, nalertuur nasingkiir mahtaang kaesum tanii hungsuwh rumahnii.”
“Reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah itu rumahnii ichii nenuw ing nensiipa.
changvakonchu ki ing neningna kariirnah, rupanuw yngkheh taklina barungriir aasumpak ing a-en mee vakhae inche abarungriirna ama thohche ichuwhmah atupa.
Namik tachang ing isii ting ababuknii vachii vanave iphernana ren; natak aangkheng longkong ting bukvanachii changve nataklitanii asae yngkheh omah ing nakhaena saksehna.
Nakik tachang ing isii ting ibabuknii vachii vanave tennana ren; natak aangkheng longkong ting bukvanachii changve nataklitanii asae yngkheh omah ing nakhaena saksehna.”

Changvakonchu ki ing neningna kariirnah, ichuwhmah atu khaena mahnaka rupanuw aansaefhuw mee chaap ing arumeechu ichuwhmah amanguurva, amanche achuw yngkheh ing rumee saanglaam ynsaevasah rupanuw buwhnave, ama meechu ichuwhmah nong atuva.
“Isivasahna ariir chukho nensiipa, ‘Ynraar ing saarkhii tumah changvakonchu Aafhuw ningna saarkhii natuchu nong ing tura.’
Chukhaenache neningna kariirnah, Thangnang ongnii thangbaen ruming parnuwna chongreep tumahruw,
changmahka Thangnang khi chuwngnii laaruw paam rumingna changmah naka iruungpak iruwng ongnii khuwruung Jerusalem ruming nakho chongreep tumahruw.
Nang ing narusae bachuw nana chongreep tumahra, akhaechuve nang ing nasam yngkhehkho manpuur kata changmahka mandupkata ichii chehmahchii.
Chutahnache naru chong chuve ung tajaehtah amanche rumah taniive rumah ing tajaehtah; havi chungna athi ing ichong chuve ichamah suwhnii vatah.”
“Mik yngkheh changdenna mik yngkheh vokhehkho ha yngkheh changdenna ha yngkheh ichii chong i nenuw ing nensiipa.”
Changvakonchu ki ing neningna kariirnah, nentaklina araar mee ningnakhe huwthung mahruw. Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing naabeeng tachangna eebeeng nave, paangkheh tingkho dura.
Vokhehkho achuw yngkheh ing isuwrnaka narungop rikata tanave napeenkho pira.
Amanche achuw yngkheh ing meil yngkheh sita atateeh nave, meil ynnii sihakruw.
Na-ningna aadik peehchae ynniihchu pira, amanche ynfhuwh chukho damahra.
“Naveenchaang aechu naning mansiih vokhehkho ynrumah mee aechu batirla ichii chongchu nenuw ing nensiipa.

Changvakonchu ki ing neningna kariirnah, ynjeehnii mee aechu nening mansiihruw, siraap ympiaechu bor piaeruw, ymbatir mee ae ningna isa turuw, yngensiimah ae vokhehkho ijachaam ympiae khaenache thampeeh aeruw.
Amana chembe thangbaenna ong Thangnang sitichu ynsuwhva nenta, akhaechuve isamah vokhehkho isa aaniimeh taklina inii abasuwhna amanche khuwkho amansuwrnah.
Aning ymmansiih mee ae chupang nening mansiih tanuwcha ynchii nongmen phava nenchii omkhang? Ree ikhuum mee aerap ingkho changche ichii ing tumah ae khang?
Nenguw nenae pangchu bariim tanuwcha, mee reentaang ae chungna ynchii nentuse? Reentaang mee aerap ingkho changche tumah ae khang?
Chukhaenache thangbaenna ong nenpa ing araarmah dehvaang nenuwkho raarmah dehruw.”

“Chukhaenache isachaang atu aeng mee ing imanpah rasiing ta aeka meekongniina vokhehkho lamna entu vaangkhe, nenuw ing isa nong nenturae nemaensokna khuwng ibeeng mahruw. Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, enuwkha enongmen emphapa.
Changvakonchu napeeh raenche natachang ing napeehkha natari ing manghuwmah rasiing,
amana chembe yndangmah ing natu isa nongchu ynruwhjaeh ing amu nangpa inche yndang ing nongmen ipivaata.”
Changvakonchu nang ing nathamsah raenche eensung ting hungruwh nana, eenkhaar kamnana thamsara amanche nangpa inche imunaka nongmen ipivaata.”
“Nenuw ing nenthamsah raenche reentaang mee ae vaang chongkha nuummahruw, nuumnungve ibasang vaata ichii ing emandenva.
Chu-khaenache enuw vaangkhe nenuw tamahruw, nenpa Thangnang ing nentaklina ivaehkha nenthamsah mahrirae amanghuw vasahva.
Chu-khaenache jinge thamruw:
‘Thangbaenna ong kempa Thangnang:
Naruming ynthiing ynsuwhrasiing;
Naaruwng lipahchu thengrasiing;
thangbaenna namanden vaang laaruw paam nenkho namanden ynsuwh rasiing.
Kenuwchu anasiirna kensahfhuw thaemin ipisar,
Kentaklina isii ikha atu mee aechu kengkuhpeeh vaang,
kentaklina isii ikha omchaap ikuhpeehsar.
Batheem tingche kenuwchu ibabuw samah,
vokhehkho isii ikha tanii ikarsar.’ ”
changvakonchu nentaklina isii ikha atu mee aechu kuhpeehmah tanuwve, nenpa ingkho ikuhpeeh chehmahnii.”
“Nenuw ing maaru nentonglae isachaang atu mee ae vaangkhe mee ing imurasiing tanuwna yndang ing tumahruw. Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, enuw enongmen emphapa.
Changvakonchu nenuw chuve maaru nentonglae nenrusae richiithou itaehpeh nuwna amanche nemae chukho phuwpehruw,
amanachen vaang maaru nentongchu mee ae ing manghuwcheh mahnii ae, nenpa pang inche manghuw vaata. Amanche ynruwhjaeh ing ymmu nenpa ing neningna nongmen ipivaata.”
Changvakonchu risa vokhehkho korhing ing asahchehmah amanche lamruw ingkho baruwh chehmah vachii thangbaen nache nenlerchii mangkongruw.
Nenlerchii omnii apham nache nenbarungriir chukho ombaata.”
“Mik inge hakchaang jaemi chuva; chukhaenache namik bareng chumnave, natak aangkheng reng-vaanta.
changvakonchu namik bareng chummah nave, natak aang-kheng manthim vaanta. Chukhaenache nataklina irengchu manthim nave, aajaemeh manthim vaate!”

“Achuw ingkho aafhuw ynniimeh meenae ynsuwh chehmah; akhaechuve yngkhehchu aning mansiih mahnave, yngkhehchu aning mansiih vaata, vokhehkho yngkheh ningna abarungriir manruwhdeh nave, yngkheh tingche barungriir manruwhmahnii. Thang-nang re lerchii aaniimeh ing anong ituhak rumahnii.”

“Chukhaenache ki ing neningna kariirnah, iringnii khaena ynchii savakate, invakate vokhehkho ynchii peendiir niivakate ichii ing nenbarungriir manjamahruw. Isah-fhuw chungna iringnii ing vokhehkho peendiir chungna hakchaang ing ruwhakmah khang?

Vaati ae i enruw, enuw sachii kho basaemah ae, ikuumkho kuummah ae amanche itom tingkho mangkongmah ae, chang-vakonchu thangbaenna ong nenpa ing ensahfhuw apeehsae. Enuw chungna nenuw ing nemen ruwhakmah khang?
Nenuw achuw yngkheh nenbarungriir ajatahna aringkum khudup yngkheh amanthichehse?”
“Nenuw peendiir khaenache ynchii khaena nenbarungriir ijaava? Lampana rii ipaar ae i enruw, yntanga turu ae ing muwngnae vokhehkho paarjaeh tahnae.
Chukhaenache ki ing neningna kariirnah, Solomon iruwng alerchii ompakrap ingkho enuwvaang peendiir deenmah.
Changche ichii ing atanii ringnaka atuknii mi sungting renvaanchii rapkho Thangnang ing isajaeh ing rukuum atunuw chembe, nenuw chuve iruwpak ing itumahnii khang? O thacha isiing ae!”
“Chutahnache ynchii savakente, ynchii invakente changmahka ynchii niivakente tanuwna nenbarungriir manjamahruw.
Hava vakhae i reentaang mee ae ing iphanii khaena enjongnah; amana thangbaenna ong nenpa ing nenvaehnii aangkheng havi amanghuwsa.
Changvakonchu amaensana Thangnang iruwng lipah vokhehkho ichum ynthiingchu jongruw, amana peeh aangkhenglaang havi neningna ipivaata.
Chukhaenache atuknii khaena nenbarungriir man-jamahruw, atuknii khaena chembe atuknii barungriir jasavaata. Nikheh khaena ija ing nikheh rutum rasiing.”
“Mee taklina vajeer tumahra, amana chembe Thangnang ing nataklina vajeer tumahnii.
Nang ing mee taklina vajeer tutaniive, Thang-nang ing nataklinakho ynchimchak ing vajeer tuvaata.
Ynchii khaena namikna ibuwr omcha ibuwrruchii ing, unae mikna om ibuwr chucha nabuwrva?
Amanche namik abuwr brohrae, nauw nanae mikna ibuwrcha ripeeh kachii nachiiva?
Ichum nabuchaang nang maensa ing namikna ibuwrkha rijapla, amanche aanuwting nauw nanae mikna om ibuwrchu iseengkiir ing mupeh vaanta.”
“Ynthiing peehva ichii chaap uti aeting pimahruw; amanche voh ae maensokna amen iruwpak rung verenmahruw, enuw ing chanii ae naka neningting vaanleh ae naka ynsi aekho arusa.”
“Niihruw ipivaata; Jongruw tuwhva nenta; ichumruw ibarangpeeh vaata.
Akhaechuve aaniih vakhae ing phavaata, aajong vakhae inche tuwh-vaata, amanche aachum mee khaenache barangpeeh vaata.
Achuw yngkheh nengkaarna siti ing tar aniihtahna rung pivachii mee ynvaenachuw?
Amanche nga aniihtahna baruwr pivanente?
Nenuw chamahkhang tanuwkho nensiti ae ningna isa peeh pinii chuve nemanghuwsa, chunuw chembe thangbaenna ong nenpa inche aajaehmeh aniihsah mee ningnache isa pining tavaate.”
“Varuwhnii lam ymbik nache ruwhruw, akhaechuve imaangnii ting ruwhnii lam chuve manjaka ijiinii laena, amanache ivaruwh mee nempakna.
Changvakonchu iringnii phanii lam chuve mambikna vokhehkho ijiinii ruwna, amanche ama lamchu atuwh mee tuumpakna.”
“Taangnacha jao peendiir ing ynthong aeka, sungtingcha imi vaang ichii ae, neningna itheng ichummah jaephar mee ae khaena ynriimruw.
Nenuw ing entu nong aanla nache manghuwva nenta. Iringbur tanii vomrip aanla vokhehkho iringbur tanii thachang iriihchak muwkhang?
Chunuw vaniive isa thingbur chaap nache isa ynlana, isamah thingbur nache isamah ynlana.
Isa thingbur nache isamah aanla vokhehkho isamah thingbur nache isa aanla ynla chehmah.
Aanla isa ing ynla chehmah thingbur chaapchu ynsaehka mi sungting ynrennah.
Jinge ichii ing nenuw ing enuwchu engaanla nache manghuwva nenta.”
“Kaningna Aafhuw, Aafhuw, tanaka yngeen mee chaap ing iruwng lipah tungmahnii, changvakonchu thangbaenna ong kapa ing amanden nong atu mee chaap inche tungvaata.

Ama inii nache mee aanem ing kaningna tavaatae, ‘Aafhuw, Aafhuw,’ narumingna Thangnang chong manthangmah ungkhang, naruming ajaarna umlae ae kenthurmah vakhang, amanche narumingna laetho kemandangmah vakhang?
Changlaenche ki ing eningna tavakata, ‘Utaraenkho nenuwchu manghuw mahchuwng; kakuurna ongmahruw ichuwhmah nongtu mee ae.’
“Achuw yngkheh ing kachong chaap siinaka amanjii mee chuve ising ing rung taklina een amangiir ising mee thohche aanghakna.
Khuw suwrka chii riimsa, amanche khuwsii ipirpak ing varaangsa. Changvakonchu tiihmah, akhaechuve rung taklina amangiirpa.
Achuw yngkheh ing kachongchu siinaka amanjiimah mee chuve ipang ing siih taklina een amangiir mee thohche aanghakna.
Khuw suwrka chii riimsa, amanche khuwsii ynleh inche eenchu raenka tiihsa; vokhehkho ithipak inche tiihsa.”
yngkhaena ynchii imbe thiimthang ae vaang chongmahka ama ing aatuaricheh yngkheh ing chongsa.
Jesu ing reen tanii ajungchum raenche mee inempak ing aanuw enjii.
Changlaenche ichiisuwhpak ynchor laena ing ina mee yngkheh ing amaensokna akheerkhuwh mansinka athamsah, “Aafhuw, nang ing namanden vanave, ki ymmandam chehsachii.”
Amana Jesu ing abaen ithoh-ka atakchu parka ariir, “Ki ing kamandennah, nang damla. Aphachak nache ynchor ing inachu damsa.”

Amana Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Rungaera, achuw ningnakho riirmahra, changvakonchu jaethiim ningna chembe vaknana mansiira; amanche saarkhii omnii ing mee vakhae maekungna Mosi ningna chonghak apeeh inuwzii ing ipifhuwchu pira.”
Jesu ing Kaparnaum ting ahungruwh raenche laarchang chaama aaruung yngkheh ing yntuwhfhuwka aningna ibomsahnii khaena athamsah,
“Aafhuw, kameenae yngkheh ipirpak ing nakka eenna ynlaap chehru ing ijaarniina yntorjaehka ijachaam aphanah achii.”
“Ki ing vakningka amachu mandam vakata,” taka Jesu ing abasang.
Changvakonchu laarchang chaama aaruung inche abasang, “Aafhuw, nang ing ka eenna thengvanachii matik chasamah ing; damrasiing ichii chong pangchu iriirpeehra, kameenaechu damjaeh vachii vatah,

akhaechuve kikho kachungna aatuaricheh iruung ae derna ongning vokhehkho kaderna laarchang omnae. Amana ki ing laarchang yngkheh ningna sira kachiitahna sina, reentaang laarchang yngkhehting huungla kachiitahna huungna, amanche kasuwh ningna havi tura kachiitahna atunah.”
Jesu ing ama chongchu asiitahna ngikka aanuw ajii mee ae ningna ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, jinge ichii ing athacha om mee Isrel sungna tuwhmahri ing.
Ki ing neningna kariirnah amachuve, thangbaen iruwng lipahna iniisuwhtah tanii vokhehkho taetah tanii mee thengnaka Abraham, Isak amanche Jakop buumna imaarnii khaena ongvaatae.
Changvakonchu iruwng lipah sitiae chuve ynthim sungting renvaata; amana enuw ing engha iriir ae naka chapvaatae.”
Amana Jesu ing laarchang chaama aaruung tingche ariir, “Yngkaera, nang nathacha inuwzii ing namandenchu ynsuwhrasiing.” Amana iruung meenae chu aphachak nache damsa.
Jesu ing Pitar eenting avakcha Pitar ampuw ijaarniina riitheng ing hejaarchu amupa.
Jesu ing Pitar ampuwchu akikna ajepartah nache ariithengchu damsa. Amana hangsuwka Jesu chu abariimsah.
Ama khuri nache umlae ing ichuwng mee aechu mee aenche enveruw, amana umlae vakhaechu Jesu ing athurpeeh chirpae vokhehkho ina chaap ae chukho amandampa.
Havi Jaephar Isaia ing ariir vasahchu hungchumsa, “Atakrap ing inuw ynlaena aasuwchirpa vokhehkho riirae omchaap areenchirpa.”
Jesu ing abuumting mee inempak ivathengchu amanghuw tahnache asebok aeting chiiding laarting isinii khaena amanthang.
Changlae thiim-thang yngkheh ing vakka aningna ariir, “Oja, nang nasinii vakhaena jiiva kachii.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Imi aeve enruwhnii engkhur omna amanche minvaenna vaati aekho enrabuw omna, changvakonchu Mee Sapa chuve aja basumnii aantornii omah.”
Amana reentaang sebok yngkheh ing aningna ariir, “Aafhuw, yngkaeningka kapa ithiichu maensa ing rijapkata.”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Kaanuw ijiira, ithii aengkhe ithii aechu riae rasiing.”
Jesu ing ruwkuwng ting hang-karka asebok aenche aanuwchu jiiaeka sisae.
Amanache enruw, ipirpak khuwsii ynlehka chifhuwchu aanohpa, amana ruwkuwngchu chiiting rupvachii ing omsa, changlaenche Jesu chuve ijaar.
Amana sebok aenche hungbasuw aeka enriir, “Aafhuw, thik ynthongnung ikarsar.”
Jesu ing abasang ae, “Ynchii khaena nenuw hangjaehmeh ynchik vachuw; ‘Aajaehmeh nenthacha isiing-va!’ Amana hangiirka khuwsii ynleh re chii ynnohchu rukuhka daerengsa.”
Amana engkhenglaang ngik aeka enriir, “Hava mee i ynchii meeva!” khuwsii ynleh vokhehkho chii ynnoh aengkho achongriir emanjii i.

Jesu ing chiiding laar Gadara ichii paam nache ahuunglae thaenkung tanii hungsuwh umlae ing ichuwng mee ynniimeh aeng Jesu engaantuwhfhuw. Enuw ae i aajaehmeh ichiisuwhpae ynchii imbe achuw ingkho ama lamchu ijii achehmahva.
Amana enuw ing va ung aeka enriir, “O Thangnang sapa, nang ing keningna ynchii tukata nachiiva? Apha ahenphamah rirae kenuw ijachaam pinii ithengvachii!”
Changlaenche engongnii thoh aasen yndahmah ing voh inempak imaar ae.
Amana umlae aenche Jesu ningna enthamsah, “Kenuw i ithurva nachii vanave voh ae kaarting ibathensara.”
Jesu ing umlae ae ningna ariir, “Nenuw ongmahruw.” Amana enuw ing hungsuwh aeka voh ae sungting ruwhsae amanche enruw, voh aangkheng jungtaen aeka chiiding tingche ruwhsae vokhehkho thikchirsae.
Voh aacheer aenche khuwruung ting hungtaen aeka isuwh chaap entong, amanche umlae ing ichuwng ae taklina isuwh chukho entong.
Chukhaenache mee vakhae ing Jesu chu vaantuwhfhuw aeka vokhehkho engkhuwveen bathennii khaena enthamsah.
Jesu ing ruwkuwngna chiilaar kaahka een hungtung,
changlae mee aeng ahakchaang ithiipoh ina yngkheh enveruwpa. Amana ina meechu damlem vaata ichii eman-denchu Jesu ing amutah nache ariir, “Narutha manruungla kasapa, isii natuchaap kakuhpa.”
Amana thiimthang aenche enum ing ichong ae, “Hava mee inge ithipak ing chongna!”
Achong nache engkharchu amanghuw tahnache Jesu ing asii ae, “Yngkhaena changchii isii ikhachu nenkharva?
Nataklina isii vakhae kakuhpa ichiire hangiir nana sira ichii i ukha inche ilaehakva?
Ki ing mandang kata amachuve, Mee Sapa inche laaruw paamna isii kuhnii ruwreng adeensa.” Amana ina mee ningtingche ariir, “Hangiir, najaar niikha chinana yngkaera.”
Amana idam inche hangiirka yngkaesa.
Amu mee vakhae aenche ynchikpohsae amanche hangchii aatuaricheh i mee ningna apeeh Thangnang chu emanpahsah ae.
Atii Jesu ing ama denchu maka ahungsirae ree ikhuum mee aruming Methiu ing akaarohna heongchu amupa. Amana Jesu ing huung kaanuw ijiira taka aachiir. Ama ing hangiirka Jesu inuwchu ajiipa.
Havi Pharisi aenche emutah nache asebok ae ningna ensii, “Yngkhaena nenuw neng oja inge ree ikhuum aere isii icher mee aethoh imaarpohva!”
Ama chongchu Jesu ing siika abasang ae, “Idam mee ae ningna ithiim ikanii omah, ina khaena chembe ikaniina.
‘Chaatha ipithoh chembe ningchuwh om ing kaadik hakva taka ynziihchu vajongnuwna tamruw.’ Ki ijuwng ing chuve ichum ynthiing ae ijongnii khaena mahva, changvakonchu isii icher ae khaenava.”
Aanuwnache Johon sebok ae theng aeka Jesu ningna ensii, “Kenuw re Pharisi ing maaru tongchak ungka amanche nasebok aencha yngkhaena maaru atong mahpae?”

Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Rakhii-niina itheng aeng songpa aanvae raentaang ijaanii phavaatae ichii nenkharnah? Utaraenkho phamahnii ae. Changvakonchu songpa jungruwva enchii apha hungvivaata, changlaenche enuw ing maaru tongvaatae.”
“Achuw ingkho baruw rungopna ithar peen ing ibermah, akhaechuve ithar peen varaangkhe kika rungop-kha ynsiih sehsehna.

Mee aenche ithar vomrip chiichu buruw shavin thuungfhuw nache thinniimah chak ae, thin ae nave shavinchu ynsiihka vomrip chiichu yntaana, vokhehkho shavin thuungfhuw ae chukho maangna; changvakonchu enuw ing ithar vomrip chiichu ithar shavin thuungfhuw nache enthinnah, amana chembe aaniimeh ing isa ing omna.”

Jesu ing changche achonglae enruw, Jehudi iruung yngkheh vathengka Jesu maensokna akheer-khuwh mansinka athamsah, “Kasanuw ataenrap thikdohsa; ivakpeeh nana ataklina nakik isiipeehsara, amana chembe ama hangring vaata.”
Chukhaenache Jesu ing hangiirka avejiipa vokhehkho asebok ae ingkho envejiipa.
Changlae kumsuum ariinii sii ynta ing ina sanuw yngkheh ing vakka atuk nungting arungop basuwrna aparpa.
Ataksah ing amanden chuve, “Ki ing arungop basuwr pangkho parcheh saningve damva kata achii.”
Jesu ing huw ruwsachu siika avaanleh tahnache sanuwchu muka ariir, “Kasanuw, nabarungriir mangamla, ithuwh ing namandensah inuwzii ing damsachii.” Aphachak nache sanuwchu vadamsa.
Atii Jesu ing iruung een tingche avaruwh raenche simruwr itum ae tachaam iriae enghuw itamchu muka
Jesu ing ariir, “Nengkheng ong-mahruw! Rupanuwti havi ithii mahva, ijaar vatah!” Chongchu ensiitah nache Jesu chu emaniisah.
Mee vakhaechu taang ensuwh aanuwna, Jesu ing varuwhka rupanuwti akiknache abachuw tahnache rupanuwtichu hangringsa.
Hava chongthar i apaam arakiing aangkhengna thangsa.
Atii Jesu ing ama denchu maka ahungsirae mikchu mee ynniimeh aeng aanuw vejii aeka naning imanchuwhsar, Devit sapa ta aeka iva uung ae.
Jesu ing eensung ahungruwh tahnache mikchu aekho varuwhsae. Amana Jesu ing asii ae, “Ki ing mansakcheh vakachuw ichii nentha-chanah?” “Imansakcheh vaanta ta aeka embasang.”
Amana Jesu ing emik parka ariir, “Nenuw nenthacha inuwzii inche damruw!”
Amana emik ichuchu saksa. Aanuwnache Jesu ing eningna ipirpak ing ariir, “Achuw ningnakho havi riirmahruw.”
Changvakonchu enuw ing apaam lija ihuur aeka mee vakhae ningna hava thamin i enjarpa.
Enuw mee ynniimehchu engaangkaedeh aanuwna umlae ing ichuwng ichong achehmah yngkheh Jesu ningnache enveruwpa.
Chang-vakonchu Jesu ing umlaechu athurthoh ichong achehpa. Amana mee aenche ngik aeka enriir, “Hava hangchii i Isrel sungna utaraenkho mumahrideh ung.”
Changlae ama ing mee inempak aechu amucha aning amanchuwhpae, akhaechuve acheer omah jao ae vaang enuw ja aeka ynsaenongsae.
Chutahnache asebok ae ningna ariir, “Ruwrae kuumfhuw inempak ruungna, changvakonchu kuumvachii mee tuumpakna.
Chukhaenache ruwrae kuumvachii mee ajebathennii khaena Aafhuw ningting thamsaruw.”
Jesu ing asebok suum ariinii aechu eenka, umlae aechu ithurchehnii, riirae mangkhiing vokhehkho ina aajaeh mandam chehnii ruwreng apeehpae.
Sebok suum ariinii ae ruming chuve; Pitar taka a-eenniichak Simon, vokhehkho anaepa Andru; Jebedi sapa Jems vokhehkho anaepa Johon;
Philip, Bartholomiu; Thomas, Methiu ree ikhuum; Alphius sapa Jems, Thadius,
Kanaan tanii Simon vokhehkho Jesu arensah Judas Iskariot ipae.
Havana sebok suum ariinii ae ningne Jesu ing nungsim thahka achiirpae: Nenuw reentaang mee ae paamting vokhehkho Samaria khuwting ruwhmahruw.
Changvakonchu ama changdenna ymmoh vasah ae Isrel mee ae tingche siruw.
Vasinuwna tongruw, “Thangbaen paam iruwng lipahchu ynneengsa!”
Ina aechu mandamruw, ithii aechu manringruw, ynchor ae chukho mandamruw vokhehkho umlae aechu thurruw. Nenuw ngareh ing nenphava, ngareh inche piruw.
Nenuw nenthuungfhuw nache sana, rupa vakhangnare vokhehkho seer vakhangnare ynringmahruw;
lamkhii khaenava tanuwna thuungfhuw, rungop, khingop changmahka thor asae ynnii yngkhii ing reenmahruw. Nong itu meechu ipipham thengna.
“Amanache khuwruung chang-mahka khuwsung nenvaruwhrae nenuwchu ihebariim vachii mee enruw, amanche aphamchu nemahmahri raentaang ama thohche ongruw.
Nenuw ing eensung tingche nenvaruwh thoh, ‘Neningna idae omlasii’ tanuwna enrutha kuurruw.
Amana een sungna heong mee aenche ibariim ae nave idaechu tungrasiing; changvakonchu ibariimmah ae nave idaechu ynrirasiing.
Amanche eensung vokhehkho khuwruung aenche ibariimmah ae naka changmahka nenchong rungaemah ae nave, nengkhina pirkhuwhchu rukhuung nuwna ama maphamchu bathenruw.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, vajeer inii nache changchii khuwruung mee ae chungna Sodom re Gomara mee aechu Thangnang ing aning manchuwhseh vaata.”
Chang-vakonchu ynriimruw; akhaechuve nenuwchu isuwr vachii mee heong vaatae, enuw ing vajeer eenting iruw vaatae amanche meekongnii ting iruw ae naka ibin vaatae.
Enuw ing reentaang mee ae maekungna kakhaena saarkhii ipeehnii lipah aapuh aere iruwng ae maensokna nenuwchu ikiae naka imangiir vaatae.
Amana vajeer tunii khaena ynghenruw aere ynchii basangva kente, ynsaangkhe riirva kente ichii khaena barungriir manjamahruw. Apha ahenpha raenche ynchii riirvakate ichiichu neningna ijepivaata.
Nenuw ing hangchong vanenchii chaap neningtanii mahnii, Thangnang tanii laetha ing ichongpeeh vaata.”
Mee vakhae ing nenuwchu ki kakhaena ibatir vaatae. Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh inche achinii ipha ing khaangcheh nave ikarpeeh pharem vaata.

Khuwruung yngkheh nache nenuwchu ijachaam ipiae nave reentaang yngkhehting ympeenruw. Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, Mee Sapa inche ajuwngmahri raentaang nenuw ing Isrel ae khuwruungna nong nentuchu manchichehmah tanuw.”
Chukhaenache aanchuw mee vaangche atam mee ingkho penvachiiva, amanche suwh ingkho aafhuw vaang penvachiiva. Eensung aafhuwchu Beelzebul nave, ama eengkuwchu aajaehmeh sakmah vaate!”
Ki ing ynthimna kariir chong havi nenuw ing ireng nache chongruw, amanche nengana ing nensii vakhae havi phuchungting karnuwna manthangruw.
Chukhaenache hakchaang thehchehka laetha atheh chehmah enuwchu chiimah aeruw; changvakonchu laetha re hakchaang aaniimeh mamaangcheh vachii Aafhuw chu athiseh ing chiiruw.
Vasak asae ynniimeh pesa yngkhehna juwrmah chuwkhang? Vokhehkho nenpa ing aru dernamah naka engkaartanii yngkhehpangkho ruwruwna bukmahnii.
Nenrusaena sambur aangkheng chukho ateenchir vasahva.
Chukhaenache ynchik mahruw; nenuw chuve vasak ae chungna nemen iruwhakva.
Chukhaenache mee ae maekungna ki ynru mee chuve, ki ingkho thangbaenna ong kapa maekungna ruvakata.
Changvakonchu mee ae maekungna kichu ynrumah mee chuve, ki ingkho thangbaenna ong kapa maekung nache rumahning.
Ki i laaruw paamna idaechu ipeeh ijuwngva ichii ing manden mahruw; Ki idaechu ipeeh ijuwngmahping, changvakonchu laar tuknii chem ipeeh ijuwngping.
Amachuve asapa ing ampa aruniimah, asanuw ing amnuw aruniimah, ameenuw ing ampuw aruniimah khaena ijuwngping.
Amanche mee ajeehniichu eengkuw sungsah kaartanii vaata.
Amnuw ampa aechu ki ithi ing aning amansiih meechu kakhaena matik chamah; amanche asapa asanuw aechu ki ithi ing aning amansiih mee chukho kakhaena matik chamah.
Amanche akhros sahchu idomnaka kaanuw ajiimah meechu, ki kakhaena matik icha mee mahva.
Ataksah alaetha karsa ningka achii mee chuve maangvaata; amanche kakhaena alaetha abathencheh mee inche ikarpeeh phavaata.
Thangnang chong ajeer ahebariim mee inche Thangnang chong ajeer yngkheh ing phavachii nongmen phavaata; ichum ynthiing mee ahebariim inche ichum ynthiing mee yngkheh ing phavachii nongmen phavaata.
Kaanuw ajii yntuur mee ae kaarna yngkhehchu achuw yngkheh ing chii pinave, ki ing neningna kariirnah, ama mee inche phavachii nongmenchu maangmahnii.
Atii Jesu ing asebok suum ariinii ae ningna chong ariir amanchichakna, ama denchu bathenka ynneengna om khuwveen nache mee ynchuwpeehnii khaena vokhehkho itongpeehnii khaena sisa.
Changlae Khrista ing nong atu chaapchu kaeshumna ong Johon ing asiitah nache, asebok meeniimeh avechiirpa.
Enuw ing Jesu ningna ensii, “Nang i juwngva chiichu vachii, changmahka kenuw ing reentaang yngkheh hahva kenchiiva?”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Nenuw yngkae-nuwna nensii vokhehkho nemu vakhae havi Johon ningna tongruw:
Mikchu ing amupa amanche khibong ing isi achehpa, ynchor aenche manthiingsae vokhehkho naaseeh inche asiichehpa, ithii aechu hangringsae amanche isa chongchu sara ae ningnache yntongsa.
Kataklina fhuwm ynvaemah meechu bor aphava.”
Johon sebok aechu engaangkae inuwnache, Jesu ing Johon khaena ichongchu mee vakhae ningna abasenpa: “Ynchii imunii khaena nenuw ing lamkangna ivasi vachuw? Siiraang ing amanlaap fuwr chuva?
Changmahka ynchii imunii ing ivasi vachuw? Mee yngkheh ing ynnaarjaeh peendiir ynthongchu nenva enva? Chumna changvakonchu ynnaarjaeh peendiir ing ynthong mee aekha iruwng ae een nache ongnae.
Kaningna riirruw, ynchii imunii inche ivasi vachuw? Jaephar chuva? Chumna, changvakonchu nenuw ing nemupa, atak i jaephar chungna ruungna.
Akhaechuve akhaena ynziihka omna:
‘Enruw, ki ing nemaana kachong ijeermee yngkheh kajenchiirsa,
ama ing nemaana nenlam heseem vaata.’

Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, rupanuw ing abaring kaarna Baptis Johon chungna iruungseh hungsuwh mahri. Changvakonchu thangbaen iruwngpaamna aasiingseh inche Johon chungna athiseh ing ruunghakna.
Baptis Johon aaniina ing basenka atanii ipha inge thangbaen iruwngpaam i ruwreng ing asuwrnah, vokhehkho ensuwr mee aenche siih aeka enrinah.
Akhaechuve Jaephar ae vokhehkho Mosi vajeer chonghak inche Johon aanii ipha inge iruwngpaam khaena chongnae;
amachu nenuw ing runungka tatanuwve, jungtheng vachii Elija chu atak iva.
Isiinii aana ipaar mee chaap inche siisa rasiing.
“Changvakonchu ataen siimnii suwnthar sitiae i ynchiithoh mandeeng kate? Enuw i kithiirna naepang ae ong aeka embarakfhuw engarang engeenthoh aanghakna.
Amachuve, ‘kenuw ing nakhaena seemruwr kentumnah, changva-konchu nang laammahchii; kenuw ing naning kemansiknah, changvakonchu nabarungriir jamah.’
Johon ing isahnii khaena juwngmah, chukhae-nache enuw ing atak i umlae adeensa enchiinah.

Mee Sapa inche saka inka thengsa, chutahnache enruw kaaraam aere juw in, ree ikhuum mee ae vokhehkho isii icher ae engarang chuva ta aeka enuw ing enriirnah; changvakonchu anong inche chumna taka amandangpa.”
Aanuwchak nache ama ing isuwh-mahri nong aajaeh atunii khuw aechu ynchah ahenbasenpa, akhaechuve enuw embarungriir huungmahdehsae.

“Nakhaena aajaehmeh ijaaniivaate, Korazin, nakhaena ijaniisapa Betsaija, mee ing atuchehmah nong aajaeh nakhaena yntu vakhae havi Taire re Sidon paamna vanave, peendiir asii niiae naka vokhehkho rungvuwh yntaeh ae naka embarungriir huungva chiipae.
Chukhaenache neningna kariirnah, vajeer inii nache nenuw ithi ing Taire re Sidon ing ningchuwh phaseh vaatae.

Kaparnaum nangve, nataksah ing thangbaen ipha ing ynthoh saning nachiiva? Nang chuve ithii lipah ipha ing jungbuk vaanta. Nakhaena mee ing atuchehmah nong aajaeh yntu i Sodom na isuwh vanave, atanii ipha ing Sodom paam omjaeh vachiichu!
Chukhaenache naningna kariirnah, vajeer inii nache nang ithi ing Sodom paam inche ningchuwh phaseh vaata.”

Apha ichiinache Jesu ing ahemandang, “Laaruw thangbaen Aafhuw Apa, nangchu kaman-pahnahchii, nang ing hava vakhae i ising aere aanghuw mee ae taklinache thuurchiika amanche aanghuwmah ae ningnache namandangpa.
Apa chumna, havi inge nang namanden chuva.”

“Aangkhenglaang kaningna kapa ing ymmansirpa, ampa mahnaka asapa chu achuw ingkho manghuwmah, vokhehkho asapa mahnaka ampa chu achuw ingkho manghuwmah, amanche asapa ing mandang ningka achii meening nachen mahnaka achuw ingkho ampa chu manghuwmah.”
“Ijapak ing nong tuchuwka vokhehkho peehrik nenreen nenuw vakhae kaningting huungruw; ki ing nenja basumpeeh vakachuw.
Kariingkor rinuwna niiruw vokhehkho tamruw, akhaechuve ki duwrning vokhehkho ynjuursaning, amana chembe nenlaetha jabasumnii phavanenta.
Akhaechuve kariingkor chuve laena vokhehkho jaangna.”
Apha ichiinache Jesu ing Deennii iniina asebok aethoh ruwchimna envasiraenche asebok ae enven chaamka sabar chim aeka ensah.
Changlaenche Pharisi aeng emutah nache Jesu ningna enriir, “Enla, nasebok aeng Deennii iniina chonghak ing arumah iser nong entupa.”
Amana Jesu ing abasang ae, “Devit vokhehkho aanruwfhuw aenche enven achaamtahna ynchii atu ichiichu nenuw nenpamahva?
Ama ing rumniieen sungting ynsaangkhe varuwhka chonghak ing arumah vokhehkho jaethiim mahnaka enuw ing isah arumah tarchu asahpae?
Amachupang mahka Deennii iniina jaethiim aeng rumniieenna Deennii nongruwchu tumahkhang ae nakho enuw raarmah ae ichii Mosi chonghak na ynziihchu nenpamahva?
Chukhaenache neningna kariirnah, rumniieen athiseh ing iruung hane ongna.
Changvakonchu ki ing ningchuwhchu kaadikva, chaatha ipeehchu idikmah ing. Nenuw ing havi ynchii achiiniiva ichii manghuw tanuwve, emiraar omah mee aechu manraar mahva nenchiiva;
Mee Sapa i Deennii Aafhuw chuva.”
Jesu ing engongnii maphamchu maka meekongnii tingche vaksa,
amanache akik yngkheh ithiipoh sapa yngkheh heong. Amana Jesu chu manraar kenta ichii mee topoh heong aenche aningna asii ae, “Deennii iniina ina yndam aruvakhang?”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw nengkaarna achuw yngkheh jaochu Deennii iniina yngkuwng sungting buknacha, ama ing jaochu isuwmah niikhang?
Jao chungna mee ing amen ruwhakna! Chukhaenache isa nong chuve Deennii inii nakho itu chonghak ingkho arusa.”
Changlaenche ama ing ina mee ningnache ariir, “Nakik kha hengathohla.” Akikchu ahengathoh tahnache paangkheh tanii akik vaangkhe damkiirsa.
Chutahnache Pharisi aechu anikungna taangting jungsuwh aeka ynsaangkhe Jesu havi thehvaan chiiva ichii chong emanseerpa.
Jesu ing amachu amanghuw tahnache engongnii aphamchu abathenpa; amana mee inempak inche Jesu aanuwchu enjiipa. Ama ing ina vakhae aechu amandampa,
vokhehkho atak i achuwva ichii riirmahdehruw taka iruwpak ing chong ajeerpa.
Havi jaephar Isaia ningna Thangnang ing amanriir vasah chongchu ahungchumnii khaenava:
“Enruw, ki ing kaateer vasah kameenae,
aningna kabarungriir inempak ingam kaning kamansiih chuva;
ataklina kalaetha thinva kata,
ama ing reentaang mee ae ningnache ichumchu mandang vaata.”
“Amave ynchehjaar mahnii, vokhehkho uungmah dehnii,
lamfhuwna mee ing aaruurkho siimahnii.
Ama ing ichum vajeer inche acheh mahtaang,
thingkiir tikho khiihmahnii,
Mi ichuwh chukho thehmahnii;
amanche thingna tikho manchir mahnii,
aningnache reentaang mee aeng ningmanden mangom vaatae.”
Changlaenche umlae ichuwng amik ichu achong isuwhmah mee yngkheh enveruw. Jesu ing amachu amansak tahnache achong suwhsa vokhehkho imukho amupa.
Chu-khaenache mee vakhae ing engik lamher ing ariir ae, “Havi Devit sapa khamah vakhang?”
Jesu ing emandenchu amang-huwtah nache eningna ariir, “Iruwng lipah sungna ynlehmah nave lipah kiina. Amanche khuwsungna vokheh-kho eensungna ynlehmah nave ipaar chehmahnii ae.”
Chutahnache umlae ing umlae thurcheh nave embingna ynleh mahpae, vokhehkho alipahchu ynsaangkhe paarva chiiva?
Ki ing Beelzebul ruwreng jaarna umlaechu kathur vanave, nenuw nensiti aecha achuw ruwreng jaarna thurva chiipae? Chukhaenache nentaklina enuw ing vajeer aafhuw ynsuwh vaatae.
Changvakonchu ki ing Thangnang laetha jaar ing umlaechu kathur vanave, atatak ing neningna iruwng lipahchu thengsa.
“Changmah naka achuw yngkheh ing ipirpak eenna varuwh naka atakchu maensa ing phuwpmah tanga naka apeehchu ynsaangkhe richehva takhang? Atakchu phuwpvaang naka a-een sungna peehchu richehpeh vaata.”
Chukhaenache ki ing neningna kariir-nah, isii chaap vokhehkho ithipak ing ichong vakhang nakho kuhpeeh vaata, changvakonchu ynthiing laetha taklina ithipak ing ichong mee chuve ikuhpeeh phamahnii.
Achuw yngkheh ing Mee Sapa takline arumah ing chongkhang nakho kuhpeeh vaata; changvakonchu ynthiing laetha taklina arumah ing ichong mee chuve ataraenkho amanche ringseeh nakho ikuhpeeh phamahnii.”
Baruwr sitiae, nentakcha nensakchah ing ynsaangkhe isachu chongchehva nente? Abarungriirna amandenchu aner ing hangchong pehva.
Isa barungriir areen mee tanii isa suwhna amanche isamah barungriir areen mee tanii isamah suwhna.
Changvakonchu ki ing neningna kariirnah, achuw yngkheh ing ikaniimah chong ichongchaap vajeer inii nache hemandang savaata.
Akhaechuve nachong inuwzii ing imanchum vaata amanche nachong inuwzii ing imanraar vaata.”
Jesu ing abasang ae, “Ichamah vokhehkho rupanuwna ichuwhmah siti ae ing laetho mandangnii khaena ajongnah ae; changvakonchu jaephar Jona laetho mahnaka yngkheh pangkho pimahning.”
Jona ing iruungpak nga vensungna siimthum jaenthum ynthin vaangkhe, Mee Sapa chukho ynthin vaata.

Nineva mee ae ing vajeer inii nache ataen siimnii suwnthar siti aethoh hangiir ae naka nenuwchu imanraar vaatae; akhaechuve enuw ing Jona thamin itongna embarungriir enghuungpa, amanche enruw, Jona chungna iruungseh hane ongna.

Khuwbur irip tanii iruwngnuw vokhehkho ataen siimnii suwnthar siti aethoh hangiir ae naka nenuwchu imanraar vaatae; akhaechuve iruwngnuw ing laaruw paam adongnii tanii Solomon ising iveerchu siisa kata taka itheng, amanche enruw, Solomon chungna iruungseh hane ongna.
“Umlae inche mee yngkheh ningtanii hungsuwhka chii omah paamting baverka aongnii ajongcha tuwhmahsa.
Aanuwnache ama ing atii ki ing kamah een tingkhe athar hunganritah kata taka ahunganritah nache eenchu aruwh ing heomsa, ynruwhpehsa vokhehkho mamaennii vaangkhe heomsa.

Amana aarang vajong reehka ama ithi ing ichamah umlae sariimeh asungting ruwh aeka ongsae. Amanache ameechu amaensa nakha ithi ing aningkuur ing sakmahsehsa. Havi vaange hava suwnthar nenkho isamah i hungsuwh vaata.”
Jesu ing mee ae ningna achonglae enruw, amnuw re anae ae ing aningna chong riirnungka ta aeka enghah.
Chukhaenache mee yngkheh ing aningna ariir, naningna chong iriirnii khaena nangnuw re nanae ae ing taangna ynghahnah ae.
Jesu ing abasang, “Achuwva ki kanuwchu? Achuw aepae ki kanae aechu?”
Ama ing asebok aechu man-tika ariir, “Hanene kanuw vokhehkho kanae aechu ongnae!
Akhaechuve thangbaen paamna ong kapa ing amanden nong atu meechu ki kanaeva, ki kasar chuva amanche ki kanuw chuva.”
Ama inii nache Jesu ing een tanii hungsuwhka chifhuw kuurting vaksa.
Ama mapham nache akuurna mee inempak avaangkong tahnache Jesu ing ruwkuwngna hangkarka ngiirsa; changlaenche mee vakhae ing chifhuw kuurnache ingiir ae.
Amana Jesu ing thamin atongthoh ynruw ing manchuw aeka eningna ariir, “Mee yngkheh ing sachii ivor hungsuwhsa,
ama ing sachii avorlae lam kuurna ibuwchu vaati ing asahpa.
Sachii areh inche rung kaarna bukka abur adongkhroh tahnache imaenhak ing hangmuwng khangnakho
inii ynsa ing deengka manvuwsa, vokhehkho arajung paecheh mahka chongsa.
Sachii areh inche iring kaarna bukka iring inche aabuum tahnache ynla chehmahsa.
Sachii areh ingve ruwruw isana bukka isajaeh ing hang-muwngka sarup chaama, somruk, vokhehkho sarup somthum ithi ing ynlana.”
Aana ipaar mee chaap inche siisa rasiing.
Amana sebok ae ing Jesu ningna ensii, “Ynchii khaena eningna yng-huwnii thamin ing natongva.”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Ithuwhpak Thangnang lipah chong havi neningna chembe amandangpa, changvakonchu eningna chembe pimahri ae.
Adeen mee ningna inempak adeennii ing pivakata; amanche adeenmah mee ningtanii chuve adeensah topohti chukho rivakata.
Ki ing eningna ynghuwnii thamin ing katong havi en-khang ae nakho mumahnii ae, rungae vaatae changvakonchu siimahnii ae amanche ynghuwkho manghuwmahnii ae.
Jaephar Isaia ing ajeerchu entaklina suwhna amachuve:
‘Enuw ing rungae chuve rungaevaatae, changvakonchu manghuwmah niiae,
enuw ing enchuve envaatae changvakonchu mumah niiae.
Akhaechuve embarungriir musa vokhehkho engana pirsa,
amanche emik engasiingpa;
changmah nave emik ing muae naka, engana ing siiae naka,
embarungriirna manghuw ae naka,
vokhehkho kaningting hunganleh ae naka,
amanche ki ing enuwchu mandamva kachiipae.’
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, Jaephar aajaeh ing vokhehkho Thangnang mee aajaeh ing nenuw ing nemu havi munungka enchii muchehmah ae, amanche nensii chong havi siinungka enchii siichehmah ae.
“Chutahnache sachii ivor thamin havi rungaeruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing iruwng lipah chong havi siikhang nakho manghuwmah nave, ichamah thengka abarungriirna avorchu asiihpa; haviva lam kuurna sachii ynvorchu.
Rung kaarna sachii ynvor chuve, ama ing chongchu asiithoh rotharohpak ing anikungna aaraangpa.
Changvakonchu arajung ithuwh ing apaehmah tahnache among pangteh khaena abadaar. Chutahnache havana chong khaene inangnii abasuw raenche ama ing anikungna abathenpa.
Iring kaarna sachii ynvor chuve, isa chongchu asiipa, changvakonchu laaruw paam vakhar re lerchii yndik ing chehka ynlachehmah chuva.
Ruwruw isana sachii ynvor chuve chongchu siika amanghuwsa, amanche sarup chaama, somruk, vokhehkho sarup sothum ynlana.”
Jesu ing eningna reentaang thamin yngkhehkho atong amachuve, “Thangbaen paam i mee yngkheh ing isa sachii avorthoh yndeeng arusa.
Changvakonchu mee aenche enjaarthir aajeehnii mee ing thengka akaarna ichuwr amuw vorka yngkaesa.
Chukhaenache hangmuwngka aanlarae ichuwr thoh hangmuwngsa.
Amana ameenae aeng theng aeka aningna enriir, ‘Aafhuw naruwraena isa sachii vormah chiikhang? Ynsaang taka ichuwr ynvaeva?’
Jesu ing eningna ariir, ‘Havi ki eejeehnii mee aeng atupae.’ Amana meenae aeng embasang, ‘Chunuwcha vaknungka ichuwr chaap vaaphichir kente?’
Changvakonchu ama ing ariir, ‘Iphimah riruw,’ ichuwrchu kenga-phinah tatanuwka gehu burkho iphiniiva nenta.

Khangkhe ichii ing muwnghak jaehtah ae rasiing, ikuumpha inii nache ki ing aakuum ae ningna ichuwr aekha ynthufhuw ing amaensana khuum nuwna phuwpruw, changvakonchu gehu chuve ki kaatomting thinruw tavakata.”
Jesu ing eningna reentaang thamin yngkhehkho atong, “Thang-baen lipah i mee yngkheh ing encham muw avorthoh aanghakna;
havi sachii kaarna aasiingsehva, changvakonchu ahangmuwng raenchembe hangruungka thingbur vaang ruungna, amanche vaati aeng enrabuw enghuwniinah.”
Jesu ing eningna thamin reentaang yngkhehkho atongreeh, “Thangbaen lipah i rupanuw yngkheh ing jaamchu sarup ynthum chor thohche manvaenohka ahangpuur mahtaang athuur thoh aanghakna.”
Jinge ichii ing Jesu ing eningna chong aangkheng ynghuwnii thamin ing atong; ynghuwnii thamin ynvaeru ing yntanga chongmah.
Havi Jaephar ing ariir chongchu isuwhnii khaena ariirva,
“Ki kaner ing thamin tongva kata,
laaruw paam abasenraennii ing yndangmah ithuwh chong aangkheng riirva kata.”
Aanuwna Jesu ing mee vakhaechu maka een sungting varuwhsa, amana asebok aeng theng aeka Jesu ningna enriir, “Ruwraena ichuwr om thamin natong khaenakhe isajaeh ing iriirpeehra.”
Amana Jesu ing enuwchu basang-ka ariir, “Isa sachii avorchu Mee Sapa chuva;
ruwrae inche laaruw paam iva; amanche isa sachii inche iruwng lipah siti aepae; ichuwr inche ichamah siti aepae,
amanche ichamah avorchu umlaeva; ikuumpha ahenpha inche laaruw paam hungchi ynthongva amanche aakuum mee aechu vaarmee aepae.
Ichuwr khuum aeka embathu vaangkhe, laaruw paam achipha nache changche suwhvaata.
Mee Sapa inche avaarmee ae jenchiir vaata, enuw ing isii atu mee ae vokhehkho ichamah mee vakhae khuum vaatae.
Amana enuwchu mi sungting renvaatae; amanache enuw ing chapvaatae vokhehkho engha iriir ae naka ijachaam phavaatae.
Chang-laenche Thangnang mee aenche iruwng lipahna inii irengvaang rengvaatae. Aana ipaar mee chaap inche siisa rasiing.”
“Thangbaen lipahchu ruwraena lerchii yndimka omthoh aanghakna, amachu mee yngkheh ing atuwhtahna mangkhum jaehka arutha iroh ing yngkaeka adeensah aangkheng juwrka ruwraechu aariithoh ynghakna.”
“Athar vokheh, Thangbaen lipah-chu amen iruwpak rung ajong lerchii ataar mee yngkheh thoh aanghakna,
ama ing amen iruwpak rung yngkhehchu atuwhpa; amana yngkaeka ama ing adeensah aangkheng juwrka amachu aariipa.”
“Athar vokheh, thangbaen lipah-chu ngaklah aeng chifhuwna ichak deeng aeka nga masing ikip inempak ahengkhum pohthoh aanghakna,
ichakchu sipka taangting aheng-kipae; amana ong aeka isa chaapchu khutheengna enthinpa changvakonchu isamah chaap chuve enrenpa.
Chang-che ichii ing laaruw paam ikho achipha nache suwhvaata. Vaarmee aeng juwng ae naka isa mee ae kaartanii isamah mee aechu iteervaatae,
amanche isamah vakhaechu mi sungting renvaatae; amanache chapvaatae vokhehkho engha iriir vaatae.”
“Hava vakhae i nemanghuwpe?” Enuw ing Aafhuw kemanghuwpa ta aeka embasang.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Chukhaenache thang-baen lipah khaena kasebok ynsuwh thiimthang ae chaap ing endeen vakhae itharkho amanche baruwkho ahemandang eensung aafhuw thoh aanghakva.”
Jesu ing thamin itong amanchi-dehna ympeenka
ama ing aongnii paam tungka meekongnii nache mee aechu amanchuw, amana enuw ngik aeka enriir, “Hava mee inge hangjaeh ising iveer i vokhehkho mee ing atuchehmah nong atu havi utanii aphava?
Atak chuve thing ichar nongtu siti khamah vakhang? Amnuw ruming Meri mahvakhang? Jems, Josep, Simon vokhehkho Judas aekha anaemah paekhang?
Amanche asar ae chukho inuwthoh onghakmah muwkhang? Chunuwcha hava vakhae i ama ing utanii aphava?”
Changche ichii ing Jesu enrumahchu emandang. Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Thangnang jaephar i reentaang paam navaang akhuwsung mee vokhehkho a-eengkuw mee ae rap ingkho teenmah ae.”
Enuw ing aningna enthachamah khaenache, Jesu ing ama mapham nache iruungpak nong inempak tumah.
Apha ichiinache Jesu ajae isi khaena Galili aapuh Herot iruwng ing asiipa.
Amana Herot ing ameenae ningna ariir, “Havi atatak ing Baptis Johon chuva; ama ithii tanii hangringsa, chutahnache ama ing laetho nong havi atuchehva.”
Herot ing amaensana Johon chu suwrka kaeshum ting asiih. Havi akhaechuve Herot ing anaepa rumee Herodias chu aadik khaenava.
Akhaechuve Johon ing Herot ningna ariir, “Nang ing nanaepa rumee buwhkata nachii i vajeer kiina.”
Chukhaenache Herot ing Johon chu thehningka takhang nakho, Jehudi mee aanem aenche Johon chu jaephar yngkhehva ichii ing emanden khaenache ynchikka itheh chehmahsa.
Changvakonchu Herot atak apuhnii inii nache Herodias sanuw rupanuwti inche mee vakhae maensokna ahung-laam tahnache Herot pendehka
ama ing rupanuwti ningnache chongreep atu, “Ki ing chongreep katunah, nang ing ynchiiva ynniih chiichu pivakachii!”
Amnuw ing chong atah inuwzii ing havane Baptis Johon rusae pakaan nache ipira taka aniihpa.
Amana iruwng abarungriir inempak jaasa, changvakonchu ama ing aarang ae kaarna chongreep atudoh vakhaka, Johon rusaechu rupanuwti ningnache ipeehnii khaena arupa.
Chutahnache iruwng inche amee vechiirka kaeshumna Johon rusaechu entenpa.
Arusae chu pakaanna henchiaeka rupanuwti ningnache empeehpa, amana henchika ama ing amnuw ningting apeehpa.
Johon sebok aenche vak aeka ithiichu idom aeka endimpa; aanuwnache enuw ing Jesu ningting vak aeka entongpa.
Jesu ing Johon khaena chongchu asiitah nache, ama ing ruwkuwng ongniika asiksii apham yngkhehting ympeensa. Changvakonchu mee aenche ensiitah nache, ama ama akhuwruung tanii hungsuwh aeka enjejiipa.
Jesu ing ruwkuwng tanii jungchumka chifhuw aruvaenache ahungsirae mee inempak ongchu amutah nache ama ing aning amanchuwhpae, amana ina vakhae chukho amandam chirpa.
Atii khuri ajungvitah nache sebok aeng Jesu ningna ariirpae, “Hava min i michuwr daena vokhehkho ithirkho thirsa. Mee vakhae i khuw khuw ting ensahfhuw thaemin ynrii sisa aerasiing.”
“Enuw simah aerasiing, ensahfhuwchu nenuw ing piaeruw,” taka Jesu inche eningna abasang.
Kenuw ing havane tar asae runga re nga asae ynniipang kenchitahsa enchii.
Amachu kaningting henchiruw taka Jesu ing ariirpa.

Amana Jesu ing mee vakhaechu fuwr kaarna ongruw taka ariirpa; Ama ing tar runga re nga asae ynniimehchu averi nuwna thangbaen ting hengenka bor apeehpa vokhehkho tarchu bakhiika asebok ae ningting jepika, sebok aenche mee aechu empeehpa.
Amana mee vakhae inche enven ynva ing ensahpa. Amana abariichu buruk suum ariinii emangkong.
Asah mee vakhaechu rupanuw naepang ynvaeru ing mee lising runga vakhaeva.
Jesu ing mee vakhae amang-kaepha raenche asebok aechu maen ing ruwkuwngna ahemansipa.
Mee vakhaechu amangkae aanuwna ama ing reen ting ithamnii khaena hangkarsa. Amanache khuri ipha ing asanaen inche ongsa.
Changlaenche khuwsii ynleh ing chifhuwchu manohka ruwkuwngchu chifhuw rikting omsa, akhaechuve asiiraangchu asiksiisii ing raangsa.
Jesu ing ziing apha ynthum re kuruk ruwrakna chii taklina asebok ae ningting akhi ing vasisa.
Jesu ivasichu sebok aenche emutah nache ngik aeka havive lae varae ta aeka vokhehkho engaanchik inche uungsae.
Changvakonchu aphachak nache Jesu ing eningna vachongka ariir, “Nenuw nenbarungriir mangamruw, kiping ynchik mahruw.”
Amana Pitar ing Aafhuw, nang va-taniive chii takline naningting ivaknii khaena ibasohsar taka Jesu ningna averiir.
Jesu ing vakla taka abasang. Chutahnache Pitar ing ruwkuwng tanii hangiirka chii taklinache sika Jesu ningting vaksa.
Changvakonchu siiraang ipirchu amutah nache ynchiksa, vokhehkho chii inche arup ynthong tahnache Aafhuw akarsar taka uungsa.
Changlaenche Jesu ing abaen ajejamthoh jebachuwka ariir, “Nathacha aajaehmeh isiingva! Ynchii khaena nachingniiva?”
Enuw ing ruwkuwng ting enghangong chakthoh siiraangkho daesa.
Amana ruwkuwngna ong sebok aenche Jesu chu rum aeka enriir, “Atatak ing nang i Thangnang sapa chuvachii.”
Enuw ing chifhuwchu iraen aeka Genesaret ichii paam nache hungtungsae,
changlae amanache heong mee aenche achuwva ichii emanghuw vasahva. Chukhaenache ama paamna ong mee ae ningnache manthang aeka ina aangkheng aningting enveruwpa.
Enuw ing Jesu peendiir abasuwrpang chukho ina aeng iparnii khaena aningna thamsa aeka apar mee vakhae aechu idamkiir aphasahpae.
Changlaenche Jerusalem tanii Pharisi aere thiimthang aeng Jesu ningna theng aeka ensii,
“Yngkhaena nasebok aeng upa ae purahchu reeh aeka engkik isuwru ing thaemin ensahva?”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Nenuwcha ynchii khaena nenpurah ing Thangnang chongchu nenbakhiiva?
Thangnang ing ariir chuve, ‘Nangnuw nangpa ijaara, amanche achuw yngkheh ing amnuw ampa taklina siraap pinave thikrasii achiisa.’
Changvakonchu nenuw ing nenriir-nah, nang ing kaningtanii ikanii phava nachiichu Thangnang ting kapeehpa tanave, ama ing amnuw changmahka ampachu ijaamah khangnakho aruva.
Chukhaenache nenuw nenpurah ingkhe Thangnang chongchu teen-taen seemmahchuw.
Isachaang itu ae! Isaia ing nenuw nengkhaena hungsuwh vachii ichum ing ariirsa!
‘Enerna chembe ki eejanah ae,
Changvakonchu embarungriir chuve kithoh yndahpaknung;
laaruw paam isii ibuwr dichu,
Thangnang chong pangeng ichii ing,
mee vakhaechu manchuw aeka vensasah ing ynrumnah ae.’ ”
Amana Jesu ing mee aechu enka ariir, “Rungaeruw vokhehkho mang-huwruw;
baeting ijungruwh ingkhe meechu manchohmah, changvakonchu baetanii ihungsuwh inche meechu amanchohnah.”
Changlaenche asebok aeng Jesu ningna vak aeka ariir ae, “Nachong kha Pharisi aeng ensiitahna embarung isiikha namanghuw mahva?”
Jesu ing abasang ae, “Thangbaenna ong kapa ing aphin chumahnaka asanaen ing imuwng chaap arajung thoh aangkheng ymphichir vaata.”
Pitar ing atae ithuwh chong ing mandeeng chiika nariirkha keningna iriirpeehra achii.”
Jesu ing ariir, “Nenuwkho ata-raen ipha ing nemanghuwmah riva?
Ynsah vakhae venting jungruwhka vokhehkho taang suwhna ichii nemanghuwmah riva?
Nerna hungsuwh vakhaechu barungriir sungtaniiva, ama inche meechu aman-chohva.

Ama vakhae chuve isamah barungriir, miktheh, reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah itu, vokhehkho naamak itu, lamruw, ichummah saarkhii itu, mee irensah, hava vakhae i barungriir tanii ihungsuwhva.
Hava vakhae inge mee amanchohnah; changvakonchu kik chaamru ing thaemin isah inche mee manchohmah.”
Ama denchu Jesu ing bathenka Taire re Sidon paamting sisa.
Amana Kanaan tanii rupanuw yngkheh ing Jesu ningna thengka ichap ing iva uungsah, “O Aafhuw, Devit sapa, naning imanchuwhsara, kasanuw taklina umlae ing chuwngka ichiisuwhpak ing omna.”
Chang-vakonchu Jesu ing basangmah dehsa. Chutahnache asebok ae ing Jesu ningna hava rupanuw i eenuw jiika uungbirna ibathenpeehra ta aeka athamsahpae.
Changlaenche Jesu ing aba-sang, “Ki chuve Isrel siti ymmoh ae khaenapang ynjenchiir vatah.”
Changvakonchu rupanuw inche vakka vokhehkho athamsah, “Aafhuw, Ibomsara!”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing basangka ariir, “Naepang ae sahfhuw tarchu uti ting ipeeh chuve chum-mahnii.”
Rupanuw inche chumne Aafhuw, changvakonchu aafhuw thaesahnii tanii ibuw aanta rapkho uti aeng ensahnah taka abasang.
Amana Jesu ing aningna abasang, “O sanuw, nang nathacha inempak pirna! Namanden inuwzii ing phasara.” Amana sanuwchu damsa.
Jesu ing ama paamchu bathenka Galili chifhuw kuurna hungsisa. Amana reen yntongting hangkarka ongsa.
Changlaenche mee inempak ing aningna theng aeka khibong, mikchu, achong isuwhmah, reentaang ina aajaeh veruw aeka Jesu ningnache amansirpae, amana enuwchu ama ing amandam chirpae.

Amanache achong isuwh mahkho suwhsa, khibong ingkho isi achehpa, mikchu ingkho imusah aphapa, reentaang ina vakhae chukho amandam chirpa. Ama vakhaechu mee vakhae aenche emutah nache ngiksae vokhehkho enuw ing Thangnang inempak amanpahpae.

Jesu ing asebok aechu eenka eningna ariir, “Havane ong mee vakhae i kaning amanchuwhnah ae, thaemin sarudeh aeng inii nithumchak inuwthoh onghak samuw. Ki ing enuw i venchaam thoh mangkae ae ningka tamah ing, akhaechuve lamna enven ichaam ing tam ing suwr ae naka itiihkho arusae.”
Amana sebok aeng embasang, “Yndahpak paambing sungne mee hangjaeh inem aansuwhnii tarchu una rivakente?”
Jesu ing eningna asiipae, “Nenuw incha tar aajaeh nenreensa?” Tar sarii re ngadii topoh tahna ta aeka embasang.
Amana Jesu ing mee vakhaechu ruwruwna ongnii khaena ariirpa.
Amana tar re ngachu chika Thangnang chu manpahka abakhiipa, amanche asebok ae ningtingche jepika, asebok ae inche mee changjaeh inemchu apeehpae.
Mee vakhae inche enven ynva ing ensahpa. Abariichu sebok aeng engkhuum tahnache buruk sariimeh bariisa.
Imaar mee vakhaechu rupanuw naepang ynvaeru ing pasar lising manrii empha.
Aanuwnache Jesu ing mee vakhaechu mangkaeka Magadaan ichii paam tingche ruwkuwngna sisa.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Khuri ajungvirae nenuw ing vaangseng takna, khuw sakvaata nenchiinah.

Ziing ahenpha nachembe vaangseng takna lamkho uwna; ataniive khuw suwrvaata nenchiinah. Nenuw ing minvaen ziih inuwzii ing ynchii suwhvaate ichii nemanghuwsa, changvakonchu laetho apha chuve nenuw manghuw chehmah tanuw.
Ichamah vokhehkho ichuwhmah siti aenche laetho yndangchu ajongnah ae, changvakonchu Jona laetho yndang chumah naka reentaang laetho yndangnii pimah ningchuw.”
Sebok aeng siaeka chiilaar engkah nuwna tar ireen embahirchu engaansiipa.
Chutahnache Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw Pharisi aere Saduki ae chor khaena ynriimruw.”
Enuw enareersahna yngkheh yngkheh chongsae, “Ama ing ariir havi inuw ing tar ynreenmah khaenava.”
Amachu Jesu ing amanghuw tahnache ariir, “O topoh pangti thacha om ae, nenuw ing tar nenreenmah khaena nentaksahna ynchii khaena ichong vachuw?
Nenuw ing ataenpha nemanghuwmah riva? Tar runga ing mee lishing runga ympika amanche abarii buruk aajaehmeh nemangkong nengaansiimahva?
Changpang mahka athar tar sarii ing mee lising manrii ympika amanche abarii buruk aajaeh nemangkong?
Ki ing tar khaena ichong mahping ichii ynsaangkhe nenuw ing nemanghuw mahva? Chukhaenache Pharisi aere Saduki ae chor khaena ynriimruw.”
Changlaenche chor ynvae tar khaena ichong mahva, Pharisi aere Saduki ae chongzeer nakhe ynriimruw achiiniiva ichii emanghuwpa.
Jesu ing Kesaria Philipi paam nache ahungsirae ama ing asebok ae ningna asii, “Mee aencha Mee Sapa i achuwva ta aeka ariirnah ae?”
Enuw ing enriir, “Achuw yngkheh ing Baptis Johon vachii, achuw yngkheh ing Elija vachii, areh aenche Jeremia chuva amanche Thangnang Jaephar chuva ta eka ariirnah ae.”
“Nenuw incha ki i achuwva ynchiinahchuw?”
Amana Jesu ing Pitar ningna abasang, “Simon Bar-Jona, nang saknachii! Havi laaruw hakchaang re sii ing naninga imanriir vachii chongmahva, changvakonchu havi chuve thangbaenna ong kapa ning-taniiva.
Amatah nache naningna kariirnah amachuve nang i Pitar vachii, hava rung takline ki karuwrthiing mangiirva kata, amachu ithii ruwreng inche utaenkho chehmahnii.
Ki ing thangbaen iruwng lipah longtingchu naningna pivakachii; laaruw paamna nang ing naphuwpchu thangbaen nakho ynphuwp vaata, amanche laaruw paamna nabathenchu thangbaen nakho ynthen vaata.”
Ama aanuwnache Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ki i Khrista chuva ichii achuw ningnakho riirmahdehruw taka ajeerpa.

Amanache basenka Jesu ing asebok ae ningna isajaeh ing ariirpa, “Ki Jerusalem ting siningka upa ae, aanchung jaethiim ae amanche thiimthang ae kikna ijachaam aajaeh kakhaang inuwna ithehvaatae, changvakonchu aanuw inii nithum nache hangring vakata.”
Amana Pitar ing Jesu chu ruwka arakuh, “Aafhuw, Thangnang ing rumahnii, ama changchiichu naningna utaenkho suwhmahnii.”
Jesu ing Pitar ningting vaanlehka ariir, “Umlae, katuknung ting ong! Nang ing kama namansiknah, akhaechuve nang ing namanden ive Thangnang tanii mahva, laaruw paam taniiva.”
Achuw yngkheh aringkum karningka achii mee inche imaangchu phavaata; changvakonchu ki kakhaena aringkum imaang mee chuve iringchu phavaata.
Achuw yngkheh ing laaruw paam vakhae phakhang nakho, alaetha mamaang nacha ynchii kaaniivaate?
Mee Sapa inche ampa aruwreng thoh, avaarmee aethoh ajuwnglaenche, mee vakhae ing ama ama ing atu ari inuwzii ing nongmen phasa vaata.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, havane mee topoh ingiir ae i Mee Sapa ing aaruwng lipah thoh ijuwngchu emumahtaang ithiichu mumahnii ae.”
Atii inii niruk aanuwna Jesu ing Pitar re Jems vokhehkho anaepa Johon enuwchu enumpang ing yngkaangpak bung ting aruwpae.
Changlaenche emaekungna Jesu ing amasak uurka amanche amaechu inii vaangche aenka vokhehkho apeendiir chukho ireng vaangche vaarsa.
Amana enruw, Mosi re Elija yndang aeka Jesu thohche thamin entongpa.

Chutahnache Pitar ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Aafhuw, havane inuw ong ing sakvaata, irupeeh taniive ki ing khurpeenthaam yn-thummeh narutum yngkheh, Mosi rutum yngkheh amanche Elija rutum yngkheh tukata.”

Ama ing achong raenche enruw, aenpak ruwrduh ing abaruwpae, amanche ruwrduh sungtanii senruwr yngkheh ing ariir, “Havi kaning kamansiihpak kasapa chuva; ataklina inempak penning, ama ajaerachu rungaeruw.”
Ama chongchu sebok aeng ensiitah nache ynchik aeka ruwruw ting khupsae.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing ajuwngthoh par aeka ariir, “Hangiirruw, ynchik mahruw.”
Enuw ing paamkhuw enghethiir tahnache Jesu mahnaka achuw tikho mumahsae.
Enuw ing bung tanii enjunganri raenche Jesu ing eningna nungsim thahka ariir, “Nemu chaapkha Mee Sapa ing ithii tanii ahangring mahri raentaang achuw ningnakho riirmahruw.”
Amana sebok aeng Jesu ningna thiimthang ae imbe Elija maensa ing juwngvaata achii ae khacha ta aeka asiipae?
Jesu ing basang aeka eningna ariir, “Amachu chumna,” Elija maensa ing jungtheng naka peehchae aangkheng ajaennii vaangkhe mangomjaeh vaata.

Changvakonchu ki ing neningna kariirnah, Elija chu ijuwng vasahva amanche enuw ing atakchu emanghuwmah tahnache, enuw ing tunungka enchii emandenchu ataklina entupa. Amachu pangeng ichii ing Mee Sapa inche eningtanii ijachaamchu khaangvaata.
Aanuwnache Jesu ing Baptis Johon khaena ichongva ichii emanghuwpa.
Enuw ing mee inempak yngkong ae kaarting enghuung raenche, mee yngkheh inche Jesu ningna vakka amaensok nache vakhupsaka ariir,
“Aafhuw, kasapa taklina naning imanchuwhpeehsara, ama lungor deenka ijachaampak ing omna; akhaechuve misung tingkho, chiisung tingkho ruwhchakna.
Ki ing nasebok ae ningna kaveruwsahva amachu enuw ingkho mandamcheh mahsae.”

Amana Jesu ing abasang, “O, thacha omah vokhehkho yngkuhsiimah suwnthar siti ae, ki aasen iseeh ing nenuwthoh ongva tingkhang? Ki ing nenuwchu aasen iseeh ing badaarva kachii vachuw? Aanuwnache ama ing kaningting naepangkha henruwruw achii.”
Amana umlaechu ama ing arakuh tahnache, umlae inche naepang ningtanii suwhsa, vokhehkho anikung nache naepangchu damsa.
Aanuwnache sebok aeng Jesu chu yntuwhfhuw aeka ensii, “Ynchii khaena kenuw ing umlae kenthurcheh mahva?”

Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing topohti nenthacha tahnava.” Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, encham muw achiihti thoh ynchim ing nenthacha omnave, “Nenuw ing havana bung tinge hanenna ing amatingse ympeenla nenchiitahna ympeen vaata, nenuw ing nenchehmah omahnii.”
“Changvakonchu hava hangchii ive ithamsah vokhehkho maaru itongmah naka suwhthaang thaangmah.”
Atii sebok engkheng Galili nache enthengpoh raenche Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Mee Sapa chu ama ajeehnii mee ae kikting arensah ynthongnah;
enuw ing atakchu thehvaatae amanche animanthumnii inii nache ama hangring vaata.” Amana sebok aechu inempak ening dimsa.
Jesu vokhehkho asebok aenche Kaparnaum na entheng raenche ree ikhuum aeng Pitar ningna vak aeka asii ae, “Nenuw neng oja icha ree apeehmah chakva?”

Pitar ing apeeh chaknah taka abasang. Aanuwnache Pitar ing een sungting hungruwhsa, amana Jesu ing aningna maensa ing asii, “Simon, ynchii namandennah? Laaruw paam iruwng aeng achuw ningtanii peehmen vokhehkho ree arichaknah ae? Enuw ensiti pasar ae ningtanii arichakpae changmahka mee asik ningtanii arichakpae?”
Pitar ing marpah ae ningtanii arichaknah ae taka abasang. “Sakna, chunuw vanave siti pasar ae inge ipeehmah arusa.

Changvakonchu enuw inge inuwchu ymmanraarniimah aeng chifhuw ting vaknana ngakinii va-thahra, amaensana naki ngachu abae mangaangla amanache makhae yngkheh tuwhvaanta; amachu chinana karutum re narutum khaena piaera.”
Amana Jesu ing naepang yngkheh ve eenka engkaarna mangiirka
vokhehkho ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, nenuw ing ynguur tanuwka havana naepang ae vaange tamah tanuwve thangbaen iruwng lipahchu phachehmah tanuw.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing naepang vaange ataksahchu ynjuursa nave, iruwng lipah nache ruungseh vaata.
Achuw yngkheh ing ki karumingna naepang yngkhehchu aning amansiih ing kemsa nave kichu yngkemsahva.

Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing havana naepang ae inge ynthacha ae i isiiting babuk nave, ama meechu ariingna rungsum iruungpak yngkheh yngkhaenaka ithuwhpak chifhuw ting iren inche akhaena sakseh vaata.”
Laaruw paamne isiiting buknii aomtah nache aajaehmeh ijaniiva, akhaechuve havi isuwhmah rumah, changvakonchu isiiting babuk vachii mee taklinache ijaniisapa.
“Nakik vokhehkho nakhi ing isiiting ibabuknii vachii vanave tennana renla; nakik nakhi ikip ing isiiting bukva nachii changve, nakik nakhi ikipmah ing iring napha inche nakhaena saksehna.
Amanche namik ing isiiting ibabuknii vachii vanave iphernana renla, namik ikip ing isii mi sungting bukva nachii changve, namik yngkhehpang om ing iring naphasah inche nakhaena saksehna.”
Akhaechuve Mee Sapa ing ymmoh aechu ikarnii khaena juwngsa.”
“Nenuw ynchii nemandennah? Mee yngkheh ing jao chaama deennaka amanche yngkhehchu ymmoh nave, jao somikuw arii eekuwchu bung nache manaka, ymmoh jao yngkhehchu jong-mah niikhang?
Neningna atatak ing kariirnah, ajao yngkheh ymmohchu tuwhnave, jao somikuw arii eekuw aechu ithi ing jao yngkheh ymmoh atuwh khaenache arotha rohseh vaata.
Amathohche aanghak ing havana naepang ae i yngkheh pangkho ymmohchu thangbaenna ong kapa ing amanden chumahva.”
Changvakonchu nang ing nariirchu irungaepeehmah nave, mee ynnii ynthum nertanii saarkhii aomnii ing, mee yngkheh meenii ikheer ing ruw-reehra.
Amana chenkho rumah nave ruwrthiing ting manthangla, ruwrthiing chong chukho rungaemah nave, ama meechu lae arum vokhehkho ree ikhuum meeva ichii ing riruw.
Athar ki ing neningna kariirnah amachuve, laaruw paamna mee yng-kheh meenii ing rutanuwka neniihchu thangbaenna ong kapa ing tuvaata.
Ki karuming nache meenii ynthum pangkho purtanuwve, nengkaarna kikho ynvaeva kata.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Ki ing naning-na kariirnah, vasarii pang mahva changvakonchu vasomsarii arii sarii ipha ing vachiiva.”
Chutahnache thangbaen iruwng lipahchu laaruw paamna iruwng yngkheh ing ameenae thoh seer empha isi vakhae isajaeh ing manvuwh chirka asiihthoh aanghakva.
Iruwng inche seer empha isi aang-kheng amanvuwhrae, aseer talen lising suum atuur mee yngkheh aningna ahenruwpae.
Amachu ipha ing alertuurchu singcheh mahsa. Chutahnache iruwng inche ariirpa, arumee, asiti amanche apeehchae aangkheng juwrchir nuwna alertuur i singnii rasiing taka chonghak apeehpa.
Seer atuur mee inche rumka athamsahpa, “Ki ing katuur seer chaap singsa vakachii apha topoh ihahsara.
Iruwng inche aning manchuwhka alertuur chaapchu kuhpeeh chirka amangkaepa.
‘Changvakonchu ama ing aangkaerae dinari chaama atuur meenae aarang yngkheh yntuwhsae; chutahnache aarangchu suwrka ariingna irahka seer yntuur chiika ising behra taka asiingpa.
Chutahnache aarang inche rumsaka, kaarang apha topoh pangti ihahsara taka athamsahpa.
Chang-vakonchu ama ing rumahka atuurchu asingmahritaang atakchu kaeshum sungnache asiihpa.
Amana isuwh vakhaechu aarang areh aenche emutah nache nungaemahdeh aeka iruwng ningnache ahungtongpae.’
Aanuwnache iruwng ing amachu eenka ariir, Ichummah meenae nang ing nalertuur khaena ynthamsahtah nachii ki ing nalertuur vakhae kakuhpeeh chirmah vachiikhang.
Ki ing nangchu kaning kamanchuwhchii vaangkhe, nangkho naarang havi naning manchuwhmah taniikhang?
Aafhuw inche amachu abarung mansikka, alertuur vakhaechu asing-chir mahtaang atakchu ponti pinii khaena kaeshum aapaanii tingche apeehpa.”
“Chukhaenache nenguw nenae aechu nenbarungriir sungna nening manchuwhmah tanuwve, thang-baenna ong kapa inche aanghakjaeh ing nentaklina chenkho tuvaata.”
Jesu ing havi ariir inuwnache, Galili bathenka Jordan laarna om Judia paamting sisa.
Chang-laenche mee inempak ing aanuw ajiipae, amanche ina vakhaechu ama ing amandampae.
Amana Pharisi aeng aningting vak aeka jinge ichii ing menkenta enchii, “Pasar yngkheh ing afhuwnii denniichah ing arumee aansaefhuw thaangthaang vajeer chonghak ing aruse?”
Jesu ing abasang ae, “Ajae aba-senraennii ing Aaseem Aafhuw inche pasar re rupanuw aseemva ichiichu nenpamahva?
‘Havi khaene pasar ing amnuw re ampa bathen naka arumee thoh yngkhehpang ing omvaatae vokhehkho enuw meeniichu yngkhehpang vaatae.’
Chutahnache enuw meenii i ynniimeh mahsae, changvakonchu yngkhehpangsae. Chukhaenache Thangnang ing amantuwh vasahchu achuw ingkho mansaemah rasiing.”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Nen rumee ynsaefhuw aruchu nenbarungriir inempak apirtah nava. Havi abasenpeh raenbe jinge ichiimahva.

Ki ing neningna kariirnah, achuw yngkheh ing arumee ing ichuwhmah tumah tanga naka afhuwsar inche ynsaefhuw naka reentaang yngkheh buwhreeh nave, ama pasarchu reentaang rumee thohche ichuwhmah atupa.”
Sebok ae ing Jesu ningna enriir, “Pasar yngkheh ing jinge ichii ing arumee thoh ruw yngkijaeh vachii vanave, rakhii iniimah ing sakvaata.”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Mee vakhaena ruvachii mahva, changva-konchu ahaeniipang ningnache suwhvachii vatah.

Achuw yngkheh chuve ynsamvasah ing abaring fhuwkho omna, achuw yngkheh chuve mee ing aseemkho omna; amanche achuw yngkheh chuve iruwng lipah khaena rakhii niimahning taka ataksah ing ynsam omna. Havi iraang ningka achii mee inche iraang sarasii.”
Mee topoh aenche Jesu ningna naepang aechu entaklina akik siinaka vokhehkho ithampeehnii khaena enveruw, changvakonchu sebok aenche enuwchu arakuh ae.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing ariir, “Naepang aekha khaam-mah aeruw; kaningting huung ae rasiing, akhaechuve thangbaen iruwng lipah phavachii aechu enuw hangchii ipae.”
Jesu ing entaklina akikchu asiih-peeh ae inuwnache ama maphamchu bathenka sisa.
Atii enruw, mee yngkheh ing Jesu ningna vakka ariir, “Isapak Oja, ki ing ynchii isa nong tuningka ichen naemah iringniichu phava kachiiva?”

Chukhaenache Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Ynchii khaena nang ing kichu isa ynchii vachii? Achuwkho isa omah changvakonchu yngkheh omna, amachuve Thangnang vatah. Nang ing iringnii tingche ruwhningka tataniive chonghak aechu ngahra.”
Ama ing ariir, “Ynchii chonghakva?” Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Mee thehmah, reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah tumah, barukmah, ichummah saarkhii pimah,
nangnuw nangpa ijaara, amanche naveenchaang aechu nataksah vaang naning mansiihva nachiipae.”
Iler inche Jesu ningna abasang, “Havana nariir vakhae i kanaepangna basen ingka kangahva. Ki ynchii kamanvaehsa?”

Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Nang ing mapung apha ynsuwh ningka tataniive yngkaera, amanche nadeen chaap juwrnana vokhehkho sara aechu piaera, amanche thangbaen nache nalerchii omvaata; huung kaanuw ijiira.”
Changvakonchu iler inche ama ariirchu asiitah nache inempak aba-rungriir ija ing yngkaesa, akhaechuve ama inempak savangsa.
Amana Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, thangbaenna om iruwng lipah tingche savang mee ing ruwhvachii chuve ruwpakna.
Athar vokheh neningna kariirnahreeh, savang mee ing thangbaenna om iruwng lipah ting ruwhvachii thoh chembe, simphuw khurna siirchar iruwh inche laehakna.”
Sebok aenche amachu ensiitah nache inempak ngik aeka aningna asii ae, “Chunuwcha achuw inche ikarpeeh phava chiiva?”
Jesu ing eningting enka ariir, “Havi mee ae ningna chembe ruthaangthaang mahnii, changva-konchu Thangnang ningna chembe aangkhenglaang ruvaata.”
Amana Pitar ing Jesu chu basangka ariir, “Enla, kenuw ing kendeensah aangkheng bathenchir ungka naanuw kenjiisah vachii. Chukhaenache kenuwcha ynchii phava kenchiiva?”
Achuw yngkheh ing karumingna a-een aruw, auw anae, asar ajuwr, amnuw ampa, arumee asiti, aruw abaar chaap abathen mee inche sarup chaama isuwh phavaata vokhehkho ichen naemah ringkum phavaata.
Changvakonchu maensa inche ningkuur vaata, amanche ningkuur inche maensa vaata.”
Thangbaen lipahchu vomrip birna changvachii ineehnii khaena aafhuw ing ziing imaenphikna baverka mee ajongthoh aanghakna.
Nikheh ruthamen dinari yngkhehna ynru aeka aruwrae tingche amansipae.
Apha ynthum taangna ahungsuwh tahnache ama ing entufhuw omahka kithiirna ingiir aechu amupa;
chu-tahnache ama ing eningna ariir, “Nenuwkho sinuwna kavomrip birna vachangruw, nenuw ing phava nenchichu piva kachuw.”
Chu-khaenache enuw ing sisae. Athar apha kuruk re apha eekuw taangna achingnii vaangkhe aruwrae ting achiirpae.
Apha suum arii yngkheh ruvaena ahungsuwh tahnache mee reentaang ae hengiir atinpa. Amana eningna ariir, “Nenuw ynchii khaena havane yntanga turuchuw ing siimseeh apha mamaang chuwka ingiir vachuw?”
Enuw ing embasang, “Kenuw achuw ingkho ineehmah.” Chunuw vaniive nenuwkho sinuwna kavomrip birna vachangruw.

Khuri ajungvitah nache, vomrip bir aafhuw inche rukuum itu ningna ariir, “Vomrip birna ichang vakhae aekha va een ae nana ningkuur ing isiae nakhe basen nana amaensa ing isiae ipha ingkhe ruthamen piaera.”
Apha suum arii yngkhehna ningkuurdeh ing isiae ningna dinari yngkhehter apeehpae.
Maensa ing isi vakhae aenche ruthamen inemhak ing phava kenta ichii ing emanden; changvakonchu ynchimter ing ruthamen dinarichu emphapa.
