Amachu emphatah nache vomrip bir aafhuw taklina engaechu chiimahka chongsae.

Ningkuur ing isiae khachuve apha yngkhehpang ichang paetah, kenuw chuve inii ynsa sungna siimseeh ija khaang ungka ichangpung changvakonchu ningkuur ing isiae thoh ruthamen namanchimpa ta aeka enriir!
Chutahnache ama ing iva ae kaarna mee yngkheh ningnache abasang, “Kaarang, ki ing neningna ynraar tumah ing. Nenruthamen dinari yngkhehna ynrumuwka ichangmah vachuw khang.
Nang ing phava nachii naruthamen chinana yngkae. Nang kapeehchii vaange aningkuurna kaneeh aekho ruthamen ynchimchak ing ipeehchu kakusiva.
Ki kaseersah nache tuning kachii ituchu kakusimah vakhang? Ki kabarungriir asaktahna nemik abuw inaava?
Chutahnache havi vaange ningkuur ing maensa vaata, amanche maensa inche ning-kuur vaata. Akhaechuve mee inem a-eennah, changvakonchu ituum aateernah.”
Jesu ing Jerusalem ting sika, ama ing asebok suum ariinii aechu asiksii ing ruwka lam nache eningna ariir,
“Enruw, inuw Jerusalem ipha ing hungsimanuw, amanache Mee Sapa chu aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang ae ningna rensavaatae; amanche enuw ing ithehnii khaena atakchu manraar vaatae,
vokhehkho ynniisahnii khaena, ithipak ing ibinnii khaena amanche khros na ijamnii khaena reentaang mee ae ningting pivaatae. Changvakonchu inii nithum ahenpharae ama hangring vaata.”
Changlaenche Jebedi sapa aechu amnuw ing Jesu ningna veruw aeka, amaensokna vakhupsaka ynchii yngkheh aningna aniihsahpa.
Jesu ing aningna asii, “Nang ing ynchii nadikva?” Ama ing abasang, “Naaruwng lipah nache ki kasiti ae i natachang ting yngkheh amanche natari ting yngkheh imangongpeehsa aera.”
“Jesu ing abasang, nenuw ing ynniihchuw i nentak ing manghuw mahchuw.” “Ki ing ijachaam ka innii kam nache nenuw inchehva nente?”
“Inchehva kenta,” ta aeka abasangpae.

Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing kakam ne inchuve inchehva nenta changvakonchu katachang re katarina ong arumah aru chuve ki ing picheh vakachuw mahva. Havana ongnii ive kapa ing enuw enrutum taka atupeeh mee aechu ongvachiipae.”
Ama chongchu sebok suum aeng ensiitah nache, unae ynniimeh ae taklinache embarung siksa.

Chukhaenache Jesu ing enuw engkheng eenka ariir, “Reentaang mee ae lipah aapuh aengkho entaklina aafhuw ynsuwhnae, amanche aaruungpung enchii aengkho entaklina aatuaricheh nong entusa ichii nemanghuwsa.
Nenuw nengkaarna chembe havi suwhmahnii. Achuw yngkheh ing nengkaarna iruungseh idiknave, ama mee inche nemeenae ynsuwhva chiiva;
amanche achuw yngkheh ing nengkaarna aanchungseh ynsuwh ningka tanave, ama mee inche nemeenae ynsuwhva chiiva;
Mee Sapa inche atakchu rukuum itupeehnii khaena ijuwng mahva, changvakonchu rukuum tupeehnii khaena vokhehkho mee inempak ikarnii khaenache aringkum ipeeh ijuwngva.”
Jesu ing asebok aethoh Jeriko tanii enghuungrae mee inempak ing atakchu ajiipae.
Enghungsinii lamfhuw kuurnache mikchu ynniimeh heong aenche Jesu hungsina ichii chong ensiitahna vauung aeka enriir, “Devit sapa Aafhuw naning iman-chuwhsara.”
Mee aenche enuwchu enghuw tamna ta aeka enrakuhpa. Changva-konchu enuw inche ipir ing uung sehseh aeka enriir, “Devit sapa naning imanchuwhsara.”
Amana Jesu ing ngiirka enuwchu a-eenpae. “Nenuw nengkhaena ki ing ynchii itu nengadikva?”
Enuw ing embasang, “Aafhuw, kemik musakenta!”
Jesu ing aning manchuwh aeka emikchu aparpa; aphachak nache imu emphapa vokhehkho enuw ing lam nache Jesu aanuwchu enjiipa.
Enuw ing Jerusalem enveneeng phana, Oleep Bungna Betphage ichii paamchu tungsae. Amanache Jesu ing asebok ynniimeh vechiir-ka
eningna jinge ichii ing ariir, “Nemaana om khuwtingse vakruw, nenvatheng thoh lola afhuw ati yng-khiih yngkheh heom vaata, amachu bajoh nuwna kaningting henruw aeruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing neningna yngkhaenava ta ae naka isiiae nave, ‘Aafhuw ing aadiknah taruw;’ amanache ama ing ipivaata.”
Jaephar chongchu asuwhnii khaena havi ariir vasahva amachuve:
“Zaion sanuw ningnache riirruw,
Enla, nang naaruwng naningna vathengna!
Amave abarungriir duwrna, vokhehkho lola aveongniisa;
amanche lola chuve ativa.”
Chutahnache sebok aeng vak aeka Jesu ing ariir inuwzii ing envatuwhpa;
amana enuw ing lola afhuw atichu henruw aeka ataklina peen tha aeka Jesu ing aongniipa.
Mee inempak aeng Jesu vasinii vachii lam nache empeen enthapae, amana areh aenche unubur ana saeh aeka atha-pae.
Changlaenche Jesu aanuw ama ajii mee aenche uung aeka enriir, “Devit sapa ningna Hosana! Aafhuw rumingna itheng atak i bor aphava! Aangkaangsehna hosana!”
Jesu ing Jerusalem chu avaruwh tahnache khuwruungchu phusii phuraang suwhka enriir, “Havi achuwva?”
Amana meenem aeng enriir, “Havi Galili paam Nazaret tanii jaephar Jesu chuva.”
Jesu ing Thangnang rumniieen nache varuwhka peehchae aajuwr vokhehkho aanrii aechu taangting athur chirpae. Amanche seersaam repnii vokhehkho khunu ijuwr ae ongnii chukho barup bareh chirka
eningna ariir, “Havi ynziih vasahva, ki ka eenchu ithamsahnii een vachiiva, changvakonchu nenuw ing lamruw ae kuw nemanguurpa!”
Changlaenche rumniieen nache mikchu aere khibong ae inche aningna theng aeka amana amandampae.
Changvakonchu aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang aenche Jesu ing laetho nong atuchu emure vokheh naepang aeng rumniieenna uung aeka, “Devit sapa ningna Hosana!” enchiichu ensiitahna embarung siksa.
Chutahnache enuw ing Jesu ningna ensii, “Naepang aeng enriir chong i ynchiiva nasiise?” Jesu ing abasang ae, kasiisa.
“Naepang aere naeduung then ajeen ae ner tanii Aafhuw nang ing ympahsahnii mapung namamphapa taka ynziihchu nenuw nenpamahva?”
Amana Jesu ing enuwchu bathen-ka khuwruung na ing Bethani ting sika amanache riihsa.
Jesu ing ziingna khuwruung tingche ahunganrirae aven chaamsa.

Changlaenche ama ing lam kuurna imuwng thachang burchu amupa amana vakka ava entah nache ana mahnaka yntanga tuwhmahsa. Chutahnache Jesu ing thachang burchu enka ariir, “Thachang bur nang athar vokheh ynlamah tanii.” Changche ichii ing ariirtah nache anikungna thachang burchu vachongsa.
Amachu sebok aeng emutah nache ngik aeka enriir, Ynsaangkhe thachang bur i ataraenrap ivachongva?
Amanche nenuw ing thacha tanuwka thamsa tanuwve aangkhenglaang neniihchu phava nenta.”

Jesu ing rumniieen nache varuwh-ka mee aechu amanchuw raenche, aanchung jaethiim aere lipah aapuh upa aenche varuwh aeka aningna asii ae, “Nang ing ynchii aatuaricheh deenchiika jinge ichii ing nong natuva? Achuw ing naningna aatuaricheh havi ympeehva?”
“Ki ingkho neningna yngkhehpang siikachuw, amachu ibasangcheh tanuwve, ki ing hangchii nong itu kachehnii aatuarichehchu neningna riirva kata achii.

Baptis Johon aatuaricheh icha utanii ithengva?” Enuw ing enareersahna manseer aeka enriir, “Inuw ing ynchii riirtaruw? Inuw ing thangbaen taniiva tamanuwve, ama ing tavaata, amachu ynchii taka nenthacha mahva?
Changvakonchu vokheh laaruw paam taniiva tata ynchii imbe, lipah siti vakhae inchembe Johon i jaephar va enchii vakhaka ynchikreeh manuw.”
Chutahnache enuw ing manghuwmah ung ta aeka abasangpae. Changvaniive ki ynchii aatuaricheh deen ingka nong havi katuva ichiichu neningna riirmahning taka abasang ae.
“Atarae nenuw ing ynchii nemandennah? Mee yngkhehchu asapa ynniimeh om; ama ing aupa ningnache ariir, ‘Kasiti, atanii nang vomrip birting ynriing sira.’
Ki siningka tamah ing taka abasang, changvakonchu aanuwna abarungriir nungaemahka sisa.
Amana athar ampa inche asapa naepang ningnache aanghakjaeh ing ariir, amana apa ki sivakata taka abasang; changvakonchu ama simahsa.

Enuw unae ynniimehne ampa ing amanden atuchu achuwva?” Asiti aupa chuva ta aeka abasang ae. Chutahnache Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah: Ree ikhuum aere ichuwhmah rupanuw ae ing thangbaen iruwng lipah ting iruwhnii khaena nemaana maen ynsanae.

Akhaechuve Johon ing neningna ichum ynthiing lamchu mansiinii khaena juwngsa, amachu nenuw ing thachamah sachuw; changvakonchu ree ikhuum aere ichuwhmah rupanuw ae inche enthachapa. Nenuw ing nemubrohrae nenbarungriir huungmahchuw amanche thachakho thachamah sachuw.”

Reentaang ynghuwnii thamin yngkheh rungaereehruw. Jesu ing ariir, “Paam aafhuw yngkheh ing vomrip bir tuka aphinpa, ruparkho atuchirpa, vomrip suurniikho atupa, arungnii khaena yngkaangpak thaam yngkhehkho atupa. Amana vomrip birchu mee ae ningna saarka paam yngkhehting sisa.
Aanla kuumphachu ahenphatah nache, ama ing aanla phavachiichu iphanii khaena ameenae aechu ajechiirpa.
Amana asaar mee aenche ajechiir ameenae aechu suwr aeka yngkhehchu abinpae amanche yngkhehchu athehpae, amana yngkheh chuve rung ing adeengpae.
Aanuwnache athar ameenae inemhak ajechiir pareeh, enuw chukho amaensana thohkhe aanghakjaeh ing ahetupae.
Aningkuur dehna ama ing ariir, ‘Kasapa chuve enuw ing topoh ijavaatae,’ taka ajechiirpa.

Chang-vakonchu enuw ing asapa chu emutah nache yngkheh yngkheh chong manseer aeka enriir, ‘Havi inge ruw kuumvachii asapa chuva, huungruw atak i thehtaruw, amanache ama ing ruw kuumvachii vakhaechu inuw ing kuumva taruw.’”
Chutahnache enuw ing atakchu suwr aeka enthehpa amanche vomrip bir ataangting enrenpa.
“Changvanuwve vomrip bir aafhuw ing atheng raenche asaar mee aechu ama ing ynchii manruva chiipae,” taka Jesu ing asii ae.
Enuw ing embasang, “Changchii ichamah mee aechu ama ing thehchir vaatae amanche vomrip bir chuve ikuum phana aanla picheh vachii mee reentaang ting pivaata.”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuwcha ynthiing thiimziihna ynziihchu nenpa-mahva?
‘Een itu aeng enrimah rung amachurap inche,
athurfhuwrungchu ynsuwhsa.
Havi Aafhuw ing atuva;
amanche havi inuw vakhae mik enna chembe ingikniina.’ ”
Chutahnache ki ing neningna kariirnah, “Thangnang iruwng lipah i neningtanii jeriva kata, amanche manla vachii reentaang jaati ting pivakata.”
Achuw yngkheh hava rung takline itiih chuve kiichim vaata, changvakonchu havi inge ataklina itiih achuw yngkhehchu pirkhuw vaang jimvaata.”
Jesu ing ynghuwnii ing ichong vakhae i aanchung jaethiim aere Pharisi aeng ensiitah nache, kenuw ynchiiniiva ichii emanghuwpa.
Ama-tah nache Jesu chu suwrtaruw ta aeka achuwmpae, changvakonchu lipah siti vakhae inche Jesu chu jaephar yngkhehva enchiinache enuw ynchiksae.
Jesu ing athar ynghuwnii thamin mee ae ningna ariir,
“Iruwng lipah chuve jinge ichii ing tikna. Apha vokhehna iruwng yngkheh ing asapa khaena rakhiinii imaar thoraang atuthoh aanghakna.
Ama ing imaarnii khaena a-een vasah vakhaechu ithengnii khaena ameenae chiirka athar a-eenpae, changvakonchu enuw itheng adapae.
Athar vokheh ameenae reentaang aechu jechiirka ariir, ‘Kasachar vokhehkho kadeen khaar imarchaap theh ingka imaarnii thoraang chichirsa. Rakhiinii imaarna thengruw tanuwna va-een aeruw.
Changvakonchu theng vachii vakhae inche teentaen seemmah aeka yngkheh ing aruwrae ting sisa, areh aenche ama ama enong tingche sisae.
Athar areh aenche meenae aechu suwr aeka vokhehkho abinpae, amanche ithehkho athehpae.
Amana iruwngchu abarung amansikpae; chukhaenache ama ing laarchang jechiirka miktheh vakhaechu atheh chirpae amanche engkhuw chukho abathu chirpae.’
Amana ameenae ae ningna ariir, ‘Rakhiinii imaar thoraang chichirsa, changvakonchu imaarna yngeen vakhaekha thengva enchii meer ing reenmahsae.
Chutahnache atii nenuw lamfhuw aantuwhnii chaapna ngiirnuwna mee nemu vakhae een aeruw.’
Meenae aenche alam tanglahlah ong aeka mee emu vakhae isakho isamahkho aangkheng engkhuumpa. Enuw vakhae inche rakhiinii eenchu bariimsae.”
“Changvakonchu iruwng inche itheng vakhaechu ennii khaena een sungting avaruwhtah nache mee yng-kheh ing rakhiinii peendiir niiru ing ynvaechu amupa.
Amana aningna ariir, ‘Kaarang, nang ynchii taka rakhiiniina iniifhuw peendiir niiruchii ing havane ongvachii? Chutahnache ama mee inche basangcheh mahsa.’
Amana iruwng inche meenae ae ning-nache ariir, ‘Akhi akik phuwp nuwna taang ynthim ting renruw, amanche ijachaam ing chaprasii vokhehkho aha iriirsana jarasii.’ ”
Akhaechuve, “Mee inempak a-eenva changvakonchu topohpang aateer vatah.”
Changlaenche Pharisi aenche taang suwh aeka unakhe achongna mentaruw ta aeka ynruwhjaeh ing ensirpa.

Amana enuw ensebok aere Herot amee ae thohche Jesu ningna vechiir aeka enuw ing enriir, “Oja, nang ing nariir chong i chumna ichii kemanghuwsa. Thangnang lam chukho ichum ing namanchuwsa, amanche mee ing ynchii kharvaate ichiikho mandenmahchii vokhehkho miksiing mikruung enmahchii.
Chutahnache keningna namandenchu iriirpeehra! Kesar ningna ree ipeeh icha ichumva ichummahva?”
Enuw ing ichamah emandenchu Jesu ing amanghuwtah nache ariir, “Isachaang itu ae, yngkhaena nenuw ing kichu menkenta ynchii vachuw?
Ree pivanenchii seerchu imansiiruw.” Chukhaenache enuw ing seerchu Jesu ningting ahenchipae.
Amana eningna ama ing asii ae, “Havane ynthin i achuw ruthaksiiva vokhehkho achuwkha ynziihne?”
“Enuw ing Kesar,” ta aeka embasang. Chutahnache Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Kesar taava ichiichu Kesar ningting piruw, amanche Thangnang taava ichiichu Thangnang ting piruw.”
Enuw ing ama chongchu ensiitah nache ngik aeka yngkaesae.
“Oja, achuw yngkheh ing siti baringru ing thiknave arumeechu auwnaefhuw yngkheh ing sapa khaena athar biva-chiiva taka Mosi ing keningna ariir.
Kenuw kengkaarna asapa sarii adeen mee yngkheh om. Aupa inche lunghah bika siti deenru ing thiksa, chukhaenache arumeechu anaepa ningna amahpa.
Amachu vaangche avomaniinii, avomanthumnii amanche avosariinii ipha ing abuwhpae.
Aanuwnache rupanuw chukho thiksa.
Chutahnache nuwting ahangring raenche unae sarii ae nache achuw rumee ynsuwhva chiiva? Akhaechuve engkheng ing abuwhpae.”
Jesu ing abasang ae, “Thangnang ynthiing thiimziih vokhehkho Thang-nang ruwreng nemanghuwmah i nenuw nenraarsa.
Akhaechuve athar hangring vasah mee vakhaechu rakhii niimahnii ae amanche rakhiiniikho omahnii, changvakonchu enuw chuve thangbaen vaarmee aethoh aanghak vaatae.
Ithii hangring khaena Thangnang ing neningna ynchii ariir: Nenuw amachu nenpamahva?
‘Ki Abraham Thangnang ping, Isak Thangnang ping amanche Jakop Thangnang chuping achiisa.’
Ama ing amanchuw ae chongchu mee vakhae aenche ensiitahna inempak ingik ae.”
Saduki aechu Jesu ing manchong chehmahsae ichii chongchu Pharisi aeng ensiitah nache, enuw yngkong aeka
amana engkaar tanii vajeer tunii ihae yngkheh ing Jesu chu menkata taka chong yngkheh asii,
“Oja, vajeer chonghak sungna aaruungseh chonghakchu ynchiiva?”
Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Aafhuw Thangnang chu nabarungriir aangkheng, nalaetha aangkheng amanche namanden aangkheng ing naning mansiihva nachiiva.
Havi aren vokhehkho aaruungseh chonghak chuva.
Avomaniinii chuve, ‘Nang ing naveenchaang aechu nataksah vaang naning mansiihva nachiiva.’
Hava chonghak ynniimeh inge vajeer chonghak vokhehkho jaephar ae chong aangkhengchu ynsakchirva.”
Amana Pharisi aeng empurpohrae Jesu ing eningna chong yngkheh asiiae,
“Nenuw Khrista khaena ynchii nemandennah? Atak i achuw sapa va?”
Enuw ing embasang, “Devit sapa va.”
Ama ing eningna ariir, “Amachu ynsaangkhe Devit ing laetha jaarna atakchu Aafhuw achiiva?
Devit ing taka,
‘Aafhuw inche Kaafhuw ningna ariir:
Nang eejeehnii aechu nakhi derna kasiih mahtaang kabaen tachangne ongla.’
Amachu vaniive, Devit atakrap ing Aafhuw taka ariirchu ynsaangkhe asapa vachiiva?”
Amana achuw yngkhehpang ingkho achongchu basangcheh mahsae, vokhehkho ama inii nache basenka aningna achuw ingkho thona isa ing chong siicheh mahsae.
Changlaenche Jesu ing asebok aere meenem ae ningnache ariir,
Pharisi aere thiimthang ae ing Mosi ongniina ongnae.
Chukhaenache enuw ing enriir chaapchu manjiiruw; changvakonchu enuw ing entu nong-vaang ichii ing nong tumahruw, enuwve enerpang ing riir aeka anong chuve tumah ae.
Enuw ing irik peeh ithong aeka mee amanreennah ae, changvakonchu entak chuve engkik topoh tikho manlaap nungka tamah ae.
Enuw ing entu enri chaap mee ing imurasii ichii ing atupae, amanche enrungop mansuwr deendeen ing ynthongnae.
Enuw ing kuurva nache isaseh ongnii nache ongchu engadiknah, amanche meekongnii nakho isaseh ongniichu engadiknah;
enuw ing kithiir nache mee vakhae ing salaam entu vokhehkho oja ichiichu engadiknah.
Changvakonchu nenuw ing enuwchu oja tamah aeruw, akhaechuve nenuw unaepoh vachuw amanche nenuw neng oja Khrista yngkhehpang om vatah.
Amana laaruw paamne achuwkho apa tamahruw, thangbaenna ong nenpa yngkhehpang omna.
Nenuwchu oja itamah ae rasiing, akhaechuve nenuw neng oja yngkhehpang omna amachuve Khrista chuva.
Nengkaarna ki aaruungseh ping achii mee inche aasiingseh ynsuwh vachiiva.
Achuw yngkheh ataksah ing ruungsa nave ama ynjuursa vaata, amanche achuw yngkheh ing ynjuursa nave, ama ruungseh vaata.

“Nengkhaena ijaniisapa, isa-chaang itu thiimthang aere Pharisi ae! Nenuw ing iruwng lipahchu mee ae maekungna nengkampa, amanche nentakkho ruwhmah sachuw, ruwhsa kata achii mee ae chukho manruwhmah sachuw.”

“Nengkhaena ijaniisapa, thiimthang ae! Akhaechuve nenuw ing apha iseehpak ing Thangnang ting thamsa khang tanuwre, muwkhuwnuw ae een vokhehkho empeeh enchaechu nensiihnah. Chukhaenache nenuw iruungpak miraar phavanenta.”

“Nengkhaena ijaniisapa, isachaang itu thiimthang aere Pharisi ae! Nenuw ing achuw yngkheh barungriirchu nemanguurchehnii khaena chifhuw iraen chuwka vokhehkho paam aajaehkho nengahuurnah; changvakonchu nencheh raenche nenuw ing atakchu nenuw ikheerdeh ing longkong siti nemambunah.”

“Nengkhaena ijaniisapa, mikchu ing mee nencheer! Achuw yngkheh ing rumniieen manpar naka chongreep atuchuve yntanga mahva, amanche achuw yngkheh ing rumniieenna om sana manpar naka chongreep atuchuve achongreep ingkhe ynsuwrsahva tachuwka nenriirnah.
Ipang mikchu ae, sana amanthiingcheh een chure asanachu achuw ingkhe iruunghakva?

Achuw yngkheh ing thiimkung manpar naka chongreep atuchuve yntanga mahva, changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing Thangnang peeh manpar naka chongreep atuchuve achongreep ingkhe atak ynsuwrsahva tachuwka nenriirnah.
Mikchu ae! kikthuur re thiimkung chu ukho ingkhe iruungpae?
Achuw yngkheh ing thiimkung chu manpar naka chongreep tunave, thiimkung vokhehkho asungna ynthin vakhaechu manparka chongreep atuva;
amanche achuw yngkheh ing rumniieen manparka chongreep atuchu asungna ynthin Thangnang chukho manparka chongreep atuva;
amanche achuw yngkheh ing thangbaen manpar naka chongreep tunave, asungna om iruwng lipah re Thangnang chukho manparka chongreep atuva.”

“Nengkhaena ijaniisapa, isa-chaang itu thiimthang aere Pharisi ae! Nenuw ing chimuw bajaang nenphana suumna yngkheh ipeehchu iruwpak ing mandenchuwka vajeer chonghak sungna aaruwseh ichum, ningsiih vokhehkho thacha, hava vakhae ichuve nenuw ing teentaen seemmahchuw; chutahnache hava vakhae i iruwpak ing tuva nenchiiting buksa, amanche areh ikho itumah rumahnii.
Mikchu ing mee icheer ae! Nenuw ing nenginnii kam sungna basuw iruwh chucha thurchuwka, siirchar chuve nenbaduwr chehnah.”

“Nengkhaena ijaniisapa, isa-chaang itu thiimthang aere Pharisi ae! Akhaechuve nenuw ing kam re bukam jaekhi chuve ataangtaniipang itaehchuwka, asung tingcha isamah tangmah, ynner paamsah ing bariim sachuw.
Mikchu Pharisi ae! Amaensana kam re pakaan jaekhikha asungtanii manseeng japruw, amana chembe taang taniikho seengvaata.”
Havi thoh aanghak ing nenuwkho taangting chembe ichum mee pingeng ichii ing nemandennah, changvakonchu sungting chembe isachaang iture ichuwhmah tangmah ing bariimnachuw.”
“Nengkhaena ijaniisapa, isa-chaang itu thiimthang aere Pharisi ae! Akhaechuve nenuw ing jaephar ae thaenchu isapak ing nentunah, amanche ichum mee ae thaen rung chukho nemanrehnah;
amanche nenriirnah, amachuve ajae afhuw ae ing empaar raenche inuwkho ynvae-manuwve, jaephar ae sii ynta khaena inuw ynvaemah vaanchiiva.
Chutah-nache nenchong inche nenuw i jaephar ae entheh siti sanaepung ichiichu nentaksah ing nemandangsahpa.
Chuvanuwve nenpa nenfhuw ae ing isii entuna entusuw mahkha nenuw ing tuchirruw.
Baruwr ae vokhehkho baruwr baring ae! Ynsaang khenche longkong ting bukva nenchii tanii ynjuwhchehva nente?

Chukhaenache ki ing neningna jaephar ae amanche ising iveer mee ae vokhehkho aanchuw ae kajenchiirpa; areh ae chuve nenuw ing khros na thehva nenta, amanche areh ae chuve meekongniina ipirpak ing binva nenta amana khuwruung khuwruugna thehkenta tatanuwka thurva nenta.
Havi nenuw ing rumniieen amanche thiimkung sungna nentheh ichum mee ae Abel na ing Barakia sapa Jekaria asii ynta ipha ing laaruw paamna ichum ae sii ynta vakhae nentaklina omvaata.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, amachuve hava vakhae i ataraennii suwnthar mee ae takline suwhvaata.”

“O Jerusalem, O Jerusalem, naningna jaephar kajenchiirchu rung ing deeng chiika nathehpa. Aar ing atichu abatha ing aop vaangkhe ki ing nasiti aechu aajaehmeh op aening kachiisahva, changvakonchu nenuw inchembe irupeehmah sachuw!
Enla, na-een i kabathenpa vokhehkho aruwh thangsiisa.
‘Thangnang rumingna ijuwng Aafhuw chu isasehva ichii nenuw ing nenriirmahri raentaang, atarae basen naka athar supmu imumah tanuw.’ ”
Jesu ing rumniieen tanii hungsuwhka asirae, asebok ae ing Jesu ningna een aechu mansii nungka enchiitah nache abuumting vaksae.

Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing hava vakhae i nemusa, mumahchuw khang? Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, rung yngkheh taklina rung yngkheh ynthuw rudeh ing aangkheng jungchim naka kiichir vaata.”

Jesu ing Oleep Bungna aongraenche sebok aeng ynruwhjaeh ing vak aeka chong asii ae, “Keningna riirla, nang ing juwngvanachii vokhehkho laaruw paam chivachiichu utaraen vachiiva ichii buwtinniichu ynsaangkhe tavachiiva.”
Amana Jesu ing abasang ae, “Nenuw achuw ingkho aasiirting ynruwniimah ing ynriimruw.
Karuming nache Khrista ping ta ae naka thengvaatae amanche mee aanem aasiirting kivaatae.
Nenuw ing laar vokhehkho laarsa yntuk chong siivanenta changvakonchu nenbarungriir manjamahruw. Hava vakhae i suwhvaata changvakonchu achiniirem chuve thengmahrinii.

Akhaechuve jaati yngkheh ing jaati yngkheh taklina, iruwng lipah yngkheh ing iruwng lipah yngkheh taklina har ynjong vaatae. Amanache apham tanglahlah venchaam chiilaar omvaata vokhehkho linglaang thengvaata.
Changvakonchu havana suwhvachii vakhae ichuve ijachaam abasennii vaata.
Changlaenche nenuw aanem thacha tanii ynrichir vanenta; yngkheh re yngkheh ynrensava nenta amanche yngkheh re yngkheh yngharva nenta.
Amanache jaephar pung achii ichummah aajaeh hungsuwh ae naka mee aanem aasiirting kivaatae.
Ichamah ahung-bariim tahnache ningsiih aanem jungtak vaata.
Changvakonchu apha achimahri raentaang abadaarcheh meechu ikarpeeh phavaata.
Iruwng lipah khaena isa chongchu ajaati siirnache saarkhii ipeehnii khaenache laaruw paam aangkhengna yntongchir pehvaang naka aanuwnache laaruw paam chipeh vaata.”
“Chukhaenache jaephar Deniel amanriir vaangkhe imaang ynvae yntirsuwh ing ynthiing apham nache ingiir nenuw ing muvanenta.” (achuw yngkheh aapa mee inche mang-huwrasii!)
“Changlaenche Judia na ong nenuw bung ting taenruw.
Een phuchung taklina ikar mee inche een sungting peehchae jungrimah rasiing.
Amanche ruwraena ong mee inche isingfhuw peen hungrimah rasiing.
Changvakonchu miknii aere naeri ae khaena chembe apha nache ningchuwh ningdiipnii vatapa!
Chukhaenache havi pharbuw nakho changmahka Deennii inii nakho asuwhniimah khaena thamsaruw.
Akhaechuve laaruw paam abasenpeh raennii ing ataraen phana isuwhmahri vokhehkho utaenkho suwhmah vachii ichiisuwh ijachaam chuvaata.
Thangnang inche aaniichu mantommah nave achuw tikho ikarpeeh phamahnii; changvakonchu aateer vasah ae khaena chembe mantom vaata.
“Changlaenche achuw yngkheh ing enruw, Khrista havane ongna, changmahka amanase ongna takhang ae nakho, amachu thacha madehruw.
Akhaechuve ki Khrista ping ichii mee amanche Jaephar ping ichii ae hungsuwh vaatae; amanache aateer vasah ae rapkho aasiirting iruwnii khaena iruungpak laetho vokhehkho ingikniipak mandang vaatae.
Rungaeruw, ki ing maen ing neningna hungsuwh vachii chaap kariir chirpa.
Akhaechuve inii-suwhtah tanii tenlungpa ynlehchu taetah tingkho ireng vaangkhe ichii ing Mee Sapa ajuwnglaenche amathohche aanghakjaeh vaata.

Changlaenche Mee Sapa buwtinniichu thangbaenna yndang vaata, amanche laaruw mee jaat vakhae ing bakhik vaatae, amanche Mee Sapa inche ruwreng vokhehkho alaar isa iruungpak thohche thangbaen ruwrduh taklina ijuwngchu muva-nenta.

Amana avaarmee aechu tumpeeh ynring rusathoh ynruw ing laaruw paam arakiing manrii tingche jenchiir vaata, amanche enuw inche laaruw paam adongnii yngkheh na ing adongnii yngkheh ipha sungna aateer vasah mee vakhaechu mangkong vaatae.
“Nenuw ing thachang thingbur na manghuwniiva nenchii yngkheh omna. Adeen hangthop naka ana hangduung nave saartha ahenphapa ichii nemang-huwnah.
Amavaang ichii ing atae aphane isuwh vakhae nemu inge Mee Sapa ing eenkhaar aaneengpa ichiichu manghuwruw.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, hava vakhae i asuwhchir mahri raentaang havana suwnthar i maangmahnii.
Thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paam chuve maang-vaata, changvakonchu kachongsae chuve maangmahdehnii.
“Changvakonchu aanii vokhehkho aphachu ampa ingmah naka thangbaen vaarmee aengkho, asapa ingkho manghuwmahnii.
Mee Sapa juwngvachii iniichu Noah aaniina isuwh vaangkhe tavaata.
Akhaechuve chii riimvachii inii aphamah rirae Noah ing ruwkuwng sungting aruwhmahri raentaang enuw ing sa aeka in aeka, rakhiinii aeka, vokhehkho rakhiikho manii aeka ong ae;
amana chiichu riimka enuw vakhaechu ataenmahri raentaangche emanghuwmah vaangkhe, Mee Sapa juwngvachiichu amachu vaangche tavaata.
Changlaenche ruwraena mee ynniimeh ongvaata, yngkheh chuve ruwvaata amanche yngkheh chuve mavaata.
Rupanuw ynniimeh aeng haachang sukvaatae; yngkhehchu ruwvaata amanche yngkhehchu mavaata.
“Chukhaenache hahjaehruw, Aafhuw juwngvachii aphachu nenuw manghuwmahchuw.
Changvakonchu havi manghuwruw, amachuve een aafhuw inche ynchii aphanache lamruwchu thengva chiiva ichii manghuw nave, ama ing hahjaeh naka amanache a-eensung nache lamruw thengchehmah vachiiva.
Chu-khaenache nenuw singsii ing ongruw, nemandenmah aphanache Mee Sapa ing juwngvaata.
“Achuwva thachafhuw vokhehkho ising meenaechu? Ama mee chuve aafhuw ing a-eengkuw aechu apha inae chakchak ing thaemin ipeehnii khaena amansir chuva.
Aafhuw ing ahunganrirae changche ichii ing isapak ing nong ahentu meenaechu bor aphava!
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, ama ing adeen vakhae taklina aningnache mansir vaata.
Changvakonchu ki kaafhuw thengsii mahnii tanaka isamah meenae inche abarungriirna kharnaka,
amanche aarang meenae aechu bin naka, juw ynruw ae thohche sahak inhak nave,
meenae inche amangaemah inii vokhehkho amanghuwmah apha nache Aafhuw inche juwngvaata.
Amana atakchu mongnii isuwh ing tenvaata, vokhehkho isachaang atu mee ae thohche sarup manphahak vaata. Amanache ichap ichuw vokhehkho aha iriirvaata.
Asae runga ae chuve ipangpae amanche rungae ae chuve isingpae.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe ipang ae chucha jaemi chiaeka achii chuve reenmahsae,
changvakonchu ising ae chuve jaemi achiikho areen ae.
Songpa inche athengsiimah tahnache emik khukka jaarchirsae.
“Changvakonchu jaenchim nache chong thangsa amachuve, “Enruw, songpa thengsa! Atakchu yntuwhnii khaena hangsuwhruw.
Changlaenche lunghah aenche hangsuw aeka jaemi embarengpa.
Amana ipang aenche ising ae ningna enriir, ‘Nenjaemi achii topoh ipisaruw, kenjaemi achii tangdohka thiksa.’
Changvakonchu ising aenche embasang, ‘Nenuwkho amanche kenuwkho ynsuwh mahkho arusa; chutahnache aajuwr ae ningting vaarii satahruw.’
Enuw ing aanrii ensithirche songpa chu thengsa, amana enthoraang ichivasah aenche songpa thoh ynruw ing rakhiinii kuurva tingche varuwhsae, amana eengkhaarchu yngkamsa.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw ing eningna abasang, ‘Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, nenuw achuw vachuw ichii manghuw mahchuwng.’ ”
Chukhaenache nenuw apha vakhaena hahjaehruw, nenuw ing aanii re aphachu manghuw mahchuw.
Ama ing ameenae yngkheh ningna talen runga, yngkheh ningna talen ynnii, amanche yngkheh ningna talen yngkhehchu enrutuk inuwzii ing piaeka atak lam-khii sisa.
Aanuwnache talen runga apha mee ingkhe anikung nache sika ler amanvuurtah nache, talen runga yngkheh amanthipa.
Talen ynnii apha inchenkho amavaang ichii ing talen ynniimeh amanthipa.
Changva-konchu talen yngkheh apha inche sika ruwruw chuwka atalenchu adimpa.
“Amana Aafhuw ing nuwting hung-kaeka ameenae ae thohche seer empha re isichu emanvuwhpa.
Amana talen runga apha ingkhe athar talen runga amanthichu chika ariir, ‘Aafhuw, nang ing ympeehchii nakhe athar talen runga kamanthisa.’
Aafhuw inche aningna ariir, ‘Inempak sakna, isa vokhehkho thachafhuw meenae, nangve peeh topoh tina thachafhuw vachii vakhaka, ki ing peeh aanem mansirva kachii, Aafhuw rotharoh nache varuwhra.’
“Talen ynnii apha ynchenkho aafhuw ningna vakka ariir, ‘Aafhuw, nang ing ympeehchii nakhe athar talen ynniimeh kamanthisa.’
Aafhuw inche aningna ariir, ‘Inempak sakna, isa vokhehkho thachafhuw meenae, nangve peeh topoh tina thachafhuw vachii vakhaka, ki ing peeh aanem mansirva kachii, Aafhuw rotharoh nache varuwhra.’
“Amana talen yngkheh apha ynchenkho aafhuw ningna vakka ariir, ‘Aafhuw, nangve amuw tukruchii ingkho nakuumcheh, navormah ingkho namangkongcheh ynchaepak mee vachii ichii kamanghuwva,
amatah nache nangchu chiisachii ingka talen ympeeh chiikha ruwruwna dim ingka kathuursahva, enla aafhuw natakha remva.’
“Changvakonchu aafhuw inche abasang, ‘Ichamah vokhehkho thaachah meenae! Ki ing tukrudeh ing kakuumcheh, kavormah ingkho kamangkongcheh nang ing namang-huwjaeh vani?
Amachu vanave kaseer kha nang ing seerthi ynthen ae ningna piae taniika, ki ing kahungkae raenne kaseersah re seerthi thohche phasava kachiiva.
Chukhaenache aningtanii talen kha rinuwna talen suum adeen tingkhe piruw.
Akhae-chuve adeen mee ningna anemsehnii ing pivakata amanche adeenmah ningnache ama ing adeensah vakhaekho rivakata.
Chukhaenache ymbaangmah meenae kha ynthim kaarting renruw, ynthim sungnache ichap ichuw vokhehkho aha iriirsana jarasii.’
Jaati aangkheng Aafhuw maanache yng-kongvaata, amanche jao icheer ing keer re jao asiksik ing akhaevaang, Aafhuw ing yngkheh re yngkheh asiksik ing khaevaata.
Amana Aafhuw inche jao aechu atachang ting, amanche keer aechu atari ting siivaata.
Changlaenche iruwng inche tachangna ong vakhae tingche tavaata, ‘Huungruw, kapa bor apha vakhae, laaruw paam abasenlimna nengkhaena ynruthongpeeh iruwng lipahchu phasaruw.
Akhaechuve kaven achaamrae isahfhuw ympeehchuw, kachii araar raenche chii infhuw ympeehchuw, lamkhii ing kathengrae kichu ymbathungchuw,
iniifhuw peendiir kadeen mahrae ympeehchuw, vokhehkho kanakrae nenuw ing ynveerchuw, amanche kaeshumna kaongraenkho ithengchuw.’
“Changlaenche ichum ynthiing aenche Aafhuw ningna basang vaatae, ‘Aafhuw utarae naven ichaam kemu raenchii kempeehchii, changmahka nachii araar raenche kempeehchii,
amanche utarae nang ing lamkhii ing nathengrae muchii ungka utarae kembathung vachii, changmahka peendiir nadeen mahrae kempeehchii,
amanche nanak raenkho, kaeshumna naong raenkho utarae muchii ungka naningna itheng ung?,’
Changlaenche Iruwng inche eningna basang vaata, ‘Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, Kauw kanae ae kaarna yntuurseh mee taklina nentukha kaningna nentuva.’
“Aanuwnache Aafhuw ing atariting ong ae ningnache tavaata, ‘Siraap apha ae, kaningtanii ongmahruw! Umlae vokhehkho avaarmee khaena aruthong vasah ichen naemah mi sungting siruw.
Akhaechuve ki venchaam ing ynthehrae isahfhuw ipimahchuw, kachii araar raenche chii ipimahchuw,
amanche ki ing lamkhii ing kathengrae nenuw ing ymbathung mahchuw, peendiir kadeensahmah raenche ipimahchuw, kanak raenkho, amanche kaeshumna kaongraenkho iveermahchuw.’

“Changlaenche enuw ing basang vaatae, ‘Aafhuw nang ing naven achammrae, nachii araarrae, lamkhii ing nathengrae, peendiir nadeen mahrae, nanakrae vokhehkho kaeshum na naongrae, kenuw ing muchii ungka utarae rukuum kentupeeh mahchii.’
Changlaenche Aafhuw ing eningna basang vaata, ‘Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, havana isiingseh ae kaarne yngkhehpang taklina nenuw ing nentupeeh mahkha, kaningna nentumahva.’
Chukhaenache enuw-chu ichen naemah ponti tingche bathen vaatae, amanche ichum ynthiing mee aenche ichen naemah ringkum phavaatae.”
Jesu ing hava vakhae i ariirchir inuwna asebok ae ningna ariir,
“Nenuw ing nemanghuwsa amachuve inii ninii aanuwna manlaennii kuurva inii vaata, amana Mee Sapa chu meekik charnaka khros na jamvaatae.”
Changlaenche aanchung jaethiim aere lipah ipuh vakhae Aanchung Jaethiim Kaiphas eennache yngkong-sae,
amana Jesu chu suwr ae naka thehva enchii khaena ynruwhjaeh inche ensirpa.
Changvakonchu manlaennii kuurva sungna phusiir phuraang asuwhniimah khaena kuurva sungna tumahmanuw enchiipa.
Bethani khuwna ong ynchor mee Simon een sungna Jesu ing aonglae,
rupanuw yngkheh ing amen iruwpak richiithou buwr yngkheh vechika Jesu rusae nache achirpa.
Amachu sebok ae ing emutah nache embarung sikka enriir, “Ynchii khaena amen iruwpak havi amampaamva?
Akhaechuve havana richiithou havi amen inem-pakna juwr manuwka sara ae ningna ipeehsah aruva.”
Jesu ing enriir chongchu amang-huwtah nache sebok ae ningnache ariir, “Ynchii khaena rupanuw havi nemanjava? Ama ing kaningna isapak nong yngkheh yntupeehsa.
Nenuw chuve apha vakhaena sara aethoh onghakva nenta, changvakonchu ki chuve apha vakhaena nenuw thoh onghakjaeh mahmanuw.
Ama ing kataklina richiithou achir i yndimva kachiichu thoraang yntupeehva.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, laaruw paam apham siirna havana isa chong i aantong raenche, rupanuw havi inge atu arichu yndennii khaena ynriir vaata.”
Changlaenche sebok suum ariinii kaarna ynvae Judas Iskariot ing aanchung jaethiim ae ningting vakka asiipae,
“Ki ing neningna Jesu chu pining chuwcha, nenuw ing kaningna ynchii ipiva nenchiiva?” Amana enuw ing khampher somthum apeehpae.
Chutahnache amanache basenka ama ing irensahnii khaena apha chavachii amanjongpa.
Chor ynvaemah tar isahnii kuurva abasennii iniina sebok ae ing Jesu ningna theng aeka asiiae, “Manlaennii thaemin isahniichu nakhaena kenuw ing unakhe sir ae naka ynchiivachii?”

Jesu ing eningna ariir, “khuw-ruung tingse vaknuwna achuw yngkheh mee ningnache taruw, Oja ing ariirva, kaaniichu ynneengsa; na-een sungna kasebok aethoh manlaennii kuurva iniichu tusakata achiinah taruw.”
Jesu ing ariir inuwzii inche asebok ae ing manlaennii thaemin isahniichu ensirpa.
Khuri hungvika imaarnii khaena Jesu re sebok aechu ongsae.
Enuw ing thaemin ensah raenche Jesu ing ariir, “Atatak ing neningna kariirnah, nengkaarna yngkheh ing ki irensava nenta.”
Amana sebok aechu inempak embarungriir jaasa vokhehkho yngkheh yngkheh ing Aafhuw kipingmo ta aeka iriir embasenpa.
Amana Jesu ing abasang ae, “Isahnii bukamna kik kengafhuwrhak mee inche ki irensavaata.
Mee Sapa ing thikvachii khaena ynthiing thiimziihna ariir inuwzii ing atuva. Changvakonchu Mee Sapa arensah mee khaena chembe ijaniisapa! Ama meechu ynlaarmah vanave, akhaena sakseh vachiiva.”
Jesu chu arensah Judas ing ariir, Oja, ki ynchiinii vachiimo taka asiitah nache, nataksah ing nariirsahpa taka abasang.
Amana enuw ing thaemin ensah raenche, Jesu ing tarchu verika, bor pika vokhehkho abakhiipa, amanche asebok ae ningnache jepika aiir, “Verinuwna saruw, havi ki kashava.”
Aanuwnache ama ing kamchu verika vokhehkho manpahsaka, aman-che eningnache jepika ariir, “Nenuw nengkheng inruw;
akhaechuve havi itharpeh chongiir mee aanem isii kuhnii khaena ynta kasii va.
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, atae basen naka kapa iruwng lipah nache ki ing nenuwthoh itharpeh vomrip chii inva kachii aaniichu aphamahri raentaang vomrip chii havi inmahning.”
Amana enuw ing la tu aeka aanuwnache Oleep Bung tingche sisae.

Apha ichiinache Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Atanii jaen nenuw nengkheng taenchir tanuwka imavanenta, akhaechuve ynziihka omna, ‘Ki ing jao aacheerchu manvarva kata, amanche jao aruwr aechu kiichir vaatae.’
Changvakonchu ki athar hangring ningka Galili ting maen henginsa vakata.”
Changlaenche Pitar ing basangka aningna ariir, “Mee areh ing imakhang nakho, ki chuve utaraenkho bathenmah ningchii!”
Jesu ing Pitar ningna ariir, “Ki ing atatak ing naningna kariirnah, amachuve atanii jaen aarkhuung ing akhuwngmah rirae nang ing ki vathumchak irumah tanii.”
Amana Pitar ing abasang, “Ki nangthoh ithiihak phavakachii vakhang nakho, ki ing nangchu irumah tumahdeh ningchii.” Sebok vakhae aengkho changche enriirpa.
Changlaenche Jesu ing asebok aethoh Getsamani enchii mintingche vaksae. Amana Jesu ing sebok ae ningna ariir, “Nenuw havane heongruw, ki chungtingse hangningka thamsa kata.”
Changlaenche ama ing Pitar re Zebedi sapa ynniimeh aechu aruwpae. Amana Jesu inempak ija ing rungneh ynthehsa.
Amatah nache ama ing eningna ariir, “Kalaetha i adongniichak ithii aru phanii ing jaana, nenuw hane ongnuwna kithoh ynruw ing hahjaehruw.”

Jesu ing topoh yndahhak ing kar vekhiingka amana aruw barupka athamsah, “O Apa! Runave, havana kam i kaningtanii imanlaenpeehsar, changvakonchu ki ing kamanden ynsuwhmahsana, nang ing naman-denchu ynsuwhrasiing.”
Aanuwnache sebok ae ningting ajuwngtah nache enuw ihejaar atinpa, amana Pitar ningnache ama ing ariir, “Ynchii khaena nenuw kithoh ynruw ing apha yngkheh pangkho nenghah chehmahva?
Nenuw batheem ting nenbukniimah ing hahruw vokhehkho thamsaruw. Laetha inchembe aman-denna changvakonchu hakchaang inchembe suurna.”
Avomanii athar vaanrika atham-sah, “Apa, havana kam i kaningtanii ynlaen rumah naka, inmah arumah vanave, nang ing namandenchu ynsuwhrasiing.”
Athar vokheh ajuwnglaen chenkho asebok ae hejaar aechu atinpa; akhaechuve enuw emik inempak khuksa.
Chukhaenache ama ing enuwchu maka avomanthumnii ithamnii khaena athar sisa, amana achingnii thohkhe aanghakjaeh ing athamsahpa.
Amana asebok ae ningting juwngka ariir, “Nenuw ataraen phanii ing jaarchuwka nenja nenbasumva? Enruw! Mee Sapa chu isii icher ae kikting charvachii aphachu thengsa.
Hangsuwruw, inuw sitaruw; enruw, ki ynrensah mee thohche ynneeng samuw.”
Jesu ing achong raenche, aanchung jaethiim aere lipah aapuh upa vakhae ing isii, chemthar, vokhehkho rumor chiaeka laarchang mee inempak aechu suum ariinii kaarna ynvae Judas ing veruw aeka vaksae.
Amana Jesu arensah mee inche eningna buwtinnii inche ariir, “Ki ing aabeeng katum mee chuva, ama meechu suwrruw.”
Ama ing anikung nache Jesu buumting vakka ariir, “Kabariimsah nahchii Oja taka aabeeng atum.”
Changlaenche Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Kaarang, ynchii khaena hane nang ivatheng vachii?” Changlae enuw ing akik nache bachuw aeka ensuwrpa.
Chutahnache Jesu ing aanruwfhuw kaartanii mee yngkheh ing achem isuwka aanchung jaethiim ameenaechu atuktah nache aana asaehjohpa.
Amana Jesu ing aningna ariir. “Nachemkha akhumting thinla. Chem aachi vakhae ing chemna maangvaatae.
Atarae ki ing kapa ningting vaarmee laarchang lejan suum ariinii athi ing jenbathenla taningka thamcheh mahnii ichii ing nemandenva?
Changche ichii ing tunacha, ynsaangkhe ynthiing thiimziihchu hungchumcheh vaate?”
Changvakonchu havana isuwh vakhae havi ynthiing thiimziihna jaephar aeng embaziihchu ahungchumnii khaenava.” Changlaenche sebok aenche Jesu bathen aeka taenchirsae.
Amana Jesu aasuwr aenche thiimthang ae vokhehkho upa ae ing Aanchung Jaethiim Kaiphas eenna yngkongchak ae nache enveruwpa.
Changvakonchu Pitar ing Aanchung Jaethiim vajeernii een sukmae ipha inche yndahhak ing avejiipa; amanche sungting varuwhka ynchii suwhvaate ichii achimahtaang ennii khaena aarung mee ae thohche ong.
Amanache Aanchung jaethiim, upa ae, vokhehkho aanchungpuh vakhae ing Jesu ithehnii khaena amiraar ajongpae;
changvakonchu ichummah saarkhii aajaeh pikhang ae nakho araarsa ichiichu tuwhcheh mahsae. Chutahnache aningkuurna ichummah saarkhii ynniimeh ahenpeeh ae,
“Ki ing rumniieen i mamaang ningka amana inii nithum sungna mangiirva kata achii ta aeka enriir.”
Amana Aanchung Jaethiim ing hangiirka Jesu ningna ariir, “Nakhaena ichummah ing ichong ae i yntangkho basangmah tanii?”

Changvakonchu Jesu ing huwdaejaeh ing ongsa. Amana Aanchung Jaethiim ing aningna ariir, “Nang Thangnang sapa Khrista vataniive, keningna nasaarkhiichu iring Thangnang rumingna iriirnii khaena apha kapeehnahchii.”

Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Nang ing nariir churapping. Chukhaenache ki ing naningna kariirnah, atarae basen naka Mee Sapa ing ruwreng ipirpak tachangna ongnaka thangbaen ruwrduh taklina ijuwngchu nenuw ing muvanenta!”

Changlaenche Aanchung Jae-thiim ing apeen isiihka ariir, “Ama ing Thangnang taklina ithipak ing chongsa! Inuw ing havi chungna ynchii saarkhii ijongfhuw omkhang! Atae ama ing Thangnang taklina ithipak ing ichongkha nenuw ingkho nensiipa!”
Nenuw ynchii nemandenva? Enuw ing embasang, ama ithii apha matik chaana.
Amana enuw ing amaena bachir aeka, manvar aeka amanche areh aenche ibeeng aeka enriir,
“O Khrista! Achuw ing nangchu man-varva? Keningna riirla.”
Atii Pitar ing vajeernii een sukmae nache aonglae meenae rupanuw yngkheh ing aningna ariir, “Nangkho Galili Jesu thohne ynruw-hakrem vachii.”
Changvakonchu mee ae maensok nache ama ing rumahka ariir, “Nenuw ing nenriir chong khaene ki mang-huwmah ing.”
Ama ing vajeernii een sukmae ting ajungsuwhtah nache reentaang meenae rupanuw yngkheh ing amupa, amana rupanuw inche abuumna ingiir ae ningna ariir, “Hava mee ikho Nazaret Jesu thoh ynruwhakpae.”
Athar vokheh Pitar ing rumahka vokhehkho chongreep tuka ariir, “Hava mee i ki manghuwmah ing.”
Apha topoh aanuwna abuumna ingiir aeng Pitar ningting henganeeng aeka enriir, “Nangkho enuwthoh ynruwhak kaarna yngkheh vachii ichii nachongna huwna.”
Amana Pitar ing chongsii laksii iriir basenka vokhehkho chongreep tuka ariir, “Mee havi ki manghuwmah ing.” Aphachak nache aarkhuung inche khuwngsa.
Amana aarkhuung ing akhuwngmah rirae nang ing ki vathumchak irumah tanii taka Jesu ing ariir chongchu Pitar ing aansiipa. Amana Pitar ing taangting jungsuwhka abarungriir asuhsahhpak ing chapsa.
Khuw ahungvaar thoh, aanchung jaethiim aere, aan-chungpuh aenche Jesu chu ithehnii khaena yntuwh aeka emanseerpa;
amanche enuw ing Jesu chu phuwp aeka lipah aapuh Pilaat ningtingche enruwpa.
“Ki ing amiraar ichah mee takline karensah i isii kareenpa. Amana enuw ing embasang, “Kenuw kengaanvaenii ynchii omkhang? Nataksah ing manghuwsara.”
Amana khampher somthumchu ama ing rumniieen nache renka jungsuwhsa; amana sika ama runoh ing ynlahka thiksa.
Changvakonchu aanchung jaethiim aenche khampher somthumchu ichuwm aeka enriir, “Havi ynthiing seerbuwrna ithin vajeer kiina, akhaechuve havi sii ynta amenva.”
Amana enuw ing chong manseer aeka, khuwr mee ae yndimnii beer seemnii ingkhon bir yngkheh engariiniipa.
Chukhaenache ama ingkhon birchu sii ingkhon bir ta aeka ataraen phanii ing aruming ymphuwka omna.
Amana jaephar Jeremia ing ariir chongchu hungsuwhsa amachuve, “Isrel siti aenche amen ymbuw vasah ae khampher somthum inche ingkhon birchu enuw ing engariipa;
amanche Aafhuw ing kaningna ariirvasah vaangkhe, enuw ing beer seemnii ingkhon bir khaenache enuw ing amenchu empeehpa.”
Jesu ing lipah aapuh maensok nache ngiirsa; amana lipah aapuh Pilaat inche aningna asii, “Jehudi ae iruwngchu nangvachii?” Jesu ing abasang, “Nang ing nariir chuping.”
Changvakonchu aanchung jaethiim aere upa aenche miraar empeeh raenche Jesu ing basang peehmah ae.
Chutahnache Pilaat ing Jesu ningna athar vokheh ariir, “Nataklina hangjaehmeh ichummah saarkhii empeeh i nangcha nasiimahva?”
Changvakonchu enuw ing Jesu taklina miraar empeeh vakhaechu yngkheh pangkho abasangmah tahnache lipah aapuh inche inempak ngiksa.
Atii manlaennii kuurva chaap nache kaeshumna ong mee yngkheh chuve Pilaat ing abathenchak.
Changlaenche Barabas ichii icha-mahna aruming isi yngkhehkho kaeshum nache ong.
Enuw ing empurpoh raenche Pilaat ing eningna ariir, “Barabas re Jesu Khrista i nenuw ing achuwkha bathen naka ynchiinahchuw?”
Akhaechuve Jesu i kallak aeka enuw ing ensuwrva ichii amanghuw tahnava.

Amachupang mahka ama ing vajeer tunii ongniina aonglae, arumee ing aningna mee vechiirka aman-riir, “Ichum mee taklinakhe nang ing yntanga manrumahra, ki ama akhaena ajaennii karumangna inempak ijachaam kapha.”
Changvakonchu aanchung jaethiim aere upa aenche Barabas chu ynthennii khaena ithoh aeka amanche Jesu chuve ithehnii khaena engathohpa.
Lipah aapuh inche athar vokheh ariir, “Havana mee ynniimehne achuwkha bathen naka ynchii nahchuw?” Changlaenche enuw ing Barabas ta aeka enriir.
Chutahnache Pilaat ing eningna ariir, “Chunuwcha Khrista ichii Jesu icha ki ing ynchii manruva kachiiva chang?” Changlae enuw vakhae ing khros na ynjam rasiing ta aeka aningna enriir.
Amatah nache ama ing ariir, “Ynchii khaenava, ama ing ynchii ichamah tukhang? Changvakonchu enuw ing khros na ynjam rasiing ta aeka uung sesehsae.”

Amana Pilaat ing ynchii tangakho tuchehmahsing ichii amanghuwpa, amachupang mahka phusiir phuraang suwhsehseh vachii ing amutah nache chii verika mee vakhae maensokna akik chaamka ariir, “Havana mee asii takline ki kamiraar yntanga ynvaemah; nenuw nendeisah vatah.”
Amana mee vakhae ing basang aeka enriir, “Ama asii i kentaklina vokhehkho kensiti ae taklina om rasiing.”
Amatah nache Pilaat ing Barabas chu abathenpa, amanche Jesu chuve binka khros na ijamnii khaena amansirpae.
Lipah aapuh alaarchang aenche Jesu chu vajeernii eenting ruw aeka amanche laarchang ruwr aangkheng aeng Jesu kuurna yngkongsae.
Amanche enuw ing Jesu apeendiir-chu siihchir aeka isen peen emansingpa,
vokhehkho enuw ing iring naakhum phaen aeka arusaena emangkhum, amanche akik tachangna rumor amanchiae. Amana amaensokna engkhi mansin aeka enuw ing enriir, “O, Jehudi iruwng!” ta aeka emaniisah ae.
Amana enuw ing amaena bachir aeka rumorchu siih aeka amanche arusaena emanvarnii.
Changche ichii ing enuw ing emaniisah nuwna peen ynsuwr emansingchu siih aeka, amanche Aafhuw ataksah peendiirchu maniireeh aeka khros nache ijamnii khaena enruwpa.
Enuw ing enghungsirae, Sairene tanii itheng aruming Simon ichiichu yntuwhsae, amana enuw ing atakchu arumah brom ing Jesu khros chu amandompae.
Amana enuw ing Golgotha ichii rusaeruwh omnii minchu emphathoh,
enuw ing Jesu ningna samit ikha re vomrip chii manvaenoh aeka empeeh, changvakonchu Jesu ing amantentah nache inningka tamahsa.
Enuw ing Aafhuw chu khros na jam aeka, apeendiirchu achuw ingkhe phavachiiva ta aeka laepah ennii khaena ensem;
vokhehhko ong aeka Aafhuw chu enrung.
Amana Aafhuw ruchung nache miraar empeehnii ynziihchu entaar: “Havi Jehudi ae iruwng Jesu chuva.”
Changlae Jesu thoh ynruw ing lamruw meeniimeh aekho yngkheh inche Jesu atachangna amanche yngkheh inche atariting khros nache enjam ae.
Changlaenche akuurpaangna isi aeng enrusae hungreh vereh aeka ithipak ing ichong thoh ynruw ing enriir,
“Rumniieen mamaangchir naka inii nithumna mangiircheh vachii nataksah yngkarsara! Vokhehkho Thangnang sapa vataniive khros tanii jungchumla.”
Changche ichii ing aanchung jaethiim ae, thiimthang ae, vokhehkho upa ae ingkho maniisa aeka enriir,
“Mee reentaang chuve karchehka; ataksah chuve yngkarcheh mahsa. Ama Isrel ae iruwng vanave atak khros tanii jungchum rasiing, amanache kenuw ing aningna thacha kenta.”
Ama ing Thangnang athachava; Thangnang ing rupeeh nave atarae aphane karlasiing akhaechuve, “Ama ing ki Thangnang sapa ping taka ariir khave.”
Aafhuw thoh ynruw ing khros na enjam lamruw aengkho changche ichii ing Jesu chu emaniisah ae.
Atii apha kuruk na ing apha eekuw ipha ing paam aangkheng manthimpohsa.
Amanche apha eekuw ahungtak phana Jesu ing iruur ipirpak ing uung, “Eloi, Eloi, Lama Sabakthani? Havi achiinii chuve Ka Thangnang, Ka Thangnang, ynchii khaena nang ing kichu ymbathenvachii?”
Amana akuurpaangna ong mee topoh aeng ensiitah nache, ama ing Elija a-eennah enchii.
Changlae engkaar tanii mee yngkheh ing vataenka haesiimna ithuwr chii ikha isip Jesu ningting innii khaena ahenpeeh.
Changvakonchu mee areh aenche, hahra, Elija ing ama ikar ithengmah itheng entaruw enchii.
Athar vokheh Jesu ing iruur yndang ing chi rika alaetha tasamsa.
Amana enruw, rumniieen sungna laedenpeenchu achungna ing thang ipha ing ynniimeh isuwh ing arikna ynsiihsa; amanche ruwruwkho ynnuhsa, rungkho kiisae;
thaen-kungkho ymmongsa, amanche ynthiing mee ithiivasah ae chukho aanem hangringsae,
Aafhuw ing ahangring aanuwna thaen tanii enuwkho hungsuwh aeka ynthiing khuwruung tingche hungruwh aeka mee aanem maekungna yndang ae.
Changlaenche laarchang chaama aapuh re Jesu aarung mee aenche linglaang thengka ruwruw ynnuhchu emutah nache inempak ynchik aeka enriir, “Atatak ing mee havi Thang-nang sapa varae!”
enuw engkaar nache Meri Maga-dalen, Jems re Josep amnuw Meri vokhehkho Zebedi sapa ae emnuw ynvae ae.
Khuri ajungvitah nache, Arima-thia khuwruung tanii savangpa yngkheh aruming Josep ichii atakkho Jesu sebok ynsuwh yngkheh mee thengsa.
Ama ing Pilaat ningting vakka Jesu hakchaangchu aniihpa. Chukhaenache Pilaat ing Jesu ahakchaangchu piruw taka arupa.
Amana Josep ing ahakchaangchu idomka, limon peen ynthiingjaeh ing aarompa,
amana thaen ithar isajaeh ing ynvuwhpeh nache Jesu chu amantorpa; vokhehkho ama ing thaenchu iruungpak rung yngkheh ing kamka yngkaesa.
Changlae Meri Magadalen vokhehkho reentaang Meri enuw inche thaen thoh laar yndeengna ong ae.
Deennii aanuw mathang inii nache, aanchung jaethiim aere Pharisi aeng Pilaat ningna yngkongsae;
amana enuw ing enriir, “Lipah aapuh, amare om mee ingkhe aringrae inii nithumna ki hangring vakata taka ariirchu kenuw ing kengaansiisa.”

Chukhaenache inii nithum ipha ing thaenchu irungnii khaena chonghak bathakla, changmah nave asebok aeng vabaruwh ae naka ithii tanii hangringsa tavaatae. Amana chembe amaensanii marekha athi ing aningkuurnii mare inche sakmahsehnii.
Amana Pilaat ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw aarung laarchang meechu deenchuwka chang; vakruw nencheh vakhae rungsaruw.”
Amatah nache enuw ing vak aeka aarung mee ae ynvae ing rungkamchu ahak nam aeka, vokhehkho thaenchu isajaeh ing emanrungpae.
Atii Deennii aanuw niisin ahaarpa inii nache, Meri Magadalen re reentaang Meri enuw meenii inche thaenchu envabuwr.
Changlaenche enruw, linglaang ipirpak ing thengsa; akhaechuve Aafhuw vaarmee ing thangbaen tanii juwngka rungchu manlupka ataklinache ong.
Ama amaechu bicheeh abukrae ireng vaangkhe ichii ing rengka vokhehkho apeendiir chukho ruwbuwr ivaar vaang ivaar.
Amana thaen aarung mee aenche emutahna engaanchik ing tiih aeka ithiithoh aanghak ing yntorsae.
Changvakonchu vaarmee ing rupanuw ae ningnache ariir, “Ynchik mahruw; khros na entheh Jesu chu nenuw ing nenvajongva ichii ki ing kamanghuwsa.
Ama havane ong-mahsa; akhaechuve ama ing ariir vaangkhe atak hangringsa. Huungruw, ama ajaarnii chukho vaabuwrruw.

Atii nenuw ithupak ing yngkaenuwna asebok ae ningna Aafhuw ing ithii tanii hangringsa tanuwna hungriirruw, vokhehkho atarae nemaana ama Galili ting hesisa, amanache nenuw ing imu phava nenta. Enruw, neningna ki ing kariirpeeh pachuw.”
Chutahnache enuw engaanchik le enrotha iroh thohche thaenchu ma aeka sebok ae ningting hungriirnii khaena ithupak ing yngkaesae.
Enuw ing sebok ae ningting iriirnii khaena enghuunglae enruw, Jesu ing enuwchu yntuwhfhuw aeka eningna ariir, “Idaechu neningna omlasii!” Amana enuw ing akuurting veneeng aeka enrumsah ae.
Changlae Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ynchik mahruw; Ki kauw kanae aekha Galili ting hesisa tanuwna riirruw, amanache enuw ing ki imuvatae.”
Enuw ing ensirae enruw, aarung areh aeng khuwruung ting huung aeka isuwh emuchaap aanchung jaethiim ae ningna entong
Chutahnache enuw ing upa aethoh yngkong aeka emanseer inuwna, enuw ing laarchang ae ningna seer piaeka embasohpa,
“Sinuwna mee ae ningna Aafhuw ahakchaangchu asebok aeng theng aeka kenjaarthir envabaruwhpa taruw.
Jinge ichii ing havana chong i lipah aapuh ningna thangnave, kenuw ing abarungriir manpen nungka vokhehkho nenuwkho yntanga imanrumahnii.”
Chutahnache enuw ing seerchu chiaeka enriir vaangche ichii ing baver aeka havana thamin i Jehudi ae kaarna ataraen ipha ing entongnah.
Amanache enuw ing Aafhuw chu emuthoh enrumsah ae; changvakonchu areh aenchembe achingnii ae.
Amana Jesu ing entakchu vepuwhka ariir, “Thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paamna om aatuaricheh aangkheng kaningna ympeehpa.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing sinuwna jaat aangkhengna sebok seemruw; enuwchu Ampa, Asapa, vokhehkho Ynthiing Laetha rumingna Baptais mantu aeruw,
Ki ing neningna chonghak kapeehchuw aangkheng havi emanjiinii ing enuwchu manchuw aeruw; amanche enruw, laaruw paam avadongnii ipha ing apha om bakhaena ki ing nenuwchu ynruwfhuw vakachuw.”
Thangnang sapa Jesu Khrista khaena isa chong abasennii.
Thangnang Jaephar Isaia thiimziihna ynziih vasah vaang:
“Enruw, nenlam iseemnii khaena,
ki ing nemaana kachong ijeermee kajenchiirsa,
iruur yngkheh ing paamfhuwna uungna;
Aafhuw lamchu seemruw, amanche asinii lam chukho manchiimruw!”
Baptis Johon ing paamfhuwna thengka isii kuhnii khaena barungriir huungruw taka amanthang.
Amana Judia paam aangkheng tanii vokhehkho Jerusalem tanii mee vakhae inche aningting theng aeka isii enrangchu enriir; amana Jordan chifhuwna enuwchu Johon ing baptais mantu aeka amanthiing ae.
Johon chu ut savin peendiir ing ynthong vokhehkho adiirriim shavin ing chiimka amanche khaeruwng re khiniing asah.
Ama ing amanthang chong chuve, “Kaanuwna thengvachii mee i kachungna alaar isa omseh chuva, akhingop runoh rapkho kiim ningka ynjoh matik chasamah ing.
Ki ingve chii ing kamanthiing sachuw changvakonchu Mee Sapa inchembe laetha ynthiing ing imanthiing vaata.”
Apha ichiinache Galili tanii Nazaret Jesu ing thengka, Johon ing Jordan iva nache baptais amantu.
Amana chii sungtanii ahungsuwh chakthoh, thangbaen ymmongsa vokhehkho laetha inche ataklina khunu vaangche ijungchuwchu amu.
Changlaenche thangbaen tanii senruwr yngkheh ing ajeriir, “Nang i kaning namansiihpak kasapa chuvachii, naningna ki inempak pensakning.”
Aanuwnache laetha ing Jesu chu paamfhuw ting aruwpa.
Paamfhuw nache Jesu ing inii nisommanrii ongka umlae ing abatheem; amanche lampa sha aethoh onghak ae; changlae vaar-mee aenche Jesu chu rukuum entu.
Atii Johon ensuwr aanuwna, Galili nache Jesu thengka, Thangnang tanii isa chongchu tongka
vokhehkho ariir, “Aphachu hungvisa, Thangnang lipah chukho ynneengsa. Barungriir huungruw vokhehkho isa chongchu thacharuw.”
Jesu ing Galili chifhuw kuurna ahungsirae, ngaklah mee Simon re anaepa Andru ing chifhuwna ichak endeengchu amupa.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Kaanuw ijiiruw, ki ing nenuwchu meesuwr mansuwhva kachuw.”
Enuw ing engachakchu bathen aeka Jesu aanuwchu enjiipa.
Amana topoh yndahhak ing enghungsirae, Jebadi sapa Jems re anaepa Johon ing ruwkuwngna ong aeka engachak engaphuwhchu Jesu ing avemu ae.
Changlaenche Jesu ing enuwchu a-een ae; amana enuw ing ruwkuwng sungna ong empa Zebadi re eneeh mee aechu bathen aeka aanuw enjiipa.
Amana enuw ing Kaparnaum ting siaeka vokhehkho Deennii inii nache Jesu ing meekongnii tingche varuwhka mee aechu amanchuw.
Jesu ing amanchuw ae nache enruw riimpohsa, yngkhaena ynchii imbe thiimthang ae vaang tamahka, aatuaricheh yngkheh vaang amanchuw ae.
Changlaenche meekongnii sungna umlae ing ichuwng mee yngkheh heong inche uungka
ariir, “Nazaret tanii Jesu keningna ynchii tukata nachiiva? Kenuw eemaang ithengvachii? Ki ing nang i achuwvachii ichii kamanghuw sachii, nang i Thangnang tanii ynthiing yngkheh vachii.”
Changlaenche Jesu ing arakuh, “Nahuw mandae nana aningtanii hung-suwhra.”
Amana umlae ing atakchu aanukrii aanuwting iruur yndang ing uungka aningtanii taang suwhsa.

Chutahnache enuw vakhae enruw riimka yngkheh yngkheh ynsiisae, “Havi ynchiiva? Ynchii ithar ymman chuwva? Aatuaricheh thoh ynruw ing umlae ae ningna rapkho chonghak apeeh i, vokhehkho achongchu enuw ingkho emanjii i.”
Aanuwnache Galili ing aruwkuwr paam vakhaena Jesu ajaechu thangsa.
Enuw ing meekongnii tanii enjungsuwh chakthoh, Jems re Johon ynruwfhuwka Simon re Andru eenting hungruwhsae.
Changlae Simon ampuwchu riitheng ing nakka hejaarchu Jesu ningna emanthangpa.
Chutahnache Jesu ing veneengka akiknache jebachuwka ahemangiir tahnache anikungna ariithengchu damka ama ing rukuum atupae.
Amana inii jungtakka khuri ajungvithoh, ina iki omchaap vokheh-kho umlae ing ichuwng ae chaap Jesu ningting enveruwpohpa.
Amanache khuwruung tanii mee vakhae thengpohka eenkhaarkung nache yngkongsae.
Amana reentaang laena ing ina chaap ae chukho amandampa, amanche umlae ae chukho manchong chehmahsa, havi enuw ing Jesu chu achuwva ichii emanghuw khaenava.
Khuw ahungvaardir mahrirae, Jesu ing hangsuwka michuwr daereng minting vakka athamsah.
Amana Simon vokhehkho aanruwfhuw ae ing Jesu chu enghenjongpa,
enuw ing Jesu chu tuwh aeka aningna enriir, “Mee vakhae ing nangchu ynjongnah ae.”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Isa chong katongnii ing reentaang khuw tingkho sitaruw, havi khaene ki ijuwngping.”
Amana ynchor mee yngkheh ing Jesu maana khupka aningna athamsah, “Nang ing irupeeh taniive, ki ymmandamcheh sachii.”
Aning amanchuwh thoh ynruw ing akik ing jeparka, karusa damsara taka ariir.
Aanuwchak nache ynchor ing ina meechu damka manthiingsa.
Amana Jesu ing ipirpak chong tahka abathen,

“Rungaera mee ningna yntanga riirmahdehra, chang-vakonchu vaknana natak ing jaethiim ningna vamandang, vokhehkho mee ae ing natak i manthiing sachii ichii emanghuwnii khaena Mosi ningna vajeer chonghak apeeh inuwzii ing ipeehfhuwchu vapira.”

Changvakonchu ama ing yngkaeka mee ningna amanthangpa, vokhehkho ynjakrudeh ing mee vakhae ningnache atongpa. Chutahnache atii Jesu ing khuwruung ting yndang ing sichehmahsa; chukhaenache Jesu ing khuwruung tanii ympeenka michuwr daereng aphamchaap nache ongsa, amana ariikiing manrii tanii mee vakhae Jesu ningting ivatheng ae.
Inii topoh aanuwnache Jesu ing Kaparnaum ting ahungangrirae, Jesu chu eenna ongna ichii thangsa.
Amana mee inempak yngkong aeka eensung nakho amanche eenkhaarkung nakho ongnii chirmahsae; chang-laenche Jesu ing isa thamin atong.
Changlae mee manriimeh ing ahakchaang ithiipoh ina yngkhehchu vedom aeka ivatheng ae.
Meechu anempor tahnache Jesu aongnii mapa phuchungchu emanlongpa; amanache ahakchaang ithiipoh meechu ajaarnii thoh enjebabukpa.
Amana Jesu ing emanden therchu muka ahakchaang ithiipoh ina ningnache ariir, “Kasapa, isii natuchaap yngkuh chirsa.”
Changlae engkaarna ynvae thiimthang aenche embarungriirna emanruur,
“Hava mee inge ynchii khaena jinge ichii ing ichongva? Havive Thangnang taklina ithipak ing chongna. Thangnang mahnaka achuw ing isiichu kuhcheh vatakhang?”
Jesu ing embarungriirna eman-ruurchu amanghuw tahnache eningna ariir, “Ynchii khaena nenbarungriir nakhe nemanruurva?
Ahakchaang ithiipoh ina ningna isii natuchaap yngkuh chirsa ichiire hangiir nana vokhehkho najaarnii idomnana sira ichiichu ukho ingkhe laehakna?
Changvakonchu Mee Sapa inge laaruw paamna isii akuhchehnii ruwreng adeensa ichii khaenache ahakchaang ithiipoh ina ningnache ariir,
Ki ing naningna kariirnah, hangiir amanche najaar niikha chinana eenting yngkaera.”
Amana hangiirka ajaarniichu chika emaekung narapche yngkaesa; chutahnache enuw vakhae enruw riimpohsa. Jinge ichii i vokhehdong mumahrimuw ta aeka Thangnang chu emanpah.
Jesu ing athar vokheh Galili chifhuw kuurting sisa; amana mee vakhae ing Jesu chu ibuumpoh aeka Jesu ing enuwchu amanchuw ae.
Amana Jesu ing ahungsirae, Alfas sapa Levi chu ree khuumnii kaaroh nache ong amupa, amana Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Kaanuw ijiira.” Levi ing hangiirka aanuwchu ajiipa.
Levi eensungna imaarnii khaena engonglae Jesu vokhehkho asebok aechu ree ikhuum aere isii icher aethoh ongpohsae; akhaechuve Jesu aanuwzii mee anempak tahnava.

Amana Pharisi ae vokhehkho engkaartanii thiimthang aeng isii icher aethoh ree ikhuum aethoh imaarpoh aechu emutah nache enuw ing asebok ae ningna enriir, “Ynchii khaena Jesu ing ree ikhuum aere isii icher aethoh imaarpohva?”

Ama chongchu Jesu ing asiitah nache eningna ariir, “Inamah mee ae khaena chembe ithiim ikanii omah, changvakonchu ina ae khaena chembe ikaniina; ki ichum ynthiing mee aechu eennii khaena ijuwng mahping, changvakonchu isii icher aechu embarungriir huungnii khaenava.”

Johon sebok aere Pharisi aeng maaru entongchak ae; amatah nache mee aeng Jesu ningna vak aeka enriir, “Ynchii khaena Johon sebok aere Pharisi sebok aeng maaru entong raenche, nang nasebok aecha maaru entong mahpae?”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Rakhiiniina itheng aeng songpa thoh engonghaklae maaru tongcheh mahnii ae.
Aaniichu thengvaata, engkaartanii songpachu jerivachii aanii hungsuwh vaata, changlaenche enuw ing maaru tongvaatae.”
Achuw ingkho baruw peendiir taklina ithar ing ibermah; ibernave ithar varaangkhe baruwkha kika ynsiihnii sehsehna.

Amana achuw ingkho vomrip chii thinnii baruw shakoh thuungfhuw nache ithar vom-rip chii thinmahchak; thinnave shakoh thuungfhuwchu saenjaar vaata, amanche vomrip chii chukho, shakoh thuungfhuw chukho maangvaata; changvakonchu ithar vomrip chii chuve ithar shakoh thuungfhuw khaenava.
Deennii inii nikhehna Jesu ing ruwchimna ivasi; amana enuw ing envasi raenche Jesu sebok ae ing sabar ichim embasen.
Chutahnache Pharisi ae ing Jesu ningna enriir, “Enla, ynchii khaena Deennii iniina enuw ing itufhuwmah iser nong entupae?”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Devit ing aarang aethoh enven achaamrae ynchii atuva ichii nenpamahva,
Abiathar ing aanchung jaethiim nong apuhrae, ynsaangkhe Devit ing aarang aethoh Thangnang eenting varuwh aeka jaethiim mahnaka isahthaang arumah Thangnang ningting ympi vasah tarchu ensahva?”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Deennii i mee khaena aseemva, mee i Deennii khaena aseem mahva;
chukhaenache Mee Sapa i Deennii Aafhuw chuva.”
Jesu ing meekongnii ting athar vokheh varuwhsa, amanache akik ithiipoh ina mee yngkheh heong.
Amatah nache amana heong aeng Jesu miraar ijongnii khaena Deennii iniina amandamse mandammah ichii engabuwr.
Ama ing akik ithiipoh ina ningnache havane huungla taka ariir.
Amana Jesu ing Deennii iniina isa iture isamah itu, ringkum ikarre ithehchu ukhokha isava taka eningna asiiae. Changvakonchu enuw ing basangmah ae.
Amana Jesu ing embarungriir ipirchu amuthoh athirfhuwr ing akuurna ong aechu enka, akik ithiipoh ina ningnache nakikkha ithoh taka ariir. Akikchu ahengathoh tahnache damsa.
Amana Pharisi aechu jungsuwh aeka Herot inuwzii aethoh anikungna Jesu chu ithehnii khaena emanseerpa.
Changlae Jesu ing asebok aethoh Galili chifhuw ting sisae, amana Galili tanii mee vakhae ing Jesu inuw ajii ae; Judia tanii,
Jerusalem tanii, Idomia tanii, Jordan chiilaar tanii, Taire khuwruung vokhehkho Sidon khuwruung ing aruwkuwr sungna ong mee vakhae aengkho Jesu ing nong atuchu ensiitahna aningting vathengsae.
Mee vakhae aenche Jesu chu athung ati naeru ing engabur-pohniimah khaena, Jesu ing sebok ae ningna ruwkuwng yngkheh thoraang turuw taka ariir.
Akhaechuve Jesu ing mee inempak amandam tahnache, Jesu chu iparnii khaena ina ae chaap ingkho enveneeng.
Amana umlae ing ichuwng mee aeng Jesu chu emu emurae amaensokna tiih aeka nang i Thangnang sapa chuvachii ta aeka uungchak ae.
Amana Jesu ing mee ing amanghuwniimah khaena eningna ipirpak ing ariir.
Jesu ing amanden mee aechu eenka bung ting hangkarsa, amana enuw ingkho enghenjiipa.
Amana Jesu ing asebok ynsuwhnii ae khaena, thamin itong amansinii ing,
umlae aechu ithur enchehnii khaena, ama ing mee suum ariinii iteerka pham athinpae.
Enuw chuve, Jesu ing Pitar taka a-eenniichak Simon,
Zebedi sapa Jems re anaepa Johon, (enuw ynniimeh i Jesu ing Bonajes taka a-eenniichak, aruthochuve, bicheeh sapa ae achiiniiva);
Andru, Philip, Bartholomiu, Methiu, Alphius sapa Jems, Thadius, Kana tanii Simon,
amanche Jesu arensah Judas Iskariot ipae.
Jesu ing asebok aethoh een yngkhehna varuwhsae; amanache mee inempak vaangkongreehsae, chukhae-nache enuw imaarkho chehmahsae.
Amana Jesu ing atu ari nongchu mee aeng emutahna Jesu i baveehsa ta aeka engaanseerchu a-eengkuw aeng ensiitahna envajong.
Amana Jesu ing enuwchu enka ynghuwnii thamin ing ichong, “Ynsaang khenche umlae ing umlaechu thurcheh vaata?
Iruwng lipah yngkheh asungna ynrumah ae naka asae ynniimeh suwhkenta ta ae nave, ama iruwng lipahchu utaraenkho ngiircheh mahnii.
Eensung yngkhehna ynrumah ae naka asae ynniimeh suwhkenta ta ae nave, ama eensungchu utaraenkho ngiircheh mahnii.
Amanche umlae iruwng lipahchu asiksik suwhnave, amachu ngiircheh mahnii, changvakonchu chenvaata.”
Achuw tanga ingkho ipirpak mee een nache varuwh naka atakchu amaensana phuwpmah nave, apeehchu richehmah; phuwpvaang naka apeehchu richehpeh vaata.
“Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariir-nah, mee vakhae taklina isii icher chaap vokhehkho Thangnang taklina ithipak ing ichong chaap kuhpeeh vaata;
changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing Ynthiing Laetha taklina ithipak ing ichong chuve utaraenkho kuhpeeh mahnii, akhaechuve ama ing ichen naemah isii arangpa.”
Hava chong i ariirnii chuve, “Jesu i ynthiingmah laetha ing ichuwngva enchii tahnava.”
Changlae Jesu amnuw re anae ae vatheng aeka, taangna ngiir aeka Jesu chu va eennii khaena mee yngkheh envechiirpa.
Changlae mee vakhae aeng Jesu chu ruwkuwr aeka ong ae: amana Jesu ningna enuw ing enriir, “Nangnuw re nanae ae ing taangna ynjongnah ae.”
Ki kanuw re kanae aechu achuw aepae taka Jesu ing abasang.
Ama-na atakchu ruwkuwr aeka akuurna ong mee aechu enka ariir, “Enruw, ki kanuw vokhehkho kanae aechu!
Thangnang ing amandenna isi achuw yngkheh meechu ki kauw kanae, kasar kajuwr vokhehkho kanuw va.”
Amana Jesu ing thamin atongthoh ynruw ing inempak amanchuw ae, vokhehkho amanchuw aethoh ynruw ing eningna ariir:
“Rungaeruw! Mee yngkheh ing sachii ivor sisa.
Ama ing sachii avorlae, sachii topoh lam kuurna ibuwchu vaati ing asahpa.
Sachii areh ing pir inem omah rungkaar nache buksa, amana pirchu adongkhroh tahnache imaenhak ing hangmuwng khangnakho
inii abasaklae mamvuwsa, vokhehkho arajung paecheh mahka chongpohsa.
Sachii areh inche iring kaarna buksa, amana hangmuwng khangnakho iring ing aabuum tahnache ynla chehmahsa.
Changvakonchu sachii areh ingve ruwruw isana bukka isajaeh ing hangmuwngsa, amana sarup somthum, somruk, vokhehkho sarup chaama ynlasa.”
Amana Jesu ing amandong, “Isiinii aana ipaar mee chaap inche siisa rasiing.”
Jesu kuurna ong aere suum ariinii ae ing Jesu ing thamin atongchu ynchii achiiniiva ta aeka Jesu asanaen ing aonglae ensii.
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ithuwhpak Thangnang lipah chong havi neningna kapeehpachuw, changvakonchu taangna ong ae khaena chembe aangkheng thaminjaeh vatah,
‘Amana chembe enuw ing muae naka envaatae,
changkhangnare embarungriir bachukmahnii,
vokhehkho siiae naka rungaevaatae,
changkhangnare manghuwmahnii ae;
changmah nave Thangnang ningting hunganriae naka,
amanche isiichu kuhpeeh vachiipae.’”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Havana ynghuwnii thamin i nenuw nemanghuwmahva? Chunuwcha ynsaangkhe ynghuwnii thamin vakhaechu manghuwcheh vanente?
Sachii ivor mee yngkheh ing isa chongchu avornah.
Mee topoh aeve lam kuurna isa chong ibuw vaangkhe, enuw ing ensiithoh umlae ing thengka eningtanii isa chongchu aripa.
Mee areh chuve, rung kaarna sachii ynvor vaangkhe ichii ing isa chongchu ensiithoh rotharoh ing anikungna engaraangpa.
Changvakonchu enrajung apaemah tahnache amongpang tina engkhaangpheh, changvakonchu isa chong khaena ijachaam empha vokhehkho enanglae jiicheh mahsae.
Mee areh inche iring kaarna sachii ynvor vaangkhe ichii ing isa chongchu ensiipa;
changvakonchu laaruw paam vakhar, lerchii yndik, amanche reentaang aajaeh vakhar ing sip aeka isa chongchu omahsa, vokhehkho ynla chehmahsae.
Changvakonchu mee arehve ruwruw isana sachii ynvor vaangkhe ichii ing isa chongchu enuw ing ensiitahna engaraangpa, amana sarup somthum, somruk, vokhehkho sarup chaama ynlasa.”
Akhaechuve irengna yndangmah vachii ithuurfhuw yntanga omah vokhehkho yndangmah vachii yntanga omah.
Isiinii aana ipaar chaap mee inche siisa rasiing.”
Aadeen mee taklina inemseh pivaata; amanche aadeenmah ningtanii topoh pangti adeensah chukho richirvaata.”
Athar vokheh Jesu ing ariir, “Thangnang lipahchu havithoh aanghakna, mee yngkheh ing ruwruwna sachii avorpa,
amana jaarkhang nakho, hangsuw khangnakho, sachii avorchu ynsaangkhe hangmuwngka ihungruungva ichii manghuwmah.
Ruwruw ing sachii i mamuwngka paarna vokhehkho amanlanah.
Aan-lachu minka ikuum phanache ama ing chemki chika aeh abasennah.”
Jesu ing ariir, “Thangnang lipahchu ynchiithoh mandeengtaruw, changmahka ynchii ynghuwnii thamin ing mandangtaruw?
Amachuve havithoh aanghakna. Mee yngkheh ing sachii kaarna aasiingseh encham muwchu chika amana ruwruwna avorpa.
Apha topoh aanuwna hangmuwngka vokhehkho chimuw bajaang vakhae kaarna iruungseh hungansuwhsa, amanche abah nache vaati aengkho enrabuw eng-huwniinah. Thangnang lipahchu havithoh aanghakna.
Enuw ing emanghuwchehnii khaena Jesu ing reentaang aajaeh thamin ynghuwnii ing atong.
Jinge ichii ing ynghuwnii thamin mahnaka eningna chongmah. Changvakonchu Jesu ing asebok aethoh enum ing engonglae aangkheng eningna atongkiir.”
Ama khuri nache Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Inuw ing chiilaar kahmanuwka reentaang yngkhehting sitaruw.”
Changlae Jesu kuurna ruwkuwng arehkho ingiir, amana mee vakhaechu ma aeka enuw ing Jesu chu ruwkuwngna enruwpa.
Amana ipirpak khuksuwr siiraang inche pha aeka chifhuw ynnoh ing ruwkuwngchu avenuurtah nache chii ing bariim ynthongsa.
Changlae Jesu ing ruwkuwng ariikiingna ijaar; amana enuw ing Jesu chu basuw aeka aningna enriir, “Aafhuw, inuw chiiting ibuw ynthongmuw i namanghuwmah vamo enchii.”
Jesu ing ynterka siiraangchu rukuhka chifhuw ynnoh tingche daerengla achii. Amana khuksuwr siiraangchu chenka daereng ing omsa.
Amana Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ariir, “Nenuw ynchii khaena ynchik vachuw? Nenuw ataraenpha nenthacha omahva?”
Enuw inempak ynchikpoh aeka yngkheh yngkheh ynsiisae, “Siiraang ingkho amanche chifhuw ingkho achongriir amanjii havi achuwva!”
Galili chifhuw alaarna om Gera-seni ichii paam nache enuw tungsae.
Amana Jesu ing ruwkuwng tanii ajungchum thoh, umlae ing ichuwng mee yngkheh inche thaen-kung tanii jungsuwhka Jesu chu aantuwhfhuwpa.
Atak i thaenkungna ong meeva, achuw ingkho siir runoh ing iphuwp achehmahva;
akhaechuve atak i siir runoh ing phuwpchak khang ae nakho amanche korkhiing ing charchak khang ae nakho, ama ing ipehka abathingchir chaktah nache, achuw ingkho atakchu irahnii maesa deenmahsa.
Ama ing siim jaen naeruung thaenkungna vokhehkho reenna uungka asanaensah ing rung ing ynsuknum chakva.
Ama ing Jesu chu laarkhehna ajemuthoh vataenka arumpa;
amana ipirpak ing uungka ariir, “Yngkaang-sehna ong Thangnang sapa Jesu, nang ing kaningna ynchii tukata nachiiva? Thangnang rumingna kathamsahnahchii, ki imamaang samahra.”
Havi Jesu ing aningna umlae nang aningtanii hungsuwhra taka ariirvasah tahnava.
Amana Jesu ing asii, “Naruming achuwva?” Ama ing abasang, “Karuming chuve ‘Inem’ achiiva; akhaechuve kenuw nempaknung.”
Ama ing Jesu ningna athamsah, “Kenuwchu hava paam tanii ithurmahra.”
Changlae ama reen nache voh aruwr yngkheh imaar ae;
amana enuw ing Jesu ningna enthamsah, “Kenuwchu voh ae sungting iruwhnii khaena ibathensara.”

Amana anikung narapche Jesu ing enuwchu ynthen arupa. Changlaenche umlae aeng aningtanii taang suwh aeka voh ae sungting ruwhsae; voh aruwr lising ynnii vakhaechu reen tanii jungtaen aeka Galili chifhuw ting ruwh aeka thikchirsae.
Amana voh aacheer aenche hungtaen aeka khuwruung vokhehkho khuw khuw ting amachu emanthangpa, amana ynchii isuwhva ta aeka aanbuwr mee itheng.
Enuw ing Jesu ningting envaklae, achingnii umlae inempak ing ichuwng vasahchu peendiir heniika vokhehkho iriing idam ing heong emutah nache enuw ynchikpohsae.
Amana heong aenche umlae ing ichuwng mee re voh ae taklina ynchii isuwhva ichiichu ivatheng ae ningnache entongpa.
Amatah nache ivatheng aenche Jesu ningna khuwveen ibathenpeeh tahra ta aeka enthamsah.
Jesu ing ruwkuwng ting ahangkarlae, umlae ing ichuwng vasah mee inche Jesu chu ijiinii khaena athamsah.

Changvakonchu Jesu ing daaka aningna ariir, “Een ting yngkaenana amanche naarang ae ningna Aafhuw ing nakhaena aajaehmeh iruung nong atuva, vo-khehkho nataklina ynsaangkhe ichii ing aningsiih amandangva ichiichu eningna hungtongla.”

Atii ama ing yngkaeka Jesu ing akhaena aajaehmeh iruung nong atupeehse ichiichu Dekapolis (Jordan chiilaar iniisuwhtah yntongting khuwruung suum om) nache ynthang abasenpa, amana asii mee vakhae aenche enruw iriim.
Jesu ing athar vokheh ruwkuwng nache Galili chifhuw laar kahka, ama ing chifhuw kuurna aonglae mee inempak akuurting vaangkongsae.
Changlae Jairus ichii meekongnii aapuh mee yngkheh vathengka Jesu amuthoh
aningna athamsah, “Ki kasanuw thik ynthongna, atakchu adamnii ing vokhehkho iring apha-sahnii khaenache ivakpeeh nana nakik ataklina isiipeehra.”
Amana Jesu ing amathohche vaksae. Changlaenche Jesu chu mee inempak ing ibuumpoh aeka ahenjii ae.
Enuw ing envakraenche kumsuum ariiniina sii ynta ing ina rupanuw yngkheh heong,
ama rupanuwchu ithiim aajaeh yngenka vokhehkho adeen seer aajaehkho abathangchir, changvakonchu damchehru ing ina athisehseh.
Hava rupanuw inge Jesu nongtuchu asiitahna mee changjaeh inem kaarnache Jesu tuknungting vakka apeenchu aparpa.
Akhaechuve ama ing amandensah, “Jesu apeendiir ruwchu parningve, ki damva kata.”
Aphachak nache asii yntachu daesa, vokhehkho ina damsing ichii ataksah ing ynghuwsa.
Amana Jesu ing aruwreng sisa ichii amanghuwtahna mee kaarna vaanlehka asiipae, “Achuw ing kapeen aparva.”
Asebok ae ing embasang, “Mee hangjaeh inem ing nakuurna eeburpoh ae raenche, ynsaangkhe achuw ing ymparva ynchiipeeh vachii.”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing achuw ing ymparva taka akuurna ong aechu aabuwr.
Changlae rupa-nuw ing ataklina ynchii suwhne ichii amanghuwthoh ynchikpak ing vokhehkho ynchiim ing Jesu maen-sokna vakhupsaka, ama ing Jesu ningna athamin aangkheng atongpa.
Amana Jesu ing rupanuw ningnache kasanuw namandensah inuwzii ing damsachii; nang nungaejaeh ing yngkaera, amanche ina tanii damkiirla taka ariir.
Jesu ing changche ichii ing achong raenche meekongnii aapuh een tanii mee topoh vatheng aeka enriir, “Nasanuw kha thiksa, ynchii khaena oja kha namanjava.”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing enchongchu rungaepeehru ing meekongnii aapuh ningnache ariir, “Ynchik mahra, yndenpang mandenjaeh tahra.”
Amana Jesu ing Pitar re Jems vokhehkho anaepa Johon mahnaka achuwkho ruwmahsa.
Enuw ing meekongnii aapuh een emphathoh, mee vakhae aeng ynchii tuva kenchiiva ichii manghuwru ing vokhehkho uung aeka ichap aechu amupa.
Jesu ing een sungting varuwhka mee vakhae ningnache ariir, “Nenuw ynchii khaena ichap vachuw? Naepang i ithiimahva, ijaarsah vatah.”
Amana enuw ing Jesu chu emaniisah ae. Changvakonchu Jesu ing enuw vakhaechu taang basuw chirka, naepang ampa re amnuw vokhehkho asebok ynthum aechu ruwka naepang aantorniiting varuwhsae.
Amana Jesu ing naepangchu akikna jeba-chuwka ariir, “Talitha, Koum,” havi arutho chuve, “Achiihnuw, hangsuwra ta ingka kariirnah achiiniiva.”
Changlaenche rupanuwti inche hangsuwka baversa; atak chuve kum suum ariinii naepangva. Amana enuw vakhae enruw riimpohsa.
Amana Jesu ing meeningna riirmah dehruw taka eningna ipirpak ing ariirpa, vokhehkho rupanuwti i asahfhuw piruw taka ariir.
Jesu ing ama maphamchu bathenka apaamting yngkaesa; amana asebok ae ing aanuw enghenjii.

Amana Jesu ing Deennii inii nache meekongnii ting varuwhka mee ynchuw abasenpa; aasii mee aanem aenche enruw riimka enriir, “Havana vakhae i utani aphava?” “Aningna ising iveernii apeeh havi ynchiiva? Laetho nong hangjaeh atucheh havi achuwva?
Ama i thing ichar mee, Meri sapa vokhehkho Jems, Josi, Judas, Simon ae aipa vokhehkho engkaarna asar ajuwr aekho omah paekhang?” Changche ichii ing ta aeka enuw ing Jesu chu rumahsae.
Mee topoh taklina ama ing akik siinaka enuwchu amandam chumah naka Laetho nong ynchiitanga ama mapham nache tuchehmah.
Enuw enthacha aommah tahnache Jesu ngiksa. Amana Jesu ing khuwveen chaap ting sika amanchuw ae.
Jesu ing suum ariinii aechu eenka, eningna umlae aechu enchehnii ruwreng pika, amana mee ynniinii ing abathenpae,
envasirae rumor yngkheh mahnaka buwsiim, thuungfhuw, diirriimna seer yntanga chimahruw;
vokhehkho rungop asae ynnii yngkhiimahruw changvakonchu kheerkhaang chuve niiruw taka Jesu ing eningna ajeer.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing een yngkhehna vatung tanuwka ongtanuwve, ama mapham nache ongjaehruw.
Laanglam mee ae ing mapham yngkheh nache nenuwchu ihebariimmah ae nave, nenuw ing ama maphamchu nemahrae eningna saarkhii omnii ing nengkhi bajaana pirkhuwh ikahkha rukhuwngruw.”
Changche ichii ing enuw ing siaeka mee vakhae barungriir huungnii khaena isa thaminchu entongpa.
Enuw ing umlae aechu aanem en-thur, vokhehkho ina aanem ae chukho richiithou itaeh aeka emandam.
Changvakonchu mee areh aeng enriir, “Havi Elija va.” Amana mee areh aenche enriir, “Havi Thangnang jaephar yngkheh vaang tikna.
Changvakonchu Herot ing asii-tahna ariir, “Arusae katenvasah Johon kha hangringsa.”
Akhaechuve Herot ing anaepa Philip rumee Herodias thoh empaarhakrae, Herodias apennii ing taka Herot ing alaarchang jebathenka Johon chu ensuwr, vokhehkho kae-shum sungna enthin.
Johon ensuwr akhaechuve Johon ing Herot ningna ariir, “Nang ing nanaepa rumee ibuwh chummahnii.”
Chutahnache Herodias ing Johon taklina abarung siksa, vokhehkho thehningka achiipa. Changvakonchu tuchehmah,

yngkhaena ynchii imbe Herot ing Johon i abarungriir isa meeva vokhehkho ynthiing meeva ichii amanghuw tahnache, Herot ing Johon chu chiika yntanga manruru ing amangong jaehva. Herot ing Johon chongchu asiitah nache abarungriir bavaesa, changkhang nakho achongchu asiirae arutha iroh ing arungaechak.
Changvakonchu nikhehna Herot ing ama achiirkhi ae, aaruung ae, vokhehkho Galili tanii aapuh mee ae thoh ama apuhnii iniina imaarpohnii apha ichachak yngkheh omsa.
Amana Herodias siti rupanuw ing ahunglaam tahnache Herot vokhehkho khuwr aarang aechu pendehsae; amana Herot ing rupanuwti ningnache ariir, “Nang ing namandenchu iniihra pivakachii.”
Herot ing aningna chongreep kho atu, “Nang ing namanden vakhaechu iniihra, khuwruung lipah arikchimbang phanii ingkho pivakachii.”
Amana rupanuwti inche jung-suwhka amnuw ningna asii, “Ki ing ynchii niihkata?” Amnuw ing basangka ariir, “Baptis Johon rusae niihra.”
Rupanuwti inche iruwng kuurting ynnehpak ing huungka, “Ki ing Baptis Johon rusae ataraenrap ipitaniika kachiinah taka aniihpa.”
Amana iruwngchu inempak aba-rungriir jaasa; changvakonchu ama ing chongreep atuvasah khaena vokhehkho khuwr aarang ae kaarna achongreepchu bakhii ningka tamahsa.
Aninkungnache iruwng ing laar-chang jebathenka Johon rusaechu ihenchinii khaena ariirpa. Laarchang inche vakka kaeshum sungna Johon rusaechu tenka,
vokhehkho henchika rupanuwti ningnache apeehpa, amana rupanuwti inche amnuw ningna apeehpa.
Johon ithiichu asebok aeng ensiitahna, ithii vasah ahakchaangchu variaeka endimpa.
Changlaenche chongthang aechu hunganri aeka, amana enuw ing entu enri nong vokhehkho ynchii emanchuwpae ichii aangkheng Jesu ningna enghungriir.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Idaejaeh min yngkhehna nenja basumphehruw.” Akhaechuve mee aanem ing ihuung iva entutah nache buw en isahnii phacheh mahsae.
Chutahnache enuw ing ruwkuwngna hangkar aeka idaejaeh min yngkheh tingche sisae.

Changlaenche mee aanem ing ensiniichu emupa, vokhehkho enuwchu achuwpae ichii emanghuwpa. Chutahnache khuwruung aangkheng tanii mee aenche hetaen aeka amanche enuw ing hungtungniiva enchii minnache maen ing heongsae.

Jesu ing ajungchum thoh mee inempak ongchu amu, amana enuw aechu aacheer omah jao ae vaang amutah nache, Jesu ing enuwchu aning amanchuwhpae; amana thamin reentaang reentaang ing enuwchu ynchuw abasenpa.
Atii inii ajungthir thoh asebok aeng Jesu ningna enriir, “Hava min i meesuwr daena vokhehkho ithirkho atii thirsa,
akuur paangna khuw khuwting ensahfhuw thaemin irii ae naka ensahnii ing enuw ae i bathentah aera.”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Isahfhuw chitanuwve piaeruw.” Amana enuw ing Jesu ningna embasang, “Kenuw ing isahfhuwchu dinari chaniina irii nungka piva kenchiipae?”
Jesu ing eningna asiiae, “Tar aajaeh nendeensa? Hungenruw.” Enuw ing entuwh tahna embasang, “Tar runga re nga ynniimeh tahna.”
Amana Jesu ing mee aechu aruwr aruwr ing fuwr kaarna ongruw achiipa,
chutahnache enuw ing arii inae ing chaama ing, songa ing ruwr sae aeka ongsae.

Amana Jesu ing tar runga re nga asae ynniimehchu verika thangbaen ting hengenka Thangnang chu manpahka, vokhehkho tarchu bakhiika asebok ae ningna semruw taka ajepeehpae, amana nga ynniimeh chukho engkhing chirnii ing ama ingkho asempa.
Mee vakhae aenche sa aeka enven bavasa.
Amana enuw ing ensahsuw chehmah chaap emang-kong tahnache buruk suum ariinii akheer isip ing emangkong.
Amachu pasar mee lising runga vakhae ing ensah ae.
Changlaenche Jesu ing mee vakhaechu mangkaeka, amana asebok ae chukho Galili chifhuw laar Betsaida khuwruung ting ruw-kuwngna maen ing ahemansipa.
