Jesu ing enuwchu amangkae ae inuwna, bung ting ithamsahnii khaena hangkarsa.
Atii khuri ajungvithoh ruwkuwng ing chifhuw arikchimbang ajepharae Jesu ing taangna asanaen ing ong.

Changlaenche siiraang inche eningting avaraangtah nache ruwkuwng ihuur ija aechu Jesu ing ajemupa. Amana aarkhiim apha manrii sung ataklae Jesu ing chii taklina akhi ing vasisa. Jesu ing enuwchu kheerkatae achiiva
changvakonchu chii taklina Jesu isichu emutah nache, enuw ing lae ruthaksii kemu varapmuw ichii ing manden aeka uung ae;
akhaechuve enuw engaanchik tahnava. Changvakonchu aphanache Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenbarungriir mangamruw, kiping ynchik mahruw.”
Jesu ing ruwkuwngna ahangkar chakthoh siiraangchu daesa. Amana enuw engkheng enruw riimpohsa,
akhaechuve enuw ing mee lising runga tar apeeh aekha arutho emanghuwmah tahnava, vokhehkho embarungriir apirtah nava.
Enuw ing chifhuw enjeraenthoh Genasaret khuw vepha aeka ruw-kuwngchu chiikuurna emangiirpa.
Ruwkuwng tanii enjungchum thoh, anikungnache mee aeng Jesu va ichii emanghuwpa,
amana enuw ing khuwveen aangkheng ting hungtaen aeka ina chaap aechu enjaarniithoh Jesu aongnii aongnii tingche iveruw embasenpa.

Jesu ing asiniitah khuwting vakhang nakho, khuwruung ting vakhang nakho, enuw ing ina chaap aechu mee aangkongnii apham chaap nache mantor aeka vokhehkho apeenpang vakhang nakho iparnii khaena enthamsah ae, amana apar vakhae aechu idam aphasah ae.
Jerusalem tanii itheng Pharisi aere thiimthang topoh aeng Jesu kuurna empurlae,
Jesu asebok aeng engkik chaamru ing imaar aechu enuw ing emu.
(Akhaechuve Pharisi ae vokhehkho Jehudi ae ing fhuwven ae purah chongjeer vakhaechu engahthernii khaena enuw ing engkik chaamru ing thaemin samah ae;
enuw ing kithiir tanii enghuungthoh ynchaammah ae nave thaemin samahchak ae; vokhehkho reentaang ynjiifhuw omna, amachuve kam vokhehkho bukam jaekhi chaamchak vachiipae.)
Amana Pharisi aere thiimthang aeng Jesu ningna enriir, “Nang nasebok ae i fhuwven ae purah chongjeer derna siru aeng engkik chaamru ing thaemin ensah i ynchii khaenava?”
Jesu ing ariir, “Isachaang nentu nengkhaena Isaia ing amanthang vasah ynziihka omna:
Mee ae inge ener pang ing eejanah ae,
changvakonchu embarungriir chuve kaningtanii yndahpak ing omnae.
Laaruw mee purah chongjeer vakhaechu Thangnang chonghakva ichii ing mee aechu manchuw aeka,
Kichu aruwh thangsii ing ynrumnah ae.
Nenuw ing Thangnang vajeer chonghakchu bathen chuwka,
nenpurah chongjeer chuve nemanjiinah.”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing ajaennii nenpurah chong-jeerchu nengah thernii khaenache Thangnang vajeer chonghakchu rumah sachuw.”
Mosi ing ariir chuve, “Nangnuw nangpa ijaara, achuw yngkheh ing amnuw chang-mahka ampa taklina siraap pinave, ataklina isii ikha bukvaata achii;
changvakonchu nenuw ingve, ‘Mee yngkheh ing amnuw ampa ningna, kaningtanii nang ing ikanii ipha aruchu Korbaansa, (amachuve Thangnang ningting ympisa) tachuwka,
nenuw ing amnuw ampa khaena ynchii yngkheh ibomnii khaena manrumah sachuw,
Changche ichii ing nenuw ing ajaennii nenpurah chongjeer amakha nemanjiijaeh tahnache Thangnang vajeer chonghakchu manjiimah sachuw. Jinge ichii ing nenuw ing ajaenkho nentusa.’ ”
Amana Jesu ing vaanlehka mee vakhae ningna ariir, “Nenuw vakhaeng rungaeruw, vokhehkho manghuwruw;
taangtanii jungruwh ingkhe mee manchohmah, sungtanii hungsuwh ing meechu amanchohnah.”
“Achuw yngkheh isiinii aana ipaar mee inche siisa rasiing!”
Amana mee vakhaechu maka een yngkheh ting varuwhsa, changlae asebok aeng thamin atongchu ynchii nachiiniiva ta aeka ensii.
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuwkho reentaang mee ae vaang nemanghuw mahva? Taangtanii ing sungting jungruwh ingkhe mee manchoh chehmah;
changvakonchu ijungruwh chuve barungriir sungting mahva, venting jungruwhka taangting suwhna ichii nemanghuw mahva?” (changche ichii ing isahfhuw thaemin chaap ynthiingva taka Jesu ing ariir.)
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Mee yngkheh barungriir tanii ihungsuwh ingkhe meechu amanchohnah.
Akhaechuve laaruw mee barungriir tanii ing isamah chaap ihungsuwhva amachuve, naamak itu, lamruw, miktheh,
reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah atu, ikaam, ichamah chaap, mare itu, lamchat omah, sehmaner om, ichummah ing ichong, ynding, ipang, hava vakhae i hungsuwhna.
Havana ichamah aangkheng inge barungriir tanii hungsuwhka meechu amanchohnah.”
Aanuwnache Jesu ing hangiirka Taire re Sidon paamting sisa. Amana Jesu ing een yngkheh nache varuwhka achuw ingkho amanghuwmah rasiing takhang nare ynthuur chehmahsa.
Changvakonchu umlae ing ichuwng rupanuwti amnuw ing Jesu khaena asiithoh vathengka Jesu khi derna vatiihsa.
Hava rupanuw i Sairia paam ing akuwm Phonisia tanii Grik meeva. Sanuw inche asiti rupanuwti taklina ichuwng umlaechu ithurpeehra taka athamsah.
Jesu ing sanuw ningnache ariir, “Amaensana naepang ae enven bavajap rasiing, naepang ae sahfhuwchu siih manuwka uti ting ipeeh sakmahnii.”
Changvakonchu sanuw inche Jesu ningna abasang, “Chumne, Aafhuw, thaemin isahnii derna isahfhuw ynta rapkho uti aeng ensahnah.”
Jesu ing sanuw ningnache ariir, “Nariir chong havi khaene nang yngkaera; nasiti rupanuwti ningtanii umlae kho taang suwhsa.”
Sanuw inche yngkaeka een ahungtung tahnache, asiti inche ijaarniina hengantorka vokhehkho ataklina umlae ichuwngchu taangting isuwh ing aantuwhfhuwpa.
Aanuwna Jesu ing Taire paam-ting athar vokheh hunganrika, Sidon arikna ing Galili chifhuw ipha ing sika Dekapolis paam tungsa.
Amana enuw ing Jesu ningting aana iseeh vokhehkho achong ynghah mee yngkheh veruw aeka Jesu ningna ataklina nakik isiipeehra ta aeka enthamsah.
Jesu ing ama meechu mee vakhae kaartanii ynruwhjaeh ing ruwka, amanche aana nache akikchar ing sinka, bachirka, vokhehkho abarina aparpa.
Aanuwnache ama ing thangbaen hengenka aningnache ariir, “Ephaphata,” amachuve, “Ymmong rasiing achiiniiva.”
Amana aanachu ymmongsa, abarikho abathahchehpa, vokhehkho isajaeh ing ichongkho achehpa.
Amana Jesu ing achuw ningnakho entongniimah ing eningna ipirpak ing ariir. Changvakonchu mee ningna aajaeh tongmahruw takhang nakho, enuw ing mee ningna athisehseh ing enriirpa.
Amana enuw ariirfhuwchah ing ngik aeka enriir, “Ama ing nong aangkheng isapak ing atupa; aana iseehkho asiipa amanche achong isuwhmah chukho suwhsa.”
Apha aasenru ing aanuwnache mee vakhae ing athar vokheh vaangkongreehsae. Changlaenche ensahfhuw omahsa, amana Jesu ing asebok aechu akuurting ve-een aeka eningna ariir,
“Havana mee hangjaeh i kaning amanchuwhnah ae, enuw ing kakuurna engongnii inii nithumchak ahenphapa, ensahfhuwkho yntanga omahsa.
Ki ing enuwchu enven ichaam ing engeenting mangkae ae ningve lamlah tanii mee topoh ynvaepae khaka, lamna venchaam ing itiih ynvae vaatae.”
Sebok ae ing Jesu ningna embasang, “Hava pammfhuw nenche achuw ing enuw hangjaeh ichu thaemin pichehva takhang?”
Jesu ing tar aajaeh nenchisa taka asii ae. “Sariimeh kenchisa,” ta aeka embasang.

Amana Jesu ing mee vakhaechu ruwruwna ongruw taka ariir; amanche Jesu ing tar sariichu verika, Thangnang amanpah thoh ynruw ing tarchu bakhiika, mee vakhae ningna semruw taka asebok ae ningna jepika, amana enuw ing tarchu ensempa.
Nga isiing topoh enchi chukho Thangnang manpahka, amana mee vakhae ningna semruw taka asebok ae ningna ariir.
Amana enuw ing enven ynva ing ensahpa; abariichu emangkong tahnache buruk sarii sipsa.
Amana asah mee aechu mee lising manrii vakhaepae.
Amana Jesu ing enuwchu amangkae aethoh ruwkuwngna Dalmanutha ichii paamting asebok aethoh sisa.

Changvakonchu Jesu ing abarungriirna abuw nakka ariir, “Hava suwnthar siti aenge ynchii khaena laetho yndangchu ajongpae? Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, amachuve, hava suwnthar siti ae ningne laetho mandang mahning.”
Ama ing enuwchu maka athar vokheh ruwkuwng ting hangkarka chifhuw laar kahsa.
Amana enuw ing tar ichi embahirpa, changvakonchu enuw ing ruwkuwng sungna tar yngkhehpang chuve enchi.
Amana Jesu ing eningna chonghak apeeh ae, “Ynriim-ruw, vokhehkho Pharisi aere Herot chor khaena ynriimruw.”
Enuw ing tar enchimah khaenache yngkheh yngkheh chong emanseer.
Amachu Jesu ing amanghuw tahnache eningna ariir, “Nenuw ynchii khaena tar chimahsung tachuwka nemanseerva? Nenuw ataraen phanii ing nemanghuw mahriva? Nenuw nenbarungriir aajaehmeh ipirva?
Nemik ombroh ing nemumahva? Nengana ombroh ing nensiimahva? Vokhehkho nenuw nengaansiimahva?
Ki ing mee lising runga ae khaena tar runga kabakhiirae, buruk ajaeh-chak ynrii nemangkong?” Suum ariinii ta aeka embasang.
Amanche mee lising manrii khaena tar sarii kabakhii raencha, baruk aajaehchak ynrii nemangkong? Sariimeh ta aeka embasang.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ataraenpha nenuw ing nemanghuw mahriva?”
Enuw ing vasi aeka Betsaida tungsae. Amana heong topoh aeng mikchu mee yngkheh veruw aeka atakchu iparnii khaena Jesu ningna enthamsah.
Jesu ing amik ichuchu akikna bachuwka khuwsung tanii aruwpa, amana amikna bachirka vokhehkho ataklina akik asiih inuwna asii, “Ynchii namusa?”
Ama ing hengenka ariir, “Ki ing mee ae kamusa; changvakonchu enuw ae i thing pangeng ichii ing hungsi vasi entu ing kamusa.”
Amana Jesu ing athar vokheh amikna akik ynnii ing parka a-enteeh tahnache damsa vokhehkho peehchae aangkheng iseengkiir ing amuchehpa.
Amana Jesu ing ama meechu eenting mangkaeka ariir, “Khuwruung sungting hungruwh mahra, vokhehkho khuwruung sungna achuw ningnakho riirmahra.”
Jesu ing asebok aethoh Kesaria Philipi paam thoh ynneeng khuwsung henjii aeka hungsiae; amana lam nache Jesu ing asebok ae ningna asii ae, “Mee aeng ki i achuwva ynchiinah ae?”
Amana Jesu ing achuw ningnakho iriir rumahnii taka ipirpak ing ajeer.

Jesu ing Mee Sapa i ijachaam inempak phavaata, aanchungpuh ae, aanchung jaethiim ae vokhehkho thiimthang aeng rumah ae naka atakchu thehvaatae, amanche animan-thumnii inii nache hangring vaata taka eningna ynchuw abasenpa.
Hava chong i Jesu ing eningna isajaeh ing ariir. Amana Pitar ing Jesu chu ruwka arakuhpa.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing hunganlehka asebok aechu amuthoh, Pitar chu rukuhka aningna ariir, “Umlae, katuk nungting ong, nang i Thangnang khaena mandenmahchii, mee khaenapang namandensa.”
Achuw yngkheh alaetha karningka achii mee chuve maangvaata, changvakonchu achuw yngkhehchu kakhaena vokhehkho isa chong khaena alaetha maangnave ikarpeeh phavaata.
Laaruw paamna om peehchae aangkheng deenkhang nare, alaetha maangnacha ama ing ynchii atuungsahse?
Vokhehkho ama ing alaethachu ynchiithoh amanteh chehse?

Ichuwhmah ing vokhehkho isii icher ing isip suwntharne, achuw yngkheh ing kakhaena vokhehkho kachong khaena aning manjak nave, Mee Sapa ing alaar isa thoh ynruw ing, ynthiing vaarmee aethoh ajungthenglaenche ningjak phavaata.”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, havane ingiir mee topoh ae inchembe Thangnang lipahchu ruwreng thoh ynruw ing ijungtheng emumahri raentaang ithii mumahnii ae.”
Changlaenche Jesu peendiirchu ariirfhuwchah ing vaarsa, amachuve laaruw paamna peendiir arusuk mee rap ingkho changche manvaar chehmahnii.
Amana Elija re Mosi ing eningnache yndang aeka enuw ing Jesu thohche chonghaksae.

Changlaenche Pitar ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Aafhuw inuw ing hava minne ong ing sakvaata, vokhehkho inuw ing rumniitham ynthummeh, narutum yngkheh, Mosi rutum yngkheh amanche Elija rutum yngkheh seemtaruw.”
Akhaechuve enuw inempak ynchiksae, amanche ama ing ynchii riirva kachiiva ichii manghuwcheh mahsa.
Aanuwdeh nache aruvaena engentah nache Jesu mahnaka achuw tikho mumahsae.
Enuw ing bung tanii enjungchumrae, Mee Sapa ing ithii tanii ahangring mahtaang achuw ningnakho nemu chaapkha tongmahruw taka eningna ariir.
Chutahnache ama ing ariir chongchu amanjiiae, changvakonchu ithii tanii ihangringchu ynchii achii-niiva ta aeka enareersahna ynsii ae.
Amana enuw ing Jesu ningna asii ae, “Ynchii khaena thiimthang aeng Elija inche maensa ing jungtheng vaata enchiiva?”

Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Elija ing amaensana juwngka peeh aangkhenglaang ajaenniivaang amang-om chirpa; amanche Mee Sapa ing ijachaam inempak khaangvaata, vokhehkho mee ing maniisa vaata ichii khaena ynsaangkhe ichii ing ynziihva?
Changvakonchu ki ing neningna kariirnah, Elija chu thengsa, vokhehkho akhaena ynziih vaangche ichii ing enuw ing emanden chaap ataklina entupa.”
Enuw ing sebok ae ningting enjuwng thoh, enuwchu mee vakhae ing ihir aeka vokhehkho thiimthang aethoh chong hungsii vaansii entuchu emupa.
Amana mee vakhaengche Jesu chu emuthoh enruw riimpohsa vokhehkho Jesu kuurting vataen aeka embariimsahpa.
Jesu ing eningna asii ae, “Nenuw ynchii nemanseerva?”
Amana engkaar tanii mee yng-kheh ing ariir, “Oja, achong isuwhmah umlae ichuwng kasapa naningna kajeruwsahnah;

Atak i umlae achuwngchak raenche bathiihka vokhehkho abaena por isuwh thoh aha iriirka ynlaap chehmahchak; amanche nasebok ae ningnakho ithurpeehruw ta ingka kariirsahva changvakonchu enuw ing chehmah ae.”

Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “O thacha omah suwnthar siti ae, ki ing nenuwthoh apha aajaeh iseeh ing ongvakata khang? Ki ing nenuwthoh apha aajaeh khaangcheh vakate? Ama meechu kaningting henruwruw.”
Enuw ing pasarti chu Jesu kuurting enghenruwpa; amana umlae inche Jesu amuthoh pasarti chu inukriika, vokhehkho abaena por isuwh ing ruwruwna bathiihka amanruppa.
Jesu ing pasarti ampa ningnache asii, “Nasapa taklina isuwh havi apha aajaeh seehsa?” Ampa inche abasang, “Anaepang raenniiva.”
“Pasarti i ama-maangnii ing mi sungting vokhehkho chii sungting aajaeh athahchak. Chutahnache Jesu nang ing ynchiiva natuchehchu, naning imanchuwh sanana ibomsara.”
Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Nang ing rutaniive, thacha mee ningna chembe nong aangkheng itu arusa.”
Aphanache naepang ampa ing uungka ariir, “Kathachanah; kathacha apirnii ing ibomsara.”

Amana mee vakhae ing ihungtaen aechu Jesu ing amutah nache, ama ing umlaechu rukuhka ariir, “Achong isuwhmah vokhehkho aana iseeh umlae nang aningtanii taang hung-suwh, vokhehkho athar vokheh aningting varuwhmah ta ingka na-ningna kariirnah.”

Chutahnache umlae inche uungka vokhehkho pasarti chu aanukrii aanuwna taang suwhsa, amana nae-pang chu ithii vaangkhe ichii ing yntorsa; changlaenche mee aanem inche naepang i thiksarammo ta aeka enriir.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing akikna jebachuwka ahemangiirpa, amana naepang chu hangiirsa.
Amana Jesu ing eensung tingche varuwhsa, ama inuwnache asebok aeng ynruwhjaeh ing ensii, “Kenuwcha ynchii taka umlaechu kenthurcheh mahva.”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Hangchii ae i ithamsah mahnaka thurcheh mahtanuw.”
Enuw ing ama mapham na ing siaeka Galili paam sung hungruwh aeka enghengaraenpa. Amachu Jesu ing achuw ingkho manghuw naka tamah;
Akhaechuve Jesu ing asebok ae hemanchuwka eningna ariir, “Mee sapa i mee ae kikna pivaatae vokhehkho thehvaatae; amana inii nithum aanuwnache hangring vaata.”
Changvakonchu enuw ing ynchii ariirniiva ichii manghuwmah ae, vokhehkho enuw ing Jesu ningna siiva enchii ynchik ae.
Enuw ing hungsi aeka Kaparnaum tungsae; amana Jesu ing een sungna aonglae eningna asii ae, “Lam nakhe ynchii nemanseerva?”
Amana Jesu ing ongka vokhehkho suum ariinii aechu eenka eningna ariir, “Achuw yngkheh ing maensa ningka tanave, ama meechu aangkhengna ningkuur va-chiiva, vokhehkho mee aangkheng rukuum tuvachiiva.”
Amana naepang yngkhehchu jedomka arikna mangongka, vokhehkho abaen nache jebachuwka eningna ariir,
“Achuw yngkheh ing karumingna naepang havi bariim nave, kichu ymbariimva; amanche achuw yngkheh ing kichu ibariimsa nave, ki ymbariimmahva changvakonchu ki ynjenchiir amachu abariimva.”
Johon ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Oja, narumingna umlae athur mee yngkheh kenuw ing mu ungka kengkhaam, akhaechuve ama eenuw ajii mee mahsa.”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing ariir, “Ama meechu khaammahruw; achuw yngkheh ing karumingna laetho atucheh mee inche kakhaena isamah ing ichong chehmahnii.
Akhaechuve inuw ynru meechu ymmeeva.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, Khrista khaenava tanaka achuw yngkheh ing chii kam yngkheh neningna ipinave nongmenchu pharem vaata.”
“Havana naepang ae inge karumingna ynthacha aechu achuw yngkheh ing isiiting babuk nave, ama meechu ariingna rungsum yngkheh bakhae manuwka chifhuw ting iren ing sakseh vaata.

Amanche nakik ing nangchu isiiting ibabuknii vachii ing omnave nakikkha ten; nakik ynniimeh om ing ithiimah misung longkongting bukva nachii changve, nakik yngkheh omah ing iringniiting ivaruwh inche saksehna.
Amanche nakhi ing isiiting ibabuk niivachii ing omnave, nakhikha ten; nakhi ynniimeh om ing longkongting bukva nachii changve, nakhi yngkheh omah ing iringniiting ivaruwh inche saksehna.

Amanche namik ing nangchu isiiting ibabuknii vachii ing omnave, namik kha ipherla; namik ynniimeh om ing longkongting bukva nachii changve, namik yngkheh-pang ing Thangnang lipah ting ivaruwh inche saksehna.
Longkong ichii ive tangong rungi ithiimah ae, vokhehkho mi chuwhjaehka om paamva.
Mee aangkheng bachii ijim vaangkhe mi sungna kaangvaata.
Bachii inche achiiniichu omahnave, ynsaangkhe manchiicheh vanenta? Nenuw netaklina bachii mangomruw, vokhehkho yngkheh re yngkheh idae ing ongruw.”
Aanuwnache Jesu ing ama mapham tanii hungsika, Jordan laar Judia paam tungsa. Amanache mee inempak aningting vaangkongreeh aeka Jesu ing enuwchu amanchuwreeh ae.
Amana Pharisi ae theng aeka Jesu chu menkenta ichii khaena chong ensii, “Pasar yngkheh ing arumee aansaefhuw tahna vajeer chonghak ing aruse?”
Jesu ing enuwchu basangka ariir, “Mosi ing neningna ynchii vajeer chonghak ympisa?”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw nenbarungriir apirtah nache hava vajeer chonghak i Mosi ing abaziihva.
Changvakonchu ajae abasenpeh raennii ing Thangnang ing pasar re rupanuw aseemva.
‘Havi khaene pasar ing amnuw ampa bathen naka arumee thohche onghak vaata,
amanche enuw meeniichu yngkhehpang vaatae.’ Chutahnache enuw meenii i atii ynniimeh mahsae changvakonchu yngkhehpangsae.
Chukhaenache Thangnang ing amantuwh vasahchu mee ing mansaemah rasiing.”
Amana asebok ae ing Jesu ningna ynchii nariirniiva ta aeka eensungna athar vokheh ensii.
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Achuw yngkheh ing arumee ynsaefhuw naka reentaang rupanuw yngkheh buwhreeh nave, sanuw taklinache ichuwhmah atuva;
vokhehkho rupanuw ing afhuwsar ynsaefhuw naka reentaang pasar yngkheh thoh paarhak nave, ama ing ichuwhmah atupa.”
Jesu ing bor ipinii khaena enuw ing naepang aechu aningting enveruw; changlae asebok ae ing enuwchu enra-kuh.

Changvakonchu Jesu ing amachu amutah nache abarung sikka eningna ariir, “Kaningting naepang aekha huungaerasiing, enuwkha khaammah aeruw; (Thangnang lipah i jinge ichii naepang ae khaenava) akhae-chuve Thangnang lipah i jinge ichii mee ae rutumva.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, naepang vaange ichii ing Thangnang iruwngpaam aaraangmah achuw yngkheh meechu utaraenkho Thangnang iruwngpaam tungmahnii.”
Amana Jesu ing naepang aechu ikorka vokhehkho entaklina akik siika bor apeeh ae.
Jesu ing lamna ahungsirae, mee yngkheh ing vataenka Jesu maana akheerkhuwh mansinka asii, “Isapak oja, ki ing ynchii tuningka ichen naemah iringnii phava kachiiva?”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Nang ing kichu ynchii khaena isa itachiika yngeen vachii? Thangnang mahnaka achuw tangakho isa omah.
‘Mee thehmah, reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah tumah, meepeeh baruwhmah, ichummah saarkhii pimah, mee manchaemah, nangnuw nangpa ijaara, ichii chonghak vakhae i nang ing namanghuwsa.’ ”
Ama ing Jesu ningna abasang, “Oja, nariir chong vakhae i kanae-pangna ing kamanjiisahpa.”

Jesu ing ave entah nache aning amanchuwhpa, amana Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Naningna yngkhehpang vaehna; amachuve yngkaenana nadeen chaap juwr, amanche sara aechu piaera, amanache nang ing thangbaen nache lerchii deenva nata; huung kaanuw ijiira.”
Hava chong i asiitah nache ama jaasa, vokhehkho nungaemah ing yngkaesa; akhaechuve ama lerchii inempak adeen meesa.
Amana Jesu ing akuurna ong aechu enka asebok ae ningna ariir, “Savang ae ing Thangnang iruwngpaam varuwhva enchiichu aajaehmeh ruwvaate.”

Jesu chongchu asebok ae ing ensiitah nache inempak ingik ae. Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna athar vokheh ariir, “Naepang ae, lerchii yndikpak mee ing Thangnang iruwngpaam varuwhva enchiichu aajaehmeh iruwva.
Savang mee ing Thangnang iruwngpaam varuwhvachii chuve siirchar ing simphuw khurna iruwh ing laehakna.”
Amanache enuw inempak ngik aeka Jesu ningna ensiireeh, “Chunuw-cha achuw inche ichen naemah iringniichu phavachiiva?”
Jesu ing enuwchu enka ariir, “Mee ing chembe chehmahnii, changva-konchu Thangnang thoh chembe aangkhenglaang achehchirsa.”
Amana Pitar ing Jesu ningna ichong abasenpa, “Enpeehra, kenuw ing kendeensah aangkheng bathen ungka naanuw kenjiisachii.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Neningna atatak ing kariirnah, ki kakhaena vokhehkho isa chong khaena a-een aruw, auw anae, asiti asanae, aruwbaar abathen omah,

atarae apha ichiine ijachaam aphathoh ynruw ing a-een aruw, auw anae, amnuw ampa, asar ajuwr, asiti vokhehkho aruwbaar abathen mee inche sarup chaama phavaata, vokhehkho hungvivachii nakho ichen naemah iringnii phavaata.
Changvakonchu maensa mee aanem ae ingkhe ningkuur vaatae, amanche ningkuur mee ae ingkhe maensa vaatae.”

Jesu ing maensaka enuw ing Jerusalem ting hungsisae, amana enuw ngiksae vokhehkho aanuw ahenjii areh ae chukho ingik ae. Amana Jesu ing suum ariinii aechu asiksii ing ruwka, ataklina hungsuwh vachii vakhaechu itong basenka ariir,
“Enruw, inuw Jerusalem ipha ing simanuw; amana Mee Sapa i aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang aeng suwrvatae, amanche enuw ing itheh matik chaana ta aenaka reentaang mee ae kikting pivaatae;
amana Mee Sapa chu enuw ing maniisa vaatae, bachir vaatae, binvaatae, vokhehkho thehvaatae; changvakonchu inii nithum aanuwna ama hangring vaata.”
Zebedi sapa Jems re Johon ing Jesu ningting vak aeka enriir, “Oja, naningna keniihchaap chii i itupeeh taniika kenchiinah.”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ki ing nengkhaena ynchii tunaka nenchiiva?”
Enuw ing Jesu ningna enriir, “Jesu nang najaarna, kenuw meenii i yngkheh ing natachangting vokhehkho yngkheh ing natariting ongnii ipisara.”

Chang-vakonchu eningna Jesu ing ariir, “Nenuw ing ynchii ynniih vachuw ichii manghuw mahchuw, ki ing ijachaam kam inniiva kachiine nenuw inchehva nente, changmahka baptais katu vaangkhe nenuw baptais tucheh vanente?”

Enuw ing Jesu ningna embasang, “Kenuw inchehva kenta.” Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Ki ing inniiva kachii kamne nenuwkho inchuve inchehva nenta, vokhehkho ki ing baptais katu vaangkhe nenuwkho tuchehva nenta.
Changvakonchu katachang re katarina ongchuve ki ing pivakachuw mahva, havive ongvachii mee ae khaena ynseem enuw khaenava.”
Amana sebok suum aenche ama chongchu ensiitahna, Jems re Johon taklina nungaemahsae.

Chang-laenche Jesu ing enuw vakhaechu abuumting ve-een aeka eningna ariir, “Reentaang mee ae aapuh ae ing entaklina aafhuw ynsuwhnae, amanche enuw ing entaklina aatuaricheh nong entunah ichii i nemanghuwsa.
Nengkaarna chembe havi suwh-mahnii, changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing nengkaarna ruungningka tanave nenuwchu rukuum ituvachiiva,
vokhehkho achuw yngkheh ing nengkaarna maensa ynsuwh ningka tanave nenuwchu rukuum ituva-chiiva.
Mee Sapa rap ingkho rukuum itupeehnii khaena juwngmah, changvakonchu mee aanem rukuum tupeehnii vokhehkho ikarnii khaena aringkum ipeeh ijuwngva.”
Enuw ing Jeriko nache thengsae; amana Jesu ing asebok aere mee vakhae aethoh Jeriko tanii ing enghungsirae Timas sapa amik ichu aniihmee Bartimas lam kuurna heong.
Ama ing Nazaret Jesu va ichii asiitah nache uungka ariir, “Devit sapa Jesu, naning imanchuwhsara.”
Amana mee aanem ing nahuw mandaera ta aeka enrakuh; changva-konchu ama ing uung sesehsa, “Devit sapa, naning amanchuwhsara!”
Amana Jesu ing ngiirka ariir, “Ama meesu ve-eenruw.” Enuw ing amik ichuchu ve-een aeka aningna enriir, “Nabarungriir mangamla, hangiir, Jesu ing yngeennah.”
Amana apeenchu arenthoh ama ing hangiirka Jesu ningting vaksa.
Amana Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Ki ing nakhaena ynchii tunaka nachiiva?” Mikchupa inche Jesu ningna abasang, “Aafhuw, ki ing imu phasa ningka kachiinah.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Yngkaera; nathacha ingkhe damsachii.” Aphanache imu aphapa vokhehkho lam nache Jesu aanuw ajiipa.
Enuw ing Jerusalem envepha phana, Oleep Bungna om Bet-phage vokhehkho Bethani nache Jesu ing asebok meenii ae ningna jinge taka achiir ae,
“Nenuw nemaana khuw yngkheh omnase vakruw amana nenvaruwh chakthoh, achuw ingkho aongniimahri lola ati yngkheh hengangkhiih muvanenta; amachu bajoh nuwna henruwruw.”
Achuw yngkheh ing neningna, havi ynchii khaena nenruwva ta ae nave, “Aafhuw ing ithupak nong khaena sichinnii ningka jebathen vakata achiinah taruw.”
Enuw ing vak aeka, lam kuurna om een yngkhehna lola ati yngkheh ynphuwpchu muaeka embajohpa.
Amana ihengiir mee aenche eningna ensii, “Nenuw ing lola ati nenbajoh kha ynchii khaenava?”
Jesu ing eningna ariir vaangkhe embasang tahnache enuw ing enrupa.
Amana lola atichu enuw ing Jesu ningting henruw aeka, ataklina peen tha aeka amana Jesu ing lola taklinache hangongsa.
Amana mee aanem ing lamna enpeen hentha aeka vokhehkho mee areh aenche ruwrae tanii thingbah ana saeh aeka lamna entha.
Changlae Jesu amaana hesi vokhehkho aanuw ahenjii aeng jinge uung ae, “Hosana, Aafhuw rumingna itheng atak i bor aphava! Aang-kaangsehna, Hosana!
Aafhuw rumingna inuw vakhae apa Devit Iruwng lipah ijuwngchu Thangnang ing isa bor apeeh ynsuwhrasiing, aangkhengsehna Hosana.”

Amana Jesu ing Jerusalem ting varuwhka rumniieen sungting varuwhsa; vokhehkho ama ing akuur-paang aangkheng aabuwr nuwna, apha ajungthirtah nache, suum ariinii ae thoh ynruw ing Bethani ting huungsae.
Enuw ing atuknuwche Bethani tanii ing enghungsi raenche, Jesu aven chaamsa.

Ama ing thachang bur ana ompoh yngkhehchu laarkhehna ajemutah nache laanglam ynla vatamo taka ava en. Changvakonchu ama ing avephatah nache ana mahnaka yntanga mumahsa, akhaechuve tha-chang ynlavachii aanii tha phamahrisa.
Chutahnache Jesu ing thachang bur tingche ariir, “Achuw ingkho athar vokheh naanla isah phamah rasiing.” Achongchu asebok aeng ensii.

Enuw ing Jerusalem hungtung aeka, amana rumniieen sungtingche Jesu varuwhka peehchae aajuwr vokhehkho aanrii mee aechu ithur abasenpa, seersaam repniii vokheh-kho khunu aajuwr ae ongniichu abaruppehpa;
amana achuw ingkho rumniieen sungna peehchae ireen, ichi chehmahsa.
Amana mee aechu ama ing amanchuwpa: Havi ynziihka om vasahva, “Ka eenchu mee aangkheng khaena ithamsahnii een vachiiva changvakonchu nenuw ing lamruw ae kuw nemanguurpa.”

Amana aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang aenche ensiitahna Jesu havi ynsaangkhe manta manuwka thehtaruw ichii emanjong, akhaechuve enuw ing Jesu chu enchii, vokhehkho ama ing amanchuw ae nache mee aangkheng ngiksa.
Khuri ajungvitah nache enuw ing khuwruungchu embathenpa.
Enuw ing ziing nache enghung-sirae thachang burchu arajung ipha ing ichong emupa.
Chutahnache Pitar ing Jesu chong ynsiika Jesu ningna ariir, “Aafhuw, enla, nang ing thachang bur taklina siraap napeehtah nache thachang burkha chongsa.”
Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Thangnang chu thacharuw.”

Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, “Achuw yngkheh ing havana bung tingnge ymphernana chifhuw ting bukra tanaka abarungriirna ching-niiru ing suwhrem vaata ichii ing thacha nave, athacha inuwzii ing suwhvaata.
Chukhaenache neningna kariirnah, nenuw ing nemandenchu phakenta tatanuwka niih tanuwve phavanenta.
Amanche nenuw ing nenthamsah raenche thangbaenna ong nenpa inche isii ikha nenraar omchu yngkuhpeehnii ing, achuw yngkheh taklina nenungaeniimah omnave kuhpeehruw.
Nenuw ing kuhpeehmah tanuwve, thangbaenna ong nenpa ingkho isii ikha nentuchu ikuhpeeh mahnii.”
Enuw ing athar vokheh Jerusalem ting vathengsae. Amana Jesu ing rumniieen sungna hungsi vaasi aturae, aanchung jaethiim ae, thiimthang ae vokhehkho upa aenche Jesu ningting vak aeka
aningna ensii, “Ynchii aatuaricheh ing havana nong vakhae i natuva, vokhehkho achuw ing aatuaricheh ipika havana nong vakhae i natuva?”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ki ingkho neningna chong yngkheh siikachuw abasangruw amanache ki ing ynchii aatuaricheh pha ingka havana nong vakhae i katuva ichiichu riirpehva kata.
Johon ing baptais atukha thangbaen taniiva changmahka mee ae taniiva?”
Amana enuw ing enareerna chong ynsiisae, “Thangbaen taniiva tamanuwve ama ing ynchii khaena Johon chu nenthacha mahva itavaata?
Vokhehkho mee ae taniiva tata enchiireeh incha, enuw ing mee vakhaechu enchii pareeh, akhaechuve mee aangkheng ing Johon chu jaephar remva ichii ing enthacha.”
Chu-tahnache enuw ing Jesu ningna embasang, “Kenuw manghuwmah ung.” Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ki ingkho utanii aatuaricheh pha ingka hava nong vakhae i katuva ichiichu neningna riirmahning.”

Aanuwnache Jesu ing eningna ynghuwnii ing thamin itong abasenpa, “Mee yngkheh ing vomrip bir yngkheh tuka, aruvaechaap manghirka, asuurnii yngkhehkho khurka, ama-nache arungnii een yngkheh atu. Amachu vomrip bir aarung ae ningna mansirka atak chuve paam yngkheh ting sisa.
Aphachu hungvika, ama ing vomrip aanlachu topoh iphanii khaena ameenae yngkheh aarung ae ningting ajechiir.
Enuw ing ama meechu ruw aeka embin vokhehkho yntanga piru ing embathen.
Athar vokheh vomrip bir aafhuw ing ameenae reentaang yngkheh eningna ajechiirtah nache enuw ing ama meechu arusae bakhii aeka vokhehkho ningjak piaeka embathen.
Amana aafhuw ing mee reentaang yngkheh ajechiirtah nareehche enuw ing enthehpa; mee reentaang aanem ae chuve bin aeka amanche mee topoh ae chuve enthehpa.
Aafhuw ing mee yngkheh adeenjaeh sareeh, amachuve aning amansiihpak asapa chuva, ‘Enuw ing kasapa ichuve iruwpak ing hetuvaatae taka akuurchiimniina ajechiir.’
Changvakonchu vomrip bir aarung ae ing enareer ing chong aeka enriir, ‘Havi ampa ruw kuumvachii chuva, huungruw atak i thehtaruw, amanache ama ing thungvachii chaap inuw thungvataruw.’
Chukhaenache enuw ing ruw aeka enthehpa, vokhehkho vomrip bir tanii enrenpa.”
Atii vomrip bir aafhuw ing ynchii tuvaata? Ama ing thengnaka vomrip bir aarung aechu mamaang vaatae, amanche vomrip birchu mee reentaang ningting pivaata.
Nenuw ing hava ynthiing thiimziih i nenpamahriva?
“Een itu aeng enrimah rung amakharap ingkhe,
athurfhuwrungchu ynsuwhsa;
Havi Aafhuw ing atuva;
inuw vakhae mik enna chembe ingiknii pakna.”

Amana enuw ing Jesu chu suwrnungka enchiipa, changvakonchu mee vakhae aechu enchii, akhaechuve Jesu ing thamin atongchu enuw engkhaenava ichii emanghuw tahnava; chutahnache enuw ing Jesu chu ma aeka yngkaesae.
Jesu ing achonglae enuw ing isuwrnii khaena Pharisi mee aere Herot mee ae yngkheh ynnii enjechiirpa.

Enuw ing vak aeka Jesu ningna enriir, “Oja, nangve ichumvachii amanche achuwkho chiimahchii ichii kemanghuwsa, akhaechuve nangve miksiing mikruung khaemahchii, changvakonchu Thangnang lamchu ichum ing namanchuwsa. Kesar Rom iruwng ningting ree ipeeh aruse rumah?”

Kenuw ing piva kenchiiva chang-mahka pimahva kenchiiva? Enuw ing isachaang entuchu Jesu ing amanghuw tahnache, eningna ariir, “Ynchii khaena kataklina yngennii vachuw? Seersaam yngkheh henchiruw enkata.”
Enuw ing seersaam yngkhehchu enghenchipa. Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Havana ynjek i achuw rusae thoh yntinna? Enuw ing Kesar thoh yntinna ta aeka embasang.”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Kesar taava ichiichu Kesar ningting piruw amanche Thangnang taava ichiichu Thangnang ningting piruw.” Amana enuw ing Jesu ningnache inempak ngiksae.
“Oja, Mosi ing kengkhaena abaziih chuve achuw yngkheh eengkuw ynringhakna aupa ing siti deenru ing thiknaka arumeechu manave, anaepa ing naepang endeennii ing buwhreehva chiiva achiisa;
eengkuw yngkhehna pasar sarii om ae, aupa ing rupanuw yngkheh abuwhpa, amanche siti deenru ing thiksa,
avomaniinii ing amachu buwhka naepang deenru ing thikreehsa. Vokheh avomanthumnii ningna chenkho aanghakjaeh ing suwhsa,
avosariinii ingkho siti deenru ing thiksa. Akuurchiimna rupanuw chukho thiksa.
Atii hang-ring inii nache engkheng hangring ae nacha rupanuwchu achuw rumee ynsuwhva chiiva? Yngkhaena ynchii imbe engkheng ing rupanuwchu embuwhpa.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, ‘Nenuw ing ynthiing thiimziih vokhehkho Thangnang ruwreng nemanghuwmahchu nenraarmah vakhang?
Enuw ing ithii tanii enghangring raenche, rakhii niichaechang tumahnii ae vokhehkho rakhii niimahnii ae; changvakonchu thangbaen nache vaarmee ae vaangche ongvaatae.
Amanche ithii ae hangring khaena Mosi ing abaziih thiimbuwrna ynziihka omchu nenuw ing nenpamah riva, amachuve, Abraham, Isak, vokhehkho Jakop ae Thangnang chuping achiisa.’
Thangnang i ithii ae Thangnang mahva, changvakonchu iring ae khaenava; nenuw inempak nenraarsa.”
Enuw ing chong hungsii vaansii entuchu thiimthang yngkheh ing siika vokhehkho Jesu ing isajaeh ing abasang aechu amutah nache aningna asii, “Chonghak kaarna ukho ingkhe amaensava?”
Jesu ing abasang, “Amaensa chuve, ‘Rungaeruw, O Isrel ae, inuw Aafhuw Thangnang yngkheh pangvatah;
amanche nang ing naafhuw Thangnang chu nabarungriir aangkheng vokhehkho nalaetha aangkheng amanche namanden aang-kheng ing naning mansiihva nachiiva.’
Avomaniinii chuve haviva, ‘Nang ing naveenchaang aechu nataksah vaang naning mansiihva nachiiva.’ Havi chungna aaruungseh reentaang chonghak omah.”
Amana thiimthang inche Jesu ningna ariir, “Oja, nang chumnachii; Aafhuw yngkheh pangvatah tachiika ichum ing nariirpa, vokhehkho Aafhuw mahnaka achuwkho omah nachiipa.

Amanche nabarungriir aangkheng, nalaetha aangkheng amanche namanden aangkheng ing Thangnang chu naning mansiihva nachiiva, vokhehkho naveenchaang aechu nataksah vaang naning mansiihva nachiiva. Thangnang ting ipifhuw vokhehkho chaatha ipifhuw reentaang aajaeh om chungna havana chonghak ynniimeh inge athurfhuwsehna.”
Jesu ing rumniieenna amanchuw ae raenche ama ing ariir, “Khrista i Devit sapava ta-aeka thiimthang aeng ynsaangkhe ariirpae?
Devit atakrap ing ynthiing laetha ing amanriirsa,
‘Aafhuw ing ki kaafhuw ningna ariir:
Ki ing nang yngensiimah aechu nakhi derna kasiihmahri ae raentaangche,
kabaen tachangne ongla.’
Devit atakrap ing Aafhuw taka a-eensa, chunuwcha ynsaang khenche asapa vachiiva?” Amana mee inempak ing ariirchu rotha irohpak ing enrungae.
Jesu ing amanchuw ae sungnache jinge chii ing ariir, “Rungop ynsuwr niiaeka ynlen engadik vokhehkho kithiirna mee ing ibariimnaka enchii,
amanche meekongniina ongnii isaseh engadik, amanche kuurva chaapna iruung ongnii engadik,
muwkhuwnuw ae engeen enruw ensiih vokhehkho achung paamphuwna iseehpak ing enthamsah thiimthang ae khaena ynriimruw. Enuw ing aaruungseh miraar phavaatae.”
Jesu ing seer thinnii maensokna ongka mee vakhae ing seer thinnii nache ynsaangkhe seer athasae taka aabuwr. Savang aanem ing seer inem entha.
Amana muwkhuwnuw sarapak yngkheh vathengka seersaam yngkhepang athasah.
Amana Jesu ing asebok aechu abuumting ve-eenka eningna ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, havana muwkhuwnuw sarapak inge mee vakhae kaarna seer aanem athasa.
Akhaechuve enuw vakhae ive endeen inuwzii ing ympahnii ing enthasa, changvakonchu muwkhuwnuw ive adeensahmah romrom ing ringniivachii adeensah aangkheng athapa.”
Jesu ing rumniieen tanii ahung-suwh thoh asebok yngkheh ing aningna ariir, “Enla, Oja, rung re een i aajaehmeh isapae.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Havana iruungpak een i namuse? Havi akiiraenche rung yngkhehpang ingkho rung yngkheh taklina omahnii.”
Amana Jesu ing rumniieen alaarna om Oleep Bungna aonglae, Pitar, Jems vokhehkho Andru aeng ynruwhjaeh ing aningna ensii.
“Nariir chong ae i utaraenkhe suwhva chiiva? Vokhehkho nariir chong ae i asuwhphana ynchii aandangnii omvaata, keningna itong-peehra.”
Jesu ing eningna itong abasenpa, “Achuw ingkho ichummah lamting ynruwniimah ing ynriimruw.
Ki Jesu ping ta ae naka mee aanem karumingna thengvaatae, vokhehkho ichummah lamting mee aanem ruwvaatae.
Nenuw ing laar yntuk vokhehkho laarsa chong nensii raenche nening mandong mahruw; changchiichu suwhvaata, changvakonchu apha achinii chumahnii.

Jaati yngkheh ing jaati yngkheh taklina, vokhehkho lipah yngkheh ing lipah yngkheh taklina laar tukvaata; reentaang reen-taang paamna linglaang thengvaata, vokhehkho venchaam chiilaar suwhvaata; changvakonchu havi ae i ijachaam abasenniipeh vaata.

Changvakonchu nenuw hahjaehruw; enuw ing nenuwchu upa ae kikting ipivaatae; amanche kaeshum sungna ibin vaatae; vokhekho nenuw ing eningna kakhaena saarkhii ipeehnii khaenache lipah aapuh ae amanche iruwng ae maekungna ngiirva nenta.
Changvakonchu jaati aangkhengna isa chong thamin maensa ing aphachirnii ing yntong vaata.
Enuw ing nenuwchu ynsuwr ae raenche ynchii riirva kente tanuwna maensa ing jamahruw; apha ichiinache neningna ympeehchu riirruw; amachu nenuw ing ichongmah vachuw, laetha ynthiing inche ichongva.
Mee aenche auw anae taklina ithehnii khaena pivaatae, amanche ampa aengkho ensiti ae taklina changche tuvaatae, vokhehkho siti aenche amnuw ampa taklina rumah aenaka ithehnii khaenache pivaatae;
amanche mee vakhae ing nenuw i kakhaena ibatir vaatae. Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing amachu achiniipha ing khaangcheh nave ikarpeeh phavaata.”
“Imaangnii yntirsuwh mee inche ngiirmahvachii nache ingiir nenuw ing nemuraenche hungmaangsa ichiichu aapa mee vakhae ing manghuwruw, changlaenche Judia na ong nenuw bung ting taenruw;
phuchungna ong mee ing jungchummah rasiing, peeh ijungrinii khaena jungruwhkho jungruwhmah rasiing,
amanche ruwraena ong mee ing asingfhuw peen huungrimah rasiing.
Changvakonchu miknii ae vokhehkho naeri ae chuve apha ichiinache aajaehmeh ijachaam niivate!
Chukhaenache havi pharbuwna asuwhniimah ing tham-saruw.
Akhaechuve Thangnang ing aseem raennii ing ataraen ipha ing vokhehdong isuwhmahrideh vokhehkho hungsuwhmah vachii ijachaam inii chuvaata.
Aafhuw ing amachu mantom mahnave, achuw tikho ikarpeeh phamahnii; changvakonchu Aafhuw ing aateer vasah vokhehkho akarvasah ae khaenache aaniichu amantompa.
Achuw yngkheh ing neningna tavaata, ‘Enruw, Khrista chu havane ongna!’ changmahka ‘Enruw, amanase ongna!’ Ama meechu thachamah dehruw.
Ichummah Khrista vokhehkho ichummah jaephar ae hungsuwh ae naka laetho vokhehkho ingiknii nong aajaeh man-dang ae naka, Thangnang ing aateer vasahrap ae chukho ichummah ting ruwkenta tavaatae.
Changvakonchu ynriimruw; ki ing neningna hungsuwh vachii vakhae maen ing kariir chirpa.”
amanche aesii ing thangbaen tanii jungbuk vaata, vokhehkho thangbaen ruwreng aangkheng ynnuhchir vaata.
Amanche enuw ing ruwrduhna Mee Sapa ing aruwreng alaar isa thoh ijuwngchu muvaatae.
Changlae Mee Sapa inche vaarmee ae jebathen vaata, amana ariikiing manrii tanii, laaruw paam adongnii na ing thangbaen adongnii ipha ing ong mee aateer vasah vakhae yngkong vaatae.”
“Thachang bur ing amandang i manghuwruw: adeen hangsuwm naka vokhehkho ana iduung ahangsuwm raenche, saartha ynneengsa ichii nemanghuwsa.
Amavaangche, nenuw ing hangchii ae i hungsuwh nemurae Mee Sapa juwngvachii ynneengsa ichii manghuwruw.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, hangchii ae i asuwhmahri raentaang havana suwnthar i maangmahnii.
Thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paam i maangvaata changvakonchu kachongsae chaap chuve utaraenkho maangmahnii.”
riimjaehruw, hahjaehruw amanche thamsaruw; akhaechuve nenuw ing aphachu utaraen vaate ichii manghuw mahchuw.
Havi mee yngkheh ing a-een bathenka khuwrting asiphana, meenae ae ningna nong mansirka amanche eengkhaar aarungpa ningna hahjaehra taka chonghak apeehthoh aanghakna.
Chukhaenache een aafhuw ing khuri nava, jaenchim nava, aar akhuwng phanava, changmahka jiingna tungvachiiva ichii nenuw ing nemanghuwmah vakhaka hahjaehruw-
manghuw mangharu ing nenjaarthir ama ithengkho arusa.
Ki ing neningna kariir i mee vakhae ningnakho kariirniiva, hahjaehruw.”

Manlaennii vokhehkho chor ynvaemah kuurvachu hung-vivachii inii ninii avaehrae aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang aeng Jesu chu ynsaangkhe ynruwhjaeh ing suwrnungka thehchehva kenchiiva ichii khaena emanseer;
akhaechuve mee vakhae kaarna isii ikha asuwhniimah ing kuurva inii sungna suwrmah manuw enchii.
Amana ong ae kaarna mee areh aenche embarung isii ing enriir, “Ynchii khaena ikaniimahna richiithou amamaangva?”
Dinari chathumna ynjuwr naka sara ae ningna ympivachiichu ta aeka enuw ing rupanuwchu enriirsah.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing ariir, “Tusatah rasiing, ynchii khaena rupanuw havi nemanjaava? Ama ing kataklina nong isapak yntupeehpa.
Sara ae chuve apha om bakhaena nenuwthoh onghak nachuw, amanche nenuw ing engkhaena tuning nen-chii isa nongchu nentuchehsa; changvakonchu kive nenuwthoh apha vakhaena onghakmah manuw.
Ama ing achehsah nongchu atupa; ki kathikmah rirae ama ing maensa ing richiithou eetaehpa.
Neningna atatak ing kariirnah, laaruw paam aangkhengna isa chong aantong raenche rupanuw havi inge yntupeeh nong ikho ama yndennii khaena yntong vaata.”
Amana suum ariinii kaarna ynvae Judas Iskariot ing Jesu irensahnii khaena aanchung jaethiim ae ningting vaksa.
Enuw ing ama achongchu ensiitahna enrotha iroh ing seer ipeeh ynrusae vokhehkho ama ing Jesu chu irensahnii apha icha amanjongpa.

Chor ynvaemah tar isahnii ahaar-pa iniine jao theh ae naka maarva enchii inii ahenpharae sebok aeng Jesu ningna ensii, “Nang ing manlaennii yndennii khaena imaarniichu hesinungka unakhe ihesir naadikva?”
Jesu ing sebok ynniimeh jeba-thenka ariir, “Khuwruung nase vakruw, amana chiibeer areen mee yngkheh ing eentuwhfhuw vaata; ama aanuwchu jiiruw,
amanche ama ing aruwhniitah een aafhuw ningnache riirruw, ‘Oja ing ariirnah, ki ing kasebok ae thoh manlaennii yndennii khaena imaarniichu una-khenva achiinah taruw?’
Amana chungtanii ka iruung yngkhehna ama ing manriipka thoraang atuvasah imansiivaata.”
Sebok aenche khuwruung ting-che vak aeka Jesu ing eningna ariir vakhaechu engaantuwh fhuwpa; amana enuw ing manlaennii yndennii khaena imaarniichu thoraang entupa.
Khuri ijungvithoh ynruw ing Jesu ing suum ariinii ae thoh vaksae.
Enuw ing emaar raenche Jesu ing ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, kithoh kensahhak nengkaar tanii mee yngkheh ing ki irensavaata.”
Enuw embarungriir ija ing yngkheh yngkheh ing kipingmo ta aeka ensiipa.
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Isahnii yngkhehna kithoh tar kensahhak suum ariinii nengkaar tanii mee yngkhehva.
Akhaechuve Mee Sapa khaena ynziihka omchu suwhna, changvakonchu Mee Sapa rensavachii mee khaena chembe aajaehmeh ijaaniiva. Ama meechu jungommah nave akhaena sakseh vachiiva.”
Enuw ing emaar raenche Jesu ing tarchu verika, bor apithoh abakhiipa, amana eningna jepika ariir, “Saruw; havi ki kashava.”
Vokheh Jesu ing vomrip chiichu verika bor apeeh aanuwnache, eningna pika engkheng inche enginpa.
Changlae Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Havi mee vakhae khaena ynta kasii chongngiir chuva,
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, Thangnang iruwngpaamna ki ing itharpeh inva kachii iniichu aphamah raentaangche ki vomrip chii athar vokheh inmahning.”
Aanuwnache enuw ing la tuaeka Oleep Bung ting sisae.
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw vakhae ing ki ibathen vanenta, havi ynziih vasahva; ki ing jao aacheerchu manvar vakata, amana ajao aenche taenchir vaatae.
Changvakonchu ki ing athar vokheh hangring ningka nemaana Galili ting hesi vakata.
Pitar ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Enuw vakhae ing ibathen khang ae nakho ki chuve utaraenkho bathenmah ningchii.”
Jesu ing Pitar ningna ariir, “Ki ing naningna atatak ing kariirnah, atanii jaenrap aarkhuung ing vanii akhuwngmah rirae nang ing vathumchak irumahtanii.”
Chang-vakonchu Pitar ing athar vokheh ariir, “Ki nangthoh ithiihak vakhang nakho irumah suptu tumah ningchii.” Pitar ing ariir vaangche enuw vakhae ingkho changche enchii.
Enuw ing Getsamani ichii min tingche vaksae, amana Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ariir, “Ki ing kathamsahrae nenuw havane heongruw.”
Amana Jesu ing Pitar, Jems vokhehkho Johon ruwka amanche inempak ija ing rungneh ynthehsa.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Kalaetha i ithii ynthongvaang inempak jaana, havane ongnuwna hahjaehruw.”
Amana Jesu ing maesokting topoh vasika ruwruwna akheerkhuwh mansinka athamsah, havi irupeeh taniive kaningtanii apha i imanlaen-peehsar achii.

Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Aba, Apa, naningna chembe aangkhenglaang aruchirsa. Kaning-tanii havana ijachaam kam i iripeehsar; changvakonchu ki ing kamanden ynsuwhmahsana, nang ing namandenchu ynsuwhrasiing.”
Jesu ing ahuunglae enuw ing ijaar aechu amupa, amana Jesu ing Pitar ningna ariir, “Simon, nang ijaar vachii? nang apha yngkheh pangkho nahahcheh mahva?
Nenuw batheem tingche nenbukniimah ing hahjaehruw vokhehkho thamruw, laetha ingve amandennah changvakonchu hakchaang ingve suurna.”
Athar vokheh Jesu ing vakka achingnii thohkhe aanghakjaeh ing athamsah.
Amana athar vokheh Jesu ing ahunganrirae enuw ing ihejaar aechu amu, akhaechuve enuw emik inempak ikhuw; amanche enuw ing Jesu ningna ynsaangkhe basangva kenchiiva ichii manghuw mahsae.
Jesu ing avomanthumnii ahunganrirae eningna ariir, “Nenuw jaarchuwka ija nenbasum jaehva? Aphachu ahenphapa! Mee Sapa i isii icher kikting ynrensahpa.
Hang-suwruw, inuw sitaruw; enruw, ki ynrensah mee thohche ynneeng samuw.”

Jesu ing achong raenche sebok suum ariinii kaartanii Judas Iskariot ing aanchung jaethiim ae, thiimthang ae vokhehkho upa ae thoh ynruw ing, chemthar vokhehkho rumor thoh ynruw ing mee inempak vathengsae.
Amana Jesu arensah Judas ing eningna buwtinnii yngkheh apeeh ae, “Ki ing aabeeng katum ama mee chuva; amachu suwrnuwna ruwruw.”
Amana Jesu kuurting ama ing ithupak ing vakka ariir, “Aafhuw!” taka aabeeng atum.
Chukhaenache enuw ing Jesu chu suwr aeka emphuwppa.
Changvakonchu engkuurna ong mee yngkheh ing chem isuwka Aanchung Jaethiim meenae yngkhehchu aana asaehjohpa.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Lamruw isuwr vaangkhe chemthar re rumor chisuwka nenuw ing kichu isuwr ivatheng vachuw?
Anasiir rumniieenna kamanchuw raenchuw nenuwkho ongchuw changvakonchu nenuw ing isuwrmahchuw. Havi ynthiing thiiziihchu ahungchumnii khaenava.”
Enuw vakhae ing Jesu chu bathen aeka taenchirsae.
Iler yngkheh ing peenpang singka Jesu aanuw ahenjii; enuw ing amachu suwrkenta enchii,
Changvakonchu ama ing peenchu bathenka asae ing taensa.
Jesu chu Aanchung Jaethiim ongniiting enruwpa; amana aanchung jaethiim ae, upa ae, vokhehkho thiimthang ae engkheng yngkongsae.
Amana Pitar ing Aanchung Jaethiim vajeernii een sukmae ipha ing Jesu aanuw yndahhak ing ajenjii; amanche aarung mee ae thoh ama ing mi uka ong.
Aanchung jaethiim aere upa ae engkheng ing Jesu ithehnii khaena ataklina ichummah saarkhii enjong changvakonchu tuwhmahsae.
Akhaechuve mee aanem ing Jesu taklina ichamah saarkhii empeeh, changvakonchu saarkhii empeehchu yngkheh pangkho yntinting yntincheh mahsa.
Amana mee areh aeng hangiir aeka Jesu taklina ichummah saarkhii havi enghenpeeh,
“Mee ing aseem rumniieen havi mamaang ningka, inii nithum sungna mee ing aseemmah yngkheh ki ing seemva kata,” achiichu kenuw ing kensii.
Changche ichii ing riirkhang ae nakho ensaarkhii chaapchu suptin yntincheh mahsa.
Amana Aanchung Jaethiim ing hangiirka Jesu chu asii, “Nang nabasangfhuw omahva? Mee aenge nataklina imanraar aeka saarkhii empeeh icha ynchiiva?”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing ahuw turudeh ing ongka basang mahsa. Amana athar vokheh Aanchung Jaethiim inche Jesu ningna asiireeh, nang bor apha Khrista chuvachii?
Amana Jesu ing basangka ariir, “Ki amachuping; nenuw ing Mee Sapa inche Aapirseh ruwreng tachangna ong vokhehkho thangbaen tanii ruwrduhna ijuwng muvanenta.”
Amana Aanchung Jaethiim ing apeen isiihka ariir, “Havi chungna inuw ing saarkhii ynchii jongvaan chiiva?
Jesu inge ithipak ing ichong nenuw ingkho nensiipa. Nenuw ing ynchii nemandennah?” Amana enuw vakhae ing Jesu chu itheh aru miraar empeehpa.
Amana mee topoh aeng Jesu taklina bachir aeka vokhehkho amae mangkhum aeka engabeeng amanche achuw ing eebeengva riirla ta aeka ichong embasen.
Amana Pitar ing vajeernii een sukmaena aonglae Aanchung Jaethiim meenae rupanuw yngkheh ihuung;
amana Pitar ing mi auchu amutah nache rupanuw inche enka ariir, “Nangkho Nazaret Jesu thoh ynruwhakchuw.”

Changvakonchu Pitar ing rumah-ka ariir, “Nang ing ynchii nariirva ki manghuwkho manghuwmah ing vokhehkho manghuw chehmah ing.” Amana Pitar ing taangting jungsuwhsa. Changlaenche aarkhuung inche khuwngsa.
Amana meenae rupanuw ing amachu muka aruvaena ingiir ae ning-na hava mee i enuw engkaar taniiva taka ariir.
Changvakonchu ama ing athar vokheh rumahsa. Amana apha topoh aanuwna akuurna ingiir aeng Pitar ningna enriir, “Nang i amarem vachii, akhaechuve natak i Galili tanii vachii.”
Changvakonchu Pitar ing ataksah siraap ympika vokhehkho chongreep itu basenka ariir, nenuw ing nenriir mee havi khaene ki ynchiikho manghuwmah ing.

Aphanache aarkhuung ing avoma-niinii khuwngsa. Amana aarkhuung ing avomaniinii akhuwngmah rirae nang ing ki vathummeh irumahtanii taka Jesu ing aningna ariirchu ynsiisaka abarungriir nungaemahpak ing chapsa.
Khuw avaarchak thoh aanchung jaethiim ae, upa ae, amanche thiimthang ae vokhehkho aanchungpuh engkheng inche chong emanseerpa, amana Jesu chu phuwp aeka Pilaat ningting empeehpa.
Amana Pilaat ing Jesu ningna asii, “Nang Jehudi ae iruwng vachii?” Jesu ing abasang, “Nang ing riirchiika chang.”
“Amana aanchung jaethiim aeng Jesu taklina miraar inempak empeeh.
Pilaat ing Jesu ningna athar vokheh asii, ‘Nang nabasangfhuw yntanga omahva? Enla, enuw ing nataklina miraar aajaehmeh ympeehpae.’ ”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing athar vokheh basangmah, chutahnache Pilaat inempak ngiksa.
Amana manlaennii kuurva entu vakhae iniina enuw ing eniih inuwzii ing kaeshumna ong mee yngkheh chuve Pilaat ing abathenchak.
Chang-laenche Barabas ichii mee yngkheh inche lipah taklina chong abasuw miktheh mee aethoh kaeshumna ong.
Amana mee vakhae ing Pilaat ing engkhaena atupeehchak ae vaangkhe itupeehra enchii.
Pilaat ing eningna abasang, “Nenuw ing Jehudi ae iruwngchu bathen naka ynchii-nahchuw?”
Havi aanchung jaethiim aeng Jesu taklina engkallak tahna ensuwrva ichii amanghuw khaenava.
Changvakonchu aanchung jae-thiim aenche Barabas chu ynthennii khaena mee vakhae ningna enriir.
Amana Pilaat ing eningna athar vokheh ariir, “Chunuwcha nenuw ing Jehudi ae iruwng nenchii icha ki ynchii manruva kachiiva?”
Enuw vakhae ing athar vokheh uungsae, “Khros taklina ynjam rasiing.”
Amana Pilaat ing eningna ariir, “Ama ing ichamah ynchii tukhang?” Changvakonchu enuw ing Khros taklina ynjam rasiing ta aeka uung-sehseh ae.
Pilaat ing mee vakhae barungriir manpensa ningka achiitah nache, Barabas chu bathenka amanche Jesu chuve binka khros taklina ijamnii khaena apeehpae.
Laarchang aeng Jesu chu lipah aapuh vajeernii een tanii ruw aeka amana laarchang ruwr aangkheng engeenpa.
Amana Jesu chu peen isen mansing aeka vokhehkho iring nakhum phen aeka emangkhumpa,
vokhehkho enuw ing Jesu chu Jehudi ae Iruwng, kenrumsahnahchii ta aeka irum embasen.
Amana enuw ing Jesu chu aruwsaena manvar aeka, ataklina bachir aeka vokhehkho enuw ing engkheerkhuwh ruwruwna mansin aeka enrum.
Amana enuw ing peen isen emansingchu riaeka, apeendiirchu maniireeh aeka khros taklina ijaamnii khaena Jesu chu enruwpa.
Amana enuw ing Jesu chu Golgotha ichii tingche enruwpa (Golgotha ichii aruthochuve rusaeruwh omnii achiiniiva.)
Amana enuw ing mar re vomrip chii manvae aeka Jesu ningna empeeh, changvakonchu Jesu ing inmahsa.
Aanuwnache enuw ing Jesu chu khros nache jam aeka vokhehkho apeendiirchu enuw ing sen aeka achuw ing phavachiiva ta aeka enlaepah engennii.
Enuw ing Jesu khros na enjam chuve apha ynthum nava (havi ziing apha eekuw taangna vaata.)
Jesu miraar empeehnii ruming Jehudi ae iruwng ichiichu khros nache ynziih.
Amana Jesu thoh ynruw ing lamruw meeniimeh aekho yngkheh ing atachangna amanche yngkheh ing atarina khros nache enjampa.
(Ynthiing thiimziih ing Jesu chuve emiraar om ae kaarna ynvaesa taka ariirchu hungchumsa.)
Khros tanii jungchum nana nataksah yngkarsara.”
Amachu vaangche ichii ing aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang aengkho maniisa aeka enriir, “Mee reentaangve karchehka, ataksah chuve yngkarcheh mahsa.”
Isrel ae iruwng Khrista ama ing atarae aphane khros tanii ijungchumchu munungka kenuw ing thacha kenta. Changlae Jesu thoh ynruw ing khros na enjam mee aengkho Jesu chu changche ichii ing emaniisah.
Amana apha kuruk na ing apha eekuw ipha ing paam aangkhenglaang manthimpohsa. (Apha kuruk i siimchim taangvaata, amanche eekuw ing apha ynthum taangvaata.)
Apha eekuw ataklae Jesu ing ipirpak senruwr ing uungka ariir, “Eloi, Eloi, lama Sabakthani?” arutho chuve, “Ka Thangnang, Ka Thangnang, ynchii khaena nang ing ki ymbathenvachii achiiniiva.”
Aruvaena mee topoh ingiir aenche chongchu ensiitahna enriir, “Enruw, ama ing Elija a-eennah.”
Amana mee yngkheh vataenka vomrip chii ithuwrchu haesiim mansipka Jesu ningna inla taka thor ing ahenpeeh, changvakonchu enuw ing enriir, “Hahra, Elija ing jungbasum vatamo entaruw.”
Amana Jesu ing ipirpak ing uungka tasamsa.
Amana rum-niieenna laedenpeenchu achungna ing thang ipha ing arikna ynsiihka ynniimeh suwhsa.
Jesu thoh mae yngheh aeka ong laarchang chaama aapuh inche Jesu tasamchu amutahna ama ing ariir, “Atatak ing mee havi Thangnang sapa varae.”
Jesu ing Galili na aonglae enuw ing Jesu aanuw jiiaeka rukuum entu; Jesu thoh ynruw ing Jerusalem ting isipoh rupanuw aekho amanache ynvae ae.
Khuri jungvika Deennii inii henphavachii khaena thoraang itu inii vakhaka,
aanchungpuh kaartanii ynjasuwh mee, Thangnang lipah ahahjaeh mee Arimathi khuwruung tanii Josep ing thona isa ing Pilaat ningting vakka Jesu hakchaangchu avaniih.
Jesu chu atarae aphane thikvatamo taka Pilaat ingik; amana Pilaat ing Josep chu ve-eenka Jesu chu atii thikvate taka asii.
Pilaat ing laarchang chaama aapuh ningtanii Jesu chu thiksa ichii amanghuwtah nache Josep ningna Jesu hakchaangchu ichi arupa.
Amana Josep ing limon peen yngkheh iriika Jesu hakchaangchu basumka limon peen inche iromka, rung ynvuwh vasah thaen nache Jesu chu amantorpa, amanche thaen kamnii rung yngkhehchu jemanrupka akampa.
Meri Megadalen re Joses amnuw Meri ing Jesu jaarnii aruvaechu emu.
Deennii aanuwna, Meri Mega-dalen, Jems amnuw Meri, vokhehkho Salomi, enuw ing Jesu chu barim ningsiihnii yntaehpeehnii khaena richiithou engariipa.
Niisin ahaarpa inii nache inii hangsuwh thoh thaen ipha ing enuw vaksae.
Lam nache enuw ing achuw ing thaen kamnii rungchu tuwrnaka eemongpeeh vaate ta aeka enareer ing enriirsah, akhaechuve rungchu inempak ruungsa.
Amana enuw ing enghengen tahnache rungchu yntuwr vasah ing emupa.
Enuw ing thaensung tingche envaruwh tahnache peen ivaarjaeh niika iler yngkheh tachang yntongting ongchu emupa; amana enuw inempak ngiksae.
Ama ing eningna ariir, “Ngikmah-ruw; khros na jam aeka entheh Nazaret Jesu nenuw ing nenjongchu hangringka ama havane ongmahsa; Ama emantorniichu enruw.
Nenuw yngkaenuwna Jesu asebok ae vokheh-kho Pitar ningna hungriirruw amachuve, Jesu ing Galili ting nenuw nemaana hesisa; ama ing neningna ariir vaangkhe nenuw ing Galili nache muvanenta.”
Enuw ing jungsuwh aeka thaen tanii hungtaensae; akhae-chuve enuw ynchiim aethoh enruw riimpohsa; amanche engaanchik inche achuw ningnakho riirmah dehsae.
Jesu ing ahangringnii niisin ahaar-pa inii nache Jesu ing umlae sarii ichuwng aningtanii athur vasah Meri Megadalen ningna yndangsa.
Meri Magadalen ing Jesu thoh ynruwhak vasah ae, barungriir nungaemah ing ichap ae ningna vakka atong.
Changvakonchu enuw ing Jesu hang-ringsa vokhehkho ama ing Jesu kamu achiichu enuw ing thachamah ae.
Havi aanuwna meeniimeh ing khuwting enghungsirae atakthoh yntinmahdeh ing lamna Jesu ing aantuwhfhuw ae.
Amana enuw ing enganuw ynriaeka mee areh ae ningna entong, changvakonchu enuw ing thachamah ae.

Aanuwnache suum ariingkheh aeng imaarnii khaena engongrae Jesu ing eningna yndangsa; amana enuw ing enthachamah vokhehkho embarungriir ipir khaena aasae ae, akhaechuve Jesu ing ahangring inuwting enuw ing muaeka enthachamah khaenava.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw laaruw paam aangkhengna sinuwna laaruw mee vakhae ningna isa chong tongruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing thacha naka baptais tunave ikarpeeh phavaata, changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing thacha mahnave ikarpeeh phamahnii.
Amanche athacha achuw yngkheh chuve hava buwtinnii ae inge ynruwfhuw vaata: amachuve karumingna enuw ing umlae aechu thurvaatae, vokhehkho ithar ithar chong ing chongvaatae;
enuw ing baruwr bachuwcheh vaatae, enuw ing laanglam ithiinii chuwr inkhang ae nakho yntanga tamahnii ae; enuw ing ina ae taklina engkik siivaatae amana ina aechu damvaatae.”
Amana enuw ing vasiaeka apha vakhaena thamin entongpa, amanche Aafhuw Jesu thoh ynruw ing nong entuhakpa, vokhehkho engaanrufhuw buwtinnii laetho inche enthamin vakhaechu amanchumpa.
Aburna basenka emikrap ing emu vohehkho isa chongchu aatong mee aenche keningna ympeeh ae inuwzii ing,
amanche inuw yngkaar nakho nong ing isuwh vasah havi khaene mee aanem ing embaziih khaenache,
Ynjasuwhpak upa Theophilus, nang ing namanghuw vasah nakhe atatak ynthiing ing namanghuwnii khaena,
ki ingkho abasenraennii ing abur aanuw henjiisa ingka isajaeh ing naningna havi mandang ningka kachiisahva.
Judia ae iruwng Herot apaallae Abija sakae sungna, aruming Sakharia ichii mee yngkheh jaethiim heom, vokhehkho ama arumee inche Aaron sungkhur taniiva, vokhehkho aruming chuve Elizabet va.
Changlae enuw saanglam ing Thangnang chonghak inuwzii ing anong entu vakhaena enraar aommah tahnache Thangnang maanache ichum ynthiing meechu ynsuwhsae.
Changvakonchu enuw siti deenmah ae, akhaechuve Elizabet siti deenvachii rupanuw mahsa, amanche enuw engkumsing kho nemsa.
Inii nikhehna jinge ichii ing suwhsa, amachuve ama ing aanchimfhuw ae kaarna pham inuwzii ing Thangnang maana jaethiim nongchu aturaenche,
jaethiim pham purah inuwzii ing Aafhuw ynthiing ka sungna varuwhnaka ningsiihnii barim bathu vachii nongchu aningna buksa.
Ama ing ningsiihnii barim abathuraenche mee vakhae ing taangna Thangnang ting thamsa aeka heong ae.
Changlaenche Thangnang vaarmee yngkheh ing juwngka ynthiing ka asung tachang yntong nache ngiirka atakchu chong abuwhpa.
Changlae Sakharia ing amutahna abarungriir fhuwm bavaesa, vokhehkho ynchiksa.
Amana vaarmee ing aningna ajeriir, “Ynchik mahra, Sakharia, nang ing nathamsahkha kasiipa, narumee Elizabet ing sapa yngkheh baring vaata, amanche arumingchu Johon tavanenta.
Amanche nang ing inungae vokhehkho rotharohchu phavanata, vokhehkho mee aanem ing enrotha rohvaata;
akhaechuve ama Aafhuw maana ruungvaata, vokhehkho vomrip chii kho, juw kho inmah dehnii, amanche amnuw ven sungna basen naka ynthiing laetha ing sipvaata,
amanche Isrel siti vakhae aenche empa Thangnang tingche athar embarungriir hemanghuung vaata,

vokhehkho ampa ae barungriirchu ensiti ae ningting, chongriir amanjiimah mee aechu ichum mee ae loshing ting enghuungnii khaena vokhehkho Aafhuw khaena husaar atu mee aechu athar husaar itunii khaena, ama ing Aafhuw maanache Elija laetha vokhehkho ruwreng thohche sivaata.”
Changlae Sakharia ing vaarmee ningna ariir, “Havi ki ing ynsaangkhe manghuwcheh vakate? Akhaechuve ki tarsing, vokhehkho karumee chukho akumsing hungnemsa.”
Amana vaarmee ing abasang, “Thangnang maana ingiir Gabriel chuping, ki nangthoh ichonghaknii khaena amanche isa chong havi naningna iriirnii khaenache ynjenchiirva.
Enla, havana chongjeer vakhae i asuwhmahri raentaang nang nahuw daejaeh vaata vokhehkho ichongkho chehmah tanii, akhaechuve nang ing hungsuwh vachii kachongjeer thachamah sachii.”
Apha ichiinache mee vakhae aeng Sakharia chu hehah aeka vokhehkho ynthiing rumnii sungtanii ajungsuwh siimah tahnache enuw inempak ngiksae.

Ama ing ajungsuwh tahnache eningna chong riircheh mahsa, chukhaenache mee aenche atak i ynthiing rumnii sungna ynchii yngkheh amusa ichii emanghuwpa; changlaenche ama akik ing eningna emanghuwnii inche ichongcheh mahchu amandangpa.
Ama ing anongchu amanchinuwna a-eenting yngkaesa.
Inii topoh aanuwna basenka ama arumee Elizabet chu venchisa, vokhehkho tha rungameh eensung tanii hung-suwhmahsa.
“Atii Aafhuw ing kichu ymbajuumsahpa. Ama ing mee vakhae kaarna kaning ynjakniichu ynripeehpa achii!”
Tha kuruk ahenpha chakna Galili khuwruwng sungna Nazaret ichii khuwna vaarmee Gabriel chu Thangnang ing ajenbathenpa.
Devit iruwng eengkuw tanii Josep ichii pasar thohche rakhiinii khaena juwr yngkhuw vasah ynthiing lunghah aningna vaarmee ing jungthengsa; lunghah aruming chuve Meri va.
Vaarmee inche veneengka ariir, “Idaechu naningna omlasii! Aafhuw ing nangchu eenruwfhuwsa vokhehkho inempak bor ympeehsahpa!”
Hava chong i asiitahna ynchii achiiniiva taka ama inempak abarungriirna fhuwm bavaesa.
Changlae vaarmee ing aningna ariir, “Ynchik mahra Meri; nang ing Thangnang ningtanii aningshiih naphapa.
Chukhaenache enla, nang venchi taniika sapa yngkheh baring vaanta, amanche aruming chuve Jesu tavanenta.
Ama inempak hungruung vaata, amanche ynkaangseh Thangnang sapa tavaatae; chukhaenache Aafhuw Thangnang inche ampa Devit iruwngpham ongniichu pivaata,
vokhehkho Aafhuw inche Jakop eengkuw taklinache ichen naeru ing paarvaata; changlaenche iruwng apaamchu ichen naemah ing paarvaata.”
Amana Meri ing vaarmee ning-nache ariir, “ki kafhuwsar omahri, havi ynsaangkhe suwhva chiiva?”
Changlae vaarmee ing aningna abasang, “Ynthiing laetha inche nataklina juwngvaata vokhehkho athiseh yngkaangpak ruwreng inche ibaruwvaata; chukhaenache naeduung-chu Thangnang sapa ynthiing chuvaata.
Amanche enla, nang nasungkhur Elizabet ingkho atar ting sapa yngkheh baring vachii khaena venchisa; mee aeng siti baring mahnii ta aeka enriirkha atiive ven achinii tha kuruk ahenphapa.
Thangnang ing chehmah vachii yntanga omah.”
Changlae Meri ing abasang, “Enla, Aafhuw meenae sanuwping; nang ing najeer chong inuwzii ing kaningna suwhrem rasiing.” Ama aanuwdeh nache vaarmeechu yngkaesa.
Amana Meri ing inii nikheh ninii aanuwna hangiirka lamthing paam Judia khuwruung tingche sisa,
amanche Sakharia eensung tingche ama ing varuwhka Elizabet chu salaam atu.
Meri ing Elizabet salaam atuchu asiitah nache aven sungna naepang ynthinchu ynlaapsa; changlaenche Elizabet chu laetha ynthiing ing sipka,
Iruur yndang ing ariir, “Rupanuw vakhae kaarna nang chuve bor naphava vokhehkho naven sungna naepang ynthin i bor naphava!
Ki kaafhuw amnuw ing kaningna ynveer i ynchii khaena isuwhva?
Akhaechuve enla nang ing salaam yntuchii i kaana ing kasiisah tahna kaven sungna naepangchu inempak arotha iroh ing ynlaapsa.
Chukhaenache Aafhuw tanii ynthiing chong aningna itheng athacha rupanuw chuve bor aphava.”
Meri ing ariir,
kabarungriir ing Thangnang chu kamanpahsahnah,
vokhehkho kalaetha ing ki eekarpeeh Aafhuw Thangnang ningnache karotha rohsakna,
akhaechuve, yntuurpak meenae rupanuw kaningna Aafhuw inche yngensahpa.
Enruw, atanii basen naka hungsuwhvachii suwnthar aajaeh ajaehna bor apha rupanuw itavatae;
akhaechuve ipirpak Thangnang inche kaningna iruungpak nong amandangpa,
amanche ynthiing ichiichu ama aruming chuva.
Amanche Aafhuw chu achii mee vakhae taklinache suwnthar aajaeh hungpaar nakho Aafhuw ningchuwhchu omjaeh vaata.
Aafhuw kik ipirpakchu ymmandangpeehpa,
emanghuwsah barungriirna ynding mee vakhae ae barungriirchu asiksik ing amangomgpa,
Aafhuw inche aacheh chirpung achii aechu engaruwngpham tanii amanjuurpae,
amanche yntuur mee ae chuve aathohpa;
Aafhuw ing venchaam chiilaar mee aechu isapak thaemin ing amamvapae,
amanche savang ae chuve aruwh thangsii ing abathenpae.
Aafhuw Thangnang ing Abraham vokhehkho atuti ae hungpaar vakhae taklina ichen naemah aningchuwhchu yndennii khaena,
inuw vakhae ynfhuwven ae ningna ajeer vasah inuwzii ing,
Aafhuw ing ameenae Isrel aechu abomsahpae.
Meri ing tha ynthum vakhae Elizabet thoh onghak aeka a-eenting yngkaesa.
Atii Elizabet naepang omvachii apha hemphaka sapa yngkheh abaringpa.
Amana Aafhuw inche iruungpak aningchuwh amandangchu ama auwnae, aveenchaang, asungkhur vakhae aengkho ensiitah nache inempak enrotha rohsa.
Amana inii neeriih ahenpha raen-che naepangchu vinchiipnii khaena enuw thengsae; vokhehkho enuw ing emanden chuve ampa ruming manreen manuwka Sakharia tavataruw ichii ing emandenpa.
Changvakonchu amnuw ing eningna naepang i aruming Johon tavaanchiiva taka ariirpa.
Amatah nache enuw ing embasang, “Nensungkhur sungna hava ruming i areen mee omahri.”
Chutahnache enuw ing ampa ningnache aruming achuw taningka nachiiva ta aeka amanghuwnii ing ensiipa.
Amana ampa ing baziihnii vachii niihka ama ing arumingchu Johon va taka abaziihpa. Chutahnache enuw inempak ngiksae.
Changlaen chakche ama ing athar ichong chehka Thangnang chu amanpahsahpa.
Changlaenche aveenchaang chaap aechu ynchikpohsae. Amana ataklina isuwh vakhaechu lamthing paamna ong Judia mee aangkheng ing engaanseerpa;
amanche nae-pang i nuwting ynchii tavachiiva ta aeka aasii vokhehkho aamu vakhae aenche embarungriirna enthinjaehpa. Akhaechuve naepang taklinache Aafhuw achangbaen inche aanruwfhuwpa.
Johon ampa Sakharia chu ynthiing laetha inche ataklina sipka Thangnang chongjeerchu amanthangpa,
“Isrel ae Aafhuw Thangnang chu manpah sataruw,
Aafhuw inche amee aechu ajungveerpa vokhehkho ikarpeehnii nong atupa,
Vokhehkho Aafhuw ameenae Devit eengkuwna inuw vakhae khaena ipirpak eekarpeeh yngkheh
tunanii ynthiing jaephar ae nernache Aafhuw ing ajejeer vasahchu ynjepeehsahpa,
inuwchu ynjeehnii ae vokhehkho ymbatir vakhae ae
kik taniichu ama ing ikarpeeh vaata;
vokhehkho inuw vakhae afhuw fhuwven ae ningna achongreep om aningchuwhchu amandangnii inche,
vokhehkho ynthiing achonghakchu yndennii khaenache,
inuw vakhae apa Abraham ningna chongreep atu inuwzii inche
inuwchu eejeehnii ae kik tanii ikarpeeh naka Aafhuw chu ynchik omru ing,
ynthiing inche vokhehkho ichum ynthiing inche ynringseehna Aafhuw maanache anong tunii khaenava.
Amanche naepang nang chuve aanchungseh jaephar ynsuwh vaanta;
nang ing Aafhuw lam seemnii khaena maensa vaanta,
Aafhuw amee ae ningnache isii kuhnii manlaenpeeh empha khaenache riirpeehva natae,
havi inuw vakhae Thangnang aningchuwh barungriir isa inchenva,
ama ajaar inche ynthimna, vokhehkho ithii ruthaksiina ong mee vakhae ningnache amanrengnii ing,
amanche idae lamtingche karkhiingnii khaena,
thangbaen tanii ing ije aenpeeh vaata.”
Chukhaenache naepangchu hakchaang nakho, laetha nakho hungruung sehsehsa, hungpirkho hungpirsa, vokhehkho Isrel ae ningna aandangmahri raentaangche lampa nache ong.
Hava apha sungne laaruw paam aphamsiirna mee masing iteennii khaena Agastas Kesar ing chonghak abathenpa.
Changlae kuirinius ing Sairia aafhuw ynsuwhka apaanii raenche masing iteen ahaarpava.
Chukhaenache mee vakhae ing akhuw akhuwting ruming ynziihnii khaena yngkaesae.
Changlaenche Josep kho Galili na om Nazaret ichii khuwruung tanii Judia na om Devit khuwruung Bethlehem iphanii ing hungkaesa; akhaechuve atak i Devit tuti taniiva;
chukhaenache juwr akhuw vasah aven rupumna nae areen Meri thoh-che ruming ynziihnii khaenache hungtungsae.
Enuw ing amana engongraenche naepang jungomvachii aaniichu ahenphapa.
Amanche sanuw inche ahaarpa asapa yngkhehchu abaringpa vokheh-kho naepangchu peen ing iromka khutheeng nache amanjaarpa, akhaechuve eensungna entungnii apham omahsa.
Changlae ama paam nache jao icheer aechu enjao cheer aeka Jaenna iriih ae.
Amana Aafhuw vaarmee yngkheh ing eningnache yndangsa, vokhehkho Aafhuw alaar isa inche entaklina aenka, enuw inempak ynchiksae.
Changlaenche vaarmee ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ynchik mahruw! akhaechuve enruw, mee aangkheng khaena inempak rotharohnii isa chong ki ing neningna kajenreensa;
atanii iniine Devit khuwruung nache nenuw eekarpeeh Aafhuw chu jungomsa, atak i Khrista Aafhuw chuva!
Chukhaenache nenuw ing nemanghuwnii khaena aandangnii chuve, nenuw ing naepangchu peen ing ynrom naka khutheeng nache ijaarchu tuwhva nenta.”
Aphanache thangbaen tanii vaarmee aruwr aenche yndang aeka Thangnang chu la ing emanpah:
“Thangnang chu yngkaangseh ing manpahtaruw vokhehkho laaruw paamna aning amanthung mee ae ningnache idae omchu ynsuwhrasiing!”
Vaarmee aeng thangbaen ting engangri aanuwnache, jao icheer aenche yngkheh yngkheh ynriirsae, “Inuw vakhae ing Bethlehem ipha ing simanuwka Aafhuw ing ariir chongchu va-entaruw.”
Chukhaenache enuw ing ynneh-pak ing vasiaeka, enuw ing Meri re Josep chu envatuwhpa vokhehkho naeduungchu khutheeng nache emanjaarchu emupa.
Enuw ing emutah nache eningna ariir chong-chu engaansiipa;
vokhehkho jao icheer aeng enriir chongchu mee vakhaeng ensiitah nache enruwriimsa.
Changvakonchu Meri ing abarungriirna mandenka havana isuwh khaene abarungriir sungna athinjaehpa.
Jao icheer aenche eningna ariirchu ensiipa vokhehkho emu khaenache enuw ing Thangnang chu la ing manpah aeka ynrisae.
Mosi vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing engkhaena ynthiingnii iniichu ahenphapa. Chukhaenache enuw ing naepang chu Aafhuw ningting ipeehnii khaena enruwpa.
Aafhuw vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing, “Ahaarpa abaring sapa vakhaechu Aafhuw ningting pivachiipae,
vokhehkho Aafhuw vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing vathuw ruwbuwkheh, changmahka khunu iduung ruwbuwkhehchu chaatha ing ipeehnii khaena vaksae.”

Changlaenche aruming Simion ichii mee yngkheh Jerusalem nache ong, ama mee inge Isrel mee ae barung ngamnii emphamahri raen-taang ichum ynthiing ing ahahsah vokhehkho Thangnang chu icheepjaeh ing amanden ama ataklinache laetha ynthiing ing hesip.
Chukhaenache laetha ynthiing ing aningna ajeer chuve, Thangnang sapa Khrista chu namumahri raentaang nang ithii mumahtanii.

Chutahnache laetha ynthiing ing ongniika rumniieen tingche varuwhsa amanche ama ing vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing naepang khaene nong itupeehnii khaena ampa re amnuw inche naepang Jesu chu aningting envepeehpa,
ama ing naepangchu vedomka Thangnang chu manpahka ariir:
“Aafhuw nang ing najeer chongreep inuwzii ing,
atiive Aafhuw nang ing idaejaeh ing ymbathenpachii,
mee vakhae kaarnache nang ing thoraang yntupeehchii
manlaenpeeh phaniichu kamikrap ing kamusahpa,
reentaang mee ae ningnache irengchu amandangnii khaena Isrel namee ae nache nalaar isachu najenreenpa.”
Havi khaene naeduung ampa re amnuw aenche ama chongchu ensiitahna inempak enruwriimsa;

Simion inche enuwchu bor piaeka Aafhuw amnuw Meri ningnache ariir, “Enla, naepang havi Isrel sungna maangnii vachii vokhehkho mee aanem karnii khaena Thangnang ing aateerva. Atak i mee ae ing enrumah buwtinnii Thangnang taniichu ynsuwh vaata;
amanche embarungriir sungtaniichu mandang vaata. Amana nabarungriirna ijachaam laangchem yngeepak ing ynsinvaang tavaata.”
Aser sungkhur tanii phanuel ichii sanuw aruming Anna ichii jaepharnuw om; (ama afhuwsar thohche kum sarii pang paarhak aeka
aanuwnache kum sommiriih arii manrii ipha ing muwkhuwnuw ing ong.) Ama ing siim jaen maaru atongthoh ynruw ing thamsaka rumniieenchu bathen samah.
Aphanache Jerusalem ting hangka Thangnang chu amanpah vokhehkho eekarpeeh Aafhuw khaenache ahah ae Jerusalem na ong mee ae ningnache inempak ichong.
Naepang Jesu chu hungruungka vokhehkho inempak hungpirsa, iveerkho hungveersa; amanche Thangnang tungsiih ajaarchu ataklinache omsa.
Atii ampa amnuw aenche kum kumna manlaennii kuurva entuchaknii Jerusalem tingche isichak ae.
Jesu inche kum suum ariinii ahenpha-raenche enuw ing isichak ae vaangkhe kuurva aanvaenii khaenache vasisae;
kuurvachu achinuw tingche enuw ing enghunganri tahnache, naepang inche Jerusalem nache ongsa. Amachu ampa re amnuw inche manghuwmahsae.

Enuw ing emanden chuve naepang havi aarang ae kaarna ynvae varom ta aeka inii nikheh entheh lam sisae, changlaenche enuw ing ensung-khur engaanghuwfhuw ae kaarna ynvaenamo ta aeka enjongtah nache tuwhmahsae;
chukhaenache enuw ing Jerusalem ipha ing siaeka envajongpa.
Amanche Jesu chu inii nithum aanuwting rumniieen nache Jehudi ae aanchuw mee ae kaarna ongka enchong arungae, vokhehkho eningna chong hungsii vesiika ong ing entuwhpa.
Ama ing ising iveerpak ing abasang chongchu asii vakhae mee aenche ngiksae.
Ampa re amnuw aenche atakchu emutah nache inempak ngik aeka amana amnuw inche aningna ariir, “Kasiti, nang ing kenuwchu jinge manchiichii i yngkhaenava? Enla, nangpa thoh kenuw ing kenvajong vachii.”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing kichu ynchii khaena ynjong vachuw? Ki kapa eennache ongva kachiiva ichii nenuw nemanghuw mahva?”
Ama ing eningna ariir chongchu enuw ing manghuwchehmah ae.
Amana enuw thohche Nazaret tingche yngkae aeka amanche en-chongriir dernache ongsa; hava vakhae i amnuw inchembe abarungriir sungna icheep ing athinjaehpa.
Jesu inche losing nakho, hakchaang nakho, Thangnang vokhehkho mee ae ajaarnache hungruung sehsehsa.

Tiberius Kesar ing hungpaar kumsuum ariirunga ahenpha raenche, Pontius Pilaat ing Judia paamna lipah aapuh ing ong, amanche Herot ing Galili na iruwng vika lipah apuh, vokhehkho anaepa Philip ing Ituria re Trakonitis paam iruwng ivi, Lisanias ing Abileni ae iruwng vika ipaar,
amanche Annas re Kaiphas ae ing aanchung jaethiim ivi ae. Apha changlaenche paamfhuw nache Sakharia asapa Johon ningna Thangnang ynthiing chongchu thengsa;
ama ing isii tanii ikarnii khaena, vokhehkho barungriir huungnii khaena baptais turuw ichii chongchu Jordan chifhuw kuurna ong mee chaap nache atongpa.
Jaephar Isaia thiimbuwr na ynziih vasah omna:
“Paamfhuw nache iruur yngkheh ing uungka ariirnah:
Nenuw ing Aafhuw khaena lamchu seemruw,
ama asinii khaenache lamchu manchiimruw.
Iphae chaapchu vemansip vaata,
Lamthing bung, isiing, iruung chaap vakhae manphae vaata,
vokhehkho lam yngkuwr chaap vakhae manchiim vaata,
amanche ynchung iphae lam chaap vakhae korpeh vaata;
vokhehkho mee vakhae inche Thangnang manlaenpeehchu muvaatae.”
Nenuw ithar barungriir nenreennii ing turuw, kenuw Abraham kendeensa tanuwna nenbarungriir sungna mandenjaeh mahruw; akhaechuve Thangnang ing rung inempak vaange Abraham siti ahenbasuw chehsa.
Ataraen rapkho thing vakhae rajungna rii ynlorka omna; chukhaenache aanla isamah thing chaapchu ynfhuwr naka mi sungting ynrenvaata.”
Mee aenche aningna ensii, “Changvaniive kenuw ing ynchii tuva kenchiiva?”
Ama ing eningna abasang, “Rungop asae ynniimeh adeen inche adeen sahmah ae ningnache yngkheh pirasiing; amanche thaemin adeen inche adeenmah aechu pirasiing.”
Amana eningna ariir, “Iripham isuwhchak nakhe manthimahruw.”

Laarchang mee aenchenkho aningna ensiipa, “Kenuw incha ynchii tuva kenchiiva? Ama ing eningna abasang, nenuw achuw yngkheh peehchae tikho siihnuwna rimahruw, achuw ningnakho ichummah miraar pimahruw, amanche nenruthamen nenpha nakhe pensaruw.”
Mee aenche en aeka enriir, havi Johon va changmahka Khrista chupentah ta aeka mee vakhae ing embarungriir sungna emandenrae,

Johon ing eningna abasang, “Ki ing nenuwchu chii thoh baptais kaman-tunahchuw; changvakonchu kachungna athiseh ing ipirsehchu jungthengna, ama akheerkhaang aruwnoh rapkho ynjoh matik chasamah ing; ama ing nenuwchu ynthiing laetha re mi thohche baptais imantuvaata.
Ama ing aruwvuw minchu isa ing manthiingpeh naka saangchu aatomting athinnii ing sisah akiklina omna; changvakonchu arasii chaap chuve ithiimahdeh mi sungtingche bathuvaata.”
Chukhaenache jinge ichii ing mee ae ningnache emanghuwnii khaena isa chongchu amanchuwpeeh ae.
Changvakonchu Herot iruwng ing anaepa rumee Herodias taklina isamah nong atuchaap khaena Johon ing aachah ae nache aanvae tahnache,
Herot ing Johon taklina abarung sikka kaeshum nache akhumpa.
Atii mee vakhae ing baptais enturaenche Jesu ingkho baptais tuka athamsahrae thangbaen ymmongsa,
amanche ynthiing laetha inche khunu vaang ataklina jungchuksa, vokhehkho thangbaen tanii iruur yngkheh thengsa, “Nang i kaning namansiihpak kasapa vachii; naningna ki inempak pensakning.”
Jesu ing anong ahenturae atak kum somthum vakhae ahenpha. Jesu i mee ae inchembe Heli sapa Josep sitiva ichii ing emanden,
Heli inge Mathat sapava, Mathat inge Levi sapava, Levi inge Melki sapava, Melki inge Janna sapava, Janna inge Josep sapava,
Josep inge Matathia sapava, Matathia inge Amos sapava, Amos inge Nahum sapava, Nahum inge Esli sapava, Esli inge Nagai sapava,
Nagai inge Mat sapava, Mat inge Matathias sapava, Mathias inge semein sapava, semein inge Josep sapava, Josep inge Juda sapava,
Juda inge Juanan sapava, Juanan inge Resa sapava, Resa inge Zarubabel sapava, Zarubabel inge Seltijer sapava, Seltijer inge Neri sapava,
Neri inge Melki sapava, Melki inge Adi sapava, Adi inge Kosam sapava, Kosam inge Almadan sapava, Almadan inge Er sapava,
r inge Joshua sapava, Joshua inge Elijar sapava, Elijar inge Jorim sapava, Jorim inge Mathat sapava, Mathat inge Levi sapava,
Levi inge Simion sapava, Simion inge Juda sapava, Juda inge Josep sapava; Josep inge Jonam sapava, Jonam inge Alijakim sapava,
Alijakim inge Maleja sapava, Maleja inge Menna sapava, Menna inge Matatha sapava, Matatha inge Nathan sapava, Nathan inge Devit sapava,
Davit inge Jesse sapava, Jesse inge Obed sapava, Obed inge Boaz sapava, Boaz inge Salmon sapava, Salmon inge Nashon sapava,
Nashon inge Aminadat sapava, Aminadar inge Arni sapava, Arni inge Hebron sapava, Hebron inge Peres sapava, Peres inge Jihuda sapava,
Juda inge Jakop sapava, Jakop inge Ishak sapava, Ishak inge Abraham sapava, Abraham inge Terha sapava, Terha inge Nahor sapava,
Nahor inge serug sapava, Serug inge Reju sapava, Reju inge Peleg sapava, Peleg inge Eber sapava, Eber-inge Shela sapava,
Shela inge keinan Sapava, keinan inge Alpha sapava, Alpha Shem sapava, Shem inge Noah sapava, Noah inge Lemeks sapava,
Lemeks inge Methushela sapava, Mathusela inge Enok sapava, Eanok inge Jaret sapava, Jaret inge Mahalaleel sapava, Mahalaleel inge kenan sapava,
kenan inge Emos sapava, Amos inge Seth sapava, Seth inge Adam sapava, Adam inge Thangnang sapa chuva.
Jesu ynthiing laetha ing sipka Jordan tanii hungnganrisa, amana inii nisommanrii ipha ing lampana umlae ing batheemka akhaanglae laetha inche Jesu chu aruwpa,
apha ichiinache Jesu yntanga samahdeh, inii changjaehchu ahungchitheeh raenche ama aven hungchaamsa.
Amana umlae ing aningna ariir, “Nang Thangnang sapa vataniive, havana rung i tar uurla tanana nachong bathahra.”
Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Tar pang ing mee ringmah taka ynziihka omna.”
Havi aanuwna atakchu umlae ing ruwka laaruw paamna iruwngpaam vakhae amongpang tina amansiipa,
vokhehkho aningna ariir, “Hava vakhae aruwreng vokhehkho alaar isa aangkheng havi naningna pivakachii; hava vakhae i kaningna ymmansirpa, amanche ki ing kamanden ningnache havi pivakata.
Chukhaenache nang ing ki irum taniive, aangkhenglaang havi nata vaata.”
Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Havi ynziih vasahva, nang ing naafhuw Thangnang chu rumvanachiiva, vokhehkho ama pangchu rukuum tuva nachiiva.”
Athar vokheh atakchu Jerusalem ting ruwka rumniieen basuwrting mangkarka aningna ariir, “Nang Thang-nang sapa rem vataniive thangtingse jungkhuwngla;
akhaechuve ynziihka omna, ‘Nangchu ahaebachuw vachii ae Aafhuw ing nakhaena avaarmee aechu jenchiir vaata,’
vokhehkho nakhina rung ing nasuhniimah ing enuw engkik ing ihengahpeeh vaatae.”
Amana Jesu ing abasang, “Jinge ichii ing ariirsa amachuve, nang ing naafhuw Thangnang chu batheem mahva nachiiva.”
Jinge ichii ing abatheemchu hungchika, vokheh batheemnii aphachu aphamahri raentaang umlae ing Aafhuw chu abathenpa.
Jesu ing laetha ruwreng ajaar-nache Galili ting hunganrisa, vokhehkho ama paam sungna om khuw chaap nache Jesu athaminchu thangsa.
Amana Jesu ing meekongnii nache amanchuwpae vokhehkho mee vakhae ing amanpahsahpae.
Aanuwna Jesu ing aongnii Nazaret nache hungtungsa; vokhehkho enunu inuwzii ing Deennii inii nache meekongnii tingche varuwhsa. Ama ing ynthiing thiimbuwrchu ipaanii khaenache hangiirsa;
amana Isaia thiimbuwrchu aningting enjepeehpa, ama ing thiimziihchu phaenka hava chong i aanthinniichu atuwhpa,
“Aafhuw laethachu kataklina chuwngna,
yntuurpak sara naeriing ae ningna isa thamin itongpeehnii khaenache kataklina thou itaehpa.
Ynsuwr aeka ong aechu bathenpeehnii khaena amanche mikchu aenche athar imunii khaena,
ijachaam peehrik ing ong aechu ruwkuwrjoh pinii khaena,
vokhehkho Thangnang ing aru kumchu itongnii khaena kichu ynjenchiirpa.”
Jesu ing thiimbuwrchu aapanii ningtingche jepika ongsa; changlaenche meekongnii sungna ong mee vakhae aenche Jesu chu engenpa.
Amachu ama ing amutah nache eningna chong iriir abasenpa, “Atanii havana nensii ynthiing thiimziih i areer suwhsa achii.”
Chukhaenache enuw vakhae ing akhaenache isa ing chongsae, vokhehkho ama ing atong ningshiih thaminchu ensiitah nache inempak ngik aeka enriir, “Havi Josep sapa khamah vakhang?”

Amana eningna ama ing ariir, “Hava chongthram i nenuw ing kaningna ynthiir rudeh ing riirva nenta, amachuve ithiim nataksahchu yndamsara; kaparnaum na natu nari nong kenuw ing kensiichu nakhuwsah nenkho tura tavanenta.”
Vokhehkho ama ing ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, jaepharchu apaamsah mee aenche rupeehmahnii ae.”
