Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, “Elija aaniina kumthum tharuk sungna thangbaen ynthingka, laaruw paamna isah taangka inempak ijanii isuwh; changlae Isrel sungna muwkhuwnuw musara om ae.
Changkhang nare Elija chu eningting vechiirmah, changvakonchu Sidon paamna om Zerephat tanii muwkhuwnuw yngkheh ong aningna pangche ajechiir.
Amanche jaephar Elisha aanii nakho Isrel sungna ynchor riirae ing ina mee inempak om; amanche achuw kho dammah ae, changvakonchu Sairia tanii Naaman ichii pasar pangchu idam.”
Enuw ing amachu ensiitah nache, meekongniina ong vakhae aenche embarung siksa.
Amana enuw ing hangiir aeka Jesu chu khuwruung taangting basuw aeka amanche engkhuwruung enseemnii yngkhohpak bung tingche ruw aeka renkenta enchiipa.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing enkaar tanii hungsuwhka sisa.
Aanuwnache Jesu ing Galili khuw-ruung Kaparnaum ting jungruwhsa, amanche Deennii inii nache Jesu ing enuwchu amanchuw ae;
Ama ing ajeerpeeh ae chongchu enuw vakhae ing ensiitah nache inempak ngiksae, akhaechuve Jesu achongjeer chaapchu aatuaricheh om ing chongsa.
Changlaenche meekongnii sungnache mee yngkheh umlae ynthiingmah laetha ing ichuwng ong; ama mee inche engkaarna hangiirka uungsa,
Nazaret tanii Jesu, “Nangle kenuw ynchii ynsuwh muwkhang? Kenuwchu mamaangnii khaena itheng vachii? Nang achuw vachii ichii kamanghuw sachii, nang Thangnang tanii ynthiing chuvachii.”

Jesu ing ynthiingmah laethachu rukuhka ariir, “Nahuw mandae nana aningtanii hungsuwhra!” Amana umlae ing ichuwng meechu enrik chimbang nache bathiihka ahakchaang suhrudeh ing umlae inche taangting suwhsa.

Amatah nache mee vakhae aenche enruw riimka yngkheh ing yngkheh ningna ynriir ae, “Hava chong i ynchiiva? Aatuaricheh vokhehkho ruwreng thoh ynruw ing ama ing ynthiingmah laetha aechu chonghak apeehtahna enuw hungsuwhsae.”
Chutahnache ama paam aangkheng nache thangka ynseer chorsae.
Atii Jesu ing meekongnii tanii jungsuwhka Simon een ting varuwhsa. Changlae Simon ampuw chu ipirpak ing arii hethengsa; chukhaenache ama akhaena Jesu ningnache enriirpa.
Jesu ing abuumna vangiirka riithengchu arakuhtah nache vadamsa; amana hangiirka enuwchu rukuum atupeehpae.
Atii inii ajungtak nuwting reentaang reentaang ing ina mee vakhaechu Jesu ningting averuwpae; amana Jesu ing mee yngkhehkheh taklina akik siika enuwchu amandam-pae.

Changlaenche ynthiingmah umlae laetha aenche mee aanem tanii jungsuwh aeka enriir, “Nang i Thangnang sapa Khrista chuvachii!” Amana Jesu ing enuwchu rukuhka manchong mahsae, akhaechuve enuw ing Jesu i Khrista va ichii isajaeh ing emanghuwpa.

Khuwchu hungvaarka Jesu ing michuwr daereng minting sisa. Changvakonchu mee vakhae aenche Jesu una ongva ta aeka aongtahnii tingche vaksae, vokhehkho aajong aenche Jesu chu reentaang ting asiniimah khaena khaam kenta enchii;
changvakonchu ama ing eningna ariir, “Ki chuve Thangnang iruwngpaam isa chongchu reentaang reentaang khuwruung tingkho siningka tongva kachiiva; akhaechuve hava isa chong khaene kichu ynjenchiirva.”
Chukhaenache Jesu ing Judia ae meekongnii chaap nache isa thaminchu atongpa.
Changlaenche chiiding kuurna ruwkuwng asae ynniimeh omchu ama ing amupa; changvakonchu ngaklah mee aenche ruwkuwng tanii jung-chum aeka engachak enchaampa.
Ruwkuwng ynniimeh omnache Simon ruwkuwngchu vepuwhka aningnache taangtanii topoh vehuurla achii. Amana Jesu ing ruwkuwng nache ongka mee vakhae ae ningnache thaminchu atongpa.
Jesu ing ichong amanchinuwna Simon ningna ariir, “Nga nensuwrnii inche ruwkuwng vehuur nuwna chiirik ithuwh tingse nengachak vedeengruw.”
Changche taka avedeeng tahnache nga inempak engkhumpa; amana engachakchu ynsiih vachii ing omsa,

Chukhaenache engarang ensifhuw ae ruwkuwng sungna ong ae ningnache ibomnii khaena huungruw ta aeka engkik ing envejaappa. Amana enuwkho theng aeka, ruwkuwng ynniimeh nache ngachu enthintah nache sipka ruw-kuwngchu arup ynthongpa.
Amachu Simon Pitar ing amutah nache Jesu akhee derna jukiimka athamsahpa, “Aafhuw, ibathensara, ki isii icherpak mee ping.”
Akhaechuve enuw ing inempak nga ensuwr nache atak ynvae ing eng-kheng ingik ae;
amavaangche Simon aarang ae, Zebedee sapa ae, Jems vokhehkho Johon enuwkho ingik ae. Amana Jesu ing Simon ningna ariir, “Ynchik mahra, atanii basen naka nang i meesuwr ynsuwh vanata.”
Jesu achong aanuwnache enuw ing ruwkuwngchu taangting henga-dom aeka vokhehkho aangkheng bathenchir aeka aanuwchu enjiipa.
Jesu ing khuwruung yngkhehna aonglae ahakchaang ynchor pasar yngkheh inche Jesu chu amutah nache vakhupka aningna athamsah, “Aafhuw, namanden ynsuwh nave ki mandamcheh sachii achii.”
Jesu ing ataklina akik ing parka ariir, “Ki ing karupa; nang man-thiingla.” Aphachak nache ynchorchu vadamsa.

Amana Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Achuw ningnakho riirmah dehra taka chong atahpa; changvakonchu sinana nataksah ing jaethiim ningna mandangla, amanche atii nang ynthiing naphachu mee ae ningna saarkhii aomnii ing, Mosi chonghak inuwzii ing ipeehfhuwchu vapira.”
Changvakonchu Jesu khaena chongchu thang sehsehsa; amatah nache isiinii khaena vokhehkho idam phanii khaenache mee aenche aning tingche vaksae.
Changvakonchu ama ing paamfhuw ting sika athamsahpa.

Inii nikheh nache Jesu ing mee aechu amanchuw raenche Galili tanii vokhehkho Judia khuw tanii ae amanche Jerusalem tanii itheng ae Pharisi ae, vokhehkho thiimthang aenche abuumna ongsae; changlaenche Jesu chuve ina ae damnii Thangnang ruwrengchu aningna om.
Amana mee aenche ahakchaang ithiipoh ina yngkheh toraena vedom aeka een sungting vemanruwhnii khaena, vokhehkho Jesu maana isiihnii khaenache emanjongpa;
Changvakonchu mee nemlamthika envemanruwh chehmah tahnache, enuw ing phuchung ting hangkar aeka amana phuchungchu iseh aeka ina ajaarnii thohche abuum nache enjebabuwpa.
Jesu ing enthachachu amutah nache ina ningna ariir, “O pasarpa, nang ing isii icher nareen vakhae kakuhpeeh pachii.”
Changlae thiimthang aere Pharisi aeng chong isii basen aeka enriir, “Thangnang taklina ithipak ing ichong havi achuwva! Akhaechuve Thangnang mahnaka achuw ing isii kuhchehva takhang!”
Enuw embarungriirchu Jesu ing amanghuw tahnache eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing nenbarungriirna changche ichii ing ynchii khaena nemandenva?
Nataklina isii omchu kakuhpeeh pachii ichiire, ‘Hangiir nana sira ichii chong i ukha ingkhe ilaehakva’?

Mee Sapa inche laaruw paamna isii vakhae akuhcheh chirnii ruwreng omna ichii nenuw ing nemanghuwnii khaena mandang kata.” Chukhaenache ahakchaang ithiipoh ina ningnache ariir, “Ki ing naningna kariirnah, hangiir nana najaarniikha chira, amanche na eenting yngkaera.”
Aphachak nache ama ing ajaar-niichu jekika mee ae maekung nache hangiirsa amanche Thangnang chu manpahsaka a-eenting yngkaesa.

Havana ruwriimnii i enuw vakhae ing emutahna embarungriir aasumpa, chutahnache enuw ing Thangnang chu emanpahsahpa; vokhehkho enuw ing “Atanii inuw ing vokheh tangakho ymmumahri ymmupa ta aeka enriir.”
Havi aanuwdehna Jesu ing vasika ree khuumnii kaaroh nache ong Levi ichii ree ikhuum mee yngkhehchu muka aningna ariir, “Kaanuw ijiira.”
Ama ing anongtuchu bathenka Jesu anuwchu ajiipa.
Aanuwnache Levi ing Jesu khaena iruungpak ing thaemin thoraang tuka a-eenna maarsae, changlae itheng ree ikhuum ae, reentaang mee upa vakhaekho theng aeka ong ae.
Changlae enruwr tanii Pharisi aere thiimthang aenche Jesu asebok ae taklina chong enriir, “Ynchii khaena nenuw ing ree ikhuum aere isii icher aethoh imaarpoh vachuw?”
Jesu ing enuwchu abasang, “Hakchaang isa ae ningna chembe ithiim ikanii omah, changvakonchu ina ae khaena chembe ikaniina.
Ki ichum ynthiing mee aechu eennii khaena ijuwng mahping, changva-konchu isii icher aechu embarungriir huungnii khaenava.”
Enuw ing aningnache enriir, “Johon asebok aenche maaru tongchak aeka enthamsah chaknah, amanche Pharisi ae sebok ae ingkho changche entunah, changvakonchu nasebok ae inchembe ensah enginnah.”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Songpa ing rakhiiniina itheng ae thohche aong raenche enuwchu maaru mantongva taekhang?
Changvakonchu ening tanii songpachu jekivaang naka, enuw ing maaru tongva enchii iniichu thengpeh vaata.”

Jesu ing eningna ynghuwnii thamin havikho atong: “Achuw ingkho ithar peen arakheh inche baruw peenchu iberniimah; ibernii nave ithar peen anbernii chukho ynsiih vaata, amanche ithar peen arakheh inche baruw peenchu ibernii nave ynlehmahnii.

Achuw ingkho baruw shavin thuungfhuw nache ithar vomrip chii thinchakmah, thinnave ithar vomrip chii inche shavin thuungfhuwchu bakhii vaata; amanche achii chukho ynta vaata, vokhehkho athinnii shavin thuungfhuw chukho maangvaata.
Chukhaenache ithar shavin thuungfhuw nache ithar vomrip chiichu thinvaan chiiva.
Vokhehkho baruwchu in manuwve, itharchu achuw ingkho inningka tamah; akhaechuve baruw ing inempak chiihakna.”
Deennii inii nache Jesu ing ruwchimna avasi raenche asebok aenche sabarchu chim aeka engkik bajaana chiaeka ensahpa.
Chutah-nache Pharisi aenche enriir, “Deennii iniina vajeer chonghak ing arumah iser nong nenuw ing yngkhaena nentuva?”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Devit ing aanruwfhuw aethoh enven achaam-rae ynchii atu,

ama ing Thangnang eenna ynsaangkhe varuwhka, jaethiim ae mahnaka isah aruthang thaangmah tarchu ama ing rika asahva, changpang mahka ama ing aanruwfhuw ae chukho amansah ae ichii ynthiing thiimziihna ynthinchu nenuw pamahchuw?”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Mee Sapa inge Deennii Aafhuw va.”
Nikhehna Jesu ing Deennii inii nache meekongnii eenting varuwhka amanchuw ae, engkaar nache akik tachang baen ithiipoh mee yngkheh heong.
Amana thiimthang aere Pharisi aeng Jesu chu emanraarnii ijongnii khaena Deennii iniine ina mansakva tamo ta aeka manchuwm aeka engenjaehpa,
changvakonchu Jesu ing emandenchu amanghuwtah nache akik tachang baen ithiipoh ningnache ariir, “Hanene huungnana ngiirla.” Ama ing hangiirka ngiirsa.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “ki ing neningna chong yngkheh kasiinah-chuw, Deennii iniine isa iture isamah itu, amanche ringkum ikarpeeh re imaangchu vajeer chonghak ing ukha ingkhe ruvaate?”
Aanuwnache Jesu ing enuw vakhaechu enka ina ningnache ariir, “Nakik kha ithohra.” Akikchu aathohtah nache damsa.
Changvakonchu enuw embarung isii inche Jesu takline ynchiikha itu ing isava ta aeka yngkheh yngkheh ynsiisae.
Changlaenche Jesu ing bungting ithamsah sisa; amana jaenpumche Thangnang ting athamsahpa.
Amana khuw ahungvaar thoh Jesu ing asebok aechu eenka engkaar nache mee suum ariinii aateerpa, vokhehkho enuwchu chongthang ae taka ruming akhiingpa;
enuw enruming chuve, Pitar kho enchii Simon, ama anaepa Andriu, Jakop, Johon, Philip, Bartholomiu,
amanche Methiu, Thomas, Arphius asapa Jakop, amanche Zilot enchii Simon,
amanche Jakop sapa Judas, vokhehkho mee irensah hunginsuwh Iskariot Judas, enuw ae iva.

Jesu ing achongthang ae thohche bung tanii jungchumka idaam nache ngiirsa. Amanache asebok ae inempak aethoh vokhehkho Judia paam taniichaap, Jerusalem tanii, amanche Taire re Sidon chifhuw laartanii, Jesu thaminchu isiinii khaena vokhehkho ina vakhaechu mandamnii khaenache mee inempak vathengsae;
amanche ynthiingmah laetha ing entaklina ijachaam apeeh vakhae chukho theng aeka amandampeeh chirpae.
Chukhaenache mee inempak aenche atakchu iparnii khaena enjongpa, akhaechuve aningtanii ruwrengchu hungsuwhka mee aechu amandampa.
Amana Jesu ing asebok aechu enka ariir:
“Sara ae nenuw bor nenphava;
Thangnang iruwngpaamchu nentavaata!
Atarae venchaam chiilaar nenpha ae nenuw bor nenphava;
nenuw bavava nenta!
“Atarae bakhik chuwka ichapchu nenuw bor nenphava;
nenuw maniiva nenta!
Changchii inii nache nen-rotha manrohruw, vokhehkho ynthoh nuwna nungaeruw, thangbaenna nenphafhuw nongmen iruungpak omna; ajaenkho jinge ichii ing empa aenche jaephar ae taklina entuva.
“Chukhaenache savang ae neningna chembe ijaniisapa;
akhaechuve aaniing omah nungaechu nenphapa!
“Atarae nenven ynva ae neningna chembe ijaniisapa;
akhaechuve nenuw venchaam ing itheh vaata!
“Atarae nemanii inja neningna chembe aajaehmeh ijaaniivaate;
akhaechuve nenuw ichap ichuw phava nenta!
“Nentaklina mee vakhae ing isapak ing ichong ae nengkhaena ijaniisapa, akhaechuve empa aenche ichummah jaephar ae ningnache entu vasahva.
“Kachong aasii neningna kariir-nah: Eejeehnii mee aechu nening mansiih aeruw; nenuwchu ymbatir mee ae taklinache isachu turuw,
Nentaklina siraap ympi aechu bor piaeruw, amanche nenuwchu ynjuum mee ae khaenache thampeeh aeruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing naabeengna eebeeng nave, paangkheh tingkho dura; amanche napeen ari mee inche narungop kho rinave khaammahra.
Naningna ynniih vakhae ningnache pira; vokhehkho napeeh nachae ari meechu athar nang ing siingmahra.
Nentaklina mee ing tunaka nenchii nemandenchu, nenuw ingkho ening-nache turuw.
“Nenuwchu aning ymmansiih taklina chenpang nenuw ingkho nening mansiih tanuwcha ynchii isuur-sahnii omkhang! Isii icher mee aerap ingkho enuwchu ening emansiih mee ae chupang ening emansiihnah ae.
Amanche neningna isa yntupeeh ae ningna nenuw ingkho isachu tupeeh ae tanuwve, neningna ynchii ympahfhuw omkhang! Akhaechuve isii icher aengkho changche entunah.
Amanche nenuw ing phava kenta ichii ing nemanden mee ae ningnache piae tanuwcha ynchii ympahfhuw omkhang! Isii icher mee aengkho athar iphanii khaenache isii icher ae ningna empinah.

Changvakonchu eejeehnii mee aechu nening mansiihruw amanche isa chukho tupeeh aeruw, vokhehkho nenbarungriir sungna fhuwm ynvaerudeh in athar phareehva kata ichii mandenru ing mamfhuwh aeruw, amanche nenongmen inempak ruungvaata, amanche nenuw ing aanchungseh sitichu ynsuwhva nenta; akhaechuve mee ing atupeeh amang-huwmah mee ae, vokhehkho isamah mee ae taklinakho Aafhuw ingkho aning amansiihnah.
Nenuw vakhae nenpa ing ningchuwh omvaang, nenuwkho ningchuwhchu omruw.

“Mee ae taklina vajeer tumahruw amanche nentakli nakho vajeer itumahnii; mee ae taklina manraar mahruw amanache Thangnang ingkho nening nache imanraar mahnii; kuhpeehruw amanche nenuw chukho ikuhpeeh vaata;

piruw, amanche nening nakho ipivaata. Isapak achaang inae ing namnaka, inuk naka, ynriimjor inche nengkikna nenchicheh vakhae ipivaata. Nenuw ing nenguur inuwzii inche neningna athar Thangnang ing uurvaata.”
Sebok ing aanchuwmee chungna ynchungseh mahva, machang ing atam mee vakhae inche aanchuwmee vaang hungtavaata.
“Chukhaenache namikna ibuwr omcha kharmah chiika, nauw nanae mikna ibuwr omchu ynchii khaena nabuwrva?

Nataksah mik narap thing yngkhangka omchu muruchii ing, ynchii khaena nauw nanae mikna ibuwr omchu ripeeh kachii nachiichehva? Isachaang itu nang amaensana namikna om thing yng-khangkha rijapla, aanuw nache nauw nanae mikna ibuwr omchu ynthiingkiir ing mupeh vaanta.
“Isa thingbur inche isamah ing ynlamah, vokhehkho isamah thingbur inche isa ing ynla chehmah;
amachuve thing vakhaechu aanla inuwzii ing ymmanghuw chehsa. Mee ing utaraenkho iringbur nache thachang iriih mahchak, vokhehkho iringbur nache vomrip aanla iriih mahchak.
Isa mee inche abarungriir tanii isachu amandangnah amanche isamah mee inche abarungriir tanii isamahchu ahemandangnah; akhaechuve abarungriir sungna ynthin inuwzii inche hangchongna.
“Neningna kariir chucha turuchuw ing ynchii khaena nenuw ing Aafhuw, Aafhuw, tachuwka yngeen vachuw?
Kaningna itheng chaap ing kachong vakhaechu siika nong ing atu mee chaapchu ynsaangkhe tane ichiichu neningna mandang kata:

Ama mee chuve eenphamburchu ithuwhpak ing chuwka rung taklina een amangiir mee yngkheh thohche aanghakna; amana eenchu chii iriim inche ajensuktah nache manlaapcheh mahsa, akhaechuve ama ing rung taklina amangiirpa.

Changvakonchu isiicha siika atumah mee chuve, eenphambur ichah ing ruwruw taklina een amangiir thohche aanghakna; chukhaenache chii iriim inche ajensuktah nache eenchu kiichirsa, amanche anikung narapche tiihsa vokhehkho eenchu amasak ithipak ing maangsa.”
Jesu ing mee vakhae inche ensiinii ing chong ariir amanchinuwting Kaparnaum tingche sisa.
Amanache laarchang chaama aapuh ameenae yngkhehchu thikvachii ing henaksa. Atak i aafhuwchu iruwpak ing atusah meeva.
Laarchang chaama aapuh inche Jesu thengna ichii asiitah nache, ameenae inachu yndampeehnii khaena avakpeeh rasii tanuwna variirruw taka Jehudi upa aechu Jesu ningting avechiirpa.
Enuw ing Jesu ningting vak aeka aningna enriir, “Hava mee i nang ing bomva nachii matik chaana,
ama ing kenjaati inempak aning amansiihva vokhehkho meekongnii eenkho yntupeehva ta aeka Jesu ningna ipirpak ing enthamsahpa.”

Chukhaenache Jesu ing enuw thohche vak haksae. Amana Jesu ing vephavachii aasen avaehmah rirae, laarchang chaama aapuh inche aarang ae vechiirka Jesu ningna chong amanriirpae, “Aafhuw, ijahoh peehmah tahra, nang ing ka-eenna varuwhva nachii ki yntuursapakning;
chukhaenache katak rapkho Aafhuw naningting vakva kachii matik ichasah mahping ta ingka kamandensahva. Changvakonchu nachonghak pangchu ipipeeh sara, vokhehkho kameenaechu idam phasarasii.

Kikho aatuaricheh yngkheh derna ong meeping, kaderna laarchang mee inempak omnae: Ki ing yngkheh ningnache sira kachiitahna sina; amanche reentaang yngkheh ningnache huungla kachiitahna huungna; vokhehkho kameenae ningna-che amakha tura kachii atunah.”

Jesu ing ama chongchu asiitah nache inempak ngikka aanuwzii mee ae ningtingche vaanlehka ariir, “Ki ing neningna kariirnah, Isrel vakhae kaarna atanii ipha ing jinge ichii atha-cha om mee yntuwhfhuw mahri ing.”
Amana avechiir mee aechu eenting enghunganritah nache, meenae inachu hedamsa.
Apha topoh aanuwting Jesu ing Najin ichii khuwruung ting vasisa, amana asebok aere, mee inempak ae thohche sipohsae.

Ama ing khuwruung suwngkung avephapha nache ithii mee envedompa, atak i amnuw ing yngkhehpang abaringsah sapava, amanche amnuw chukho muwkhuwnuwva; amana khuwruung tanii mee inempak inche amnuwchu engaanruwfhuw.
Changlae Jesu ing amnuwchu amutahna aningchu mansiihka aningna ariir, “Nang chap-mahra.”
Amana Jesu ing envedomnii toraechu avepartah nache aandom mee aechu ngiirsae. Aphanache Jesu ing ariir, “Achiihpa iler, naningna hangsuwra ta ingka kariirnah.”
Changlaenche ithii inche hangsuwka ongsa, vokhehkho ichongkho abasenpa. Amana Jesu ing amnuw ningting amansirpa.
Amatah nache mee aechu eningdim ing ynchikpoh aeka vokhehkho enuw ing Thangnang chu manpah aeka enriir, “Iruungpak jaephar yngkaarna hungsuwhsa, vokhehkho Thangnang ing amee aechu aveersahpa!”
Jesu ing havana nong i atu khaena Judia paam vokhehkho akuurna ongchaap vakhae mee aenche ynseer aeka ynjarsa.
Johon asebok aenche havana chong vakhae i siiaeka aningna aman-thangpae.
Chukhaenache Johon ing asebok meeniimeh aechu eenka Aafhuw ningting vechiirka ariir, “Ijungtheng Aafhuw chu nangvachii, changmahka reentaang itheng kenuw ing hahva kenchii omne vataruw?”

Enuw inche Jesu ningnache theng aeka enriirpa, baptais eetupeeh Johon ing kenuwchu naningne avechiirka jinge ichii ing siiruw achiinah, “Ijungtheng Aafhuw chuvachii, chang-mahka reentaang yngkheh hahva kenchiiva?”
Apha ichiinache Jesu ing ina chaap ae, isamah riirae ing ina ae vokhehkho ynthiingmah laetha ing ichuwng ae vakhaechu amandampae amanche mikchu vakhae chukho amandampae.

Amana Aafhuw ing eningna abasang, “Nenuw ing nensii vokhehkho nemu chaap vakhae i Johon ningna hungriirruw; mikchu aeng imu emphasahpa, engana iseeh aeng ensii-chehpa. Amanche khibong aenche isi enchehpa, ynchor aenche ynthiing emphasahpa, ithii ae chukho hangring emphapa, amanche havana isa chong katong chaap ikho sara naeriing aengkho ensiisahpa.
Chukhaenache kataklina fhuwm ynvaemah meechu bor aphava.”

Johon achongjeer aenche engaang-kae nuwna, Jesu ing Johon khaena mee changjaeh inem kaarnache thamin itong abasenpa: “Nenuw ing paamfhuw ne ynchiikha iva en ivasi vachuw? Sii iraang ing amanlaap thingdii chuva?
Vokhehkho nenuw ing ynchiikha munung tachuwka ivasivachuw? Peen ynnaarjaeh anii mee yngkheh chuva? Enruw, inempak ivaar ing ynthong inungaepak ing ipaar enuw ae chuve iruwng ae ongnii nache ongnae.
Chukhaenache nenuw ynchii enkenta tachuwka ivasi vachuw? Thangnang jaepharchu nenva enva? Ichum chuve chumna, ki ing neningna kariirnah, atak chuve Thangnang jaephar athiseh ing manchungsehna.
Haviva ama akhaena ynziihka omchu enruw, ki ing kachongjeer meechu nemaana kachiirsa, ama ing nengkhaena lamchu heseem vaata.
Ki ing neningna kajeernah, rupanuw aeng embaring vakhae kaarna Johon aathi achuwkho omah; changvakonchu Thangnang iruwngpaamna aasiingseh inche Johon chungna ruunghakna.”
Changvakonchu Pharisi aere thiimthang aenche aningna baptais itu rumah aeka entaksah ing Thangnang ing amandenchu rimahsae.
“Ataraennii suwnthar ne ipaar mee ae i ynsaangkhe ichiipae vokhehkho ynchiithoh aanghakpae taningka man-dang kate?

Enuw chuve kithiirna ong naepang aethoh aanghaknae. Enuw ing yngkheh yngkheh yngeen aeka enriirnah, ‘Kenuw ing nengkhaena baasi kentumnah changvakonchu nenuw ing laammahchuw! Kenuw ing kenchaprae chapmahchuw.’
Akhaechuve Baptis Johon tarkho asahmah amanche vomrip chiikho ainmah thengsa, amanche nenuw ing atakchu ynthiingmah laetha areensa tachuwka nenriirpa.
Mee Sapa inche jungthengka asahpa vokhehkho ainpa, amachu vokheh nenuw ing apeehbuwr iruung juw ain vokhehkho ree ikhuum mee aethoh, amanche isii icher mee aethoh ynchaarna tachuwka nenriir nahreeh!
Thangnang losingchu ama asiti aenche aangkhenglaang chumna ta aeka emandangpa.”
Pharisi yngkheh ing Jesu thohche imaarpohnii khaena a-eenpa, chukhae-nache Jesu ing Pharisi een tingche varuwhka ongsa.
Amana enruw, ama khuwruung nache isii icher rupanuw yngkheh inche Pharisi een sungnache Jesu ongna ichii asiitah nache rupanuw inche yntaehfhuw barim isa richiithou buwrchu vechika,
vokhehkho atuknungna vangiirka chapsa, amanche amik richii ynta inche Aafhuw khichu manomka asam inche aanuwrpa vokhehkho akhichu tumka richiithou inche aataehpa.
Jesu chu a-eenpa Pharisi inche amachu amutah nache abarungriirna mandenka ariir, “Hava mee i ynchii rupanuwva ichii manghuwva chiiva, akhaechuve rupanuw havi isii icher meeva.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Simon, ki ing naningna kariirfhuw yngkheh omna.” Ama ing abasang, “Oja, ynchiiva iriirpeehra.”
Achuw mee yngkheh seer mee amanfhuwhchak ningnache seer afhuwh ae om. Yngkheh inche chanii songa amanche yngkheh inche somnii ariirunga entuurpa.
Enuw meenii inche ensingfhuw endeenmah tahnache akuhpeehpae. Chukhaenache enuw meeniimeh ne achuw ingkhe athiseh ing aning mansiihhak vaate?
Simon ing abasang, “Ki ing kamanden chuve inemhak ing atuur meechu vaata.” Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Nang ichum ing vajeer natupa.”

Aanuwnache rupanuw ningtingche vaanlehka Simon ningna ariir, “Nang ing rupanuw havi namuse? Na-een sungting varuwhsing, nang ing kakhi chaamnii chii ipimahchii, changva-konchu rupanuw havi inge amik richii ing kakhi manomka asam ing aanuwrpa.
Nang ing kaabeeng tummahchii, changvakonchu kavaruwh chakthoh basenka kakhi atumchu manchenmah,
changpangmahka karusaena richiithou itaehmahchii, changvakonchu ama inchembe kakhina richiithou aataehpa.

Chukhaenache naningna kariirnah, ama ing isii arangchaap vakhae kakuhpeeh chirpa, akhaechuve inempak aning ymman-siihpa; changvakonchu topoh pangti ikuhpeeh apha inche topoh pangti aning amansiihnah.”
Chukhaenache Jesu ing rupanuw ningnache ariir, “Nataklina isii icher chaap vakhae kakuhpeehchir pachii.”
Changlae Jesu thoh imaarniina onghak aenche yngkheh ing yngkheh ningna ynriirsae, “Isii chukho akuh-cheh havi achuwva?”
Jesu ing rupanuw ningnache ariir, “Nathacha inche yngkarsahpa, idaejaeh ing yngkaera.”
Havi aanuwna Jesu ing khuw-ruung khuwruung ting, vokhehkho khuw khuw ting sika Thangnang iruwngpaam isa chongchu tongka vokhehkho manchuw aeka asiraenche asebok suum ariiniiae,
amanche isamah laetha ing ichuwng vokhehkho ina amandam rupanuw ae chukho Jesu thohche ynruwhakpoh ae: Enuw chuve, ynthiingmah laetha sarii-meh ing ichuwng athurpeeh Meri Magadalen,
amanche Herot rukuum atu Kuza rumee Johanna, Susanna amanche aanem chuve reentaang tanii rupanuw ynvae ae; enuw vakhae aenge endeensah lerchii ing Jesu nongna abomsah ae.
Jesu ningnache khuwruung chaap tanii theng aeka mee inempak engaang-kong tahnache, Jesu ing ynghuwnii thamin ing ichong,
Sachii amuw vorvachii mee yngkheh inche amuwchu ivornii khaena hungsuwhsa; ama ing amuwchu avortah nache lamfhuw kuurna bukka mee aenche engkhi ing enchaniipa, vokhehkho vaati aengkho ensahpa.
Amanche areh inche rung kaarna bukka ahangmuwng tahnache chongsa, akhaechuve ruwruwchu isa vaehsa.
Amana areh inche iring kaarna bukka imuwngcha hangmuwngka iring inche ibuumka ihangmuwng chehmahsa.
Changvakonchu areh chuve ruwruw isana bukka hangmuwngsa, vokhehkho asae chaama athi ing ynlasa. Hava vakhae i ariirnuwna Jesu ing uungka ariir, “Achuw yngkheh aana ipaar chaap inche siisa rasiing.”
Jesu asebok aenche aningna ensii, “Havana ynghuwnii thamin i ynchii nariirniiva?

Jesu ing basang aeka ariir, ‘Thangnang iruwngpaam ithuwhpak chongchu neningna kapeeh-vachuw; changvakonchu reentaang mee ae ningna chembe ynghuwnii thamin vatah, chutahnache enuw ing emubrohna emuniimah ing amanche siikhang ae nare emanghuwniimah ing katongva.’ ”
Atii haviva ynghuwnii thaminchu: Sachii amuw inche Thangnang chong chuva.
Lamfhuw kuurna ibuw ae chuve chong asii mee ae chuva; amachu aanuwna umlae ing vathengka enthacha niimah ing vo-khehkho ikarpeeh emphaniimah inche embarungriir sungtanii chongchu avaripa.
Rung taklina ibuw ae chuve, chongchu sii aeka rotharohpak ing engaraangpa, changvakonchu arajung apaechehmah tahnache apha topohpang tina thacha aeka batheem atheng raenche tiihsae.
Iring kaarna ibuw ae chuve, enuw ing siiaeka enring kumpumna hungpaarniiva enchii emanden, vokhehkho laaruw paam rotharoh kuurva inche cheh aeka engaanla changcheh mahsa.
Amana laruw isana ibuw ae chuve, chongchu siiaeka isapak barungriir thohche icheepther ing bachuw aeka aanlamahri raentaang abadaarcheh chupae.
Akhaechuve yndangrudeh ing ynthuurcheh vachii ynchiikho omah, vokhehkho manghuwru ing ynthuur naka yndangmah vachii yntangakho omah.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing ynsaangkhe nensiise tanuwna ynriimsaruw; adeen taklinache jepivakata, amanche adeenmah taklinache topoh kadeensa taka amanden sahrap chukho ripeehva kata.”
Havi aanuwna Jesu amnuw re anae aenche Jesu ningna vaksae, meechu anempak tahnache Jesu thohche yntuwh chehmahsae.
Mee yngkheh inche aningna nangnuw re nanae ae ing taangna ngiir aeka nangchu yntuwhfhuw nungka ynchiinah ae taka ariirpa.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Thangnang chongchu siinaka anong ing atu mee aechu ki kanuw chupae vokhehkho kanae chupae.”

Inii nikhehna Jesu ing asebok ae thohche ruwkuwngna hangong aeka ama ing eningnache ariir, “Inuw ing chiiding veraen manuwka reentaang yngkheh minting sitaruw taka ariirtah nache, enuw ing ruw-kuwngchu enghuurpa,
amana enuw ing changche envasiraenche Jesu jaardohsa. Changlaenche chiiding nache khuksuwr siiraang vetuka chiichu ynnohsa, vokhehkho chiichu ruwkuwng nache varuwhka phir isiipak inche omsae.

Amatah nache enuw ing Jesu ningting huung aeka Aafhuw, Aafhuw, inuw thiklo ynchiinah! ta aeka enriirpa. Amana Jesu ing hangsuwka khuksuwr siiraang vokhehkho chii ynnohchu arakuhtah nache aaniimeh inche daerengsae.

Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, ‘Ne-nuw nenthacha chucha ukhava chang?’ Enuw ynchikkho ynchiksae, ingikkho ngiksae. Chukhaenache enuw ing yngkheh yngkheh chong aeka enriir, ‘Siiraang re chii aengkho chonghak apeehtahna emanjii Aafhuw havi achuwva.’ ”
Aanuwnache Galili thoh laar yndeeng Gerasani paam nache vatungsae.

Amana Jesu ing avasitah nache ataklina ynthiingmah umlae ing ichuwng mee yngkheh khuwruung tanii hungsuwhka Jesu thohche yntuwhsae; amamee i apha iseehpak ing peendiir niiru ing vokhehkho een nakho ongru ing thaenkungna ongva.

Chukhaenache ama ing Jesu avemutah nache va-uungka Jesu maanache vakhupka ipirpak ing ariir, athi omah Thangnang Sapa! “Nang ing kaningna ynchii tuningka nachiiva? Ki ing kathamsahnahchii, imanja samahra.”

Havi ariir i ataklina ichuwng ynthiingmah umlae laethachu taangting asuwhnii khaena chonghak apeehtah nava. (Akhaechuve ynthiingmah umlae laetha inche atak i apha vakhaena asuwrva; vokhehkho mee aenche atakchu cheer aeka siir runoh ing phuwrkhang ae nakho amanche siir hang ing charkhang ae nakho ipehchir chakka ynthiingmah umlae laetha inche lampa kaarting aruwchakva.)
Amana Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Naruming achuwva?” Karuming chuve inempak taka abasang. Akhaechuve ynthiingmah umlae laetha aenche ataklina chuwngsae.
Changlaenche ynthiingmah umlae laetha aenche Jesu ningna kenuw i idong naemah kuurdong tingche isinii khaena chonghak ipisamahra ta aeka enthamsahpa.
Changlaenche bungna voh inempak imaar ae; amana umlae aenche engkaar tingche ibathensara ta aeka enthamsah tahnache Jesu ing arupa.
Changlaenche umlae aenche hungsuwh aeka voh ae kaartingche ruwhsae, amana voh aenche bung tanii jungtaen aeka chiiding ithuwh tingche ruwhchirsae.
Amachu voh aacheer aenche emutah nache, khuwruung vokhehkho khuw sungting hungtaen aeka enriirpa.

Amana changche isuwhchu mee aenche enva enpa, vokheh-kho Jesu abuum ipha ing vaksae. Changlaenche ynthiingmah umlae laetha aeng aningtanii isuwh mee inche peendiir niika abarungriir ichum inche Jesu buumna heong emutah nache ynchiksae.
Chukhaenache ynthiingmah umlae laetha ichuwng pasar havi ynsaangkhe taka idamva ichiichu aamuw mee aenche eningna entongpa.
Changlaenche Geraseni khuw akuur apaangna ongchaap mee vakhae ing yngkaenii khaena Jesu ningna enthamsahpa; akhaechuve enuw inempak ngiksae. Amatah nache Jesu ing ruwkuwngchu ongniika ynrisa.
Aningtanii umlae ae isuwh mee inche Jesu naanuw jiisa kata taka athamsahpa; changvakonchu rumahka aningna ariir,

“Na-eenting ynrinana Thangnang ing nataklina ynchii atuva ichiichu tongla.” Chutahnache ama ing khuwruung apaam lija aangkhengna sika Jesu ing akhaena aajaehmeh iruungpak nong atupeehva ichiichu atongpa.
Atii Jesu ing ahunganritah nache mee inempak inche rotharoh ing enghebariimpa; akhaechuve mee vakhae ing Jesu alam enghengen.
Changlaen siimche Jairus ichii pasar yngkheh vathengsa, atakchuve meekongnii sungna vajeer ituna aafhuw yngkhehva; ama inche Jesu chu rumka a-eenting ivakpeehnii khaena athamsahpa;
akhaechuve asanuw kumsuum ariinii ahenpha yngkheh pangchu thik ynthongsa. Jesu ing avasitah nache mee inempak aenche engaburpohpa.
Ama kaarnache kumsuum ariinii chak sii ynta ing ina rupanuw achuw ingkho amandam chehmah inche
Jesu tuknungna vakka apeen basuwrna avaparcheh tahnache sii yntachu daesa.
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Ki ymparchu achuwva?” Mee aenche achuw ingkho iparmah enchiitah nache, Pitar ing ariir, “Aafhuw, mee hangjaeh inge eeburpoh tahna vasiingta!”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing ariir, “Mee yngkheh ing ki ymparsa; akhae-chuve kataklina ruwreng omchu sina ichii ki ing kamanghuwsa.”

Amana rupanuw inche ynthuurcheh mahsing ichii amanghuw tahnache ynchiimpak ing vakka amana Jesu maanache vakhupsaka ynchii khaena Jesu aparva vokhehkho ahakchaang inachu ynsaangkhe idamva ichii vakhaechu mee vakhae kaarnache ariirpa.
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Kasanuw, nang nathacha inche idam naphasahpa; idaejaeh ing yngkaera.”
Jesu ing changche ichii ing achong raenche vajeernii een aapuh yngkheh ing thengka nang nasanuw kha thiksa; chukhaenache Jesu kha manjamahra taka Jairus ningna avariirpa.
Jesu ing ama chongchu asiitah nache Jairus ningna ariir, “Nang ynchik mahra, thacha jaehtahra, ama hangring jaehvachii vatah.”
Amana Jesu ing eensung tingche avaruwh raenche Pitar re Johon amanche Jakop vokheh-kho naepang ampa amnuw mahnaka achuwkho ivemanruwh rumahsa.
Changlaenche rupanuwti khaenache mee inempak chapsae; changvakonchu ama ing ariir, “Nenuw chapmahruw; rupanuwti havi ithii mahva, ama ijaar vatah.”
Enuw ing Jesu chongchu ensii-tahna emaniisahpa, amachuve enuw ing thiksa ichiichu emanghuwpa.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing akikna jebachuwka hangsuwra kasiti taka a-eenpa.
Amana alaethachu hungan-risa vokhehkho vat hangsuwsa; changlaenche Jesu ing isahfhuw thaemin piruw taka chong ajeerpa.
Amana ampa re amnuw inche inempak ngiksae; changvakonchu Jesu ing havana isuwh nong i mee ningna riirmah dehruw taka ajeerpa.
Jesu ing sebok suum ariinii aechu eenka amanche eningnache umlae ae thurnii vokhehkho laena aajaehchu amandamnii ruwreng re aatuarichehnii apeehpae,
vokhehkho Thangnang iruwngpaam chukho itongnii khaena amanche ina aechu yndampeehnii khaena achiirpae.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir chuve, “Lamkhii khaena rumor, thuungfhuw, isahfhuw tar, seer yntanga reenmahruw, amanche rungopkho ynnii yngkhii ing reenmahruw.
Nenuw ing nenvatung niitah een nache ongnuwna amanache basen nuwna siruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing nenuwchu ihebariimmah ae nave ama khuwruungchu nenuw ing bathenruw, amanche nemah phana nenrumahchu asaarkhii omnii khaena suwngkung nache nengkhina ikah pirkhuwhchu rukhuungruw.”
Aanuw nache enuw ing siaeka aphamsiirna isa thaminchu tong aeka vokhehkho khuw khuwna ruwh aeka amanche ina mee aechu amandampae.
Mee topoh aenche Elija va ta aeka enriirpa, amanche achuw yngkheh aenche tunanii Thangnang jaephar ae kaartanii yngkheh hangringva enchii.
Changvakonchu Herot ing ki ing Johon rusae katenpa; changvakonchu ki ing kasii mee havi achuw vaate taka ariir.
Atii chongthang aechu hungkae aeka, enuw ing envatu nongchaap Jesu ningna entongpa. Aanuwnache Jesu ing enuwchu ruwka Betsaida ichii khuwruung tingche asifhuwpae.

Amachu mee vakhae ing ensiitah nache Jesu aanuwchu enjiipa; amana Jesu ing enuw vakhaechu abariim-sahpae, vokhehkho ama ing Thangnang iruwngpaam khaena thamin atongpa, amanche ina mee aeng damsa nungka enchii vakhaechu amandampa.

Inii ajungtak phanache chong-thang suum ariinii aenche Jesu ningting huung aeka enriir, “Havana mee hangjaeh inem ae i akuurpaangna om khuw, vokhehkho yndah khuwting itungnii amanche isahnii innii khaena enuw ae i bathentah aera; akhaechuve inuw pambingna ongsamuw.”

Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing isahfhuw piaeruw.” Enuw ing embasang, kenuw ing sinungka mee hangjaeh inem khaene thaeminchu vaariimah nungve ke-ningna om chuve tar runga re nga ynniipang imah naka reentaang omah.
Akhaechuve enuw mee lising runga chak empha. Amana Jesu ing achongthang ae ningnache ariir, “Mee ae i aruwr songa songa ing mangong aeruw.”
Jesu ing ariir inuwzii inche enuw ing mee aechu emangongpa.
Amana Jesu ing tar runga re nga asae ynniimehchu verika thangbaen ting hengenka bor apeehpa, vokhehkho bakhiika mee changjaeh inem ae ningnache semruw taka achongthang ae ningting ajepeehpa.
Enuw vakhae inche sa aeka enven bavasa; amana chongthang aenche ynriichu engkhuum tahnache buruk suum ariinii bariisa.
Nikheh nache Jesu ing anumpang ing athamsahrae achongthang aekho aanruwfhuw. Amana Jesu ing eningna chong asii ae, “Mee ae ing ki i achuwva ynchiinah ae?”
Jesu ing eningna achuw tanga ningnakho riirmahruw taka ipirpak chonghak jeerka havi ariir,

“Mee Sapa inche ijachaam aajaeh phavaata, amanche upa chaap aeng vokhehkho aanchung jaethiim aeng amanche thiimthang chaap aenche rumah ae naka thehvaatae, amanche inii animanthumnii nache hangring vaata.”
Amana Jesu ing mee vakhae ningna ajeer, “Achuw yngkheh ing kaanuw jiikata tanave ataksah ynrumahrasiing vokhehkho akhros sahchu anasiir nache idomsana kaanuwchu jiirasiing.
Aringkum karsa ningka achii achuw yngkheh inche imaangsah phavaata, amanche kakhaena aringkum ama-maangcheh mee chuve ikarpeeh phavaata.
Akhaechuve mee yngkheh inche laaruw paam aangkheng phanaka ataksahchu maangnave vokhehkho chiirdeh nave ynchii ikanii aphase?

Chukhaenache kakhaena vokhehkho kachong khaena aning amanjak mee chuve Mee Sapa inche alaar isa re ampa laar isa vokhehkho ynthiing vaarmee ae enlaar isa thoh-che ynruw ing ajungthenglaenche ningjak phavaata.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, havane ingiir mee topoh ae ichuve Thangnang iruwngpaam emumahri raentaang ithiichu phamahnii ae.”
Hava vakhae i ariir aanuw inii neeriih omka, Jesu ing Pitar re Johon, amanche Jakop, enuwchu ynruwfhuwka bung ting ithamsah sisae.
Ama ing athamsah raenche Jesu amaechu asikdeh ing tiisa, amanche Jesu apeendiir chukho ivaar lamher ing ynreensa.
Apha ichiinache Jesu ing meeniimeh thoh chongsae, enuw chuve Mosi re Elija ynsuwhsae.
Enuw ing enlaar isa mandang aeka amanche nuwting Jerusalem na Thangnang ing asir inuwzii ing thikvachii khaenache chongsae.
Changlaenche Pitar ing aanruwfhuw ae thohche emik ikhuw lamher ing ynguwsae, changvakonchu emik ikhuwchu ahungriing tahnache enuw ing Jesu alaar isa re amathoh ingiirhak ae meeniimeh chukho emupa.

Amana enuw ing Jesu thohche engaansae aanuwnache Pitar ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Aafhuw, hava minne inuw ong ing sakna; inuw ing rumniithaam asae ynthummeh, nakhaena yngkheh, Mosi khaena yngkheh amanche Elija khaena yngkheh tutaruw achii.” Havi ama ing ynchii kariirva ichii manghuwmah.
Ama ing changche achong raenche ruwrduh inche entaklina abaruwpae; amana ruwrduh sungna ongchu enuw ynchiksae.
Changlae ruwrduh tanii iruur yngkheh ing ariir, “Havi ki ing kaateer kasapa chuva; ama ing ariirchu nenuw ing rungaeruw.”
Ama iruurchu achichak inuwna, Jesu anumpang ongsa. Amana enuw ing huwdaejaeh inche ong aeka vokhehkho emuchu achuw ningnakho riirmahsae.
Atuknuwche enuw ing bung tanii enjungchum tahnache mee inempak ae thohche yntuwhsae.
Amana mee yngkheh ing changjaeh mee inem kaarnache uungka ariir, “Oja, kasapa havi ienpeehra taka Jesu ningna athamsah, ki sapa yngkhehpang havi kadeensah vatah.
Enla, atak i ynthiingmah umlae laetha ing chuwngka uunglap uungchakna; vokhehkho abaena por ifhuwr ing ijachaam aphanah, amanche mee ing suwrkhang nare chehmah aeka abathen chaknah ae.
Chukhaenache ataklina umlae laetha ing ichuwngchu ithurpeehnii khaena nasebok ae ningna kathamsah tahnae enuw ingkho thurcheh mahsae.”
Jesu ing abasang, “O thacha ivaeh vokehkho ynraar ing isi mee ae, ki ing nenuw thoh apha aasen iseeh ing ongningka khaangfhuwva kachii vachuw? Nasapa kha havatinge hen-ruwra.”
Asapa inche ahuungtah nache isamah umlae inche bathiihka aanukriipa. Changvakonchu Jesu ing isamah umlaechu thurka amandampa, vokhehkho naepangchu ampa ningting amansirpa.
Amana mee vakhae aenche Thangnang ruwreng ipirpakchu emutah nache inempak enruwriimsa.
Jesu ing atu ari nong vakhae nache ngik aeka engomraenche asebok ae ningna ariir,
“Havana kachong vakhae i nenganana manruwhruw; Mee Sapa chu mee ae kikting piro enchiinah.”
Enuw ing ajeer chongchu ynchii achiiniiva ichii manghuwmahsae, vokhehkho enuw ing emanghuwniimah inche athuurpa; chukhaenache hava chongjeer khaene Jesu ningna siiva enchii ynchiksae.
Changche ichii ing embarungriir sungna emandenchu Jesu ing amanghuw tahnache ama ing naepang yngkhehchu vekika abuumna mangongka,

amana eningna ariir, “Achuw yngkheh ing karumingna havana naepang i bariimsa nave kichu ymbariimsahva, amanche achuw yngkheh ing kichu ibariimsa nave ki ynjenchiir Thangnang chu abariimsahva; nenuw nengkaarna yntuursehping taka amandensah meechu iruunghakva.”
Changlae Johon ing abasang, “Aafhuw achuw yngkheh mee ing narumingna isamah umlae athur kenuw ing mu ungka kengkhaam, akhaechuve ama ing kenuw thohche sihakmahsa.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Khaam mahruw; nenuw ynjeehniimah meechu nengkhae nava.”
Jesu thangbaen ting jerivachii apha ahunganeeng tahnache Jerusalem ting isinii khaena karkhiing abasenpa.
Chukhaenache Jesu ing amating maen ing asebok aechu achiirpae; chukhaenache enuw ing hesi aeka Jesu khaena hesirnii inche Samaria khuwting varuwhsae;
Changvakonchu Jesu ing Jerusalem phanii ing isinii khaena ahehchu emanghuw tahnache enuw ing Jesu chu hebariim mahsae.
Amachu Jakop re Johon ing emutah nache enuw ing enriir, “Aafhuw, thangbaen tanii mi jenbabuk manuwka enuw i emaang chirnii inche kenuw ing chonghak ipeeh naruse?”
Jesu ing eningting vaanlehka arakuhpae, “Nenuw ynchii laetha ing eenruwfhuwva ichii manghuw mahchuw,
Mee Sapa inche laaruw mee mamaang kata taka ijuwngmahva, karpeeh katae taka ijuwngva.” Amana enuw ing reentaang khuw yngkheh ting sisae.
Enuw ing lamna envasiraenche mee yngkheh ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Aafhuw nang nasitah vakhaena naanuw jiisa kata.”
Jesu ing aning-nache imi aekho engkhur omna amanche vaati aekho enrabuw omna, changvakonchu Mee Sapa chuve arusae mangkamnii unakho omah taka ariir.
Jesu ing mee reentaang yngkheh ningnakho kaanuw ijiira taka ariir. Changvakonchu ama ing abasang, “Aafhuw, maensa ing kapa ithii idim sirap kata irupeehra.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Ithii aechu entaksah ing yndimsa ae rasiing; nang sinana Thangnang iruwngpaam chongchu vatongla achii.”
Mee reentaang yngkheh ingkho ariir, “Aafhuw, ki naanuw jiiva kata; changvakonchu maensa ing ka eengkuw aechu lamsuw thaenrap katae irupeehra achii.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Nong itu basen naka aanuwting ivaanleh mee chaap chuve Thangnang iruwngpaam khaena ynchiikho ikaanii omah.”
Jesu ing reentaang achongthang mee Somsarii ariinii aechu iteerka ama ing siniivachii khuw-ruung chaap tingche, vokhehkho aphamsiir tingche mee ynniinii inche maen ing achiirpae.
Changlae eningna Jesu ing ariir, “Ikuumfhuw ruwrae ruungpakna, changvakonchu kuumvachii mee tuumpakna; chu-khaenache ruwrae tingche nong tuvachii mee ichiirnii khaena Aafhuw ningtingche thamsaruw.
Nenuw nema taarnuwna siruw! Imi ae kaartingche Jaoti vaangkhe ki ing kachiirnahchuw,
Seerthuung chimahruw, thuungfhuw ivamahruw, vokhehkho kheerkhaang reenmahruw amanche lamna achuw tikho chong buwhmahruw.
Nenuw ing eensung nenvaruwhrae amaensana idaechu hava eensungne omlasii taruw.
Ama eensung nache idae ing ipaar amanden mee omnave neningtanii idaechu aningnache omvaata, omahnave neningting athar hunganrirasiing.
Enuw ing ympeeh vakhaechu saruw, inruw, vokhehkho amanache nenuw ongruw, nong itu meechu ruthamen iphapham suwhna; yngkheh yngkheh ting hungruwh varuwh tumahruw.
Nenuw ing khuwruung nache nenvaruwhrae ihebariim ae nave, nemaana ensiih vakhae thaeminchu saruw;
Amanache ina mee omnave mandam nuwna taruw, ‘Thangnang iruwngpaamchu neningnache yn-neengsa.’
Changvakonchu nenuw ing khuwruung nache nenvaruwh raenche enuw ing ihebariimmah ae nave, lam nache sinuwna taruw,

‘Nentaklina kenrumah chuwchu asaarkhii omnii ing neng khuwruung tanii kengkhina pirkhuwh ikah vakhae kembahuwnah; changvakonchu nenuw ing havi manghuwruw, Thangnang iruwng-paam neningna ynneengsa ichii chuve eningna riirruw.’ ”
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, vajeer inii nache ama khuwruungchu Sodom kha athiseh ing ningchuwhnii phavaata!

Korazin nakhaena ijaniisapa! Betsaida nakhaena ijaniisapa! Nen-taklina katu kari laetho vakhae chaap i Taire re Sidon khuwna katu vanave, enuw ing bora asii niiae naka, rungvuwh taklina ong ae naka, vokhehkho kembarungriir keng-huungva ichii mandangva enchiichu.
Chukhaenache vajeer aanturaenche nentaklinakhe Taire re Sidon kha athi ing ijachaam vaata.
Amanche Kaparnaum, nangcha thangbaen phanii ing ynruung saningka nachiiva? Nangchuve longkong ipha ing bukva nata.
Atii somsarii ariinii ae ing rotha-rohpak ing hunganri aeka enriir, “Aafhuw, naruming nache isamah umlae aerap ingkho kenchongriir derna ongnae.”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Thangbaen tanii tenlungpa chem ynleh vaangkhe Umlae ijungbuw kamu.

Enruw, nenuw ing baruwr ae, amanche rungmanchiih ae taklina nenchanii chehnii vokhehkho ynjeehnii ae ruwreng aangkhenglaang taklina nenchehnii ruwreng ki ing neningna kapeehpachuw; amanche ynchiitanga ingkho nenuwchu imansuhcheh mahnii.
Changvakonchu laetha aeng nenderna ongnae ichiine nenrotha rohmah rasiing; thangbaen nache nenruming ynziihsa ichii khaenache nenrotha manrohruw.”

Apha ichiinache Jesu ing ynthiing laetha ajaarna arotha irohpak ing ariir, “Thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paam Aafhuw apa nangchu kamanpahsah nahchii, nang ing hava vakhae i ising ae ningna vokhehkho amanghuw ae ningnache thuurchiika amanche naeduung ae ningna namandangpa, chumna apa, havi nang ing namanden sahrem chuva.

Hava vakhae i kapa ing kaningna ymmansirpa, chukhaenache ampa ing mahnaka asapa chu achuwva ichiichu achuw ingkho manghuwmah, amanche asapa inche achuw yngkheh ningna mandang ningka achii chumah naka ampa chu achuwva ichiichu achuw ingkho manghuwmah.”
Aanuwnache Jesu ing asebok ae ningting vaanlehka ynruwhjaeh ing ariir, “Nenuw ing nemuchu emik ing imu empha enuw-chu bor aphapae!
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, amachuve jaephar ae vokhehkho iruwng aenche nenuw ing nemu ae i munungka enchii muchehmah ae, amanche nenuw ing nensii havi siinungka ta ae khang nakho siichehmah ae.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Vajeer chonghak nacha ynchii ynziihna? Nang ynsaangkhe napa?”

Ama ing abasang, “Nang ing naafhuw Thangnang chu nabarungriir aangkheng ing, nalaetha aangkheng ing vokhehkho naruwreng aangkheng inche naning mansiihva nachiiva; amanche naveenchaang aechu natak-sah naning namansiih vaangkhe naning mansiihva nachiiva.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Nang ichum ing nabasangsa; havi tura, amanache nang ringvaanta.”
Changvakonchu ama ing ichum ymbusaka Jesu ningna ariir, “Sakna, changvakonchu achuwa kaveen-chaangchu?”
Jesu ing abasang, “Achuw yng-kheh mee ing Jerusalem na ing Jeriko ting ajungsiraenche lamruw mee aethoh yntuwhsa, amana apeehchu ripeeh aeka vokhehkho bin aeka thikvachii ing emahpa.
Atii jinge suwhsa amachuve, jaethiim yngkheh inche ama lam nache hungsisa. Changvakonchu ama ing amutah nache reentaang yngkheh lamting repka sisa.
Amavaangche Levi mee yngkheh ingkho lamchu ahenjiitah nache muka lam yngkheting areppa.
Changvakonchu Samaria mee yngkheh lamkhii isi inche jenphaka amutah nache inempak aningchu amansiihpa,

chutahnache apaang veneengka ahakchaang suhnii nache richiithou re vomrip chii inche chirka aarompa; aanuwnache ama ing aveong-nii asha taklinache thinka aruwpa, vokhehkho meetungnii nache mantorka rukuum isajaeh ing atupeehpa.
Akhuwvaar nache ama ing seer dinari asae ynniimehchu meetungnii een aafhuw ningnache pika ariir, nang ing rukuum tupeehra; nang ing havi athi ing namanruwh chaap vakhae kahunganrirae bariva kata.”
Havana ynthummeh ae sungne achuw ingkhe lamruw ae ing embin meechu aveenchaang vaate ichii ing namandennah?
Ama ing abasang, “Ataklina aning amansiih mee chuva.” Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Yngkaenana nangkho havi vaange tura.”
Martha naenuw aruming Meri inche Jesu khiderna ongka Jesu chongchu arungaesahpa.

Changlaenche Martha inche rukuum atutahna ja-hohka Jesu ningna ariir, “Aafhuw, kanumpang ing kanaenuw inge ru-kuum imantuka ymbommah i nang ing thova ynsapeehmah vachii? Kanaenuw renkha ymbomnii inche nang ing iriirpeehra.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Martha, Martha, nanongtu inem khaenakhe nabarungriir sungna fhuwm bavae chiika ija ing omnachii;
chang-vakonchu athurfhuw ing itufhuw yngkheh omna. Meri inge aningtanii irijoh rumahvachii isapakchu aateerpa.”

Nikhehna Jesu ing denkhehna athamsahpa, ama ing amanchen aanuwnache asebok yngkheh ing aningna ariir, “Aafhuw, Johon ing asebok aechu ithamnii amanchuw ae vaangche kening nakho ithamnii imanchuwsara.”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing nentham-sahrae jinge taruw:
Apa, naruming ynthiing ynsuwhrasii.
Naaruwngpaam thengrasii.
Anasiirna kensahfhuw thaemin ipisar;
Amanche kentaklina araar mee aechu kengkuhpeeh vaang,
kentaklina isii icher vakhaechu ikuhpeehsar.
Vokhehkho batheemnii tingche ibabuwsamahra.”
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw nengkaarna achuw yng-kheh ing aarang ningna jaenchim nache vaknaka, ‘Kaarang tar asae yn-thumpang imanfhuwhsara,
kaarang yngkheh lamkhii tanii kaningna tungna, amachu aningna kapeehfhuw ynchii tangakho deenmahsing tataniika nariir raenche,
sungna ong naarang inche imanjamahra, eengkhaar kakampa vokhehkho kasiti ae thoh jaarsung; ki ing hangsuw ningka pichehmah ningchii tavaate?’
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, ama ing aarang rapkho hangsuw naka piningka tamah; changkhangnare vanuh vanuh aniihsah khaenache hangsuw naka aniih vakhaechu pivaata.
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, Niihruw, neningna ipivaata; jongruw, tuwhva nenta; ichumruw, ibarangpeeh vaata.
Akhaechuve aniihsah mee vakhae inche aphanah, amanche ajong mee vakhae inche atuwhnah vokhehkho aachum mee ningnache abarang peehnah.
Chukhaenache nengkaarna asiti ing ampa ningna nga aniih tahna nga pivachii changdenna baruwr apeeh ynvae chuwkhang;
vokhehkho aarlachii aniihtahna rungmanchiih piva takhang?
Chukhaenache nenuw sakmahpak khangtanuwre, nensiti ae ningna chembe isa kikthuur ipinii nemanghuw vakhaka, thangbaenna ong nenpa inche aajaehmeh aniih mee ningnache ynthiing laethachu pivaate!”
Atii Jesu ing isamah umlae laetha ing chuwngka achong isuwhmahchu athurpeehpa; amana umlae inche taang asuwhnuw nache achong isuwh mahkha ichong achehpa; chukhaenache mee vakhaechu inempak ngiksae.
Changlaenche mee topoh aenche umlae vakhae engaruung Beelzebul ruwreng ing umlae aechu athurcheh vatah ta aeka enriir.

Changvakonchu enuw ing emandenchu ama ing amanghuwtah nache eningna ariir, “Iruwngpaam chaap vakhae asungsah nache aruwr ynniimeh suwhnave imaangniichu suwhvaata; vokhehkho eengkuw yngkheh sungna ynlehmah omnave mee derna ongna.
Amavaange umlae ingkho ensungsahna ynlehmah ae nave, ama iruwngpaamchu ynsaangkhe paarvaata? Akhaechuve Beelzebul ajaarna umlae ae athurvatah tachuwka nenuw ing nenriirnah.
Ki ing Beelzebul ajaarnache umlae aechu kathur vanave, nenuw nensiti aencha achuw jaarna umlae aechu athurpae chang? Chukhaenache enuw ing nentaklina vajeer aafhuw ynsuwh vaatae.
Changvakonchu Thangnang ruwreng ajaarna umlae aechu kathur vanave neningna Thangnang iruwngpaamchu ithengva.”
Chukhaenache ipirpak mee inche laar tuknii peehchae ing ynthongka a-eenchu aherung tahna adeen peehchae vakhaechu maangmahsa;
changvakonchu achungna ipirseh mee inche vathengka achehpa, vokhehkho ama ing aangahsahnii laar tuknii peehchae chaapchu aachehpa inche siihka ensempa.
Achuw yngkheh kithoh ynruwhakmah meechu ki eejeehniiva, amanche kithoh kengkhuum hakmah mee chuve aanseh mee chuva.

“Isamah laetha ing mee yngkheh tanii hungsuwhka ama ing chii omah paamting bavaeka aongnii ajongpa, changvakonchu ama ing aongniichu atuwhmah tahnache, ki ing ajae kaongnii een tingkhe hunganritah kata ichii amandenpa.
Ama ing ahunganritah nache eensungchu ynriippeh ing vokhehkho isapak inche heom amupa.
Chutahnache ama ing sika achungna inempak ichamah ae reentaang isamah laetha sarii aechu henruwka ongsae. Amanache amaensa nakha athideh ing sakmahsehsa.”
Jesu ing havi ariir raenche, mee changjaeh inem kaartanii rupanuw yngkheh ing ipirpak inche uungka Jesu ningna ariir, “Nangchu ynreen ven rupum vokhehkho naethen najeennii meechu bor aphava!”
Changva-konchu Jesu ing ariir, “Amachu athiseh ing Thangnang chongzeerchu siinaka amanjii meechu inempak bor aphava!”
Akhaechuve Jona ing Nineva mee ae ningna buwtinnii ynsuwh vaangkhe, Mee Sapa inchenkho hava suwnthar khaene buwtinnii ynsuwh vaata.

Iniisuwhtah paam tanii iruwngnuw ing vajeer inii nache ataraennii suwnthar mee ae thohne hangiirhak ae naka enuwchu manraar vaatae; akhaechuve laaruw paam adongnii lamrii tanii ing Solomon alosing ennii khaena itheng; changvakonchu enruw, havane Solomon chungna iruunghak yngkheh omna.

Nineva mee aeng vajeer inii nache ataraennii suwnthar mee ae thohne hangiirhak ae naka manraar vaatae; akhaechuve Jona ing isa thamin atong tahna enuw ing embarungriir enghuungpa. Chukhaenache enruw, Jona chungna iruungseh yngkheh havane ogna.”
Namik inge hakchaang jaemi chuva; chukhae-nache namik barengchu chumnave, nahakchaang aangkheng rengchir vaata, changvakonchu namik barengchu chummah nave, nahakchaang chukho inempak manthim vaata.
Chu-khaenache nahakchaang irengchu amanthim niimah inche ynriimla.
Amanche nahakchaang aangkheng manthimrudeh ing isajaeh inche reng nave, jaemi ireng inche nataklina aen vaangkhe rengvaata.”
Jesu ing achong raenche Pharisi yngkheh inche Jesu chu imaarpohnii khaena athamsahpa; chukhaenache Jesu ing vakka isahnii nache vaongsa.
Jesu ing amaarphana akik achaammahchu Pharisi inche amutah nache inempak ngiksa.
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Pharisi ae ataraene nenuw inchembe bukam jaekhi taangna nenga-taehpehnah, changvakonchu sungting chembe ynruw ynrep vokhehkho isamah ing sipnachuw.
Ipang ae, taang taniichu Aafhuw ama ing ynseem peehrae sungtanii chukho ynseemmah vakhang?
Nenbukam jaekhi sungna omkha sara naeriing ae ningnache piruw, amanche enruw, nengkhaenache aangkhenglaang manthiing vaata.

Chukhaenache Pharisi ae nengkhaena ijaniisapa! Nenuw ing ipifhuw chaapchu sarup suumna yngkheh pichuwka amanche ichum re Thangnang ningsiih chuve nenbathennah; hava vakhae i nenuw tuva nenchiiting bukna, vokhehkho reentaang ae renkha bathen mahva nenchiiva.
Pharisi ae nengkhaena ijaniisapa! Nenuw ing meekongnii sungna ongnii isaseh nache ong vokhehkho kithiirna mee aenche salaam yntu nengadiknah.”
“Nengkhaena ijaniisapa! Nenuw i ymmuchehmah thaen thohche aanghak sachuw, ama taklinache mee ae ing manghuwmah aeka hungsi vasi entunah.”
Vajeer itu mee yngkheh inche Jesu ningna abasang, “Oja, hava chong i nariirtahna kenuw vakhaekho ningjak ympinahchii achii.”
Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Ne-nuw vajeer itusii nengkhaenakho ijaniisapa! Irik peeh chucha mee manreen chuwka, nentak incha nengkikchar rap ingkho parnungka tamahchuw.
Nengkhaena ijaniisapa! Amachuve nenpa aeng entheh jaephar ae thaenchu nenuw ing nentunah.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing asaarkhii ngiirnachuw vokhehkho nenpa aeng entu nongchu nenuw ing nenrusa, akhaechuve entakrap ing jaephar aechu enthehpa amanche nenuw ing enthaenchu nenseemnah.
Havi khaene Thangnang losing inche ariirsa, ‘ki ing neningna kajaephar aere kachongthang ae jebathenva kata, changlaenche enuw ing topoh ae chuve thehvaatae vokhehkho manang vaatae.’
Thiimkung re ynthiing min ruwrakna Abel sii ynta na ing Zakharia sii ynta phanii ing,
laaruw paam abasenpeh raennii ing jaephar ae enthehkha, ataraennii mee ae ningne vajeer itupham suwhna.

Vajeer ituae nengkhaena ijaniisapa! Nenuw ing ising iveernii een kamnii longtingchu chither chuwka nentak rapkho varuwhmah sachuw, vokhehkho varuwh saningka achii mee ae chukho manruwh chehmah sachuw!”
Jesu ing ama denchu bathenka asitah nache thiimthang aere Pharisi ae ing Jesu achongriir nache isuwrnii khaena chuwm aeka,
Jesu chu ithipak ing jeehnii aeka vokhehkho emenchehnii ing reentaang chong aajaeh isii embasenpa.
Yng-khumjaeh naka yndangmah vachii yntanga omah, amanche ynghuwmah vachii ynruwh yntangakho omahnii.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing ynthim sungna ynruwh ing nenriir chaapkha ireng nache siivataruw; vokhehkho arakiing yngkhehna nenganana nenriir chongkha een chungting ynthang vaata.”
“Kaarang ae neningna ki ing kariirnah, hakchaang thehcheh naka, aanuwting ynchiikho amanruchehmah ae enuwchu chiimah aeruw.

Changva-konchu nenuw ing achuwchu chiiva nenchiiva ichiichu neningna ki ing riirpeeh kachuw: Yntheh aanuwting longkong ting ynrencheh ruwreng adeenchu nenuw ing chiiruw; ki ing ichumchu neningna kariirva, atakchu chiiruw!”
“Vasak runga pesa ynniimehna nenjuwrmah vakhang? Thangnang mik barengna vasak aechu yngkheh pangkho inghir omahnii.
Nenrusaena sambur khakho ateenchir vasahva. Nenuw ynchik mahruw; nenuwve vasak ae ithi ing nemen inemva!”
“Ki ing neningna kariirnah, mee vakhae maekungna kichu ynru meechu Mee Sapa inche Thangnang vaarmee ae maekungna ruvaata;
amanche mee ae maekungna ynrumah mee vakhae chuve Thangnang vaarmee ae maekung nakho rumah aening.”
changlaenche ynthiing laetha ing ynchii riirva nente ichiichu imanchuw vaata.”
Mee inempak kaarnache mee yngkheh inche Jesu ningna ariir, “Oja, ki ing iphapham isuwh lerchiichu isemnii khaena kaipa ningna iriirpeehra.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Kaarang, achuw ing kichu nentaklina vajeernii vokhehkho isemnii khaena pham ithinkhang?”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ynriimruw, amanche ymphaam vakhae ae tanii nentaksah yncheer saruw; laaruw mee iringniichu lerchii inem adeen nachenpang omahva.”
Aanuwnache Jesu ing eningna ynghuwnii thamin yngkheh atong: “Achuw yngkheh savangpak mee inche apaamsah nache inempak lerchii amanla pohpa;
amana abarungriirna ama ing amanden, ‘Lerchii isahfhuw kadeenpoh havi asiihnii apham omahsa. Ki ing ynchii tukate?’
Havi ki ing tukata taka ataksahna ynriir, ‘Kaatom havi isehchir ningka, havi chungna iruunghak yngkheh tukata; amanche asung nache kasaang kabaar vokhehkho kapeehchae vakhae thinpoh kata.
Amanche ki ing kalaetha ningna riirkata, kalaetha, kum aajaeh isahfhuw khaena lerchii nasiihpa; ongjaeh nana sara inla vokhehkho nungaesara!’
Changvakonchu Thangnang ing aningna ariir, ‘Ipang nang! Atanii jaen nalaetha ringkum jeriva kata; changlae nalerchii chaapkha achuwta ynsuwh vaate?’ ”
Chukhaenache achuw yngkheh ing ataksah khaenapang lerchii amanghuwng meechu Thangnang maana savangmah.

Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ajeer, “Chukhaenache ki ing neningna kariirnah, nenringnii khaena nenuw ing ynchii savakente vokhehkho hakchaang khaena ynchii peendiir niivakente tanuwna nenbarungriir manjamahruw.
Isahfhuw chungna ringkum ing vokhehkho peendiir chungna hakchaang ing athurfhuw-sehna.

Phaenva vaak ae i enruw: Enuw ing ivorkho vormah ae, ikuumkho kuummah ae, amanche enuw ing itomkho, pangkho deenmah ae, changvakonchu Thangnang ing enven amamva peehsae. Chukhae-nache vaati ae thoh chembe nenuw nemen aajaehmeh ruwne!
Nenuw achuw yngkheh ing havi khaene abarungriir jaka aringkum khaapkheh amanthicheh omkhang?
Chukhaenache aasiingseh rapkho nenuw ing tuchehmah tanuwve, ynchii khaena reentaang reentaang khaena nenbarungriir nemanjava?

Riibur aeng ynsaangkhe ihangruungpae ichii mandenruw, nongkho tumah ae, itaarkho taarmah ae; chukhaenache ki ing neningna kariirnah, Solomon rap ingkho lerchii aajaeh adeen ingkhe enuw vaange ynthongmah.
Atanii lampana om fuwrchu atuknuw mi sungting ynthuvachii rapkho Thangnang ing hangjaehmeh aning mansiih nave, O thacha ivaeh ae! Aafhuw ing nenuwchu athiseh ing eerommah niikhang?”
“Chukhaenache nenuw ing ynchii savakente, vokhehkho ynchii invakente tanuwna jongmahruw, vokhehkho nenbarungriir manjamah-ruw.
Akhaechuve laaruw paamna Thangnang yndenmah mee chaap ing hava vakhae i enjongnah; amanche peeh vakhae i neningna ikaniina ichii nenpa ing amanghuwsa.
Chukhaenache amaensana Thang-nang iruwngpaamchu jongruw, amana hava vakhae i neningna ipivaata.”
“Ynchik mahruw, isiing jao ruwr ae, neningna Thangnang ing iruwng-paam ipeehchu abarungriir ipenva.

Nenuw ing nendeen vakhaekha juwrnuwna amenchu sara naeriing ae ningna piaeruw; jungbaruw mahdeh vachii seerthuungchu nengkhaena seemruw; akhaechuve lamruw aeng enganeeng chehmah vokhehkho rungi ing asah chehmah, thangbaenna om lerchii chuve imaang omahva.
Akhaechuve nenlerchii aomniitah nache nenbarungriir chukho omvaata.”
Aafhuw ing rakhiinii kuurva imaar tanii hunganri naka eengkhaarchu arakhuung raenche ithupak ing imongva nenchii meechu nenuw ynsuwhruw.

Aafhuw ing ajuwnglae meenae aenche hemeng ae naka enghahcheh ajenpha mee aechu bor aphapae; ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirva, Aafhuw inche endiirriim manehther naka vokhehkho isahnii khaena mangong ae naka emaarnii khaena rukuum tupeeh vaatae.
Amana Jesu ing avomaniinii apha, avomanthumnii apha nache ajungthenglae husaar ahentu ajenpha mee aechu bor aphapae!
Nenuw ing havi manghuwruw, amachuve een aafhuw inche ynchii apha nache lamruwchu thengva chiiva ichiichu manghuw nave ama ing hehah naka a-een sungtingche ruwhmah vachiiva.
Chukhaenache nenuwkho husaar hetunuwna heongruw; nenuw ing nemandenmah siisii apha nache Mee Sapa inche jungtheng vaata.”
Pitar ing ariir, “Aafhuw, havana ynghuwnii thamin i kengkhae napangva changmahka mee aangkheng khaenakho nariirva?”
Jesu ing ariir, “Chunuwcha apha ichachakna eningna isahfhuw thaemin enrutumchu ipinii khaenache Aafhuw ing eensung nache paaniivachii thachafhuw om iveer rukuum itu meechu achuw vachiiva chang?
Aafhuw inche ajungthenglae havi vaange ahetu ajenpha meenae chuve bor aphava.
Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirva, aafhuw inche adeensah lerchii vakhaechu aningna mansir vaata.

Changvakonchu meenae inche ataksah ing tanaka, ki kaafhuw juwngvachiichu abarungriir nache yntuksa tanaka meenae pasar aechu vokhehkho meenae rupanuw aechu ibin basen naka, ama ing sanaka innaka, meenae inche asuwh ae pasar rupanuw aechu safhuw infhuw naka vokhehkho juw hebaruw nave,
ama ing amandenmah riri inii vokhehkho amanghuwmah apha nache Aafhuw inche juwngvaata, changlaenche ahakchaangchu mongnii basuw naka tenvaata; amana thachafhuwmah ae thohche iphafhuw phahak vaata.”
“Aafhuw ing amandenchu manghuw naka husaar atumah vokhehkho Aafhuw ing aadik inuwzii ing ahetumah meenae chuve rumor abuw inae ing binvaata.

Changvakonchu Aafhuw ing amandenchu manghuwmah naka ibin matik icha nong atu meenaechu rumorbuw topoh inae ing binvaata, vokhehkho inem apeeh mee ningnache inem phakata tavaata; amanche inemhak apeeh mee ningnache inemhak niihvaata.”
“Laaruw paamne mi bathunii khaena ki juwngsing, amanche michu ataraene chuwhnave ki ing kaadikchu ynchiiva?
Ki ing baptais iraangva kachii omna; amachu achimahri raen-taang aajaehmeh kaningna ijaniiva!
Laaruw paamne idae ipeeh ijuwngva ichii ing nemandenva? Ki ing neningna kariirnah, changmahva asiksik suwhnii sehseh khaenava.
chukhaenache atarae basen naka eengkuw sungna mee runga ongnii nakhe ynniimeh re ynthum, ynthum re ynniimeh suwhvaata.
Ampa re asapa, amanche asapa re ampa, vokhehkho amnuw re asanuw, amanche asanuw re amnuw, vokhehkho ampuw re ameenuw, amanche ameenuw re ampuw thoh asiksik suwhnii khaenava.”
Amana Jesu ing mee changjaeh inem ae ningnache ariir, “Nenuw ing iniisuwhtah tanii ruwrduh hungsuwh nemutahna, nenuw ing nenriirnah, khuw suwrvaata nenchiichu ichum.
Amanche Irip tanii sii hanglaang nave nenuw ing nenriirnah, inii inem-pak basak vaata tachuwka nenriir chumna.
Isachaang atu mee ae! Nenuw ing laaruw vokhehkho minvaen alaar enchuwka suwhva chiichu nenriir chehsa, changvakonchu ynchii khaena ataraennii aphachu nemanghuwcheh mahva?”
“Ynchii khaena ichum tunii khaenache nataksah vajeer yntumah vachii?

Nangchu ynrumah mee thohche vaapa ngiirniiting navak raenche, amathoh aanrunii tura. Changmahnave ama ing vajeer itumee ningting iruwnaka, vajeer itumee inche natakchu aaruung ningting imansir vaata, amanche aaruung inche natakchu kaeshum tingche ithin vaata.
Ki ing naningna kariirnah, nang ing akuurchiimnii seerchu napeehmahri raentaang hungsuwh rumahnii.”
Apha ichiinache Galili mee ae ing Thangnang ting ipeehfhuw chaatha chaap empeeh raenche, Pilaat ing atheh aechu Jesu ningna chong abajen mee topoh omsae.
Amana Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Galili mee aechu changche ichii ing entheh khaenache, Galili mee ae kaartanii enuw inche isii icher sehpae ichii ing nemandenva?
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, changchen mahva; nenuw ing nenbarungriir huungmah tanga tanuwka, nenuwkho enuw vaange maangchir vanenta.
Changpang mahka Shilom na om yngkaangpak een inche atiihrae mee suum arii iriih derka ithii aenche Jerusalem sungna ong mee vakhae chungna isamah sehpae ichii ing nemandenva?
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, Changchen mahva; nenuw ing nenbarungriir huungmah tanga tanuwka, nenuwkho enuw vaange nengkheng maangchir vanenta.”
Jesu ing ynghuwnii thamin havi ariir: “Achuw yngkheh mee ing ingkhon sungna thachang bur yngkheh aphin; nikheh nache ama ing aanla ajongtah nache ynlamahsa.

Chutah-nache ama ing ingkhon khaenache aapaanii ningnache ariir, ‘Enla, kumthum sungna ki ing thachang bur havi aanla kajong tuwhmahsing. Fuwrtahra; havi inge ruwruwchu ikaniimah ing amangom i ynchii ikanii omkhang?’
Ingkhon aapanii inche aningna abasang, ‘Aafhuw, atiikum pangve omtahrasii, ki ing akuur manriningka chuwkata vokhehkho ruwruw mansakpheh katae.
Ama inuwnache basen naka hunganla nave saksa; changvakonchu ynlamah nave changlaenche fuwrtah vaanta.’ ”
Jesu ing meekongnii yngkhehna isa thamin Deennii inii nache atong.
Amanache enruw, kumsuum arii iriih sungna akuung puumka ina ynjik achehmah rupanuw yngkheh om.
Jesu ing amachu amutah nache eenka aningna ariir, “Rupanuw, ina chiikha damsachii.”
Amana Jesu ing ataklina akik ing avepartah nache akuung ipuum ynjik achehmahchu damsa, vokhehkho ama ing Thangnang chu amanpahsah.

Changvakonchu meekongnii aapanii inche Jesu ing Deennii iniina amandam tahnache abarung sikka ama ing mee ae ningnache ariir, “Mee ing inii niruk sungna nong tunii omna; chukhaenache inii niruk sungnache ina vakhaechu mandamnii khaenache thengruw, Deennii iniine thengmahruw.”
Jesu ing abasang, isachaang itu ae! Nenuw nengkheng ing Deennii iniina nensiir nendaar nenphuwpchu bajoh chuwka taangting chii nenpeehmah vakhang?
Abraham sanuw havi enruw, kumsuum arii iriih chakna umlae ing suwrka om havicha Deennii iniina ynjohpham suwhmah khang?
Amana hava chong vakhae i riirka, Jesu atak ajeehnii vakhae mee aechu ningjak apeehpae; amanche Jesu ing hangjaehmeh isapak nong atu vakhae khaene mee changjaeh aenche enrotha irohsah.
Chukhaenache Jesu ing ariir, “Thangnang iruwngpaamchu ynchiithoh aanghakne? Vokhehkho ynchii thohche mandeeng vaanchiiva?
Havi chuve mee yngkheh ing encham muwchu chika aruwraena avorthoh aanghakna; amana aburchu hangmuwngka thingbur vaangche hungruungsa, vokhehkho abah taklinache vaati aeng enrabuw enghuwnah.”
Athar vokheh Jesu ing ariir, “Thangnang iruwngpaamchu ynchiithoh mandeeng kate?
Amachuve rupanuw yngkheh ing jaam chika amana chor thohche manvaeka ahangpuur mahri raen-taangche asiith thoh aanghakna.”
Havi aanuwdehna Jerusalem yntongting vasivachii nache, Jesu ing khuwruung chaapna vokhehkho akhuw siirna isa thamin tongka ivasi.
Changlaenche mee yngkheh ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Aafhuw, ikarpeeh phava enchii mee aechu topoh pangti vachiiva?”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Eenkhaar ymbik nache ivaruwhchehnii khaena karkhiingruw; neningna kariirnah, mee inempak ing amanache ivaruwhnii tuvaatae changvakonchu chehmahnii ae.

Eensung aafhuw inche hangiir naka eenkhaar akam-pang aanuwnache nenuw ing taangna ngiir tanuwka, vokhehkho eenkhaar-chu ichum tanuwka, Aafhuw, Aafhuw, ibarangpeehra tavanenta. Apha ichiinache ama ing nenuw utanii vachuw ki manghuwmah chuwng tanaka ibasang vaata.
Chang-laenche nenuw ing ichong basenva nenta, ‘Kenuw ing nang thoh kensah kenginhak, vokhehkho keng khuwruung nache ymmanchuwchii.’
Changvakonchu ama ing tavaata, ‘Ki ing neningna kariirnah, nenuw utanii vachuw ki manghuwmah chuwng; kaningtanii ongmahruw, ichuwhmah nong itu vakhae ae!’

Nenuw ing Abraham, Isak, Jakop, vokhehkho Thangnang jaephar vakhae aenche Thangnang iruwngpaamna ong aechu nemuraenche, nenuw chuve taangting iren naka ama mapham nache nengha iriir tanuwka ijachaam, ichap ichuw phava nenta.
Amana mee aenche iniisuwh tanii, taetah tanii, ikang, irip tanii theng ae naka Thangnang iruwngpaam ongnii nache ongvaatae.
Chukhaenache enruw, maensa inche ningkuur vaata amanche ningkuur inche maensa vaata.”
Changlaen siimche achuw yngkheh Pharisi aenche vatheng aeka Jesu ningna enriir, “Hava mapham i bathen nana apham yngkheh ting sira; Herot ing nangchu thehningka ynchiinah.”

Amana Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Nenuw ing vaknuwna imi ningnakhe riirruw, ‘Amachuve enruw, atanii re atuknuwkho umlae aechu thurva katae, amanche ina ae chukho mandamva katae, amanche inii animanthumnii nache kanongchu manchichir vakata.’
Changkhang nare ataniikho, atuknuwkho, amanche thiim nakho ki siva kachiiting bukna; akhaechuve Jerusalem taangna Thangnang jaephar ing ithiichu sakmahnii.”

“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, Thang-nang jaephar aechu thehchiika, vokhehkho rung ing nadeeng ae nang, aar afhuw ing atichu abatha ing aop vaangkhe vajaehmeh nasiti aechu opsa ae ningka kachii, changvakonchu nenuw ing irupeeh mahchuw!

Chu-khaenache enruw, nenta rumniieen havi aruwh ing kamahpa. Ki ing neningna kajeernah, nenuw ing Aafhuw rumingna ijungtheng atak i aajaehmeh bor aphava tatanuwka nenriirmahri raentaang imumah tanuw!”
Deennii nikheh nache Jesu ing Pharisi ae upa yngkheh een sungna imaarnii khaena athengtah nache; mee aenche Jesu chu eman-chuwmpa.
Amana enruw, akik akhi iturpoh ina mee yngkheh heongsa,
amana Jesu ing vajeer itumee aere Pharisi ae ningna chong asii ae, “Deennii iniine ina mee yndam aruva arumahva?”
Changvakonchu enuw emfhuw mandae aeka ongsae. Amana Jesu ing inachu jebachuwka amandampa vokhehkho amangkaepa.
Enuw ing achongchu basangcheh mahsae.
Mee vakhae aenche isaseh ongnii engateer Jesu ing amutah nache ynghuwnii thamin ing eningna ariir,
“Achuw mee yngkheh ing rakhiinii imaarna yngeen raenche, nenuw ing ynjasuwhpak ongnii isaseh nache ongmahruw, achuw ing ymmanghuwsa, nenchungna iruunghak mee ithengnii khaena eennaka ithengkho arusa;

vokhehkho ama ing nangkho amakho yngeen aafhuw inche naningna huungnaka ongniikha hava mee inge ongnii rasiing tanaka iriirkho arusa, changlaenche naning ynjakthoh ynruw ing tuknungdeh tingche ong phavaanta.

Chukhaenache mee ing yngeenlae vatheng nana akuur yntongdeh ongniiting ongla; amana chembe nangchu yngeen mee inche huungnaka naning nache, ‘O kaarang huungla, chungna ongnii isaseh tingse ihungongpeehra ita vaata.’ Amanache nangthoh onghak mee vakhae maekung nache nang ing ympahsah phavaanta.
Akhaechuve ataksah ing iruungping achii meechu ynjuursa vaata amanche ynjuursah mee inche ruungseh vaata.”

Aanuwnache Jesu chu a-een mee ningna chenkho ama ing ariir, “Nang ing ziingna vakhang nakho, khurina vakhang nakho, imaarnii khaena naarang ae, nauw nanae, na-eengkuw ynsuwh ae, changmahka naveenchaang ae, vokhehkho savang fhuwraang aechu eenmah aera, achuw ing ymmanghuwsa, enuw ingkho nangchu yngeenreeh aekho arusa.
Chukhae-nache mee maarfhuw kata nachii raenche sara naeriing ae, yntuursah mee ae, khibong ae, mikchu ae, enuw vakhae i eensa aera;
amanache nang ing borchu phapeh vaanta, akhaechuve enuw ing naningna ithungcheh mahnii ae. Ynthiing mee aenche ithii tanii enghangring raenche Thangnang ing ipisa vaata.”
Jesu thoh imaarpoh ae engkaarna mee yngkheh ing Jesu achongriirchu asiitah nache aningna ariir, “Thangnang iruwngpaamna tar isah phava chiichu alaepah sakna!”
Amana Jesu ing manghuwcheh niivachii ynghuwnii thamin inche ariir, “Achuw yngkheh mee ing iruungpak ing imaarnii khaena mee inempak a-eenpa;
aphachu ahenpha tahnache, ama ing a-een mee chaap ae ningna huungruw chichirsa tanaka iriirnii khaena ameenae yngkhehchu achiirpa.

Changvakonchu ama ing a-een mee chaap aenche aanghakjaeh ing emba-sangpa. Amaensa inche aningna ki ing ruwrae yngkheh kaariisa, amachu ki ing siningka vaabuwr kata; naningsiihna kathamsahchii i irupeehsara taka ariir.
Yngkheh inche aningna siirchar apu asae runga kaariipa, enuwchu ki ing isapae isamahpae ichii enjap kata; naningsiihna kathamsahchii i irupeehsara taka ariir.
Reentaang yngkheh inchenkho ariir, ‘Ki lung-hah kabuwhpa, itheng chehmahning achii.’ ”

Meenae inche hunganrika aafhuw ningnache ariirchirpa. Amana aafhuw inche abarung isii ing ameenae ningnache ariir, “Khuwruung lamfhuw chaapna vokhehkho veen veenna ynneh ing sinana sara naeriing ae, yntuursah ae, mikchu ae, vokhehkho khibong aechu havane henruw aera.”
Meenae inche ariir, “Oja, nang ing nariir inuwzii ing katusah chirpa, changvakonchu ataraenkho een yntheersong ing omjaeh tahna.”
Amana aafhuw inche meenae ningnache ariir, “Ataraenkho lamfhuw chaap nakhe vokhehkho lamrak chiirak chaapna sinana een aera, ka-eensung asipnii vakhae ing enuwchu henruw aera.
Ki ing naningna kariirnah, ki ing ka een mee vakhae aengkhe kabuw ka en isah phamahnii ae.”
Atii mee inempak aenche Jesu thohche isihak ae; amana Jesu ing eningting vaanlehka ariir,
“Achuw yngkheh ing kaningting huungkhang nakho ampa, amnuw, arumee, asiti ae, auw anae, asar ajuwr, vokhehkho atak ynvae ing kichu aning imansiihseh mahnave kasebok ynsuwhcheh mahnii.
Achuw yngkheh ing ataksah khros reenmah naka kaanuwchu jiinave, ama meechu kasebok ynsuwhcheh mahnii.
Akhaechuve nenuw nengkaarna achuw yngkheh ing yngkaangpak een tukata achiiraenche, amaensana havi achideh phanii ing aajaehmeh ruwhvate tanaka ihiihmah niikhang?
Amachumah nave, ama ing eenchu abur mangiir naka amanchichehmah raenche aamu mee vakhae aenche maniisa ae naka,
‘Mee havi inge itucha basenka manchicheh mahsa tavaatae.’

Iruwng yngkheh inche reentaang iruwng yngkheh thohche laar yntuk kata achii raenche, amathoh laar yntuk vachii mee inche mee lising somnii thoh ivathengchu ama ing mee lising suum thohche yntuwh chehva kate chehmahning ichiichu amaensana ongnaka kharmah niikhang?
Ama ing chehmah vachii vanave reentaang iruwng inche laar-khehna aonglae, chong aathak mee aechu vechiir naka ynchaarnii chong vamanriir vaata.
Amachu vaangche, achuw yngkheh nenuw nengkaar tanii mee ing adeensah aangkheng abathen chehmah mee inche kasebok ynsuwhcheh mahnii.”
“Bachii i sakna, changvakonchu bachii inche achiiniichu omah nave, athar vokheh amanchiinii omah.
Amachu ruwruw khaenakho, haar khaenakho yntanga ikanii omah; chukhaenache mee ing arennah. Isiinii aana ipaar mee chaap inche siisa rasiing.”
Amana Pharisi aere thiimthang aenche ichong basen aeka enriir, “Havana mee inge isii icher aethoh thaemin asahhakpa enchii.”
Chukhaenache Jesu ing eningna ynghuwnii thamin havi atong:
“Nenuw nengkaarna achuw mee yngkheh ing jao chaama adeen sungna yngkhehchu aamoh tahna paamfhuw nache somikuw arii eekuwchu manaka, ymmohchu atuwh mahtaang aajong simah vachii achuw omkhang?
Ama ing ymmohchu atuwhtah nache aangna arotha irohpak ing ahengadomsah.
Ama ing a-eenchu hungtungka, aarang arupae vokhehkho aveen-chaang aechu eenka eningna ariir, ‘Kajao ymmohchu katuwhsahpa. Inuw ynrotha manrohtaruw!’

Ki ing neningna kariirnah, havi vaange barungriir huungnii omah ichum mee ae somikuw arii eekuw kaarna isii icher mee yngkheh ing abarungriir ahuung khaena thangbaen nache athiseh ing rotha rohhak vaata.
“Vokhehkho seersaam suum adeen rupanuw yngkheh ing asae yngkheh aamoh tahna ama ing jaemi bareng naka, a-eensungchu ruwhpeh naka atuwhmahri raentaang jongmah niikhang?
Ama ing seersaam ymmoh-chu atuwhtah nache aarang arupae, aveenchaang aechu eenka ariir, ‘Kaseersaam ymmohchu katuwhsahpa. Inuw ynrotha manrohtaruw!’
Jinge ichii ing ki ing neningna kariirnah, isii icher mee yngkheh ing abarungriir ahuung khaenache Thangnang vaarmee ae enrotha rohna.”
Aanuwnache Jesu ing ariir, “Achuw mee yngkheh ing sapa ynnii-meh adeen;
asapa abutum inche ampa ningna apa, nang ing lerchii nadeen sungne ki ing phava kachii chaapchu atii kaningna ipira taka ariirpa. Chutahnache ampa inche lerchiichu asempeehpae.
Apha topoh aanuwtingche asapa butum inche alerchii chaapchu khuumka yndahpak paam yngkheh tingche sisa; amana adeensah lerchii vakhaechu abathang chirpa.
Ama ing abathangchir aanuw tingche, ama paam nache inempak isah hungtaangsa, chukhaenache ama asahfhuw hungommahsa.
Chukhaenache ama ing sika ama paam khuw mee yngkheh ningna ongsa; amana aongnii een aafhuw inche voh aechu cheernii khaena ruwrae ting achiirpa.
Amanache vohthen inche aven manva saningka ichii amandensah; changvakonchu achuw ingkho aningna yntangakho pimahsae.
Chukhaenache ama ing yndensaka anumsah ing ariirsah, ‘Ki kapa ing aneeh meenae changjaeh inem aengkhe ynriijor ing ensahnah, changvakonchu ki chuve havane venchaam chiilaar ing ongning!’
Ki hangiir ningka kapa ningting huung ningka, amana aningna jinge thamsatah kata, apa, ki ing thangbaen jeehnii ingka namaana isii katupa;
atiive ki nasapa ping ichii iriir matik chamahsing; naneeh meenae vaang itusara.
Chukhaenache ama ing hangiirka ampa ningtingche hungkaesa.
“Changvakonchu ihungkaechu laarkhehna ampa ing avemutah nache aning inempak avemansiihpa, amanche ampa inche vataenka aakorpa vokhehkho aabeeng atumpa.
Changlaenche asapa inche aningna ariir, ‘Apa, ki ing thangbaen jeehnii ingka vokhehkho namaana isii katupa; atii ki nasapa ping ichii iriir matik chasamah ing.’
Changvakonchu ampa ing ameenae ae ningna ariir, ‘Ithupak ing isaseh peendiir kha henchinuwna maniiruw; amanche kikchii akikna jemaniiruw vokhehkho khingop kha jemaniiruw;
amanche imarhak siirti kha henruwnuwna thehruw, inuw samanuwka nungaetaruw;
yng-khaena ynchii imbe kasapa havi ithii tanii athar hangringva; ymmoh vasah tanii katuwhva.’ Amana enuw rotha irohpak inche nungaesae.
“Apha ichiinache asapa upa inche ruwraena ong; ama ing ahungkaetahna eenchu ahenpha phana khuwng daar baringka iraam ae huwrusachu asiipa.
Amatah nache ama ing meenae yngkhehchu eenka amachu ynchii entuva taka asii?
Meenae inche aningna abasang, ‘Nang nanaepa kha hungtungsa, chukhaenache nangpa ing nanaepachu isii ikha omrudeh ing hungtung ing aphatah nache siirti imarhak yngkheh athehpeehva.’
Amatah nache abarung sikka sungting hungruwh ningka tamahsa. Amana ampa ing hungsuwhka asapa chu amaneempa,

changvakonchu ama ing ampa ningna abasang, Enla, kum aajaeh sungna rukuum katuvachii, changpang mahka ki ing nachongriir vakhae kamanjiimah omah; changkhang nare kaarang ae thoh rotha rohniihak khaena keerti yngkheh pangkho kaningna ipimah richii.
Changvakonchu hava nasapa inge ichuwhmah rupanuw ae thoh ynruwhakka alerchii chaap vakhae bathang chirka ahunganritah nache, nang ing akhaena siirti imarhakchu nathehpeehpa!
Ampa ing aningna ariir, kasapa, nang chuve kithoh anasiir onghak vamuw; amanche kaningna omchaap vakhae aangkheng i natachirva.
Chukhaenache rotharoh ing nungae raprap vaanchiiva, nanae havi ithii tanii hangring vaang atak i ymmoh vasahva, changvakonchu atiive yntuwhpa.’ ”
Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ariir, “Apha vokhehna savangpak mee yngkheh om. Ama ing alerchii rukuumtu mee yngkheh asiih; ama mee inche alerchii apeehchae amamaangpa ta aeka enrensahpa.

Amana savangpa inche atakchu eenka ariir, ‘ki ing natu nari nanong khaena chong kasii i ynchiiva? Nang ing nong natu nabaziih chaapkha ipira, nang athar vokheh kalerchii rukuumtu ynsuwh chehmah tanii.’

Amatah nache rukuumtu mee inche abarungriirna ariir, ‘Kaafhuw ing alerchii rukuumtu kapha pham havi kaningtanii riro achiinah, atii ki ynchii tuva kachiiva? Ki ing ruwruw phuhkata kachiipa pirmahsing, amanche niihkata kachii ingkho kaning ynjakreehsa.
Katak i lerchii rukuumtu pham tanii ynthur aanuwtingche mee ae ing engeen sungna ymmanruwhnii ae inche, ynchii tuva kachiiva ichiichu kamanghuwpa.’
Chukhaenache ama ing aafhuw alerchii atuur vakhae mee aechu a-eenpa. Ama ing maensa ningnache ariir, ‘Nang ing aafhuw i aajaehmeh natuursa?’
Ama ing abasang, ‘Marup nakhe chaama chakva.’ Ama ing aningna ariir, ‘Nang ing naseerpham ynziih niikha verinana ongla amanche ithupak ing songa jebaziihra.’
Aanuwnache reentaang yngkheh ningnache ariir, ‘Nangcha aajaeh natuursa?’ Ama ing abasang, ‘Gehu thuungfhuw chaama.’ Amana aningna ariir, ‘Aanziih niikha verinana somiriih baziihra.’
Amana ichummah rukuumtu inche iveerpak ing atu ari khaenache savangpa inche amanpah; akhaechuve ireng siti ae chungna laaruw paam mee ae inge entaksahsah suwnthar khaena athiseh ing veernae.”
Chukhaenache ki ing neningna kariirnah, ichummah lerchii thohche nataksah khaena naarang tusara, nachehmah raenche, enuw ing ichen naemah ongnii een nache ihebariimnii vaatae.
Chukhaenache achiihtina thachafhuwchu nong vakhae nakho ithachafhuwva, vokhehkho achiihtina ichummah meechu nong vakhaena chumchehmah.
Nenuw ing ichummah lerchiina thachafhuw omah tanuwve, achuw ing ichum lerchii nache ithacha vatakhang?
Chukhae-nache nenuw ing reentaang mee yngkheh lerchii nache thachafhuw omah chuwchu achuw ing nenta ynsuwhchu neningna ipiva takhang?
Seer engadikpak Pharisi ae ing Jesu achongjeer vakhaechu ensiitah nache, enuw ing Jesu taklina enerku thep aeka emaniisahpa.

Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Mee ae mik bareng nachembe nentaksah ing ichumpung ichii ing nemandennah, changvakonchu Thangnang ing nenbarungriir amang-huwsa; yngkhaena ynchii imbe mee ae kaarna ynding mee aechu Thangnang mik barengna yntirsuwh pakva.”
Changvakonchu vajeer chonghak achiihti ynthiir changve, thangbaen re laaruw paam imaang inche laehakna.”
“Apha vokhehna savangpa mee yngkheh om, ama ing amen iruwpak peendiir ynnarjaeh ing ynthongka anasiir rotharoh inungae ing ipaar.
Amana ahakchaang aangkheng ipaen, savangpa sakaar kungna ongchak sarapak Lazarus ichii pasar yngkhehkho om,
ama ing savangpa buw sahniina yntachu saningka kaven manva sakata achii, vokhehkho uti aengkho ahakchaang ipaenchu theng aeka abareehchak ae.”
Amana sarapak meechu thiksa amanche vaarmee aenche Abrahaam changbaen nache ongnii khaena enruwpa. Savangpa chukho thikka endimpa;
amanche atakchu longkong nache ijachaampak ing ongka paamkhuw ahenthiirtah nache, Abraham changbaen nache Lazarus ongchu laarkhehna ahemupa.

Chu-khaenache ama ing ahengeenpa, “Apa Abraham, ki naning imanchuwhsara, Lazarus akikchar ingkhe chiina fhuwmsana kabari amandaenii khaena ajenchiir peehsara; ki mi sungna ijachaam inempak kaphasahnah!
