Changvakonchu Abraham ing ariir, ‘Yndenla sapa, nang ing naringlae isa inungae aangkheng napha, amanche Lazarus ing isamah chaap apha; changvakonchu atii hane ama ing nungaechu aphapa, amanche nang chuve ijachaam naphanah.

Ama-chungna, havanennii ing naning ipha ingkhe iraen nungka achii aeng engaraenchehniimah khaena vokhehkho amatanii ingkhe kening ipha ing achuw ingkho aaraenchehniimah khaenache, nang re kenuw ynruwrakna ithuwhpak yngkuwng yngkheh ynlaapmahdeh ing omna.’
Savangpa inche ariir, ‘Chunuwvaniive apa Abraham, nang ing atak i kapa eenting ijenchiirnii khaena nangchu kathamsahnahchii,
akhaechuve kanae ae rungaemeh omnae, enuw vakhaechu havana ijachaamnii maphamne enghungruwhniimah khaena ijungriirpeeh rasiing.’ ”
Changvakonchu Abraham ing ariir, “Engkhaenache Mosi vokhehkho jaephar ae ongnae; enuw enchongriirchu rungae ae rasiing.
Vokhehkho ama ing ariir, ‘Changmahva apa Abraham, achuw yngkheh ithii vasah ae kaartanii ing eningting juwngnave, embarungriir huungvaatae.’
Ama ing aningna ariir, enuw ing Mosi vokhehkho jaephar ae chongchu thachamah ae nave, ithii ae kaartanii achuw yngkheh hangring naka enthachanii khaena ynneemsah rumahnii ae.”
Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ajeer, “Isii ting bukniichu suwhrem vaata; changvakonchu isii tingche buknii abasuw aningnache ijaniisapa!
Ama ing hava naepang ae ningne yngkhehchu isii ting babuwnii vachii changve, ariingna rungsum ynthinaka chifhuw ting iren inche akhaena saksehna.
Chukhaenache nenuw nentaksah ynriimruw; nenguw nenae mee yngkheh ing isii tunave ichahruw, amana abarungriirchu huungnave kuhpeehruw;
amanche nikhehna ama ing vasarii chak neningna isii tunaka, neningna vasariimeh vaanrinaka kabarungriir kahuungpa tanaka riirnave, kuhpeehva nenchiiva.”
Sebok aenche Jesu ningna enriir, “Kenuw kenthacha i imanpir peehsara!”

Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing enchaam muw thoh ynchim ing nenthacha omnave, nenuw ing leimachaak bur tinge, ‘Nataksah ing narajung ymphinana chifhuw tingse ymphinsara nenchiitahna nenriirchu manjiivaata.’

“Nenuw nengkaarna ruwrae amanriim achuw yngkheh mee ing changmahka jao acheer nemeenae inche ruwrae tanii ahungkae tahna ithupak ing huungnana amanche imaarnii nakhe ongla tanaka aningna riirvachii achuw omnachuw?
Ama changdenna aningna ki ing savakachii thoraang jetu, aanuwnache nang ing sapeh inpeh vanata tamah niikhang?
Ama ing meenae ningna chong ariirchu meenae inche amanjii khaena manpahmah niikhang?
Chu-khaenache amavaangche nenuw ing vajeer chonghak ympeeh vasah vakhaechu tuchirnuwna, ‘Kenuwve ikaniimah meenaepung; kenuw ing tuvakenchii chupang kentusah vatah taruw.’ ”
Jesu ing Jerusalem ting avakraenche, Samaria re Galili ruwrakna ivasi.
Amana Jesu ing khuwsung yngkheh nache avaruwhtah nache, ynchor ing ina ae pasar suum aechu yntuwhsae. Enuw ing laarkhehna ngiir aeka
vokhehkho va-uungsae, “Aafhuw Jesu! Kenuwchu naning imanchuwhsara envechii!”
Jesu ing enuwchu ajemutahna aeche eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing sinuwna nentaksah ing jaethiim ae ningna vandangruw.” Amana enuw ensinii baram ing manthiingsae.
Chu-tahnache enuw engkaar tanii mee yngkheh ing damsing ichii amanghuw tahna hangiirka iruur yndang ing Thangnang chu amanpahsahpa;
vokhehkho ama ing Jesu khiderna vakhupsaka amanpahsahpa. Atak ichuve Samaria meeva.
Amana Jesu ing aningna chong ariir, “Nenuw mee suummeh kamanthiingmah vachuwkhang? Mee eekuw ae chucha utingpae?
Marpah mee havimah naka Thangnang chu manpahnii khaena hunganri omahpae?”
Amana Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Hangiir nana yngkaera; nang nathacha ing ymmandampa.”
Pharisi topoh aeng Thangnang iruwngpaamchu utaraenkhe juwng-vachiiva ta aeka Jesu ningna ensii. Ama ing eningna abasang, “Thangnang iruwngpaam chuve yndang ing ijuwngmahva.
Achuw yngkheh ingkho enruw havane omna, changmahka amanase omna, tamahnii ae; akhaechuve Thangnang iruwngpaamchu neningna omna.”
Aanuwnache Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ariir, “Mee Sapa aaniichu nenuw ing munungka takhang ta-nuwre, muhehmahva nenchii aaniichu hungsuwh vaata.
Amanche mee aeng nening nache enruw, amanase omna, changmahka havane omna tavaatae. Changlaenche nenuw isikho simahruw, enganuwkho jiimah aeruw.
Akhaechuve tenlungpa ing denkhehna aanlehrup tahna denkheh tingkho ireng vaangkhe, Mee Sapa inche ama aanii nache changche tavaata.
Changvakonchu ama ing amaensana ijachaam aajaeh vokhehkho suwnthar havi inge arumahchu khaangvachii ting buksa.
Noah ing apaarlae isuwh vaangkhe, Mee Sapa aanii nachenkho suwhvaata.
Noah ing ruwkuwng sungting aruwhmahri raentaang vokhehkho chii iriim ing amamaangchir mahri ae raentaang rakhiinii kuurva iriim tu aeka ong ae.
Amathohche aanghakjaeh ing Lot ing apaar laenkho isuwh; amachuve enuw ing ensah, engin, engarii, enjuwr, saangbaar emphin, vokhehkho een tu aeka ong ae;
changvakonchu Lot ing Sodom tanii ahungsuwh inii nache thangbaen tanii mi inche enuw vakhaechu maangchirsae.
Mee Sapa inche aandang inii nache havithoh aanghakjaeh vaata.”
Lot rumee kha ynsiiruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing alaetha ikarnii khaena amanjong mee chuve maangvaata, changvakonchu alaetha khaena imaang acheh mee chuve karpeeh vaata.
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, ama jaen nache ijaarnii yngkhehna meenii jaarvaatae; yngkhehchu ruwvaata, amanche yngkhehchu mavaata.
Rupanuw meenii ing haachang sukvaatae; yngkhehchu ruwvaata, amanche yngkhehchu mavaata.”
(Ruwraena meenii ongvaatae; yngkhehchu ruwvaata, amanche yngkhehchu mavaata.)
Amana enuw ing Jesu ningna enriir, “Aafhuw, unava?” Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ithii sha omnii nache laangta yngkong vaatae.”
Jesu ing asebok aechu anasiir nache ithamsahna vokhehkho enrutha asikniimah khaena ynghuwnii thamin ing eningna ichong.
Ama ing ariir, “Khuwruung yngkhehna Thangnang achiimah vokhehkho mee aajamah vajeer itumee yngkheh om.
Amanche ama khuwruung sungnache muwkhuwnuw yngkheh om, ama inche aningna anasiir vakka ariir, ‘Ki eejeehnii mee takline huw iripeehra taka athamsah.’
Ama ing apha topoh sungna chembe adapheh; changvakonchu aanuwnache abarungriirna mandenka ariir, ‘Ki ing Thangnang chu chiimah ingka vokhehkho mee aechu ijamah khang ae ningkho,
muwkhuwnuw havi inge anasiirna kaning amanghar khaene, ki ing ahuwchu ripeehtah kata achii-pa!’ ”
Amana Aafhuw ing ariir, “Ichum-mah ing vajeer aatu ing ynchii ariirse ichiichu siiruw.
Atii Thangnang ningtingche siim jaen aateer vasah amee aechu ibompeehnii khaenache achuw yngkheh ing henthamsa nave, vajeer tupeehmah niikhang? Ama ing ibompeehnii khaenache manthirva takhang?
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, Aafhuw inche engkhaena ithupak ing huwchu ripeeh vaatae. Changvakonchu Mee Sapa inche ajungthenglaenche laaruw paamne athacha om mee tuwhcheh vaate?”
Jesu ing entaksah chupang ichumpung ta aeka amanche reentaang vakhae mee chuve enrathiih mee ae ningna havana ynghuwnii thamin ikho atong:
“Mee ynniimeh aeng ithamnii khaena rumniieen nache itheng ae, yngkheh chuve Pharisi meeva amanche yngkheh chuve ree ikhuum meeva.

Pharisi inche ngiirka athamsah, ‘O Thangnang, inempak kamanpah sahnahchii, ki chuve ikaam, ichummah vokhehkho reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah atu mee ae khavaang tamah ing, amanche havana ree ikhuum mee ithohkho aanghakmah ing achii.
Ki chuve niisin yngkheh sungna voniimeh maaru katongnah, amanche ki ing kaphasah peehchae aangkheng sungna suumna yngkheh kapeehnah.’ ”
Changvakonchu ree ikhuum mee inche yndah ing ngiirka thangbaen yntongting rapkho amik hengenchehru ing abarung ichumka athamsah, “O Thangnang, isii icher ki naning imanchuwhsara achii!

Ki ing neningna kariirnah, Pharisi mee khamahva, ree ikhuum mee inge Thangnang maana ichum inche yngkaesa. Yngkhaena ynchii imbe ataksahchu ynruungsah mee inche ynjuursa vaata amanche ataksahchu ynjuursah mee chuve manruung vaata.”
Jesu ing naepang aechu akik ing aparnii khaena mee topoh aeng aningna enveruwpa; amana asebok aeng emutah nache enuwchu enrakuhpae.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing naepang aechu een aeka ariir, “Naepang aekha khaammah aeruw; kaningting huung ae rasiing; Thangnang iruwngpaamchu enuw hangchii ae inge phavachiipae.
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, havana naepang ae vaange ichii ing Thangnang Iruwngpaam aaraang chehmah achuw yngkheh mee inche amanache supruwh ruwhcheh mahnii.”
Aanuwdeh nache achuw yngkheh Jehudi ae iruung inche Jesu ningna chong asii, “Isapak oja, ki ing ynchii tuningka ichen naemah iringnii phava kachiiva?”
Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Nang ing kichu ynchii khaena isapak oja ynchii vachii?” Thangnang mahnaka achuwkho isa omah.
“Reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah tumah, mee thehmah, barukmah, ichummah khaena ngiirmah, nangnuw nangpa ijaara, ichii havana chonghak vakhae i namanghuwsa.”
Ama ing abasang, “Hava vakhae i kanaepangna basen ingka kamanjii vasahva.”

Jesu ing ama chongchu asiitah nache aningna ariir, “Yngkheh pangti namanvaehsa. Nang ing nadeensah vakhae juwrnana sara naeriing ae ningna piaera, amanache thangbaenna nalerchii omvaata; huung, kaanuw ijiira.”
Changvakonchu ama ing Jesu chongchu asiitah nache abarungriir inempak jasa, yngkhaena ynchii imbe atak savang meesa.
Jesu ing ijachu amanghuwtah nache ariir, “Savang mee aenge thangbaen iruwngpaam nache hungruwhva enchii aajaehmeh iruwvani!
Akhaechuve savang mee ing Thangnang iruwngpaam nache varuwhva enchii chuve, siirchar ing simphuw khurna iruwh inche athiseh ing laehakna.”
Ama chongchu aasii vakhae mee aenche enriir, “Changmaniicha achuw ing ikarpeehchu phacheh vachiiva?”
Jesu ing ariir, “Mee ae ningna rumah vachiichu, Thangnang ningna chembe arusa.”
Aanuwnache Pitar ing ariir, “Enla, kenuw vakhae ing kengeen kenruw bathenchir ungka naanuwchu kenjiiva.”
Jesu ing chumna taka eningna ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, Thangnang iruwngpaam khaena a-een aruw, arumee, auw anae, ampa amnuw, asiti ae abathen meechu,
atarae nenkho aphafhuw inempak omna, changpang mahka hungvi vachii suwnthar nakho ichen naemah iringniichu phavaata.”
Havi aanuwna Jesu ing asebok suum ariinii aechu ruwka eningna ariir, “Enruw, inuw Jerusalem phanii ing hungsimanuw, Thangnang jaephar aeng embaziih aangkhenglaang Mee Sapa ningnache suwhchir vaata.
Atakchu reentaang mee ae ningting pivaatae, maniisa vaatae, ningjak pivaatae vokhehkho ataklina bachir vaatae;
enuw ing ithipak ing manvar ae naka thehvaatae; amana inii avomanthumnii tahnache ama hangring vaata.”
Changvakonchu asebok aenche hava vakhae khaene yntanga manghuwmahsae; akhaechuve emang-huwniimah khaenache athuurpa, vokhehkho ynchii ariirniiva ichiichu enuw ing manghuw mahsae.
Jesu ing Jeriko avephapha nache, aniihmee mikchu yngkheh inche lamfhuw kuurna heongsa;
amana mee inempak ing ivasi huwruwsachu asiitah nache, havi ynchii isuwhva taka mee asiipa.
Mee aenche aningna Nazaret Jesu vasina enchii.
Amatah nache ama ing uungka athamsah, “Devit sapa, Jesu, ki naning imanchuwhsara!”
Amana maen ynsa mee aenche nahuw tumahra ta eka enrakuh. Changvakonchu ama ing vanuh vanuh uungka athamsah, “Devit sapa, ki naning imanchuwhsara!”
Amatah nache Jesu ing ngiirka kaningting atakkha henruwruw achii. Ama ing huungka ahenganeeng tah-nache, Jesu ing aningna asii,
“Ki ing nakhaena ynchii itupeeh naadikva?”
Ama ing abasang, “Oja, kamik imu phasaning kachiisahnah.”
Jesu ing ariir, “Namik imuchu phasara; nang nathacha inche damsa-chii.”
Anikung narapche imu achehpa, amanche Jesu aanuwchu jiika Thangnang chu amanpahsahpa; mee vakhae inche emutah nache Thangnang amanpahsah ae.
Jesu ing Jeriko hungruwhka vasisa.
Amana Zakius ichii aanchung ree ikhuum mee yngkheh inempak savang heong.
Ama ing Jesu chu achuwva ichiichu muningka takhang nakho meechu anempak tahnache imu chehmahsa, akhaechuve atak tomsa.
Chukhaenache ama ing maensok ting hetaenka Jesu chu imunii khaena haepong vaangkar ritingche hangkarsa, akhaechuve Jesu ing ama yntong tingche hungsisa.
Jesu ing ama ruvaechu ahenpha tahnache hengenka aningna ariir, “Zakius ithupak ing nang jungchumla, ki atanii na-een sungna tungva kata.”
Chukhaenache ama ing ithupak ing jungchumka vokhehkho Jesu chu arutha irohpak ing abariimsahpa.
Amachu mee ae ing emutahna yngkheh yngkheh chong aeka, “Ama ing isii icher een sungting ruwhsa ta aeka enriirpa.”

Amana Zakius ing hangiirka Jesu ningnache ariir, “Enla, oja, ki ing kadeensah vakhaechu achimbang sara naeriing ae ningting kapeehnah, changpang mahka ki ing achuw yngkheh peeh ichummah ing riningve, sarup manrii aningting kabaripeeh chaknah.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Atanii hava een sungne manlaenpeeh iringniichu thengsa, akhaechuve ama ikho Abraham sapa va.
Mee Sapa inche ymmoh vasah aechu ijongnii khaena vokhehkho ikarpeehnii khaenache thengsa.”

Hava chong vakhae i enrungae raenche, Jesu ing reentaang ynghuwnii thamin ing eningna ichong. Atii ama ing Jerusalem chu aveneengpa, amana enuw ing Thangnang iruwngpaamchu yndanglo achiinah ichii ing emandenpa.
Chukhaenache Jesu ing ariir, “Ynchungseh mee yngkheh inche ataksah khaena iruwngpaam yngkheh phanaka ahunganrinii inche yndahpak paam yngkheh tingche sisa.
Ama ing asiphana ameenae suum aechu eenka amanche eningna mina suum ter piaeka ariir, ‘Ki ing kahunganrimahri raentaang havi inge lerchii hetaar-niiruw.’
Changvakonchu ama aaruwngpaam mee ae inchembe har aeka, vokhehkho chong apeeh meechu aningting vechiir aeka enriir, ‘Hava mee inge kengaruwng viva chiichu idikmah ung.’ ”
“Ama ing iruwng phamchu phaaka hunganrisa. Amana aajaeh entaarse ichiichu manghuw ningka achii khaena meenae aechu amanthangpa.
Amaensa meenae inche vathengka ariir, ‘Aafhuw, nang ing ympeehchii mina yngkheh ingkhe mina suum kataarniisa.’
‘Isapak meenae, inempak sakna! Nang achiihtina thachafhuw vachii khaka, khuwruung suum taklina aafhuw ynsuwhra.’
Aanuwnache avomaniinii inche vathengka ariir, ‘Aafhuw, nang ing ympeehchii mina yngkheh ingkhe mina runga kataarniisa.’
Havi ningnenkho ama ing ariir, ‘Nangkho khuwruung runga aafhuw ynsuwhra.’ ”
“Athar yngkheh inche vathengka ariir, ‘Aafhuw, nang ing ympeehchii mina kha havane omna; ki ing irompang ingka kasiihsah jaehva.
Nang i ki ing inempak kachiisah vachii, akhaechuve barungriir ikha mee vachii, nang ing nasiihmah peeh chukho narinah amanche nang ing navormah chukho nakuumnah.’

Ama ing aningna ariir, ‘Isamah meenae, nang naner nakhe ki ing vajeer tuvakachii. Ki chuve barungriir ikha mee ping, ki ing kasiihmah peehchu karinah, amanche kavor mahchu kakuumnah ichiichu namanghuwsa.
Changmaniicha nang ing kaseer kha ynchii khaena seerthi aomnii nache nasiihmahva chang? Amanache siitaniive, ki ing kathengraenne seerthi thohche kaangkaeraenche reenva kachiichu!’
Aanuwnache abuumna ingiir ae ningnache ariir, ‘Aningtanii mina kha rinuwna mina suum adeen mee ningnakhe piruw.’
Changvakonchu enuw ing aningna enriir, ‘Aafhuw, amave mina suum adeensa!’
‘Ki ing neningna kariirnah, adeen mee vakhae ningnache pivakata, vokhehkho adeenmah ningna khenkho adeensah topohchu ripeehva kata.
Atii entaklina iruwng ivi enrumah ae enuwkha havane henruw ae nuwna kamaane theh aeruw.’ ”
Hava chong i ariir inuwna, Jesu ing Jerusalem ting sivachii khaena maen henginsasa.
Ama ing Oleep Bungna om Betphage re Bethani avephaphana Jesu ing asebok meeniimeh maen ing hemansika ariir,
“Nemaana heom khuw tingse nenuw ing hesiruw; nenuw ing nenvaruwhnii nache achuw ingkho aongnii mahri lola ati yngkheh yngkhiih muvanenta; amachu bajoh nuwna henruwruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing yngkhaena nenbajohva itanave, Aafhuw ing kaaniivachii yngkheh omna tanuwna basangruw.”
Chukhaenache Jesu ing ariir inuwzii inche achiir mee aenche siaeka envatuwhpa.
Enuw ing lola atichu embajoh raenche, aafhuw aenche eningna ariir ae, “Nenuw ing havana lola ati ichu ynchii khaena nenbajohva?”
“Aafhuw ing kaaniivachii omna ta aeka embasang,
Enuw ing bajoh aeka Jesu ningting enghenruwpa.” Amana enuw ing lola taklinache enpeen tha aeka Jesu chu amangongpae.
Ama ing ongniika avasiraenche, mee ae ing lam nache enpeenchu enghenthapa.

Jesu inche vasika Jerusalem avephaphana Oleep Bung tanii ajung-chum raenche, aanuw aajii asebok mee inempak aenche iruungpak nong aajaeh atuchu emu khaena Thangnang chu rotha rohroh ing ympah emba-senpa:
“Aafhuw rumingna itheng iruwngchu Thangnang ing bor apeeh ynsuwhrasiing! Thangbaen nache idae om ynsuwhrasiing amanche yngkaangseh ing thangbaen nache ympahchu ynsuwhrasiing!”
Mee changjaeh inem kaarnache Pharisi topoh aenche Jesu ningna hangchong aeka enriir, “Oja, nang nasebok ae i rukuh aera.”
Jesu ing abasang ae, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, enuw vakhae inge enhuw mandaekhang ae nare, rung ae inge uung vaatae.”
Jesu ing Jerusalem aveneengtah nache, khuwruungchu vemuka akhae-nache chapka ariir,
“Nang ing atanii iniine idae nong i manghuw taniive ni! Changvakonchu atiive namik ing muchehmah sachii!
Nataklina apha thengvaata, nang eejeehnii aeng rupar tuae naka, amanche irakuwr ae naka arakiing manriina nalam thing vaatae;

amanche natakkho, nasiti aekho laruw imanvarnii vaatae, changpang mahka naongnii sungna rung yngkheh ensiih taklina athar ynsiihmahnii, akhaechuve Thangnang ing ikarpeehnii khaena ithengchu natak ing manghuwmah sachii.”
Havi aanuwna Jesu ing rumniieen tingche varuwhka peeh ajuwr ae vakhaechu ithur basenka eningna ariir,
“Havi ynziihka om vasahva, ki ka-eenchu ithamnii een vachiiva, amachu nenuw ing lamruw ae kuw nemanguurpa.”
changvakonchu enuw ing ynchiikho tuwhchehmah ae, akhaechuve mee vakhae ing Jesu athaminchu ynlehchak ing enrungaepa.
Inii nikhehna Jesu ing rumniieen nache mee aechu manchuwka isa chong atonglae, aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang aenche upa ae thoh Jesu ningna vatheng aeka
aningna enriir, “Keningna riirla, nang ynchii aatuaricheh ing hava vakhae i natuva? Achuw ing nangchu havana aatuaricheh i ympeehva?”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Ki ingkho neningna chong yngkheh siikachuw; kaningna riirruw,
Johon ing baptais atukha thangbaen taniiva changmahka meening taniiva?”
Enuw enareersahna inuw ing ynchii riirtaruw ynta aeka enriir, “Inuw ing thangbaen taniiva tamanuwve, ama ing tavaata, chunuwcha nenuw ing yngkhaena nenthacha mahva?
Changvakonchu inuw ing meening taniiva tamanuwve, mee vakhae inge rung ing ideeng vaatae; akhaechuve enuw ing Johon chu Thangnang tanii jaephar meeva ta aeka enthacha.”
Chukhaenache enuw ing utaniiva manghumah ung ta aeka embasang.
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ynchii aatuaricheh inche hava vakhae i katuva ichiichu ki ingkho neningna riirmahning.”
Jesu ing mee vakhaenache yng-huwnii thamin ing ichong abasenpa: “Pasar yngkheh ing vomrip bir yngkheh tuka ama ing mee ae ningnache saarka reentaang paam yngkheh ting apha iseehpak ing sisa.”
Aphachu ahenpha tahnache, asaar mee ae ningtanii vomrip aanlachu iphanii khaena ameenae yngkhehchu eningting ajechiirpa; changvakonchu asaar mee aenche atakchu hebin aeka aruwhnaen ing emangkaepa.
Chu-khaenache ama ing athar reentaang meenae yngkhehchu ajechiir pareeh; ama chukho enuw ing hebin aeka vokhehkho ningjak piaeka aruwhnaen ing emangkaepa.
Aanuwnache ama ing avomanthumnii meenaechu athar ajechiirpa, ama chukho enuw ing mansuh aeka arenpae.
Chu-khaenache vomrip bir aatupa inche ariir, “Ki ing ynchii tuva kachiiva? Ki ing kasapa kaning kamansiihpak i chiirtah kata; amana chembe enuw ing kichu eeja aekho arusa.”

Changvakonchu asaar mee aenche atakchu emutah nache yngkheh yngkheh chong manseer aeka enriir, “Haviva ruw kuumvachii meechu; inuw ing atak i thehtaruw, amana chembe ama ing ruw kuumva chiichu ynta ynsuwh vaata.
Amatah nache enuw ing atakchu vomrip bir tanii taangting kiaeka enthehpa. Chukhaenache vomrip bir aafhuw inche entaklina ynchii tuvaata?”
“Ama ing thengnaka asaar mee aechu mamaangchir vaatae, amana vomrip birchu reentaang ae ningting pivaata.” Amachu mee aenche ensiitah nache, enuw ing enriir, Changche suwhremmah rasii!
Amana Jesu ing enuwchu enka ariir, “Changvaniive ynziihka om icha ynchiiva:
‘Een itu aeng enrimah rung amachurap inche athurfhuwrungchu ynsuwhsa?’
Hava rung takline ynruum mee vakhaechu arehkheh kheh ing kiivaata, changvakonchu hava rung inge ataklina ibuw mee chuve pirkhuwh vaangkhe jimvaata.”

Apha changlaen siimche thiim-thang aere aanchung jaethiim aenche Jesu chu akik narap bachuw nungka suwrkenta ta aeka emanjong, changvakonchu enuw ing mee aechu enchiipa; akhaechuve Jesu ing entaklina ynghuwnii thamin ariirchu enuw ing emanghuwpa.
Chukhae-nache enuw ing Jesu chu chuwm aeka achong nache suwrnungka aatuaricheh lipah aapuh ningting vokhehkho vajeer atu iruwng ningna ipeehnii khaenache, ichum asa ae chong aathak aechu embathenpa.

Chong aathak mee aenche Jesu ningna ensii, “Oja, nang ing ichum ing chongsiika ymmanchuw sachii vokhehkho adongchang kho tumahchii, changvakonchu Thangnang lam ichumchu atatak ing ynriirpeeh sachii ichii kenuw ing kemanghuwsa.
Kesar ting ree ipeeh inge vajeer kiine kiimah?”
Changvakonchu enuw ing Jesu ningna losing ynlak aechu ama ing manghuwka eningna ariir,
“Kaningna dinari yngkheh imansiiruw. Havane achuw rusae re ruming omna?” Enuw ing Kesar ta aeka embasang.
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Changva-niive, Kesar ta ynsuwhchu Kesar ting piruw, amanche Thangnang ta ynsuwhchu Thangnang ting piruw.”
Mee changjaeh maana Jesu achong nache isuwr chehmahsae; akhaechuve enchong abasang nache enruwriimka huwdaejaeh ing ongsae.
“Oja, Mosi ing kengkhaena ymbaziih peehsa, amachuve achuw yngkheh mee ing lunghah buwhnaka siti baringru ing thiknave, athar ama anaepa ing rupanuwchu buwhnaka aipa khaena siti deenva chiiva achiisa.
Atii apha vokhehna unae sarii om ae; upa inche lunghah buwhka siti deenru ing thiksa,
avomaniinii inchenkho, avomanthumnii inchenkho rupanuwchu abuwhpa;
enuw sarii aenche siti deenrudeh ing thikchirsae,
amanche akuurchiimna rupanuw chukho thiksa.
Atii changvaniive nuwting enghangring raenche achuw rumee ynsuwh vachiiva? Akhaechuve pasar mee sarii aenge embuwhpa.”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Rakhii inii ive laaruw paamne iring mee ae khaena vatah,
changvakonchu ithii tanii hangringva enchii matik icha aenche thangbaen ting engkar raenche, enuw ing amanache rakhii inii chaechang tumah ae.
Enuw athar thikchehmah ae; akhaechuve enuw vaarmee ae thoh aanghaksae vokhehkho Thangnang siti ynsuwhsae, yngkhaena ynchii imbe enuw ithii tanii hangringsae.
Mosi ingkho ithii ae hangringnae ichiichu ama ing lampa thing iphangna mi ichuwh thamin nakhe ama ing Aafhuw chu Abraham Thangnang vokhehkho Isak Thangnang amanche Jakop Thangnang taka amandangpa.
Chukhaenache atak i ithii ae Thangnang mahva, changvakonchu iring Thangnang va; akhaechuve aningnache aangkhenglaang ringna.”
Amana thiimthang topoh aeng ihangchong ae, “Oja, isapak ing nariirsa!”
Akhaechuve enuw ing athar vokheh aningna chong siicheh mahsae.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Khrista chu Devit sapa ta aeka enuw ing ynsaangkhe ariirpae?
Havi yngkhaenava ynchii imbe Devit atakrap ing ympahnii ynthiing la thiimziihna ariirsa,
‘Aafhuw ing ki kaafhuw ningna ariir:
Nang eejeehnii aechu nakhi chuwngnii kabasuwmahri ae raentaang katachangne ongla.’
Devit ing Aafhuw taka a-eensa, amachu ynsaangkhe asapa vachiiva?”
Mee vakhae ing aningna enrungae raenche Jesu ing asebok ae ningna ariir,
“Thiimthang ae ynsuwr peen niiaeka ynlen nungka enchii, amanche mee inem aangkongniina mee ing salaam itu, amanche meekongnii chaapna vokhehkho kuurvana ongnii isaseh nache ong engadik ae,
muwkhuwnuw ae een ensiih ae, amanche apha iseehpak ing enthamsah vaang entu enuw tanii nenuw ynriimsaruw. Enuw inge iruungseh miraar phavaatae.”
Jesu ing rumniieen nache kikthuur enthachu a-entah nache savang aeng enthachu amupa;
amanche sarapak muwkhuwnuw ing pesa ynniimeh atha chukho ama ing amupa.
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Atatak ing kariirva, havana muwkhuwnuw inge enuw vakhae chungna inemseh athasa;
Reentaang vakhae aeng endeenpoh ing enthasa, changvakonchu hava muwkhuwnuw sarapak inge adeensah aringnii topohtichu athadehpa.”
Mee topoh aenche isapak rung vokhehkho Thangnang ting kikthuur empeeh havi yngentahna aajaehmeh isava ta aeka rumniieen khaena enchong tahnache, Jesu ing eningna ariir,
“Nenuw ing nemu vakhae havi maangchir vachii apha inii nikhehna thengvaata; changlaenche rung yngkheh taklina yngkheh ing deengru ing kiimah vachii yntanga omahnii.”
Enuw ing Jesu ningna ensii, “Oja, ama changchiichu utaraenkhe suwhva chiiva? Vokhehkho ama vakhaechu ahungsuwh phanache ynchii buwtinnii ombaate?”

Jesu ing ariir, “Nenuw aasiirting mee aeng ynruwniimah ing ynriimruw; akhaechuve ki Khrista ping, aphachu ynneengsa ta ae naka mee aajaeh ing karumingna hungsuwh vaatae. Nenuw ing enganuwchu jiimahdeh aeruw.
Nenuw ing laar yntuk vokhehkho laarsa isuwh nensii tahna ynchik-mah dehruw; hava vakhae chaap i amaensana suwhvaata, changvakonchu achiniirem chuve ama apha sungnache suwhmahnii.”
Changlaenche Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Paam yngkheh re paam yngkheh ynna vaatae, iruwng lipah yngkheh re yngkheh ynrumahnii ae.
Ipirpak linglaang vokhehkho reentaang apham aajaehna venchaam chiilaar, reentaang laena aajaeh suwhvaata; vokhehkho ichiisuwh amanche minvaen tanii iruungpak ruwriimnii aajaeh yndang vaata.

Changvakonchu hava vakhae i asuwhmahri raenche enuw ing nengkikna ibachuw aenaka imanang vaatae; enuw ing nenuwchu meekongnii eenting vokhehkho kaeshum sungting ithin ae naka kakhaena iruwng ae, vokhehkho lipah aapuh ae maana nenuwchu ihenruw vaatae.
Havi ki kasaarkhii ipeehnii khaena nentaklina suwhvaata.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing ynchii basangva kente tanuwna amaensana nenbarungriir sungna kharmanung tanuwna mangiirruw,
nenuw nentaklina eejeehnii aeng ichong chehmahva enchii nenerna iveernii ki ing jepiva kachuw.
Nenpa nenuw aeng amanche nenguw nenae vokhehkho nensungkhur amanche nengarang ae rap ingkho irensa vaatae; havipang mahka achuw yngkheh chuve ithii imanpha vaatae.
Mee vakhae ing nenuwchu ki karuming khaenache ibatir vaatae.
Changvakonchu nenuw nenrusae sam asae yngkheh pangkho maangmahnii.
Nenuw ing ikhaang nencheh ingkhe nentaksah iring phava nenta.”
“Nenuw ing Jerusalem chu laarchang aeng enruwkuwr nemu-raenche hungmaang vachiichu hunganeengsa ichii manghuwruw.

Changlaenche Judia sungna ong vakhae aeng bung ting taen ae rasiing, amanche khuwruung sungna ong mee aenche hungsuwh ae rasiing, vokhehkho khuw sungna ongchaap aenche khuwruung tingche hungruwhmah ae rasiing;
akhae-chuve ynziih chaapchu asuwhchirnii khaena huwrinii iniichu vaata.
Changlaenche miknii ae, naereen ae, naeri atua chuve apha ichiinache aajaehmeh ijaniivate! Laaruw paam nache ijaniipak vokhehkho mee ae taklinache barungsii thengvaata.

Mee topoh chuve laarchem yngeepak taklina bukvaatae, amanche areh chuve suwr ae naka paam vakhaechaap nache ruwvaatae; amanche reentaang mee aenche enganiichu achimahri raentaangche Jerusalem chu engkhi chuwngnii ing tuvaatae.”
Suwhvachii amachu laaruw paam mee ing ahahtahna ynchik ae naka murvaatae; akhaechuve minvaen ruwreng chaapchu manuh vaata.
Aphanache Mee Sapa inche aruwreng vokhehkho alaar isa thohche ruwrduhna ijuwngchu enuw inche muvaatae.
Hava vakhae i isuwh ahenbasen raenche nenrusae mangen nuwna hengenruw, nenuw ijungruw vachiichu junganeengsa.”
Changlaenche Jesu ing havana ynghuwnii thamin i ariir: “Thachang bur re thingbur chaap ae i enjaehtahruw.
Enuw inge ana iduung hangsuwm basen ae nave, atii saartha hungvisa ichii nentaksah ing nemanghuwsa.
Amavaange nenuw ing hava vakhae i nemuraenche, Thangnang iruwngpaam junganeengsa ichii manghuwruw.
Atatak ing kariirnah, hava vakhae i ahungandang mahri raentaang havana suwnthar i maangmah dehnii.
Thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paam ichuve maangvaata, changvakonchu ki kachongsae chuve utaraenkho maangmahnii.”

“Nenuw isahnii innii ing, juw ynruw ing vokhehkho hava suwnthar ringkum inge nenbarungriir amanja-niimah ing changmahka ama inii inche chaangna uvaang, nentaklina manghuw mangharu ing abukniimah ing nenuw nentaksah ynriimsaruw;
Ama inii nache laaruw paamna ong mee vakhae taklina thengvaata.
Chukhaenache suwhvachii vakhae tanii nensuwhchehnii ing, amanche Mee Sapa maanache ingiir nenchehnii khaena apha vakhaena hahjaehruw vokhehkho thamsaruw.”
Jesu achongchu mee ae inche rungae nungka enchii khaena imaen ing aziing siir aningting ithengchak ae.
Atii chor ynvaemah manlaennii kuurva thaemin isahnii aphachu hunganeengsa.
Amana aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang aenche Jesu chu ynsaangkhe thehchehva kenchiiva ta aeka ynruwhjaeh ing emanjongpa; akhaechuve enuw ing mee aechu enchiipa.
Sebok suum ariinii sungna ynvae aruming Judas Iskariot ningnache umlae chuwngsa.
Chutahnache ama ing sika aanchung jaethiim aere rumniieen aarung iruung ae thohche Jesu chu ynsaangkhe eningna pivachiiva ichii khaena chong eman-seerpa.
Enuw ing enrotha rohka aningna seer ipeehnii khaenache enchong reepsa.
Chukhaenache ama ingkho ruka mee ing amanghuwnii mahdeh ing Jesu chu eningna ipeehnii khaena apha ichachu amanjongpa.
Atii chor ynvaemah thaemin isahnii aanii nache manlaennii kuurvana jaoti yntheh vachii aaniichu ahenphapa.
Chukhaenache Jesu ing Pitar re Johon chiirka ariir, “Inuw ing manlaennii thaemin sanii vaanchii aphamchu thoraang vaturuw.”
Amana enuw ing enriir, “Kenuw ing unakhe thoraang ituchu nang ing naadikva?”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Enruw, nenuw ing khuwruung na nenju-ruwhrae mee yngkheh ing chiiphur idomnaka eentuwhfhuw vaata; atakchu jiinuwna aruwhnii eennache varuwhruw.
Amana eensung aafhuw ningnache nenuw ing taruw, ‘Jesu ing naningna kasebok aethoh manlaennii ningsiih thaemin saniiva kenchii aphamchu unakhenva tanuwna siiruw?’
Amanache chungting iruungpak ongnii yngkhehna thoraang yntuvasah ama ing imansiivaata; amanache thoraangchu turuw.”
Enuw ing siaeka Jesu ing ariir inuwzii ing vatuwh aeka, amanache manlaennii ningsiih thaemin isahnii-chu thoraang entupa.
Aphachu ahenpha tahnache, Jesu ing achongthang ae thohche isahnii nache ongsa.
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Ki ing ijachaam kaphamah rirae manlaennii ningsiih thaemin havi nenuw thoh isahhak kadikva.
Thangnang iruwngpaamchu ma-pung aphamahri raentaang, ki ing utaraenkho havi samahning ta ingka neningna kariirnah.
Aanuwnache Jesu ing vomrip chiichu ithohka ariir, havi verinuwna ynsemruw.
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, Thangnang iruwngpaam athengmahri raentaang, atanii basen naka ki ing vomrip chii havi inmahning.”
Amana Jesu ing tarchu verika amanpah aanuwnache bakhiika eningnache jepika ariir, “Havi neng-khaena kapeehchuw kashava. Ki yndennii khaena havi turuw.”
Enuw ing ensah aanuwnache aanghakjaeh ing vomrip chiichu verika ariir, “Hava vomrip chii i nengkhaena ynta kasii ing kahak ithar chongiirva.”
“Changvakonchu enruw, kichu irensavachii meechu kithoh isahniina onghaknung.
Amaenna ajeer vasah laepah inuwzii ing Mee Sapa inche ma ataarnah; changvakonchu ynrensah mee ichuve aningna ijaniisapa!”
Amana enuw ing entaksah sungna achuw ing ama nongchu tuvachiiva ynta aeka ynsiisae.
Amatah nache Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Reentaang mee iruwng aeng emee ae taklina aafhuw ynsuwhnii nong entunah; amanche aatuaricheh aechu mee ae khaena isa nong itu mee ae ta aeka engkhiingnah.
Changvakonchu nenuw chuve amachu vaangche tamahchuw; nenuw nengkaarna ruungseh vachii inche naepang vaang ynjuursa vachiiva, vokhehkho aapuh inche meenae ynsuwh vachiiva.
Achuw inche iruungsehva, isahniina ong chuva? changmahka rukuum atu mee chuva? Isahniina ongchumah vakhang? Chukhaenache ki chuve nengkaarna rukuum itu mee thoh aanghak ing omning.”
“Nenuw chuve kichu chaang yngen vakhaena kithoh onghakchu vachuw;
Kapa ing kaningna iruwngpaam yngkheh ympeehvaang, nenuw chukho ki ing pivakachuw.
Nenuw ing karuwngpaam nache isahhak inhaknii khaena iruwngpham ongnii chaap nache ongtanuwka amanche Isrel sungkhur suum ariinii aechu vajeer tuvanenta.”
“Simon, Simon, enla, gehu re akoh ynteerka yngkhaevaang nenuwchu umlae ing ynniihnah.
Changvakonchu Simon, nang nathacha achenniimah khaena nakhaena ki ing kathamnah, amanche nang ing nabarungriir athar nahuung raenche nang ing nauw nanae aechu embarungriir manpirpeehva nachiipae.”
Pitar ing abasang, “Aafhuw, ki chuve nangthoh kaeshum sungna onghaknii vokhehkho ithiihaknii khaenakho ynthong chirsing.”
Jesu ing ariir, “Pitar, ki ing naningna kariirnah, nang ing ki i manghuwmah ing tataniika vathum-chak nariirmahri raentaang atanii jaen aarkhuung ing khuwngmahnii.”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Changvakonchu atiive seerthuung adeen mee inche chirasiing, amanche thuungfhuw chukho chirasiing. Amana yntanga adeenmah mee inche apeen juwrsana laarchem iriirasiing.
Ki ing neningna kariirnah, isii icher mee ae kaarnache ama ynvaesa taka ynziihchu kataklina suwhva chiiting buksa.”
Enuw ing enriir, “Enla Aafhuw, laarchem ynniimeh omna.” Jesu ing ariir, “Ama ingkhe ynsuwh chaksa.”
Jesu ing hungsuwhka anunu ing atuchak vaang Oleep Bung tingche vaksa, amana asebok aeng aanuw ajii ae.
Ama ing ama minnahce avatung tahnache eningna ariir, “Nenuw batheem ting nenbukniimah ing thamsaruw.”
Amana rung ing kung ideengthoh ynchimvak yndahpakmah ing Jesu ing enuwthoh ynsaeka athamsahpa,
“Apa, nang ing irupeeh taniive, havana ijachaam kam i kaningtanii iripeehsar; changvakonchu ki ing kamanden ynsuwh mahsana, nang ing namandenchu ynsuwhrasiing.”
Amana thangbaen tanii vaarmee inche juwngka ajungmanpirpa.
Jesu abarungriir ija lamher ing ipirsehseh ing athamsahpa, amana aruthen ifhuwr ing ruwruwna ibuwchu sii atang atang vaang ynta.
Jesu ing athamsah aanuwna hangiirka asebok ae ongnii ipha ing ahuungtah nache, enuw embarungriir ija inche ijaar ing ahenphapae.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Yngkhaena nenuw ijaar vachuw? Batheem ting nenbukniimah ing hangsuw nuwna thamruw.”
Jesu ing achong raenche enruw, mee inempak aechu asebok kaarna ynvae Iskariot Judas atak ing maensaka Jesu aabeeng tumnii khaena abuum tingche avaneeng.
Changlae Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Judas, nang ing Mee Sapa chu aabeeng tumchiika narensahva?”
Jesu thoh ynruwhak ae asebok aenche hungsuwh vachiichu emutah nache enriir, “Aafhuw, kenuw ing laarchem inge tukva kenchiipae?”
Changlaen siimche engkaarna yngkheh ing aanchung jaethiim ameenae yngkhehchu atachang aana asaehpa.
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Havi inge ynsuwhsa!” Jesu ing aana asuhchu veparka amandampa.

Aanuwnache Jesu ing aanchung jaethiim aere rumniieen aarung iruung ae vokhehkho upa vakhae ae, atak ivasuwr ivatheng mee vakhae ningna ariir, “Vajeer chonghak abakhii ichamah ynruw ynrep suwrva nenchii vaangkhe laarchem re rumor thoh ivatheng vachuw?
Anasiirna ki ing nenuw thoh Rumniieenna kaonglaen khencha nenuw ing kichu isuwrnii khaena nengkik varaammahchuw. Changvakonchu havana apha ive nengkhaenava vokhehkho ynthim ruwreng apha chuva.”
Enuw ing Jesu chu suwr aeka aanchung jaethiim een tingche enghenruwpa. Changlae Pitar ing yndahseh ing avejiipa;
enuw ing vajeernii een sukmae ariknache mi manseh aeka engu kaarnache pitar kho ongsa.
Meenae rupanuw yngkheh inche irengna ongchu amutah nache enteehka averiir, “Hava pasar ikho ama thoh ynruwhak chakpae.”
Changvakonchu Pitar ing rumahka ariir, “Rupanuw, ama i ki manghuwmah ing.”
Apha topoh ompheh reehka mee yngkheh inche amureeh tahnache nangkho enuw kaartanii yngkheh vachii taka ariirpa.
Changvakonchu Pitar ing abasang, laaruw mee, ki mahping achii.
Apha topoh iseeh aanuwting mee reentaang yngkheh ing ipirpak ing ariir, “Hava mee rem ikho amathoh ynruwhak chakpae; akhaechuve atak i Galili tanii meeva.”
Changvakonchu Pitar ing abasang, “Laaruw mee, nang ing nariir chong i ki manghuwmah ing.” Ama chongchu abasang chakthoh aarkhuwng inche khuwngsa.
Amana Jesu ing aningting vaanlehka Pitar chu ave enpa. Chutahnache atanii aarkhuung ing akhuwngmah rirae vathumchak irumah tanii taka Jesu ing aningna ariir chongkha Pitar ing aansiipa.
Amana Pitar ing taang jungsuwhka abarungriir asuhpak ing chapsa.
Atii Jesu chu embachuw pasar aenche maniisa aeka abinpae;
vokhehkho enuw ing Jesu chu amik mangkhum aeka aningna ensii, “Riirla nangchu achuw ing ymbinva?”
Amana enuw ing reentaang ithipak chong ing ataklina ariirpae.
Khuwchu hungvaarka, upa chaap ae, aanchung jaethiim ae vokhehkho thiimthang ae yngkongsae; amana enuw ing Jesu chu aanchungpuh tingche enghenruwpa.
Amana enuw ing ensii, “Nang Khrista chu vataniive, keningna riirla.” Changvakonchu Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ki ing neningna riirkhang ningle nenuw thachamah tanuw.
Ki ing neningna chong siikhang ningchuwkho nenuw ing ibasangmah tanuw.
Changvakonchu atanii basen naka Mee Sapa inche Aacheh Thangnang atachang nache ongvaata.”
Enuw vakhae ing enriir, “Chunuw-cha nang Thangnang sapa vachii?”
Ama ing eningna abasang, “Nenuw ing kiping ichiichu nenriirpa.”
Ama-na enuw ing enriir, “Inuw vakhae ing havi chungna saarkhii athar ijongnii ynchii omkhang? Inuw yntaksah ing anertanii ynsiipa!”
Mee vakhae aenche hangiir aeka, Jesu chu Pilaat ningting enruwpa.

Enuw ing Jesu chu miraar piaeka enriir, “Hava pasar inge kemee chaap vakhae ningna Kesar ningting ree ipeeh rumahka ichummah ting aruwnah, amanche ataksah ingkho Khrista iruwng chuping taka ariirchu kenuw ing ataklina kentuwhpa.”
Pilaat ing Jesu chu chong asii, “Nang Jehudi ae iruwng vachii?” Jesu ing abasang, “Nang ing nariirpa.”
Amana Pilaat ing aanchung jaethiim aere mee changjaeh inem ae ningnache ariir, “Ki ing hava mee takline amiraar ynchiikho tuwhmah ing.”
Changvakonchu enuw ing aacheh yngen aeka ithipak ing enriir, “Ama ing Galili na ing havi ipha inge, Judia mee vakhae ningna manchuwka iraang abasuwhniinah.”
Ama chongchu Pilaat ing asiitah nache mee havi Galili taniiva taka arudehpa.
Ama ing Jesu i Herot ing apuh paam derna ong meeva ichii amanghuw tahnache, Herot ning-ting ajebathenpa.

Herot inche Jesu chu amutah nache inempak arotha rohsa, ama ing Jesu khaena chong asii khaenache apha iseehpak ing muningka achii, vokhehkho Jesu ing ruwriimnii laetho tunaka mukata ichii ing amanden.
Chukhaenache ama ing Jesu ningna chong inempak asii; changvakonchu Jesu ing aningna ynchiikho basang mahsa.
Changlaenche aanchung jaethiim aere thiimthang aenche Jesu taklina ichummah chong aajaeh riir aeka ingiir ae.
Amana Herot vokhehkho alaarchang aenche Jesu chu juum aeka emaniisahpa, vokhehkho iruwng peen manvi aeka athar Pilaat ningting enghenbripa.
Ama inii nache Herot re Pilaat ynchaarsae; ajae enuw meenii i yngensiimah aeka yngharpae.
Pilaat ing aanchung jaethiim aere upa vakhae ae vokhehkho mee aechu eenka

eningna ariir, “Hava mee inge ichummah tingche mee aechu aruwnah tachuwka kaningting nenghenruwpa. Ki ing nemaekungna chong kasiitahna, nenuw ing nenriir chong inuwzii ingkhe mee havi takline amiraar yntanga tuwhmah ing;
amanche Herot ingkho tuwhmahsa; chukhaenache Herot ing kaningting athar ahenbripa. Enruw, ithii phavachii nong ama ing yntangakho tumahsa.
Chukhaenache ama i ki ing ichah ningka bathenva kata.”
Akhaechuve havana kuurva sungne eningna Pilaat ing mee yngkheh ipimah arumahva.
Changvakonchu enuw vakhae inche iruur yngkhehpang ing uung aeka enriir, “Hava mee i jenbasuw nana, kengkhaena Barabas kha bathenla.”
(Barabas inge khuwruung sungna iraang basuwka vokhehkho mee atheh khaena kaeshum sungna ynsiihva.)
Pilaat ing Jesu chu bathen ningka achiitah nache athar eningna ariirpareeh.
Changvakonchu enuw ing athar uunglap uung aeka enriir, “Khros taklina jamla, khros taklina jamla.”

Pilaat ing vathumchak ipha ing eningna ariir, “Ynchii khaenava, mee havi inge isamah ynchii tukhang? Ama ithehnii khaena ki ing amiraar yntangkho tuwhmah ing; chukhaenache ama i ichah ningka bathenva kata.”
Changvakonchu enuw ing Jesu chu ijamnii khaena uunglap uung aeka amana enuw inche enchehpa.
Chukhaenache enuw ing eniihsah inuwzii ing emandenchu itunii khaena Pilaat ing chong apeehpa.
Amana iraang basuwka vokhehkho mee atheh kaeshum sungna asiihchu bathenla ta aeka enriir inuwzii ing amachu bathenka amanche Jesu chuve enuw ing emanden inuwzii ing eningting apeehpa.
Atii laarchang aenche Jesu chu enghenruw raenche Sairene paam tanii ivatheng Simon chu kiteeh aeka, amanche khros chu atuknung ting amandom hakpae.
Mee inempak inche aanuw henjii aeka vokhehkho embarung ichum aeka ijachaampak ing ichapsah ae rupanuw ae ingkho Jesu aanuwchu ajiisah ae.
Amana Jesu ing vaanlehka eningna ariir, “Jerusalem sanuw ae, ki kakhaena ichappeeh mahruw, nenuw nentaksah khaena vokhehkho nensiti ae khaena chapruw.
Enruw, siti abaringmah miknii mahri ae, vokheh-kho nithen apeehmahri ae enuw aechu bor aphapae ta ae naka riirva enchii inii tha aphachu ahenphava!
Changlaenche lamthing bung ae tingche kenuw kentaklina ibukpeehra amanche lamthing bukhoh ae tingche kenuwchu ibaruwsara ta ae naka enuw ing ichong basen vaatae.
Akhaechuve enuw ing er thing takline havana nong ae i entu vanave, ichong taklina chencha ynchii suwhvaate?
Isamah nongtu meenii ae chukho Jesu thoh itheh haknii khaenache enruwpa.
Enuw ing Rukang ichii minchu enghungtung tahnache, enuw ing isamah nongtu meeniimeh aechu Jesu thohche yngkheh ing atachang ting amanche yngkheh ing atari ting khros na jopi hen aeka enjampae.
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Apa, enuw i kuhpeeh aera; enuw ing ynchii kentuva ichii emanghuwsah mahva.” Amana enuw ing Jesu peendiirchu sen aeka enlaepah engabuwrniipa.

Changlae mee aenche ngiir aeka engen, changvakonchu Jehudi aapuh upa vakhae aeng chembe enerku hungthep vethep aeka, vokhehkho maniisa aeka enriir, “Ama ing mee aechu akarpeehva; atak i Thangnang ing aateer Khrista chu vanave, ataksah ing yngkarsa rasiing.”
Laarchang mee aengkho Jesu abuumting vak aeka amen iraecharii ithuwrchii empeeh thoh ynruw ing maniisa aeka enriir,
“Nang Jehudi ae iruwng vataniive, nataksah yngkarsara.”
Jesu Khrista aruwchung nache havana chongtiim i ynziihka om: “Havi Jehudi ae iruwngva.”
Khros taklina meeniimeh enjam yngkheh ing Jesu ningnache ithipak ing chongka ariir, “Nang Khrista chumah vachiikhang? Natak sahkho yngkar nana amanche kenuw chukho ikarla.”
Changvakonchu yngkheh inchembe rukuhka ariir, “Nang Thang-nang nachiimahva? Nang amathoh aanghakjaeh ing phava nachiichu naphava.
Inuw chuve ichumchak ing iphapham isuwh ymphava; akhaechuve inuw ing yntu ynrisah inuwzii ing ymphava; changvakonchu ama ive isamah tangmah yngkheh pangkho tumah.”
Amana Jesu ningna ama ing ariir, “Jesu, Iruwng ing napaar raenche kichu eensiisaro achii.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Ki ing naningna kariirnah, atanii nang ki thoh Paradais nache onghak vaata.”
Changlaenche aphachu kuruk ita, amanche inii irengchu apha eekuw atakmahri raentaangche duwrpohka paam aangkheng manthimpohsa;
vokhehkho Rumniieen sungna laedenpeen chukho achimbangna ynsiihsa.
Amana Jesu ing ipirpak ing uungka ariir, “Apa, nakiklina kalaetha i kamansirsahnahchii!”
Changlaenche laarchang mee chaama aapuh inche amachu amutahna Thangnang manpahka ariir, “Atatak ing mee havi ynthiing ichum mee varae.”
Havi aanbuwr mee inempak itheng aenche isuwh vakhaechu emutahna, embarung ichum aeka yngkaesae.
Amanche aanghuwfhuw vakhae aenche vokhehkho Galili tanii Jesu aanuw ajii vakhae rupanuw aenche laarkhehna ngiir aeka isuwh vakhaechu emupa.
Atii Josep ichii aanchungpuh ae kaarna ynvae ichum itu mee yngkheh pasar om,
atak i enuw ing entu enri nongchaap arumah Jehudi ae khuwruung Arimathia tanii itheng Thangnang iruwngpaam ahah mee yngkhehva.
Hava pasar inge Pilaat ningting vakka Jesu ahakchaang avaniihpa.
Amana Jesu hakchaangchu ama ing basumka amanche ynnaarjaeh peen ing iromka achuwkho endimniimahri rungkuw thaen nache Jesu chu asiihpa.
Ama iniichu Thoraang itu Iniiva vokhehkho Deennii iniichu abasennii ahenphava.
Jesu ing anruwfhuwchak ae Galili tanii rupanuw aeng aanuwchu jiiaeka Jesu athaen vokhehkho ahakchaangchu ynsaangkhe asiihse ichiichu engen;
amana enuw ing hunganri aeka abarim isapak vokhehkho yntaehfhuw richiithou embathongpa. Deennii inii nachembe vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing enuw ongsae.
Aafhuwnii ziing imaenphik nache rupanuw aenche embathongsah barim ningsiihnii yntaehfhuw chiaeka thaenkung ipha ing vaksae.
Changvakonchu enuw ing thaen kamnii rungchu ymmong vasah ing envephapa,
enuw ing asungting envaruwhtah nache ahakchaangchu tuwhmahsae.
Chukhaenache enuw ing utingva ta aeka embarungriirna fhuwm abavae raenche enruw, ivaarjaeh peen enii pasar meeniimeh embuumna vangiirsae;
amana enuw ing engaanchik lamher ing ruwruwting engkhuptah nache pasar meeniimeh aenche eningna enriir, “Ithii ae kaartanii ihangringchu nenuw ing ynchii khaena nenjongva?
Jesu ing Galili na aonglae neningna ajeer chongkha yndenruw:
Mee Sapa chu isii icher mee ae kik charnaka khros na thehvaatae, amanche inii avomanthumnii nache hangring vaata taka ariir vasahva.”
Amana enuw ing changlaennii chongjeerchu engaansiipa,
chutah-nache enuw ing thaenkung tanii hunganri aeka mee suum arii yngkheh ae ningna vokhehkho reentaang ae ningnakho enriirpa.
Enuw ae chuve, Meri Magadalen re Johana, amanche Jakop amnuw Meri, enuw ynthummeh ipae; enuw thoh ynruwpoh ae rupanuw aengkho achongthang ae ningnache ariirpae;
changvakonchu enuw enchongchu ikaanii mahva ichii ing manden aeka, enuw ing thacha mahsae.
Changvakonchu Pitar inchembe hangiirka thaenkung phanii ing vataensa, ama ing kiimka thaenchu aabuwrtah nache, limon peen chupang amupa; chutah nache ama aruwriimka eenting hunganrisa.
Ama iniirem nache enuw engkaar tanii meeniimeh inche Jerusalem na ing meil sarii yndah Emmos khuw phanii inche isiae,
amana enuw ing isuwh vasah thaminchu entonghak.
Enuw ing yngkheh yngkheh chong ynsii aeka emanseer raenche, Jesu ing hempha aeka enuw thohche sihaksae.
Changvakonchu enuw ing Jesu chu mukhang ae nare manghuwcheh mahsae.
Amana Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw nensinii baram ing yngkheh yngkheh chong nemanseer i ynchiiva?”
Amana enuw ening idimpak inche ngiirsae.
Changlaenche Kliopas ichii mee yngkheh inche Jesu chu abasangpa, “Ataraensiim Jerusalem na isuwh vakhae i namanghuwmah lamkhii tanii ivasipeh mee vachii?”
Jesu ing eningna asii ae, “ynchii isuwhva?”
Enuw ing aningna enriir, “Thang-nang re mee vakhae maanache nongna vokhehkho chongna ruwreng ipirpak aningna om jaephar Nazaret Jesu khaenava,
amanche atakchu aanchung jaethiim aere lipah aapuh aeng ynsaangkhe Jesu chu ithiinii miraar piaeka khros taklina enthehva ichii khaena chenva.
Changvakonchu kenuw inchembe Isrel jaatichu karvachii meeva ta ungka kemandensahva. Chumna hava nong vakhae takline asuwhnii i ataniinii inge inii nithum ahenphava.
Amanche kenuw kengkaar tanii rupanuw topoh aengkho thaenkung ting imaen ing vak aeka kenruw amanriimpae;
vokhehkho enuw ing Jesu ahakchaangchu entuwhmahtah nache, Jesu chuve hangringsa ichii chong enriir vaarmee aechu emik ruvaamna emu ing enriir ae.
Kenuw thoh ynruwpohchak ung achuw yngkheh aenche thaenkung tingche vak aeka amana rupanuw aeng enriir vaangche envamupa, changvakonchu Jesu chuve mumahsae.”
Amana Jesu ing ariir, “Ipang mee ae, Thangnang jaephar aeng enriir vakhaechu nenbarungriirna thacha itap mee ae!
Khrista inche ijachaam khaangnaka ama alaar isa tingche hungruwhrem vachiimah vakhang?”
Amana Mosi na ing jaephar chaap ae phana ing basenka Jesu ataksah khaena ynthiing thiimziih chaapna ynthin vakhaechu ynchii achiiniiva ichiichu eningna ariirpeehpae.
Chukhaenache enuw ing envasinii khuwchu envepha phanache, Jesu ing yndahseh ting sivachii pangeng ichii ing atupa,
amana enuw ing enriir, “Atii khuri jungvisa vokhehkho hungmanthimsa. Chukhaenache kenuw thoh cheenghak taruw ta aeka engkhaam.” Amatah nache ama ing enuw thohche cheenghaksa.
Ama ing enuw thohche isahhaknii khaena ongka, tarchu verika bor apeehpa; amana tarchu bakhiika eningnache ajepeehpae.
Changlaenche emikchu ymmongka enuw ing atakchu emanghuwpa, changvakonchu ening-tanii ama yndangmahsa.
Enuw ing enareerna enriir, “Ama ing lamna chong ibuwhka ynthiing thiimziih ynriirpeeh raenkhe ymbarungriir sungna mi ichuwngvaang tamahkhang?”
Chutahnache enuw ing hangiir aeka Jerusalem ting ynrisae, amanche enuw ing sebok suum arii yngkheh ae thohre reentaang areh mee ae yntuwhfhuw aeka
vokhehkho enriir, “Aafhuw kha hangring tataksa! Ama ing Simon ningna yndangsa!”
Meenii aenche lamna ensirae isuwh vokhehkho ama ing tar abakhiirae emanghuw chehchu eningnache enriirpa.
Meeniimeh aenche havi eningna enriir raenche, Jesu ing engkaar nache vangiirka eningna ariir, “Idaechu neningna omrasiing.”
Changvakonchu enuw ing lae kemu varammuw ta aeka ynchiksae.
Amana eningna ama ing ariir, “Ynchii khaena nenuw ynchik vachuw? Ynchii khaena nenbarungriirna nen-chingniiva?
Enruw kakik kakhi ae i, ki remping. Ipar nuwna enruw; lae chuve hakchaang re ruw aningna omah, nenuw ing muchehva nenta ki chuve omna.
Havi riirka ama ing eningnache akik re akhichu amansiipae.
Enuw enrotha iroh re ingik aethoh thachacheh mahsae; chukhaenache ama ing eningna asiipae, “Nenuw hane isahfhuw nendeense?”
Enuw ing iminvasah nga arekhehchu enjepeehpa,
Ama ing verika emaekung nache asahpa.

Aanuwnache ama ing eningna ariir, “Haviva ki ing nenuw thoh kaonglae neningna kariir chong vakhaekha; Mosi vajeer chonghak na vokhehkho Jaephar aeng amanche ympahnii la nache kakhaena ynziih vakhaechu ahungchumnii chuva.”
Changlaenche ama ing ynthiing thiimziihchu emanghuw chehnii inche envakhar aamongpa,
amana eningna ariir, “Haviva ynziihka omchu: Khrista inche ijachaam phanaka, animanthumnii nache ithii tanii hangring vaata.
Amana barungriir huungnii re isiicher kuhniichu aruming nache Jerusalem na basen naka Jaat aangkhengna yntong vaata.
Nenuw ing nemu vakhae havi apham aangkhengna riirva nenchiiva.
Enruw, kapa ing chongreep atuchu, ki ing neningna jenbathen vakata; changvakonchu nenuw ing chungtanii ruwrengchu nengaraang mahtaang khuwruung nache hahjaehruw.”
Ama ing enuwchu bor apeehraenche, enuwchu bathenka vokhehkho thangbaen ting atakchu ajekipa.
Amana enuw ing inempak enrotha iroh ing Jerusalem ting ynrisae,
amanache enuw ing ympehrudeh ing rumniieen nache Thangnang emanpah.
Abasenlimna chongsaechu om vasahva, amana chongsaechu Thangnang thoh ynruwhak ing om amanche chongsae inche Thangnang atak chusa.
Abasenlimna chongsaechu Thangnang thoh ynruwhak ing om.
Ama ajaarnache Thangnang ing peeh aangkheng aseem, amamah naka yntanga ynseem peeh omah.
Aningnache iringnii ahungsuwhnii ynsuwhka amanche havana iringnii inge laaruw mee ningnache irengchu ajenreenpa.
Ireng inche ynthim nache aenka, ynthim inche chehmahsa.
hava mee inge irengchu saarkhii ipeeh ijuwng ajaar inche mee vakhae ing siinaka athachanii khaenava.
Atak ichuve ireng chumahva, changvakonchu irengchu saarkhii ipeeh ijuwngva.
Laaruw paamna ijungtheng atak i mee aangkheng ningna irengchu ipeeh ichum ireng chusa.
Laaruw paamna chongsaechu omsa, ama ajaarna Thangnang ing laaruw paam seemkhang nakho laaruw mee inche manghuwmahsa.
Ama ing apaam sahna ijuwng vakonchu ameesah aenche herimahsae.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh inchembe thachaka ahengaraang ae; amatah nache enuwchu Thangnang siti ynsuwhnii ruwrengchu apeehpae.
Enuw i sii re hakchaang vokhehkho mee ing amanden nache jungom siti mahpae, Thangnang ing amanden nachenva.
Chongsae inche mee ynguurka tungsiih re ichum ynriim inche yng-kaarna paarsa; Thangnang sapa yngkheh ynsuwh ing alaar isachu iraangka, inuw ing alaar isachu imu ymphapa.
Johon ing ama akhaena uungka saarkhii apeeh, “Haviva ki ing akhaena ichong ingkha, ama ing kaanuwna juwngna changvakonchu atak ichuve kachungna ruunghakna, akhaechuve kaommah rirae ama om vasahva.”
Aningtanii tungsiih ynriim inche inuw vakhaechu ama ing bor ympeehpa.
Thangnang ing Mosi ajaarna chonghakchu apeehva chang-vakonchu tungsiih re ichum chuve Jesu Khrista ajaarnava.
Achuw ingkho Thangnang mumahri; Thangnang thoh aanghak ampa buumna ong asapa ningna chembe imuchu amamphasa.
Jerusalem tanii Jehudi aatuari-cheh aenche jaethiim aere Levi aechu Johon ningna vechiir aeka enuw ing aningna chong ensii, “Nang achuw vachii?”
Johon inche ynsang damahka ynthiingkiir ing abasang ae, “Ki chuve eekarpeeh Khrista chumahping.”
Chunuwcha achuw vachii ta aeka ensii. Elija vachii chang?
Ki amamahping, taka Johon ing abasang ae.
Chunuwcha jaephar vachii ta aeka ensii. Ama ing kimahping taka abasang.
Chunuwcha achuw vachii riirla enchii. Kenuwkho yngkaenungka ynvechiir ae ningna ahuwnii hungriir kenta. Natakcha achuwping nachiiva chang?
Amana Johon ing ajaennii jaephar Isaia chong ipherka ariir,
“Ki chuve Aafhuw ing ajiinii lamchu manchiimruw ichiinii khaena,
paamfhuwna uung senruwr yngkheh chuping!”
Pharisi aeng envechiir chong areen mee ae aenche,
Johon chu ensiireeh, “Natak icha Khrista chumah taniika, changmahka Elija chumah taniika vokhehkho jaephar chukhommah taniicha, yngkhaena mee aechu baptais namantupae?”
Johon ing abasang ae, “Ki ingve chiina baptais kamantunah chang-vakonchu nemanghuwmah mee yngkheh nengkaarna ngiirna,
atak chuve kaanuwting ijuwngpehva, changvakonchu ama akheerkhaang runoh rapkho parvakachii ki matik chasamah ing.”
Hava vakhae i iniisuwhtah yntongting om Johon ing batais amantunii ae Jordan chifhuw laar Bethani paam nache isuwhva.
Akhuwvaar nache Jesu ing Johon ningna ivachu avemutah nache ariir, “Enruw, laaruw paam isiicher areenchir Thangnang jaoti reeh!
Havana mee iva, hangsenna kariir chakkha, ‘Mee yngkheh kaanuwna thengna, atakchu kachungna ruwreng adeensehsa, akhaechuve ki kaommah rirae ama om vasahva.’
Ki ing atak i achuwvaate ichii chuve hemanghuw mahri ing changvakonchu Isrel mee aeng emanghuwnii khaena ki ing chii nache baptais kamantuva.”
Johon ing havana saarkhii i apeeh, “Khunu vaang ichii yngkheh thangbaen tanii laetha ynthiing ataklina ijung-chuwchu kamu.

Ataraenpha ing ama i manghuwmah ing changvakonchu chiina baptais itunii khaenache kichu ynjenchiir Thangnang ing ariir, ‘Mee yngkheh taklina laetha jungchum naka ichuw muvaanta; ama chuva laetha ynthiing ing mee aechu baptais mantu vachiichu.’
Johon ing ariir, ki ing kamupa vokhehkho neningna kariirnah, atak i Thangnang sapa chuva.”
Akhuwvaarna Johon ing asebok mee ynniimeh ae thohche ingiirhak ae,
Jesu ing ivasichu ama ing vemuka ariir, “Enruw, Thangnang Jaoti chu vathengna.”
Sebok mee ynniimeh aenche ariirchu siiaeka amana Jesu aanuwchu enuw ing enjiipa.
Jesu ing avaanleh tahnache aanuw enjiichu muka eningna chong asiiae, “Nenuw ynchii nenjongva?” Enuw ing embasang, una ongvachii oja?
Ama ing abasang, “Huungruw vokhehkho va-enruw.” (Changlaenche siim apha manrii ita.) Enuw ing aanuwchu henjii aeka una ongva ichiichu emupa, vokhehkho ama inii nache aningna cheengsae.
Johon chongchu siiaeka Jesu aanuw enjii meenii sungne yngkheh chuve Simon Pitar naepa Andriu va.
Ama ing aipa Simon yntuwhfhuwka ariir, “Kenuw ing Mesaija chu kengaantuwh fhuwpa.”
Amana Jesu ningting Simon chu ahenruwpa. Jesu ing aningna enka ariir, “Nang i Johon sapa naruming Simon vachii changvakonchu atanii basenka naruming i Kaiphas yntavaata.”
Akhuwvaar nache Jesu ing Galili ting vakningka achiipa. Amana Philip chu Jesu ing yntuwhfhuwka aningna kaanuw ijiira achii.
(Philip i Andriu re Pitar engkhuw Bethsaida taniiva.)
Mosi vajeer chonghak na ynziih vokhehkho Jaephar aengkho akhaena embaziih vasah Nazaret Jesu, Josep sapa chu kenuw ing kengaantuwh fhuwpa taka Philip ing Nathanel ningna ariir.
Changvakonchu Nathanel ing aningna ariir, “Nazaret tanii isa changsiichu hungsuwhcheh vaate?” Philip ing abasang, “Huungnana vaabuwrla.”
Nathanel ing Jesu ningting ihuungchu amutah nache ama akhaena ariir, “Enruw Isrel ynthiingkiirchu haviva; aningna ynraar yntanga omah.”
Nathanel ing aningna asii, “Yn-saangkhe kichu ymmanghuw vachii?” Jesu ing abasang, “Philip ing nang i yngeenmah rirae, thachang bur derna ong kamuchii.”
Nathanel ing ariir, “Oja, nang i Thangnang sapa vachii! Amanche Isrel ae iruwngchu vachii.”
Jesu ing ariir, “Thachang bur derna kamuchii kachiitahna ynthachapeh vachii? Nang ing havi chungna iruung iruung aajaeh hemuvanata.”
Amana aningna ariir, “Atatak ing naningna kariirnah, thangbaen chu ymmong vaata amanche Thangnang vaarmee aenche Mee Sapa taklinache ihangkar ijungchum entu nang ing muvaanta.”
Inii ninii aanuwting Galili paam Kana khuwna rakhiinii iriim yngkheh om. Amanache Jesu amnuw chukho itheng.
Rakhiinii iriim nache Jesu vokhehkho asebok aekho engeen ae.
Rakhiinii iriim nache vomrip chiichu atangdoh tahnache Jesu amnuw ing Jesu ningna ariir, “Vomrip chii ensenfhuw tangdohsa.”
Amana Jesu ing abasang, “O rupanuw, ki nangthoh ynchii itupham omkhang? kakhaena aphachu henphamahri.”
Jesu amnuw inche meenae ae tingche ariir, “Neningna ariir vakhae-chu turuw.”
Jehudi ae iriim purah nache ynthiingnii khaena ynchaam ichii yngkheh om; ama khaena litar som-thum ichar beer kuruk ensiih.
Jesu ing sebok ae tingche ariir, “Beer vakhae i chii mansip chirruw.” Enuw ing beer aangkhengchu chii emansip chirpa,
aanuwnache eningna ariir, “Chiikha suwhnuwna iriim aapuh ningting hungpiruw.” Enuw ing chiichu suwh aeka enghungpeehpa.
Chiichu vomrip chii uurka chiipaksa. Aapuh inche utanii vomrip chii ithengva ichii manghuwmah (changvakonchu chii aasuwh ae inchembe emanghuw); chukhaenache ama ing songpa ningna-che ariir,
“Mee vakhae ing iriim abasen raenche aren ichiipakchu semchak aeka itheng vakhae ing engin aanuwna achuumchu ensen chakpae, changvakonchu nangve ataraenpha ing aren nasiihjaehva!”
Jesu ing anongtuna maensa ing laetho atuchu Galili paam Kana rakhiinii iriim nenva; amanache alaar isa amandang tahnache sebok aeng inempak embariim.
Manlaennii kuurva ichii apha ahenpha tahnache Jesu ing Jerusalem ting iva.
Rumniieen nache ama ing siirdaar, jao amanche khunu ijuwr mee ongpoh aechu amu; amana seersaam irep mee aeng heong ae chukho amu.
Amana siruw mong irehka jao ae vokhehkho deenkhaar aechu athurchirpa; amanche seersaam repnii ensiih chaap chukho barup barehka aajehchirpa;
vokhehkho khunu aajuwr ae ningnakho ipirpak ing ariir, “Hava vakhae i chichirruw; kapa sejaam i kithiir manguur mahruw!”
Amana sebok aeng ynziihka omchu engaansiipa, “Na-een khaena kabarungriir iruwhdeh ing kamanden inche kichu ynsahnah.”
Jehudi aatuaricheh aeng Jesu chu basang aeka chong ensii, “Ynchii ruwriimnii laetho keningna man-dangcheh vanachii deenchiika hava ae i itunii ruwreng nadeenva?”
Enuw ing ensii, “Jerusalem rumniieen havi aantutahna kum sommanrii ariikruk chak iruwhva, amachu nang ing inii nithumna athar vokheh mangiirreeh chehva nachiiva?”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing rum-niieen khaena ichong ichuve ama ahakchaang ynchiiniiva.
Jesu ing thikka ahangring raenche asebok ae ing havi eningna ariirchu engaansiipa, vokhehkho ynthiing thiimziih re Jesu ing ariir chongchu enthachapa.
Manlaennii kuurva sungna Jesu ing Jerusalem na ongka atu ari laetho chaap mee vakhae ing imu emphatah nache inempak enthacha ae.
Changvakonchu Jesu ing enuw vakhaechu thachamah ae, akhaechuve enuw vakhae i ynchii meepae ichii isajaeh ing amanghuw vasahva.
Enuw engkhaena achuw ingkho aningna saarkhii ipinii omah, akhaechuve embarungriir sungna ynthinchu ama ing amanghuw vasahva.
Pharisi ae ruwr tanii Jehudi upa aruming Nikodemas ichii yngkheh om.
Jaenkhehna ama ing Jesu ningtingche vakka aningna ariir, “Rabi, nang i Thangnang ing ynjenchiir oja vachii ichii kamanghuwsa. Thangnang ynvaemah naka laetho hangjaeh natu i achuw ingkho chehmahnii.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Atatak ing na-ningna kariirnah, achuw yngkheh ing athar ynringreeh mahnave utaraenkho Thangnang iruwngpaam mucheh mahnii.”
Nikodemas ing Jesu ningna asii, “Mee inche ynsaangkhe athar naeduung vaang ynringreeh vachii vareeh? Ama ing utaraenkho athar amnuw ven rupumting ruwhreeh naka ynring chehmah nareeh.”
Jesu ing abasang, “Atatak ing naningna kariirnah, chiina vokheh-kho laethana ynringmah meechu utaraenkho iruwngpaam ruwhcheh mahnii.
Mee i amnuw ampa tanii hankchaang inuwzii ing ynringva, changvakonchu ama chuve laethacher nache ynringva.
Nenuw athar ynring-reehva nenchiiva ta ingka kariirne nang ngikmahra.

Sii ing raangningka achiitah tingche raangna; amachu nenuw ing ahuwrusa nensiinah, changvakonchu utanii ithengva changmahka utingkhe sine ichii chuve manghuwcheh mahchuw. Laethana yngringreeh vakhae chaap havi thohne aanghakva.”
Ynsaangkhe havichu suwhva chiiva taka Nikodemas ing asii.
Jesu ing abasang, “Nangve Isrel sungna athurfhuw aanchuwmee yngkheh chiika ynsaangkhe havi namanghuw mahva?
Ki ing na-ningna atatak ing kariirnah: Kenuw chuve kemanghuwchu kenriirva, changvakonchu havi achuw ingkho thacha nungka tamahchuw.
Laaruw paam tanii kariir chong nenthacha mahchu; ynsaangkhe thangbaen tanii kariir chongchu thachava nente?
Thangbaen tanii ijuwng Mee Sapa chumah naka achuw ingkho thangbaen karmahri.”
Paamfhuw nache Mosi ing siir baruwr aathoh vaangkhe Mee Sapa chukho ithoh vaatae,
amanche aningnache athacha mee vakhae aenche maangmahnii ae chang-vakonchu ichen naemah ringkum phavaatae.
Thangnang ing laaruw paam inempak aning amansiih khaenache asapa yngkhehpangchu ynjepeehsahpa, achuw yngkheh mee ing aningnache thacha nave maangmahnii changvakonchu ichen naemah ringkum phavaata.
Thang-nang ing asapa ajenbathenchu laaruw paam vajeer tunii khaena mahva, changvakonchu ama ajaarnache laaruw paam ing ikarpeehchu phanii khaenava.
Chukhaenache aningna athacha mee chuve vajeer tumahsa; changva-konchu aningna athachamah mee chuve vajeer chisa, akhaechuve ama ing Thangnang sapa yngkhehpangchu thacha mahsa.
Haviva vajeer ichiichu, amachuve laaruw paamne irengchu thengsa, amachu mee ae inche ireng ening mansiihva enchii changdenna ynthimchu ening emansiihsehpa, akhaechuve enuw enong chaapchu sakmahsa.
Isamah atu vakhae aenche irengchu embatirnah, vokheh-kho ireng nache huungmah ae, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ama ing atu ari isamah chaapchu yndang naka tamahsa.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ichum atu chuve anong vakhae nache Thangnang chongriir amanjiichu ynthiingkiir ing yndangnii khaenache ireng nache huungna.
Havi aanuwna Jesu ing asebok aethoh Judia paam nache inii topoh vacheeng aeka mee baptais emantu.
Johon ingkho Salim kuurna om Enon iva nache mee baptais amantu, akhaechuve amanache chii inempak om; amanche mee aenche aningnache theng aeka baptais atuae.
Havi Johon chu kaeshum ting engkhum-mahri raenniiva.
Atii Johon asebok aere Jehudi yngkheh thohche ynthiingnii khaena chong ynsangsae.
Chukhaenache enuw ing Johon ningting huung aeka enriir, “Rabi, Jordan laarna ynruwhak chuwka saarkhii napeehkha havane ongna, amanche mee vakhae ing aningna theng aeka baptais entunah ae.”
Johon ing abasang, “Thangbaen tanii ing aningna jepimah naka, achuw ingkho phacheh mahnii.
Havana kariir i nentakrap ingkho kasaarkhii nachuw, ‘Ki Khrista chumahping, ama ajungtheng mahrirae ynjebathen chuping.’
Songnuw i songpa rutum chuva; changvakonchu songpa khaena ingiir, achong arungae aarang chuve songpa senruwr asiiraenche inempak arotha rohna. Chukhaenache havana karotha iroh i atiive areersuwhsa.
Amave hungruung sehseh vaata, ki chuve jungtak sehseh vakata.”
Chungtanii ijungtheng chuve aangkhenglaang taklina ruungsehna; laaruw mee chuve laaruw tavaata amanche laaruw khaena riirvaata; chungtanii ijungtheng chuve aang-khenglaangna ruungsehna.
Amave amu re asii vakhaechu ariirnah, amachu achuw ingkho asaarkhiichu herimahsae.
Achuw yngkheh asaarkhii aheri mee inchembe Thangnang i ichum remva taka amangiirnah.
Thangnang ing ajenbathen mee inche Thangnang chongchu ariirnah, akhaechuve Thangnang ing aningnache laetha ynriimjor ing apeehsa.
Ampa inche asapa chu aning mansiihka amanche akiklinache aangkheng amansir chirpa.

Achuw yngkheh mee ing asapa ningnache thacha nave ichen naemah ringkum aphapa; asapa chongriir amanjiimah mee chuve iringnii ringkum imu phamahnii, changvakonchu ataklinache Thangnang barungsii omjaeh vaata.
Johon chungna Jesu ing mee inem khuumka asebok khaena baptais amantupa ichii i Pharisi aeng ensiipa.
(Jesu ing mee aechu baptais mantumah, asebok ae ing emantu vatah.)
Ama enriirchu asiicha Jesu ing Judia bathenka Galili paam ting ynrisa.
Ama ing ahunganri raenche Samaria ahemantheng.
Samaria nache ajae Jakop ing asapa Josep ningna apeeh lam yng-kheh om thohche yndahpakmah khuw yngkheh aruming Saikar ichii om.
Amanache Jakop rumchii heom, amana lamlah ing hungsi khaenache Jesu jahohka rumchii kuur nache aja abasiir phehpa. Apha chuve inii siimchim sungna vaata.
Samaria rupanuw yngkheh ing chii avathaarchu amucha Jesu ing aningna infhuw chii ipira taka aniihpa.
(Changlae asebok ae chuve khuwruung ting isahfhuw ynrii isiae.)
Rupanuw inche abasang, “Nangve Jehudi vachii, ki chuve Samaria ping. Amachu ynsaangkhe nang ing infhuw chii ynniih vachii?” (Samaria aere Jehudi ae thaemin sahakmah chak ae.)

Jesu ing abasang, “Thangnang ing ympeehchu ynchiiva vokhehkho infhuw chii ynniih ama meechu achuwva ichii nang ing manghuw taniive, nang ing niihromva nachiiva, amanche naningna iringnii chiichu ama ing ipirom vachiiva.”
Rupanuw inche abasang, “Oja, nangve asuwhnii chimahchii, rumchii chuve thuwhpakna. Una changchii iringnii chiichu rivanate?
Kemfhuw Jakop ing hava rumchii i ympeehva. Hane atuti aeng vokhehkho ensiir endaar aengche hava chii i in aeka hungomba. Amachu Jakop chungna nang ing iruunghak vachiikhang?”
Jesu ing abasang, “Hava chii i ain mee chuve athar achii raarva tareeh,

changvakonchu ki ing kapeeh chii ain mee chuve athar vokheh achii raarmahnii. Ki ing kapeeh chii inche aningna chiitaang ynsuwh naka, iringnii chiichu fuwrvaata vokhehkho amachu inche iringnii ringkum pivaata.”
Rupanuw inche athamsah, “Oja, ki athar vokheh kachii araarniimah ing vokhehkho athar havane chiithaar kavasiniimah ing changchii chiichu kaningna ipirasa.”
Yngkaera vokhehkho nafhuwsar hungeen nana vaanrireehra taka Jesu ing aningna ariir.
Rupanuw inche abasang, “Atanii ipha ing kafhuwsar omahri.”
Jesu ing ariir, “Chumna kafhuwsar omahri nachiichu.
Natak chuve sapa runga ningna rakhii niisachii, ataraenkho naongfhuw ikho nafhuwsar rem mahva. Ichum chuve nariirsa.”
Rupanuw inche ariir, “Oja, natak i jaepharchu vachii ichii kamamghuw pachii.
Kemfhuw Samaria upa aeng hava bungne Thangnang enrum ae, changvakonchu Jehudi nenuw chuve Jerusalem na Thangnang manden vaanchiiva nenchiinah.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Kariir manjiira, rupanuw, hava bungne changmahka Jerusalem na mee aeng apa Thangnang chu rummahva enchii aphachu hungvivaata.
Samaria nenuw chuve achuw kenrumva ichii manghuw mahchuw changvakonchu Jehudi kenuw chuve kemanghuwsa, yngkhaena ynchii imbe manlaenpeeh ichii i Jehudi tanii ithengva.
Atiive apha ichiichu hungviva, mee vakhae ing Thangnang laetha ruwrengchu empha raenche apachu rumvaatae vokhehkho ama ing amanden nache rumvaatae.
Thangnang i laetha chuva, amana laetha ruwreng inche mee aenche ichum ing rumvaatae.”
Rupanuw inche ariir, “Khrista jungtheng vaata ichiichu kamang-huwpa; ama ing ajuwnglaenche aangkhenglaang iriirpeeh vaata.”
Jesu ing ariir, “Ama meechu kiping, nangthoh atae chongnachuw.”

Changlaen siimche asebok ae ing enghunganri tahnache Jesu ing rupanuw yngkheh thoh hechong aechu muaeka ingik ae. Changvakonchu achuw ingkho rupanuw tingche ynchiiva tamah ae, amanche Jesu ningna chenkho yngkhaena rupanuw thohne hechong vachii tamahdeh ae.
Rupanuw inche abeer maka eenting mee vakhae ningna ahungriir,
“Ki ing kamu kasii mahri aajaeh ariircheh mee yngkheh ongna. Atakchu Khrista chuvamo va-enruw”
Mee aenche engkhuw bathen aeka Jesu ningtingche vaksae.
Aphanache sebok ae ing Jesu ningna enthamsah, “Oja, isahfhuw thaeminchu omsa topoh sara.”
Changvakonchu Jesu ing abasang, “Nenuw ing nemanghuwmah kasah-fhuw omsa.”
Amana sebok ae ing enum ing ichong ae, “Achuw yngkheh ing isahfhuw avepeeh pentah enchii.”
Jesu ing abasang ae, “Kasahfhuw thaemin chuve ki ynjenchiir ing amandenchu ynjii vokhehkho kaningna itufhuw nong ympeehchu amanchinii ing itu chuva.

Nenuw ing nenriirchak yngkheh omna, ‘Tha manrii aanuwna ruwbaar kuumpha hempha vaata?’ Changvakonchu ki ing kariirnah amachuve, ruwrae ae i isajaeh ing ibuwrruw, chimuw aangkheng hungminsa, vokhehkho ikuumnii aphachu ahenphapa!
Imin chimuw aakuum meechu ruthamen pivaata, amanche chimuw aangkheng ichen naemah ing omnii khaenache mangkong vaata; changlaenche aavor vokhehkho aakuum aenche rotharoh phahak vaatae.
Enriirchak i ichumva, ‘Mee yngkheh inche basaeka, mee yngkheh inche akuum chaknah.’
Ruwbaar ikuumnii khaena ruwrae ting kachiirchuw changvakonchu nenuw anong tumahchuw; reentaang mee aeng tuaeka nenuw ing ikaanii nenphanah.”
“Kamu mahri, kasii mahri aajaeh ariircheh taka rupanuw ing ahungriir nache Samaria na ong mee aanem ing Jesu chu enthacha ae.”
Amana Samaria mee ae thengpoh aeka Jesu chu icheengnii khaena enthamsah tahnache Jesu ing amanache niniimeh icheeng.
Ama achongjeer nache mee inempak ing enthacha ae,

vokhehkho rupanuw ningnache enriir, “Atiive kenuwkho kenthachapa, havi nang ing nahungriir khaena mahva, chang-vakonchu kentakrap ing achong ara kensiitah nava. Atiive atak i laaruw paam mee Ikarpeeh Khrista chuva ichii kemanghuwpa.”
Inii ninii acheeng aanuwting Jesu ing ama maphamchu bathenka Galili paam tingche sisa.
takrap ingkho saarkhii apeeh, “Jaephar chu apaam mee rap aengkho rumah ae.”
Galili ahungtung tahnache, amana heong mee aeng ahebariimsah ae, akhaechuve ajae Jerusalem na manlaennii kuurva enturae Jesu ing atu ari aajaeh emuvasah khaenava.
Jesu ing Judia tanii Galili ting hungtungsa ichii ama ing asiitah nache, vaantuwh fhuwka asapa ithii ynthong ing inachu yndamnii khaenache Kaparnaum ting ivakpeehra achii.
Jesu ing aningna abasang, “Nenuw ing laetho ingiknii ae i mumah tanuwve nenuw achuw ingkho thachamah tanuw.”
Lipah aaruung inche abasang, “Oja, kasapa athikmah rirae avejiisara achii.”
Jesu ing aningna ariir, “Yngkaera, nasapa damvaata!” Ama ingkho ruka yngkaesa.
Een ting ahungkae raenche lam nache ameenae aenche vatheng aeka rotharoh chong avereen ae amachuve, “Nasapa kha hungdamsa enchii.”
Asapa idamchu apha aajaeh vakhae nava taka asii aecha enuw ing embasang, “Ajaenii siim apha yngkhehna riitheng ichen enchii.”
Ampa ing aansii amachuve, ajaenii Jesu ing nasapa damsa achii apha thohkhe ynchim chaksa. Amana atak vokhehkho eengkuw engkheng Jesu chu enthacha.
Jesu ing Judia tanii Galili na ahungtung aanuwna laetho amandang havi inge vanii chaksa.
Havi aanuwna Jesu ing Jerusalem na Jehudi ae kuurva entu nache isi.
Jerusalem na Jao suwngkung ichii nache eensukreen asae rungameh rumchii kuurnache om; amachu Hebreeu chong ing Bethesda enchii.
Amana mikchu, khi kik ibong, amanche hakchaang ithiipoh ing ina aenche ama rumchii kuurnache yntorpoh ae,
akhaechuve marak marakna vaarmee inche rumchiichu aanohchak. Changlaenche maensa ing aparcheh ina meechu idam chakpae.
Ama kaarnache kum songthum arii eeriih chak sungna ihungna sapa yngkheh ynvae.
ma yntorjaehchu muka, vokhehkho apha iseehpak ing ihungna chukho manghuwka aningna asii, “Nang dampak ningka nachiinah?”
Ina sapa inche abasang, “Oja, rumchii aanoh chaklae amatinge ivedom vachii mee omahka, kachehmah romrom ing kajuk incha mee maensadoh chakva.”
Changlaen siimche Jesu ing ariir, “Hangsuwra, amanche naduup pomna-na sira.”
Amana inachu vadamsa vokhehkho aduupchu pomka isi achehpa.
Havi Deennii inii nache isuwhva,
chutahnache Jehudi aatuaricheh aenche idam meechu atanii Deennii iniina nang ing naduup naadom i vajeer chonghak nabakhiisa ta aeka enriir.
Ama ing ki ymmandam mee inche, naduup pomnana sira achiitah nava taka abasang ae.
Enuw ing ensii, “Achuwva havi tura achiichu?”
Changvakonchu idam mee inche Jesu va ichii manghuwmahsa, amana Jesu inche mee kaartanii ynruwhjaeh ing suwhsa.
Athar Jesu ing ama meechu rumniieen nache aantuwhfhuwrae ariirpeeh, “Atii damsachii, rungaera athar vokheh isii tumahra, havi chungna isamahpak naningna isuwh-kho arusa.”
Ama mee inche hungsuwhka Jehudi aatuaricheh ae ningna ama ing athacha meechu Jesu va taka amanthang.
Chukhaenache Jehudi aenche Jesu chu Deennii iniina ina amandam khaena ynnang embasenpa.
Amana Jesu ing abasang ae, “Kapa ing nong atunah, ama khaena kikho tuva kachiiva.”

Ama achongriir nache Jehudi aatuaricheh aenche ithehnii enjongpa; Deennii vajeer chonghak abakhii khaenapang mahka, ama ing Thangnang chu kapava achiinah vokhehkho ataksahrap Thangnang thoh amanchimpa.
Jesu ing abasang, “Atatak ing kariirnah: kapa ing atuchu mu ingka katumah naka, Mee Sapa inche anum ing yntanga itu chehmah. Ampa ing atuchu asapa ingkho atuva.
Ampa inche asapa chu aning mansiihka atu ari chaapchu amansiiva. Havi chungna iruung iruung aajaehkho mansii vaata, amanache nenuw ngikva nenta.
Ampa inche ithii amanring vaang, asapa ingkho pining achii ningnache apeehnah.
Ampa ing achuw tikho vajeer tumah. Asapa ningna vajeer itunii aatuaricheh aangkheng apeehsa.
Amanche mee vakhae ing ampa aajavaang, asapa chukho ijavaatae. Achuw yngkheh ing asapa chu ijamah nave ajenchiir ampa chu aajamahva.”

Atatak ing kariirnah: Achuw yngkheh ing hava kariir chaap i rungaeka amanche ki ynjenchiirchu athacha mee inche ichen naemah ringkum phavaata. Entaklina vajeer yntumahnii changvakonchu ithii tanii iring emphapa.
Atatak ing kariirnah: Aphachu thengsa-apha ichiichu ahenphadehpa-ithii aenche Thangnang sapa iruurchu siivaatae, amachu asiichaap aenche iring phavaatae.
Ampa taklina ringkum suwhnii om vaange, asapa ningna chenkho ringkum suwhnii apeehpa.
Asapa chu mee taklina vajeer itunii aatuaricheh apeehpa, akhaechuve atak i Mee Sapa chutah nava.
Havi khaena nenuw ngikmahruw; ithii vakhae aenche asenruwrchu siiva enchii apha ahenphapa.
Thaen tanii hungsuwh vaatae; isa atu vakhae aenche hangring ae naka paarvaatae amana isii atu vakhae aenche hangring ae naka achinii vajeer phavaatae.

“Kataksah aatuaricheh ing yntanga itu chehmah ing; Thangnang ing ajeriir nache vajeer katu vatah, amatah nache kavajeer i ichumva, yngkhaena ynchii imbe kamanden-sahna tumah ing changvakonchu ki ynjenchiir amanden inuwzii inche katu vatah.”
“Kasaarkhii i kamandensah tanii vanave ichumrem chuva ichii rumahnii.
Changvakonchu kathenna saarkhii apeeh yngkheh omna, ama ing ariirchu chumna ichii kamanghuwsa.
Johon ningting nenuw ing chongjeermee nenchiir, amanche ama ing ichum inche ajeer.
Ki chuve mee ningtanii saarkhii kaphamahva; Hava kajeer inge nenuw vakhae nenringnii ynsuwh vaata.
Johon kha jaemi chuwhka vokhehkho ynreen thoh aanghakva, amanche nenuw ing apha topohpang khaena ireng nache nenrotha manroh nungka tavanenta.

Kakhaena saarkhii kadeensa, havi Johon ing ympeeh saarkhii chungna ruunghakna. Katu chaap i kapa ing atu inuwzii ing katuva, ama inche kathenna ariirnah vokhehkho kapa ing kichu ynjenchiirva ichii amandangniisa.
Ki ynjenchiir kapa ingkho kathenna saarkhii apeehsa, amanche nenuw ing asenruwrchu siimah dehchuw vokhehkho amaekho mumahchuw,
amanche ajaera chukho nenbarung-riir sungna siimahchuw, akhaechuve ynjenchiir ningnache thachamah sachuw.
Ynthiing thiimziih chuve nenpanah, akhaechuve amanache ichen naemah ringkum tuwhva kenta ichii nemandenpa. Changvakonchu ynthiing thiimziih inchembe kakhaena saarkhii pika chongna.
Changkhang nakho atanii ipha ing kaningting ringkum iphanii khaena huungmahchuw.”
“Ki ing mee ae ningtanii ympah-chu jongmah ing.
Nenuw ynchii mee vachuw ichii kamanghuw sachuw, vokhehkho nenbarungriir sungna Thangnang ningsiih deenmahchuw ichiikho kamanghuwsa.
Kapa aatuaricheh thohche ki ijuwngping amachu nenuw ing iheri mahchuw; changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing ataksah aatuaricheh thoh juwngnave herivanenta.
Nenuwve yngkheh ing yngkheh isuursah nengadiksa, changvakonchu Thangnang tanii isuursah iphanii chuve jongmahchuw. Amachu inche kichu ynsaangkhe ithachava nenchiiva?
Kapa ningna ki ing nenuw i manraarva kachuw ichii ing kharmahruw. Mosi ningna ningmanden nemangom ingkhe nenuwchu imanraar savaata.
Mosi chu atatak ing nenthacha vanave kichu ithachava nenchiiva, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ama ing ki achuwva ichiichu abaziihchir vasahva.
Changvakonchu ama ing abaziih nenthachamah vakhaka, ki ing kariirchu ynsaang khenche thachava nenta?”
Havi aanuwna Jesu ing Galili chiiding laar kahsa (Tiberia chiiding kho enchiinah ae).
Amana mee inempak aenche aanuw enjii, akhae-chuve ama ing ina ae taklinache laetho tuka amandamchu emupa.
Jesu ing reenting hangkarka asebok ae thohche ongsa.
Atii Jehudi ae Manlaennii Kuurva aphachu hunganeengsa.
Jesu ing paamkhuw athiirtah nache mee inempak ing aningting itheng aechu amupa, chukhaenache Philip ningna asii, “Havana mee ae chaap i mamaarnii khaena unakhe tar iriiva taruw?”
Havi Jesu ing Philip chu abarungriir aabuwrnii vatah, atatak chuve ama ing ynchii tuvakate ichiichu amanghuw vasahva.
Philip ing abasang, “Dinari chanii ing tar eeriitah nakho topohter thung-cheh mahnii ae.”
Asebok yngkheh Andriu ichii Simon Pitar naepa ing aningna ariir,
“Nae-pang yngkheh ing tar runga re nga ynniimeh achisa; changvakonchu mee hangjaeh inem nenche amachupang inche ynchii tuniiva taruwkhang?”
“Mee aekha mangong aeruw taka Jesu ing eningna ariirpa. Ama minchu fuwr inempak om. Chutahnache mee aangkheng ongsae, amana pasar aechu lising runga vakhae ae.”
Jesu ing tarchu verika bor apeeh aanuwna, asebok ae ningting jepika, amana asebok aenche mee vakhaechu empeehpa. Nga chukho aanghakjaeh ing bor pika enven ynva ing ensah ae.
Mee vakhaechu enven abava aanuwna Jesu ing sebok ae ningna ariir, “Abarii chaap aekha mampaam rudeh ing khuumruw.”
Chutahnache tar rungarik ensahnii tanii abarii chaapchu engkhuum tahnache buruk suum ariiniichak isip emangkong.
Jesu ing ama laetho atuchu emutah nache, mee aenche laaruw paamna jungtheng vaata enchii jaepharchu havi vachii vatah ta aeka enriir.
Mee aenche atakchu ruw ae naka iruwng amanvinii tuteehva enchiichu Jesu ing amanghuwtah nache taenka reenting hangkarsa.
Khuri ajungvitah nache Jesu sebok aenche chiidingchu enjepuwhpa,
ruwkuwng nache hangong aeka Kaparnaum laartingche ynriae. Jaen hungvi ipha ing Jesu ing embuum ting juwngmahsa.
Amana khuwsii ivaanleh inche chiichu aanohpa.
Sebok aenche meil runga kuruk vakhae enjehuur aanuwna Jesu ing chii taklina ivasichu emutah nache ynchiksae.
Amana Jesu ing ynchik mahruw kiping taka eningna averiir.
Enuw ing Jesu chu mangong nungka enchiipak ing ruwkuwng nache emangong tahnache, enuw ing vatungniiva enchii aphamchu anikung-narap vatungsae.
Akhuwvaar nache chiiding laarna mee inempak ongpoh aenche ruwkuwng yngkhehpang omvatah ichii engaansii. Enuw ing Jesu chu sebok ae thoh ynruwhak mahsa anumpang ing emahpa ichii emanghuw.
Tiberias tanii ruwkuwng areh chuve Aafhuw ing tarchu bor apeeh aanuwna ensah-nii yntong tingche ivasi aechu emu.
Amana enuw ing ruwkuwng nache Jesu vokhehkho asebok ae chukho ynvaemahsae ichii emutah nache, enuw ing ruwkuwng nache hangong aeka Jesu ijong Kaparnaum tingche vasisae.
Enuw ing Jesu chu chiiding denkhehna engaantuwhfhuw tahnache aningna enriir, “Oja, utaraenkhe havane ivatung vachii?”
Jesu ing eningna abasang, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah: Nenuw ing ki ynjongchuw i laetho katukha nemutah namahva, tar kha nenven ynva ing nensahtah nakhenva.

Maangvachii isahfhuw khaenache nong tumahruw; ama changdenna ichen naemah ing chitha paarvachii ringkum phanii khaenache nong turuw. Haviva Mee Sapa inche thaemin ipiva chiichu, akhaechuve ampa Thangnang inche ataklina ahakpa.”
Chutahnache enuw ing aningna ensii, “Thangnang ing kenuwchu tuae naka achii amandenchu kenuw ing ynchii tuchehva kenchiiva?”
Jesu ing abasang ae, “Thangnang ing tutanuwka achii amanden chuve ama ing ajenchiir ningnache ithacha chuva.”
Enuw ing embasang, “Ynchii laetho tutaniika kemutahna nangchu thachava kenchii vachii? Ynchii tuvaanta?
‘Ama ing thangbaen tanii eningna isahfhuw manna jepika ensah ae taka ynziih vaangche, kemfhuw fhuwven aenche paamfhuw nache manna ensah ae.’ ”
Jesu ing eningna ariir, “Ki ing neningna atatak ing kariirnah, Mosi ing thangbaen tanii tar ympimahva; changvakonchu kapa ing thangbaen tanii tarchu ympeehva.
Thangnang ing ympeeh tar chuve thangbaen tanii juwngka laaruw paamna iringnii apeeh chuva.”
Enuw ing aningna enriir, “Oja, keningna ama tarchu anasiir ipisara.”
“Ki iringnii tar chuping taka Jesu ing eningna ariir. Kaningting ihuung meechu utaraenkho aven chaammahnii; vokhehkho ki ynthacha mee inche utaraenkho achii raarmah reehnii.”
Ataraenkho neningna kariirnah, nenuw ing ki ymmupa-chuw amachu ithachamah tanuw.
Kapa ing kaningna ymmansir vakhae ae chuve kaningting huung vaatae. Kaningting ihungruwh chaap achuwkho hedamahning,
akhae-chuve laaruw paamne ijuwng ingchu ki kamanden itunii khaena mahva, ki ynjenchiirchu amanden tunii khaenava.
Ki ynjenchiir ing aman-den chuve haviva, ama ing kaningna ympeeh aechu yngkheh pangkho maangrudeh inche achinii inii nache iringkiir emphanii chuva.
Kapa ing amandenrem chuve Mee Sapa chu munaka aningna athacha vakhaechu ichen naemah iringnii ipha chuva. Amana ki ing achinii inii nache manringva katae.
“Ki thangbaen tanii ijungtheng tar chuping taka ama ing ariirtah nache, enuw ing ataklina inempak chongsae.”
