Jesu ing abasang, “Ki kajuwng-mahri raentaang heringjaeh rasiing ichii manden ningve, naningna ynchii takhang? Kaanuw ijiira!”

Amatah nache Jesu aanuwzii aenche havana sebok i thikmah dehnii ta aeka enareer sungna ichong ae. Changvakonchu Jesu ing ama thikmah dehnii tamah; ama ing achii chuve, ki kajuwngmahri raentaang heringjaeh rasiing ichii manden ningcha; naningna ynchii takhang achii vatah.
Hava sebok iva hava vakhae takline saarkhii pika vokhehkho hava vakhae i abaziihsa; amanche inuw ing ariir vakhae i chumna ichii ymmanghuwsa.
Ataraenkho Jesu ing atu ari reentaang aajaehkho omna. Ama vakhaechu baziih kiirta tamanuwve, ama thiimbuwr chuve laaruw paam chirmahnii ichii ing kamandennah.
vokhehkho Jesu chu ajeri aanii ipha inche ama ing nong atu ari amanchuw ae, abasenraennii ing aangkhenglaang khaena chenva.

Inii nisommanrii sungna chongthang ae ningnache yndangka vokhehkho Thangnang iruwngpaam khaena chenkho chongka, Jesu ing ijachaam akhaang aanuwnache atatak ing atakrap ringna ichiichu ynghuwnii aajaeh ing eningna yndangsa.
Jesu ing enuwthoh engaanruw raenche eningna chonghak ajeer: “Nenuw Jerusalem tanii ympeenmah dehruw, kapa chongreepchu ipivaata amanche nenuw ing kaningtanii nensii havi hehahjaehruw;
Johon inchembe chiithoh baptais amantupa, changvakonchu nenuw chuve inii topoh aanuwting laetha thohche baptais tuvanenta.”
Enuw ing theng aeka engaang-kongpoh raenche aningna ensii, “Aafhuw atarae apha ichiinencha iruwngpaamchu Isrel ne pivana-chiiva?”
Aafhuw ing eningna ariir, “Kapa ataksah aruwreng ing amanae apha vokhehkho kumthachu nenuw ing ynghuwpham suwhmah.

Chang-vakonchu ynthiing laetha nentaklina atheng inii nache nenuw ing ruwreng phavanenta; amanche Jerusalem na ing Judia aangkhenglaangna vokhehkho Samaria amanche laaruw paam avadong mahtaang aphamsiirna kasaarkhii ynsuwhva nenta.”
Jesu ing havi ariir aanuwting enuw ing engenraenche atakchu ajekipa vokheh-kho ruwrduh inche aruwpa.
Amana Jesu ing thangbaen ting yngkaechu enuw ing engenraenche enruw, peen ivaarjaeh ing ynthong ae meeniimeh inche embuum nache ngiir aeka

enriir, “Galili mee ae, nenuw ing yngkhaena ngiirchuwka thangbaen ting nengenva? Nengkaar tanii Jesu chu thangbaen ting ajeki nenuw ing nemuvaang inge, Aafhuw ing havithoh aanghakjaeh ing jungtheng vaata.”
Aanuwnache enuw ing Deennii inii nikheh thehvachii ing yndah Oleep Bung na ing Jerusalem ting junganrisae;

Amana enuw ing khuwruung tingche jungruwh aeka engongniichak chung eensungka nache Pitar, Johon, Jems, vokhehkho Aandriu, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomiu, Methiu, Jems sapa Alphius, vokhehkho Simon Zilot amanche Jems sapa Judas enuw vakhae ong ae.
Enuw vakhae inge rupanuw aethoh vokhehkho Jesu amnuw Meri amanche Jesu anae ae thohche purpoh aeka Thangnang tingche anasiirche enthamsahpa.
Ama inii sungnache Pitar ing mee chaama somnii kaarna hangiirka chong ariir.
“Kauw kanae ae, Jesu isuwrnii khaena lam aaching Judas khaene ynthiing laetha ing Devit nerna amanchong ynthiing thiimziihchu hungchumsa.
Judas inuw yngkaarna nong tunii khaenache ynvae vasahva.”
Havi khaene Jerusalem na ong mee vakhae ing amanghuwpae; chukhaenache ruwraechu enuw enchong ing Akeldama ichiichuve, sii ing aariisah ruwraeva ta aeka emphuwpa.
“Amachu ynthiing la nache ynziihka omna,
‘Ama aongniichu haangrasiing;
amanache achuw ingkho ongmah rasiing.’
Havikho ynziihka omna,
‘Achuw yngkheh ing ama aphamchu virasiing.’
Johon ing baptais khaena chong ajeer raennii ing Jesu chu yngkaar tanii thangbaen ting ajeri ipha ing ynvae meeva chiiva.”
Chukhaenache enuw ing Barnabas enchiichak Josep (Justus kho ta aeka embakepchak), re Mathias enuw meeniichu engathohpae.
Amana enuw ing thamsa aeka enriir, “Aafhuw nang ing mee vakhae barungriir namanghuwsa, chukhaenache havana mee ynniimehne
Judas ing anongpham maka ama ongniivachii ting isi achangdenna chongthang ynsuwh naka nong tuvachii naateerchu imansiisara.”
Enuw ing achuw ningna bukvaate ta aeka engkhaena engentah nache Mathias ningnache buksa, amana atakchu chongthang suum arii yngkheh kaartingche aruming ynvaesa.
Pentikos aphachu ahenphatah nache enuw vakhae inche denkhehna ipurpak ing ongsae.
Amana manghuw mangharu ing ipirpak siiraang vaang ahuwrusa inempak om thangbaen tanii siiraang ijungtheng inche engongnii eenchu sipsa.
vokhehkho bari vaang ichii mi ichuwng inche ynsaesiirka entaklina ichuwchu emupa.
Enuw vakhaechu Ynthiing Laetha inche sip aeka, vokhehkho enuw ing laetha ing amanchongcheh ae reentaang chong inche ichong embasenpa.
Atii Jerusalem nache Thangnang ynden Jehudi ae, apaam lija tanii chaap theng aeka ong ae.
Enuw ing huwrusachu ensiitah nache mee inempak yngkongsae vokhehkho ngiksae, akhaechuve ameesiir aenche entaksahsah chong ing ichong aeng ensiipa.
Mee aenche ichiisuwh vokhehkho ingikniipak ing enriirpa, “Havana ichong vakhae ae i Galili mah paekhang!
Amachu ynsaangkhe enuw ing ichong ae i inuw yntaksahsah chong pingeng ichii ing ynsiiiva?
Inuw ithengchaap muw i Pathia, Midia, vokhehkho Ilam tanii vamuw; Mesopotamia, Judia, vokhehkho Kappadosia tanii vamuw; amanche Pontus vokhehkho Asia tanii vamuw,
Phrigia vokhehkho Paamphilia, Ijeep re Sairene thoh ynneeng Libia paam tanii vamuw. Topoh chuve Rom tanii vamuw,

Judaijam ening Jehudi aere reentaang mee ae vokhehkho inuw topoh inchembe Kret re Arabia tanii manuw, changkhangnare inuw vakhae ing ynsii ichuve inuw ynchongsah ing Thangnang anong iruungpak khaena ichong ae vaang ynsiisa!”
Enuw ing ingik aethoh vokhehkho fhuwm ynvae ing yngkheh yngkheh chong aeka enriir, “Havi ynchiikhava?”
Changvakonchu areh ae inchembe maniisa aeka enriir, “Enuw ae i aren juw ing baruwsae.”

Pitar ing chongthang suum arii yngkheh ae thohche hangiirka mee ae ningnache iruur ipirpak inche chongsa: “Kauw kanae Jehudi ae vokhehkho Jerusalem sungna ong mee vakhae, havi ynchiiva ichiichu neningna riirkata irungaepeehruw.
Havana mee ae i nenuw ing juw ynruwpae ichii ing nemandennah, enuw ae i ynruwmahpae; akhaechuve ziing apha eekuw tapehna.
Changvakonchu havi jaephar Joel ing ariir chong chuva:
“Thangnang ing achii, achinii inii nache jinge suwhvaata,
Ki ing mee vakhae taklina laetha jepivakata.
Nenuw nensapa vokhehkho nensanuw aenche kachong isachu tongvaatae;
nenaepang aenche ruvaam muvaatae,
vokhehkho nengupa aenche enrumang sikvaata.
Chumna, kameenae ae, pasar vokhehkho rupanuw ae ningna rapkho,
ama inii nache kalaetha jechirva kata,
amanche enuw ing kachong isachu tongvaatae.
Amana ki ing thangbaen chungting vokhehkho laaruw paam derting ingiknii mandangva kata,
amanache sii, mi, vokhehkho mikhuwh inempak khukvaata;
Achinii iruungpak Aafhuw iniichu ahenphamahri raenche inii ing manthim vaata,
vokhehkho tha ing sii isenvaang tavaata.
Amanache Aafhuw ruming athamsah mee vakhaechu ikarpeeh phavaatae.”

“Isrel mee ae, havana chongriir i rungaeruw: Nazaret Jesu chuve nengkaarna ampa Thangnang ajaar nache laetho vokhehkho ingiknii nong aajaeh amanche buwtinnii atu ingkhe Thangnang ing aru meeva ichii nentaksahrap ing nemanghuwsa.
Jesu chu Thangnang ing asir vokhehkho maen ing amanghuw inuwzii ing neningna ipika, nenuw ing vajeer chonghak amanjiimah ae kikrina khros nache jamchuwka jopi henchuwka nenthehpa.
Chang-vakonchu Thangnang ing isii ikha ijachaam taniichu bathenka amanringpa, akhaechuve ithii inche atakchu chehmahsa.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe Devit ing Aafhuw khaena ariir,
‘Ki ing Thangnang chu kamanache anasiirna kamusa;
akhaechuve kaanlaap niimahdeh khaena Aafhuw ing kachangbaen kuurna ongna.
Havi inge ki kabarungriirna inungae ing sipning,
kabari inge rothakho rohsakna;
athurfhuw chuve kahakchaang ing kaningmanden nache ongvaata.
Aafhuw nang ing kalaetha i longkong tingche irenpeehmah tanii,
Aafhuw nang nameenae ynthiingchu thaensung nache manthukmah tanii.
Aafhuw nang ing kaningna iringnii lamchu ymmansiipasii,
Aafhuw nama nache kichu rotharoh inche imansip vaanta.’
“Kauw kanae ae, Iruwng Devit khaena ichiimjaeh ing kariirchehsa. Atak ithikkho thiksa amanche idimkho yndimsa, amanche athaenkho atanii phanii ing yngkaarna omna.
Atak jaephar yngkheh vakhaka ama atuti bahsuwm tanii yngkheh ing aaruwngpham ongniina ongva chiiva taka Thangnang ing aningna chongreep yngkheh atupeehpa ichii ama ing amanghuwpa.
Devit ing nuwting hungsuwh vachiichu maen ing muka Khrista ing hangring vachii khaena chongsa,
‘Aafhuw chu longkong tingche babuk mahsa,
Aafhuw hakchaang inche thaensung nache thukmahsa.’
Havana Jesu rem ichu Thangnang ing amanringpa, ama khaenache kenuw vakhae ing asaarkhii ynsuwhnung.

Chukhaenache Thangnang chang-baen atachang ing manruungka vokhehkho ynthiing laetha pivakachii taka ariir chongreepchu ampa ningtanii iraangka, ama ing ajechirchu nenuw ing nemu vokhehkho nensii haviva.
“Devit ing thangbaen ting karmah, changvakonchu ataksahrap ing taka,
‘Aafhuw ing ki kaafhuw ningna katachangne ongla,
nang ynjeehnii aechu ki ing nakhi bakhong derna kasiihmahri ae raentaang.’
“Chukhaenache khros na nenuw ing nentheh Jesu havi Thangnang kho Khrista kho ynsuwhsa ichiichu Isrel eengkuw chaap ing atatak ing manghuw aerasii.”
Amachu ensiitah nache, enuw embarungriirna isii ynsinvaang taka Pitar vokhehkho chongthang ae ning-nache enriir, “kenguw kenae ae kenuw ynchii tuvakenchiiva.”

Pitar ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing isii nentu chaap akuhnii inche nenbarungriir huungruw vokhehkho Jesu Khrista ruming nache nengkheng baptais turuw; amanche nenuw ing ynthiing laetha kikthuur phavanenta.
Nening nakho amanche nensiti ae ningnakho vokhehkho yndahna ong ae vakhae nakho, Thangnang ing eenvachii chaap nakho chongreepchu omna.”
Pitar ing reentaang chong aajaeh ingkho saarkhii pika, enuwchu ithoh-saka ariir, “Embarungriir ichuwhmah entaklina vajeer thengvachii havi tanii nentak sahsah nenringnii tusaruw.”
Chukhaenache ama achongchu athacha vakhae aenche baptais entupa, vokhehkho ama inii nache mee lising ynthum vakhae emphapa.
Enuw ing chongthang aeng emanchuw nache vokhehkho ningsiih ipurnache, tar isahhak nache vokhehkho ithamsah nache ympehru-deh ing embarungriir emanruwh dehpa.
Mee vakhae taklinache ynchiknii suwhsa, amanche laetho vokhehkho ingiknii aajaeh chongthang ae inche entupa.
Amana thacha mee vakhae aenche purpak aeka peehchae vakhae ynchumpoh ing ensichinniipa;
vokhehkho enuw ing endeensah vakhae juwr aeka achuw yngkheh ing kaaniivachii inuwzii inche mee vakhae ningnache ensempa.
Anasiir rumniieen nache barungriir yngkhehpang ing yntuwh aeka, een een nache tar bakhii aeka rotharoh ing vokhehkho barungriir ichampak inche sahakpoh aeka,
enuw ing Thangnang manpah aeka ong ae, amanche mee vakhae taniikho ningsiih empha, vokhehkho ikarpeeh apha aechu Aafhuw ing anasiirche eningna mee ahemanempa.
Atii apha eekuw hungtakka Pitar re Johon ing rumniieen tingche ithamsahnii khaena sisae.

Amanache amnuw ven rupumna basenka akhi ibong pasar yngkheh veruw aeka, rumniieen nache ivaruwh mee ae tanii meeningsiih athamsah aniihmee inche, Isapak Suwngkung enchii eenkhaarkung nache anasiir emangong.
Pitar re Johon inche rumniieen asungtingche envaruwh phana ama ing enuwchu muka eningsiih athamsahpa.
Enuw ing atakchu enteeh aeka amana Pitar ing ariir, “Keningting ihengenla.”
Ama ing eningtanii iphafhuw phava katamo taka abarungriir iruwhdeh ing ahengenpa.
Changvakonchu Pitar ing ariir, “Ki sana rupa deensamah ing, ki ing kadeensah chuve naningna kapeehnahchii: Nazaret Jesu Khrista rumingna hangiir nana karkhiingla!”
Pitar ing akik nache jebachuwka ahemangiirpa, aphachak nache akhi vokhehkho akhi bakhongchu vapirsa.
Amatah nache ama ing hangan thohka ngiirsa amanche hungsi vasikho atupa, ama ing ihuung iva tuka ynthoh sehsehka vokhehkho Thangnang manpahka enuwthoh ynruw ing rumniieen tingche varuwhsa.
Ama ing hunsi vasi tuka Thangnang amanpahchu mee vakhae ing emupa;
Rumniieen Isapak Suwngkung nache ningsiih iphasahnii khaena ongchak aniihmee khava ichii enuw ing manghuw aeka, ataklina isuwh nongchu ingiknii vokhehkho ichiisuwh ing bariimsa.
Ama ing Pitar re Johon chu abachuw raenche, mee vakhae inche ngik aeka Solomon eensukreen ichii nache vataensae.

Pitar ing amachu ajemutah nache mee ae ningnache ariir, “Isrel mee ae, kenuw kentaksah ruwreng ing changmahka keningsiih ing mee havi kemansicheh khaena atakline nenuw ynkhaena ingik vachuw, changmahka ynchii khaena kentaklina yngenteeh vachuw?

Abraham, Isak vokhehkho Jakop Thangnang, apa fhuwven aekho Thangnang inche ameenae Jesu chu alaar isa apeehpa. Changvakonchu nenuw ingve Aafhuw chu aatuaricheh ae kikting nenpeehpa, Pilaat ing bathenning takhang nakho amaekung nache rumahchuw.
Changvakonchu ynthiing vokhehkho isa Aafhuw atakchu rumah chuwka miktheh pasarpa yngkhehchu bathenla tachuwka neniihsahpa,
amanche iringnii Aafhuw chuve nenthehpa; Aafhuw amachu Thangnang ing ithii ae kaartanii amanringpa, ama khaenache kenuw asaarkhii nung.
Aafhuw ruming athacha nenuw ing nemu vokhehkho nemanghuw pasar havichu Aafhuw ruming inche akarpa; chumna, Aafhuw tanii ynsuwh thacha inche nenuw vakhae maanache ataklina idamkiirniichu apeehpa.
“Ataraene kauw kanae ae, nenuw nenfhuwven aeng emanghuw-mah vaangkhe, nenuw ingkho nemanghuwmah ing nentuva ichii ki ing kamanghuwsa.
Changvakonchu Thangnang ing ajae isivasahna jaephar ae jaarnache Khrista ing ijachaam phavachii khaena amanthangchu ama ing jinge areer abasuwpa.
Chukhaenache nenbarungriir huungnuwna athar hunganlehruw, nentaklina isii icher chaapchu ikuhpeeh vaata; nenuw ing changche tutanuwve laetha ruwreng aphachu Thangnang tanii thengvaata,
vokhehkho nengkhaena aateer vasah Khrista Jesu chu ama ing jenbathen vaata.
Peeh aangkhenglaang ithar ing aseemmahri raentaangche Aafhuw ing thangbaen nache ongjaeh vaata ichii khaena Thangnang ing ajae ynthiing jaephar ae nerna amanjeer vasahva.
Mosi ing taka, ‘Aafhuw Thangnang ing nenuw nenguw nenae ae sungna nengkhaena ki vaange ichii jaephar yngkheh jenbathen vaata, ama ing neningna ariir chong vakhaechu siiruw.
Havi hungsuwh vaata, jaephar chong amanjiimah mee vakhaechu Thangnang mee ae tanii asik ing khaenaka yngkuupkiir ing mamaang vaatae.’
Samuel na ing ynthaang chakchak ing hungsuwh jaephar chaap aenche iriirfhuw vakhaechu atarae apha hungvi ipha inge enjeerpa.

Nenuw chuve jaephar ae jaarna Thangnang ing chongreep atuchu nengkhaenava, amatah nache Thangnang ing nenfhuw fhuwven aethoh chongreep enrinache nenuwkho ynvaenachuw. Thangnang ing Abraham ningna ariir, ‘Natuti bahsuwm ae jaarnache laaruw paam mee aangkhengna bor pivakata.’
Amaensana Thangnang ing neningna ameenaechu ihenbasuw peehka neningtanii isii icher mee vakhaechu barungriir isamah tanii nenghunganrinii khaenache bor ympeehpa.”
Pitar re Johon ing mee ae ningna enchong raenche jaethiim ae, rumniieen aarung aapuh iruung vokhehkho Saduki aenche eningna inempak nungaemahsae.
Amachuve enuw ing mee aechu Jesu ing ithii ae kaartanii hangringva ta aeka emanchuw inche ithii mee chaap hangring vaata ichii amandangniipa.
Enuwchu suwr aeka khuwvaar ipha ing kaeshum nache engkhumpa, akhaechuve apha khuri hungvisa.
Changvakonchu enchongchu sii aeka athacha ae mee aechu pasar lising runga empha.
Aanuw inii khuw hungvaar nache Jehudi upa ae, aapuh ae vokhehkho thiimthang ae Jerusalem nache
Aanchung Jaethiim Annas re Kaiphas, Johon vokhehkho Alekjender amanche aanchung jaethiim eengkuw vakhaekho ynvae ing yngkongsae.
Amana enriknache mangiir aeka chong ensii, “Ynchii ruwrengna vokhehkho achuw rumingna nenuw ing havi nentuva?”
Aphanache Pitar ynthiing laetha ing sipka eningna ariir, “Mee aapuh ae vokhehkho upa ae:
Atanii kenuwchu ijachaam apha akhi ibong ningne isa nong kentupeeh khaena ynchii ruwreng ing nemansakva tatanuwka ynsii vatanuwve,

nenuw vakhae neningna vokhehkho Isrel mee vakhae ningna kamanthangsahnah, nenuw ing khros na nentheh Thangnang ing ithii ae kaartanii amanring Nazaret Jesu Khrista ruming ajaarna mee havi inge damkiirka nenuw vakhae nemaana ngiirna.
Jesu Khrista i ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirchuva,
‘Een itu mee aeng enrimah rungchu,
athurfhuwrungchu ynsuwhsa.’
Achuw mee reentaang ningnakho manlaenpeeh phanii omah;
Thangbaen derna inuwchu ikarvachii laaruw mee kaarna ruming akhiing reentaang achuwkho omah.”
Enuw ing Pitar re Johon enthona isachu emutah nache vokhehkho thiim-ziih iteenmah meechaam meepae ichii emanghuwtah nache, inempak ngik aeka enuw Jesu thoh ynruwhaknae ichii emanghuwpa.
Changvakonchu ina idam mee inche enuwthoh ingiirhakchu emutah nache enriirfhuw yntanga omahsa.
Chukhaenache enuwchu aanchungpuh eensung tanii taang basuw aeka, enuw yngkheh yngkheh chong manseer aeka enriir,
“Inuw ing entakline ynchiikha tutaruw?” Akhaechuve enuw ing ingikniipak laetho entupa ichii Jerusalem na ong mee vakhae ing emanghuwpa, amanche inuw ing amachu irumah chehmahmuw.

Changvakonchu mee ae kaarna havi chungna athiseh ing athangsehseh niimah khaenache, enuw atarae basen naka achuw ningnakho hava rumingne ichong niimah khaena inuw ing ipirpak ing manchiih taeruw enchii.
Chukhaenache entakchu een aeka Jesu rumingna ichongkho enchong niimah inche vokhehkho achuw ningnakho ynchuw rumahnii ta aeka chonghak apeehpae.
Changvakonchu Pitar re Johon ing embasang ae, “Thangnang tanii chungna ithi ing nenchong kemanjii inche Thangnang mik-enna ichumva ichummahva, nenuw vajeer itupeehruw.
Kenuw ing kemu vokhehkho kensiichu ichongmah chehmah ung.”
Chukhaenache aanchungpuh aenche enuwchu manang chehmahva enchii ing emutah nache ipirpak chong ing manchiih aeka embathenpae, akhaechuve isuwh nong khaenache mee vakhae ing Thangnang emanpahpae.
Havi kum sommanrii aaraen upa yngkheh ina taklina laetho tuaeka emandam khaena chenva.
Enuwchu embathen thoh, enruwr ae ningting hunganriaeka eningna aanchung jaethiim aere upa aeng enriirchu entongpa.

Ama chongchu thacha ruwr aenche ensiitah nache enuw vakhae barungriir yngkhehpang ing Thangnang ting enthamsahpa: “O Aafhuw, nang chuve thangbaen, laaruw paam, chifhuw vokhehkho asungna omchap vakhae aaseemchu vachii!
Ynthiing laetha ajaarna kempa Devit nernache ymmanjeer peehchii,
‘Ynchii khaena reentaang mee aenge hangjaehmeh embarung emansikva,
vokhehkho mee aenche ynchii khaena ikaniimah aechu emandenva?
Aafhuw vokhehkho Khrista irumah nache laaruw paam iruwng chaap aeng hangiirsae,
vokhehkho aapuh aenche yntuwhpohsae.’
Aafhuw nakik ing vokhehkho nuwting hungsuwh vachii maen ing nasirvasah vakhaechu itunii khaenache yntuwhpohsae.
Amatah nache atiive Aafhuw, enuw ing kenuw ymmanchiih aechu ijebuwrpeehsar vokhehkho nameenae kenuwchu thona isa ing nachong isachu ichongnii ipisar.
Ina idamnii inche nachangbaen eethohpeeh sanana ynthiing nameenae Jesu ruming ajaarnache ingiknii vokhehkho laetho tunii ipisara.”
Enuw ing ithamsah emanchichak thoh, enuw engongnii aphamchu ynnuhsa; vokhehkho engkheng ynthiing laetha inche sip aeka thona isapak ing Thangnang chong isachu chongsae.
Vokheh-kho Aafhuw Jesu ing ihangring khaenache iruungpak ruwreng thoh ynruw ing chongthang aenche saarkhii empeeh ae, vokhehkho tungsiih inempak emphasah.
Engkaarna achuwkho ivaeh ichii omah dehsa, akhaechuve paam vakhang nakho changmahka ruwbaar adeen vakhae aenche juwr aeka amenchu vechi aeka,
Chongthang ae ningna emansir; amanche achuw yngkheh kaaniivachii khaena ameesiir nache asem ae.
Saipras na om Levi ichii Josep, chongthang aeng Barnabas ta aeka engeenniichak (ichiichuve thona ipeeh mee) inche
adeensah aruwrae juwrka amanche amenchu chongthang ae ningting vechika engkikna amansirpa.
Aphanache Anania ichii pasar re arumee aruming Saphira enuw inche endeensah paam yngkheh enjuwrpa.
Ama arumee ingkho amanghuw ing amenchu sarup yngkheh siika, sarup yngkhehchu vechika chongthang ae ningnache avapeehpa.

Changvakonchu Pitar ing Anania ningna ariir, “Anania, ynthiing laetha taklina nang ing mare itunii khaena, napaam najuwr amenchu sarup yngkheh nasiihnii ing, umlae inche nabarungriir yngkhaena amansipva?

Nang ing najuwrmahri raenche natasahva amanche najuwr aanuwtingche amenchu natasah vatah. Nang ing natu nong havi nabarungriirna nakharchu yngkhae-nava? Nang ing mee taklina ichummah natu changchii mahva, Thangnang taklina natuva.”
Hava chong i Anania ing asiithoh ama tiihka thiksa; amana isuwhchu asii vakhae aenche inempak ynchiksae.
Iler aenche hangiir aeka ahakchaangchu irom aeka, taang jenbasuw aeka envadimpa.
Apha ynthum vakhae aanuw-tingche, aarangnuw ing isuwh nongchu manghuwru ing varuwhsa.
Pitar ing aningna ariir, “Nenuw ing nenjuwr paam amen chakchu kaningna riirla.”

Ama ing abasang, “Chumna, changjaeh pangna kenjuwr vatah.” Amatah nache Pitar ing aningna ariir, “Thangnang laethachu ennii khaena nenuw ing nenruhakchu ynchii khaenava? Enla, nafhuwsar kha aadim ae atarae eenkharkungna ngiirnae, nangkho enuw ing ivadim vaatae.”
Aphachak nache amakho Pitar akhi derna tiihka thiksa. Iler aenche envaruwh tahnache ithiichu muaeka enuw ing atakchu idom aeka afhuwsar buumtingche envadimpa.
Ruwrthiing aangkheng ing vokhehkho isuwh nong asii vakhae taklinache ynchiknii suwhsa.
Atii chongthang aenche mee ae kaarna laetho vokhehkho ingiknii inempak entupa. Amana enuw eng-khengche Solomon eensukreen nache barungriir yngkhehpang ing ong ae.
Changvakonchu reentaang areh aenchembe engkaarna vaanvae chehmah ae, changkhangnare mee aenchembe engajapak ae.
Chu-khaenache pasar kho, rupanuw kho thacha mee hungnemsae.
Amatah nache Pitar ing ahungsirae aruthaksii ing vakhangnare achuw yngkhehkheh taklina ataknii khaenache, ina aechu lamfhuw chaap nache hembasuw aeka ijaarnii vokhehkho duup nache emantorpa.
Jerusalem khuwruung akuurchaap tanii mee aengkho ina ae vokhehkho umlae ing ichuwng vakhae ae chukho veruw aeka engaangkong tahnache aangkheng amandampa.
Aanchung Jaethiim vokhehkho ama aruwr ae engkheng, amanche Saduki ae ruwr aenche chongthang ae taklina inempak kallaksae; chukhaenache enuw ing isamah itunii khaena ngiirsae.
Enuw ing chongthang aechu suwr aeka kaeshum tingche ensiihpa.
Changvakonchu ama jaen nache Aafhuw vaarmee inche kaeshum eenkhaar vakhaechu imongka vokhehkho taang basuw aeka ariir,
“Sinuwna nenuw ing rumniieen nache ngiirnuwna mee ae ningnache iringnii chong havi khaene chongruw.”
Enuw ing ama chongchu ensiitah nache, rumniieen tingche khuwvaar phana varuwh aeka mee aechu emanchuwpae.
Changvakonchu Aanchung Jaethiim vokhehkho aanruwfhuw ae inche vatheng aeka aanchungpuh ae vokhehkho Jehudi upa vakhaechu een aeka, enuwchu ihenruwnii khaenache kaeshum tingche envechiirpa.
Changvakonchu itheng phamnae aenche entakchu kaeshum sungnache envatuwhmah tahnache hunganriaeka emanthangpa,
“Kaeshum eenkhaar aangkheng isajaeh ing yngkamka vokhehkho eenkhaarkung aarung mee aekho hengiir ing kenvepha ae, changvakonchu eenkhaarchu kengamong tahnache sungnache achuwkho tuwhmahsung.”
Atii aanchung jaethiim aere rumniieen aarung ae aapuh enuw inche hava chong i ensiitah nache, chongthang ae taklina ynchii isuwhva ta aeka enruwriimsa.
Amana mee yngkheh vathengka eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing kaeshum sungna nengkhum mee aekha rumniieen sungna ngiir aeka mee ae emanchuwnah ae.”
Chukhaenache aapuh inche mee ae thohche vakka chongthang aechu ahenruwpae, changvakonchu ithipak inchembe tumah ae, akhaechuve mee ae ing rung ing ideengva taemo ichii khaena ynchik ae.
Enuw ing chongthang aechu henruw aeka, aanchungpuh ae maanache emangiirpa, amanche aan-chung jaethiim inche chong siiaeka ariir,

“Hava mee rumingne mee manchuw mahruw ta ungka neningna ipirpak ing chonghak kempeehchuw.” Changvakonchu enruw, nenuw ing nemanchuw chong inge Jerusalem aphamsiirna sipsa, mee havi asiichu kentaklina babunungka ichii ing nentunah.
Changvakonchu Pitar vokhehkho chongthang aenche embasang, “Mee ae tanii changve Thangnang chong manjiiva kenta.
Nenuw ing thing taklina jamchuwka nentheh Jesu kha afhuw fhuwven ae Thangnang inche amanringpa.
Isrel mee ae ningnache barungriir huungnii vokhehkho isii ikuhpeehnii khaenache Thangnang ing Aafhuw havichu Eepuh ing vokhehkho Eekarpeeh vachii ing akik tachang inche eethohpeehpa.
Thangnang ing Aafhuw amachu ariir amanjii vakhae ningna kikthuur apeeh ynthiing laetha re kenuw ing hava vakhae khaene saarkhii pung.”
Enuw ing hava chong i ensiitah nache embarung siksa vokhehkho theh ae nungka enchiipa.
Changvakonchu aanchungpuh ae kaarna thiimthang aruming Gamaler ichii mee ae ing inempak engaja, ama inche hangiirka chongthang aechu amongpang khaena taang basuwnii chong amanthangpa.
Ama ing eningna ariir, “Isrel mee ae, nenuw ing entakline ynchii tukenta nenchiiva ynriimsaruw.

Isivasah iniina upa aruming Theudas pasarpa ataksah ing ipirpak iruung mee yngkhehping ichii ing mandenka, mee chamanrii vakhae ing aanuw enjii. Changvakonchu atakchu entheh tahnache, aanuwjii aechu kiichir aeka ynchiikho ynsuwhmahsa.
Ama mee aanuwnache mee masing iteen aphanache Galili mee Judas ing ama aanuwjii topoh akhuumpa, changvakonchu amakho enthehpa vokhehkho aanuwjii vakhae ae chukho kiichirsae.

Chutahnache atarae vaathuh havi khaene neningna kariirnah, nenuw entaklina yntanga tumahruw, enum ing bathen aeruw akhaechuve enuw ing emanden vokhehkho entu enong havi laaruw mee tanii vanave chenvachii vatah,
changvakonchu Thangnang tanii vanave nenuw ing chehmah ae tanuw. Thangnang ijeehniipae ichii vara phaniiva nenta.”
Gamaler ing chong atahpeeh aechu aanchungpuh aenche enrupa, amana chongthang aechu een aeka embinpa vokhehkho atii Jesu rumingne ichong rumahnii ichii chongchu ipirpak ing riir aeka embathenpae.
Chongthang aenche Jesu khaena ningjak ympha havi iphapham isuwhremva ta-aeka aanchungpuh ae ningtanii rotharohpak inche jungsuwhsae.
Anasiir nache enuw ing rumniieen nache vokhehkho eensung chaap nache manchenrudeh ing Jesu i Khrista chuva ichiichu manchuw aeka entong.

Atii hava inii sungne mee hung-nem ahenthi tahnache, Grik chong ing ichong Jehudi aenche Hebreeu ae taklinache eningtanii muwkhuwnuw aechu anasiir ipeehfhuw ensemchak nache eebuwrpeeh mahsae ta aeka ichong embasenpa.
Chutahnache mee suum ariinii aenche sebok vakhae aechu een aeka enriir, “Mee ae hungbom vabomnii khaene Thangnang isa chong itongchu ynchendoh chummahnii.
Chukhaenache kenguw kenae ae, athang isa, ynthiing laetha ing isip vokhehkho ising iveer mee, hava nong khaene pham pivaanchii nengkaar tanii eeteer peehruw.
Amana chembe kenuw ing ithamsahna vokhehkho isa chong itongnii apha khaena barungriir ruwhvaata.”

Enuw ing enriir chong nache mee vakhae barungriirchu penka, enuw ing thacha re ynthiing laetha ing isip Stephen, amanche Philip, Prokorus, Nikamor, Timon, vokhehkho Parmenas amanche Reen-taang mee Judaijam ting iruwhvasah Entiok tanii Nikolos, enuw vakhae ichu iteer aeka
Chongthang ae maanache emangiirpae; amana enuw ing entaklina engkik siiaeka enthamsah.
Amana Thangnang isa chongchu hungruungsa; vokhehkho Jerusalem nache sebok masing hungnemsa, vokhehkho jaethiim inempak aenche ithacha emphapa.
Stephen ing tungsiih vokhehkho ruwreng ing sipka iruungpak laetho vokhehkho ingiknii mee ae kaarna atupa.
Freedmen meekongnii enchii ruwr ae tanii, Sairene ae, amanche Alekjendria ae, vokhehkho Silisia tanii, amanche Asia tanii hangiir aeka Stephen thohche ynjeehniisae.
Changvakonchu ising iveer ing vokhehkho laetha thoh ynruw ing ichong nache enuw ing manraar chehmah ae.
Chukhaenache enuw ing mee topoh aechu emanriirpae amachuve, ama ing Mosi re Thangnang taklina arumah ing ichong kenuw ing kensiipa.
Enuw ing mee ae vokhehkho upa ae, amanche thiimthang aechu embasohpa. Enuw aenche vasuwr aeka aanchungpuh ae maanache enghenruwpa.

Enuw ing ataklina ichummah iriirnii khaena sungting mee topoh envemanruwhpa. Amana enuw aenche enriir, “Hava mee inge havana ynthiing rumniieen takline vokhehkho Mosi vajeer chonghak taklina arumah ing ichong manchen mahdeh,
amachuve Nazaret Jesu havi inge rumniieen ichu mamaang naka vokhehkho Mosi ing ympivasah ynjiifhuwchu manteh vaata taka ama ing ariir kenuw ing kensiipa.”
Aanchungpuh vakhae aenche aningting engenteeh tahnache, ama amaechu vaarmee mae vaang ichii ing emupa.
Aanchung jaethiim aenche aningna ensii, “Hava chong i chumne?”
Ama ing abasang, “Kauw kanae ae vokhehkho kapa kafhuw ae, irungaepeeh saruw! Apa Abraham ing Haran ting ipaarnii khaena asimahrirae, Mesopotamia nache Thangnang alaar isa ing yndangka
aningnache, nang ing na-eengkuw nachaangru ae vokhehkho napaam nachii bathen nana ki ing mansiiva kachiichii paam tingche sira achii.
Chukhaenache ama ing Kaaldia paam taniichu hungsuwhka Haran tingche hungongsa; amana ampa athik aanuwting atarae nenpaarnii paamne Thangnang ing ahung mangongpa.

Changvakonchu Thangnang ing ata-sah khaena vokhehkho akhi chuwngnii vachii rapkho pimah, changvakonchu Thangnang ing aningna pivakata achii vokhehkho atuti bahsuwm aechu aafhuw engaansuwhnii inche pivakatae taka Abraham ing siti deenmah khangnare chongreep atupa.
Thangnang ing aningna jinge ichii ing ariir, ‘Nang nasiti aenche mee lipah ting ongvaatae, amana mee lipah aenche kum chamanrii suwh ing engongraenche ijachaam manpha vaatae.’
Entaklina ijachaam amanpha ae taklinache ki ing vajeer tuvakata, vokhehkho ama aanuwdeh nache enuw ing hungsuwh ae naka hava maphamne ki irum vaatae ichii chongchu Thangnang ing ajeer vasahva.

Thangnang ing aningna nang vinchiip tuva nachiiva ichii chukho chonghak apeehpa. Chukhaenache Abraham ing Isak omchu inii neeriih ahenpha chakna vinchiip atupa; amanche Isak ing asiti Jakop chu vinchiip atupa amanche Jakop ing asapa suum ariinii afhuw fhuwven aechu vinchiip atupeehpae.
“Jakop sapa aenche Josep taklina kallak aeka, enuw ing atakchu Ijeep paam tingche suwh ing enjuwrpa. Changvakonchu Thangnang ing atakchu aanruwfhuw.

Chukhaenache ama ijachaam aajaeh tanii karpeehka Ijeep iruwng Pharo maana ningsiih phanii khaenache ising iveernii apeehpa, amana atakchu Ijeep lipah vokhehkho Pharo eengkuw taklina aapuh phamchu apeehpa.
Apha vokhehna Ijeep vokhehkho kanaan lipah nache isah taangka mee ijachaam inempak aphapae, amana afhuw fhuwven aenche isahfhuw phamahsae.
Ijeep lipah nache isahfhuw infhuw chimuw bajaang ymphanah ichii Jakop ing asiitah nache, ahaarpana asapa aechu achiirpae.
Avomanii vokheh avechiirtah ae nachencha Josep ing ai ae ningnache atakchu enaeva ichii amandangpa, amana Josep a-eengkuw aechu Pharo ing amanghuwpae.
Chukhaenache Josep ing mee chiirka ampa Jakop amanche auw anae asungkhur aangkheng mee somsarii ariirunga aechu aningting ave-eenpae.
Jakop ing Ijeep tingche vasisa, amanache atak vokhehkho asiti ae thohche thiksae.
Enuw enghakchaangchu Sikem ipha ing henreen aeka, Abraham ing Sikem na ong Hamor asapa ae tanii seer ing aarii thaenkung nache endimpa.
“Thangnang ing Abraham thoh ynruaeka chongreep entu aphachu ahungvitah nache, Josep amanghuwmah Ijeep ae iruwng reen-taang yngkheh ahungpaarmahri raentaangche,
inuw ymmee aechu Ijeep lipah nache masing inem ahenthi sehsehpa.
Iruwng havi inge inuw ynjaati taklina ijachaam pika vokhehkho inuw ynsiti aechu ren aeka afhuw fhuwven aechu ithipak ing entupae.
Apha ichiinache Thangnang maana inempak amasak isa Mosi omsa; amana atakchu ampa eenna tha ynthum enjuhpa.
Amana atakchu enrentah nache Pharo iruwng sanuw inche naeduungchu tuwhka asapa basuwnii khaena ajuhpa.
Mosi chu Ijeep ae thiimziih vakhae ising iveernii khaena amanchuwpa. Chutahnache Mosi ichongtah nakho amanche nong itutah nakho ruwreng ipir mee hungansuwhsa.
“Mosi ing kum somanrii ahenpha raenche auw anae Isrel siti aechu enningka ichii abarungriirna ahe-mandenpa.
Mosi ing enuw engkaar tanii meechu Ijeep mee yngkheh inche ichummah ing amanangchu amutah nache bomka Ijeep meechu athehpa.
Ama akik ing auw anae akarpeehsa ichiichu enuw ing emanghuwsa ichii ing amanden, changvakonchu enuw ing manghuwmahsae.
Mathang inii nikheh nache enareersahna ynna aechu muka, enuwchu engaanchaarnii khaena ama ing mee ae, nenuw unae yngkheh vachuw, yngkhaena jinge ichii ing ynnavachuw achii.
Changvakonchu aunae taklina ynraar atu ama inche Mosi chu ithikka ariir, “Nangchu achuw ing kentaklina aapuh vokhehkho vajeer tunii ymbasuwva?”
Nang ing ajaennii Ijeep mee natheh vaangkhe, kikho thehkachii ynchii vachii?
Mosi ing hava chong i asiitah nache ama ing Ijeep lipah tanii taenka Midian paam nache paarsa. Amanache ama ing sapa ynnii adeen.
“Kum sommanrii ahengaraen nuwting Sinai bung lampa ikor kaarna vaarmee yngkheh ing thing ana om yngkheh manchuwhka mi ichuwhchu amansiipa.
Mosi ing amachu amutah nache inempak ngiksa; amanche isajaeh ing amunii ing ava-neengcha Aafhuw iruur inche ariir:
‘Ki nangpa nangfhuw ae Thangnang chuping, Abraham, Isak vokhehkho Jakop Thangnang ping.’ Amana Mosi ynchiimka isajaeh ing encheh mahsa.
Aafhuw ing aningna ariir, ‘Nakheerkhaang kha siihra, nangiirnii maphamkha ynthiing ruwruwva.

Ijeep na ong kamee ae ing ijachaam inempak emphachu kamuchirpa, vokhehkho enuw ing yngkhik aechu kasiipa, amatah nache enuwchu ikarnii khaenache ijuwngping. Atii nang huungla, ki ing nangchu Ijeep ting chiirkachii.’

“Achuw ing nangchu aapuh vokhehkho vajeer tunii ymbasuwva ta aeka enuw ing enrumah Mosi havichu thing ana ymbarna mi ichuwh lampa nache, aningna mansiika vaarmee ajaar inche aapuh vokhehkho aakarpeeh ynsuwhnii khaena achiirpa.
Mosi havi inge Ijeep na, Isen chifhuwna vokhehkho paamfhuwna kum somanrii sungna ingiknii nong aajaeh vokhehkho laetho nong aajaeh mandangka enuwchu ahenruwpae.
Thangnang ing nenuw nemee sungtanii nengkhaena ki vaange ichii jaephar yngkheh hembasuwva kata taka Isrel siti ae ningna ajeerchu Mosi haviva.

Sinai bung nache aningna chong iriirnii khaena vaarmee thohche, vokhehkho afhuw fhuwven ae thoh ynruw ing paamfhuwna Isrel siti aethoh onghakchu haviva, ama ing ynningna ipeehfhuw iringnii chongchu ympeehpa.
Inuw vakhae afhuw fhuwven aenche ama achongchu manjiinungka enchiimah khaena atakchu eningtanii ithik aeka, enuw embarungriir Ijeep tingche piaeka Aaron ningna enriir,
‘Kenuw kemaana isipeeh vachii kengkhaena lae ruthaksii iseempeehruw; Ijeep tanii ynghenruw Mosi ningne ynchii suwhne ichii kenuw ing manghuwmah ung.
Amanache enuw ing siirti ruthaksii yngkheh seem aeka, ama aruthaksii ningnache ipeehfhuw peeh vechi aeka enuw engkik ing enseemsah peeh nache rotharoh embasenpa.
Chukhaenache Thangnang ing eningtanii yngheerka minvaen derna omchaap vakhae irumnii khaena abathenpae; amachuve Thangnang jaephar ae ynthiing thiimziihna ariir haviva:
‘O Isrel mee ae eengkuw,
kum sommanrii paamfhuwna nenuw ing deenkhaar thehchuwka kaningna chaatha ympeehchuw e?
Nenuw ing Molek rumniithaam vokhehkho Rephan lae ruthaksii irumnii khaena seemchuwka nenrumpa.’
Chukhaenache Babilon laar manlaen ningchuwka thurva kachuw.”
“Inuw afhuw fhuwven aeng paamfhuwna ensaarkhii rumniithaam kha omjaehna, amachuve namu havi inuwzii ing seemva nachiiva taka Mosi thohche chong aeka Aafhuw ing ariirpeeh khavaang ichiiva.
Inuw afhuw fhuwven ae emaana Thangnang ing athur ae jaati paamna enghungruwh raenche, rumniithaamchu aandom aenche Joshua thoh ynruw ing enghenchipa. Amanche Devit ipaar ipha inche amachu omjaeh.
Devit inche Thangnang ningsiih ajaarchu phaaka Jakop Thangnang aongnii iphanii khaenache aniihsahpa.
Changvakonchu Solomon ing Aafhuw ongnii khaena een atupa.
Changvakonchu kik ing ynseem een isapak nache Aanchungseh Thang-nang inche jaephar ing ariirvaang ongmahsa,
‘Ki kaaruwngpham ongnii chuve thangbaen nava,
laaruw paam ichuve kakhi chuwngniiva.
Aafhuw ing ariir, ki kakhaena nenuw ing ynsaangkhe ichii een tuva nenchiiva?
Ki ing ongniiva kachiichu unakhenva?
Kakikrap ing peeh vakhae havi kaseemmah vakhang?’
“Nenriing ipir vokhehkho nenba-rungriir re nengana vinchiip nentumah ae, nenuw apha vakhaena ynthiing laethachu nenjeehniinah. Nenpa nenfhuw aeng entuvaang, nenuwkho nentunah.

Nenuw nenpa nenfhuw aenche jaephar aechu emanangmah achuw omkhang! Ichum ynthiing Aafhuw chu juwng vaata ichii khaena maen ing aanthang mee aechu enthehpa; amanche atarae nenuw ingkho rensachuwka nenthehpa.
Nenuw vachuw vaarmee aeng Thangnang vajeer chonghak imansir aeka nenphachu, changvakonchu nenuw ing amachu manjiimahchuw.”
Enuw ing hava chong vakhae i ensiitahna, embarungriir nache mi ichuwngvaang enthir ifhuwr ing engha iriir aeka aningna ichong embasenpa.
Changvakonchu ama ynthiing laetha inche ataklina sipka thangbaen ting ahengentah nache, Aafhuw Jesu ing Thangnang tachangna ingiir alaar isachu muka ariir,
“Enruw thangbaen ymmongka Mee Sapa ing Thangnang tachangna ingiirchu ki ing kamusa!”
Changvakonchu enuw ing iruur ipirpak ing uung aethoh ynruw ing enganachu engkik ing siing aeka barungriir yngkhehpang ing aningting vataensae.
Amana atakchu khuwruung taang basuw aeka rung ing ideeng embasenpa; amanche saarkhii om mee aenche enpeendiirchu aruming Sol ichii iler yngkheh akhi paangna ensiihpa
vokhehkho enuw ing Stephen chu rung ing endeeng raenche ama ing athamsah, “Aafhuw Jesu, kalaetha i eeraangpeehsara achii.”
Ama ing akheerkhuw mansinka ipirpak iruur inche ariir, “Aafhuw enuw entaklina isii icher vakhae eensiipeeh samahra.” Ama ing havi riirka thiksa.

Stephen enthehchu Sol ingkho aru. Ama inii nache Jerusalem na ong ae ruwrthiing chaap taklina inempak ijachaam suwhsa, amanache chongthang ae mahnaka, enuw engkheng Judia vokhehkho Samaria paam chaap tingche kiinongsae.
Yndentahna ympideh mee aenche Stephen chu dim aeka, ama akhaenache inempak ijasah ae.
Atii thacha mee ae ikiinong ae inche isa chongchu apham om vakhaena siaeka entongpa.
Philip ing Samaria khuwruung tingche jungruwhka eningna amanache Khrista isa chongchu atongpa.
Atong chongchu mee vakhae aenche ensiitahna vokhehkho laetho chukho atuchu emutah nache, enuw vakhae ing ariirnache embarungriir empeehpa.
Akhaechuve eningtanii ynthiingmah umlae aenche ipirpak ing uung aeka taangting suwhsae, vokhehkho enghakchaang ithiipoh mee ae amanche khibong ae vakhae chukho amansakpa.
Amatah nache khuwruung nache rotharoh inempak emphapa.

Changvakonchu ama khuwruung nache isivasahna ingikniipak ruwriim-nii disuur asichinnii aruming Simon ichii pasar yngkheh om. Ama ataksah ing kikho mee yngkhehping ichii ing mandenka Samaria mee aechu enruw amanriim.
Amatah nache enuw vakhae ing naepang na ing upa ipha ing embarungriir piaeka enriir, “Atak i Thangnang ruwreng ‘Iruungpak ruwreng’ enchiichu varae.”
Ama adisuur mahae inche enuwchu apha isivasah nache enruw amanriim khaenache enuw ing aningna embarungriir iruwhdeh ing empeehva.
Changvakonchu Philip ing Thangnang lipah, vokhehkho Jesu Khrista khaena isa chong atongchu enthacha tahnache, enuw ing pasar rupanuw kho baptais entupa.
Simon ataksahrap ingkho thachaka baptais tuka Philip thohche anasiirche ynruw-haksae. Amana ingiknii vokhehkho ruwriimnii laetho nong isuwhchu muka ama aruw iriim.
Atii Samaria mee aeng Thangnang chongchu enripa ichii chongchu Jerusalem na ong chongthang aenche ensiitah nache, enuw ing Pitar re Johon chu envechiirpa.
Enuw meenii inche Samaria nache vatheng aeka ynthiing laetha emphanii khaena Thangnang ting enthampeeh sahpae.
Akhaechuve ynthiing laetha inche enuw achuw taklinakho juwngmahrisa, changvakonchu Aafhuw Jesu ruming napangche baptais entusah paetah.
Apha ichiinache Philip re Johon inche entaklina engkik siipeeh aeka, amana enuw ing ynthiing laethachu emphasahpa.
Atii chongthang aenche engkik ensiih ajaarna ynthiing laetha amamphapae ichiichu amutahna, ama ing eningna seer piaeka ariir,
“Ki ing achuw mee yngkheh taklina kakik siiningka, ama ing ynthiing laethachu iphanii khaenache, ruwreng havi kaningnakho ipisaruw.”
Changvakonchu Pitar ing aning-na ariir, “Nang naseerkha natakthoh longkongting ibuw ynsuwhrasii, akhaechuve Thangnang kikthuurchu nang ing seer inge ynrii aruva ichii ing namandenpa.
Hava nongne nang nasarup changmahka ikaefhuw yntanga omah, akhaechuve nabarungriir Thangnang maana chum-mahsa.
Chukhaenache nabarungriir isamah havi tanii nabarungriir huungla, amana ruvachii ing omnave, nabarungriir ing namanden amachu ikuhpeehnii khaena Aafhuw ting thamsara.
Nang ikhapak kallak ing isipna vokhehkho isii icher ing yngkhumchu ki ing kamusa.”
Simon ing Pitar re Johon ningna ariir, “Nenuw ing nenriir amachu kataklina yngkheh-pangkho asuwhniimah ing kakhaena Aafhuw ningting ithampeehsaruw.”
Enuw inche jinge ichii ing isajaeh ing saarkhii empeeh aanuwtingche, Samaria ae khuw aanemnache isa chongchu hentong aeka Jerusalem tingche hunganrisae.
Aafhuw vaarmee ing Philip ningna ariir, “Hangiir nana Jerusalem na ing Gaza ting isinii lam Irip tingse vasira.” Hava lam i paamfhuwva.
Chutahnache ama hangiirka sisa. Amana enruw Ithiopia ynsamvasah pasar yngkheh, Ithiopia iruwngnuw Kandaki lerchii aapaanii iruung ama inche Jerusalem ting Thangnang irum isi.
Ama ing ahunganrirae asiirgari sungnache ongka jaephar Isaia thiimbuwrchu apa.
Ynthiing laetha inche Philip ningna ariir, “Amana siirgari kuurtingse veneeng nana sihakruw.”
Amatah nache Philip ing aningnting vataensa, amana jaephar Isaia thiimbuwr apachu ama ing asiipa. Chukhaenache ama ing asii, “Nang ing napakha namanghuwse?”
Ama ing abasang, “Mee yngkheh ing imanchuwmah naka ynsaangkhe ki inche manghuwva kachiiva?” Amana Philip chu ama ing hangkalla onghakta taka athamsahpa.
Ama ing ynthiing thiimziih apaniichu haviva:
“Jaochu ithehnii khaena engkivaang Aafhuw chu engkipa,
Jaoti ing amuwr engaehrae ynlaammah vaangkhe,
Aafhuw ing chongmahdeh.
Ama ynjuursahdeh inche aningna ichumchu aripeehpa,
Atak ahungsuwhnii achuw ing riirchehva takhang,
akhaechuve ama aringkumchu laaruw tanii ajeripa.”
Ynsamvasah pasar inche Philip ningna asii, “Kaningna iriirpeehra, havana jaephar ing ariir ichu achuw khaenava, ataksah khaenava chang-mahka reentaang mee yngkheh khaenava?”
Philip ing ichong basenka, havana ynthiing thiimbuwr na inge Jesu isa chongchu atongpa.
Enuw ing lam nache changche enghungsiraenche chii topoh om mapham enghenphapa. Amana ynsam-vasah mee inche ariir, “Enla, havane chii omna!” Kichu baptais ymmantutah nachii ynchii parden omvachiiva?
Philip ing ariir, “Nang nabarungriir aangkheng ing thacha taniive, nang baptais itu ruvaata.” Ama ing abasang, “Jesu Khrista i Thangnang sapa chuva ichii ki ing kathachanah.”
Ama ing engongnii siirgarichu ikhaamnii khaena chong jeerka amana enuw ing jungchum aeka Philip ing atakchu baptais atupa.

Enuw ing chiisung tanii enghungsuwh nuwtingche Philip chu Aafhuw ynthiing laetha inche aruwpa; amana insam vasah inche Philip chu athar vokheh mumahsa, changvakonchu ama inempak arotha iroh isip inche sisa.
Changvakonchu Philip ataksah ing Azotus nache tungsing ichii amanghuwpa, amana Kesaria tingche atungmahri raentaang ama ing khuwruung vakhaena sika isa chong ahentong.
Sol ing Aafhuw aanuw ajii aechu manchiih katae vokhehkho thehkatae taka Aanchung Jaethiim ningtingche vaksa,

vokhehkho Aafhuw Lamchu ajii ae pasar kho rupanuw kho achuw yngkhehchu tuwh ningve phuwp ae ningka Jerusalem ting ahenruwnii ae inche Damaskas meekongnii nache yndangnii khaena chongthen ipira taka aningna aniihpa.
Ama ing vasika Damaskas avepha phanache manghuw mangharu ing thangbaen tanii ireng inche atakchu arakuwrpa.
Amatah nache atakchu ruwruwna jungbuksa, amana Sol, Sol, nang ing kichu ynchii khaena ymmanang vachii taka aningna ajeriir iruur yngkheh ama ing asiipa.
Amana Aafhuw nang achuw vachii taka asiipa. Aafhuw inche abasang, “Ki chuve nang ing ymmanangchii Jesu ping.”
Changvakonchu nang hangiir nana khuwruung ting varuwhra, amanache nang ing tuva nachiichu naningna manthang vaata.
Ama ing asifhuw pasar aenchembe iruur chucha sii aeka mee chuve achuw tangakho emumah tahnache chongchehru aeng ngiirsae.
Amana Sol ing laruw tanii hangiirka paamkhuw athiirtah nache yntanga muchehmahsa; chutahnache enuw ing akikna bachuw aeka Damaskas tingche enruwpa.
Amanache inii nithum sungna ama paamkhuw mumahsa vokhehkho thaemin kho saru ing ongsa.
Damaskas nache khristen mee yngkheh aruming Anania enchii pasar yngkheh ong. Ama aruvaamna yndang inche ariir, “Anania!” Ama ing abasang, “Aafhuw, havane ki ongning.”
Aafhuw ing aningna ariir, “Hangiir nana ichiimjaeh lamkha vejiinana vasira, amana Judas eenna Tarsas tanii Sol enchii pasar yngkhehchu jongra; ama ing athamsahnah.
Anania inche varuwhka paamkhuw amuchehnii khaena athampeehchu Pol ing ruvaamna amu.
Anania ing abasang, “Hava pasar inge Jerusalem na ynthiing namee ae taklinache isamah atuchu mee aajaeh ningtanii ki ing kasiipa.”
Aafhuw nang ynrum mee vakhaechu isuwrnii khaena aanchung jaethiim ae ningtanii aatuarichehnii aphapa.
Aafhuw ing aningna ariir, “Sira, reentaang mee ae, iruwng ae vokhehkho Isrel siti ae maana karumingchu amandangnii khaena ki ing amachu kaateerpa.”
Ama ing kakhaena ijachaam inempak khaangva chiichu aningna mandang vakata.”

Anania ing vasika eensung tingche varuwhsa amana ataklinache akik siika ariir, “Kauw kanae Sol, nang ing imusah naphanii khaena vokhehkho ynthiing laetha ing nasipnii inche, nang ing lamna navasirae namu Aafhuw Jesu ingkhe ki ynvechiirva.”
Aphachak nache amik tanii ngakoh vaang ichii topoh jungbukka paamkhuw imu achehpa.
Amana hangiirka baptais atupa vokhehkho isahtah nakho hungpirsa. Amanache Damaskas na ong ae thoche apha topoh ongsa.
Ama ing apha mamaangrudeh inche meekongnii apham chaap nache Jesu i Thangnang sapa chuva taka athaminchu atongpa.
Achongchu asii vakhae mee aenche ngik aeka enriir, “Jerusalem na Jesu arum mee aechu suwrningka aanchung jaethiim ae ningting ihenruwnii khaena ithengmah vakhang!”
Changvakonchu Sol ing manpir sehsehka, havirap iva Khrista chu taka ariirtah nache, Damaskas na ong ae Jehudi aenche enruw riimka basangcheh mahsae.
Enuw ing siim jaen khuwruung suwngkuungchu Sol ithehnii khaenache enrung jaehpa.
Changvakonchu asebok aenche Sol chu jaenna ruw aeka polaang yngkheh nache thin aeka bang ynrong nache embabukpa.
Sol ing Jerusalem ting sika sebok aethoh yntuwhnii khaena ataksah ing amanjongsahpa, changvakonchu enuw ing atakchu sebok yngkhehva ichii thachamah aeka atakchu enchiipa.

Changvakonchu atakchu Barnabas ing ynruwfhuwka chongthang ae buumting ahenruwpa; amana Aafhuw Jesu chu lamna ama ing ynsaangkhe amuva vokhehkho Aafhuw ing aningna chong abuwhraennii vokhehkho Jesu rumingna Damsakas nache thona isapak ing isa chong atongchu, eningna ynthiingkiir ing atongpa.
Athar vokheh Aafhuw rumingna thona isa ing isa chong tongka Jerusalem nache hungsi vasi tuka enuw thohche ynruwhaksae.
Ama ing grik chong ichong ae Jehudi aechu chongfhuw aeka chong ynsang ae; changvakonchu enuw ing atakchu ithehnii khaena ensir.
Ama ensirchu auw anae aenche emanghuwtah nache atakchu Kesaria tingche ruw aeka Tarsas ting emansipa.

Apha changlaenche Judia, Galili, vokhehkho Samaria aangkhenglaang sungna ruwrthiing chaapchu seemka idae empha; amanche enuw ing Aafhuw ichiisah nache vokhehkho ynthiing laetha ruwreng inche sisa aeka mee masing hungnem ae.
Pitar ing apham om vakhaena sika apha icha yngkhehna Lidda na ong ae Thangnang mee aechu iva-en sisa.
Amanache aruming Aenias ichii kum iriih ipha ing ijaarniina yntorjaeh asha paangkheh ithiipoh mee yngkheh inachu ama ing aantuwhfhuw.
Amana Pitar ing aningna ariir, “Jesu Khrista ing nangchu ymmandampa; nang hangiir nana najaarniikha seem-sara.” Aphachak nache ama hangiirsa.
Amana Lidda na vokhehkho Sharon na ong mee vakhae inche atakchu emupa. Chutahnache enuw ing Aafhuw ningting hungruwh chirsae.

Joppa nache rupanuw aruming Tabitha enchii thacha mee yngkheh ong. (Ama aruming i Grik chongna Dorkas va amanche arutho chuve “Sakhii,” achiiniiva.) Rupanuw havi inge ympehrudeh ing atusah chuve isa nong ing vokhehkho ipeehtahna amanghuw inche isip.
Ama inii sungnache ama nakka thiksa, amana enuw ing ahakchaangchu isuwpeh aeka chung eensungka nache emantorpa.
Joppa chu Lidda thoh yndahpakmah vakhaka, Joppa na ong ae thacha mee aenche Pitar ing Lidda na ongna ichii ensiitah nache, enuw ing mee ynniimeh aechu eningting ivathengnii khaena enchiirpa.

Pitar ing hangiirka enuwthoh vaksa. Ama ing avatungtah nache enuw ing chung kaatingche enruwpa. Amana muwkhuwnuw aenche chapsa aeka Dorkas ing enuwthoh engonghak laennii vokhehkho peendiir aasiipeeh aechu mandang aeka abuumna ingiir ae.

Pitar ing enuw vakhaechu taang basuw chirka, ama ing akheerkhuwh mansinka athamsahpa; aanuwnache vaanlehka ithii hakchaangchu enka ariir, “Tabitha, nang hangsuwra.” Ama-na Tabitha inche amik ahenbarengpa vokhehkho Pitar chu amutah nache hangsuwka ongsa.
Amana Pitar akik ing vabachuwka avemangiirpa; aanuwnache Pitar ing thacha mee vakhaechu muwkhuwnuw ae ynvae ing een aeka iring inche eningting amansirpa.
Amana Joppa sungnache havana isuwh nong i thangka mee inempak inche Aafhuw chu entha-chapa.
Amana Pitar ing Joppa nache shavin iseem nong atu Simon ichii pasar thohche apha iseehpak ing ongsa.
Kesaria nache Italia enchii laarchang ruwr chaama aapuh aruming Kornelius ichii pasar yngkheh ong.
Ama ing a-eengkuw thohche Thangnang yndentahna, Thangnang achiisah, mee ningna inempak ipisahnii amanghuw vokhehkho apha vakhaena Thangnang ting athamsah mee ynsuwh.
Apha eekuw vakhae ahungtakna aruvaam nache ama ing iseengkiir ing vaarmee ing juwngka Kornelius taka chong abuwhchu amu.
Ama ing achiisah thoh ynruw ing enteehka ynchiiva Aafhuw taka ariir. Vaarmee inche aningna ariir, “Nang ing nathamsah vokhehkho ipeehtahnii namanghuw aangkheng Thangnang maana yndennii khaena tungsa.
Atarae Joppa na Pitar enchii Simon amachu ivaruwnii khaena mee chiir aera.
Atakchu shavin iseem nong atu chifhuw kuurna a-een om ama thohche onghaknae.”
Aningna chong ariir vaarmee inche aangkaenuwna, Kornelius ing ameenae mee ynniimeh re atak rukuum atu Thangnang yndentahna icheep laarchang yngkhehchu eenka,
eningnache iriirfhuw chong vakhae riirchirka Joppa phanii ing enuwchu achiirpae.
Atuknuwche enuw ing lam nache hungsiaeka khuwruung envephapha nache, Pitar ing apha kuruk taangna ithamnii khaena een chungting hangkarsa.
Amana Pitar aven ichaam ing thaemin saningka achiipa; enuw ing isahnii khaena ensir raenche ama ing ruvaamna amupa.
Ama ing thangbaen ymmong vokhehkho iruungpak peehvaang ichii ithinnii yngkheh jungbukka arakiing manriina ynchuwka laruwna ijungbuw amu.
Ama sungnache masing ikip, akhi manrii ipaar shava ae, laruwna yntor aeka isiae chaap vokhehkho minvaen vaati ynvae ae.
Amana iruur yngkheh ing aningna ariir, “Hangiir, Pitar, theh ae nana sara!”
Changvakonchu Pitar ing ariir, “Havi suwhmah dehrasii, Aafhuw! Ki utaraenkho imaang vokhehkho ynthiingmah peehchaap samahri ing.”
Avomanii aningna ariir, “Thangnang ing amanthiing vasahchu nang ing imaangva ichii ing mandenmahra.”
Havi jinge vathumchak asuwhnuwna, peehchu thangbaen ting ajekipa.
Amana Pitar ing ruvaamna amansiichu ynchiiva taka ataksahna fhuwm abavae raenche enruw, Kornelius ing avechiir pasar aenche Simon ongnii eenchu siiaeka suwngkung maana ngiir aeka,
Pitar ichii Simon tungnamo ta aeka ensii.
Pitar ing ruvaamna amunache amanden najaehrae laetha inche aningna ariir, “Rungaera, pasar ynthummeh aeng nangchu ynjongnah ae.
Chukhaenache nang hangiir nana jungchumra, yntanga fhuwm ynvae omru ing sira, ki ing enuw i kajechiirpae.”
Pitar ing jungchumka eningnache ariir, “Nenuw ing nenjong meechu kiping; nenuw ynchii khaena ivatheng vachuw?”

Enuw ing embasang, “Laarchang chaama aapuh ynsuwh Kornelius ichii ichum mee, Thangnang chu achiipak vokhehkho Jehudi mee vakhae kaarna athang isana aruming isi a-een tingche ihenruwnii khaena vokhehkho naningtanii chong isiinii khaena ynthiing vaarmee inche ariirpeehpa.”
Amatah nache ama ing enuwchu bariimsaka abathungpae. Atuknuwche ama ing enuw thohche sisa vokhehkho Joppa tanii unae thacha mee ae thohche sihakpohsae.
Ama inii aanuwnache enuw ing Kesaria nache hungtungsae. Amana Kornelius ing eengkuw ynsuwh auw anae vokhehkho aarang arupae vakhaechu eenka enuwchu enghah ae.
Pitar ing avaruwhtah nache jinge tasa, Kornelius ing atakchu bariim saka akhi nache vakhupka arumsahpa.
Changvakonchu Pitar ing atakchu jemangiirka ariir, “Hangiirla, kikho meeping.”
Pitar ing athaminchu Kornelius ningnache tongka eensung ting enghungruwh tahnache, mee hengongpoh aantuwhfhuwpa.

Ama-na eningnache ama ing ariir, “Jehudi ynsuwh pasar yngkheh ing reentaang mee jaati thoh yntuwhhak changpang mahka hunganveer vaanveer itu aajaehmeh vajeer ikiiva ichii nenuw ing nemanghuwsa. Changvakonchu ki ing achuw yngkheh meechu imaangva vokhehkho ynthiing mahva ichii sakmah ichiichu Thangnang ing kaningna amandangpa.
Chu-khaenache ki ynvaruwchu tahna chong yntanga manemru ing ivathengping. Chukhaenache nenuw ing ki ynvaruwchuw akhae ynchiiva kasiinahchuw.”
Amana Kornelius ing ariir, “Inii nithum visa ki ing apha jingenne ka-eensungna apha eekuwna kathamsah raenche manghuw mangharu ing peen ynreen ing ynthong pasar yngkheh ing kamana ngiirka ariir,
‘Kornelius, nathamsahkha kasiipa vokhehkho nang ing ipeehtahna namanghuwkha Thangnang maana yndennii ing omsa.
Chukhaenache Joppa ting chiir aengka aruming Pitar ichii Simon amachu va-eenruw, ama chifhuw kuurna shavin iseem nong atu Simon een nache tungna.’

Amatah nache ki ing apha ichiinache naningting kavechiirpae, nang ivathengchii i inempak sakna. Chukhaenache Aafhuw ing naningna chonghak ympeeh aangkhengchu isiisahnii khaenache kenuw kengkheng ing atarae Thangnang maana ongsanung.”
Amana Pitar ichong abasen, “Atatak ing kamanghuwpa, Thangnang ing mee vakhaena adongchang tumahdeh.
Jaat aangkheng Aafhuw achii vokhehkho isa nong atu mee chaap Aafhuw ing aruva.
Aangkhengna Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajaarna idae omna ichii isa chong jebathenka yntongchu nenuw ing nemanghuwsa.
Johon ing baptais itu khaena atong aanuwna basenka Galili na ing Isrel paam aangkhengna yngkhiirchu nenuw ing nemanghuwmah changchii mahva,

amachuve Nazaret Jesu khaenava, Thangnang ing ynsaangkhe ataklina ynthiing laetha re ruwreng chirka, Aafhuw ing hungsi vasi tuka isa nong atuva vokhehkho umlae ichuwng ae chaapchu amansakva ichii khaena chenva; yngkhaena ynchii imbe Thangnang ing Aafhuw thohche ynruwhaksae.
Aafhuw ing Isrel ae paam nakho, Jerusalem nakho atu ari nongchaap asaarkhiichu kenuwpung; amanche enuw ing Aafhuw chu khros taklina jam aeka enthehpa.
Chang-vakonchu Thangnang ing Aafhuw chu inii nithum ahenpha nache manringka amandangpa,
mee aangkheng ningna mahva changvakonchu Thangnang ing mamaenna aateer ae saarkhii om ae ningna chemba, amachuve Aafhuw ing ithii ae kaartanii ahangring aanuwna asahhak kenginhak keningna chemba.

Amanche mee ae ningnache isa chongchu itongnii khaena vokhehkho iring re ithii aechu vajeer Aafhuw Thangnang ing apeehchu Aafhuw havi iva ichiichu saarkhii ipeehnii inche Aafhuw ing keningna chonghak ympipa.
Aafhuw khaena jaephar aeng saarkhii empisa, amachuve Aafhuw chu athacha mee vakhae ing ama aruming nache isii ikuhpeeh phasa vaatae.”
Pitar ing achong raenche ynthiing laetha inche achongchu arungae vakhae ae ningnache juwngsa.
Amana Pitar thoh ynruw ing itheng vinchiip mee aenche ngikpohsae, akhaechuve reentaang mee ae taklinakho kik-thuur ynthiing laethachu ajechirpa,
yngkhaena ynchii imbe enuw ing reentaang reentaang chong ing chong aeka vokhehkho Thangnang emanpahchu enuw ing ensii.
Apha ichiinache Pitar ing ichong, “Inuw thoh ynchim ing ynthiing laetha empha enuw ichu chiina baptais ituniimah khaena achuw yngkheh mee ing khaamcheh vaate?”
Ama ing enuwchu Jesu Khrista rumingna baptais itunii khaena ariirpa. Amana enuw ing inii topoh icheengnii khaena enthamsahpa.
Atii chongthang aeng vokhehkho Judia paamna ong thacha mee unae vakhae aenche reentaang mee aengkho Thangnang chongsae emphapa ichii chong ensiipa.
Pitar ing Jerusalem ting avasitah nache, vinchiip ruwr aenche amathoh chong ynsang aeka enriir,
“Nang ing vinchiipmah ae ningna ruwh chiika enuw thoh thaemin nasah hakpa!”
Amatah nache Pitar ing eningna thamin aangkheng atongpa:
“Ki ing Joppa khuwruung nache kathamsah raenche ruvaamna kamu. Iruungpak peenvaang ichii peehchae thinnii yngkheh arakiing manriina ynchuwka thangbaen tanii ijungbuw kamuchu kabuum nache omsa.
Amachu ki ing ibuwrneh ingka kakharlae, laaruw paam shava akhi manrii ipaar, lampa sha, aven ing yntorka isiae vokhehkho minvaen vaati ae kamu.
Amana iruur yngkheh ing ariir kasii, ‘Hangiirla, Pitar; theh nana sara.’
Changvakonchu ki ing kariir, ‘Aafhuw amachu ynsuwhmahrasii! Akhaechuve ki imaangva ichii chaap changmahka ynthiingmah peeh kabaena thinmahri ing.’
Changvakonchu thangbaen tanii iruur yngkheh ing athar vokheh ymbasang, ‘Thangnang ing amanthiing vasahchu nang ing imaangva tamahra.’
Havi vathum phachak ing suwhsa, amanche aangkheng athar thangbaen ting ajekipa.
Apha ichiinache Kesaria tanii kaningna envechiir pasar ynthum aenche kengongnii een nache vathengsae.
Amana laetha inche kichu fhuwm ynvaerudeh ing enuw thoh sira taka ariir vokhehkho unae mee kuruk ae thohkho ynruw ingka, kenuw ing Kornelius eensung tingche varuwhsung.
Ama ing ynsaangkhe vaarmee ing a-eensungna vangiirka Joppa na mee chiirnana aruming Pitar ichii Simon chu varuwra taka ariirchu kaningna ariirpa.
Ama ing naningna chong iriirpeeh vaata, ama chong ajaarnache nang ingkho, na-eengkuw aangkheng ingkho manlaenpeeh phavanenta.
Ki ing ichong kabasentah nache, kenuw kentaklinakho amaensana ijuwngvaang ynthiing laetha inche entaklinache juwngsa.
Amana Johon ing chiina baptais yntupa, changvakonchu nenuw chuve ynthiing laetha nache baptais imantuvaata taka Aafhuw ing ariir chongchu ki ing kaansiisahpa.
Chukhaenache inuw ing Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ynthacha tahna, Thangnang ing ynning nakho ynchimchak kikthuur ipinave, kicha achuw ingka Thangnang chu khaam kata kachiiva!”
Enuw ing hava chong i ensiitah nache enghuw mandae aeka Thang-nang chu amanpahsah ae, “Reentaang mee ningnakho iringnii phanii khaena barungriir ihuung Thangnang ing arupa.”
Changvakonchu engkaarna topoh aechuve Saipras vokhehkho Sairene pasar ynsuwh ae. Enuw ing Entiok nache enthengtah nache, Grik ae ningnakho Aafhuw Jesu chu tong aeka emanchuw ae.
Amana Aafhuw ruwreng inche enuw thoh ynruwhaksa, mee inempak inche thacha aeka Aafhuw ningtingche hungruwhsae.
Hava chong khaene Jerusalem na om ruwrthiing aphapa, chutahnache enuw ing Barnabas chu Entiok ting enchiirpa.
Ama ing vatungka Thangnang ing mee aechu bor apeeh amutah nache arotha rohka enuw vakhaechu barungriir ingiirthoh ynruw ing Aafhuw ningnache apha vakhae-na omnii khaena aathohsahpae.
Barnabas ichii i isa meeva, ynthiing laetha ing isip vokhehkho thachana ipir yngkhehva, amanche mee aajaeh Aafhuw ningting ahenruwva.
Ama ing Sol chu ijongnii khaena Tarsas ting sisa.

Ama ing Sol chu tuwhka Entiok ting ahenruwpa. Amana jinge tasa, enuw ing kumkheh chak sungna ruwrthiing aethoh purpak aeka mee aanem amanchuwpae; amanche Entiok nache thacha mee aechu amaensana Khristian enchii-pae.
Apha havi sungne Jerusalem tanii jaephar ae Entiok nache thengsae.
Enuw engkaar tanii aruming Agabus ichii yngkheh ing hangiirka laetha ruwreng ing ariir, laaruw paam aangkheng isah itaang omthongna. Havi Klodius iruwng aaniina suwhsa.
Chutahnache Judia na ong thacha unae ae ningnache mee vakhae ing enchehsah inuwzii ing ibomsah ynthennii khaena sebok aenche chongiir enripa.
Havi enuw ing tuaeka, Barnabas re Sol kikting seerchu mansir aeka ruwrthiing upa ae ningtingche envemanthakpa.
Apha ichiinache Herot iruwng ing ruwrthiing mee aechu ijachaam pinii khaena akik avarorpa.
Ama ing Johon aipa Jems chu chem ing amanthehpae.
Havi inge Jehudi aenche pennae ichii amutah nache, Pitar chukho ama ing amansuwrpae. Havi chor ynvaemah tar isahnii kuurva apha ichiinache isuwhva.

Ama ing Pitar asuwr nuwna kaeshum ting siika, laarchang manriii ing ruwrkheh asha manriimeh nache atakchu amansirpa; yngkhaena ynchii imbe manlaennii kuurva aanuwna atakchu mee ae maana chaang enkata ichii ing amanden.
Chutahnache Pitar chu kaeshum sungnache arungpae; changvakonchu ama akhaena ruwrthiing mee aenche Thangnang ningting ipirpak ing enthamsahpa.

Herot ing atakchu mee ae maana hembasuw vachii inii ama jaen nache, Pitar chu laarchang ynniimeh ae ruwrak nache siir runoh ynnii ing phuwp aeka ijaar; amana aarung aenche kaeshum suwngkung nache arung ngae.

Amana manghuw mangharu ing Aafhuw vaarmee yngkheh inche abuumna ngiirsa, amanche ireng inche aongnii nache aenpa, amana vaarmee inche Pitar aangna parka abasuw thoh ariir, “Ithupak ing hangsuwra.” Aphachak nache siir runohchu akik tanii ynjohchirsa.
Aanuwnache vaarmee ing aningna ariir, “Nadiirriim chiimtherla vokhehkho nakheerkhaang kha niira.” Pitar ing changche mantaka vokhehkho vaarmee inche ariir, “Napeen kha singnana kaanuw ijiira.”
Ama ing aanuwchu jiika vaarmee ing atu arichu ataktakva ichii manghuw mahka ama ing ruvaamna kamuva ichii ing amanden.

Enuw ing ahaarpana ing avomaniinii eenkhaarkung aarung aechu jengaraen aeka khuwruung ting varuwhnii siir ing enseem suwngkungchu enve-phatah nache suwngkungchu ataksah ing ymmongka taang suwhsae. Enuw ing lam nache siaeka vokhehkho vaarmee inche Pitar chu manghuw mangharu ing amahpa.
Amana Pitar ing ataklina isuwh-chu manghuwka ariir, “Atii ki ing atatak ing kamanghuwpa, Aafhuw ing avaarmee jebathenka Herot iruwng kik tanii vokhehkho Jehudi ae ing emanden tanii kichu yngkarpa.”
Ama ing vakhar tuka Johon Maak amnuw Meri eenting vaksa, amanache mee aenche yngkongpoh aeka enthamsah.
Ama ing eenkhaarchu aachumtah nache, Roda ichii meenae rupanuwti yngkheh inche imongkata taka huungsa.
Rupanuwti inche Pitar iruurva ichii amanghuwtah nache arotha iroh lamher ing een-khaarchu imongru ing hungtaenka eenkhaar kungna Pitar ngiirna ichii chong ahungriir.
Amana enuw ing aningna enriir, “Nang baveeh nachii! Changvakonchu ama ing ataktakva taka ariirteehpa. Chutahnache enuw ing embasang, “Ama avaarmee vasiingta.”
Changvakonchu Pitar inchembe eenkhaarchu vanuh vanuh ichumka ong. Enuw ing eenkhaarchu engamongtah nache atakchu muaeka ngiksae.

Ama ing eningnache huwdaejaeh ing ongnii khaena akik ing mandangniika, amana atakchu Aafhuw ing kaeshum sungtanii ynsaangkhe taang abasuwva ichiichu eningnache atongpa. Ama ing hava chong i Jems vokhehkho auw anae thacha mee ae ningna riirruw achii; aanuwnache ama ing jungsuwhka reentaang yngkhehting sisa.
Khuw ahungvaar tahnache Pitar taklina ynchii isuwhva ta aeka laarchang ae sungna inempak huwtamsa.
Herot ing atakchu jongka atuwhmah tahnache, aarung ae ningna chong siika vokhehkho ithehnii khaena eningna chong apeehpa. Aanuwnache Herot ing Judia bathenka Kesaria nache cheengsa.

Herot ing Taire Sidon mee ae taklina inempak abarung siksa, chutah-nache barungriir yngkhehpang ing aningtingche vak aeka iruwng kaaroh aapanii Blastus chu ynchaarfhuw aeka idae omnii khaena enthamsahpa, akhaechuve empaamchu iruwng apaam tanii isahfhuw thaemin empha.
Amana engaanrunii inii nache Herot ing iruwng peendiir ing ynthongka iruwngpham ongnii nache ongka eningna thamin atong.
Mee aenche hanguung ae, lae iruurva, meeruur mahva!
Ama ing Thang-nang amanpahmah khaena apha ichiinache Aafhuw vaarmee ing man-varka amanche rungi ing saka thiksa.
Thangnang isa chongchu yntongka thacha mee hungnemsa.
Barnabas re Sol ing enong manchi-aeka aruming Johon Maak ichiichu ynrufhuw aeka Jerusalem tanii hunganrisae.
Entiok na om ruwrthiing nache jaephar ae vokhehkho mee amanchuw mee ae Barnabas, Simion (abachii yndup enchii), Sairene tanii Lusius, Herot iruwng ing ajuhsah anae ynsuwh vokhehkho Sol ong ae.
Enuw ing Aafhuw rum aeka vokhehkho maaru entongraenche ynthiing laetha ing ariir, “Barnabas re Sol i kanong khaena ka-eennah ae, chukhaenache enuwkha atii asik ing ikhaepeehsa aeruw.”
Enuw ing maaru tong aeka vokheh-kho enthamsah aanuwtingche entaklina engkik siiaeka embathenpae.
Chukhaenache jinge ichii ing ynthiing laetha inche enuwchu chiir aeka tungsae; amanche amana ing Saipras iphanii ing ruwkuwng nache vaongsae.
Enuw ing Salamis aphamchu vatung aeka engongraenche, Jehudi ae meekongnii chaap nache Thangnang chongchu entongpa. Changlae Johon kho enuwchu ibomnii khaena engaanruwfhuwpa.

Enuw ing siaeka chiirikpaam vakhae iraenchir aeka Joppa envatung tahnache, amanache achuw yngkheh disuur ihae Thangnang chong aba-rungriir ynthiingmah ing atong aruming Bar-Jesus ichii Jehudi ae ichummah jaephar yngkheh yntuwhsae.
Ama i chiirikpaam aafhuw aruming Sergius Polus ichii iveerpak pasarpa thohche ynruwhak ae. Chiirikpaam aafhuw inche Barnabas re Sol chu eenka Thangnang chongchu rungaenii khaena asirpa.
Changlaenche disuur ihae Elimas (Grik chongna arumingva) ama inge chiirikpaam aafhuwchu Thangnang chong athacha tanii abarehnii khaena enuwchu ajeehniipa.
Changvakonchu Pol kho enchiichak Sol ing ynthiing laetha ing sipka aningting enteehka ariir,
“Runam barungriir ireen umlae sapa, ichumchu najeehnii nang Aafhuw ichum tachu ichummah ting bareh ningka nachii nanongtu tanii manchen mahva nachiiva?

Enla, atarae Aafhuw kikchu nataklina omna, nang namik chunaka apha topoh iseeh ing paam-khuw mumahtanii.” Aphachak nache ahakchaangchu ruwrduh re ynthim ing abaruwpa vokhehkho ama ing achuw yngkheh ningting akikna ibachuw nuwna iruwsaruw taka ajongpa.
Ama isuwhchu paam aafhuw inche amutah nache, Aafhuw khaena entong nache aruwriimka athachapa.
Atii Pol ing aanruwfhuw ae thohche Paphos na ing ruwkuwng ongnii aeka Pamphilia na om perga tingche hungruwhsae. Amanache Johon ing enuwchu bathenka Jerusalem tingche hunganrisa.
Changvakonchu enuw ing Perga hengaraen aeka Pisidia na ing Entiok ting hungtungsae. Amana Deennii inii nache meekongnii sungting varuwh aeka ongsae.

Amanache vajeer chonghak re jaephar ae thiimziihchu empa aanuwnache meekongnii aapuh aenche eningna chong enjeriirpa, “Unae ae, nenuw ing mee ae kaarna ynthohsahnii iriirfhuw chong omnave iriirpeeh saruw.”
Chutahnache Pol ing hangiirka akik ithohka ariir, “O Isrel mee ae vokhehkho Thangnang achiipak mee ae rungaeruw,

Isrel mee ae khaenache Thangnang ing afhuw fhuwven aechu eeteer peehpae vokhehkho enuw ing Ijeep lipahna marpah mee ing engonglae, enuwchu amanruung peehpae vokhehkho amatanii Thangnang inche abaen ithohka aruwpae.
Vokhehkho kum sommanrii sungna lamrakna empa ynsuwhka enuw thohche ijachaam akhaang fhuwpae.
Aafhuw ama ing kanaan paamna jaat sarii ipaar aechu mamaangka Isrel paam uurnii khaenache kum chamanrii songa chak apeehpae.
Aanuwting chembe jaephar Samuel ipha ing Aafhuw ama ing vajeer aafhuw aechu apeehpae.
Ama aanuwnache enuw ing iruwng aniihsahpae; amana Thangnang ing Benjamin sungkhur tanii Kish asapa Sol chu kum somanrii khaena apeehpae.”

Changvakonchu Aafhuw ing marakna Sol chu mantehka Devit chu iruwng khaenache iteerka athinpa; ama akhaena Aafhuw ing asaarkhii ynsuwhka ariir, “Kabarung-riirna ki ing kamanden Jesse asapa Devit chu kaphapa, ama ing kamanden aangkheng tuvaata.”
Havana pasarpa tuti bahsuwm tanii achongreep inuwzii ing Thangnang ing Isrel khaena eekarpeeh Jesu chu ahenbasuwpa.
Ama ing aandangmah rirae Johon ing mee vakhae ningna maen ing isii icher tanii barungriir huungnii khaena baptais turuw taka thamin atongpa.

Chukhaenache Johon ing anong amanchiphana ariir, “Ki i achuwva ichii ing ymmanden nahchuw? Ki Aafhuw chumahping, changvakonchu kaanuwna thengvachii Aafhuw chuve akhingop runoh rapkho bajohva kachii matik ichasahmah meeping.”
Abraham eengkuw siti ae vokhehkho nengkaarna Thangnang achii mee ae, manlaenpeehnii chongchu ynning nache ynjebathenpeehpa.
Jerusalem na ong aere aapuh aenche Deennii inii chaapna jaephar ae chong chaap empachu manghuwchehmah aeka, enuw ing jaephar ae chong chaapchu mapung mampha aeka Jesu chu rumahsae.
Enuw ing atakchu ithehnii khaena amiraar tuwhchehmah khang ae nare, Aafhuw chu ithehnii khaena Pilaat ningna eniihpa.
Aafhuw khaena maen ing ynziihchu enuw ing mapung emamphachir tahnache, atakchu khros tanii basum aeka thaen sungna emantorpa.
Changvakonchu Thangnang ing Jesu chu ithii ae kaartanii amanringpa;
Aafhuw thoh ynruwhak ing Galili na ing Jerusalem ipha inche ihungsihak ae ningnache Aafhuw ing inii aajaeh sungna yndangka, atarae enuw inche mee ae ningna asaarkhii ynsuwhnae.
Ataraenkho havane kenuw ing afhuw fhuwven ae ningna Thangnang chongreep omvasah isa chongchu neningna kenjereensa;
amachuve Thangnang ing Jesu chu hembasuwka inuw vakhae ynsiti ae ningnache areer abasuw chakpa; vokhehkho havi vaange avomaniinii ynthiing la nakho abaziihsa,
“Nang i ki kasapa vachii;
ataniine ki nangpachu ynsuwhsing.”
Thangnang inche ithii ae kaartanii Aafhuw chu amanringpa vokhehkho Aafhuw chu maangvachii ting utaraen-kho athar bukmahnii ichii khaenache Thangnang ing jinge ajeerpa:
“Ki ing Devit ningna chongreep katu ynthiing vokhehkho bor vakhaechu neningna pivakachuw.”
Chukhaenache ynthiing la nakho ajeer sareeh,
“Nang ing naningtanii ynthiing amachu maangvachii thaen mamumah tanii.”
Thangnang ing amandenchu Devit ing aring raenche tuka aanuwnache thiksa, amanche ampa ae thohche yndimsa vokhehkho thaensung nache maangsa.
Changvakonchu Thang-nang ing amanring Aafhuw chuve maangmahsa.
Chukhaenache kauw kanae ae, havi imanghuw peehruw, Aafhuw havi ajaarnache isii akuhva ta ungka kentongsahnah.
Nenuw Mosi vajeer chonghak ajaar ingkhe imanchum chehmah, changvakonchu Aafhuw Jesu havi ajaarna chembe mee vakhaechu chumpeh vaata.
Chukhaenache jaephar aeng enriir-chu nentaklina asuwhniimah ing ynriimsaruw:
Enruw thosamah mee ae, ingikkho ngikruw, ichenkho chenruw; akhaechuve nenuw nema-tamna ki ing nong yngkheh katu; achuw ynngkheh ing amachu itongpeeh khangnakho thachamah tanuw.
Pol re Barnabas ing meekongnii tanii hungsuwh aeka engaangkae raenche mee aenche ihungvi Deennii inii nache vathengreeh nuwna imanchuwsaruw ta aeka enthamsahpae.

Mee aenche meekongnii tanii enchiir aanuwnache, Pol re Barnabas chu Judaijam ening Jehudi vokhehkho Reentaang mee aenche enganuw enjiipa. Chutahnache enuw ing Thangnang tungsiih nache icheepther ing empaarnii khaenache riir aeka engathohsahpae.
Hungvi vachii Deennii inii nache khuwruung sungna ong mee vakhae aenche Aafhuw isa chongchu isiinii khaena thengsae.
Jehudi aenche mee inempak itheng aechu emutah nache kallak aethoh ynruw ing Pol chu inahfhuw aeka vokhehkho ningjak apeehpae.

Changvakonchu Pol re Barnabas ing enthona isapak ing hangchongsae: “Amaensana Thang-nang chong isa i neningna itongpham isuwhva, changvakonchu nenuw ing rumah chuwka vokhehkho ichen naemah ringkumchu ipha nentaksah ing nemandenmah vakhaka, kenuw ing nenuwchu bathen ningchuwka reentaang mee aeting sivakenta.
Haviva Aafhuw ing keningna chonghak ympeehchu:
Laaruw paam mee vakhaechu ikarpeeh phanii khaenache,
ki ing nangchu reentaang mee ae ireng phanii kabasuw pachii.”
Hava chong i reentaang mee aenche ensiitah nache inempak enrotha rohka Aafhuw chong isachu emanpahpae, vokhehkho ichen naemah ringkum khaena aateer mee ae inche thacha mee hungansuwhsae.
Chutahnache Thangnang chong isachu ama paam lija nache ynjarsa.

Changvakonchu Thangnang ynden reentaang mee rupanuw ynjasuwh ae ningnache vokhehkho khuwruung aapuh ising iveer pasar aechu Jehudi aenche sinsa aeka, Pol re Barnabas chu rumah aeka empaam tanii enthurpae.
Chukhaenache enuw ing enrumah aechu saarkhii ynsuwhnii khaenache engkhina pirkhuwhchu bahuw aeka Ikonium tingche sisae.
Entiok nache thacha mee aechu ariirfhuwchah ing rotharoh inche vokhehkho ynthiing laetha inche isip ae.
Ikonium nache Pol re Barnabas ing meekongnii nache varuwh aeka enchongtah nache, Jehudi aengkho, Grik aengkho mee inempak ing enthachapa.
Changvakonchu enthachamah Jehudi aenche reentaang mee aechu sinsa aeka vokhehkho enguw enae thacha mee ae taklina ichamah amanbupae.

Chukhaenache enuw ing Aafhuw ajaarnache thona isapak ing chong aeka amanache apha iseehpak ing ongsae, amanche Aafhuw ing enchongchu bajuumka aning taniiva ichiichu laetho tuchehnii ruwreng eningna apeeh inche saarkhii ynsuwhsa.
Changvakonchu khuw-ruung mee aechu asiksik suwhsae. Mee areh aenche Jehudi khaena amanche mee areh aenche chongthang ae khaena ngiirsae.
Amana reentaang mee topoh aere Jehudi ae vokhehkho Jehudi aapuh thoh ynchum ing chongthang aechu ningjak piaemanuwka vokhehkho rung ing deengtaeruw ichii eman-denpa.
Chongthang aenche amachu emanghuwtah nache, enuw ing Likonia, Listra vokhehkho Derbe ichii khuwruung ting amanche aruvaena om paam tingche sisae.
Amanache enuw ing isa chongchu entong.
Listra nache amnuw ven rupum tanii ajungomlae akhi ibong vasah isi achehmah yngkheh om.
Ama ing Pol ing ariir chongchu arungaerae, Pol ing atakchu enteehka adamnii khaena athacha omchu amutah nache
iruur ipirpak ing uungka ariir, “Nakhi ichum ing ngiirla” Ama ing khuwngka hungsi vasi atupa.
Pol ing atu nongchu mee aeng emutah nache Lokonia chong ing uung aeka, “Lae ae ing laaruw mee ynsuwh aeka vokhehkho ynningna juwngsae enchii.”
Amana enuw ing Barnabas chu Jupitar ta aeka amanche Pol inche ichong tahna aaruung vakhaka Markuri enchii.
Jupitar rumniieen khuwruung maensokna om ama jaethiim inche siirchar vokhehkho riikuwrchu suwngkung nache vechika mee ae thohche chaatha tukenta enchiipa.
Amachu Barnabas re Pol ing ensiitah nache enpeen isiih aeka mee ae kaarna vataen aeka va uung ae,

“Nenuw ing havi ynchii khaena nentuva? Kenuwkho nenuw thoh aanghak laaruw mee pungtah! Ne-nuw ing ikaniimah nong havi tanii thangbaen, laaruw paam, chifhuw vokhehkho hava sungne om aangkheng ynseempeeh iring Thangnang ningting hunganheernii khaena isa chong kenuw ing neningna kenvereenpeeh vachuw.
Isivasahna Aafhuw inche mee ae ing emandenna isichu aruva.

Changvakonchu Aafhuw chuve asaarkhii mangomru ing mamah, Aafhuw ing isa nong itupeehka minvaen tanii khuwsuwr vokhehkho chimuw bajaang aanlanii khaena kumtha ympeehpa; ama ing isahfhuw ipika vokhehkho nenbarungriir rotha-roh ing amansippa.”
Havi riir aeka eningna chaatha tukenta enchii mee aechu ijapak ing engkhaam.
Jehudi topoh aenche Entiok vokhehkho Ikonia tanii thengsae, amana enuw ing mee aechu sinsa aeka Pol chu rung ing deeng aeka thiksa ichii ing manden aeka khuwruung taangting atakchu ensiihpa.
Changvakonchu thacha mee aenche aruvaena engiirraenche, ama ing hangiirka khuwruung ting varuwhsa; mathang inii nache ama ing Barnabas thohche Derbe ting sisae.
Pol re Barnabas ing Derbe nache isa chong tong aeka sebok inem ensempa. Aanuwnache enuw ing Listra, Ikonia vokhehkho Entiok ting hunganrisae.

Enuw ing thacha mee aechu manpir aeka vokhehkho thacha nache ichum ing omnii khaena ithohsa aeka, ijachaam inem thoh ynruw ing inuw ing Thangnang iruwng lipah nache hungruwh vaanchiiting buksa ta aeka enriirpeeh.
Enuw ing ruwr-thiing chaapna upa aechu pham thin aeka, ithamsah thoh ynruw ing vokhehkho maaru tong aeka enuw ing enthacha Aafhuw ningnache emansirpa.
Enuw ing Pisidia paam hungruwh aeka Paamphilia nache tungsae.
Amanache enuw ing Perga nache isa chong tong aeka aanuwnache Attalia ting sisae.
Enuw ing enong enghemanchi khaena Thangnang tungsiih ajaarna entakchu emansirnii apham Entiok phanii ing ruwkuwng engongniipa.

Enuw ing Entiok nache envatungtah nache ruwrthiing mee aechu mangkong aeka amanche Thangnang ing enuw thoh nong atu vakhae vokhehkho ynsaangkhe reentaang mee ae ningna thacha lam ama ing aamongva ichii vakhaechu eningna entong.
Amana enuw ing apha iseehpak ing thacha mee ae thohche onghak ae.
Judia tanii mee topoh aenche Entiok nache theng aeka, Mosi vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing vinchiip tumah tanuwve ikarpeeh phachehmah tanuw ta aeka thacha mee ae ningna emanchuw.

Amana Pol re Barnabas ing enuw thoh havi khaene inempak chong ynsangsae. Chutahnache Pol re Barnabas vokhehkho Entiok na ong mee topoh aechu chongthang aere upa ae ningna Jerusalem ting havi khaene isinii khaena engathohpa.

Chukhaenache enuwchu ruwrthiing mee aenche vathak aeka, lam nache reentaang mee aeng embarungriir enghuungchu tong aeka Phonisia vokhehkho Samaria enghengaraenpa. Hava chong khaene thacha mee aechu inempak enrotha amanrohpa.
Enuw ing Jerusalem envatungtah nache ruwrthiing aere chongthang ae vokhehkho upa aenche entakchu enghebariim, amana Thangnang ing enuw thoh ynruw ing atu ari nong vakhae entongpa.
Changvakonchu Pharisi ae ningting ikop ae thacha ruwr topoh aenche enriir, “Reentaang mee ae ingkho vinchiip tuvachiipae vokhehkho Mosi vajeer chonghak chukho manjiiva chiipae.”
Chong-thang aere upa aenche hava chongsuwh khaene ynseernii khaena yntuwhsae.

Amana inempak chong engaansang tahnache, Pitar ing hangiirka eningna ariir, “Kauw kanae ae, isivasahna Thangnang ing kichu nengkaar tanii isa chongchu reentaang mee aeng sii ae naka enthachanii ing itongnii khaena eeteerchu nenuw ing nemanghuwsa.
Amanche mee vakhae barungriir amanghuw Thangnang ing ynningna atu vaangkhe ening nakho ynthiing laetha ipeehchu arupa.
Thacha jaarna embarungriir manseengka, ama ing inuw re enuw ruwrakna yntanga yntheep mangom mahsa.
Chukhaenache fhuwven aengkho amanche inuw ingkho ireen ynchehmah riingkorchu thacha mee ae riingna maniichuwka atarae ynchii khaena Thangnang taklina chaang nengenva?
Changmahva! Aafhuw Jesu tungsiih jaarna enuw thoh aanghak ing inuwkho manlaenpeeh phavataruw ichii ynthachasa.
Bar-nabas re Pol ing reentaang mee ae khaena Thangnang ajaarna laetho vokhehkho ingiknii aajaeh entu emanthangchu ensiitahna mee vakhae aenche huwdaejaeh ing ongsae.
Enuw ing ichong emanchi nuwna Jems ing ichong: “Kauw kanae ae irungaepeehruw!
Thangnang ing Aafhuw aruming khaena reentaang mee ae kaartanii mee aechu irinii khaenache amaensana ynsaangkhe amikna ichuwpae ichiichu Simon ing atongpa.
Havi jaephar ae chong thoh yntinna; jinge ynziihka omna,
“Havi aanuwna ki junganriva kata, Devit iruwngpaam itiih vasahchu athar seemva kata, vokhehkho imaang vasahchu athar seemva kata, amanche athar vokheh manpirva kata.
Abarii areh laaruw mee aenche vokhehkho ka-eenvasah ae reentaang mee chaap aenche kaningting huungvaatae.
Amaensana hava vakhae i ynriir-peeh Aafhuw ing ariirnah,
“Ki ing kamanden chuve reentaang mee aeng Thangnang ting hunganheer aechu inuw ing manjamah ae manuw.
Changvakonchu enuw ing lae ting empeeh vasah ynthiingmah peeh isah rumah, naamak itu rumah, chaang emen ithii sha vokhehkho sii isah vakhae havi tanii idahnii khaena eningna chongthen baziih taruw.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe ajaen jaen basenka khuwruung chaapna Mosi vajeer chonghak yntongka Deennii inii chaapna meekongnii nache ympaava.

Amana chongthang aere upa ae, ruwrthiing chaap ynchumpoh ing engkaar tanii mee topoh iteer manuwka Pol re Barnabas thoh ynruw ing Entiok ting chiirtaeruw ichii ynrusae. Enuw ing thacha mee aeng ynjasuwhpak ing entu Judas enchii Barnabas re Silas engahthohpa.
Amana jinge ichii ing baziih aeka enchiirpae: Chongthang vokhehkho upa amanche unae vakhae aethoh kenuw ing Entiok, Sairia amanche Silisia na ong reentaang unae ae ningna salaam kentusahnah.

Kenuw ing chonghak kempeeh mahchuw mee topoh aenche kening tanii taen aeka neningna vinchiip tuvanenchiiva amanche Mosi vajeer chonghakchu ngahva nenchiiva ichii chong ing nenbarungriir amanja vokhehkho nenbarungriir amangiir chehmahchu kensiipa.
Kenuw ing barungriir yngkhehpang yntuwhpoh ungka, mee iteer manuwka keningsiih Barnabas re Pol thoh ynruw ing neningting ijechiir ing sakvaata ichii ing kemandenva,
enuw ae i Aafhuw Jesu Khrista khaena enringkum empeeh meepae.
Chukhaenache kenuw ing Judas re Silas kenjebathenva; enuw ing neningna hava chong khaene manthang vaatae.
Havana iriirmah arumah imahnaka nentaklina peehrik ynreenmah ing sakvaata ichii ing ynthiing laetha re kenuw ingkho kenrupa:

Lae ting ympeeh vasah isah rumahnii, sii isah vokhehkho chaangna imen sha isah rumahnii amanche naamak itu rumahnii. Nenuw ing hava vakhae i ngahtanuwve neng-khaena isava. Nentaklina isa ivaar omlasii.
Chukhaenache enuw ing chiir aeka Jerusalem nache vatungsae. Enuw ing mee aechu mangkong aeka chongthenchu empeehpa.
Enuw ing empatah nache barungriir ynthohsahnii vakhaka enrotha irohsah.
Atii Judas re Silas entaksahchu jaephar paekhaka enguw enae aechu chong ing ithohsa aeka vokhehkho embarungriir emanpirpae.
Apha topoh enuw ong aeka enjechiir ae enguw enae ningting idaejaeh ing hunganrisae.
Chukhaenache Silas inchembe amana ong ing sakvaata ichii ing amandenpa.
Pol re Barnabas ing Entiok nache ong aeka mee areh ae thohche Aafhuw chongchu manchuw aeka vokhehkho entong.
Inii topoh aanuwna Pol ing Barnabas ningna ariir, “Inuw ing Aafhuw isa chong yntongnii khuwruung chaap nakhe unae aechu ynsaangkhe tanae ichii khaena athar ynrimanuwka va entae.”
Barnabas ing Johon Maak chu enuw thoh ynrufhuw ningka achiipa.
Changvakonchu enuwchu Paamphilia na bathen aeka nongtuna enuw thoh ynruw ing isihakmah havichu enuw ing ynrufhuwva enchiichu sakmahnii ichii Pol ing amandenpa.
Amana ynrumah aeka enuw ynsaesae, Barnabas ing Maak ruwka Saipras phanii ing ruwkuwng nache sisae.
Changvakonchu Pol ing Silas iteerka, thacha mee aenche entakchu bor piaeka enuw sisae.
Ama ing Sairia vokhehkho Silisia phanii ing sika ruwrthiing vakhaechu amanpirpa.
