Pol ing Derbe vokhehkho Listra nache tungsa. Amana che Jehudi rupanuw athacha om asiti pasarpa aruming Timothi ichii sebok yngkheh om, ampa chuve Grik meeva.
Listra re Ikonium na ong ae thacha mee aenche Timothi khaena isapak ing ichong ae.
Pol ing atakchu amathoh ynruw ing sihaknungka achiipa, chutahnache ama ing ruwka vinchiip amantupa. Havi akhaechuve ama ampa Grik meeva ichiichu ama paamna ong aenche emanghuw.
Enuw ing khuwruung chaapna siaeka Jerusalem na ong chongthang ae vokhehkho upa aeng engaanrunii chongchu ingahnii khaena thacha mee ae ningnache empeehpa.
Jinge ichii ing ruwrthiing aenche thacha tahna hungpirsae vokhehkho anasiir nache mee masing ahenthipa.
Atii enuw ing Pharigia re Galatia paamna enghungsi raenche, Asia na isa chong itongchu ynthiing laetha inche akhaampae.
Enuw ing Misia envephatah nache Bithinia varuwhnii entupa, changvakonchu Jesu ynthiing laetha inche rumahsa.
Chutahnache Misia iraen aeka Tros nache vatungsae.
Ama jaen nache Pol ningna ruvaamna amansiipa. Mesidonia mee ing ngiirka athamsah, “Mesidonia kenuwchu ibomsara achii!”
Ama ing ruvaam amu aanuwting Mesidonia ting isinii kentupa, akhaechuve Aafhuw ing eningna isa chong itongnii khaena yngeenpa ichii kenuw ing kemanghuw.
Chukhaenache kenuw ing Tros na ing ruwkuwngna Samothras phanii ing sisung amanche mathang inii nache Nipolis vatungsung.
Amana ing Philipi kenvephapa. Hava paam i Mesidonia ae aaruungseh khuwruung chuva vokhehkho Rom derna om paam ynsuwhsa; amana kenuw ing hava khuwruung ne inii iseehpak ing cheengsung.

Amana Deennii inii nache kenuw ing khuwruung taangting siungka chiikuur paangna-che Jehudi ae ithamnii omsiingta manden ungka ama phanii ing vaksung. Kenuw ing ong ungka amana ong rupanuw ae ningnache chongsung.

Thitira khuwruung tanii aruming Lidia ichii rupanuw isenphiphi peen ajuwr vokhehkho Thangnang athacha yngkheh ing Pol ing atong chongchu arungaepa; Pol ing atongchu abarungriir iruwhdeh ing isiinii khaena Aafhuw ing abarungriir aamong peehpa.

Ataksah vokhehkho a-eengkuw thoh baptais entunuwna, ama ing ynthamsahpa, “Ki i Aafhuw athachava ichii ing nenuw ing imanden tanuwve ka-eenna ithengpeeh nuwna iongpeehruw.” Amana kenuwchu ama ing yngkhaampa.
Inii nikhehna kenuw ing ithamnii khaena kensir raenche, umlae ichuwng suwh rupanuwti yngkheh kengaantuwhfhuw. Ama ing kikjii ibuwrka seer inempak taarka ama aafhuw inche inempak akaaniisah.
Rupanuwti havi inge Pol vokhehkho kenuw kengaanuwchu jiika uung, “Ynningna manlaenpeeh phanii lam yntongpeeh mee havi ae i athi omah Thangnang meenaepae!”

Ama ing havi inii aajaeh atu. Chutahnache Pol ing adir inempak nungaemahka laetha ningnache ariir, “Aning tanii hungsuwhnii khaena Jesu Khrista rumingna naningna chonghak kapeehnah!” Apha ichiinache isamah umlaechu taang suwhsa.
Ama aafhuw aenche kaaniiva enchiichu omahsa ichii emanghuwtah nache, enuw ing Pol re Silas chu suwr aeka kithiir sungting vajeer ituae maanache enveruwpa.
Enuw ing entakchu vajeer ituae ningna veruw aeka enriir, “Enuw ae i Jehudi aepae, enuw ing khuwruung ne huw emantamnah.
Enuw ing Rom vajeer chonghak ing arumahchu mee ae ningna emanchuwnah ae.”
Amana mee aenche Pol re Silas irumah nache vaanvaesae; amana vajeer itu aenche empeen vesiihchir aeka rumor ing bin aeruw ta aeka enriirpa.
Inempak embin aanuwnache, enuwchu kaeshum ting khum aeka ynriimpak ing irungnii khaena kaeshum aarung ae ningnache enriirpa.
Ama chongchu emphatahnache entakchu kaeshum tingche khum aeka, engkhichu thing hang ing emphuwppae.
Changvakonchu jaenchim nache Pol re Silas ing thamsa aeka Thangnang chu la tuaeka emanpah, amachu kaeshumna ong aenche enrungae ae.
Amana manghuw mangharu ing ipirpak linglaang thengka kaeshum eenphambur ynnuhsa, vokhehkho eenkhaar vakhaechu ymmong chirsa.

Amana kaeshum aarung inche ijaar tanii hangsuwka kaeshum eenkhaar chaapchu ymmong amutah nache, yngkhum mee aechu suwhchirsae ichii ing mandenka, ama ing achemchu isuwka ataksah ynthehsa kata achiipa.
Changvakonchu Pol ing iruur ipirpak ing uungka ariir, “Nataksah maangnii tumahra, kenuw vakhae havane ongnung.”
Kaeshum aarung inche jaemi niihka vataensa, amana aanchik ing ynchiimka Pol re Silas maensokna vatiihsa,
vokhehkho ama ing enuwchu taang suwhfhuwka ariir, “Oja ae, ki ing ikarpeeh phanii khaena ynchii tuva kachiiva?”
Enuw ing embasang, “Aafhuw Jesu chu thachara; amanache natak kho amanche na-eengkuw kho manlaenpeeh phava nenta.”
Enuw ing aning nakho, a-een sungna ong ae ningnakho Aafhuw chongchu ariir peehpae.
Ama jaen nachenrap ama ing enuwchu ruw aeka rumor ensahnii abuwchu achaam peehpae, amanche aphana chenrap ataksahkho, a-eengkuw aangkhengkho baptais entupa.
Ama ing enuwchu a-eensung-ting ruw aeka buw amansahpae, amanche Thangnang chu thacha aeka a-eengkuw aangkheng thoh ynruw ing inempak enrotha iroh.
Khuwchu hungvaarka vajeer itu aenche iruung aechu vechiir aeka enriir, “Mee aekha bathen aeruw.”
Chutahnache kaeshum aarung inche Pol ningna ariir, “Vajeer itu aenche nenuwchu bathenruw enchiipa, chukhaenache nenuw suwhnuwna idaejaeh ing yngkaeruw.”

Changvakonchu Pol ing eningna ariir, “Vajeer ituru aeng Rom mee kenuwchu mee ae maana enuw ing ibin aeka kaeshum ting ynsiihpae amanche atarae enuw ing kenuwchu ynruwhjaeh ing ibathenva chiipae? Rumahnii, entakrap vak ae sana kenuwchu ibathen ae rasiing.”
Amana aarung aenche vajeer ituae ningting hava chong i enriirtah nache, Rom meepae ichii manghuw aeka enuw ynchiksae.
Chukhaenache enuw ing vak aeka enthamsahpae amanche entakchu kaeshum sungtanii basuw aeka khuwruung tanii isuwhnii khaena enriir.
Pol re Silas ing kaeshum tanii jungsuwh aeka Lidia eenting vaksae. Amana enuw ing enguw enae aechu ithohsa aeka sisae.
Pol re Silas ing Amphipolis vokhehkho Apolonia na hungsi aeka Jehudi ae meekongnii om Thesalonika nache thengsae.
Pol ing atuchak inuwzii ing meekongnii nache varuwhka Deennii inii vathumchak ynthiing thiimziihchu enuw thoh manseerka,
Khrista ing ijachaam khaangnaka ithii ae kaartanii hangring vachiichu, ki ing neningna katong Jesu havi ama Khrista chuva taka isajaeh ing ariir peehpae.
Enuw engkaar tanii mee topoh Thangnang emanden Grik ae tanii mee aanem vokhehkho rupanuw ae aapuh tanii aanem ing thacha aeka Pol re Silas ningting kaahsae.

Changvakonchu Jehudi aenche kallak aeka ihaesingmah ae kaartanii ichamah mee aechu khuum aeka mee emangkong. Enuw ing khuwruung nache ynnahnii basuw aeka amana Jason eenchu enuw ing nam aeka entakchu mee ae kaarna jenbasuwnii khaena enjong.
Changvakonchu enuw ing entakchu entuwhmah tahnache, Jason vokhehkho unae topoh aechu khuwruung aapuh ae maana veruw aeka uung ae, laaruw paam akhup athar amanguur mee ae inge hava nenkho thengnae.
Enuw ae i Jason ing aripae vokhehkho Jesu ichii iruwng reentaang yngkheh omna ta aeka enuw vakhae inge Kesar chonghak areh aphuw ing entunah.
Amana meenem aere ama khuwruung aapuh aenche hava chong i ensiitahna jaasae.
Chukhaenache enuw ing Jason vokhehkho areh aechu saarkhii tuaeka embathenpa.
Amanache unae aenche anikungna Pol re Silas enuwchu jaenna Beria ting emansipa. Enuw ing amanache envatungtah nache Jehudi ae meekongnii tingche varuwhsae.

Enuw ae inge Thesalonika mee ae akheer ing embarungriir isa, akhaechuve enuw ing chongchu manghuw nungka enchii ing iraang aeka, amanche ynthiing thiimziihchu jinge ichii vamo ta aeka anasiirna engatoh.
Chukhaenache enuw mee aanem ing vokhehkho ynjasuwh Grik rupanuw ae, pasar aenche enthachapa.
Changvakonchu Thesalonika Jehudi aenche Pol ing Beria nakho Thangnang chongsae atongnah ichii emanghuw tahnache enuw ing theng aeka, mee aechu sinsa aeka chongsuwhsa.
Anikung narapche auw anae aenche Pol chu chifhuw ipha ing isinii khaena embathenpa, amanche Silas re Timothi chuve changche ongsae.
Changvakonchu avethak mee aenche Pol chu Athens ipha ing enghenruwpa, amanche Silas re Timothi enuwchu aningting ynlanghak ing ithengnii chonghak pha aeka enuw yngkaesae.
Pol ing Athens na enuwchu ahahrae, ama ing khuwruungchu lae ruthaksii ing ynriim muka abarungriir nungaemahsa.
Amatah nache ama ing meekongnii nache Jehudi aethoh, Thangnang ynden mee aethoh vokhehkho kithiirna anasiir amathoh yntuwhchak ae thohche vakhar entuhak.

Amana Ipikiurien vokhehkho Stoik thiimziih amanghuwpak ae topoh aenche amathoh chongla emanseer. Amana mee topoh aenche ta aeka, havana ikanii mahna ichong havi inge ynchii riirningka achiiva? Areh aeng ta aeka, ama ing reentaang lipah lae khaena atong ing omna; ama ing Jesu vokhehkho hangring khaena atong.
Amana enuw ing atakchu bachuw aeka Ariopagus ningna veruw aeka enriir, nang ing ynriir peehchii ithar havi ynchiiva ichii kenuw ing ynghuw ruvaate?
Nang ing kengana kungna reentaang chong ymmansiipeeh sachii; chukhaenache chong havi ynchiiva ichii kenuw manghuw nungka kenchiinah.
Akhaechuve Athens mee aere amana ong marpah mee aenche ithar chong iriir isiichu mahnaka reentaang yntanga turu aenche ong ae.
Amana Pol ing Ariopagus arikna ngiirka ariir, “Athens mee ae, nenuw aangkhenglaangna inempak lae irum mee vachuw ichii kamanghuwsa.
Ki ing jinge ynlen ingka nenlae rumnii kaen tahna ‘Ynghuwmah Lae ningna’ tachuwka thiimkungna ynziih kamupa. Chukhaenache nenuw ing nemanghuwmah nenrum havi ki ing neningna katongva.
Laaruw paam vokhehkho asungna om peeh aangkheng aseem ama inche, Thangnang vokhehkho laaruw paam Aafhuw ynsuwh vakhaka, kik ing ynseem rumniieenna ongmah;
amanche ama ing avaehnii omka mee ae kik ing Aafhuw arum omah, Aafhuw atakrap ing aangkhengna iringnii, ihuwh kinii vokhehkho peeh aangkhenglaang ympiva.
Aafhuw ama ing sii yngkhehpang tanii jaat vakhaechu laaruw paam aangkheng phanii ing ongnii khaena ynseem peehpa, Aafhuw ama ing enganii vokhehkho ongnii lamrii amanaepa,
amanachembe enuw ing Aafhuw jong ae naka, ituwhnii khaena emangaena engkik laam ae naka jongvaatae, atak chuve inuw vakhae thoh yndah ing ongmah.
Aafhuw ningna inuw iring vamuw, ynlaap vokhehkho ipaar ynchehva, nenuw nensungsah tanii laksii yngkheh ing taka, ‘Inuw chuve Aafhuw tuti bahsuwm vamuw.’

Chukhaenache inuw Thangnang tuti bahsuwm vamuw khaka, ynthiing tanii ichiichuve mee ae ising iveer ing vokhehkho hungsem vasem sana vakhangnare, rupa vakhangnare, rung vakhangnare, amavaangche ichiiva tamanuwka ymmanden sakmahnii.
Atatak ing ymmanghuwmah aphachu Thangnang ing imanghuw peehmah, changvakonchu atiichembe apham tanglahlah mee aangkheng barungriir huungnii khaena Aafhuw ing apeehpa,

Yngkhaena ynchii imbe Aafhuw ing aateer vasah mee yngkheh ing laaruw paamchu ichum ynthiing ing vajeer tuvachii inii yngkheh amanaepa. Aafhuw havi inge ithii ae kaartanii hangring inche mee vakhaena ithachanii ama ing ympipa.”
Enuw ing ithii ae ing hangring khaena ensiitahna topoh aenche emaniisah, changvakonchu topoh aenchembe havi khaene athar naning tanii siisava kenta enchii.
Chutahnache Pol ing engkaar tanii sisa.
Changvakonchu pasar mee topoh aenche aningting kaah aeka enthacha, ama kaarnache Dionisius Ariopagus, Damaris ichii rupanuw yngkheh vokhehkho enuw thoh ynruw ing areh aekho ynvae ae.
Atii Pol ing Athens khuwchu bathenka, Korinthia aphapa.

Amanache achuw yngkheh Jehudi mee aruming Akuila ichii pontus na om yngkheh ing arumee Presila thoh Itali tanii ithengpeh ae enuwchu Pol thoh yntuwhsae, akhaechuve Iruwng Klodius ing Jehudi mee vakhae Rom bathenruw taka chonghak abathen. Pol ing enuwchu avaveerpae.
Enuw thohche enongtu aanghaktah nache onghak aeka nong entupohpa, enongtu chuve khurpeen iseem nongva.
Ama ing Deennii chaapna meekongnii nache Jehudi ae, Grik mee ae thohche chong yntaannii aeka, Aafhuw chu thachanii khaena emaneem ae.
Amana Silas re Timothi chuve Mesidonia ting juwngsae, amanche Pol chuve Jesu i Khrista chuva taka Jehudi ae ningna isa chongchu abarungriir iruwhdeh ing atong.

Amana Pol chu rumah aeka ithipak ing ataklina enchong tahna Pol ing apeen rukhuung-ka eningna ariir, “Nenuw nentaksah nensiikha nenrusaena bukrasii! Ki chuve manthiingning, atanii basen naka ki reentaang mee ae ting isiping.”
Amachu ariirthoh ympeenka Taitas enchii Justus mee yngkheh Thangnang amanden a-een nache tungsa; ama a-eenchu meekongnii thoh ynneeng.
Amana meekongnii nong aapuh Krispus ing a-eengkuw aethoh engkheng Aafhuw enthachapa; amanche Korinthia mee aanem ing siiaeka enthacha vokhehkho baptais entu.
Ama jaen nache Aafhuw ing Pol ningna ariir, “Ynchik mahra, chongla vokhehkho manchen mahra,
Ki ing nangchu kaanruwfhuw sachii, achuw ingkho nangchu iparmahnii; hava khuwruungne kamee inempak omnae.”
Chukhaenache Pol ing engkaarna Thangnang chongchu manchuw aeka kumkheh tharuk chak ong.
Gallio ing Akaia lipah apuh raenche, Jehudi aeng barungriir yngkhehpang ing Pol taklina rumah aeka vajeer tunii tingche varuwh aeka enriir,
“Hava mee inge vajeer chonghak nakhe henbareh vebarehka Thangnang ting thachanii khaena mee aechu amaneemnah enchii.”
Pol ing ichong basen kata achiiraensiim Gallio ing Jehudi ae ningna ariir, “O Jehudi ae, laanglam isamah miktheh chiitheh vokhehkho ynraar chong omnave, ki ing nenuwchu khaangfhuwva kachiivachuw.”
Changvakonchu chongsuwhnii, ruming khaena vokhehkho nen vajeer chonghak khaena ynjeehnii vata-nuwve nenareerna ensaruw; ama khaena ki vajeer itu ynsuwh ningka tamah ing.
Amana enuwchu vajeer tunii tanii athurpae.
Amanache enuw vakhae ing meekongnii aapuh Sosthenes chu suwr aeka vajeer tunii maanache embinpa. Changvakonchu Gallio ing hava nong khaene yntanga thosamahsa.

Pol ing amanache apha iseehpak ing ongka aanuwnache auw anae ae thohche ynsaeka, Presila vokhehkho Akuila aethoh ynruw ing Siria phanii ing ruwkuwng nache sisae. Ama achongreep om khaena Kenkria nache arusae amangkuhpa.
Enuw ing Ephisia nache hungtung aeka enuwchu amanache amahpae. changva-konchu atak chuve meekongnii nache varuwhka Jehudi ae thohche chong emanseer.
Enuw ing Pol chu apha topoh iseehhak ing ongla ta aeka enriircha rumahsa.
Chukhaenache enuw thoh engaansae phana Pol ing ariir, “Thangnang ing amanden ynsuwh nave ki athar vokheh nening-ting vaanriva kata.” Ama ing Ephisia na ing ruwkuwngna ongka sisa.
Ama ing Kesaria nache ahung-tung tahnache Jerusalem ting vakka ruwrthiing aechu salaam tuka vokheh-kho Entiok ting sisa.
Amana apha topoh iseeh ing cheengka vokheh Galatia, Pharigia paam khuwruung henphaka, Thangnang thacha mee vakhaechu barungriir amanpir.
Aruming Apollo ichii pasar Alekjendria tanii thiimziih ihae Jehudi mee yngkhehchu Ephisia nache itheng; atak i ynthiing thiimziih amanghuw meeva.

Hava pasar inge Thangnang lam ijiinii khaene aner ithumpak ing amanchuwpeeh ae; vokhehkho aba-rungriir ija omrudeh ing Jesu khaena thamin isajaeh ing amanchuw ae. Changvakonchu Johon ing Jesu baptais amanturaennii pangchu amanghuwsah.

Changvakonchu ama ing meekongnii eenna thona isapak ing ichong abasen. Amana Akuila ing arumee Presila thohche ama ing atong chongchu ensiitah nache, atakchu engeenting ruw aeka Thangnang lamchu amanghuw sehnii khaenache adiing anehthoh eman-chuw.

Aanuwnache ama ing Akaia khuwting sining achiitahna, Ephisia na thacha mee aenche ithohsa aeka, akhaena chongthen baziih aeka Akaia na thacha mee ae ningtingche embathenpa. Ama ing ahungtungtah nache, tungsiih ajaarna thacha apha mee aechu inempak abom ae.
Ama ing Jesu i Khrista chuva taka ynthiing thiimziih ruwreng ajaarna mangdangka mee changjaeh inem Jehudi ae chongchu ipirpak ing basangka achehpae.
Apollo ing Korinthia nache aonglae, Pol ing chungpaam lamting veraenka Ephisia nache va-tungsa. Amanache sebok topoh aechu ama ing aantuwhfhuwpa.
Pol ing eningna ariir, “Nenuw ing nenthacha laenche ynthiing laetha nengaraang e? Enuw ing embasang, ‘Kenuw ing ynthiing laetha omna ichiikho siimah ung.’
Pol ing eningna ariir, ‘Chunuwcha, nenuw ing ynchiina baptais nentuva?’ Enuw ing ta aeka, ‘Johon baptais itu nachenva.’”
Hava chong i enuw ing ensiitah nache, athar Jesu ruming nache baptais entupa.
Aanuwnache Pol ing entaklina akik siika athamsah tahnache ynthiing laetha eningna thengsa; amana enuw ing reentaang reentaang chong inche Thangnang isa chongchu enjeerpa.
Enuw vakhae chuve pasar mee suum ariiniipae.
Pol ing Ephisia ae meekongnii nache varuwhka Thangnang lipah khaena manseer aeka, vokhehkho maneem aeka tha ynthumpha ing thona isapak ing amanchuw ae.
Chong iriir arumah ae vokhehkho thachamah ae, mee ae maana isamah chong ichong ae kaartaniichu hungsuwhka, sebok aechu ynruwfhuwka amanche thiimziih een Tairanus ichii nache anasiir chong ynsang ae.
Havi kumnii sungna suwhjaehsa; chu-khaenache Asia sungna ong vakhae, Jehudi aengkho amanche Grik aengkho Aafhuw isa chongchu ensiipa.
Amana Thangnang ing isuwh thaangthaang mah laetho Pol kik nache amantupa;

amatah nache aningtanii rumaan vakhangnare, chanhgmahka peen vakhangnare ina ae ningting enghenchitah nache, riirae mangkhiing chaap entaklina omahchirsa vokhehkho isamah umlae vakhae chukho eningtanii suwhchirsae.

Aanuwnache Jehudi thiimziih ynghuw ae hungsi vasi atumee topoh aenche, Pol ing atong Jesu chu suursa ungka nenuwchu chonghak kempeeh nahchuw ta aeka, isamah umlae ing ichuwng mee ae taklinache Aafhuw Jesu rumingna isuursah embasenpa.
Havi Jehudi ae aanchung jaethiim aruming Skiva ichii pasar mee sarii chupae.
Changvakonchu isamah umlae inche abasang ae, “Ki ing Jesu chukho kamanghuwsa amanche Pol chukho kamanghuwsa, changvakonchu nenuw achuw vachuw?”
Isamah laetha ichuwng mee inche eningting vakhuwngka, enuwchu achehpae. Chutahnache enuw ing ama eensung tanii peendiirchah ing yncheh ynchang aeka ensuh ing taensae.
Ephisia sungna ipaar ae vokhehkho Grik mee vakhae aenche emanghuwpa; vokhehkho enuw vakhae taklinache ynchik niikho suwhsa, Aafhuw Jesu ruming chukho inempak hungruung sehsehsa.
Amana athacha om mee aajaeh ing theng aeka entu enri isii vakhaechu enriirsahpa.
Disuur aeka nong atu mee aanem aengkho enthiimbuwr vechi aeka mee vakhae maekung nache misung tingche embathupa; enuw ing amenchu enteentah nache lising songa apha.
Jinge ichii ing Aafhuw Thangnang isa chongchu hungruungka vokhehkho hungpir sehsehsa.

Atii hava nong vakhae i amanchi-chir aanuwting, Pol ing Mesidonia, vokhehkho Akaia veraen ningka Jerusalem ipha ing sikata ichii ing alaethana mandenka ariir, “Ki ing amachu phaningka aanuwna Rom kho vamuva kachiiting buksa.”
Ama abom ae Timothi re Erastus enuw mee ynniichu Mesidonia ting chiirka, atak chuve apha topoh khaena Asia nache ongsa.
Apha changlaenche ichum Lam khaena inempak chong suwhsa.
Akhaechuve Demetrius ichii pasar sana rupa aseem inche Aartemis siihnii iseeng aphamchu seemka, ihae ising mee khuumka ama nong ituchu amangongpa.
Ama ing enuw vakhae vokhehkho enongtu aanghak mee aechu khuumka ariir, “Mee ae, hava nong i yntutahna inuw vakhae ing lerchii ymphasa ichii nenuw ing nemanghuwsa.
Havana kik ing ynseem chaap i thangnang mahva taka Pol inge Ephisia nakho, Asia paam aphamsiir nakho sika mee vakhaechu maneemka embarungriir amanghuungnah ichii nemu nensiisa.

Chukhaenache inuw vakhae ing yntu nong i jungmaanglo chiinah, amanche rumingkho simahnii, changpangmahka Asia sungna ong mee vakhae ing aning iruwpak lae Aartemis eenkho ikaniimah ynsuwh vaata, vokhehkho ama aruungnii chukho hungmaang vachii ing omna.”
Ama chongchu enuw ing ensiitahna inempak enthirfhuwr ing uung aeka Ephisia ae Aartemis ing iruungsehva enchii.
Amatah nache khuwruungchu fhuwm ynvae ing sipsa, amana Pol ing aanruwfhuw Mesidonia mee Gaius vokhehkho Aristarkus chukho enuw ing suwr aeka, kuurva tunii iruungpak een tingche hungtaensae.
Pol ing mee ae kaartingche varuwh ningka achii, changvakonchu thacha mee aenche akhaampae.
Chutahnache ama aanchaarfhuw ae Asia sungna aaruung ae buumting vemanruwh aeka amasak mandang mahruw ta aeka iruung ae ningnache enthamsahpa.

Amana mee areh aeng chong yngkheh, amanche mee areh aengkho asiksik chong ing uungsae. Chutahnache mee changjaeh inem itheng aechu enghuw inempak tamsa, vokhehkho ynchii khaena yntinvamuw ichiikho manghuwmahsae.
Chukhaenache Alekjendar chu mee ae kaarna enjebasuwpa, akhaechuve Jehudi aeng atakchu mee ae maensok ting enjetuwr sehsehpa, chutahnache mee ae kaarna akik ithohka ihah phehruw taka ariir.
Atakchu Jehudi meeva ichii emanghuwtah nache, mee vakhae apha topoh iseeh ing, Ephisia ae Aartemis lae Daina inge iruungsehva ta aeka iruur yngkhehpang ing uungsae.

Khuwruungna nongtu mee iruung inche mee changjaehchu daereng ing mangongka chong ariir, “O, Ephisia pasar ae!” Ephisia khuwruung sungna Aartemis lae havi jupitar tanii ijungbuw aruthaksii ing lae eenchu arungva ichii amanghuwmah mee omah.
Ama chongchu irumah enchehmah vakhaka daereng ing vokhehkho embarung mansikru aeng enrungaepa.
Lae een taniina embaruwhmah vokhehkho inuw ynlaechu enjuummah enuw ichu nenuw ing nenghenruwpae.
Chukhaenache achuw yngkheh ing Demetrius vokhehkho anongtufhuw ae takline enrumah omnave, vaapa ngiirnii een haangna vokhehkho ruwreng ideen ae ongnae; amanache enuw ynrensah ae rasiing.
Changvakonchu nenuw ing reentaang thaechii chong khaena nenjong manave, vajeer inuwzii ing lipah siti aangkonglae chong chiva-chiiva.
Ataniinii khaena chembe vaathuh suwhnii omah vakhaka ynrensah manuwve yntaklina isii ikha suwhnii vatah, vokhehkho havi khaene inuw ing akhae iseeng ing picheh mahmuw.
Havi ariir aanuwna ama ing mee vakhaechu amangkaepa.
Emanseer chongchu emanchi aanuwting, Pol ing sebok aechu eenka ynthohsahnii chong ajeerthoh lamsuw thaen aeka atak chuve Mesidonia ting isinii khaena kar akhiingpa.
Ama ing ama paam tingche avasiraenche enuwchu inempak ithohsa aeka Grees ipha ing sisa.
Amanache tha ynthum cheengka Sairia phanii ing ruwkuwng ongnii ningka sikata achiiraensiim Jehudi mee aeng atakchu enjeehnii tahnache, ama ing Mesidonia yntongting ynritah kata ichii ing amandenpa.

Changvakonchu Beria tanii Pirhus sapa Soptar ing atakchu aanruwfhuwpa; amanche Thesalonika ae, Aristarkus re Sekundus vokhehkho Derbe tanii Gaius, amanche Timothi; vokhehkho Asia ae, Taikikus re Trophimus, enuw aechu ama ing aanruwfhuwpae.
Enuw inche maen henginsa aeka Tros nache kenuwchu ynghahpae.
Chor ynvaemah tar isah kuurva aanuw tingche, kenuw ing Philipi na ing ruwkuwng nache vasi ungka inii nirunga sungna Tros nache embuumna vatung ungka inii nisarii cheengsung.
Niisin hungvi ahaarpa inii nache kenuw ing tar sahnii khaena kempurpoh tahnache, Pol ing atuknuw karkhiing ningka achii khaenache ama ing enuwchu manchuwka apha jaenchim aphapa.
Kempurnii een chung kaanache jaemi inempak ynreng.
Pol ing thamin atongchu apha ahungseehtah nache bangrengna ong Iutikus ichii ilerchu amik ikhuw ing namka ajaarcha chungtanii ka avomanthumnii tanii jungbukka ithii ing enjungadompa.
Amatah nache Pol ing jungchumka atakchu jedomka ariir, nenuw jamahruw; ama alaetha omna.
Aanuwnache Pol ing hangkarka tarchu bakhiika ensahpa. Amana enuwthoh khuwvaar ipha ing thamin tongka sisa.
Enuw ing ilerti chu iring ing eenting ruw aeka enrotha inempak irohsah.
Kenuw ing ruwkuwng omnii ipha ing vasi ungka amanche Asos phanii ing ruwkuwng vaongsung; amana Pol kho ongrasiing ichii ing kemanden, changvakonchu ki kakhi ing sivakata taka chong avemanthangpa.
Ama ing Asos nache eentuwhfhuw tahna-che, kenuw ing ruwkuwngna mangong ungka Mitilen tungsung.
Kenuw ing ruwkuwngchu vehuur ungka mathang inii nache Khios ichii kuurnache vatungsung; amana inii ninii ahenpha raenche Samos vepha ungka, mathang inii nache Miletus tungsung.

Pol ing Asia nache apha amaangniimah khaena, Ephisia iraen manuwka ruwkuwngna sijaehtaruw ichii aba-rungriir amangiirpa; akhaechuve chehmanuwve Pentikos inii nache Jerusalem nache ongnii khaena ynnehpak ing isiung.
Miletus tanii Ephisia ting mee vechiirka ruwrthiing upa chaap aechu aningting ivaknii khaena avamangeenpae.

Enuw ing Pol ningtingche envathengtah nache ama ing eningna ariir, “Ki ing Asia ne kavatheng ahaarpa inii nache basenka apha vakhaena nenuwthoh ynruwhak muwka ynsaangkhe ongping ichiichu nentaksah ing nemanghuwsa.
Amachuve, kabarungriir iduwr ing, mikrachii aajaeh ynta ing, vokhehkho Jehudi aeng isamah entu inche kataklina chaang yngen aethoh ynruw ing Aafhuw meenae yngkheh ing anong katusah.
vokhehkho Jehudi ae vokhehkho Grik ae aaniimehna isii icher tanii Thangnang ningting vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ning-tingche barungriir ihuungnii khaena ichum saarkhii pisa ingka,
nenuw ing kaaniiva nenchiichu mee vakhae maekungna vokhehkho een een nakho katong amanche kamanchuwchuw.
Atiive enruw, ynthiing laetha ing iphuwpka ki Jerusalem ting sining; amanache kataklina ynchiikha suwhva tamo ichii ki manghuw samah ing.
Havipang chuve kamanghuwsa, ymphuwpva kachii vokhehkho ija-chaam phava kachii inche kichu ihahka omna ichii ynthiing laetha ing khuwruung siirna saarkhii apeehsa.
Changvakonchu Thangnang tungsiih ajaarna ki ing isa chong saarkhii ipinii inche, Aafhuw Jesu ningtanii kapha nongpham amachu kamanchinii khaena kalaethana iruwpak ing mandenmah ing.
Atiive enruw, nenuw nengkaarna Thangnang lipah khaena tongchak ingka isibir ing, changvakonchu atii nenuw vakhae ing kamae athar vokheh mumah tanuw ichii kataksah ing kamanghuwsa.
Chukhae-nache ataniine neningna saarkhii katusahnah, nenuw achuw yngkheh maang tanuwve ki karaarnii yntanga omah.
Thangnang ing amanden vakhaechu neningna kamanthangne ki duwrmahdeh ing.
Jesu Khrista asii ing eeriivasah Thangnang ruwrthiing nenuwchu icheernii khaena nenuw nentaksah vokhehkho jao ruwrchaap nakhe nenbarungriir manruwhruw; laetha ing nenuwchu ruwrthiing aapuh ymbasuwpa.
Ki kaangkae aanuwting eentheem heemfhuw jaoruwr aseeh-mah nengkaarna thengvaata ichii kamanghuwsa.
Vokhehkho nenuw nensungsah taniirap ing enganuwchu ijiinii inche sebok aechu ivakinii areh aphuw chong ing ichong mee hungsuwh vaatae.
Ama khaenache kumthum sungna richii ynruwm thoh ynruw ing siim jaen mee vakhaechu ynchah manchen samahdeh ing ichiichu eensiipeeh saruw.

Atii ki ing nenuwchu Thangnang ningna vokhehkho Aafhuw atungsiih chong nache kamansirsah nahchuw; havana chong inge nenuwchu ynseemsahnii vokhehkho amanthiing vasah ae kaarna iphapham om amachu neningna ipisah achehsa.
Ki ing achuw ningtanii sana, rupa, changmahka peendiir idik samahdeh ing.
Kakik ynniimeh inge kataksah vokhehkho kaanruwfhuw ae ikanii phanii khaenache nong katusa ichii nenuw ing nemanghuwsa.

Aangkhenglaangna ki ing neningna itupham isuwh kamandangsahpa ichiichuve, nenuw ing amachuvaang nong tutanuwka isuur mee aechu ibomsah re Aafhuw Jesu isa chongchu mandenva nenchiiting buksa, akhaechuve Aafhuw Jesu rap ing ajeer, “Aapha ithi ing aapeeh inche bor aphahakva.”
Havi riirka ama ing akheerkhuwh mansinka enuw vakhae thohche athamsahpa.
Enuw vakhae inempak ening sikka chapsae vokhehkho Pol chu ikorsa aeka amae entumpa;
Pol maechu athar vokheh mumahnii ae ichii ariir chong khaenache inempak embarungriir ijasah ae. Amana enuw ing atakchu ruwkuwng omnii ipha ing envethakpa.
Enuw thoh ynsae ungka aanuw-nache ruwkuwng nache ong ungka, Kos phanii ing ichiimjaeh ing vasi ungka, inii nikheh aanuwting Rhodes chu vepha ungka amana inche Patara vatungsung.
Amana Phonesia veraenvachii ruwkuwng vepha ungka sisung.
Kenuw ing Saipras kenve-mutah nache, Sairia yntong tari tingche vehuur ungka vokhehkho peeh ithinfhuw om khaena Taire tingche kenuw hungruwhsung.
Amanache sebok topoh aechu yntuwhfhuw ae ungka inii nisarii cheengsung; enuw ing ynthiing laetha ajaarna Pol chu Jerusalem ting asiniimah ing enriirpa.

Changvakonchu enuwthoh onghak aphachu hungtangka kenuw ing kensitah nache, enuw vakhae ing enrumee, ensiti aethoh ynruw ing khuwruung taang ipha ing ynvethak sahpae, amana chifhuw ataang nache kheerkhuwh mansinsa ungka kenthamsahpa vokhehkho yngkheh yngkheh lamsuw ynthaensah ung.
Kenuw ing ruwkuwng nache ong ungka, enuw chuve engeenting ynrisae.
Aanuwnache kenuw ing Taire na ing chifhuwna isi ungchu ahungdong tahnache Patolemais tungsung, amana kenuw ing unae aechu salaam tu ungka enuw thohche nikheh cheengsung.
Aanuw akhuwvaar nache kenuw hangiir ungka Kesaria nache hungtungsung. Amanache Jerusalem na rukuum itunii khaena ynteer vasah mee sarii kaarna Philip ichii isa chong ajeermee eensung nache ongsung.
Ama asanuw rakhii iniimah Thangnang chong ajeer ae lunghah manriimeh om ae.
Amanache kenuw ing inii topoh kencheenglae Judia tanii Agabus ichii jaephar ivatheng.

Ama ing keningna vakka Pol ing adiirriim achiimniichu verika ataksah akhi akikchu phuwpka ariir, “Ynthiing laetha ing jinge ichii ing ariirnah, havana diirriim ynchiimnii aafhuw pasarpa chu Jehudi aeng Jerusalem nache jinge ichii ing phuwp ae naka atakchu reentaang mee ae ningting pivaatae.”
Kenuw ing hava chong i kensiitahna kenuw re amana ong mee aengkho Pol chu Jerusalem ting asiniimah ing kengkhaam.

Chang-vakonchu Pol ing eningna abasang, “Nenuw ing chapchuwka kabarungriir nengasum i ynchii khaenava? Aafhuw Jesu aruming khaenache Jerusalem na kichu kaeshumna ong khaenapang mahka ithii khaenakho ynthongping.
Kemaneemchu arumah tahnache manchen ungka kenriir, Aafhuw ing amandenchu ynsuwhrasiing.”
Inii topoh kencheeng aanuwnache kempeeh bathong ungka Jerusalem ting isi kembasempa.
Kesaria tanii sebok ae thohche vasihak ungka vokhehkho enuw ing kenuwchu itungnii khaena mamaenna sebok vasah Saipras tanii Manason eensung nache ymbathungpae.
Kenuw ing Jerusalem kenvatung tahnache, unae aenche rotha irohpak ing ymbariimsah ae.
Aanuw inii nache Pol ing kenuw thohche Jems ningting vaksung; amanache upa aekho ynvae ae.
Pol ing enuwchu salaam atuae aanuwna ama anongtuna Thangnang ing reentaang mee ae kaarna atupeeh nongchu adiing aneh ing atongpa. Enuw ing amachu ensiitah nache Thangnang emampahsah.
Amana enuw ing aningna enriir, “Kenguw kenae, nang ing namusa Jehudi ae kaarne thacha mee aajaeh omnae; vokhehkho enuw vakhae ing vajeer chonghak nache embarungriir apeehsae.”

Nang ing reentaang mee ae kaarna ong ae Jehudi aangkhengna ensiti aechu vinchiip tumahruw vokhehkho enunu nache simahruw tachiika Mosi vajeer chonghakchu bathenruw ichii ing namanchuw aechu enuw ing enriirnah.
Chukhaenache ynchii tuvaanchiiva? Akhaechuve nang thengsachii ichii enuw ing siisiingtae.
Chukhaenache naningna kenriir havi itupeehra; amachuve entaksah ing chongiir enrisah ae pasar mee manrii omnae.

Havana pasar ae i ynruwfhuw ae nana nataksahkho ynthiingsara, amanche enuw ing enrusae emangkuhnii khaena engkhaena ruwhvachii bathongla; vokhehkho eningna nang nakhaena enriir chongchu ichummahva changvakonchu nataksah ingkho vajeer chonghakchu ngahsiika hungsinachii ichiichu enuw vakhae ingkho manghuw vaatae.

Changvakonchu athacha vasah reentaang mee ae khaena chembe kenuw ing vajeer tu ungka lae ting peeh ympeeh, sii isah, chaangna uka ithii, lamsi ing ithii vokhehkho naamak, hava vakhae chaap tanii entaksah ing ingahnii khaenache chongthen kembathenpa.

Amatah nache Pol ing pasar aechu ynruwfhuwka animaniinii inii nache ynseeng aeka engkheng khaena ipeefhuw peehchu empeeh inii ipha ing ynthiingnii inii chivachii ynthangnii khaena rumniieen tingche ama ing hangruwhsa.
Inii nisarii ahungchidir mahrirae Asia tanii Jehudi aenche Pol chu rumniieen nache emutah nache, amana itheng mee vakhaechu sinsa aeka atakchu akikna bachuw aeka uung ae.

“Isrel pasar ae, ibomruw! Aphamsiirna inuw ymmee aechu, vajeer chonghak vokhehkho hava mapham ichu jeehniika mee vakhae amanchuwchu haviva; vokhehkho havi manthisiirka Grik mee aekho rumniieen ting henruwka ynthiing mapham havichu amanchohpa.”
Ajae isivasahna enuw ing Ephisia tanii Trophimas chu Pol ing khuwruung nache ynruwfhuwka vokhehkho rumniieen ting ahenruwva ichii ing emanden.
Chutahnache khuwruung nache inempak huwtamsa, vokhehkho mee ae ing vataen aeka Pol chu ensuwr amanche rumniieen tanii thur aeka eenkhaar aangkheng engkamchirpa.
Pol chu enuw ing ithehnii khaena enjongtah nache Jerusalem sung aangkheng iraang suwhsa ta aeka laarchang aruwr aaruung ningtingche chong emanthangpa.
Ama ing ithupak inche laarchang ae vokhehkho chaama ter aapuh aechu ruwka ening ipha ing vataensae; amana enuw ing athurfhuw aapuh aere laarchang aechu emutah nache Pol embinchu emanchenpa.

Changlaenche athurfhuw aapuh iruung inche Pol chu veneengka asuwrpa, vokhehkho siirruw runoh asae ynniimeh inche phuwpruw taka chong ajeerpa. Amana atakchu achuwva vokhehkho ynchiikha atudohva taka ama ing asiipae.

Mee changjaeh inem kaarnache mee topoh aenche chong yngkheh amanche reentaang topoh aenche asik chong yngkheh riir aeka uungsae; amana huwchu atam ramthi inche ama ing atatak ichumchu manghuw chehmahka, Pol chu laarchang ongnii een sungtingche ruwruw taka chong ajeerpa.
Pol inche kaarchum nache ahangkarthoh mee changjaeh inem aenche engaburpoh tahnache, atakchu laarchang aenche engadompa.
Akhaechuve mee changjaeh inem aenche atakchu taang jenbasuwparuw ta aeka enguungnii baram ing aanuw enjiipa.
Pol chu laarchang ae ongnii eensung tingche emanruwh phana, ama ing aaruung ningnache ariir, naningna ki ing chong yngkhehpang iriirsah ruvatamo?
Aaruung inche asii, “Nang Grik chong namanghuwse?”
Isivasahna miktheh mee ae pasar lising manrii aechu paamfhuw ting naruw ae Ijeep mee chumah vachii-khang?
Pol ing abasang, “Ki chuve Silisia khuwruung na om Tarsas tanii Jehudi meeping, chukhaenache mee ae ningne chong iriirnii khaena irupeehra tasa ingka kathamsahnahchii.”

Laarchang aaruung inche Pol ing athamsahchu arupeehtah nache, Pol ing hangiirka mee vakhaechu daereng ing ongnii khaena akik aathohsahpa. Mee ae inche daereng ing engong-raenche, ama ing Hebreeu chong ing eningnache chongsa.
“Kauw kanae vokhehkho kapa kafhuw chaap ae, atarae ki ing nenuw vakhae neningna kaangahsahnii chong kariirsah i irungaepeeh saruw.”
Ama ing Hebreeu chong ing eningna ichongchu ensiitah nache daereng ing ongsae. Amana Pol ing ariir:
Ki ing pasar aekho, rupanuw aekho phuwp ae ingka kaeshum ting kakhum ae vokhehkho ithii ipha ingkho havana Lam khaene kamanja ae.

Havi khaene Aanchung Jaethiim aengkho amanche aanchungpuh upa chaap ae ingkho saarkhiinae. Enuw eningtanii unae Jehudi ae ningna ynziih chong-then pha ingka, Damaskas na ong enuw chukho ijachaam pinii khaena vokhehkho phuwp ae ningka Jerusalem phanii ing ihenruwnii inche ki ing amatingche isi ing.
“Ki ing vasi ingka inii siimchim ruvaena Damaskas kavephapha nache manghuw mangharu ing ka-ruwvaena thangbaen tanii ireng inche ynrakuwrpa.
Vokhehkho laruw tingche ki jungbuk ingka iruur yng-kheh inche kaningna Sol, Sol, nang ing kichu ynchii khaena ymmanja vachii taka ariir chongchu ki ing kasiipa.
Amana ki ing kabasang, ‘Aafhuw, nang achuwvachii?’ Aafhuw ing ariir, ‘Ki chuve nang ing namanja Nazaret Jesu ping.’
Changlae kaanruwfhuw mee aenchembe irengchu amuae, changvakonchu kaningna ichong Aafhuw iruur chuve siimah ae.
Ki ing kabasang, ‘Aafhuw, ki ing ynchii tuvakachiiva?’ Aafhuw inche ymba-sang, ‘Nang hangiir nana Damaskas ting varuwhra, amanache nang ing tuvanachii nong Thangnang ing amandenchu iriirpeeh vaata.’
Ama ireng inche kamik manthimka paam-khuw kamuchehmah tahnache, kaanruwfhuw aenche kakikna ibachuw aeka Damaskas khuwtingche ynruwpae.
“Amana heong Jehudi aenche ynseer aeka engajapak vajeer chong-hakchu isajaeh ing amanjii Anania ichii pasar mee yngkheh inche vathengka,
kabuum nache ngiirka ariir, ‘Kauw kanae Sol, nang namik namu ynsuwhrasiing!’ Aphachak nache kamik imu phasa ingka aningting kahengenpa.

Ama ing kaningna ariir, ‘Inuw vakhae afhuw fhuwven ae Thangnang inche nangchu Aafhuw ing amanden namanghuwnii khaenache, ynthiing ichum Aafhuw amachu imunii khaena vokhehkho Aafhuw nertanii iruur isiinii khaenache eeteersahpa.
Nang ing mee vakhae maekung nache Aafhuw thenna nang ing namu vasah, vokhehkho nasii vasah vakhaechu asaarkhii ynsuwh vaanta.
Atarae nang ing ynchiikha nahahva? Hangiirla amanche naningna om isii icher vakhaechu aanchaamnii inche baptais tunana Aafhuw ningtingche henthamla.’
“Ki ing Jerusalem ting hunganri ingka vokhehkho rumniieen nache kathamsahrae karuvaamna yndang kamupa,
amanache kaningna ariir, ‘Jerusalem bathen churchurla, kakhaena nang ing saarkhii pivana-chiichu enuw ing rimahnii ae.’
Ki ing kabasang, ‘Aafhuw, enuw entak ing emanghuwsa, ajae ki ing meekongnii chaapna Aafhuw nang ynthacha mee aechu kaeshum ting khum ae ingka vokhehkho ibinkho kabin ae.’
Aafhuw nang nasaarkhii apeeh Stephen sii aantarae, kikho embuumna ngiir ingka entu nongchu karuva, vokhehkho aatheh mee ae peendiir chukho ki ing karung.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw ing kaningna sira, ki ing nangchu yndahpak reentaang mee ae ningting chiirva kachii achii.”
Havi phanii ing enuw inche achongchu enrungaepa; changvakonchu aanuwnache enuw ing uung aeka enriir, “Hangchii mee i laaruw paamne iring matik chaamah.”
Enuw ing uung aeka vokhehkho empeendiir siih aeka amanche minvaen ting pirkhuwhchu emanthuum tahnache,
Aapuh aaruung inche ataklina jinge ichii matik ing uung ae akhaechu ynghuwchehnii khaena, laarchang ae ongnii eensung tingche ruwnuwna binruw vokhehkho chong siiruw ichii ipirpak chong abathakpa.
Enuw ing atakchu runoh ing emphuwp tahnache, Pol ing abuumna ingiir laarchang chaama aapuh ningnache ariir, “Rom meechu vajeer turu inche nenbinchu nenuw nenvajeer chakva?”
Laarchang chaama aapuh inche ama chongchu asiitah nache, ama ing aapuh aaruung ningna vakka ariir, “Nang ing ynchiikha tura nachiiva? Akhaechuve ama mee i Rom mee ynsuwhsa.”
Chukhaenache aapuh aaruung inche Pol ningnache vakka chong asii, “Kaningna riirla, nang Rom mee vachii?”
Pol ing “Ung” taka abasang.
Aapuh aaruung inche ariir, “Amen inempak ing irii ingka Rom mee yngkheh kaphapa.”
Changvakonchu Pol ing abasang, “Ki Rom na om meeping.”
Chukhaenache aningna chong siiva enchii aenche engadahpa vokhehkho aapuh aaruung inchenkho Rom meesa ichii amanghuw tahnache, ama ing aphuwp khaenache ynchiksa.

Mathang inii nache Jehudi aeng aningna ynchii khaena miraar apeehpae ichiichu aapuh aaruung inche atatak ing manghuw ningka achiitah nache, Pol aphuwpchu abajohpa amanche aanchung jaethiim ae vokhehkho aanchungpuh vakhae ningnache meekong tunii khaena ipirpak chong amanthangpa, amana Pol chu henruwka emaensok nache amangiirpa.
Pol ing aanchungpuh aechu enka ariir, “Kauw kanae ae, ki atanii ipha inge Thangnang maana barungriir iseeng ing ringning.
Aanchung Jaethiim Ananias ing abuumna ingiir ae ningnache anerku nakhe jechumruw taka ajeriirpa.”

Apha ichiinache Pol ing ariir, “Ivaar ing yntaehchii bang, nang Thangnang ing ibin vaata! Nang ing vajeer chonghak inuwjii ing kichu vajeer itunii khaena ongchiika, vajeer chonghakchu asup aphuw ing bareh chiika yngkhaena kichu binruw tachiika najeriirva.”
Apaangna ingiir mee aenche enriir, “Aanchung Jaethiim chu nang ing narakuhva.”
Pol ing abasang, “O kauw kanae ae, ama aanchung jaethiim va ichii ki manghuw samah ing; havi ynziihka omna, ‘Nang ing namee ae aapuh taklina isamah ing chongva nachii-mahva.’”
Pol ing changche ichii ing ariir-tah nache, Pharisi aere Saduki ynrumah aeka aruwr asiksik ing suwhsae.
Akhaechuve hangring kho, vaarmee vokhehkho laetha kho omah ta aeka Saduki aenchembe enriir, changvakonchu Pharisi aen-chembe aaniimeh ing omna ta aeka enthacha.

Amatah nache ipir ing uung sehsehsae, vokhehkho Pharisi ae enruwr kaarting ynvae ae thiimthang topoh aenche hangiir aeka chong ynsangsae, kenuw ing hava mee takline isamah ynchiikho tumah ung. Achuw ing ymmanghuwsa, ama aningna laetha yngkheh ing changmahka vaarmee yngkheh ing ichongkho arusa.

Changche ichii ing chong yngkheh yngkheh engaansang tahnache, Pol chu arakheh arakheh ing embasuwkho arusa ichii khaena aapuh aaruung inche ynchikka laarchang ae ningting jungchum nuwna ataksu engkaar tanii siih ae nuwna laarchang ongnii eensung ting ruwruw taka ajeriirpa.
Ama jaen nache Aafhuw ing apaangna ngiirka ariir, “Nathona mansakla. akhaechuve nang ing Jerusalem na kakhaena saarkhii napeeh vaangkhe, Rom nenkho saarkhii piva nachiiting buksa.”
Khuwchu ahungvaar tahnache Jehudi topoh aenche yntuwhpoh aeka ensirpa. Enuw entaksah ing Pol chu kenthehmahri raentaang thaemin samahnung vokhehkho chiikho inmahnung ta aeka reepsae.
Havi aasir aechu mee somanrii athipae.
Enuw ing aanchung jaethiim ae vokhehkho upa ae ningnache vak aeka enriir, “Kenuw ing Pol kenthehmahri raentaang thaemin samahnung ta ungka kensanaensah ing kemanreeppa.

Chukhaenache atarae nenuw ing ama akhaene isajaeh ing ynchiiva ichiichu manghuw nungka nenchiivaang mantanuwna, Rom ae aapuh aarung ningtingche Pol chu neningting ivebathennii chong vepiruw. Changvakonchu kenuw ing havane avatungmah rirae ithehnii khaena hemanchuwmva kenta.”
Changvakonchu Pol asarnuw sapa inche emanchuwmchu asiipa, chukhaenache laarchang ongnii eentingche vakka Pol ningnache ariirpa.
Pol ing laarchang chaama aapuh yngkhehchu ve-eenka aningna ariir, “Havana naepang i aanchungseh aapuh ningting iruwpeehra, ama ing aningna chong yngkheh riirvachii omna.”

Chukhaenache ama ing aanchungseh aapuh ningtingche ruwka ariir, “Kaeshum sungna ong Pol ingkhe ive-eenka havana pasarti i naningting vethakla achiitah nache kaveruwva, ama ing naningna chong yngkheh riirvachii omna.”
Aanchungseh aapuh inche akikna bachuwka aruwpa vokhehkho ynruwhjaeh ing chong asiipa, “Nang ing kaningna chong iriirfhuw omchu ynchiiva.”
Ama ing ariir, “Enuw ing Pol akhaena isajaeh ing chong siiva enchiivaang manta ae naka, naningna aanchungpuh ting ivepinii khaena Jehudi aatuaricheh aeng iveniih vaatae.

Changvakonchu nang ing enchongchu imanjiipeeh mahra, enuw engkaar tanii mee somanrii athi aenche Pol kenthehmahri raentaang thaemin samahnung ta aeka embarungriir manreep aeka amanchuwmnah ae; atii enthoraang chichirsa, naningtanii chong chupang enghah vatah.”
Chukhaenache aanchungseh aapuuh inche pasarti ningnache nang ing havana chong i kaningna kaman-thangpa tanana achuw ningnakho riirmah dehra taka amangkaepa.

Aanuwnache ama ing laarchang chaama aapuh meeniimeh ve-eenka ariir, “Jaen apha eekuw ataklae Kesaria phanii ing isinii khaena laar-chang mee chaniimeh thoh sakuurna siva enchii mee somsarii vokhehkho isii ichi mee chaniimeh thoraang turuw.
Pol chu sakuurna mangong nuwna lipah aapuh Feliks aongtah phanii ing ataklina isii ikha asuwhniimahdeh ing sakuur thoraang turuw.
Amana jinge ichii ing chongthen abaziihpa:
“Klodius Lisias Ruwrengdeen, lipah aapuh Feliks: Salaam kajepeeh-sah nahchii.
Havana pasar ichu Jehudi mee aeng suwr aeka ithehnii khaena thoraang enturae, ki ing Rom tanii meeva ichii manghuw ingka, eningtanii laarchang aethoh apha icha ing kengkarpa.
Enuw ing ynchii khaena ataklina miraar empeehva ichii akhaechu ki ing manghuw ningka kachiitah nache, atakchu enuw aanchungpuh ae ning ipha ing kaveruw.
Ki ing katuwh chuve enuw envajeer chonghak khaena chong emanjaam vatah, changvakonchu ithii phanii changmahka kaeshum sungna ithinnii yntangakho amiraar omah.

Vokhehkho hava pasar takline emanchuwmnah ichiichu kaningna emanthang tahnache, ki ing ama ataklina miraar apeeh ae ningnakho namaensokna ataklinache chongsaruw ta ing atak i naningna ithirmahdeh ing kajebathenva.”
Chukhaenache laarchang ae inche chonghak inuwzii inche Pol chu ruw aeka jaenna Entripatis tingche enghenruwpa.
Changvakonchu atuknuwche enuw ing sakuur aongnii mee aechu amathoh ynruw ing isinii khaena ma aeka, laarchang ae ongnii een tingche hunganrisae.
Enuw ing Kesaria hungtung aeka, chongthenchu lipah aapuh ningnache emansirpa vokhehkho Pol chukho aningting enjeruwpa.
Ama ing chongthenchu paaka, nang upaam tanii mee vachii taka asiipa. Ama ing Silisia meeva ichiichu amanghuwtah nache,
ama ing ariir, “Nataklina miraar ympeeh aechu enthengraenche, ki ing nachong isajaeh ing rungaeva kata.” Amana Pol chu Herot iruwng ongnii sungna mangong nuwna rungruw taka chonghak ajeerpa.
Inii nirunga aanuwna Aan-chung Jaethiim Ananias ing upa topoh aethoh amanche ichongnii amanghuw Tertulus thoh ynruw ing vatheng aeka lipah aapuh maana Pol chu vajeer tunii khaena enriirpa.

Aanchung Jaethiim ing Pol chu eenka amana Tertullus ing Pol taklina amanraarnii ing chongsa: “O, ruwreng ideen Feliks! Nang najaarna kenuw idaejaeh ing vokhehkho namanden inche jaati khaena isa isamah namanchumcheh khaena
kenuw ing inempak kemanpahsah chiithoh ynruw ing akhae aangkhengna vokhehkho apham aangkhengna kenruvachii.
Chukhaenache ki ing naningna apha aseehniimah ing, naningsiihna kenchong topoh pangti rungaepeehnii khaena kathamsah nahchii.

Amachuve Pol ichii pasar havi inge hungmaangnii vachii atu, laaruw paam aangkhengna ong Jehudi vakhae ae sungna imaangnii chong abasuw vokhehkho Nazaret mee aechu akikna achi aapuh ynsuwh meeva ichii kenuw ing ataklina kentuwhpa.
Ama ing rumniieen rapkho mamaang kata taka atunah, changvakonchu atak i kenuw ing kensuwrva. Chukhaenache kenuw kenvajeer chonghak inuwzii ing atak i vajeer itu kengadikva.
Changvakonchu Lisias ichii aanchung aaruung ing vathengka kengkik tanii isiihka
ama ing araarsa ichii chongchu naningting vaknuwna vasiisaruw taka chonghak ympeehpa. Chukhaenache kenuw ing ataklina kemanraarnii vakhaechu nang ing chong nasiirae imanghuwpeehcheh vaanta.”
Havana emanraarnii chong vakhae i Jehudi aengkho ynvae aeka enchong emanchimpa.

Lipah aapuh inche Pol chu ichongnii khaena arutahache Pol ing ariir, “Nang ing kum aajaeh iseeh ing jaati taklina vajeer natuva ichii ki ing kamanghuwsahsa, chukhaenache namaana kaangahsahnii chong karotha irohpak ing kariirsahnah.
Ki ing Jerusalem na Thangnang irum kathengnii inii nisuum ariinii iraenmahri ichii nang ing ymmang-huwpeeh chehsachii.
Ki ing achuw mee yngkheh thohkho chong ynjeehniimah ung, changmahka rumniieen nakho, meekongnii chaap nakho amanche khuwruung chaap nakho chong kabasuw Jehudi aeng tuwhmah ae.
Enuw ing kataklina ymmanraarnii ae chongchu atarae chumna ichii aandangnii ipichehmahnii ae.

Changvakonchu havi naningna kariirsahnah amachuve, vajeer chonghak sungna ynziihka om vokhehkho jaephar ae ynthiing thiimziih sungna ynthin vakhaechu thacha ingka, enuw ing chummah enchii Lam amachu inuwzii ing ki ing kenfhuwven ae Thangnang chu karumsahva.
Isa mee chukho isamah mee chukho hangring vaata ta aeka entaksahrap ing enruchu, ki ingkho Thangnang ningna kaningmanden kamangomva.
Havi khaene ki ing Thangnang vokhehkho mee vakhae ningnakho apha om vakhaena kavakhar ynthiing ing ongnii inche kataksah ing katusahva.
Ama apha sungnache mee ae thohkho ynruwru ing vokhehkho huwtamrudeh inche rumniieen nache katakchu ynthiing vasah inche enuw ing yntuwhpae. Changvakonchu Asia paam tanii mee topoh ae chuve ong ae-
enuw ing kataklina miraar piniichu omnave, hava nene nama nache ngiir ae naka kataklina imanraar vachiipae.
Changmah vakhaka mee ae rap inge ki ing aanchungpuh ae maana kangiir laenne ynraar katu entuwhchu riir ae rasiing.
Ithii ae ing hangring vaatae ichii khaena atanii iniine nenuw nemaana kataklina vajeer yntuchuw chuve ki ing engkaarna ngiir ingka kariirsah.”
Changvakonchu Feliks ing Lam akhaenache athiseh ynthiingkiir ing amanghuwcha Lisias aanchung aapuh ing athenglaenche, ki ing vajeer tupeehva kachuw taka aatorpa.
Aanuwnache Pol chu vaesang ing mangong nuwna ingahnii khaena vokhehkho aarang ing rukuum tupeehva enchii chukho aanthing-niimah ing, laarchang chaama aapuh ningnache ama ing chong ajeerpa.
Inii topoh aanuwtingche Feliks ing ama aarangnuw Jehudi sanuw Drusilla thoh ynruw ing theng aeka amanche Pol chu vamangeen aeka Jesu Khrista ithacha khaenache achong enrungaepa.

Changvakonchu Pol ing ichum ing ataksah yngahcheh vokhehkho nuwting vajeer omvachii khaena ama ing achongtah nache, Feliks ing ynchikka ariir, “Ataraenbe yngkaetahra, ki ing apha icha kapharae nang eenva kachii.”
Ama apha sungnache Pol inge seer ipivatamo ichii ing amandenkho amanden, chukhaenache Pol chu veer raprap chakka achong fhuwchak.
Changvakonchu kumnii ahenphatah nache Porsius Festus ing Feliks aphamchu amansirpa; amanche Feliks ing Jehudi ae ningtanii eningsiih phaningka ichii mandenka Pol chu kaeshum nache amangongpa.
Atii Festus ing ama paam nache varuwhka, inii nithum aanuwting Kesaria na ing Jerusalem phanii ing vasisa.
Amana aanchung jaethiim ae vokhehkho Jehudi ae aaruung ynsuwh ae ing Pol taklinache Festus ningna vajeer tura ta aeka enthamsahpa.
Pol chu lamna chuwm manuwka thehtaruw ichii khaena sir aeka, Jerusalem tingche eennii khaena Festus ningna enuw ing aningsiih athamsah ae.
Changvakonchu Festus ing eningna abasang, “Pol chu Kesaria na laarchang aeng rung aeka ongna; katakkho apha topoh ongpheh ningka amating sivakata.
Chukhaenache nenuw nengkaarna aacheh mee aenche kithoh ynruw ing sinungka, ama amiraarchu omnave enuw ing changlaenche manraar ae rasiing taka ariir.”

Amanache engkaarna ama ing inii neeriih, changmahka nisuum iraenru ing ongka, Kesaria phanii ing vasika mathang inii nache ama ing vajeernii ongnii nache ongka, Pol chu iveruwnii khaena chonghak ajeerpa.
Pol ing avathengtah nache, Jerusalem tanii itheng Jehudi aenche aruvaena ngiir aeka iruwpak miraar aajaehcha piaeka haviva ichii inaemah ing enriir numnumpa.

Amana Pol ing aangahsahnii ariir chongchuve haviva: “Jehudi ae vajeer chonghak taklina vakhang nakho, Thangnang rumniieen taklina vakhang nakho, Kesar taklina vakhang nakho, ki ing isii yntangakho tumahdeh ing.”

Changvakonchu Festus ing Jehudi ae ningtanii eningsiih phaningka ichii amandentah nache, Pol chu abasang, “Nang ing Jerusalem ting sitaniika havana vaathuh khaene kamana vajeer itu runingka nachiinah?”

Changvakonchu Pol ing ariir, “Kichu vajeer itunii vachii apham Kesar vajeernii ongnii maanache ki ngiirning, Jehudi ae taklina ki ing ynraar katu yntanga omah, amachu nang ingkho isajaeh ing imanghuwpeeh chiika omna.

Katak i ynraar katu meeping vanave vokhehkho ithii aru nong katu omnave, ki ithii khaena kada omah; changvakonchu mee ae inge kataklina miraar ympeeh chaap ae sungna laanglam ichum yngkheh pangkho omah nave, achuw mee yngkhehpang ingkho kichu eningting ipichehmahnii ae. Ki ing Kesar ningting vajeer tunii khaena kariirsahnah.”
Amatah nache Festus ing aanchungpuh upa aethoh chong manseerka abasang, “Nang ing Kesar ningting vajeer tunii khaena nariir vakhaka Kesar ningting sivaanta.”
Atii inii topoh ynghaen phehka Agrippa vokhehkho Barnis ing Kesaria nache Festus chu ivaveernii vokhehkho bariimsahnii khaena va-tungsae.
Enuw ing apha topoh iseeh ing encheeng raenche Festus ing Iruwng Agrippa maanache Pol taklina vaathuh isuwhchu manthangka ariir, “Feliks ing kaeshum sungna thinka amah pasar mee yngkheh omna.
Ki ing Jerusalem na kaonglae hava pasar khaene aanchung jaethiim aere Jehudi upa aeng ataklina miraar ibabuwpeehra ta aeka kaningna vajeernii khaena enriir.

Amana ki ing eningna kariir chuve, amiraar omsa ichii apha mee inche amanraar mee ae thoh mae re mae yntuwh ing ataklina isuwh vaathuh khaenache aangahsahnii chong iriirnii apha aphamah rirae, ama meechu ynraar chuve Rom mee ae nunu mahva kachii.
Enuw ing havane engkheng itheng ae khaenache, ki yntukrudeh ing, aanuw nikheh nache vajeernii ongnii nache ong ingka, pasarpa chu iveruwnii khaena chonghak kajeerpa.
Ataklina miraar apeeh mee aenche enghangchong incha ki ing kamanden vaang, ataklina isamah chong yntanga enuw ing hembasuwmah ae.
Chang-vakonchu enuw entaksah endharmo khaenache, vokhehkho ringna taka Pol ing ithii vasah Jesu khaena ireep nache enganahnii ynsuwhsa.
Chukhaenache hava vaathuh khaene ki ing ynsaangkhe siiva kachiiva ichii manghuwchehmah ingka, nang ing Jerusalem ting sinana vaathuh havi khaene vajeer itu naadiknah ta ingka kasiipa.
Changvakonchu ama ing paam aapuh ningting vajeer itunii khaena ariirsah tahnache, ki ing Kesar ningting kajebathen mahri raentaang ikhumnii khaena chonghak kajeer.”
Agrippa ing Festus ningna ariir, “Ki ingkho achongchu siiningka kachiinah.” Festus ing abasang, “Atuknuw nang ing ama achongchu siivaanta.”

Atuknuwche Agrippa re Barnis enuw meenii inche thoraang iruungpak ing vatheng aeka, laarchang ipirpak aapuh ae thoh vokhehkho khuwruung aapuh iruung ae thohche mee vakhae aangkongnii nache varuwh aeka, Festus achonghak inuwzii ing Pol chu enveruwpa.

Amana Festus ing ariir, “Iruwng Agrippa vokhehkho kenuw thoh ong pasar vakhae, nenuw havana pasar i nemusa. Ama i iring matik chaamah ichii ing uung aeka Jerusalem nakho, hava nenkho Jehudi mee vakhae ing kaningna enriirpa.
Changvakonchu ama ithii phanii ynchiikho tumah ichii ki ing katuwhpa, ama atak ing iruwng ningna vajeer itu aniihnuwzii ing amachu mansinii khaena kachong kamanreeppa.

Ama akhaene ki ing kaafhuw naningna ynziihfhuw yntangakho omah. Chukhaenache siinana ki ing ynziih aruchu ituwhnii khaena nenuw nemaana vokhehkho Iruwng Agrippa, athurfhuw ing namaana atakchu kaveruwpa.
Kaeshum sungna yngkhum meechu vajeer tuniinache ynveruwtahna, ataklina emanraarnii chongkho emandangmah havichu vakhar omah ae ichii ing kamandennah.”
Agrippa ing Pol ningna ariir, “Nang nataksah khaena ichong ruvaata.” Amana Pol ing akik ithohka aangahsahnii chong iriir abasenpa:
“O Iruwng Agrippa, Jehudi aeng kataklina ymmanraar ae khaena atanii naningna kaangahsahnii chong riirsava kachii i kakhaena chembe kalaepah isapakva ichii ing kamandensahnah.
Jehudi ae sungna om ensinii vokhehkho vaathuh isuwh aangkheng nang ing namanghuwseh yngkheh vachii. Chukhaenache ikhaangpeeh nana kachong irungaepeeh tasa ingka kathamsahnahchii.
“Kanaepanglae basenka kajaati ae kaarna Jerusalem na hungpaar ingka katu kari vakhaechu Jehudi mee vakhae ing emanghuwsa.
Enuw ing saarkhii pinungka ta ae nave, kenuw ing kening dharmo chu ipirpak ing emanden Pharisi tanii yngkhehping.
Kempa fhuwven ae ningna Thangnang ing chongreep atunache kaningmanden om khaena, atarae havane vajeernii khaena ngiir ingka

amachu iphanii khaenache kensungkhur suum ariinii ing siim jaen Thangnang chu barungriir iruwh ing rumsa ungka ningmanden phanii ing kemandensahva. Amanche havana ningmanden khaene, O Iruwng, kataklina Jehudi aeng ymmanraarpae.
Thangnang ing ithii aechu manring nave, amachu ynchii khaena nenuw ing nenthacha chehmahva?
Havi Jerusalem na ki ing katu, aanchung jaethiim ae ningtanii aatuaricheh pha ingka ynthiing mee ae aanemchu kaeshum ting kasiih ae, amanche enuwchu entheh raenche ki ingkho karusa ichii kamandang.

Amanache meekongnii chaapna enuwchu vanuh vanuh manja ae ingka, enuw ing eningchu ithipak ing enchongnii inche katu; vokhehkho entaklina ki ing ynveeh vaang reentaang khuwruung chaap tingkho kavamanang ae.
“Havi khaenava ki ing aanchung jaethiim ae ningtanii aatuaricheh vokhehkho chongthen thoh ynruw inche Damaskas ting vasising.
Amana inii siimchim nache O Iruwng, inii ireng athi ing aen thangbaen tanii ireng yngkheh inche katak vokhehkho kasifhuw ae chukho irakuwrka ireng-chu kamupa.
Kenuw vakhae ing laruw ting kenbuktah nache, Hebreeu chong ing ariir iruur ki ing kasii, Sol, Sol, nang ing ynchii khaena kichu manjavachii? Iring taklina nakhi ing nahaechu nasuhnii vatah.
Ki ing kariir, ‘Nang achuwvachii Aafhuw?’ Aafhuw inche ariir, ‘Ki chuve nang ing manjachii Jesu ping.’

Chang-vakonchu nang hangsuw nana ngiirla; akhaechuve havi khaene ki ing nangchu kamansii vachii, amachuve nang ing kichu ymmuchii vokhehkho naningna mansiiva kachiichii ama khaenache anong itukho amanche saarkhii ipichukho naansuwhnii khaena chenva.
Nang namee ae vokhehkho reentaang mee ae tanii, ki ing nangchu karvakachii.

Enuw ing ynthim tanii ivaar ting vokhehkho umlae ruwreng tanii, Thangnang ningting hunganriae naka isii icherchu ikuhpeeh vokhehkho kichu ithacha ajaarna ynthiing aphavasah ae kaarna ynvaenii khaenache, ki ing nangchu emik avaarnii inche eningting kachiirvachii.”
Ama khaenache, “O, Iruwng Agrippa! Thangbaen tanii ymmansiichu ki ing kamanjiimah changchii mahva.

Changvakonchu amaensana Damaskas mee ae ningna, aanuwting Jerusalem mee ae ningna, Jehudi ae paam aangkhengna vokhehkho reentaang mee ae ningna enuw ing barungriir huung ae naka, Thangnang ting hunganri vachiipae vokhehkho barungriir ihuung nongchu matik icha ing tuvanenchiiva ichii khaenache katongsah.
Havi khaenenche Jehudi aeng rumniieen nache kichu isuwr aeka ithehnii khaena emanjongpa.
Changvakonchu Thangnang ning-tanii ruwreng phasa ingka isiing nakho, iruung nakho saarkhiichu pi ingka hava inii ipha inge ki ingiirsahping.

Khrista ing ijachaam badaarvachii vokhehkho Aafhuw inche ithii ae kaartanii amaensa hangring ynsuwhvachii khaenache Aafhuw amee ae nakho, reentaang mee ae nakho, manlaenpeeh irengchu yntong vachiiva taka jaephar aengkho, Mosi ingkho hungsuwh vachii enriir chongchu mahnaka ki ynchiikho riirmahdeh ing.”
Pol inche aangahsahnii chongchu ariirtah nache, Festus ing uungka ariir, “Pol nang baveeh sachii, nang ing inempak teensiika namanghuw ingkhe natak ymmanveehpa.”
Changvakonchu Pol ing ariir, “O Ynjasuwhpak Festus! Ki baveehmah ing, changvakonchu ichumchu ichongping.
Iruwng Agrippa! Naningna thona ompak ing ki chong chehning, akhaechuve hava vakhae i yndangmah arakiing yngkhehna isuwh mahva ichii nang ing namusa vokhehkho namanghuwsa ichii kathachasahnah.
O Iruwng Agrippa, nang jaephar aechu nathachasae? Nang ing nathachasae ichii ki ing kamanghuwsa.”
Agrippa ing Pol ningna ariir, “Nang ing kichu apha mongtehna khristen manguur kachii ynchiinahchii.”

Pol ing abasang, “Among pang-tina vakhang nakho, iseehpak vakhang nakho, naning napang mahva, ataniiniine kachong aasii vakhae aengkho, kakik kakhi ymphuwp havimah naka, ki vaange nengaan-suwhnii ing, ki ing Thangnang ting ithamsah kaadiksahnah.”
Amatah nache iruwng ingkho, lipah aapuh ingkho, Barnis ingkho amanche enuwthoh onghakpoh ae inchenkho hangiir chirsae.
Enuw chiir aeka yngkheh yngkheh chongsae, “Hava mee inge ithii ipha aru vokhehkho kaeshum ting isiihniirem ynraar nong chuve ynchiikho tumah.”
Agrippa ing Festus ningna ariir, “Hava mee inge Kesar ting vajeer itunii khaena riirmah nave, atak i bathencheh vaanchiiva.”

Kenuw ing Itali ipha ing ruwkuwng nache vaongva taruw kenchiitah nache, enuw ing Pol vokhehkho reentaang areh ae kaeshum sungna engkhum mee aechu laarchang chaama aapuh aruming Julius ningnache amansirpae.
Asia taang aphamsiir tingche huurnaka sivachii Adramittium ichii ruwkuwng nache ong ungka, kenuw chifhuw nache sisung. Amana Thesalonika na ong Mesidonia tanii mee Aristarkus ing kenuwchu eenruwfhuw.
Mathang inii nache kenuw Sidon nache ruwkuwngchu mangiir ungka, Julius ing Pol chu iruwpak ing tuka aarang ae ningnakho ynlen naka anungaenii inche abathenpa.
Ama mapham nache basenka chifhuw iruung nache kenvasitah nache, siiraang ing kenuwchu parden yntu khaena kenuw ing Saipras daeriim tingche jemanjii ungka kenghuurpa.
Vokhehkho Silisia re Paamphilia maana heom chifhuwchu veraen ungka, kenuw ing Lisia na om Mira nache vatungsung.
Amanache laarchang chaama aapuh inche Itali ipha ing sivachii Alekjendria ruwkuwng yngkhehchu vepha ungka, kenuwchu ama ruwkuwng nache ymmangongpa.

Apha inii iseehpak ing kenuw ing tapnaenae inche ruwkuwngchu huur ungka Knidus ichii maanache ijachaampak ing kenvatung tahnache, siiraang inche akhae ynsuwhka kemaating kensichehmah khaenache, Kep Salmon ichii amaana om Kret daeriim jemanri ungka kenghuurpa.
Ijachaampak ing chifhuw kuur ruvae jemanri ungka Lasia khuwruung kuurna om isapak ruwkuwng mangiirnii enchii nache tungsung.
Apha inempak theh ungka vokhehkho Ynthiingnii Inii apha chukho aaraen khaenache, vokheh-kho sivakenchii khaenakho ichiisuwh ing aomtah nache;
Pol ing mee ae ningna ariir, “Laaruw mee ae, ruwkuwngna simuwka ynreen peehchae vakhae vokhehkho ruwkuwng i maangvachii vokhehkho yntak ikho maangvaanchii ing kamusa.”
Changvakonchu laarchang chaama aapuuh inche Pol ing ariir chungna ruwkuwng aahuur aaruung re ruwkuwng aafhuw enchongchu athiseh ing arungaepa.

Vokhehkho ruwkuwng mangiirnii nache pharbuw thana ongnii ichachehmah khaenache, aruvakhae Phoniks phamanuwka amanache pharbuw tha sungna ongcheh manuwve ichii manden aeka mee aanem ing chifhuw nache sitaruw ta aeka enriirpa; Phoniks ichii apham chuve Iniisuwhtah, Taetah, amanche Ikang vokhehkho Irip aheh Kret ruwkuwng mangiirnii yngkhehva.
Irip tanii siiraang inche iduwrjaeh ing ahangraang tahnache, enuw ing emandenchu kenphapa ichii ing manden aeka, ruwkuwngchu huur aeka Kret phanii inche tapnanah ing enjehuurpa.
Changvakonchu apha topoh aanuwtingche Ikang Estar ichii ipirpak siiraang inche avesukpa.
Chutahnache ruwkuwngchu raenka siiraangchu maesa abadaar chehmah tahnache, ruwkuwngchu siiraang ahehtingche embathenpa.
Amana Kloda enchiichak isiing chifhuw akuur nache jungsi ungka, kenuw ijachaampak ing ruwkuwngchu kemangiirpa.

Ama mapham nache ruwkuwngchu kiaeka emphuwp therpa; amana kensitah nache, athar vokheh siihphuw yntongting jensukdoh nave ichii khaena ynchik aeka, enuw ing ruwkuwng laangpeenschu rijoh aeka changche emansipa.
Amana khuksuwr siiraang inche kenuwchu inempak ymmanjatah nache, mathang inii nache enuw ing ruwkuwng sungtanii peehchae arehrehchu iren embasenpa,
animanthumnii inii nache ruwkuwng tanii peehchae chaapchu enrenchirpa.

Amanache inii iseehpak ing kenuw kentaklina inii ingkho, aesii ingkho arengmah tahnache, vokhehkho ipirpak khuksuwr siiraang ing kentaklina ymbaruw tahnache, atii kenuw ringva kenta ichii yngaemah ung.

Amana venchaam kentongnii ahunhgseeh thohche, apha ichii nache Pol ing enuw enrik chimbangna ngiirka ariir, “Laaruw mee ae, nenuw ing kachongriir manjiitanuwka Kret tanii henghuurmah manuwve isii ikha vokhehkho ijachaampak imaang ae i phamah vaanchiiva.
Atii ki ing nenuw vakhae nenbarungriir ajaniimah ing kariirnah; amachuve ruwkuwng mahnaka nenuw nengkaarna yngkheh pangkho laetha imaang omahnii.
Ki Aafhuw ameechu ynsuwh ingka karum Thangnang avaarmee yngkheh ing kabuumna jaen nache ngiirka ariir,
‘Pol nang ynchik mahra, nang ing Kesar maana ngiirva nachiiting buksa; amanche enla, nangthoh ynruw ing ruwkuwng naongfhuw ae vakhaechu Thangnang ing naningna ympeehpa.’
Chukhaenache laaruw mee ae nenbarungriir manjamahruw, kaningna ariir vaange suwhvaata ta ingka Thangnang ningna kathachasa.
Changvakonchu inuw chiirikpaam yngkhehting ympeen vaanchiiting bukna.”
Jaen suum ariimanrii ahenpha tahnache Adria chifhuw nache asup aphuw ing ymmansi raenche, jaenchim hemphaka ruwkuwng aahuur aenche taang kenjeneengpa ichii ing emanden.
Chukhaenache enuw ing chii aasen thuwhne ta aeka emanticha lam somnii thuwhsa; amanche topoh sireeh aeka emantireeh tahnache lam suum ariirunga ithuwh emphapa.
Chukhaenache kenuw ing rungfhuw taklina laanglam jesukva tarammo ta ungka kengaanchik tahnache enuw ing ruwkuwng khaamnii asae manriimehchu bathen aeka, khuw hungvaar vachii khaena enthamsahpa.
Ruwkuwng aahuur aenche ruwkuwng khaamniichu bajohchir aeka, taangting khuwngva enchii ing thoraang entuchu Pol ing amutah nache,
ing laarchang mee chaama aapuh vokhehkho laarchang ae ningnache ariir, “Enuw inge ruwkuwngne ongjaehmah ae nave, nenuw iring phamah tanuw.”
Apha ichiinache laarchang mee aenche ruwkuwng isiing arunohchu ten aeka embathenpa.

Khuwchu ahungvaarpha nache Pol ing enuw vakhaechu isahfhuw thaemin topoh isahnii khaena thamsa aeka ariir, “Atanii inge inii nisuum ariimanrii chak sungna thaemin man-tenruchuw ing venchaam nentongpa.
Chukhaenache thaemin topoh isahnii khaena kathamsahnahchuw; yngkhaena ynchii imbe havi nenuw nenlaetha karnii khaenava, akhaechuve achuw yngkheh rusae tanii sambur yngkheh pangkho maangmahnii.”
Pol ing hava chong i ariir nuwna tarchu verika enuw vakhae maana Thangnang hemanpahka vokhehkho bakhiika isah abasenpa.
Amatah nache mee vakhae aenche enrotha rohka enuwkho ensahpa.
Ruwkuwng sungna ong vakhae ungchu mee chanii somsarii ariikruk kempha.
Enuw enven abava tahnache, chifhuw tingche gehuchu ren aeka ruwkuwngchu atii hungjaangsa.

Khuwchu ahungvaar tahnache, enuw ing paamchu manghuwcheh mahsae; changvakonchu chii ing avemah siihphuw ympeehpak mapham yngkheh enuw ing enjemupa. Amatah nache enuw ing ruwkuwngchu vemanlaen chehva taruwmo ta aeka emanseerpa.

Chukhaenache enuw ing ruwkuung khaamniichu ten aeka chifhuw nache embathenpa; apha ichiinache ruwkuwng amanchumnii emphuwp chukho bajoh aeka amanche maensokna laangpeenchu siiraang ahehting ithoh aeka siihphuw ajenghehnii ing entu.

Changvakonchu chifhuw ynniimeh aantuwhnii tingche ajenghehtah nache, ruwkuwngchu siihphuw tingche ruwhsa; amana ruwkuwngchu yntaangka ynlaap arumah ing omsa. Changvakonchu ruwkuwngchu chii ynnoh inche ivebakhii abasenpa.
Amatah nache kaeshum sungna ong mee achuw yngkheh ing chii japnaka itaenkho arusa ta aeka, enuw ae i thehtah taeruw ta aeka laarchang aenche chong emanseerpa.

Changvakonchu laarchang chaama aapuh inche Pol chu karningka ichii amanden khaenache enuw ing chong emanseerchu akhaampae; amana chiijap aacheh mee aenche ruwkuwng tanii khuwng ae sana taangting suwhsa ae rasiing;
vokhehkho areh aenche thingchuwngna changmahka topoh aenche ruwkuwng peeh achiihchahna iraen ae rasiing taka chonghak ajeerpa. Amana jinge ichii ing engangkheng taangtingche isuwh empha chirpa.
Kenuw vakhae ing iring kem-pha inuwtingche chiirikpaam omchu Malta va ichii kemanghuwpa.
Ama paam mee aenche keningna inempak eningsiih emandang, akhaechuve khuksuwr siiraang vokhehkho isik om khaena enuw ing mi imansehpeeh aeka kenuw vakhaechu ymbariimsahpae.
Pol ing itikfhuw thing mangkongka mi sungting ajebathu tahnache, mi ynsa inche baruwr yngkheh ama sungtanii hungsuwhka akikna aakherteehpa.

Chutahnache amana ong mee aenche chuwr ompak baruwr inche akikna aakherteehchu emutahna, enuw yngkheh yngkheh ing enriir, “Mee havi mikthehva ynchii tahna ichingniifhuw omah. Ama ing chifhuw tanii iring phasakhang nakho, ichum vajeer inche atak i manringmahsa.”
Chang-vakhang nakho ama ing baruwrchu mi sungting ithikka yntangakho tamahsa.

Enuw ing turva tarammo ta aeka vokhehkho manghuw mangharu ing tiihnaka thikva tarammo ichii ing manden aeka enghah; changvakonchu enuw ing enjaeh aeka vokhehkho ataklina yntangakho ichiimahchu emutah nache embarungriir yntehka atakchu laeva enchii.
Atii ama min apaang nache Publius ichii chiirikpaam aafhuw apaam yngkheh om; ama mee inche ihebariim saka inii nithum ynner paamsah omrudeh ing ymbathungsahpa.
Ama-nache Publius ampa chu arii itheng ing nakka vokhehkho siithoh tursuwh isi ina ing aphapa. Amana Pol ing vaveerka vokhehkho thampeehka ataklina akik siika amandampa.
Hava nong i atutah nache chiirikpaam nache ong ina chaap aengkho vatheng aeka Pol ing enuwchu amandampae.
Enuw ingkho kenuwchu inempak ymbariimsah aethoh ynruw ing iruwpak ing yntusah ae. Amana kenuw ing ruwkuwng ting kenvaong tahnache, kenuw ing kaaniiva kenchii peehchae chaap ynthin peehpae.
Tha ynthum aanuwtingche unae ymphuwr yntaka buwtinnii om pharbuwna chiirikpaamna om ruwkuwng nache sisung.
Kenuw ing Sairakus nache ruwkuwngchu sii ungka amanache inii nithum cheengsung.
Aanuwnache kenuw ing ruwkuwr ungka Rejium nache vatungsung; amanache inii nikheh ong ungka, ikang tanii sii ahangraang tahnache inii ninii ahenpharae Putioli tungsung.
Amanache kenguw kenae ae tuwh ungka, kenuwchu enuw ing inii nisarii ongpohtaruw ta aeka ynthamsahpae. Jinge ichii ing kenuw vakhae Rom lipah tungsung.

Amana heong unae aenche kenuw thengnae ichii chongchu ensiitah nache, Appius kithiirna vokhehkho Meetungniieen ynthum enchii apham ipha ing kenuwchu ynjuhahpae. Enuwchu Pol ing amutah ae nache Thangnang chu manpahka inempak aruwreng pirsa.
Kenuw ing Rom nache kenghung-ruwh tahnache Pol chu laarchang mee ae thohche anumpang ing ongchu enrupa.

Inii nithum aanuwnache Pol ing Jehudi mee aaruung upa aechu eenka amangkongpae; enuw ing engaang-kongpoh raenche ama ing eningna ariir, “Kauw kanae ae, ki ing kamee ae changmahka afhuw fhuwven ae siniichu jeehniimah khang ningkho, Jerusalem kaeshum nache ong ingka Rom mee ae kiktinge ymmansirpae.
Rom mee aenche kichu chong ynsiitah ae nache, ithehnii khaena kamiraar omahdeh khaenache enuw ing kichu bathen nungka enchii.
Changvakonchu Jehudi mee aen-che enrumah tahnache, kamee ae ningting miraar pinii omahkhang nakho, ki ing Kesar ningting vajeer tunii khaena iriirpham isuwhdohva.

Chukhaenache havi khaene ki ing nenuwchu yntuwhnii inche vokheh-kho ichonghaknii khaena ka-eensah vachuw, akhaechuve Isrel mee aeng ningmanden emangom Aafhuw akhaenache kakik kakhine siir ing ymphuwppae.”
Enuw ing aningna enriir, “Kenuw ing nakhaena Jehudi ae ningtanii chongthen phamah ung vokhehkho havane itheng mee aengkho nakhaena isamah chong manthangmah ae vokhehkho ichongkho chongmah ae.

Changvakonchu kenuw ing naman-denchu ynchiiva ichiichu naningtanii siinungka kenchiinah. Kenuw ing kemanghuwsa amachuve apham aangkhengna havana khristen ruwr ae khaene mee vakhae ing enrumah ing chongnae.”

Chukhaenache enuw ing inii manae aeka, Pol ing aongnii nache mee inempak ama inii nache thengsae. Amana eningna Pol ing Mosi vajeer chonghak na ing jaephar ae thiimbuwr na basenka Thangnang iruwngpaam khaena enuw ing enthachanii inche ziing na ing khuri ipha ing aman-chuwpae.
Mee areh aeng chembe ama ing ariirchu thacha aeka, areh aeng chembe thachamah ae.

Chutahnache enuw ensungsahna ynrumah aeka ynsaesae. Enuw ing engaansaemah rirae Pol ing eningna chong yngkheh ariir, “Ynthiing laetha ing nenpa nenfhuw ae ningna jaephar Isaia ningna isajaeh ing manchongka ariir:
‘Nang ing havana jaati ae ningne sinana riirla,
nenuw ing isiichuve siivanenta, amachu manghuwchehmah tanuw,
imuchuve muvanenta, nenbarungriir chuve supsuwh suwhmahnii.
Akhaechuve emik ing emu, engana ing ensii,
embarungriir ing amanghuw, athar hunganlehva enchii,
vokhehkho ki ing enuwchu yndam arumahnii ing,
havana mee ae i embarungriir kamanurpa;
Engana ing siinungka tamahsae vokhehkho emik engasiingpa.’”
Chukhaenache havana Thangnang ningtanii iringnii manlaenpeeh havi reentaang mee aeting ajenbathenva ichiichu nenuw ing manghuwva nenchiiting buksa. Enuw inche rungae vaatae.
Ama ing hava chong i ariirtah nache, Jehudi aeng enareer sungna ynnahnii aeka ynsaesae.
Pol ing vaehka aongnii een nache kumnii ongka, aningna itheng vakhae aechu abariimsah ae.
Pol chu achuw ingkho parden turudeh ing, ama ing thona isa ing Thangnang iruwngpaam khaena tongka vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu Khrista khaena manchuw aeka ong.
Jesu Khrista ameenae vokhehkho chongthang ing eeteerka Aafhuw isa chongchu itongnii khaena Thang-nang ing yngeen Pol kaning taniiva.
Isa chongchu ajae isivasahna Thangnang ing jaephar ae enjaarna chongreep tuka ynthiing thiimziihna ynziih chuva,
amachuve laaruw mee hakchaang yngkheh inuwzii ing Devit tuti tanii junginlaar asapa Aafhuw Jesu Khrista khaena chenva.
Vokhehkho ynthiing tanii laetha re ruwreng ipirthoh ynruwhakna ichii-chu ama ing thikka ihangring inge amandangpa, amachuve Aafhuw Jesu Khrista chuva.
Laaruw mee vakhaechu thacha mee vokhehkho chongriir ynjii engaansuwhnii khaena aapuh yngkheh ing, Aafhuw tungsiih ajaar inche Thangnang ing kichu chongthang pham ynthinsahpa.
Thangnang ing Jesu Khrista mee ynsuwhnii khaena yngeen nache Rom na ong nenuw chukho ynvaevachuw.
Chukhaenache Rom na ong Thang-nang ningsiih apha ae, vokhehkho amee ynsuwhnii khaena yngeen nenuw vakhae ningna kabaziihnah:
Inuw Apa Thangnang vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu Khrista inche tungsiih re idaechu ympeeh ynsuwhrasii.
Abasenniina, nenuw vakhae nenthachachu laaruw paam aangkheng mee ing aanseer khaenache, Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajaarna ka Thangnang amachu kamanpahsahnah.
Kabarung-riir aangkheng iruwhdeh ing asapa Jesu isa chongchu tong ingka anong katu Thangnang inche kariir i ichumva ichiichu saarkhiina.
Apha vakhaena kathamsah nache, nenuw kaansiisachuw ichiichu Thangnang ing amanghuwsa. Thangnang ing amandenna nong katu ynsuwh nave, apha vokhehna nenuwchu ivaveernii khaena kathamsahnah.
Akhaechuve nenlaetha acheepnii khaena, ki ing nenuwchu laetha kikthuur ipeehnii khaenache nenuw thoh ki yntuwh manuwka kachiisahva.
Amachuve inuw yngkheh re yngkheh ynthacha inche, nenuwkho kikho ymbomsah ymphanii khaenava.

Kauw kanae ae, ki ing reentaang mee ae kaarna laetha kakhuumcheh vaange, neningnakho ikhuum kachehnii inche neningna ithengnii khaena kaniihsah birva. Changvakonchu eekhaam yngkheh omka ithengcheh mahping ichiichu imanghuwpeeh tanuwka kachiinah.
Ki ing Grik ae ningnakho, reentaang jaat ae nakho, ising ae vokhehkho ipang ae ningnakho enlerchu katuurva.
Amatah nache ki ing isa chongchu Rom na ong neningnakho tongpak ningka kachiisahva.

Akhaechuve isa chong inge ynsaangkhe Thangnang ing mee aechu ichum ynthiing amanphapae ichiichu amandangniisa. Amachuve abasempeh raennii ing achinii ipha ing thacha ajaarna chenva. Ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirsa, “Thacha mee inche ichum ynthiing jaarna iringchu phavaata.”
Laaruw mee aeng entu enri isamah tangmah isii icher inche ichumchu enthing khaenache, Thang-nang barungsiichu thangbaen tanii amandangpa.
Havi Thangnang akhaena ynghuw enchehchu enuw embarungriir sungna amandangpeeh ae khaenava, yngkhaena ynchii imbe Thangnang ing eningna amandangpa.

Laaruw paam abasempehna basenka Thangnang tanii imu ynchehmah, Thangnang ningtanii ichen naemah ruwreng vokhehkho Aafhuw Thang-nang ynsuwhchu, ynseem vasah atu ari vakhae inge isajaeh ing ymmuva; amatah nache enuwchu ikuhpeehpham suwhmahsa.

Akhaechuve enuw ing Thangnang chu manghuwkhang ae nare, Thangnang va ichii ing manpah mahsae, amanche Aafhuw ing yntupeeh ynripeeh chukho manghuw mahsae, changvakonchu enuw ing emandenchu ikaniimah ynsuwhsa, vokhehkho enuw empangnii barungriirchu manthimsa.
Enuw entaksah ing isingpung ta aeka pangsae.
Ithii omah Thangnang rumva enchii changdenna, enuw ing maangvachii mee ruthaksii, vaati vaata, shava ae vokhehkho baruwr khaerae enrumpa.
Chukhaenache enuw ing emanden yntirsuwh nong vokhehkho ningjaknii ichuwhmah tangmah nong itu mee engaansuwhnii khaenache Thangnang ing enuwchu abathenpae.

Enuw ing Thangnang lam ichumchu ichummah ting manguur aeka, Eeseem Aafhuw rumva enchii changdenna aruwh thangsii peeh ynseemchu enrumpa vokhehkho rukuumkho entupa; Eeseem Aafhuw chuve ichen naemah ing manpah vaanchiiva! Amen.
Havi khaene Thangnang ing enuwchu ningjaknii yntirsuwh engadik tingche abathenpae. Amana rupanuw rap ae ingkho laaruw mee nunu thoh yntinmah ing entupa.

Amanache havi vaange pasar ae ingkho anunu ing rupanuw thoh ruw ingkichu bathen aeka, enuw ing engadik nache yngkheh ing yngkheh taklina mi vaang ichuwng inche pasar nireer ingkho yntirsuwh ichohnii nong entupa, amanche enuw ing ynraar nong entu aanla phava enchiichu enuw entaksah ing aphasahpae.
Enuw ing Thangnang chu manghuw aeka enrumah vaangche, ichuwhmah nongchu itunii khaenache, Thangnang ing enuwchu arumah barungriir tingche abathenpae.
Ichum ynthiingmah, isamah, ym-phaam, vokhehkho ynjiim, hava vakhae inge bariimsae; enuw kallak ing, miktheh, ynnahnii, mee amanchae, vokhehkho mee abatir inche sipsae.
Enuw ing mee iriirsahna vokheh-kho yngkheh re yngkheh isamah ing ichong ae; Thangnang abatir ae, ningjak amanghuwmah ae, ynding, iruungchichuh, isamah nong abasuw, ampa amnuw chongriir amanjiimah,
abarungriir ynthinmah, chongreep abakhii, ningsiih omah, mee akuur-siimah, ningchuwh omah,
hava mee ae inge hangchii nong ae i nunu ing entu aenche ithiipham suwhna ichii Thangnang vajeerchu manghuw ae sana, amachurap itujaeh mahka amachu entu diindiin ae thohkho chongkheh enchihakpa.
Chukhaenache changchii ynraar nong atuae taklinache Thangnang ing ichum vajeerchu tuvaata ichiichu ymmanghuwsa.
Changchii nong itu nang ing reentaang aeng entu taklina vajeer itu laaruw mee nang, Thangnang vajeer nache nang ringva kata ichii ing namandenva?

Changpangmahka, Thangnang tanii isa ichum inche nangchu barungriir huungniiting ynruwva ichii nang ing manghuwmah chiika, Thangnang tanii isapak atu ari ing ynghahjaeh vokhehkho yngkhaangpeeh jaehchu nang ing namanghuw mahva?
Nabarungriir ipir ing huungning nachiimah khaena Thangnang barung isii vokhehkho ichum vajeerchu aandang inii nache barung sikniichu nataksah ing narangsahva.
Mee vakhae ningna ama ing atu inuwzii inche, Thangnang ing baripeeh vaata.
Chukhaenache isachu atujaeh, aruwrengchu iphanii khaena ajong, aajasah, amanche imaang naemah ajong ae inche ichen naemah iringchu phavaatae.
Changvakonchu ataksah khaenapang ataar, ichumchu manjiimahka ichummahchu ajii mee ae ningnache Thangnang barungchu sikvaata.
Isamah atu mee vakhae laetha nache ijachaam ipirpak inangniichu amaensana Jehudi ae amanche Reentaang mee ae inche phavaatae.
Changvakonchu amaensana Jehudi ae amanche aanuwnache Reentaang mee ae vakhang nakho, isa nong atu mee chaap ningnache ympahsah, ynjasuwh vokhehkho idaechu Thangnang ing pivaata.
Thangnang chuve adongchang tumah.
Vajeer chonghak ynvaeru ing isii atu mee vakhaechu vajeer chonghak ynvaeru ing maangvaata. Vajeer chonghak derna isii atu mee vakhaechu vajeer chonghak ing vajeer tuvaata.
Achuw yngkheh ing vajeerchu asiijaeh ingkhe, Thangnang ningna ichum mahva, changvakonchu vajeer chonghak amanjii meechu amanchumva.

Reentaang mee ae ningna vajeer chonghak omahkhang nakho, enuw ing entu nong vakhaechu vajeer chonghak ing aruchuva. Enuw ing vajeer chonghakchu omahkhang nakho, entaksah vajeer chonghakchu adeensahpae.
Enuw ing embarung-riirna enthin vasah vajeer chonghakchu anong ing emandangnah. Enuw enrathuwh ichum ynraar ynghuwnii inche saarkhii atunah.
Ki ing katong isa chong inuwzii ing vajeer inii nache Thangnang ing Jesu Khrista jaarna ynruwh ing atu nongchaap vakhae vajeer tuvaata.
Atarae nang nataksah ing Jehudi ping tataniika, vajeer chonghak nache yndiisa taniika, Thangnang chu ruungchichuhnii taniive,
vokheh-kho Aafhuw ing amandenchu manghuw taniika, vajeer chonghak na namanghuw ingkhe aasaseh nongva ichii ing manden taniive,
amanche nang ing namanghuw re ichumchu vajeer chonghak sungna tuwhtaniika, natak ing mikchu ae aaching, ynthimna ong ae aanreng chuping,
vokhehkho ipang aechu aanchumping amanche naepang aechu aanchuw ping ichii ing manden taniive,
chunuwcha mee reentaang aanchuw mee nang, nataksahcha ynchuw nachii? Baruk mahra nachii nangcha, baruk nachii?
Reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah tumah achii nangcha, ichuwhmahchu natuse? Lae ruthaksii nabatir nang, lae een tanii nabaruwhse?
Vajeer chonghak na iruungniichii nang vajeer chonghakchu namamak inche, Thangnang chu ynjasauwhmah ing natuva?
Ynziih vasah vaangkhe, nenuw nengkhaena reentaang mee ae kaarna Thangnang rumingchu ithipak ing nemanriirnah.
Nang vajeer chonghak ynjii mee vataniive, vinchiip natu ing natuungsehva. Nang vajeer chonghak najiimah mee vataniive, vinchiip natumahthoh yngkhehpang vachii.
Chukhaenache vinchiip atumah mee ing vajeer chonghakchu manjiinave, ama ing vinchiip atumahkha vinchiip atuvasahva ichii ing mandenmah manuwkhang?

Anunu ing vinchiip atumah mee ing vajeer chonghak vakhaechu manjiinave, ynthiing thiimziihna ynziih vaangkhe vajeer chonghak vokhehkho vinchiip atuvasah vakhang taniikho, vajeer chonghak aangkhii nangchu vajeer chonghak ajii mee inche vajeer itumah nakhang?
Akhaechuve achung paamphuwna Jehudi ynsuwh meechu Jehudi mahva. Achung paamphuwna hakchaang vinchiip atu chuve vinchiip chumahva.

Changvakonchu barungriirna Jehudi ynsuwh inche Jehudi meeva, amanche ynziih ingmahva laetha ing abarungriirna vinchiip atuchu vinchiip chuva. Atak ympahasah aphachu mee ae tanii mahva, Thangnang taniiva.
Chunuwcha Jehudi aecha ynchii engkanii omne? Vinchiip entu-tahna ynchii entuungsah omne?
Havi akhaechuve nempakna, amaensa nache Thangnang isa chongchu Jehudi ae ningna amansirpa.
Reentaang aeng thachamah ae nacha ynchii tavaate? Enuw ing Thangnang thachava enchiichu enthacha aommah tahnache, Thangnang chu yntangamah basuwva chiipae khang? Changchen mahdeh rasii.
Mee vakhae ing ichummah chongkhang ae nakho Thangnang chuve ichumva. Ynziihka omna:
“Ichumchu nachong ing mandangva nachiiva,
amanche nang navajeer nache maepah phava nachiiva.”
Changvakonchu ichum ing nong atu Thangnang chu inuw ing ichummah ing mandang manuwka, ama ing Ponti ympiraenche ichummahva tavaanchiiva?
Amachumah rasii, changchen vaniive Thangnang ing laaruw paam mee aechu ynsaangkhe vajeer tuvaate?
Ichummah ki ing Thangnang ichumchu mandang ningka aruwreng alaar isachu manruung ningve, kichu ynchii khaena ataraenpha ing isii icherva ichii ing vajeer yntupae?
Mee maangnii vachii ichamah chong enriirpa ta aeka kichu ynrensahpae. Chutahnache isa suwhnii khaena isamah tuvaanchiiva tamah manuw-khang? Changchii ichong mee aechu miraar ipeeh chumna.
Chunuwcha enuw chungna inuw ing isaseh vamuw? Changmahva, Jehudi aekho, Grik aekho aangkheng isii derna ongpae ichiichu mamaenna kamanthang vasahva.
Ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirsa:
“Ichum ynthiing achuwkho omah,
yngkhehpangkho omah,
Thangnang aajong achuwkho omah.
Engkheng Thangnang tanii aasiirting yngheersae;
Engkheng ynraarting sichirsae;
isa atu achuwkho omah, yngkhehpangkho omah.
Enuw engaruurchu ymmong vasah thaen vaang tasa,
embari ing mee amanchaepae;
baruwr hae chuwrchu enerna omna.
