Enbaechu siraap re ikha ing bariimna.
Engkhi ing sii yntanii khaena jaangpakna.
Imaangnii re ijachaam emaana omna.
Idae lamchu enuw ing manghuwmahsae,
vokhehkho emik barengna Thangnang chu chiimahsae.”

Inuw ing ymmanghuwsa amachuve, vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing ong vakhaena vajeer chonghak ing ariir chuve, laaruw paam mee vakhae ing Thangnang vajeer derna omvaatae. Chukhaenache ner vakhae ing chong-mah ae rasii.
Vajeer chonghak nong ing Thangnang mik enna achuw yngkhehpangkho manchumpeeh mahnii; akhaechuve vajeer chonghak ajaar ing isii ikha amanghuwniinah.
Atiive vajeer chonghak chah ing, Thangnang tanii ichum ynthiingchu amandangpa. Amachuve Mosi vajeer chonghak re jaephar ae ing saarkhii entupa.
Thangnang aanden vakhaena Thangnang tanii ichum ynthiingchu Jesu Khrista thacha ajaarna chenva, reentaang asik ichii yntanga omah.
Mee vakhae isii cherchirsa vokhehkho Thangnang alaar isachu jungsuursa.
Changvakonchu Jesu Khrista ing isii icher tanii yngkarsah ajaarnache atungsiih ing inuwchu ngareh ing ymmanchumpa.

Thangnang ing apensahnii khaenache Aafhuw chu ipisaka ithii apha aningne ithacha ajaar nache laaruw mee isii vakhaechu ikuhpeehnii khaenava. Thangnang ing atu havi atakchu ichum ynthiingva ichiichu amandangniiva. Isivasah nachembe laaruw mee isii chaap taklinache khaangtherka teenpeehmah,
changvakonchu atarae apha ichiinen chembe ichum ynthiingchu mandangnii inche, Jesu athacha mee vakhae taklina adongchang omrudeh inche vokhehkho aanchumpeeh aechu ynsuwhniiva.
Amachu vanave inuw ynruungnii unakhe omkhang? Omahdeh! Havi khaena akhaechu ynchiiva? Inuw ing vajeer chonghakchu ymmanjiitah nava? Changmahva, Aafhuw chu ynthacha tahna chenva.
Chukhaenache kenuw ing kemanchinah amachuve thacha ajaarna meechu amanchumpehva, vajeer chonghak ingmahva.
Thang-nang chu Jehudi ae pang Thangnang vakhang? Reentaang mee ae khae-nacha Thangnang mahvakhang?
Thangnang yngkhehpang vatah, chukhaenache vinchiip atukho amanche atumahkho athacha inuwzii ing Thangnang ing manchumpeeh vaata.
Thacha inche vajeer chong-hakchu arimah changchii mahva, changvakonchu amanpirniiva.
Hakchaang inuwzii ing apa ynsuwh Abraham khaena ynchii riirtaruw?
Nong ing Abraham chu manchum nave ama aruungsahnii omna, changvakonchu Thangnang maana mahva.
Havi khaene ynthiing thiimziih ing ynchii ariirsa? Abraham ing Thangnang chu athachapa, chutahnache ichum ynthiingva taka ateenpeehpa.
Nong atu mee ningna-che aruthamenchu kikthuurva ichii ing ympimah, changvakonchu ama ing iphapham asuwhtah nava.
Nongcha atumah achuw yngkheh inche ynraarchu amanchum aningnache thacha nave, ama athacha inche chumsa ichii ing ateenpa.
Nong ynvaeru ing Thangnang ing chumsa taka ateenpeeh meechu bor aphava, havi Devit atakrap ingkho ariirsa:
“Enraarchu akuhpeeh ae amanche isiicher abaruwpeeh aechu bor aphapae;
Aafhuw ing isiicher teenpeehmah vachii meechu bor aphava.”
Hava bor ichu vinchiip mee ae khaena pangva? Changmahka vinchiipmah mee ae khaena khomva? Inuw ing ynchiinah, Abraham chu athacha inche ichum ynthiingva taka ateenpeehpa.
Ynsaang khenche aningna ateenpeehva? Ama ing vinchiip atumahri raenva chang-mahka atu aanuwtingva? Vinchiip atu aanuwting mahva, vinchiip atumahri raenva.

Ama ing vinchiip atumah rirae aningna om athacha inche ichum ynthiingva ichii ahak namka vinchiipsa ichii buwtinniichu aphapa. Havi enuw ing vinchiip tumahkhang ae nare, thacha mee vakhae aechu ichum ynthiingpae ichii ing iteenpeehnii ampa ynsuwhnii khaenava.
Amanche vinchiip atu aepang mahka, inuw apa Abraham ing vinchiipmah ing aomlae, ama athacha nache aanuw enjii vakhae ae ningnakho vinchiip ampa ynsuwhnii khaenava.
Thangnang chongreep-chu vajeer chonghak amanjii vakhae aenche ruwkuum vaatae tanave, thachachu ikaniimah ynsuwhsa vokhehkho Thangnang chongreepchu yntangamahsa.
Thangnang barung-siichu vajeer chonghak ing ahenreenva, vajeer chonghak omah nave vajeer chonghak amanjii omahnii.

Ama khaenache ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirsa, “Ki ing nangchu jaati vakhae ampa kabasuw pachii.” Chu-khaenache omahchu achonghak ing mangomka vokhehkho ithii amanring Thangnang Abraham ing athacha mik en nache chongreepchu inempak saksa.
Abraham ing thachaka ningmanden fhuwmahna ningmanden mangomka ama ing jaati aanem ampa ynsuwhsa. Havi ynziih ing ariirsa, “Nang natuti aechu aesii tangbang aevaang nemvaatae.”
Ama ing athacha takrudeh ing, kum chaama vakhae ahenpha ithii vasahvaang ichii ahakchaang om vokhehkho Sara ing venchivachii omahchu akhar.
Changvakonchu Thangnang chongreep om khaenache ithachamah turu ing Thangnang chu manpahka,
Thangnang ing chongreep atupeeh vasahchu yntupeehkho achehsa ichii ing abarungriirna mangiirka, athacha hungpir sehsehsa.
Ama khaenache athachachu ichum ynthiingva ichii ing ateenpeehpa.
Abraham chu ichum ynthiingva taka arupeeh chongsaena ynziihchu ama akhaena-pang mahva.
Jesu Khrista ithii tanii amanring ningnache athacha chukho ichum ynthiingva tanaka irupeeh vachii inuw yngkhaenakho ynziihva.
Inuw ing ichumchu ymphanii inche, yntaklina om isiicher khaenache Jesu ing ithii phaka vokhehkho yngkhaena hangringsa.
Atii thacha jaarnache inuwchu ymmanchum vakhaka, Jesu Khrista jaarnache Thangnang thoh idae ing ongsamuw.
Thangnang tungsiih tingche inuwchu thacha inche ynghenruw vakhaka, Thangnang alaar isachu phavataruw ichii khaena ningmanden omchu eenpahniisa.
Inuw ing ijachaam ympha nachenkho rotha manrohtaruw. Ijachaam inche ikhaangchehnii ahenreensa,
ikhaang-cheh inche isa suwhnii ahenreensa, amanche isa suwhnii inche ning-manden ahenbasuwsa.
Havana ningmanden inge ningmandenchu bakhii mahnii. Ynthiing laetha kikthuur jaarnache Thangnang ing aningsiihchu ymbarungriir nache ajechirpa.
Inuw ing eentuursah raenche, Khrista ing Thangnang amandenmah ae khaena apha ichachak nache jungthiksa.
Ichum ynthiing mee yngkheh khaena achuw yngkheh ing ithii omthaang thaangmah. Changvakonchu isa mee khaena achuw yngkheh ing ithiknii khaena thona isakho om arusa.
Inuw ing isii icher mee eensuwh raensiimche, Khrista ing inuw yngkhaena ithii inche Thangnang ing aning ymmansiihchu amandangpa.
Chukhaenache Khrista ing ngareh ing ynthikpeeh inge inuwchu ymman-chum vakhaka, Thangnang barungsii tanii ama ing ikarvaata.
Inuw ing Thangnang ijeehniichu eensuwh raenche, asapa ithii ajaarnache Thangnang thoh aanrunii atupa, havi athiseh ing aanrunii om khaena asapa ringkum ing inuwchu ikarvaata.
Amachupang mahka Jesu Khrista jaarna Thangnang ningnache rotharoh omna, akhaechuve asapa ajaarnache atii aanruniichu ymphapa.
Mee yngkheh ningna isii iruwh inche laaruw paam aangkheng isii chersa. Ama ing arang isii inche ithiichu aphapa vokhehkho mee vakhaena ithiichu ynjarka isii cherchirsa.
Vajeer chonghakchu ympimahri raenche laaruw paamna isiichu om, changvakonchu vajeer chonghak aommahri raenche isiichu teenpeehmah.

Changvakonchu Adam na ing Mosi ipha ing ithii inche iruwng vaang mee vakhae taklinache ihungpaar. Adam ing chonghak abakhiithoh aanghak ing isii atumah ae taklina khomba; Adam ichuve Khrista jungtheng vachii buwtiniiva.

Ynniimeh havi yntinmahnii, Thangnang tanii ngareh kikthuur re Adam isiichu yntinmah. Ama mee yngkheh inche isii arangtah nache mee vakhae ithiichu phanave, Thangnang tungsiih vokhehkho mee yngkheh ajaarna, ichiichuve, Jesu Khrista tungsiih ajaarna ympeeh kikthuurchu mee aanemna athar vokheh athiseh ing ynriimjor ing sipsa.

Thangnang tanii kikthuur re mee yngkheh taklina isiichu yntinmahnii, isii yngkhehpang araar chukho vajeer inche amanraarva, changvakonchu isii icher aajaehtanii ngareh kikthuur inche chumsa ichii ing ynteenpa.

Changvakonchu mee yngkheh ajaarna ithii inche iruwng vaang ing paarnave, tungsiih re ichum ynthiing kikthuur ing isip apha mee aenche Jesu Khrista jaarna iringnii tingche athar athiseh ing iruwng vaang paarvaatae.
Isii icher mee yngkhehpang khaenache mee vakhae isii icher ting ibuw vaangkhe, ichum ynthiing mee yngkheh ajaarnache mee vakhaena aanghaksiir ing iringniichu ympeehpa.
Chong areeh mee yngkheh khaenache mee vakhae isii icher ynsuwhvaang, chongriir amanjii yngkheh ajaarnache mee vakhaechu ichum ynthiing mee basuw vaata.
Ichummah nong ahenthi sehsehnii khaena vajeer chonghakchu omsa, changvakonchu isii ahenthi sehseh ithi ing Thangnang tungsiih chukho ahenthi sehsehva.
Isii inche ithii nache iruwng vaang ipaarvaang, tungsiih chukho ichum ynthiing ajaar inche iruwng vaang ichen naemah ringkum ing Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajaarna apaarnii khaenava.
Chunuwcha inuw ing ynchiikha riirtaruw? Tungsiih om ahenthinii khaena isii nache ongjaeh taruw chang?
Changmahva! Ynsaangkhe isii ing ithiimuw inche amanache ongjaeh vaanchiiva?
Jesu Khrista ningna baptais yntu inuw vakhae ama ithii nache baptais yntupa ichii nenuw ing nemanghuw mahva?
Baptais yntu inge inuw Khrista thoche yndimhak vamuw, vokhehkho ithiihak vamuw, amatah nache ampa alaar isa inche ithii tanii amanring vaange, inuwkho itharpeh ringkum ing ipaarnii khaenava.
Khrista ithii nache inuw va-khaekho amathoh yngkhehpang manuwve, ama ihangring vaangche inuwkho hangringrem vataruw.
Isii hakchaangchu maangnaka, inuw ing isii nache apha iseehpak ing suwh eensuwh niimah khaenache, baruw meechu Aafhuw thoh ynruw ing khros nache thik haksae ichiichu inuw ing ymmanghuwsa.
Ithii meechu isii ruwreng tanii abajohpa.
Inuw Khrista thohche ithiihak manuwve, ymbarungriir ngamna amachuve inuwkho amathoh ynruw ing ringhakva taruw.
Ithii tanii ihangring Khrista ing athar thikreehmahnii, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ithii inche ataklina chehmahnii ichii ymmanghuwsa.
Khrista ing inuw yngkhaena ithii i isii khaenache ithiiva, amanche ama aringkum hangring i Thangnang ningna onghaknii khaena hangringva.
Havi vaange ichii ing nenuwkho isii nache ithii vatanuwve, hangring ikho Jesu Khrista ajaarna Thangnang tingche hangringping ichii ing mandenruw.
Nenuw ing isii ing aadik tingche nensiimah ing, thiknaka chiirvachii nenghakchaang nakhe isii ing paarmah rasii.

Nenuw nenghakchaang kha ichum ynthiing mahvaang isiiting ipeeh manchenruw; nenuw ing Thangnang jaarnache ithii ae kaartanii hangring mee vaang vokhehkho nenghakchaang kha ichum ynthiing peehvaang Thang-nang ting pidehruw.
Isii inche nentaklina paarmah rasii, nenuw chuve vajeer chonghak derna ongmah vachuw; nenuw chuve Thangnang tungsiih inuwzii inche ongvachuw.
Chunuwcha inuw ing vajeer chonghak dernache ongru ing tungsiih derna ongmuw khaenache, inuw ing isiichu tutaruw chang? Changchen mahnii.

Nang ing achuw yngkheh mee asuwhchu ynsuwh ningka havi manjii kata tachiika natak ing narusahchu, thikniiva nachii vakhang nakho, ichum ynthiingnii khaena chongriir ynjii vakhang nakho, nang ing anu namanjii aafhuwchu asuwh-ping ichii nang ing manghuwmah chiikhang?
Nenuw isii suwh vasah vakhang tanuwkho, nenuwchu imanchuwka ymmansir inuwzii ing barungriir iruwh ing nemanjii inche nemanpahnii ynsuwhrasii.
Isii tanii nenuwchu ibajohka ichum ynthiing suwhchu ymbasuwpa.

Nenuw hakchaang inuwzii ing isuur vachuw khaka, ki ing hakchaang yntongting ichongping. Isivasahna ichummah, ynthiingmah itufhuwmah nentu chaapkha bathennuwna, atiive nenuw nenhakchaang kha ynthiing ing ichum ynthiing suwhchu ynsuwhnii khaena Aafhuw ting pidehruw.
Nenuw ing isii suwh ing nengom raenche, ichum ynthiing tanii ruwkuwrjoh ing omvachuw.
Changlaenche nenuw ing ynchii aanla nenpha? Ama nong ingkhe ningjakniichu nenphapa, ama nongkha chuve ithiichu vatah.
Atiive nenuwchu isii tanii ibathenka Thangnang suwh ymbasuw vakhaka, iseeng vokhehkho adongniichak ichen naemah ringkumchu nenphapa.
Isii ruthamen chuve ithiiva, changvakon-chu Thangnang ngareh kikthuur chuve inuw vakhae Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajaarna ichen naemah iringniiva.
Kauw kanae ae, ki ing riirva kachii i nenuw nengkheng ing manghuwsiing nenta, akhaechuve vajeer chonghak khaena nenuw ing nemanghuwsa. Laaruw mee ing aringlaen taangche vajeer chonghak ing apuhva.
Afhuwsar om rupa-nuwchu aringkum vakhaena vajeer chonghak inche afhuwsar taklinache aphuwppa. Changvakonchu afhuwsar thiknave, afhuwsar ningna ynphuwp vajeer chonghak taniichu ynjohsa.

Chukhaenache afhuwsar ing aringlae, reentaang pasar yngkheh thoh paarhak nave, ama rupanuw chuve basiider ichuwhmah atu meeva. Changvakonchu afhuwsar thiknave ama vajeer chonghak tanii ynjohsa, ama ing rakhii niireehkhang nakho ichuwhmah tumahsa.
Amavaangche kauw kanae ae, ithii ae kaartanii ihangring Khrista mee ynsuwhnii khaenache, Khrista hakchaang ajaarna vajeer chonghak nache nenuw thiktanuwve, Thangnang ningnache aanla manla vataruw.
Inuw ing hakchaang inuwzii ing yngonglaenche, vajeer chonghak ajaar inche ithii henreen niivachii aanlachu yntaklina nong amantu.
Atiive inuw ympuhchu ithii vakhaka, vajeer chonghak tanii inuwchu ymbajohpa; chukhaenache baruw vajeer chonghak ynziih ing mahka, itharpeh laetha inche inuw ing rukuum yntuva.

Chunuwcha inuw ynchii riirtaruw? Vajeer chonghakchu isiiva? Changmahva! Vajeer chonghak ajaarna chenmah naka ki ing isiichu manghuwmahva kachiiva. Yngkhaena ynchii imbe vajeer chonghak inche achuw mee yngkheh peehchu nang ing idikmahva nachiiva tamahnave, ama barungriirchu kaningna omahva chiiva.
Vajeer chonghak ajaar inche isamah tangmah chaap yndikniichu kataklina omsa. Vajeer chonghak ynvaemah nachembe isiichu ithiiva.
Ki vajeer chonghak ynvaeru ing iring vasahping, changvakonchu chonghakchu athengtah nache isiichu ringka ki ithii ing.
Iringnii khaena chonghak havi inge kaningna ithiiniichu ynsuwhsa.
Isii inche amanden ituchehnii aphatah nache, chonghak jaarnache kichu ymmanchaepa, amanche ithehkho ynthehpa.
Amatah nache vajeer chonghak kho ynthiingva, amanche chonghak kho ynthiingva, ichumva vokhehkho isava.

Isa inche kaningna ithiiniichu ynsuwhva chiiva? Changchen mahnii! Isii chuve isiiva ichii yndangnii khaena, isa ajaar inche isii ing kaningna ithiinii nong tuka kaningna ithiinii ynsuwhva. Havi chonghak ajaarnache isii inche athisehseh ing isii icher hungansuwhnii khaenava.
Vajeer chonghak chuve laethacher taniiva ichii ymmanghuwsa, changvakonchu kive isii derna ynjuwr vasah hakchaang meeping.
Ki ing katuchu ynchii katuva ichii manghuwmah ing, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ki ing tuning kachiichu tumah ing, changvakonchu ki ing kabatirchu katunah.
Ki ing tuning kachiimahchu katu vanave, vajeer chonghak i ichumva ichiichu karupa.
Chutahnache katu kari amachu ki ing katumahva, kataklina om isii inche ymmantuva.
Ki kahakchaang sungna isachu omah ichii ynghuwning. Isa tunii khaena ipirpak yndennii chuve kadeensa amachu ki ing itu chehmah ing.
Ki ing tuning kachii isachu tuchehmah ing, ki ing tuning kachiimah isamahchu katunah.
Ki ing tuning kachiimahchu tuningve, ama aatuchu kimahping, kaningna om isii inche atuva.
Amatah nache ki ing vajeer chonghak havi katuwhpa amachuve, ki ing isa nong tuning kachiirae, isamahchu kithoh ynruw ing ongna.
Kasungna ong mee inuwzii inche Thangnang vajeer chonghak nache karotha irohsahva.

Changvakonchu kabarungriirna vajeer chonghakchu jeehniika laar yntuk vokhehkho kahakchaang sungna mari om isii vajeer chonghak inche kichu isuwrka ynghenruw reentaang vajeer chonghak yngkheh kahakchang mari sungna kamusa.
Ki i yntuursahpak meeping! Havana ithii hakchaang tanii ichu achuw inche ikarva chiiva?

Inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajaarnava ta ingka Thangnang chu kamanpahsahnah. Chunuw vaniive kabarungriirna Thangnang vajeer chonghakchu kamandensa, changva-konchu hakchaang ingve isii vajeer chonghak anongchu amandensa.
Atii Jesu Khrista thoh iring mee vakhae ningnache manraar mahnii.
Vajeer chonghak tanii iringnii laetha Jesu Khrista ningna om inche, isii icher omnii vajeer chonghak re ithii tanii ymbathenpa.

Akhaechuve hakchaang ing suurka, vajeer chonghak ing atucheh mahchu Thangnang ing asapa yngkhehpangchu laaruw paam nache isii icher vaang jenchiirka, laaruw mee taklina isii icher vakhae-chu amanraarpa.
Amatah nache hakchaang ing amanden inuwzii ing isimahka, ynthiing laetha inuwzii ing isi inuw ing vajeer chonghak chongjeerchu areer basuwnii khae-nava.

Laaruw mee hakchaang ing amanden inuwzii ing iring mee inche hakchaang ing amanden nache abarungriir apeehnah, amanche laetha inuwzii ing iring mee inche laetha ing amanden nache abarungriir apeehnah.
Laaruw paam hakchaang ting barungriir ipeeh chuve ithiichu vatah, changvakonchu laetha ting barungriir ipeeh chuve iringnii vokhehkho idae phaniiva.
Chukhaenache hakchaang ting barungriir apeeh mee vakhaechu Thangnang taklina ajeehniiva; akhaechuve ama Thangnang vajeer chonghak dernache ongmahsa, aman-che ongkho chehmahsa.
Hakchaang inuwzii ing iring mee inche Thangnang manpenchehmah.
Changvakonchu Thangnang laetha-chu neningna atatak ing ongnave, nenuw hakchaang nache ongmah vachuw, laetha nache ongvachuw. Achuw yngkheh ningnache Khrista laethachu omah nave Khrista mee mahsa.
Changvakonchu Khrista inche neningna ongnave, neng hak-chaangchu isii khaenache thikkhang nakho, nenlaetha chuve ichum ynthiing khaena iringchu aphapa.
Jesu chu ithii tanii amanring laetha inche neningna ongnave, Jesu Khrista ithii tanii amanring laetha neningna ong inche maangvachii neng hakchaangchu iringnii ringkum pivaata.
Chunuwchembe kauw kanae ae, inuw hakchaang inuwzii ing iringnii khaena hakchaang ler yntuurmahva.
Hakchaang inuwzii ing ring tanuwve nenuw thikva nenchiiva, changvakonchu laetha ajaarnache nenuw ing hakchaang nongtuchu thehta nuwve nenuw ringvanenta.
Akhaechuve Thangnang laetha ing apuh mee vakhae chuve Thangnang siti chupae.
Ynchiknii khaena nenuw ing ynthiing laethachu nenphamahva, changvakonchu ijuh siti sanae laethachu nenuw ing nenphava; amatah nache inuw ing Aba! Apa! tamuwka ynriirnah.
Thangnang siti vamuw ichii khaena, Aafhuw alaetha inche ynlaetha thoh saarkhii apeehsa.
Inuwchu asiti manuwve ruw ikuum-chu ynsuwh samuw vokhehkho Khrista thohche ruw ikuumchu ynsuwhhak samuw. Amanche ijachaamchu khaanghak manuwve alaar isachu phahak vataruw.
Ataraennii ijachaam ichuve ynningna mandangvachii alaar isa ipir thohche yndeengnii sakmah ichii ing kamandennah.
Akhaechuve Thangnang siti pae ichii mandang vachiichu akikseem chaap ing hahbrah ing ynghahnah.
Akikseem vakhae ing ikaniimah vachii derna ong ae ichuve emanden inuwzii ing mahva, changvakonchu amanghuw ing ama derna amangong Aafhuw ing amanden khaenava.
Thangnang siti ynsuwhnii khaenache, ynseem peeh vakhaechu ynthiingmah tanii karpeeh vaata.
Ataraenpha ing ynseem peeh vakhae ing abuw ina vokhehkho siti ynringna ijaanii vaangkhe ijachaampak ymphahaknah ichii ymmanghuwsa.
Enuw pangmahva, ynthiing laetha apha inuwkho Thangnang siti ynsuwhnii khaena vokhehkho ikarpeeh phanii khaenache hakchaangna abuw ina ing ongmanuw.
Ningmanden ajaar inche inuw vakhaechu ikarpeeh ymphava, changvakonchu ningmandenchu mik ing imu phamah manuwve, atatak ningmanden chumahva. Achuw inche ningmandenchu muchehkhang!
Changvakonchu inuw ing imu ynchehmah nache ningmanden mangom manuwve, inuw ing khaangsa muwka ynghahnah.
Isuurmuw vakhaka, ynthiing laetha inche ibomvaata. Inuw ing Thangnang ningting iniihnii, itham-nii ymmanghuwmah vakhaka, ynthiing laetha ing inuw ynthen nache Thangnang ningting iniihpeeh vaata.
Atii barungriir aatoh inche laetha ing amandenchu amanghuwsa, akhaechuve Thangnang ing aman-denna ynthiing ae khaena ama ing aniihpeehna.
Thangnang aning amansiih mee ae khaena, vokhehkho ama ing amanden inuwzii ing a-een ae ningnache isachu tupeeh ae ningka achiiva ichii inuw ing ymmanghuwsa.
Thangnang ing maensana amanghuw vasah aechu asapa thoh aanghakjaeh ing asik inche asiihpae, amana chembe asapa ing auw anae ae kaarna amaensachu aansuwhnii khaenava.
Thangnang ing een aeka asik ing asiih vasah ae vokhehkho a-een mee aechu manchum vaatae amanche alaar isa chukho phahak vaatae.
Changvaniive hava vakhae khaene inuw ing ynchii riirvataruw! Thangnang chu inuw yngkhaena vanave, achuw ing inuwchu ijeehnii-cheh vachiiva?
Asapa rapkho karpeehru ing inuw vakhae khaena ympeehpa! Asapa ngareh ing ipinave, yngkhaenache hava vakhae ichu ngareh ing ipimah vachiiva?
Thangnang ing aateer vasah amee aechu raarmah ae achii vakhaka, achuw ing Thangnang amee aechu manraar chehva chiiva!
Achuwva enuw manraar vachiichu, Khrista ing ithii chukho chehka hangring Thangnang changbaen derna ongka ynniihpeeh raenche,

achuwva Khrista ningsiih tanii ikhaecheh vachiichu? Barungriir ija ing vamo, inangsuwh ijachaam vamo, changmahka venchaam chiilaar ing vamo, ideenmah sara naeriing ing vamo, isii ikha ing vamo changmahka ithii inchen vamo?
Havi ynziihka omna,
“Aafhuw nakhaena kenuw apha vakhaena ichiisuwh ithiinii nache ongnung;
Kenuwchu jao enthehchak vaangkhe yntunah ae.”
Changmahva, aningsiih ajaar-nache inuw ing hava vakhae takline aacheh phavataruw.
Ki ing kaman-dennah, ynchiitanga ingkho inuwchu aningsiih tanii ikhaecheh mahnii, ithii vokhehkho iring ing, vaarmee vokhehkho minvaen aapuh ae ing, ruwrengpir ae vokhehkho nuwtanii ing,
changmahka yngkaangseh ing vakhang nakho, ithuwhpak ing vakhang nakho, reentaang ynseem peeh ing vakhang nakho, Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ningna om Thangnang ningsiih tanii inuwchu ikhaecheh mahnii.
Ki ing Khrista rumingna ichum kariirnah, kabarungriirna ynthiing laetha ing saarkhiina manchaemah ningchuw.
Kapeeh irikthoh barungriir ija ing ongning.
Hakchaang thoh sii yntinfhuw kamee ae khaena ki ing Thangnang siraap tanii re Khrista ningtanii asik ing yngkhae ningka kachiisahnah.

Enuw Thangnang meepae, asiti aepae, amanche eningna alaar isachu amandang vasahva, ama ing enuw thoh chongiir rika vokhehkho vajeer chonghakchu ening-nache apeehpa; Thangnang nongtu vokhehkho chongreep vakhae empha vasahva;
Empa aechu ening taniiva, vokhehkho hakchaang nachembe Khrista chuve ening taniiva; Aafhuw chuve aangkheng taklina ichen naemah ing mampah vaanchii Thangnang va.
Thangnang chongsaechu yntanga mahva ichii ing kariirmahva, Isrel mee ae chupang Thangnang mee mahpae,
Abraham tuti aangkhengkho Thangnang siti mahpae. Thangnang ing Abraham ningna ariir, “Ki ing naningna chongreep katunah, Isak ajaarna nang natuti ompeh vaata.”
Hakchaang siti chuve Thangnang siti mahnii, changvakonchu chongreep derna om naepang chuve ichum tuti chuva.
Haviva chongsae chong-reepchu, “Apha ahenphachak nache ki juwng ningka Sara ing sapa deenvaata.”
Havipang mahva, Rebika kho ampa yngkhehpang Isak ningtanii sapa deenvaata.
Naepang ae engommahrirae vokhehkho isa isamah entumahrirae aateer vasah inuwzii ing, Thangnang ing amandenchu angiirnii khaenava, nong ingmahva; a-eenpeeh
Rebika ningna ariir, “Upa inche naepangchu rukuum tuvaata.”
“Jakop chuve kaning amansiihpa, changvakonchu Iso chuve kabatirpa taka ynziihka omna.”
Chunuwcha Thangnang chu chummah tavaanchiiva? Changmahva.
Mosi ningna amanthang chuve, “Ki ing kamandenchu kaning mansiihva kata, ki ing kamanden ningnache kaning manchuwhva kata.”
Chang-tahnache, laaruw mee amanden namahva, Thangnang ing amanden chirnava.
Ynthiing chongsae ing Pharo ningna ki ing kamandenchu haviva taka amanthang, “Nang ing iruwng puhnana karuwrengchu laaruw paam aangkhengna mandangla achii.”
Chutahnache amanden aechu aning mansiihka, amandenmah aechu embarungriir amanpirnah.
Amachu vanave nenuw ing kaningna tavanenta, “Thangnang ing yngkhaena miraar ahenbasuwva? Achuw inche Thangnang ing amanden-chu manghuwcheh vachiiva?”
Laaruw mee nangcha achuw vachii, Thangnang taklina nabasangcheh nang achuw vachii? Pir bukam ing aaseem ningna yngkhaena kichu jinge ichii ing ynseem vachii tachehmah.
Aaseem kikna omchirna, pir yngkheh tanii bukam asae ynniimeh iseem arusa, yngkheh ing isaseh ikanii om ing vokhehkho yngkheh inche icham chamnii ing aseemchehsa.
Thangnang chu jinge tana, athir fhuwrnii re aruwrengchu mandang ningka takhangle, thirfhuwrnii beerchu maangvachii khaenache apha iseehpak ing akhaangva.
alaar isa chukho aning amansiih ae ningna mandang ningka achiinah, alaar isa phavachii ama ing thoraang atuvasah mee ae ningnakho mandang ningka achiinah.
Jehudi ae pangmahka, Reentaang mee aekho ama ing yngeennah.
Thangnang ing Hosia ningna jinge ichii ing ajeer,
“Ki kameemah aechu kameepae taningka eenva katae,
Kaning kamansiihmah aechu kaning mansiihpak kajaati ae tava katae.”
“Nenuwchu kamee mahvachuw taningka kariir ae nache,
enuwchu Iring Thangnang siti tavakatae.”
Isaia ing Isrel khaena ichap, “Isrel mee vakhaechu chifhuw kuurna om siihdii thoh aanghak khang nakho, ikarpeeh aphachuve tuumvaata.”
Aafhuw ing anong manchivaata vokhehkho mantom vaata, akhaechuve laaruw paam khaena Thangnang ing nong manchivaata.
Mamaenna Isaia ing ajeer vasah vaang, “Aachehchir Aafhuw ing yntuti imapeehmah nave inuw i Sodom vaangkhe tavaanchiiva vokhehkho Gomora thoh aanghak vaanchiiva.”
Chunuwcha inuw ynchii riirtaruw? Ichum ynthiingchu enjongmah reen-taang mee aeng ichum ynthiingchu enthacha ajaarnache emphapa.
Changvakonchu ichum ynthiing vajeer chonghak enjong Isrel aeng vajeer chonghakchu mapung mampha mahsae.
Yngkhaenava? Enuw ing thacha ajaarnache ichum ynthiingchu jongmah ae, changvakonchu nongtu ajaar inche enjong. Chutahnache khi mansiinii nache engkhi emansiipa.
Ynziih ynthiing chongsae ing ariir:
“Enruw, Zaion nache rung kaphinsa,
mee aenche engkhi mansiinii vaatae,
amanche achuw yngkheh ing aningnache thacha nave ningjak phamahnii.”
Kauw kanae ae, kabarungriir ing aadik inche kamee ae ing ikarpeeh emphanii khaenache Thangnang ting kathamsahva.
Thang-nang chu ithuwhpak ing emandensa changvakonchu emanghuw inuwzii ing mandenmahsae ichiichu ki ing saarkhii kapeehnah.
Thangnang ningtanii ichum ynthiingchu emanghuwmah vakhaka entaksah tanii ichum ynthiing nache engiirnii jong aeka, enuw ing Thangnang ningtanii ichum ynthiing dernache ongmahsae.
Khrista chuve thacha mee vakhae ningnache ichum ynthiingchu engaansuwhnii inche adongnii vajeer chonghak chuva.
Mosi ing abaziih chuve vajeer chonghak ajaarna ichum ynthiing phanii atu mee inche vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing ringvaata.
Changvakonchu thacha jaarna ichum ynthiing ymphava achii aenche enriir, “Nabarungriirna tamahra, achuw inche thangbaen ting karvachiiva?” (amachuve Khrista chu ajenbasumnii vatah.)
Changmahka achuw inche laaruw paam dertingche juruwhva chiiva? (amachuve Khrista chu ithii tanii ahenbasuwnii vatah.)
Ama ingkhe ynchii ariirsa? Nang nabuumna, nanerna vokhehkho nabarungriir nakhe chongsaechu omna (amachuve kenuw ing kentong thachanii chongsae chuva.)
Nang naner ing Jesu chu Aafhuwva tataniika vokhehkho Thangnang ing ithii tanii amanringva ichiichu nabarungriirna thacha taniive, nangchu ikarvaata.
Mee ing abarungriirna thachaka ichum ynthiingchu aphava, amanche ner ing ynriirsah inche ikarpeeh ymphava.
Ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirsa, “Aafhuw chu athacha mee vakhae ing ningjak phamahnii.”
Akhaechuve Jehudi re Grik ae ruwrak nache asiksik ichii yntanga omah; Thangnang chuve aangkheng khaena Aafhuwva vokhehkho aningna a-een vakhae ningnache ynriimjor ing bor apeehsa.
Akhaechuve Aafhuw ruming a-een mee vakhaechu karvaata.
Changvaniive enuw ing enthacha-mah Aafhuw chu ynsaangkhe eenva chiipae? Enuw ing supsii ensiimah Aafhuw chu ynsaangkhe thachava chiipae? Aatongchu omah nacha ynsaangkhe siiva chiipae?

Enuwchu ynchiirmah ae nacha, ynsaangkhe enuw ing isa chongchu tongva chiipae? Ynziih vasah ynthiing thiimziihna ariirsa, “Rotharohnii idae isa chong ajereen vokhehkho atong ae engkhichu aajaehmeh isava!”
Changvakonchu mee aangkheng ing isa chongchu rimah ae. Isaia atakrap ing ariirsa, “Aafhuw, achuw ing kenchongchu atha-chasae?”
Chukhaenache chongchu siika thachachu ompehva, vokhehkho Khrista ajaarnache chongchu ompehva.
Changvakonchu ki ing kariir, enuw ing ensii vasah mahvakhang? Atatak ing ensiipa, “Enuw engaruurchu laaruw paam apaam lijana vokhehkho enchongchu laaruw paam avadongnii ipha ing tungsa.”
Ki ing athar kasii, Isrel mee aeng emanghuwmah vakhang? Mosi ing amaensana ajeer,
“Jaati ynsuwhmah aechu naningna kallak mangomva kata,
Ipang jaati ae taklina nathir manfhuwrva kata.”
Changvakonchu Isaia ing inempak athona isa ing ariir,
“Ki ynjongmah mee aenche kichu yntuwhpae,
Kichu ynniihmah ae ningnache kataksah ing yndangsing.”
Changvakonchu Isrel ae ningna-che ama ing ariir, “Chongriir ynjiimah ae vokhehkho asiksiisii jaati ae chaap nache siimpum kakik kathohpa.”

Thangnang ing amaensana aateer vasah ameechu utaraenkho renmahdeh. Vokhehkho Elija khaena ynthiing thiimziih ing ynchii ariirse ichii nemanghuw mahva? Ama ing Isrel ae taklina Thangnang ningting athamsah:
“Aafhuw, nang nathamin aatong jaephar aechu enuw ing enthehpa, enuw ing thiimkung chaap chukho embakhiipa; ki kanumpang omtahning, amanche kalaetha enuw ing enjongnah.”
Changvakonchu Thangnang ing aningna basangka ynchii ariir? “Ichummah lae Baal arummah mee lising sarii kakhaena kasiihsae.”
Amavaangche ichii ing apha ichii nenkho tungsiih ing aateer inuwzii ing abarii mee topoh omnae.
Changvakonchu havi tungsiih ajaar vanave, athar nong tanii mahnii, changvaniive tungsiihchu athar tungsiih mahsa.
Amachu vanave ynchiiva chang? Isrel aeng enjongchu phamahsae; changvakonchu aateer vasah mee aenchembe amachu emphapa, amana om areh aechu embarungriir pirsa.
Ynziih vasahna jinge ariirsa, “Thangnang ing eningna embarungriir ing emandenchu emuniimah ing, emik emuniimah ing vokhehkho engana ing ensiiniimah inche ataniiphane apeehpae.”
Devit ing ariir,
“Enuw ing ensah thaemin inche chaang ynsuwhsana unii ae rasii vokhehkho engkhi emansii inche engkhaena isii ikha ynsuwhnii rasii,
enuw ing emuniimah khaena emik manthimrasii,
apha vakhaena Aafhuw ing ikiim ijachaam dernache mangom ae rasii.”
Chukhaenache ki ing kariirnah, enuw entiihnii ing engkhi emansiipae? Amachumahdehva! changvakonchu enuw engkallaknii khaena itiih aenche, reentaang mee ae khaena manlaenpeeh phanii ynsuwhsa.
enuw itiih aenche laaruw paam savang vanave vokhehkho enuw imaangsah aenche reentang mee ae savang suwhnii vanave, enuw ynriimjor aenche aajaehmeh thivaatae!
Reentaang mee ae neningna kariirnah, ki reentaang mee ae khaena chongthang ynsuwhping khaeka, ki ing katu nongnache yndingniining.
kacheh vakhae ki ing ruwreng yngkheh ing hakchaangna mari yngki kamee ynsuwh ae enuwchu kallak mangom ae ningka enuw topohchu ikarpeehnii khaenava.
Enuwchu arupeehmah ae inche laaruw paam thohne aanrunii ynsuwhnave, arupeeh ae raenche ynchii ynsuwhvaate? Ithii tanii hangring chuvatah.
Aren aanla manthiing nave, jaam atum chukho ynthiingva; vokhehkho arajung manthiing nave, abah chukho ynthiingva,

amanche oleep thing abah arehchu yngkhiih nave, lampana imuwng oleep thing abah nache vaanjomna. Reentaang mee ae nenuw chuve lampana imuwng oleep thing thohche aanghak vachuw, changvakonchu atiive nenuw Jehudi ae ipirpak laetha ringkumchu enuw thohche sarup nenphahakpa,
yngkhiih thing abah aechu jeehnii nuwna yndingnii mahruw; nenuw chuve abah vatahchuw, arajungchu nemanehmahva, arajung inche nenuwchu ymmanehva.
Amachuvanve nang ing tavaanta, “Chumna, thing abah yngkhiichu kaongnii seemnii khaenava.”
Amachu ichumva, enthachamah inche enuw yngkhiihsae, changvakonchu nang chuve nathacha ing ngiirnachii, nabarungriir nakhe yndingvanachii changdenna ynchikra.
Thangnang ing Jehudi aechu karpeehmah nave, Aafhuw inche nangkho ikarmahnii.

Chukhaenache Thangnang ningtanii isa vokhehkho isamahchu ibuwrla; itiih ae yntongting isamah changvakonchu isa nache nang anasiir ongtaniive, naning yntongting Aafhuw inche isa eensuwhpeeh vaata. Changmah nave natakkho itenvaata,
vokhehkho enuw ingkho enthachamah nache apha vakhaena ongmahpae vaniive, engongniichu seempeeh vaata; akhaechuve Thangnang ing enuwchu athar vokheh engongnii iseempeeh achehsa.

Reentaang mee ae nenuw chuve lampa kaarna imuwng oleep thing abah yngkhiihka yntinmah siisii ing omchuwka, om vasah oleep thing nache ivaanjom thoh aanghak vachuw, Jehudi ae chuve om vasah oleep thing thohne aanghakpae; amanche yngkhiih abahchu entaksah thingbur nache iraecharii ing Thangnang ing avemanjomchehsa.

Kauw kanae ae, nenuw nentaksah iruungsahchuw ingkhe isingpung ichii ing nemanden niimah ing ithuwhpak chong havi nenuw ing manghuw tanuwka kachiinah. Reentaang mee vakhae ing Thangnang ningting enghungruwhchir mahtaang, rakhehting Isrel sungna barungriir ipirchu suwhna.
Havi vaange ichii ing Isrel mee vakhaechu karpeeh vaata. Ynziihka omna,
“Ikarpeeh Aafhuw inche zaion tanii thengvaata,
Aafhuw inche Jakop tuti bahsuwm tanii Thangnang aandenmah vakhaechu rupeeh vaata;
Vokhehkho enuw isii enrang vakhaechu kakuhpeeh ae aphanache,
enuw thoh ynruw ing chongiir katuchu haviva.”
Isa chong khaena chembe enuw chuve nengkhaena Thangnang jeehnii meepae; changvakonchu ynteer vasahpae ichii khaena chembe enuw chuve fhuwven ae tanii hungsuwh meepae khaka aarang chupae.
Thangnang inche aateer vasah aere bor apeeh vasah ae ningna abarungriir mantehmah.
Reentaang mee ae, ajaenche nenuw Thangnang chongriir ynjiimah ing omchuw, changvakonchu atiive nenuw Thangnang ningchuwh nenphapa, akhaechuve Jehudi aenche chongriir ynjiimah ynsuwh-sae.
Havithoh aanghak ing nenuw ing ningchuwh nenpha inche, Jehudi aenche Thangnang chongriir manjiimahsae, amachuve enuwkho atii Thangnang ningchuwh emphanii khaenava.
Thangnang ing mee vakhaechu chongriir ynjiimah kaeshum nache akhumpa, akhaechuve aningchuwhchu mee aangkhengna amandangnii khaenava.
Aajaehmeh iruungva Thangnang lerchii? Aajaehmeh ithuwhva asing aveernii vokhehkho amanghuwchu! Achuw ing achongiirchu riircheh vachiiva? Achuw ing alamchu manghuwcheh vachiiva?
Ynziih ing ariirsa,
“Aafhuw barungriirchu achuw ing manghuwva chiiva?
Achuw ing aningna chong tahpeehcheh vachii omkhang?”
Aafhuw aningna maensa ing pinaka, Aafhuw ningtanii athar phava-chiichu achuwva?
Aafhuw ing peeh aangkhenglaang aseemva amanche aangkhenglaang ama ajaarna omchirva vokhehkho akhaenava. Thangnang ningnache ichuwr naemah ing ympah ynsuwhrasii! Amen.

Thangnang ningchuwh jaarna kauw kanae ae nenuw vakhae neningna kaniihsahnahchuw. Nenuw chaatha ipeehvaang nenringsen ing, ynthiing ing vokhehkho Thangnang peeniivachii ing ympidehruw, ama-chuva turemva nenchii nenongruwchu.

Havana laaruw paam thohne aanghak mahruw, changvakonchu nenbarungriir manteh nuwna mantharruw, amana chembe Thangnang ing amanden isa vokhehkho penniivachii amanche mapung iphachu ynchiiva ichii manghuwva nenta.

Ki ing Thangnang tungsiih kikthuur kaphasah ajaar inche nenuw vakhae neningna kariirsahnah, nataksah rutukchak nakhe athi ing mandenmah, Changvakonchu naningna Thangnang ing ympeeh nathacha rutuk ingkhe nataksahchu vajeer yntusar.
Hakchaang yngkhehpangna mari inempak omna amanche mari vakhae enongchu yntinmaemah.
Inuw vakhae Khrista ningnache hakchaang yngkhehpang vamuw. Amavaange inuw vakhae hakchaang yngkhehpangna ruw yngkivamuw.
Thangnang ing ympeehsah tungsiih inuwzii ing asiksik kikthuur ympha-sah, Thangnang chong jeernii vakhang nakho, inuw ynthacha rutuk inuwzii ing jeersataruw.
Nong tunii khaena vanave, nongchu tutaruw; aanchuwmee ing vanave, manchuw taruw.

Ynthohsahnii iriirpeeh khaena vanave, ynthohsahnii tutaruw, pivachii inchenkho manerru ing pirasiing, aapuh inchenkho abarungriir iruwh ing puhrasiing; ningsiih khaena nongtu mee inchenkho rotharoh ing turasii.
Ningsiihchu manthiingva chiiva. Isamahva ichiichu batirruw. Isachu bachuw teehruw.
Unae ningsiih vaangkhe yngkheh re yngkheh ningsiih ympiruw, amanche yngkheh ing yngkhehchu ynjasuwhva ichii ing ynriruw.
Thaachah mahruw nong ipirpak ing turuw, Aafhuw chu barungriir iruwhdeh ing rukuum turuw.
Ningmanden nache rotha manrohruw, ijachaamchu khaang-teehruw, amanche apha vakhaena thamsaruw.
Ruwrthiing ae ijachaam nache bomsa aeruw, amanche lamkhii itheng ae khaenache serung eengkhaar imongpeehruw.
Rotharoh aechu rotha rohfhuwruw, ichap aechu chapfhuwruw.
Yngkheh yngkheh barungriir ynchim ing omruw; yndingmahruw, changvakonchu ynjuursahchu ruruw. Nataksah ing isingping tamahra.
Achuw yngkheh ing nataklina isamah tunave, isamah ing barimah, changvakonchu mee vakhae mik enna sakvachiichu tura.
Nencheh vakhae mee vakhae thoh idaejaeh ing paarruw.

Kaarang ae, nenuw huw ynrimahruw, nenuw huw ynriva nenchii changdenna Thangnang barungsii ing huw iripeeh vaata. Ynthiing thiimziih ing ariir chuve, “Ki ing huw ripeehva kachuw, ki ing baripeehva kachuw taka Thangnang ing ariir.”
Ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirsa, “Nang ynjeehnii meechu aven chaam nave, aven manvaara, achii raarnave chii pira; ama napeeh inche aning ynjak naka arusaena mi ichuwh thoh aanghak vaata.”
Chukhaenache isamah inche nenuwchu ichehmah rasii, ama changdenna isa inche isamahchu chehniirasii.
Mee aangkhenglaang ing aatuaricheh ae derna ongvachiiva. Thangnang tanii aatuari-cheh mahnaka omah, vokhehkho om aatuaricheh aechu Thangnang ing pham athinpae.
Aatuaricheh ae arumah mee vakhaechu Thangnang chongriir amanjiimahpae. Chukhaenache arumah chaap ae ing Thangnang vajeer phavaatae.
Aapuh aechu isa nong atu mee aenche chiivachii mahpae, changvakonchu isamah atu mee aenche chiivachiipae. Nang aatuaricheh aechu chiimahchii? Isachu tura amanache aningtanii ympahchu phavanata.

Ama isa khaena Thangnang nong atuva. Changvakonchu isamahchu nang tutaniive, nang ynchikra akhaechuve achemchu manpaam mahnii, ama Thangnang nong atu meeva, isamah atu mee chaapna ponti pikata achii chuva.
Havi khaene aatuaricheh ae chongchu manjiira, Thangnang khaenapang mahva changvakonchu barungriir khaena khomva.
Nenuw ing lerchii nentuur chaapchu singva nenchiiva, natasah vokhehkho nadeen chaapna ree teenva nachiiva amanche ijava nachiipae vokhehkho bariimva nachiipae.
Mee ningna ler tuurmahruw, changvakonchu yngkheh re yngkheh ningsiih ympiruw. Yngkheh re yngkheh ningsiih inge vajeer chonghak ynjii chuva.

Chonghak ing ariirnah, “Reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah tumah; mee thehmah; peeh baruwhmah; ynraar ing saarkhii tumah amanche kaammahra, havimah reentaang chonghak chuve, ‘Naveen-chaangchu nataksah vaangkhe naning mansiihra.’”
Chukhaenache naveenchaang taklina ningchuwhjaeh ing isamah tumah. Chutahnache ningsiih ing chonghak areer abasuwsa.
Aphachu manghuwruw, ataraene ijaar tanii ihangsuwnii aphachuva; amaensana ynthacha thohkhe athi ing ataraene Manlaenpeeh phaniichu ynneengsa.
Jaenchu vitohsa, siim aphachu ynneengsa, chutahnache ynthim nongchaap renmanuwka ireng laarpeenchu niitaruw.
Inuw vakhae ing siimna isajaeh ing isimuw vaangkhe sitaruw, isamah, ichummah, juw ynruw, ichamah, barungriir ingiirmah, ynnahnii, vokhehkho kallak omahrasii.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tanii laar tukniichu chinuwna, isii hakchaang ing aadik vokhehkho apenniichu itu manchenruw.
Achuw yngkheh athacha inche isah aruchirva taka amandennah, achuw yngkheh thacha tahna isuur chuve thingna rungna pangchu asahnah.
Asah mee ing asahmah meechu yntuurlep ing tumahrasii. Amanche asahmah mee ing asah meechu vajeer tumahrasii; Thangnang ing aningna aruva.
Mee meenae taklina vajeer natu nang achuw vachii? Amakho ama aafhuw ningna basangsa vaata. Aafhuw ing bachuw naka amakho ngiircheh vaata.
Mee yngkheh ing inii nikhehchu reentaang inii chungna amen iruwpak ing amanden omna, amanche achuw yngkheh ing iniichu aanghakjaehva ichii ing amandennah. Mee aangkheng ing ataksahna yndensa rasii.

Inii tha aanden mee ing Aafhuw amandennah. Inii tha aandenmah mee ing Aafhuw mandencheh mahnii. Achuw yngkheh asah mee inche Aafhuw ing ympeehva taka amanpahnah, amanche asahmah mee ingkho kasahmah khaena taka Aafhuw amanpahnah.
Achuw mee ingkho anumpang khaena ringcheh-mah vokhehkho anumpang khaena thikchehmah.
Ringkhang manuwkho Aafhuw ningna ringvaanchiiva, thikkhang manuwkho Aafhuw ningna thikvaanchiiva, amanche ithii iring tahrasii, inuw chuve Aafhuw tavamuw.
Iring mee vokhehkho ithii aechu Aafhuw ynsuwhnii khaenache Khrista ing thikka hangringsa.
Nang ing yngkhaena nauw nanae taklina vajeer natuva? Yngkhaena nauw nanaechu na-ensiimahva? Khrista ing vajeer aturaenche inuw vakhae atuwr maanache ngiirvataruw.
Jinge taka ynziihna,
“Aafhuw kichu mee aangkheng ing irum vaata,
mee aangkheng ing kenraarpa ichii riirvaatae.”
Chukhaenava mee aangkheng ing ama ing atu ari chaap Thangnang ningna riirvaata.
Chukhaenache mee yngkheh ing mee taklina vajeer itu manchenruw. Amathoh ynruw ing mee yngkheh ing auw anae taklina isii ting abukniimah ing turuw.
Jesu Khrista thoh ynchaar inge kaningna yntanga ynthiingmah thaemin omah ichii ing kamandennah. Achuw yngkheh ing thaeminchu manthiingmah tanave, aningnache manthiing mahnii.
Nang ing thaemin nasah yngkhe nauw nanaechu mansuh taniive, naning namansiih mahva. Khrista ing akhaena ithii meechu nang nathaemin ingkhe mamaang mahra.
Nang ing isava nachiikha, isamahva ichii ing ruming thangmah rasii.
Thangnang lipahchu isahnii innii khaena mahva, changvakonchu ichum ynthiing, idae vokhehkho ynthiing laethana rotharoh chuva.
Hava vakhae inge Khrista ningna nong atuchu Thangnang ing aru vokhehkho laaruw mee ingkho aruchuva.
Chukhaenache idae vokhehkho yngkheh yngkheh ympirniichu inuw ing jongsataruw.
Isahfhuw khaena Thangnang nongchu mamaangmah manuw. Aangkhenglaang ynthiing chirva, changvakonchu abarungriir asuh ing asah mee ningnache isamahva.
Isaseh chuve sha isahmah, juw inmah changmahka ynchii yngkheh ing nauw nanaechu isii ting bukniivachii vaniive itumah ing sakna.
Nang nathacha omba? Thangnang maanache mangom jaehra.
Changvakonchu fhuwm ynvae ing asah mee ningnache amachu imaangva, akhaechuve athacha om ing samahsa, thacha taniimah chaapchu isiiva.
Inuw thacha ipir chaap inge isuur aechu bomsa vaanchiipae. Intaksah penniipang tuvaanchiimahva.
Inuw ing unae aechu thacha apirnii khaena manpensavaan chiipae.
Khrista ingkho ataksah ympensahnii tumah. Jinge ichii ing ynziihna, “Naningna ningjak ympichaap aechu kaningna buksa.”
Mamaenna ynziih chaap vakhae inuwchu ynchuwnii khaenava, amana chembe ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirnache ikhaangcheh re barungriir amanungae jaarna ningmanden ymmangomnii khaenava.
Ikhaang acheh vokhehkho barungriir amanungae Thangnang ing yngkheh re yngkheh barungriir ynchimnii khaena Jesu Khrista manden derna ipirasii.
Nenuw ing barungriir yngkhehpang inche Jesu Khrista ampa Thangnang chu ympahnii khaenava.
Khrista ing nenuwchu ymbariim vaang, Thangnang alaar saknii khaena nenuw yngkheh yngkheh ymbariimruw.
Ki ing kariirnah amachuve emfhuw fhuwven ae ningna chongreep atuchu areepnii inche ichum Thangnang khaena Khrista ing vinchiip ae meenae hunginsuwhsa.
Amanche reentaang mee aengkho Thangnang ympahnii khaenava. Havi jinge ichii ing ynziihna,
“Reentaang mee ae kaarna manpahva kachii,
vokhehkho ympahnii la ing nangchu manpahva kachii.”
Athar vokheh jinge ariirsa,
“Reentaang mee ae, nenuw Aafhuw amee ae thohche nenrotha manrohruw.”
Amanche reentaang mee vakhae,
“Aafhuw manpahruw;
Mee aangkheng Aafhuw manpahruw!”
Athar vokheh Isaia ing ariirsa,
“Jese tanii atuti bahsuwm omvaata;
vokhehkho ama ing reentaang mee ae taklina paarvaata,
amanche aningnache reentaang mee aenche thacha vaatae.”
Ningmanden omnii Thangnang inche inungae vokhehkho idaechu nentakalina imansippeeh vaata, amana ningmanden inche sipnaka ynthiing laetha ruwreng inche eenruwfhuw vaata.
Kauw kanae ae, ki kataksah ing kamandennah amachuve isachu sipvaata, ynghuwnii chukho sipvaata amanache yngkheh re yngkheh ymbomcheh vanenta.
Hava takline neningna athar vokheh manthang-ning kachii akhae yngkheh omna. Thangnang ing kaningna tungsiih ympeeh khaena neningna ki ing riirning kachiiva,

Reentaang mee ae ningna Jesu Khrista isa chong nong aatu ynsuwh ingka, ynthiing laetha ing amanthiing vasah reentaang mee aeng empeeh chaapchu arupa ichiichu ynthangnii khaena Thangnang isa chong nongchu katunah.
Chukhaenache kajaarna Jesu Khrista ing atu vakhaene yndingsah kaphachu kakhaena chembe ichumva.
Reentaang mee aechu puh ae ningka Thangnang chongriir emanjiinii inche Khrista ing kajaarna atu ari chupang khaenache thona isa ing chongva kata. Ama ing atu havi chongsae vokhehkho nong ajaar nava.
Laetho vokhehkho ingiknii atu ruwreng re Thangnang ynthiing laetha ruwreng ing Jerusalem na ing Illirikum ipha ing Khrista isa chong itong kaphasahpa.
Ki ing hangsenna kamandensah chuve, Khrista ynghuwmah paamna isa chong ynthang re mee reentaang ae chongchu aanvormahnii khaenava.
Jinge ichii ing ynziih vasah omna,
“Aafhuw isa chong eningna ynthangmah rideh enuw inche imu phavaatae vokhehkho asiimahrideh aenche manghuw vaatae.”
Apaam lija vakhaena ki ing nong vakhaechu kamanchipa vokhehkho kum hangsenna nening phaning kachii inche akhae ynsuwhka nenuwchu muningka kachiivachuw.
Ki ing Spen paamting kasiraenche nening phava kata, ki kasi katung vakhaena nenuwchu muningka kachiivachuw, vokhehkho nenbuumna ongning kachiiva.
Apha nenve ki Jerusalem ting Thangnang mee ae ningna katufhuw nong omna.
Mesidonia re Akhaia mee aeng Jerusalem na ong Thangnang mee aechu inempak bomnungka enchii-nah.
Havana kanong vakhae i vokhehkho eningna seerbaar ynlaen-fhuw chaap kamanchi aanuwna Spen paamting kasinii baram ing nening phava kata.
Neningna kavathengraenche Khrista ningtanii ynriimjor borchu vereenva kata ichii kamanghuwsa.
Kauw kanae ae, nenuw vakhae ing Khrista rumingna vokhehkho laetha aningsiihna kakhaena Thangnang ting ithampeeh saruw.
Judia na ong thacha omah mee ae ningtanii kasuwhchehnii khaena ithampeehruw, vokhehkho Jerusalem na ong Thangnang mee aeng kanongtuchu enrunii khaenakho ithampeehsaruw.
Ki ing isip rotharoh thohche neningna vathengva kata, amanche Thangnang ing amanden ynsuwh nave, kavaveerchuw inche rotharoh yntharnii vaata.
Idae Thangnang inche nenuw vakhaethoh ong ynsuwhrasii! Amen.
Kenkria ruwrthiing na nong atu kensarnuw Phoebe chu kavechiirnah.
Thangnang rumingna atak i ihebariimpeehruw. Thangnang mee vaangkhe ibom aru vakhae bomsaruw. Amave mee inempak abomva, amanche kikho ymbomva.
Jesu Khrista aanuw ajii Presila re Akuila aekho salaam katunah ae.
Ki kakhaena ithii iring enchiimah meepae, kipang ing eningna karotha irohmahva, reentaang mee ae ruwrthiing chaap khomva.
Chutahnache engeenna om ruwrthiing ae chukho salaam katunah ae. Kaning amansiihpak Epaenetus chukho salaam katunah, atak i Asia paamna amaensana Khrista athacha pasarpa yngkhehva.
Kengkhaena inempak ijasah Meri chukho salaam katunah.
Kauw kanae vokhehkho kaeshumna onghak ung Andronikus re Junias enuwkho salaam katunah ae, enuw ae i ki kamana khristian vasahpae.
Khrista rumingna kaning ka-mansiihpak Ampliatus chukho salaam katunah.
Khrista khaena ymbom Urbanus vokhehkho kaning kaman-siihpak Stakus chukho salaam katunah ae.
Khrista ing aruvasah Apelles kho salaam katunah, vokhehkho Aristobulus eensungna ongchaap ae chukho salaam katunah ae.
Kauw kanae ae re, Herodion chukho salaam katunah ae. Khrista ningna ong Narkisus eensungna ongchaap ae chukho salaam katunah ae.
Khrista khaena inempak ijasah Triphena vokhehkho Triphosa enuw chukho ibariimpeeh aeruw. Kaning mansiih Parsis chukho ibariimpeehruw, amakho Khrista khaena inempak ijasahva.
Khrista ing aateer vasah Rufus amnuw vokhehkho kanuw ynsuwh ae chukho salaam katunah ae.
Asinkritus, Phlegon, Harmes, Patrobas, Harmas vokhehkho enuwthoh ong ae areh Khristian ae chukho salaam katunah ae.
Enuw thoh ongpoh Philogonus, Julia, Nerius vokhehkho asarnuw Olimpas amana Thangnang aanden mee aethoh ynruwpoh aechu salaam katunah ae.
Yngkheh re yngkheh unae vaang salaam ynturuw. Khrista rumingna ruwrthiing chaap ae ing ymmanpah sahnah ae.
Kathamsahnahchuw, asiksik suwhnii atu vokhehkho chonghak ing arumah tuningka achii mee tanii nenuw dahruw.
Enuw changchii vakhae inche Thangnang nong tuning tamah ae, enven sipniipang khaena vatah, amana isa chongsae re ener isa ing amanghuwmah mee aechu emanchaenah ae.
Mee aangkheng ing nenuw ing isa chong derna ongchuwchu amanghuw chirsae. Chutahnache ki inempak karotha rohna, isa khaena ising iveer ing ongruw, amanche isamah chaapchu manghuwmahruw.
Amana idae Thangnang ing umlaechu nengkhi derna mamaang vaata. Jesu Khrista tungsiih inche nenuwchu eenruwfhuw ynsuwhrasii, Amen.
Pol khaena havana chongthen aanziih Tertius ki ingkho khristen salaam kajepisahnachuw.
Inuw vakhae Aafhuw Jesu Khrista atungsiih inche nenuw vakhaechu eenruwfhuw ynsuwhrasii! Amen.
Isivasah kum aajaehna ynthuurka omjaeh ynvaraam chehmah Jesu Khrista khaena ichumchu kaningna amandang isa chong inuwzii ing, nenuwchu Thangnang ing ymman-reepther chehsa. Thangnang chu manpahtaruw!
Atiive jaephar aeng embaziih vokhehkho ichen naemah Thangnang ing jaat aangkhengna amanche mee vakhae ing thachanii ing vokhehkho emanjiinii khaenache, kaningna ichumchu amandangpa.
Aangkhengna ising iveer Thang-nang chu Jesu Khrista ajaarna ichen naemah ing ympahchu ynsuwhrasii! Amen.
Thangnang ing anong tunii khaena eeteer Khrista Chongthang Pol ki ing vokhehkho unae Sosthenes tanii thoh ing-
Apa Thangnang vokhehkho Jesu Khrista tanii tungsiih re idaechu omrasiing.
Nentaklina ympeeh vasah Thangnang atungsiih khaenache, ki ing nengkhaena apha vakhaena Thangnang chu kamanpahsahnah.
Atiive neningna Aafhuw chu om khaenache nenuw aangkhenglaangna, ichongtah nakho amanche losing nakho aangkheng ahenthi chirsa.
Khrista saarkhii ipeehnii khaenache nengkaarna amanehtherpa,
chutahna-che Aafhuw Jesu Khrista jungindang vachii khaena nenghahjaeh nenuw ing nenphafhuw kikthuurchu yntanga ivaeh omahdehnii.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajuwnglaenche nenraar aomniimah ing, Aafhuw ing nenuwchu imanehther vaata.
Thangnang chuve thachafhuwva, Thangnang ajaar inche asapa Jesu Khrista thoh yngkhehpangnii khaena nenuwchu yngeenpa.

Atiive kauw kanae ae, nenuw vakhae ing chongkheh ichihaknii khaena, vokhehkho nengkaarna ynleh-niimah yntanga omru ing barungriir aanchimnii khaena, Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ruming nache thamsa ingka neningna kariirsahnah.
Kauw kanae ae, nengkaarna ynnahnii, ynlehmah omna taka Kloi eengkuw aeng kaningna enriirpa.
Amachuve nengkaarna achuw yngkheh ing ki Pol meeping, ki Apollo meeping, ki Kaipha meeping, vokhehkho ki Khrista meeping ichii ynvaenachuw.
Nenuw Khrista chu nensenva? Nenuw nengkhaena Pol chu khros na entheh vakhang? Changmahka nenuw ing Pol rumingna baptais nentuva?
Atii nenuw ing kaanuw ijiinii khaena baptais kentupa ichii achuw ingkho riircheh-mah tanuw.
(O chumna, ki ing Stephanas eengkuw aekho baptais kamantu ae; changvakonchu mee reentaang achuwkho baptais kamantu ynsiimah ing.)

Ki i baptais yntunii khaena Khrista ing ynchiir mahva, changvakonchu Khrista ing khros na ithiichu ngareh aansuwhniimah khaena, laaruw mee losing chong ynvaerudeh ing, isa chong itongnii khaena ynchiirva.
Jesu Khrista ing khros na ithii thamin i ymmoh ae ningna chembe ipang chongva; changvakonchu ikar-peeh ympha inuw yngkhaena chembe Thangnang tanii ruwreng chuva.
Havi ynziihka omna,
“Ki ing ising ae losingchu mamaangva kata amanche vakhar kharnii amanghuw ae barungriirchu ki ing yntangamah riri basuwva kata.”
Ising iveer meechu utingva? Thiimthang aechu utingpae? Ataraen-nii laaruw paamne ichongnii amanghuwchu una ongva? Thangnang ing ipangchu laaruw paamne ising mee amanguurmah vakhang?

Chukhaenache Thangnang losing inche, laaruw paam mee aeng entak-sah losing ajaarna Thangnang chu ynghuwchehniimah ing atupa. Ama changdenna ipang chongva enchii kenuw ing kentong thamin athacha mee aechu ikarpeeh inche Thangnang apenniichu ynsuwhsa.
Ama khaena Jehudi ae ing buwtinnii yndang engadiknah amanche Grik ae ing losingchu enjongnah.
Kenuw chuve khros na entheh khrista thaminchu kentongnah, khros na enthehchu Jehudi ae ningnache khi mansiiniiva vokhehkho reentaang mee ae ningnache ipangniiva;
changvakonchu Thangnang ing a-een vasah ae Jehudi aere Grik ae aaniimeh khaena chembe, Khrista inche Thangnang ruwreng vokhehkho Thangnang losing chuva.
Chukhaenache Thangnang ing apangnii nache laaruw mee chungna singsehna, vokhehkho Thangnang asuurnii nache laaruw mee ipir chungna athiseh ing pirna.
Atiive kauw kanae ae, Thangnang ing yngeenchu ynsiiruw, amachuve hakchaang inuwzii ing ising iveer nemmah, ipir nemmah, yngkaangpak ing iruung nemmah.
changvakonchu ising iveer mee aechu ningjak pinii khaena, laaruw paamna ipangchu Thangnang ing aateerva, amanche ipir aechu ningjak pinii khaena laaruw paamna isuurchu Thangnang ing aateerpa,
vokhehkho laaruw paam ing arathiih re meejuum ita aechu Thangnang ing aateerpae, amanche laaruw paam ing iruungpakva ichii ing ari vakhaechu yntangamah abasuwpa,
amana chembe achuw ingkho Thangnang maana ruungcheh mahnii.

Changvakonchu nenuw chuve Thangnang ing Khrista ningnache ymmangongpa, amanche Khrista inche inuw vakhae ynsing ynveernii Thangnang ing abasuwpa. Ama ajaarnache inuw ing ichum ynthiing, iseeng vokhehkho ikarpeeh ymphapa.
Chukhaenache ynziihka omna, “Achuw yngkheh inche ruungningka tanave, Thangnang ing atu ari nache ruungniirasiing.”
Kauw kanae ae, ki ing neningna kathenglae yngkaangpak ing vokhehkho ising iveerpak ing Thangnang chongchu tongmah ing.
Ki ing nenuw thoh kaonglae, athurfhuw ing Jesu Khrista vokhehkho khros na ithii thamin mahnaka reentaang chaap kabahirnii ing kabarungriir kamanreep.
Chukhaenache ki ing nenuw thoh kaonglaenkhe, isuurpak ing, ynchikpak ing vokhehkho ynchiim riirii ing ongsa ingka,
amanche kamanchuwchuw re kachongchu laaruw mee ising iveer chongsae ingmahka, laetha re Thangnang ruwreng ingva.
Amana chembe nen thachachu laaruw mee ising iveer ningna mangomru ing, Thangnang ruwreng nache omnii khaenava.

Changkhang nare kenuw ing laethana imin ae kaarnache ising iveer chong ing ichong ung, changva-konchu laaruw paam havi tanii ising iveer ingmahva vokhehkho laaruw paam aapuh ae havi tanii yntangamah ynsuwh vachii ising iveer ing mahva.
Changvakonchu laaruw paam aangkheng aseemmah rirae Thangnang ing inuw vakhae ynlaar isa omnii khaena maensa ing amantukchir vasah thuurjaehka om Thangnang tanii ising iveer chong inche ichong ung.
Havana ising iveer i laaruw paam aapuh ae achuw ingkho manghuwmah ae; enuw ing manghuw ae nave alaar isa om Aafhuw chu khros na thehmahrom vachiipae.
Changvakonchu ynziihka omna,
“Mik ing amumah, na ing asiimah,
vokhehkho laaruw mee barungriirna isuwhmah aangkhengchu,
Thangnang aning amansiih ae khaena Thangnang ing asirpa.”
Thangnang ing inuw ynningna ynthiing laetha ajaarnache ymman-dangpeehpa, akhaechuve laetha ing aangkhenglaang ajongva. Chumna, Thangnang tanii ithuwhpak chong phanii ing ajongva.
Mee yngkheh ningna om laetha inche ataksah khaena amanghuwsa. Havivaange Thangnang ynthiing laetha inche Thangnang khaena aangkheng amanghuwsa.
Ataraene inuw laaruw paam tanii laetha ymphamahva; changvakonchu Thangnang ing ajenbathen laethachu ymphava, amana chembe Thangnang ing ynningna ngareh ing ympeeh aangkhengchu ymmanghuwnii khaenava.
Havana vakhae i laaruw paam ising iveer ing ymmanchuw chong ichong mahpung, changvakonchu laetha chong ing imanchuwka, laetha adeen ae ningnache laetha chong ichumchu ichongpung.

Achuw yngkheh laetha omah mee chuve Thangnang laetha kikthuurchu phamah, akhaechuve aning nache enuw pangsae, amanche enuwchu ama ing manghuwpeeh mahsae. Yngkhaena ynchii imbe laetha inche enuwchu asiksii ing amupae.
Laetha mee inche aangkhengna vajeer atuchirsa, changvakonchu ataksah chuve achuw ingkho vajeer tumah.
“Achuw ing Aafhuw barungriir manghuwka chong atahpeeh chehse?” Changvakonchu kenuwve Khrista barungriir kendeen-sahsa.
Kauw kanae ae, ki ing neningna laetha om mee ae ningna ichong vaang ing chong chehmah ing; chang-vakonchu hakchaang mee ynsuwh ing vokhehkho Khrista ningna iduung naepang vaang ichong ping.
Ki ing nenuwchu sangkhom kapeeh vachuw, ynchae buw kapeehmah vachuw; akhaechuve nenuw badaarcheh mahchuw; nenuw ing ataraen phanii ing chehmah richuw,

nenuw ataraenkho hakchaang mee ynsuwhjaeh nachuw. Nenuw nengkaarna kallak, ynnahnii vokhehkho asiksik suwhnii omjaehtah nachuw, nenuw hakchaang mee ynsuwh vokhehkho laaruw mee nunu inuwzii ing sijaehmah chuwkhang?
Nenuw achuw yngkheh ing nenriirnah, “Ki Pol mee ping,” amanche reentaang yngkheh inche, “Ki Apollo mee ping,” nenuw laaruw mee ynsuwhjaehmah chuwkhang?
Chunuwcha Apollo chu achuw vakhang? Pol chu achuw vakhang? Enuw enjaarna nenthacha vasah nong itupaetah, amanche Aafhuw ing enuw yngkheh kheh ningna nongtunii apeehsah thoh aanghakva.
Ki ing amuwchu kavorpa, amanche Apollo inche chiichu apeehpa, changvakonchu Thangnang ing amanruungva.
Amachu vanave amuw avor re chii apeeh meechu yntangamahpae, changvakonchu Thangnang pang inche amanruung vatah.
Amuw avor mee re chii apeeh mee chuve yngkhehpang vatah, enuw enongtu inuwzii ing entaksahsah nongmen phasa vaatae.
Kenuw chuve Thangnang nong ituhakpoh chupung; amanche nenuw chuve Thangnang ruwrae chuvachuw vokhehkho Thangnang eenchu vachuw.

Kaningna ympeeh vasah Thangnang tungsiih inuwzii ing, een itu aafhuw yngkheh vaang ing eenphambur kamangiirpa, amanche mee reentaang yngkheh ing ataklinache eenphambur amangiirpa. Changvakonchu mee vakhae inche ama taklinache ynsaangkhe kamangiirse tasana ynriimsa ae rasiing.
Jesu Khrista mahnaka achuw ingkho reentaang eenphambur mangiir chehmah.

Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing eenphambur amangiirchu sana ing, khampher ing, amen iruw rung ing, thing ing, fuwr ichong ing, sapuur ing mangiir nave, mee vakhae ing entu nong vakhaechu mandang vaata;

yngkhaena ynchii imbe Khrista ing ajuwnglaenche mee vakhae nongchu yndangchir vaata, ama inii nache mi ing aangkhenglaang mandangchir vaata; vokhehkho mi inche ama ama ing atu nongchu ynchiiva ichiichu itohchir vaata.
Achuw yngkheh ing eenphambur amangiirchu omjaeh nave, ama ing nongmen phasa vaata.
Achuw yngkheh mee anongtuchu mi inche kaangnave, ama imaangsahva changvakonchu ataksah chuve mi sungtanii ihungsuwh vaang ikarpeeh phasa vaata.
Achuw yngkheh ing Thangnang rumniieenchu mamaang nave, atakchu Thangnang ing mamaang vaata, yngkhaena ynchii imbe Thangnang rumniieen chuve ynthiingva, amachu nenuw vachuw.
Achuw tanga ingkho ataksah ynchaesamah rasiing. Nengkaarna laaruw paam losingna achuw yngkheh mee ing isingping tanaka manden nave, ama ing ising aambunii ing, ipang ynsuwhrasiing.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe havana laaruw paam tanii losing chuve Thangnang mik enna ipangva. Amachuve ynziihka omna, “Ising mee aechu enchong nache Thangnang ing asuwrpae”;
athar vokheh, “Ising mee ae ing emandenchu ikanii omahva ichii Thangnang ing amanghuwsa.”
Chukhaenache achuw ingkho mee ing atucheh aricheh khaena ruungniimah rasiing. Akhaechuve aangkhenglaang havi nentasahva.

Pol vatah rasiing, Apollo vatah rasiing, Kaiphas vatah rasiing, laaruw paam vatah rasiing, iring vakhangnare amanche ithii vakhangnare, ataraennii vatah rasiing vokhehkho nuwtanii vakhangnare, aangkhenglaang havi nentasahva,
nenuw i Khrista tanii vachuw; amanche Khrista inche Thangnang taniiva.
Mee ing kentak i Khrista meenae aepae vokhehkho ithuwhpak Thangnang chong rukuumtu meepae ichii ing imanden ae rasiing.
Atii athurfhuwseh yngkheh chuve thacha-fhuw om rukuumtu mee yngkheh ituwhpham suwhna.
Changvakonchu nenuw ing changmahka laaruw paam vajeer ing ki vajeer yntuchu kaningna chembe isiingpak peehvatah. Atatak chuve kataksah rapkho vajeer yntusamah ing.
Kataksah miraar rapkho manghuwmah ing, changkhang nakho havi inge kichu ymmanchum mahva; changvakonchu kichu vajeer yntu mee chuve Aafhuw chuva.

Chukhaenache Aafhuw ing ajungtheng mahri raentaang, aphachu ahenpha mahri raentaangche achuw ningnakho vajeer tumahruw. Aafhuw ing ynthim sungna ynthuurka om peeh vakhae chaap ireng tingche hembasuw vaata, vokhehkho barungriir ing aman-den chukho mandang vaata; amana chembe Thangnang tanii ympahsahchu ameesiir ing phasa vaata.

Kauw kanae ae, nenuw achuw yngkhehpang ingkho mee yngkheh khaena reentaang yngkheh taklina rumah tanuwka nenruungniimah ing, ynziih vasah nakhe ynraenjop sakmahnii ichiichu kenjaarna nenuw ing nemanghuwnii inche, nengkhaena katak re Apollo taklina aandangnii katuva.
Achuw ing nangchu asiksii ymbasuwva? Vokhehkho nang ing naphamah ynchii omkhang? Changva-konchu nang ing napharem vanave, yngkhaena naphamahri vaang iruung-chichuh vachii?

Atiive nenuw nenven bavasa! Atiive nenuw savang sachuw! Kenuw ynvaeru ing iruwng vaang paarsachuw! Sakna, kenuwkho nenuw thoh iruwng vaang ipaarnii khaenache, nenuw ing iruwng vaang ipaarchu ki ing kaadiksahnah.

Chukhaenache thikvachii mee ae vaang, Thangnang ing chongthang kenuwchu akuurchiimna ynghen basuwpa ichii ing kamandensahnah, akhaechuve laaruw paam nakho, vaarmee ae amanche mee vakhae maana ynniisahnii ing omsung.

Khrista khaena kenuw chuve ipang-pung; changvakonchu nenuw chuve Khrista ningna isingchu vachuw! Kenuwve suurnung, changvakonchu nenuw chuve pirnachuw! Nenuwve ympah nemphasa, changvakonchu kenuw chuve ynjasuwhmahchu kemphapa.
Apha ataraen phane kenuwve kenven chaamjaeh tahna amanche kenchii raarjaehna; peen yntukmah ung, rumor isah kenphanah amanche kengongnii jaarnii naemah;
Amanche kengkiksahrap ing nong kentusahva, siraap ympiae raenche bor kenpeeh ae; ymmanang ae raenche kengkhaangsah;
Kenthang mansik khang ae nare, isa ing kenthamsah ae. Kenuwve ataraen phanii ing laaruw paamne yntirsuwh peehchae vaang aangkhenglaangna lamchohnii ynsuwhsung.
Ki ing nenuwchu nening ynjaknii khaena chong havi kabaziih mahva, changvakonchu kaning kamansiih siti vaang ichii ing nenuwchu kaachahnii vachuw.
Nenuw ing Khrista thoh ruw ingki ing maensa naka ariirpeeh vachii lising suummeh omkhangnare, nempa nemmah, akhaechuve isa chong ajaarna Jesu Khrista ningna nenuwchu kabaring vachuw.
Chukhaenache ki ing kamaneemnahchuw kanu imanjii-peeh saruw.

Havi khaena rapche kaning kamansiihpak vokhehkho thachafhuw om kasiti Timothi chu neningting kajechiirpa. Apham siirna, ruwrthiing siirna, ki ing kaman-chuwchuw vaangkhe, Jesu Khrista ningna om kajii lamchu ama ing imanthangpeeh vaata.
Changvakonchu ki ing nening-na thengmah vakachii vaang, achuw yngkheh aenche yndingsae.
Changvakonchu Thangnang ing amanden ynsuwh nave apha aasenru ing ki thengva kata, changlaenche ynding mee ae enchong chumahka enruwreng manghuwva kata.
Akhae-chuve Thangnang iruwng lipah chuve chong ing mahva, changvakonchu ruwreng ingva.
Nenuw ynchii nengadikva? Ki ing neningna rumor thoh ynruw ing changmahka ningsiih ing vokhehkho iduwrjaeh laetha thohche thengkate?
Nenuw nengkaarna naamak itu omna ichii chong iseeng ing enriirpa, jinge ichii ing naamak itu havi thacha omah ae kaarnakho suwhmah; amachuve mee yngkheh ing ampa rumee thoh ijaarhak omsachuw!
Hava hangchii havi atu meechu nengkaar tanii thurva nenchii khaena japeehva nenchii changdenna nenuw yndingnii nachuw.
Ki katakrap ynvaemah khangningle, laetha inchembe ynvaeka jinge ichii nong atu meechu katak ynvaevaang ing Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ruming nache vajeer katupa.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista rumingna, nenuw re kalaetha thoh ing inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ruwreng thoh ynruw ing nenpurraenche,
nenuw ing hangchii mee havi ahakchaang maangnii khaenache umlae ting mansirruw, amana chembe Aafhuw Jesu aanii nache alaetha ikarpeeh phavaata.

Chukhae-nache baruw chor amakha manseeng kiirruw, amana chembe nenuw atum itharchu ynsuwhva nenta, akhaechuve nenuw i chor ynvaemahchu vachuw. Inuw manlaennii kuurva khaenache jaoti Khrista inche ympidehsa.
Chukhaenache inuw ing yngensii-mahnii baruw chor vokhehkho isamah chor ynvaerudeh inche, chor ynvaemah vokhehkho ichum tar thohche manlaennii kuurvachu tusataruw.
Nenuw ichuwhmah naamak itu mee aethoh ynruwhak mahruw ta ingka neningna chongthen kabaziihpa;

laaruw paamna isamah itu mee aethoh changmahka ikaam mee aethoh, vokhehkho lae ruthaksii irum mee ae thohkhe ynruwhakpoh mahdehruw kachiimahva, changchenreeh vanave nenuw laaruw paam tanii ympeenva nenchiiting bukna.

Changvakonchu ki ing kariirnah, atiive achuw mee yngkheh unae pasa ing naamak itu, ikaam, lae ruthaksii irum, achong isii, juw ynruw changmahka lamruw mee, changchii mee ae thohche ynruwhak mahruw, isahkho sahak mahruw ta ingka neningna kavebaziih sahnah.
Akhaechuve taangting ong meechu vajeer itunii khaena kavaanvaenii ynchii omkhang? Nenuw ing ruwrthiing sungna ong meechu vajeer nentumah vakhang?
Thangnang ing taangting ong meechu vajeer tuvaata. “Nengsung sahna isamah mee aechu asik ing bathiing aeruw.”
Nenuw nengkaar tanii achuw yngkheh ing mee taklina vaathuh abasuw tahna, ynthiing ae ningting siruchuw ing ichummah ae ningting vajeer tunii khaena isi thona omvachuw?
Vokhehkho ynthiing aenche laaruw paam vajeer tuvaatae ichii nemanghuw mahva? Laaruw paamchu nenuw ing vajeer tutanuwve, isiingpak vaathuhchu nenuw ing vajeer tunii nematik omahva?
Inuw ing vaarmee aechu vajeer tuvataruw ichii nenuw nemanghuw mahva? Amachu vanave, laaruw paam havane nenvathuhchu manchichehmah vanenchiiva!
Nengkaarna vaathuh isuwh omchu, vajeer tunii khaenache ruwrthiing sungna ynvaemah mee aechu nenuw ing nemanvaepae?
Havi nening aanjaknii ing kariirva. Nengkaarna chong amanchicheh achuw yngkheh ising mee sup om omahdehva?
Mee yngkheh ing yngkheh taklina vaathuh abasuwchu thachamah mee ae ningting vajeer tunii khaena isichakpae?

Chukhaenache atiive yngkheh re yngkheh chong amanthuh omchakna ichiichu atatak ing nenuw nensuurnii chuva. Amachang chembe nentaklina mee yngkheh ing araar inche athiseh ing sakmah khang? Amachang chembe nenuw nentaklina lam abaruwh inche athiseh ing sakseh mahkhang?
Nenuw nentakrap ing unae ningna nemanchae chaksa, vokhehkho nenraar chaksa.

Ichummah mee ae ing Thangnang iruwng lipah phamahnii ae ichii nenuw nemanghuw mahva? Nentaksah ynchaemahruw; nengkaarna ichuwhmah nongtu, lae ruthaksii irum, naamak itu om, pasar nireerna, rupanuw nireerna ichuwhmah ruw ingki om,
lamruw, sehmaner om, juw ynruw, achong isamahdeh amanche mee amanchae, enuw vakhae inge Thangnang iruwng lipahchu phamahnii ae.
Nenuw areh ing jinge ichii ing tiknachuw, changvakonchu Aafhuw Jesu Khrista rumingna vokhehkho Thangnang tanii ynthiing laetha ing nenuwchu ynchaampa, ymmanthiingpa amanche Ymmanchumpa.

Achuw yngkheh ing tavaata, “Isahfhuw inge ven khaenava, amanche ven inge isahfhuw khaenava.” Havi chumna, changvakonchu Thangnang ing aaniimeh i mamaang vaata. Hakchaang ive naamak tunii khaena mahva, Aafhuw khaenava, amanche Aafhuw inche hakchaang khaenava.
Thangnang ing Aafhuw chu amanringpa amanche inuw chukho aruwreng inche amanring vaata.
Nenuw nenghakchaang i Khrista hakchaang yngkhehva ichii nemang-huwmah vakhang? Ki ing Khrista hakchaangchu riningka ichuwhmah hakchaang thohche ruw mangki kate? Supru rumahnii!
Vokhehkho ichuwhmah rupanuw thoh ruw ingki mee inche amathoh hakchaang yngkhehpangsae ichii nemanghuwmah vakhang? Havi ynziihka om basahva, “Ynniimehchu hakchaang yngkhehpang vaata.”
Changvakonchu Aafhuw thoh yntuw mee chuve amathoh laethana yngkhehpangsae.
Naamak itu bathenruw. Mee ing reentaang isii atuchaap chuve hakchaang ataang taniiva; changva-konchu naamak itu mee ae chuve ataksah ahakchaang ajeehnii sahva.
Thangnang ing neningna ympeeh hakchaang i ynthiing laetha eenva ichii nenuw nemanghuw mahva? Nentaksah tanii mahva, changva-konchu Thangnang taniiva;
Ama ing nenuwchu amen ing eeriipa. Chukhaenache nenghakchaang inge Thangnang manpahniiruw.
Atarae nenuw ing nenvebaziih chongla khaena chembe, mee ing rakhii iniimah ing sakna.
Changvakonchu naamak itu om inem khaenache pasar chaap arumeesah omrasiing; amanche rupanuw chaap afhuwsarsah omrassing.
Fhuwsar ing arumee taklina nong tuvachiichu turasiing, amanche rumee ichenkho afhuwsar taklinache aanghakjaeh ing turasiing.

Rupanuw ing ataksah ahakchaang pangchu aafhuw mahva, changvakonchu afhuwsar chukho ynvaeva; amavaangche fhuwsar inchenkho ataksah ahakchaang pangchu aafhuw mahva, changvakon-chu arumee chukho ynvaeva.

Nenuw nentaksah ing thaemin hitanuwka vokhehkho ithamnii khaena apha yngkheh manaenuwna, amomgpang khaena nenuw ing nengaanrunii mahnaka nenuw yndahnii mahruw; amanche nentaksah ing nenduur-chehmah khaena nentakchu umlae ing ymbatheem chehniimah ing nenuw athar vokheh onghakruw.
Ki ing kariir havi chonghak mahva, irunii khaenache kariirsahva.

Changvakonchu mee vakhae ing ki vaange ichiichu kaadiknah, changva-konchu mee yngkheh kheh ing Thangnang tanii kikthuur adeensa, mee yngkheh inche havi khaena, reentaang yngkheh inche reentaang yngkheh kikthuur amachu adeensa.
Atarae ki ing rakhii iniimah aere muwkhuwnuw ae ningna kariirnah, nenuw ing ki vaange rakhii niiru ing ong inche nengkhaena sakseh vaata.
Changvakonchu nenuw ing nemandenchu duurchehmah tanuwve, rakhiichu niiruw. Mi ichuwh thoh ynchim ing nenbarungriirna mandenva nenchii changve rakhii inii inche saksehna.
ama ing ynsaefhuw nave, atak rakhii niiru ing ongrasiing, changmahka afhuwsar thoh athar aanruniichu turasiing, amanche afhuwsar inchen-kho arumeechu ynsaefhuwmah rasiing.
Reentaang reentaang ae ningna ki ing kariirnah, Aafhuw tanii mahva, achuw yngkheh unae ing arumeechu athacha omah mee naka arumee inche ipaarhakchu runave, ama ing arumeechu ynsaefhuwmah rasiing.
Amanche achuw yngkheh rupanuw ing afhuwsar inche athacha omah mee naka, afhuwsar inche ipaarhakchu runave, rupanuw inche afhuwsarchu ynsaefhuwmah rasiing.

Yngkhaena ynchii imbe athacha omah fhuwsarchu arumee thacha ajaarnache Thangnang ing amanthiingpa, vokhehkho thacha omah rumeechu afhuwsar ajaar nache amanthiingpa; amachumah nave ensitichu manthiing mahnii ae, changvakonchu amachu vanave ensiti aechu manthiingsae.

Changvakonchu athacha omah mee inche ynsaefhuw ningka tanave ynsaefhuw tahrasiing, kauw kanae ynreehmah, kasar kajuwr ynreehmah, changche ichii nachembe Thangnang ing aphuwp ae dernache ongmahsae. Thangnang ing inuwchu idae ing ipaarnii khaenache yngeenva.

Rupanuw, nang ing nafhuwsarchu karchehva kata karcheh mahning ichiichu ynsaangkhe namanghuwse? Vokhehkho fhuwsar nang incha narumeechu karchehva kata karcheh mahning ichiichu ynsaangkhe namanghuwse? Thangnang ing yngeen inuwzii ing paarruw.
Thangnang ing mee yngkheh kheh ningna kikthuur pika vokhehkho a-een inuwzii inche sirasiing. Ki ing ruwrthiing vakhae chaapna changche ichii ing kamansirpae.
Vinchiip vasah achuw yngkheh meechu a-eenva? Ama vinchiipmah mee ynsuwhmah rasiing. Vinchiipmah achuw yngkheh meechu a-eenva? Ama vinchiipmah inche ongrasiing.
Vinchiip kho yntanga mahva, vinchiip mahkho yntanga mahva, changvakonchu Thangnang chonghak ingah chuva.
Thangnang ing yngeen anong nakhe ongjaehtah ae rasiing.
Nang ing meesuwh ing naonglae yngeenva? Ama khaena jamahra, changvakonchu nang ing ruwkuwrjoh phataniive, amachu tuniira.
Akhaechuve meesuwh ing aonglae Aafhuw nongting a-een meechu Thangnang ningtanii ruwkuwrjoh mee chuva; amavaangche ruwkuwrjoh aphavasah ing a-een meechu Jesu Khrista ameenae chuva.
Nenuwchu amen ing eeriipa; meesuwh inche ongmahruw.
Kauw kanae ae, atakchu a-eenpeeh raennii vaangkhe, mee vakhae ing Thangnang thohche ongjaeh rasiing.
Atii rakhii iniimah ae khaena ki ing Aafhuw chonghak phamah ing, changvakonchu Aafhuw Thangnang tanii tungsiih aphavasah thachafhuw om mee yngkheh vaangkhe, ki ing kamandenchu kariirsahva.
Chukhaenache inuw yntaklina om ijachaam khaena chembe havi sakna, amachuve, nang ing ongsahjaeh vataniive ongsajaeh tahra.
Nangchu rakhii iniivasah vachii? Ynsaenii jongmah. Nangchu rakhii iniimahri vachii? Rakhiinii khaena jongmah.

Changvakonchu nang ing rakhii niitaniive isii omah, amanche lunghah ing rakhii niinave ataklina isii omah. Changvakonchu changchii ae inge hakchaang tingche ijachaam phavaatae, ki ing nenuwchu havi tanii karpeeh ningchuwka kachiinah.
Kauw kanae ae, ki ing havi kariirnii ichuve: Apha i hunganeengsa; atiive arumee om ae inche omah vaangkhe ta ae rasiing;
ichap ae inche ichapmah vaang, rotharoh ae inche rotharoh mahvaang ta ae rasiing; amanche peeh aarii mee ae inche enrutumsah isiihfhuw engariimah vaang ing ta ae rasiing;
Laaruw paam tanii peehchae asichinnii ae inche ama ing abarungriir amanruwh dehmah vaangkhe ta ae rasiing, akhaechuve atarae om laaruw paam i seehpak mahnii.
Nenuw nenbarungriir fhuwm bavaeru ing ongchu ki ing kaadiknah. Rakhii iniimah mee inche Aafhuw chu ynsaangkhe manpensa kate taka Aafhuw nongchu itunii khaena amandennah.
Changvakonchu rakhii iniivasa mee inche arumeechu ynsaangkhe manpen kate taka laaruw paam peehting abarungriir aman-ruwhnah;

vokhehkho abarungriir ynnii suwhna amanche rakhii iniimah rupanuw re lunghah inchenkho, ynsaangkhe hakchaang nakho, laetha nakho ynthiingnii khaena Aafhuw nong khaenache abarungriir amanruwhnah; changvakonchu rakhii iniivasa mee inche afhuwsarchu ynsaangkhe manpen kate taka laaruw paam peehting abarungriir amanruwhnah.

Havi nenuw ing kaaniiva nenchii khaena kariirva, nentaklina chaang kadumahva, changvakonchu ynsuwhchak ing, vokhehkho nening amurniimah ing Aafhuw nong tutahna nenuw ing barungriir iruwhdeh nenchehnii khaenava.
Achuw yngkheh ing juwr akhuwvasa lunghah ningna isajaeh ing sichehmah vachii ing omnave rakhiinii ae ing sakvaata, amachu inche isiiting bukmahnii ae.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing abarungrirr isajaeh ing mangiircheh naka juwr akhuwvasa sanuwchu isajaeh ing rukuum atupeeh thoh ynruw ing ikhaang chehnave amachu isasehva.
Amatah nache pasarpa inche lunghah binave saksa, changvakonchu abimah mee ningna chembe athiseh ing saksehna.
Rakhii iniivasa rupanuw chuve afhuwsar aring raentaang akusi omah; changvakonchu afhuwsarchu thiknave, ama ing amanden achuw yngkheh thohche Khrista rumingna rakhiinii ruvaata.
Changvakonchu kavajeer nachembe rakhii iniireehmah inche akhaena sakseh vaata. Ki ing kakharsahnah, ki Thangnang laetha kadeensa.
Atarae umlae ruthaksii ting empeeh peehchae khaena chembe, inuw vakhae ing ymmanghuw vasah omna. Ynghuw ichii inge yndingnii suwhna, changvakonchu ningsiih inchembe ynseemnah.
Achuw yngkheh mee inche kive kamanghuw chirsa tanaka manden nave, ama ing manghuw vachiichu manghuw mahri.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing Thangnang chu aning mansiih nave, ama meechu Aafhuw inche amanghuwsa.

Chukhaenache umlae ruthaksii ting empeeh peeh isah khaena chembe, lae ruthaksii inge laaruw paamna yntanga mahva ichii amamdangniisa; inuw ing Thangnang yngkhehpang mahnaka reentaang omah ichii ymmanghuwsa.
Akhaechuve thangbaenna chang-mahka laaruw paamna lae aechu omkhang ae nare, havi vaange lae inempak amanche aafhuw inempak omna,

changvakonchu ynningna chembe apa Thangnang yngkhehpang omna; Aafhuw ningtanii peeh aang-khenglaang isuwh chirva amanche inuw chuve Aafhuw khaena omvamuw; amanche Aafhuw yngkhehpang Jesu Khrista chu omna, ama ajaarnache peeh aangkhenglaang re inuw i omvamuw.

Changvakonchu ynghuw ichii ive mee aangkhenglaang ningna omah. Achuw yngkheh chuve ataraen phanii ing anunu ing lae ruthaksii irum barungriir aomjaeh tahna lae ruthaksii ting empeeh vasah peehvaang ensahnah; amanche ichum ynraar ynghuwchehnii enruthuwh-chu suurka, isahfhuw ensah inche manthiing mahsung ichii ing emandenpa.
Isahfhuw peeh inche inuwchu Thangnang thoh ynneengnii mahva, inuw ing samahkhang manuwre yntanga maangmahmuw, sakhang manuwre athiseh ing isaseh khommahva.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing nentu nenricheh havi inge isuur ae ningna khi mansiinii ynsuwhkho arusa tanuwna ynriimsaruw.
Amachuve, lae ruthaksii eenna achuw yngkheh ing thaemin nasahrae imunave, barungriir isuur mee ningnache lae ruthaksii ting ympi vasah peehchu isahnii khaena athiseh ing ynjakniimah niikhang?
Amatah nache nauw nanae khaena Khrista ithiichu namanghuw natu nari inge namamaangpa.
Jinge ichii ing unae ae taklina isii tuchuwka amanche enuw ing ichum ynraar manghuwchehnii enruthuwhchu mansuh chuwka nenuw ing Khrista taklina isii nentupa.
Ama khaenache isahnii peeh inche kauw kanae aechu khi mansiinii vachii vanave, kauw kanae aechu khi mansiiniimah ing, ki athar vokheh sha supsa samahning.
Ki ruwkuwrjoh meemah ping-khang? Ki chongthang mah pingkhang? Ki Aafhuw Jesu Khrista chu kamu vasah meemah pingkhang? Nenuw i kanongtu aanla chumah vachuwkhang?

Reentaang ae ningna chongthang ynsuwhmah khangningle, neningna chembe chongthang churap-ping; chukhaenache nenuw ing Aafhuw thoh yngkhehpang ing omchuw inge, ki i chongthang ning ichiichu nemandangsa.
Kataklina chaang yngen mee ae ningna kaangahsahnii ing havi kariirva.
Kenuwcha isahnii innii khaena kencheh omah vakhang?
Reentaang chongthang ae amanche Aafhuw anae ae vokhehkho Pitar, enuw ae vaang kikho karumee thoh ynruwhak kacheh mahva?
Changmahka Ki re Barnabas kenuwkho kenringnii khaena nong itu kencheh mahva?
Achuw inche ataksah lerchii ing laarchang nong atu omkhang? Vomrip phinka aanla asahmah achuw omchakne?
Ki ing laaruw mee nunu inche hava vakhae i ichong pingkhang? Havi vajeer chonghak ingkho ariirmah vakhang?
Havi Mosi vajeer chonghak nache ynziih vasahva, “Siircharchu shaang namanchaniirae anerku iphuwp sakmahnii.” Thangnang ing siirchar khaena akhar vakhang?
Havi inuw yngkhaena atatak ing ariirmah vakhang? Inuw vakhae khaena havi abaziihva, akhaechuve ruwrae aatu vokhehkho aakuum inche sarup phava kachiiva ichii manden naka shaangchu ruwpva chiiva.
Kenuw ing neningna laetha tanii amuw vornungka, neningtanii ikanii phafhuw kuum nungve, amachu iruwpak nong vakhang?

Reentaang ae rap ingkho nening tanii iphafhuw emanden raenche, kenuw inche thihakmah nungkhang! Changchii ruwrengchu chimah ung, changvakonchu Khrista tanii isa chong khaenache parden aomniimah ing aangkhenglaangna kengkhaangsahva.
Rumniieenna nong atuae inche rumniieen tanii ensahfhuw emphanah vokhehkho thiimkungna ipeehfhuw apeeh mee inche sarup topoh aphanah ichii nenuw ing nemanghuwsa.
Amavaange isa chong aatong mee aechu enong entunii nache enringniichu phava chiipae ichiichu Aafhuw ingkho ajeerpa.

Changvakonchu ki ing havana enunu vakhae havi manjiimah ing, ki ing sarup iphanii khaena chong havi kabaziih mahva. Achuw mee yngkheh ing karuungniichu ikaniimah ting abasuw ynthong vaniive, ki kakhaena chembe ithii ing sakna.
Ki ing isa chong katongtahna, karuungsahnii yntanga omah; akhae-chuve kataklina itumah arumah ing imanderka omna; Chumna ki isa chongchu tongmah ningve, kakhaena chembe ijaniisapa!
Kadiksah ing kanongchu tuningve iphafhuw nongmen omna, changvakonchu katufhuwrem nongva ichii ing katuva, akhaechuve Thangnang ing kaningna hava nongruw i ymmansirpa.
Amana chembe kaphafhuw kanongmenchu ynchiiva? Isa chong katong tahna, amen omah ing katongnii inche, vokhehkho isa chong nong katu khaena iphapham isuwh jongru ing katuva.
Ki mee vakhae tanii ruwkuwrjoh mee vakhangningle, mee aechu athiseh ing ikhuumnii khaena katak i mee vakhae meenae ynsuwhsahping.

Jehudi aechu kavaraam chehnii khaena, ki ing Jehudi ae kaarna enuw vaangche ong ing; vajeer chonghak derna ong aechu ikhuumnii khaena kataksahchu vajeer chonghak derna ongmah khangningle, vajeer chonghak derna ong ae ningnache vajeer chong-hak derna ong vaang ongning.

Havi vaange ki ing reentaang mee ae kaarna nong katurae, reentaang mee ae vaang ing ong ing, akhaechuve enuwchu ikhuumnii khaena chenva. Havana katu kari inge Thangnang chonghakchu kamanjiimah mahva, changvakonchu atatak ing kataksah i Khrista dernache ongping.
Ki ing isuur mee aechu kakhuum chehnii ae khaena isuur ae ningna isuur ynsuwhping; kachehsah ruwreng inche mee topoh ae bahamve ikarpeehnii khaenache aangkheng tachu ynsuwh-sing.
Hava vakhae katu i isa chong khaena katuva amana chembe nenuw thohche sarup phahak vakata.
Itaen yntaarnii ae ing engkheng taen aeka mee yngkhehpang ing nongmen aphavatah. Chukhaenache nenuw nongmen aphanii inche taenruw.

Itaen yntaarniina achehnii ing atuther mee chaap ing ataksahchu aangkhenglaangna achehnii ing atunah. Changvakonchu enuw inchembe maangvachii phurchiichu iphanii khaena taennae, inuw chuve maangmahdeh vachii phurchiichu iphanii khaena taenmanuw.
Chu-khaenache ki ing achinii ipha ing itaenping ichii ynghuwmah tumah ing, ikanii mahna siiraangchu sukmah ing;
changvakonchu ki ing mee reentaang ae ningna isa chong tongningka, kataksah rapkho matik ichamah ynsuwh ingkho arusa ta ingka kahakchaang sahchu manpir ingka kachehnii ing katusahnah.
Kauw kanae ae, havi ki ing manghuw tanuwka kachiinah, amachuve, Mosi aanuwzii inuw vakhae afhuw fhuwven ae inche ruwrduh derna siaeka amanche Isen Chifhuwchu engaraenpa.
Amanche engkheng ing ruwrduh sungna vokhehkho Isen Chifhuw sungnache Mosi ningna baptais entupa.
Enuw vakhae ing laetha tanii thaeminchu isah emphapa
vokhehkho laetha ringnii infhuw chukho enginpohpa; enganuw ajii Rungfhuw ringnii laetha tanii chiichu enginpohpae, ama Rungfhuw chuve Khrista chuva.
Changvakonchu enuw aanemhak ae ningna Thangnang ing penmahsa; chukhaenache enuw vakhaechu paamfhuw nache ithiichu emphapa.
Atiive enuw ing isamah itu engadik vaangkhe, inuw ingkho eedikniimah ing hava vakhae inge yntaklina ynchahnii ing amandeengnii chusa.
Enuw areh aenche lae ruthaksii enrum ae vaangkhe nenuw tamahdehruw; mee aenche isahnii innii khaena ong aeka vokhehkho ynlakniiting emanguurnah ichii i ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirsa.
