Amanche mee areh aenche naamak itu engomtahna, mee lising songthum arii ynthum inii nikheh pangna ithiiae vaangkhe naamak itu omah rasiing.
Vokhehkho enuw mee areh aenche Thangnang chu chaang engen khaena, enuw chukho baruwr ing bachuk aeka ithiiae vaangkhe inuw ingkho Thangnang chu chaang ensamah manuw.
Amanche enuw mee areh aenche thaechii thaenam ing enchong tahna aamaang ing amamaangchir ae vaangkhe, inuwkho thaechii thaenam chongmah taruw.

Aangkhenglaang havi yndangnii khaena entaklina isuwhva, amanche suwnthar hungvina inuw ing eensiijaeh-nii ing abaziihva. Yngkhaena ynchii imbe inuw i laaruw paam chivachii hunganeeng aphana iringvamuw.
Chukhaenache kabarungriir reep-jaehna tanaka amanden mee inche isiiting ibuw arusa tasana ynriimsa rasiing.

Nenuwchu mee ing yndaar achehmah umlae inche isuwrmahri, changvakonchu Thangnang chuve thachafhuwva, nenuw ing nenchehsah taklina athiseh ing nenuwchu batheem-nii khaenache Aafhuw ing rumahnii; changvakonchu yndaar nenchehnii inche batheem thoh ynruw ing ynlaenchehnii lam iseempeeh vaata.
Chukhaenache kaanchaarfhuw ae, lae ruthaksii irum bathenruw.
Ki ing ising mee ae ningna kariirvaang ichongping; kariir i ikharpeehruw.
Aafhuw thaemin kam taklina borchu Khrista asii changden thoh ymphahakmah vakhang? Inuw ing tar ymbakhiichu Khrista ahakchaang changden thoh ymphahakmah vakhang?
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe inuw nemsakhang manuwre tar yngkhehpang vokhehkho hakchaang yngkhehpang chuvamuw, akhaechuve tar yngkhehpang tanii ymphahak pohva.
Hakchaang taniina Isrel mee aechu eebuwrpeeh aeruw; enuw ing Thangnang ting empeeh vasah isahfhuw peeh ensahchu thiimkung thohche iphafhuw phahakmah ae khang?
Changmaniive ki ing ynchii kariirniiva? Lae ruthaksii ting peehchae ympivasahchu peeh yngkhehva changmahka lae ruthaksii-chu peeh yngkhehva ta ingka riir ingkhang?

Changchen mahva, reentaang mee ae ing thiimkungna peeh empichuve umlae tingche empeehva, havi Thangnang ningting mahva kachiiniiva. Chukhaenache nenuw ing umlae thohche iphafhuw iphahakchu idiksamah ing.
Nenuw ing Thangnang re umlae kam tanii inhak rumahnii; Thangnang thaemin isahnii nare umlae thaemin isahnii nache isahak rumahnii.
Changmahka inuw vakhae ing Thangnang aangae chiiniimah ing daetaruw chang? Inuw ing Thangnang chungna ipirsehping tamanuwka mandentaruw chang?
Mee achuw ingkho ataksahpang khaena jongmah rasiing, changvakonchu meekhae nakho kharpeeh rasiing.
Nenuw ing kithiirna enjuwr peehkha nenbarungriirna isah aruse rumah ichii kharpakru ing saruw.
“Akhaechuve laaruw paam sungna om aangkhenglaang i Aafhuw ningtanii chirva.”
Thachamah ae kaarna achuw yngkheh ing nenuwchu imaar yngeen aechu sinungka tatanuwve, nenbarungriirna isah aruva arumahva tanuwna kharmahruw, nemaana envesiihchu sajaeh tahruw.
Chang-vakonchu achuw yngkheh ing neningna havi laeting ympivasahva tanaka neningna riirnave, nenbarungriir ing amanghuw vakhaka samahruw.

Ichum ynraar ynghuwnii barungriir ki ing kariirchu nengkhaenarap kariirmahva, reentaang ae khaena chenva; chukhaenache reentaang achuw yngkheh ichum ynraar barungriir ynghuw inche ruwkuwrjoh ing ongsah ingchu ynchii khaena vajeer yntuva?
Ki ing kasahfhuw khaena Thangnang manpah ningve, ynchii khaena achuw yngkheh ing isahfhuw khaena kamanpah nache isamah ing ichongva.
Nentu nenri chaapna nenuw ing nensah vakhangnare, aangkheng-laangna Thangnang alaar isa yndangnii ing turuw.
Jehudi ae, Grik ae, vokhehkho Thangnang ruwrthiing ae ningnache khi mansiinii tumahruw.
Ki ing mee vakhae saknii khaenache kataksah kaaniiva kachii bathen ingka, mee aangkheng apennii khaena vokhehkho ikarpeehchu mee aangkheng ing iphanii khaena katu kari vaange nenuwkho turuw.
Nenuw ing aangkhenglaangna kichu eensii sachuwka vokhehkho neningna manchuwchuw ingka kaman-sirchuw amakha icheepther ing nengah khaena kamanpah sahnahchuw.
Changvakonchu pasarpa rusae chuve Khrista va, amanche rupanuw rusae chuve afhuwsar va, vokhehkho Khrista rusae chuve Thangnang va ichii i nenuw ing ynghuw kaadiknah.
Pasar ing arusae mangkhum naka athamsah changmahka Thangnang isa chongchu jeernave atak arusae ynsuwh Khrista chu aajamahva.

Vokhehkho rupanuw inche arusae mangkhumru ing athamsah chang-mahka Thangnang chongchu jeernave atak arusae ynsuwh Khrista chu aajamahva; chukhaenache jinge ichii rupanuwchu arusae amangkuh rupanuw thoh aanghak jaehva.
Akhaechuve rupanuw ing arusae mangkhummah nave ama asam mangkuh rasiing; changvakonchu asam aten changmahka amangkuh rupanuw chu ningjaknii vakhaka, arusaechu mangkhum rasiing.
Pasar chuve Thangnang tanii masak vokhehkho alaar isa amandang vakhaka, ama arusae mangkhummah vachiiva; changvakonchu rupanuw chuve pasar alaar isachu amandangniiva.
Akhaechuve rupanuw tanii pasar suwhmah, changvakonchu pasar tanii rupanuw isuwhva.
Amanche rupanuw khaena pasar aseem mahva, changvakonchu pasar khaena rupanuw aseemva.
vaarmee ae khaena rupanuw ing arusae amangkhum inche afhuwsar derna ongva ichii amandangnii omva chiiva.
Changkhang nare Aafhuw ningna chembe pasar ynvaeru ing rupanuw suwhmah amanche rupanuw ynvaeru ing pasar suwhmah.
Akhaechuve rupanuw ing pasar tanii isuwh vaangkhe, pasar kho amavaangche rupanuw jaarna isuwhva; amanche peeh aangkhenglaang i Thangnang tanii isuwh chirva.
Rupanuw ing mee kaarna arusae mangkhumru ing Thangnang ting athamchu isava isamahva ichiichu nenuw nentaksah ing mandensaruw.
Pasar asamchu suwnave akhaena ichohniiva,
changvakonchu rupanuw ing asam suwnave aningnache ympahniiva.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing havi khaene kharther tanuwve, ki ing riirning kachii chuve kening nakho changmahka ruwrthiing vakhae nakho, irumniina reentaang nunu yntanga omah.
Neningna kajeriir chongne jemanpah mahchuwng, yngkhaena ynchii imbe nenuw nemeekong ing sakniivachii athi ing asakniimah ahenreensa.
Amaensana nenuw ing ruwrthiing sungna ynlehmahchuw ingkhe ikiinii omna ichii kasiisa; amachu ki ing topoh kathachahnah.
Amachuve ichumchu iseengjaeh ing yndangnii khaena nengkaarna ynlehmah chukho ombachiiting buksa.
Nenuw ing apham yngkhehna nenpur raenche nensahpohchu Aafhuw ningsiih thaemin mahva.
Akhaechuve nenuw ing nensahrae mee vakhae ing ataksahsah athen rutum asahnah, amanche mee yngkheh ing aven chaamna, reentaang yngkheh ing juw baruwna.

Ynchiiva chang! Nengeen nengeen nacha isah arumahva? Changmahka Thangnang ruwrthiingchu nenjuumva chang? Vokhehkho endeensahmah aechu ningjak nenpeehniiva? Ki ing neningna havi khaene ynchii riirtentah tachuwka yngennii vachuw? Ki ing nenuwchu manpah kachuw chang? Ki ing havi khaene manpahmah dehchuwng?
Ki ing neningna kapeeh chuwkha, Thangnang ningtanii kaphasahva, amachuve, Aafhuw Jesu chu arensah jaen nache Jesu ing tarchu jerika,
vokhehkho Thangnang chu amanpah inuwna bakhiika ariir, “Havi nenuw nengkhaena kasha chuva; Ki yndennii khaena havi turuw.”
Havihtoh aanghakjaeh ing ensah inuwnache, Jesu ing athar kam chukho jerika ariir, “Hava kam i kasii ing kaseem ithar chongiir chuva; nenuw ing havi nenginchak raenche ki yndennii khaena turuw.”
Havi ariirnii chuve, nenuw ing tar havi nensahchak raenche vo-khehkho hava kam i nenginchak raenche, Thangnang ing ajungtheng mahri raentaang Jesu ithiichu nemanthangniiva.
Chukhaenache ynjasuwhmah ing Aafhuw tar asah vokhehkho kam havi ain achuw mee yngkhehchu Aafhuw hakchaang re asii nache araarpa.
Amatah nache amaensana ama ataksah ing yngensa rasiing, vokhehkho jinge ichii ing tarchu sarasiing, amanche kam tanii chukho inrasiing.
Aafhuw chu mandenru ing asah ain meechu ataksah vajeer yntunii ing asah ain sahva.
Havi khaene nengkaarna mee aanem ing suurniinae, inakho naknae, amanche areh ae inche thiknae.
Changvakonchu inuw yntak sahsahna isajaeh ing vajeer yntusa manuwve, Thangnang ing vajeer itupeeh mahnii.
Changvakonchu inuw vajeer yntu inge laaruw paam thoh ynruw ing isii ting ymbukniimah khaenache, Aafhuw ing inuwchu eechahniiva.
Kauw kanae ae, havi khaene nenuw ing isahnii khaena nenpurraen-che yngkheh yngkheh ynghahruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing aven chaam nave, nenuw ipur chuwchu Thangnang ing vajeer atuniimah ing a-een sungna sasa rasiing. Amana reentaang areh iriirfhuw chong chuve katheng raenche riirpehva kata.
Kauw kanae ae, atarae nenuw ing ynthiing laetha kikthuur khaena nemanghuw mahchu idikmah ing.
Nenuw reentaang mee ing nengonglae achong omah lae ruthaksii inche aasiir aphuwting ymmansiva ichii nemanghuwsa.

Chukhaenache achuw ingkho Thangnang laetha ajaar inche Jesu i siraap aphava tanaka riircheh mahnii, amanche achuw ingkho ynthiing laetha ajaar ing mahnaka Jesu i Aafhuw chuva ichii riircheh mahnii ichii nenuw ing nemanghuw inche kaadiknah.
amanche nongtunii asiksik omna, changvakonchu Aafhuw yngkhehpang nongtunii vatah;
amanche nong tuchehnii asiksik omna, changvakonchu ataksahsah nongchu itunii khaena Thangnang ing ympeeh barungriir chuvatah.
Laetha tanii iseengkiirchu mee aangkheng saknii khaena yngkheh kheh nache apeehpa.
Akhaechuve mee yngkheh ningna laetha ing losing suwhnii chong apeehnah, amanche reentaang yngkheh ningnache laetha churap inche ynghuwchehnii chong apeehpa.
Mee reentaang yngkheh ningnache laetha churap inche thachanii vokhehkho mee reentaang yngkhehna laetha inche ina amandam chehnii kikthuur apeehpa.

Laetha ing mee yngkheh ningna laetho ituchehnii apeehnah amanche reentaang yngkheh ningnache Thangnang chongjeernii, vokhehkho reentaang yngkheh inche laetha taniimah kikthuurva ichii ynghuwnii ruwreng apeehnah, yngkheh ningnache mee ing amanghuw chehmah asiksik bari ing ichongnii apeehnah, amanche yngkheh ningna asiksik bari tanii chongchu abarichehnii apeehpa.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw ing amanden inuwzii ing nong aangkheng havi mee vakhae ningna semsiirka, laetha yngkhehpang churap inche nong atusa.

Amana Jehudi ae changmahka Reentaang mee ae vakhangnare, meesuwh ae changmahka ruwkuwrjoh mee ae vakhangnare, laetha yngkheh ing ama vakhaechu hakchaang yngkhehpang eensuwhnii ing baptais ymmantupa; vokhehkho inuw vakhaechu denkhehpang nache ynginpohnii khaenache laethachu ympeehpa.
Hakchaang i mari yngkhehpang mahva changvakonchu nempakna.
Khi inche tanaka, kive kik mahping vakhaka hakchaang tanii mahping ichii inche hakchaang tanii mahva ichii rumahnii.
Amanche na inche ki chuve kik mahping vakhaka hakchaang tanii mahping tanave, hakchaang tanii mahva ichii rumahnii.
Hakchaang aangkhengchu mik pangnacha, chong siinii unakhe omvaata? Aangkheng inche chong siinii ynsuwhpoh nacha barim siinii unakhe omvaata?
Changvakonchu atiive Aafhuw Thangnang ing aadik inche hakchaangna yngkheh yngkhehchu mari inae ing ymmangom peehpa.
Aangkheng inche mari yngkhehpang ynsuwh nacha hakchaang chucha unakhe omvaata?
Jinge ichii ing mari nempakna, changvakonchu hak-chaang chuve yngkhehpang vatah.

Chunuwchenve mik inche nang i kaningna yntangakho ikanii omahchii tanaka kik ningnache tacheh mahnii; changmahka rusae inche vokheh nang i kaningna chembe yntanga khomah vachii tanaka khi ningnache tacheh mahnii.
Ynlehjoh ingla, hakchaangna aasuurseh churap khamah naka, hakchaang ing yntanga tucheh mahnii;
amanche athiseh ing bariimmah vaanchiiva tamuwka yngkhar mari vakhae churachu ymbariimnii sehseh omna, vokhehkho ymmari isaseh aeng abariimmah ae isamahseh vakhae chukho inempak isaseh ing yngennah.
Changvakonchu ymbariimmah mari taklinache athiseh ing Thangnang ing ymbariimsahnii ipipeehka hakchaang-chu ymmantuwpeehpa.
Chutahnache hakchaangna asiksik ing aomniimah khaenache mari vakhaechu yngkheh ing areh ae khaena ynchimsiir ing ymbariimsahnii khaenava.
yngkheh inche ijachaam phanave, mari aangkhenglaang inche ijachaam aphanah; amanche mari yngkheh taklina bariimsah manuwve, mari aangkheng inche enrotha rohna.
Atii nenuw Khrista hakchaang ynsuwh sachuw vokhehkho amari yngkhehter chukho ynsuwh sachuw.

Amanche Thangnang ing ruwrthiing sungnache aangkheng mancha chirka asiihpa, amaensa nache chongthang ae, avomaniina jaephar ae, avomanthumniina aanchuw mee ae, aanuwna laetho nongtu ae, ina mandamnii ruwreng apeeh mee ae, ibomnii nong atu mee ae, aapuh mee ae vokhehkho asiksik chong ichongnii amanghuw mee aechu ympisahpa.
Enuw vakhae i chongthang mahpae vokhehkho Jaephar chumahpae amanche laetho nongtu mee mahpae.
Amanche ina mandamnii kikthuur aphamahpae vokhehkho reentaang iruwpak chong ing ichongcheh chirnii kikthuur aphamahpae amanche reentaang chongchu abariniicheh kikthuur aphachir mahpae.
Nenbarungriir ingkhe aangkaangseh kikthuurchu nenlaetha iruwhdeh ing idikruw.
Amanche neningna isaseh lam mansiipeeh vakachuw.
Ki ing laaruw paam chong vakhae vokhehkho vaarmee ae chong chongkhang ningle ningsiihchu omah ningve, ki ahuwruwsa ynling siirpeeh re kanta ynlingthoh aanghakjaehsing.

Amanche Thangnang chong jeernii kikthuurchu ki ing phakhang ningle, ynvaraam chehmah ithuwh chong aangkheng vokhehkho thiimziih manghuwkhang ningle, kathacha ing bung vakhaechu apham peencheh khangningle, ningsiihchu omah ningve yntanga mahsing.
Ki ing kadeensah vakhae pichircheh khang ningkho, vokhehkho kahakchaang rap ikho mi sungting bathunii khaena pikhang ningle, ningsiihchu omah ningve, katuungsahnii ynchiikho omah.
Ningsiih inge apha iseehpak ing akhaangnah vokhehkho mee achaar-peehnah; ningsiih inge kallakmah, ataksahpang khaena kharmah, yndingmah;
ningsiih inge ithipak ing omah, ataksah khaenapang jongmah, barung siksiimah, ningsiih inge isamahchu mandenmah,
isamah nache rotha manrohmah, changvakonchu ichum nache rotha amanrohnah,
aangkhenglaangna abadaarsa, aangkheng athachasa, aangkhenglaangna ningmanden amangomsa, aangkhenglaang akhaangsa.

Ningsiih chuve ichuwr naemahva, changvakonchu Thangnang chong jeernii vakhangnare chenchir vaata; vokhehkho asiksik chong ichongchenii kikthuur vakhangnare chenvaata; thiimziih vakhangnare omahchirnii.
Akhaechuve inuw ing arakhehpang ymmanghuw vatah amanche Thangnang chong jeernii chukho arakhehpang vatah.
Changvakonchu mapung ahenpha raenche arakhehpang chukho omahchirnii.
Ki kanaepang raenche naepang vaang ichong ing, naepang vaang kamanghuw, naepang vaang kakhar; changvakonchu upa kahenpha tah-nache, naepang vaang ichiichu kabathen.

Atarae inuw ing vaartha sungna ynthim riprip ing ymmunah; changavakonchu nuwting chemve mae re mae yntuwh naka muvataruw, atarae ki ing arekhehpang kamanghuw tahsa; changvakonchu nuwting chembe kichu Thangnang ing iseengjaeh ing ymmanghuw vaange, ki ingkho ynthiingkiir ing manghuwva kachuw.
Chukhaenache ataraen chembe thacha, ningmanden, ningsiih hava ynthummeh i omna; changvakonchu hava vakhae kaarne aaruungseh chuve ningsiih iva.
Ningsiihchu omnii turuw amanche ynthiing laetha kikthuurchu nenbarungriir iruwh ing idikruw, changvakonchu athurfhuwseh ing Thangnang chong jeernii chuvachiiva.

Reentaang ithuwhpak chong ing ichong mee inche mee reentaang ningna ichong mahva, Thangnang ningna vatah; akhaechuve achuw ingkho chongchu manghuw chehmah; changvakonchu laetha ajaar inche ithuwhpak chongchu ichongva.
Changvakonchu Thangnang chong ajeer ama inche mee ae ningnache iseemnii, ynthohsahnii, vokhehkho rotha manrohnii ichongva.
Reen-taang chong yngkheh ichong ama inche ataksahpang saknii vatah, changvakonchu Thangnang chong ijeer chuve ruwrthiing aangkhengchu aseemniinah.

Nenuw vakhae ing reentaang chong ing ichongchu ki inchembe kaadiknah, changvakonchu Thang-nang chong ijeer inche athiseh ing kaadiksahna. Chukhaenache ruwrthiingchu ahemansaknii inche chong aanrichu omah nave, reentaang chong ing ichong athi ing Thangnang chong ijeer inche athiseh ing ruungna.

Chutahnache, kauw kanae ae, ki ing neningna kathenglae reentaang chong ing chong ningve ynchii ikanii henreen vatakhang, ikanii achiih tikho omah dehnii, ki ing Thangnang ningtanii amandangnii changmahka thiimziih ynghuw changmahka chong ijeer changmahka ynchuwpeeh mahnaka kakanii ynchii omkhang.
Aaruur yndang, alaetha omah peehchae, baasi vakhangnare, bina vakhangnare, aaruurna aantheepnii mandangmah manuwve, baasi atumva changmahka bina atumva ichiichu ynsaangkhe manghuwva tamuwkhang?
Vokhehkho seemruwr amanring mee ing ichummah iruur ing manring nave, achuw ing laar tuknii khaena ynthongva takhang?

Amavaangche nenuw ingkho reentaang chong ichong chuwchu iraecharii ing manghuwnii chong inche barimah tanuwve, ynchii ariirniiva ichii ynsaangkhe mang-huwva tamuwkhang? Nenuw aruwh thangsii ing ichongchu ynsuwhva nenta!
Laaruw paam sungne chong yntinmah inempak omna, changvakonchu arutho omah chong ynvaemah.
Akhaechuve ki ing enchongchu manghuwmah ningve, aachong mee ningnache reentaang meeping amanche ichong meechu kaningna reentaang meeva.
Nenuw ing laetha tanii kikthuur iphachu nengadik vakhaka, ruwrthiing seemnii iruungsehchu jongruw.
Achuw yngkheh reentaang chong ichong mee inche chongchu abarinii kikthuur iphanii inche thamsa rasiing.
Akhaechuve ki ing jinge ichii ing thamsa ningve, kalaetha ing athamsahva, changvakonchu kavakhar sarup chuve ynvaemah.
Ki ing ynchiikha tukate chang? Ki ing kalaetha inche thamsava kata, vokhehkho kavakhar inchenkho thamsa vakata; kalaetha inche lachu tuvakata, vokhehkho kavakhar inchenkho la tuvakata.
Nang ing nalaetha pang inche Thangnang chu namanpah raenche, ynsaangkhe taangtanii achuw yngkheh inche manpah chiika nathamsah nache Amen tavaate? Ama ing ynchii nariirva ichiichu manghuwmahsa.
Nang ing isajaeh ing manpahsa taniika Thangnang ting thamsa taniikho, mee areh chuve seempeeh chehmahchii.
Ki ing nenuw ithithi ing reen-taang iruwpak chong ing chongning tasa ingka Thangnang chu kamanpah-sahnah.

Changvakonchu ruwrthiing nache ki ing reentaang ae chukho manchuwnii khaena, iruwpak reentaang chong lising suum kariirchang chenve, mee ing mang-huwseh vachii chong asae runga rikti iriir inche kaadiksahnah.
Kauw kanae ae, barungriir ikhartahna naepang eensuwhpeeh mahruw; isamah tuniinache naepang eensuwhpeehruw, changvakonchu ikhartahna upa eensuwhpeehruw.
Vajeer chonghak nache havi ynziihka omna,
“Laaruw mee ajaarna reentaang reentaang chong vokhehkho marpah ae ner ajaarnache hava mee ae ningne chongva kata changvakonchu enuw ing irungaepeeh mahnii ae taka Aafhuw ing ajeer.”

Reentaang chong ing ichong kikthuurchu athacha om ae khaena mahva, athacha omah ae khaena buwtinnii chuva, changvakonchu Thangnang chong amanthang kikthuurchu athacha omah ae khaena mahva, thacha om mee ae khaenava.

Chukhaenache ruwrthiing aang-kheng ing purtanuwka reentaang chong nenchong raenche, taangtanii changmahka thachamah aechu varuwh ae nave, nenuw i baveeh sachuw ta ae naka enuw ing riirmah ae niikhang?

Changvakonchu mee vakhae ing Thangnang tanii chongchu jeernave, thachamah mee changmahka reentaang mee achuw yngkheh avaruwhtahna, ong vakhae ajaarnache aningna isii amiraar omna ichii manghuwnii vaata vokhehkho aasii vakhae ing ataksahchu vajeer yntusa vaata.
Amana barungriir ithuwhpak taniichu henphong vaata vokhehkho jinge ichii ing nenuw nengkaarna Thangnang ynvaena ichii riirsa naka ama ing khupnaka Thangnang chu rumvaata.

Auw kanae ae, nenuw ing nenpurpoh raenche, nengkaarna achuw yngkheh ing ympahnii la, ynchuwpeeh, Thangnang tanii chong amanthang, reentaang chong ichongnii, amachupang mahka chongchu abarinii, hava vakhae i om tanuwve, ruwrthiing seemniichu ynsuwhrasiing.
Achuw yngkheh ing reentaang chong inche chongnave mee ynnii ynthum ing ynden chakchak inche chongruw; amanche chongchu mee yngkheh ing abaripeeh rasiing.
Changvakonchu chongchu aanripeeh mee omahnave, ama ing ruwrthiing sungna ahuw turu ing ongrasiing.
Jaephar mee ynnii ynthum ae ing chong ae rasiing; amanche reentaang ae inche atinva atinmahva ichiichu vajeer tuae rasiing.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh meekongna ong ama inche Thangnang tanii chong phanave, amaensana hechong mee inche ichongchu manchen rasiing.
Akhaechuve mee vakhaechu ynthohsahnii khaena vokhehkho yng-huwchehnii khaena, nenuw yngkheh yngkheh ing Thangnang tanii chongchu ynthang arusa;
amanche jaephar laetha yngkheh derna jaephar yngkheh inche ongna.
Akhaechuve Thangnang i ynnahnii suwhnii Thang-nang mahva changvakonchu idae chuva.
Thangnang ruwrthiing chaapna jinge ichiiva,
rupanuw ae ing ruwrthiing sungna huwdaejaeh ing ong ae rasiing akhaechuve enuw ichong rumah. Jehudi ae vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing enuw ynjuur savachiipae.
Enuw ing ynchii yngkheh manghuw nungka ta ae nave, engeen engeenna enfhuwsar ae ningnache siisa ae rasiing; akhaechuve rupanuw ing ruwrthiing sungna ichong i ningjakniiva.
Nening tanii Thangnang chongchu ithengva, chang-mahka neningna pangche ithengva?
Achuw yngkheh ing ataksahchu jaephar ping, changmahka laetha tanii kikthuur kaphava tanaka manden nave, ki ing neningna kabaziih havi Thangnang tanii chonghak chuva ichii manghuwsa rasiing.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing havi manghuwmah nave, ama ing ariirchu rungae mahruw.
Chutahnache, kauw kanae ae, Thangnang chong ijeerchu barungriir iruwh ing idikruw, amanche reentaang chong ing ichongchu khaammahruw.
Nong aangkhenglaang ing ynden chakchak ing tuva nenchiiva.
Atiive kauw kanae ae, ki ing neningna katong isa chong vakhae nenuw ing iraang chuwka vokhehkho ingiirchuw nening nache kamanthangsahnah.
Isa chong ki ing neningna katong chongkha nenuw ing icheepther ing bachuw tanuwve, ama ajaar inche nenuwchu yngkarva; changmahnave nenuw aruwh thangsiih ing nenthachapa.
Ki ingkho kaphasah vakhaechu neningting kapeehsah vachuw, ama-chuve ynthiing thiimziih inuwzii ing Khrista ing inuw vakhae isii khaena thiksa;
Aafhuw chu endimpa, ynthiing thiimziih inuwzii ing Aafhuw chu inii avomanthumnii nache hangringsa;
amanche ahaarpana Pitar ningna, vokhehkho aanuwnache ama asebok suum ariinii ae ningnache yndangsa.
Ama aanuwting chembe, Aafhuw ing mee charunga athi auw anae aethoh yntuwhsa, enuw tanii mee aanem chuve ataraen phanii ing ringnae, changvakonchu areh ae chuve thiksae.
Aanuwnache vokheh Jems thoh yntuwhsae vokhehkho chongthang vakhae thoh yntuwhsa.
Ki chuve Khrista chongthang vakhae ae kaarna matik ichamah isiingpak chongthang yngkheh ping, yngkhaena ynchii imbe Thangnang ruwrthiing aechu kamanang ae.

Changvakonchu ki ing chongthang ynsuwhsah kaphasah i, Thangnang tungsiih ajaar inche ynsuwhsahping, changvakonchu Aafhuw ing atungsiih kaningna ympeehchu aruwhnam mahva. Changvakonchu ki chuve Khrista chongthang vakhae kaarna athiseh ing inuwmhak chuping. Changvakonchu kataksah ing katu ing mahva, Thangnang tungsiih ing kataklina nong atuva.
Chunuchenve kaningtanii vakhangnare, eningtanii vakhangnare, jinge ichii ing chongchu kenjeersa vokhehkho nenuw ing nenthachapa.
Ataraene Khrista chu ithii vasah tanii hangringsa ta ungka kentong raenche, ithii hangring omah ta aeka nengkaarna achuw yngkheh mee aenche enriir ynvaenae.
Ithii hangringchu omah nave, Khrista chukho hangring mahsa;
aman-che Khrista chu hangring mah vanave, kenuw ing kentong havi aruwh thangsii vatah vokhehkho nenthacha chukho aruwh thangsii vatah.

Ama chungnache kenuw chuve Thangnang taklina ichummah asaarkhii ipeehchupae ichii ing thang-sung, akhaechuve Thangnang ing Khrista chu amanringpa ichii saarkhii kempeehpa. Khrista chu hangring mahsa ichiichu ataktak vanave, ithii ae chukho hangring mahnii ae.
Ithii aechu ihangring mahpae vaniive, Khrista chukho hangring mahsa;
amanche Khrista chu hangring mah vaniive, nenuw nenthacha chukho aruwhnamva, amanche ataraen phanii ing nenuw isii nache ongjaehtah nachuw.
Amana chembe Khrista athacha ithii ae chukho maangsae.
Khrista ningna ningmanden ym-mangomchu ynring raenpang khaena vanave, laaruw mee vakhae tanii ningchuwh niisehchu vamuw.
Changvakonchu atiive ithii vasah ae kaartanii Khrista ing ithii tanii hangring aren aanlachu hungan-suwhsa.
Laaruw mee tanii ithii isuwh vakhaka, amavaangche mee yngkheh ningtanii ajaarna ihangring chukho isuwhva.
Akhaechuve Adam ningna aangkheng ithii vamuw, amavaangche Khrista ning-nache mee vakhae hangring vaata.
Changvakonchu amee siirna ningkuur maensa naevaata, Khrista ing aren aanla chuva, aanuwnache Khrista ing ajungtheng raenche Aafhuw mee ynsuwhchu vaatae.
Ama aanuwnache achiniichu ynsuwh vaata; Khrista ing laetha aapuh mee, aatuaricheh ae vokhehkho ruwreng aadeen vakhae aechu cheh-chir naka aaruwng lipahchu ampa Thangnang ningting mansir vaata.
Akhaechuve meejeehnii vakhae aechu Aafhuw akhi derna asiihmahri raentaangche, Khrista ing paarvaata.
Akuurchiimnii meejeehnii ae achehnii chuve ithii chuva.

Ynthiing chonghak ing ariir chuve, “Aafhuw ing adernache peeh vakhae amangom chirva.” Iseengkiir ing omna amachuve, peeh aangkhenglaang kaderna omvaata taka Aafhuw ing ariirtahna, peeh aangkhenglaang Khrista akhi dernache omchirva ichii i atatakva.
Peeh aangkhenglaang aderna amangom aphanache, asiti ataksah ing Thangnang dernache siivaata, aangkhenglaang aderna amangom Aafhuw Thangnang inche aderna aangkhenglaang mangomchir naka paarvaata.
Atii ithii khaena baptais entu mee aechu ynchii tavachiipae? Ithii aechu hangring mah ae nacha, yngkhaena ithii khaena baptais entuva?
Kenuw ingkho apha siirna isii ikha suwhnii vachii nache ynchii khaena ongpung?
Kauw kanae ae, inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ningna ki ing kaphasah neningna kaandingniichu parsa ingka, ki anasiirna thikning ta ingka atatak ing kariirnah.

Laaruw mee nunu inuwzii ing, ki ing Ephisia na lampa sha aethoh laar yntuk ningve, ynchii katuungsah omvaate? Ithii aechu hangring mah ae nave, inuw sataruw vokhehkho intaruw, akhaechuve atuknuw thikvaanchii vatah.
Nenuw pangmahruw; “Isamah ruwr inche isa ringkum amamaangnah.”
Ichum barungriir nache hungomruw amana isii chukho tumahruw. Akhaechuve mee areh ae chuve Thangnang kho manghuwmah ae. Havi ningjak nemanghuwnii ing kariirva.
Achuw yngkheh mee ing tavaata, ithii aechu ynsaangkhe hangringpae? Enuwchu ynchii hakchaang khavang-khe ichiipae?
He ipang ae! nang ing amuw navorkha thikmah tanga naka hangmuwng chehmahnii.
Nang ing navorkha amuwpang vatah, gehu vakhang nakho, asiksik amuw vakhang nakho, chumnii ing amuw pangchu navor vatah, imuwng vasah ing vormahchii.
Thangnang ing amuw ipika aadik inuwzii inche amamuwngva amanche amuw siirna atakchu asiksik ing amamuwngva.
Iring hakchaang aechu aang-hakchir mahpae, laaruw mee ing asha yngkheh, shava aenche asik yngkheh, vaati aenche asik yngkheh amanche nga aenche asik yngkhehpae.
Thangnang tanii hakchaang omna, laaruw paam tanii hakchaang omna, thangbaen tanii isa chuve laaruw paam tanii isa thohche ynghakmah.
Inii tanii isa asikna, thapa ireng asaknii asikna, aesii ireng asaknii asik yngkheh omva vokhehkho aesii ae kaarnakho asiksiisii isa reentaang inempak omna.
Havi vaange ithii ae ihangring chukhom vatah. Ithii hakchaangchu aandim raenche imaang peeh ynsuwhna; changvakonchu ahangring raenche imaangmah peeh ynsuwh vaata.
Aandim raenche ynjasuwhmah ing omna, ahangring raenche alaar sapakna, aandim raenche suurna, ahangring raenche ruwreng pirna.
Aandim raenche hakchaang pangvatah; changvakonchu ahangring raenche ynthiing laetha hakchaang chuvaata. Anunu tanii hakchaang om vaange, laetha tanii hakchaang chukho omva.
Havi khaena ynziih vasah omna, “Ahaarpa mee Adam inche iring mee ynsuwhka; aningkuur Adam inche iringnii ympeeh laethachu ynsuwhva.”
Laetha tanii ing ahaarpa mahva, changvakonchu hakchaang tanii ingva; aanuwting chembe laetha tanii ing isuwhva.
Ahaarpa meechu ruwruw ing aseem vakhaka ruwruw taniiva, amanche avomaniinii chuve thangbaen taniiva.
Ruwruw tanii aseem mee inche ruwruw tanii ynsuwhnae vokhehkho thangbaen tanii ae chuve thangbaen tanii pingeng tiknae.
Inuw ing laaruw paamna ynringrae ruwruw tanii masak ynri vaange, thangbaen tanii masak chukho inuw ing rivataruw.
Kauw kanae ae, ki ing havi kariirnah, sii re hakchaang ynvae ing Thangnang lipah ipha chehmah, amanche imaang inche imaangmah chehmah.
Akhaechuve maangva chiichu maangmahdeh vachiiting yntehvaata vokhehkho ithii fhuwchu ithiii arumahting yntehvaata.
Havi asuwhraenche imaang aru havi imaang arumahting aantehchir aanuwtingche ynziih vasahchu hungindang vaata,
“O ithiichu aacheh inche abaduwrpa.”
“O ithii, nang ing nachehchu utingva?
O ithii, namansuh chehnii nahaechu utingva?”
Ithii ing ymmansuh chehnii ruwrengchu isii taniiva, amanche isii ruwreng chuve vajeer chonghakva.
Changvakonchu inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajaarna ichehnii inuw yntaklina ympipeeh Thangnang chu ympah ynsuwhrasiing.
Chukhaenache ka-ningsiih kauw kanae, nenuw ing nentu nenri vakhaechu Aafhuw ningnache paammah ichii nemanghuw sahthoh icheep ing, ynlaapmahdeh ing Aafhuw nongnache apha om bakhaena matak ynsuwhruw.
Katak katheng raenche seerthaang bathaang aomniimah khaenache, ama ama ing aphasah inuwzii ing Aafhuwnii inii nache meepum siir ing seerchu mangkong ae sana siiae rasiing.
Ki ing kavatheng raenche, nenuw ing nengkaar tanii thachafhuw achuw yngkhehchu chongthen thoh ynruw ing Jerusalem ting neningsiih kikthuurchu vethaknii khaena chiirva kata.
Amana kikho isinii apha chacheh nave, enuw thohche sihakva kenta.
lamkhii kasinii kasiniina nenuw ing kichu ibomnii khaenache, nenuw thoh ynruw ing apha mongtehna changmahka pharbuw nakho onghakmuw arusa.
Atarae ki ing nenuw thoh lamthahna yntuwhchu idikmah ing; Aafhuw ing irupeeh nave, ki nenuw thoh ynruw ing apha topoh iseehhak ing cheenghak manuwka kachiisahnah.
Changvakonchu Pentikos inii ipha ing Ephisia nache cheengva kata.
Eejeehnii inempak omkhangnare, iruungpak vokhehkho ikaniipak vachii eengkhaar yngkheh kakhaena imongka omna.
Chukhaenache achuw ingkho amachu juummah rasiing, changvakonchu kaningting ahungtungnii khaenache amachu lamthahna ivethakpeehruw, akhae-chuve ki ing amachu unae aethoh kahahsahnah.
Kauw kanae ae, atarae Apollo chu ki ing unae aethoh neningting ivathengnii khaena inempak kamaneemsahnah, changva-konchu atarae ama ing ivasichu mandenmahri, isinii apha apharaenche vatheng vaata.
Nenuw ynriimruw, thacha nache ngiirjaehruw, thona mangomruw vokhehkho pirtherruw.
Nenong aangkhenglaang ningsiih ing turuw.
Jinge ichii ing nong itu mee ae, inuwmpak mee vakhaechu ibomsah thoh ynruw ing nenuw ingkho imanjii peehruw ta ingka kariirsahnah.
Amanche Stephanas re Phortu-natus vokhehkho Akhaikus, enuw ae inge entheng tahna karotha rohsakna; akhaechuve nenuw ing nenthengmah tahna enuw inge ber ymbupeehpae,
enuw ing nenrotha emanroh pingeng ichii ing katakli nakho rotha ymmanroh peehpae. Hangchii mee ae i inuw ing manghuwpham suwhna.
Unae vakhae ing nenuwchu salaam ynjetusahnah ae. Unae yngkheh ynsuwh ing ibeeng yntum nuwna yngkheh kheh salaam ynturuw.
Pol kataksahrap kakik ing havana salaam chong i kabaziih sahva.
Achuw yngkheh ing Aafhuw aning mansiih mahnave, ama siraap phara-siing. Maranatha, thenglo O Aafhuw!
Aafhuw Jesu ajaarna nengkaarna ningsiih omrasiing.
Jesu Khrista ajaarna kaningsiih inche nenuwchu eenruwfhuw rasiing.
Akhaia na ong ynthiing ae aangkheng thoh ynruw ing Korinthia na om ruwrthiing neningna:
Inuw vakhae Apa Thangnang re Aafhuw Jesu Khrista inche tungsiih re idaechu ympeeh ynsuwhrasii.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ampa re ningchuwh ing isip Thangnang vokhehkho aangkhengna barungriir amanungae Thangnang chu manpah-sataruw.
Ama ing kenjaanii vakhaena barungriir amanungae ajaarnache, kenuw ingkho ijachaam apha mee ae ningna barungriir amanungaepeeh chehnii khaenache, Thangnang ing kenuwchu kenbarungriir amanungaepa.
Khrista khaena ijachaam kentaklina ihungnem sehseh vaange, barungriir bathaenii chukho Khrista ajaarnache keningna hungnemna.

Kenuw ing ijachaam phanungve, nenbarungriir bathaepeehnii vo-khehkho manlaenpeeh phanii khaenava; amanche kenbarungriirchu manungaenave, nenbarungriirchu bathaepeehnii khaenava; amanche kenuw ing ijachaam kengkhaang churap nenuw ingkho ikhaangchehnii ympiva.

Chukhaenache kenuw ing neningna ningmanden kemangomchu ynlaapmahdeh, yngkhaena ynchii imbe kenuw ing kemanghuwsa amachuve, nenuw ing ijachaam nache sarup nenjapoh vaangkhe, kenuw ing barungriir bathaenii kemphasah nachenkho sarup ijapeehruw.
Kenuw thikva kenchii phanii ing ijachaam kenphachu kenbarungriir ing kenrusahva, amana chembe kentaksahna yndiiru ing, ithii aechu amanring Thangnang ningnache kengaandiinii khaenava.
Aafhuw inche kenuwchu ichiisuwhpak ithiinii tanii yngkarpa vokhehkho ikarrem vaata; kenuw ing athar akarrem vaata ta ungka aningnache ningmanden kemangomsa,

amanche nenuw ingkho kengkhaenache ithamsahna ymbom sachuw. chukhaenache mee aajaeh ing kengkhaena ynthampeeh aechu basang vaata, vokhehkho Thangnang inche bor ipivaata; amanche mee aajaeh ing aning tingche iruur yndang ing kengkhaenache manpah vaatae.

Kenuw kengaandingniichu haviva: Kenuw ing ichum ynraar yng-huwchehnii kenruwthuwh ing saarkhii kempeehsa, amachuve barungriir ynthiing ing vokhehkho Thangnang yndentahna barungriir iseeng ing, laaruw paam mee ae tanii ising iveer ing mahka, Thangnang tungsiih ruwreng ing laaruw paamne athiseh ing neningting ichum inche isisahpung.
Kenuw ing neningna pacheh mahva nenchii vokhehkho manghuw chehmah vanenchii yntangakho baziihmah ung. Atiive achinii phanii ing manghuwva nenta ta ingka ireep ing kamandennah.

Nenuw ing ataraenbe kenuw i topoh chuve ymmanghuw sachuw; changvakonchu iseengkiir ing ihemanghuw vanenta ichii ing kamandensahnah, amana chembe kenuw ing nenta ynsuwh vaang unge, Jesu Khrista aanii nache kenruungniichu nenuw ynsuwhva nenta.
Kabarung ingam khaena nenuw ing voniimeh bor nenphanii khaenache amaensana neningna thengning kachiisahva.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe neningna basen naka Mesidonia ting siningka athar Mesidonia tanii nening tingche hunganrireeh ningka, Judia phanii inche nenuw ing lamna ivethak tanuwka ichii ing kamandensahva.
Chukhaenache kamandenchu reepmahri ing ichii kamandangniiva? Changmahka kamandenchu karuse rumah ing kachiiniiva changmahka kataksah ing karu inuwzii ing kamandenva?
Changvakonchu Thangnang chuve thachafhuw vakhaka, neningting kenchong chuve kenrusa rumah ung ichii chumahva.

Thangnang sapa Jesu Khrista khaena nening nache Silas re Timothi vokhehkho kataksahrap ynvae ing kenvatong Aafhuw chu karusa, rumah ing ichiimahva, Changvakonchu Thang-nang ningna chembe karusa ichii chuva;
Thangnang ningna chongreep chaap chuve karusa ichii chuva. Havi khaenava Thangnang ympahnii khaena asapa ajaarna Amen ichii isuwhchu.
Atii Khrista ningnache kenuw re nenuwchu yngkhehpang ymbasuw vokhehkho ningsiihnii richiithou eetaehchu Thangnang chuva.
Aafhuw ama ingkho inuwchu ahak inamka vokhehkho inuw yngkhaena ynsiihpeehchu ynthiing laetha ing ymbarungriir nachenkho saarkhii atupa.
Changvakonchu athurfhuw ing nenuwchu rukuh ningchuwka nenja-niimah khaena Korinthia na ki vanuh thengsamah ing ichiichu kalaetha taklina saarkhii aomnii ing Thangnang chu ka-eensahva.
Kenuw ing nenthacha taklina aafhuw ynsuwhnii khaena mahva, changvakonchu ibomnii khaenache nongtuhak mee chupung, yngkhaena ynchii imbe nenuw thacha nache ngiirnachuw.
Ki ing nenuwchu athar ijachaam pinii khaena thengmahning ichii kabarungriir kamangiirpa.
Akhae-chuve ki ing nenbarungriir manja ningve, ki ing kamanja mee aechu mahnaka, achuw ing kichu ibom savaate?

Ama khaena neningna chong-then kavebaziih chuve-ki ing neningna katheng raenche, karotha iroh inche nenuw vakhaechu ibomnii ynsuwh vaata ichii ing kabarungriir mangamsa ingka, karotha manrohvachii mee ae ningtanii barungriir ija kaphaniimah ing havana chongthen i kavebaziihva.

Athurfhuw ing inempak ijaacham ing kabarungriir aasum khaenache, ki ing neningna aajaeh richii ynruwm ing kabaziih sahpa; havi nenbarungriir manjanii khaena mahva, changva-konchu kaningsiih nentaklina athiseh ing omchu nemanghuwnii khaenava.

Atii achuw yngkheh mee inche imanja nave, ki chupang ymmanja mahva, changvakonchu (chong ikha ing kamander niimah ing) rakheh yntongting tamanuwve, nenuw vakhae chukho ymmanjava. Havana kariir akhae chuve, ki ing ataklina ipirpak ing chong ningka tamah ing.
Mee aanemhak ing ponti apeeh changchii mee aechu khaena ynsuwh chaksa.
Chukhaenache rakheh yntongting tamanuwve, nenuw ing ama meechu kuhpeeh tanuwka vokhehkho nenbomsah ing sakvaata, changmahnave ama meechu ijachaam inche rupvaata.
Chukhaenache ki ing neningna kariirsahnah, nenuw ing aningna nening nemansiihchu amanghuwnii ing mandangruw.
Ki ing neningna chongthen kavebaziih akhae chuve, nenuw ing aajaehmeh isa ing batheem nache ingiircheh vachuw vokhehkho anasiirna kangiirnii nakhe ngiirnachuw ngiirmahchuw ichii ynghuwnii khaenava.

Atiive nenuw ing achuw yngkheh mee ing araarchu kuhpeeh tanuwve, ki ingkho kakuhpeehsa. Yngkhaena ynchii imbe umlae ing yntaklina atuungsah aphaniimah inche, ki ing laanglam kuhpeeh ningve, kakuhpeehchu nengkhaenache Khrista maana kakuhpeehva,
yngkhaena ynchii imbe umlae ing asirchu inuw ing ymmanghuwsa.
Changvakonchu kauw kanae Taitas katuwhmah tahnache kabarungriir nache ija basumnii phasamahsing. Chutahnache amana ong mee ae thohche ynsae ungka Mesidonia ting sising.
Changvakonchu Thangnang kamanpahsahnah, ama ing ma somka Khrista ajaarnache maepah kemphapa amanche kenjaar nachenkho aphamsiirna Khrista chu ynghuwnii khaenache ningsiihnii barimchu ynsuwhsung.
Amachuve ikarpeeh apha mee aere phamahka ymmoh ae kaarnache Khrista barim ningsiihnii Thangnang ningnache ynsuwhsung,
amanche ithii tanii ithii barim omna, iring tanii iring barimchu omna. Amana nongruw havi khaena chembe atucheh aricheh meechu achuwva?
Kenuw chuve Thangnang chong arimah ae khavaang tamah ung; changvakonchu barungriir ichiimjaeh ing Thangnang mik barengna, Khrista mee yngkheh ynsuwh ing ichongpung.
Kenuw kentaksah khaena athar ympahsah kembasenva? Changmahka neningna vakhang nakho, nening tanii vakhang nakho, achuw yngkheh mee aeng entuvaang, kenuw ing ympahnii chongthen inche ikanii kemphase?
Kembarungriir sungna ynziihka om mee vakhae ing paavachii kendeen chongthenchu nenuw vachuw.
Muk ing ynziihmahka, iring Aafhuw Thangnang laetha ing ymmanziih, vokhehkho rung taklina mahka, laaruw mee barungriir taklina ynziih Khrista chongthen vachuw ichiichu kamandangnii vachuw.
Kenuw ing kenriir havi akhae chuve Khrista jaarna Thangnang ningnache kenbarungriir kemangam khaenava.
Nong havi kentaksah ing kentuchehnii kentaklina yntanga omah. Kentuchehchu Thangnang tanii kemphava.

Aafhuw inche ithar chongiirchu amanpir mee ynsuwhnii khaena inuwchu ynseemva, havi vajeer chonghak ynziih tanii mahva, changva-konchu laetha taniiva. Ynziih vajeer chonghak inche ithii ahenreenva, changvakonchu laetha inchembe iringnii ympiva.

Rung nache vajeer chonghak ynziih ing ynghaksa, vokhehkho amachu apeeh raenche Thangnang alaar isa yndang. Mosi mae irengchu maang-vachii vakhangnare inempak ipir khaena, Isrel mee aenche aningnache encheh mahsae. Ithii ahenreen vajeer chonghakchu ruwreng aomlaenche hangchii alaar isa thohne thengnave,
laetha nongruw alaar isa inche aajaehmeh athiseh ing ruungseh vaate!
Maangvachii nongruw inche alaar isa omnave, manlaenpeeh ahenreen nongruw inche aajaehmeh alaar isa omseh vaate!
Inuw ing iriir arusa amachuve alaar isa om ireng inche ahungom tahnache, atii isivasahna alaar isa ompak irengchu omahsa.
Chukhaenache maangvachiichu alaar isa omnave, maangrudeh ing chitha paarvachii alaar isa inche aajaehmeh thivaate.
Keningna ningmanden havi om khaenache, kenthona inempak isava.
Kenuw chuve Isrel mee ae ing maangvachii vokhehkho omahvachii Mosi mae yngkhum nache engen thohche aanghakmah ung.

Enuw envakharchu atatak ing bachaesa; chukhaenache atanii inii ipha ing baruw chongiir ynziihchu empajaeh tahnache mae mangkhum niikha omjaehna, yngkhaena ynchii imbe Khrista ajaarnache ynripeehpa ichii eningna manthangmahri.
Chu-khaenache atanii ipha ing Mosi vajeer chonghakchu empa raenche mae mangkhumnii inche embarungriir yngkhum jaehna.
Changvakonchu enuw ing Aafhuw ningtingche emba-rungriir enghenpeeh raenche, mae mangkhumniichu phaenpeeh vaatae.
Aafhuw chuve laethava amanche Aafhuw laetha ongnii nache ruwkuwr-johchu omna.
Changvakonchu inuw eengkheng mae mangkhumru ing Aafhuw alaar isachuw vaarthana ymmuvaang, Aafhuw laetha ajaarna ama amaethoh aanghakjaeh ing alaar isa tanii iruungseh alaar isa ting ymmantehpa.
Thangnang ningchuwhna kenuw ing nong tunii kemphasah inuwzii ing kenrutha sikmahdeh.

Chukhaena-che kenuw ing hemanchae vemanchae ing vokhehkho Thangnang chongchu ichummah ing sichinniiru ing, ireng ing isip ichumchu ymmansii ajaarna Thangnang mik ennache mee vakhae taklina ichum ynraar ynghuwnii ruthuwh thohche siungka ningjaknii vachii ichohnii, ynruwh nongchaap kenuw ing kembathenpa.
Kenuw ing kentong isa chongchu mangkhumjaeh nungve, imaang aechu kemangkhum-jaeh tahsae.

Enuw ing thachamah ae, yngkhaena ynchii imbe isamah laaruw paam aafhuw inche embarungriir amanthimpa. Thangnang mae eensuwhpeeh Khrista alaar isa tanii ireng isa chong ithengchu imuniimah khaenache asiihpae.
Kenuw kentaksah khaena kentong mahva, changvakonchu Jesu Khrista chu Aafhuwva ichii khaena kentongva; amanche kenuw ichuve Jesu khaena nemeenae chupung ichiichu kentong sahva.

Chukhaenache taka, “Ynthim nache ireng inche aenvaata,” achii Thangnang ingkhe Khrista mae nache Thangnang alaar isa irengchu inuw ing ymmanghuwnii khaenache, irengchu ymbarungriir sungnache amangaengpa.
Keningna laetha amen iruwpak omchu pir ing ynseem beer vaang ichii vatah, aanchungseh ruwrengchu keningna omah. Changvakonchu Thangnang ningnache omna ichiichu kemandangva.
Kenuw ing aphamsiir nache kenangnah, changvakonchu utaraenkho kiimah ung, makae maraang ynghuwchehmah ung, changvakonchu ningmanden kiimah;
yngensiimah ae inempak omnae; changvakonchu kengaarang omahdeh ichii omah, amanche ithipak ing ynlensahnah ae, changvakonchu kenuw maangmah ung.
Iring Jesu chu kentaklina yndangnii khaenache, ithii vasah Jesu barimchu apha omba khaena kenreensa.
Jesu aringkumchu kentaklina yndangnii khaena Jesu changden nache kenringsen ing ichiisuwhpak ithiinii nache kempeehsahva.
Chu-khaenache ithiinii nongchu keningna omna, changvakonchu iringnii inche neningna nong atunah.
Ynziih vasah ing ariirsa, “Kathacha khaenache ki chong chehning.” Thacha tahna laetha yngkhehpang nache kenuwkho chongnung, akhaechuve kenuw ing kenthacha tahnava.
Aafhuw Jesu amanring Thangnang ama inche kenuw chukho Jesu thoh ynruw ing imanring vaata, vokhehkho ne-nuw thohche ynruw ing kenuwchu imangiir vaata ichii kenuw ing kemanghuwsa.
Aangkhenglaang havi nenuw nengkhaenava, amanche Thangnang tungsiih inche mee vakhaechu hengkuwmchir naka alaar isa Thangnang ningnache ympah thoh ynruw ing thamsa vaatae.
Havi khaene kenuw kenrotha sikmahdeh; changvakonchu taangtanii hakchaangchu maangkhang nare, sungtanii kenlaetha chuve inii iniina ahemanthar sehsehnah.
Havana ijaangsesak vokhehkho among-pangna ijachaam kempha havi inge kengkhaena ijachaam chungna ichen naemah alaar isa athiseh ing hungomna.
Kenuw ing yndang peeh nache enru ing, yndangchehmah peeh nache kengensahva; yndang peeh chuve iseeh ing omah changvakonchu yndang chehmah peeh chuve ichen naemah ing omna.
Inuw ing ymmanghuwsa amachuve havana khurpeenthaam ynseem havi maangkhang nare, kik ing ynseem-mah Thangnang tanii ichen naemah een thangbaen nache inuw yngkhaena omna.
Chukhaenache thangbaen tanii yngongnii eenchu peen vaang isingnii khaenache ningmanden ing hahchehru ing abuw ina vaang ing ommanuw.
Atatak ing peen ing singmanuwka, asae ing ongchu inuw phamah manuw.

Laaruw paam khurpeenthaam hane ong inuw ing laethana abuw ina thohche peehrik ing ongmanuw; inuw ing asae inche om idik changchiimahva, changvakonchu thiknii vaanchiichu iring inche abaduwrnii ing peen vaang isingchu eediksahva.
Havi yntehnii inche inuw yngkhaena asirchu Thang-nang va, vokhehkho ama ing havana ithar ringkum ichu ynningna ipinii khaenache laetha chongreepchu ympisahpa.
Chukhaenache inuw ing apha omba khaena barungriir ymmangamva. Inuw ing ymmanghuwsa amachuve, eenna yngong raentaangche hakchaang nache Aafhuw thohche inuw onghak mahmuw.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe ynthacha ajaarnache inuw isisah vamuw, mik ing ymmu ajaarna mahva.
Inuw ing hakchaangchu bathen mamanuwka amanche Aafhuw thohche onghaknii khaenache thona isip ommanuw vokhehkho inempak eediknah.
Chukhaenache inuw ing onghak vakhangnare, barungriir nache Aafhuw chu amanpennii eediksahva.
Mee vakhae inche ahakchaang ing atu ari inuwzii ing, isa vakhang nakho, isamah vakhang nakho, iphanii khaenache inuw vakhae ing Khrista vajeer tunii vaapa ongnii maanache mandang vataruw.

Chukhaenache Aafhuw chu chiisa ungka, kenuw ing mee aechu kema-neemsahnah. Thangnang ing inuw vakhaechu isajaeh ing ymmanghuwsa, vokhehkho nenuw ing katak i isajaeh ing ymmanghuw sachuw ta ingka kathachanachuw.

Kenuw ing neningna athar kentaksahchu ympahsah mahpung, changvakonchu barungriir nachen mahka achung pamphuw mik enna iruungsah ae ningnache, nenuw ing nenbasangfhuw chong omnii khaena kenruungniichu nening nache kenriirsahva.
Kenuw ing barungriirna areh ing omkhang nungle, amachu Thangnang khaenava; vokhehkho barungriir ichum vakhang-nare, nengkhaena vatah.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe Khrista ningsiih inche kenuwchu ympuhpa, atii kenuw ing kemanghuwpa amachuve, mee yngkheh inche aangkhenglaang khaena thiksa, amanche mee vakhaekho thiksa.
Atii iring mee aenche athar entaksah khaenapang ringru ing, Aafhuw khaena iringnii khaenache, Aafhuw ing aangkhenglaang khaena thikka athar hangringsa.

Chukhaenache kenuw ing mee achuw yngkhehpang chukho hak-chaang nache manghuwmah ung; kenuw ing Khrista chu hakchaang nache manghuwkhang nungle, atiive Aafhuw chu hakchaang yngkheh-vaang ichii ing manghuwmah sung.
Chukhaenache achuw yngkheh mee ing Khrista ningnache ongnave, ama itharpeh mee chusa; baruw chaapchu omahchirsa. Enruw, aangkhenglaang hungthar chirsa.
Aangkhenglaang havi Thangnang ningtaniiva, Thang-nang ing inuwchu Khrista ajaarna atak thohche aanruniichu tuka, kening nache athar aanrunii nong tuniichu ympeehpa;

amachuve, laaruw mee ing isii areen vakhaechu mandenpeehru ing, Thangnang ing Khrista ningnache iongpeehka, laaruw paamchu Aafhuw thohche aanrunii atupa, vokhehkho aanrunii yntupeeh khaenache isa chongchu Aafhuw ing kening nache ymmansirpa.
Chukhaenache Thangnang ing kenjaarna ymbasoh vaange, kenuw ing Khrista khaena changdenmee ynsuwh ungka athen nache kenriirsahnah: Thangnang thoh aanrunii itupeehruw.
Aafhuw ajaarna inuw ing Thangnang mee ichumchu ynsuwhnii khaena, isii amanghuw mahdeh Aafhuw chu ynchangden nache Thangnang ing isii icher mee abasuwpa.
Thangnang thoh ynruw ing nong tuhak ungka, nenuw inche Thangnang atungsiihchu ikaniimah ing nenpha aansuwhniimah khaena, kenthamsah nahchuw.
Chukhaenache rungaeruw Thangnang ing ariirchu:
“Ynrupeeh aphane ki ing nenuwchu kasiipeeh pachuw;
amanche manlaenpeeh iniine ki ing nenuwchu kabomsah pachuw.”
Enruw, ataraene irupeehnii apha chuva;
enruw, ataraene manlaen-peehnii inii chuva!
Kenuw kenongtuna ynraar aomnii-mah ing, vokhehkho laanglam khi mansiinii asuwhniimahdeh inche, Thangnang nong kentuva ichiichu kenong inche aangkhenglaangna kemandangva.
Thangnang meenae yngkheh ynsuwh ing, kenuw ing ajaehmeh ikhaangtahna, ijachaamna, laepah isiinii chaap nache, ichirpak nache,
hebin vebin nache, kaeshumna vanuh vanuh ong kenpha nache, chong suwhnii nache, ijapak ing nong kentu aanem nache, jaarrudeh ing maaru kentong thoche;
ynthiing nache, kemanghuw nache, ningsiih nache, ynthiing laetha nache, ichum ningsiih nache,
ichum chong nache, Thangnang ruwreng thohche; tari tachang nache ichum ynthiing laarchem ajaar inche,
kenuwchu ymmanruung ae vokhehkho ynrathiih ae; amanche ningjakkho ympeeh ae vokhehkho ymmanpah ae, kenuwchu emare vatah ichii ing ynriae, chang-vakonchu ichumchu ichong ung;
Ymmanghuw peeehmah ae mee vakhang nungle, kenuwchu mee vakhae ing ymmanghuwsa; ithii mee ae vaangche takhang nungle enruw, kenuw ringnung; imanjakhang ae nare ithehmah ae,

ijachaam phakhang nungle anasiir nache kenrotha rohna; sara mee ae vaang takhang nungle, mee aanem savang kembasuwsa; aadeenmahdeh mee ae vaang takhang nungle, ataraen phanii ing keningnache aangkhenglaang omchirna.
Kaarang Korinthia mee ae! Neningna kenuw ing ichiimjaeh ing chongnung; kenuw ing kembarungriir barang ungka kemanruungnah.
Kenuw kembarungriir sungna nenuwchu manchirtuwng mahchuwng; changvakonchu nentaksahchu nening nemansiih tahnache nenbarungriir manchir chuwka kenuwchu ynthincheh-mah vachuw.
Atiive ki ing kasiti ae ningna vaang ichong sahping; kenuw ing nengkhaena vakhar kendeen vaange, nenuw ingkho nenvakharchu imansii saruw. Nenbarungriirchu ynjaahak ing ibarang peehruw!
Thachamah mee aethoh riingkor reenhak mahruw, akhaechuve ynsaang khenche ichum re ichummahchu ynruwhak vaatae? Ynsaang khenche ireng re ynthimchu onghak vaatae?
Ynsaang khenche Khrista re Umlae-chu engaanrunii omne; amanche thacha mee re thachamah meechu ynchii nakhe engaanchum haknii omkhang?
Vokhehkho Thangnang rumniieen re ichummah lae ruthaksii aethoh ynchii enganrunii chongpham omkhang? Yngkhaena ynchii imbe nenuw chuve iring Thangnang rumniieen vachuw; Thangnang ing ariirvasah vaang,
“Ki ing engkaar nache ongva kata
vokhehkho karkhiingva kata;
Ki enuw Thangnang ynsuwhva kata,
amanche enuw inche kamee ynsuwh vaatae.”
Chukhaenache Aafhuw ing ariir,
“Nenuw ing enuwchu bathen aeruw vokhehkho eningtanii hungsuwh nuwna asik ing tiingruw,
amanche ynthiingmah ynchiitanga parmahdehruw;
amanache ki ing nenuwchu iraangva kachuw.
Amanache ki ing nenpa ynsuwhva kata,
vokhehkho nenuw ing kasapa kasanuw ynsuwhva nenta taka aangkhenglaang Aacheh Aafhuw ing ariirnah.”

Chukhaenache kaning kamansiih kauw kanae ae, chongreep vakhae havi ymphasah khaenache, yntaksah ing hakchaang re laethachu ynthiing-mah tanii manthiing samanuwka, Thangnang ichiithoh ynruw ing mapung ipha ing inuw manthiingtaruw.

Nenuw nenbarungriir sungna kenuwchu ongnii ipisaruw; kenuw ing achuw mee yngkheh taklina raarsamah ung, kenuw ing achuw yngkheh pangkho ijachaam pimah ung, kenuw ing achuw mee yngkheh ningtanii kaaniiva kenchii tusamah ung.
Ki ing nenuwchu ynraarnii khaena kariirmahva, ithiihak vanakho, iringhak vanakho, kembarungriir sungna nenuw omnachuw ta ingka mamaenna kariirpa.

Nenuw neningtingche ichongnii kataklina thona inempak omna, nengkhaena kaangaenii ompakna, tuning riningka ichii thona inche kaningna bariimka omna, kenjanii aangkheng nache rotharoh ing kaningna bariimka omna.
Changvakonchu yntuursah aechu barungriir amanungaepeeh Aafhuw Thangnang ing Taitas ivatheng ajaarna kenbarungriir abathaepa.

Atak ivathengpang inche kenbarungriir bathaejaeh mahka, aajaehmeh nenuw ing aningna abarungriir nenbathae-peehchu amanthang yachen khomba. Ama ing keningna ariir chuve, nenuw ing kichu aajaehmeh munungka ynchiichuw, aajaehmeh ijasahchuw, kakhaena nenruwthuwh iruwh, ama vakhae inche athar athiseh ing karotha rohsa.

Ki ing nenuwchu kachongthen inge nenbarungriir manja khangningle, ama khaena kaning ichimmah tumah ing; kaning chimmah khangnare chongthen ama ingkhe nenuwchu amongpang khaena vakhangnare nenbarungriir amanjasa ichii kamusahsa.

Atiive nenbarungriir amanjanii khaena mahka, nenbarungriir huungnii ipha ing ijachaam nenpha khaena karotha rohsakna; yngkhaena ynchii imbe nenuw ing keningtanii imaangchu nenphaniimah khaenache, Thangnang ing amanden inuwzii ing nenbarungriir amanjapa.

Akhaechuve Thangnang ynden tahna ija inche barungriir huungnii basuwka manlaenpeeh aphanah vokhehkho nungaeniimah yntangakho omah, changvakonchu laaruw paam khaena barungriir ija inche ithiichu aphanah.

Enruw, Thangnang ynden tahna nenbarungriir ija ama ingkhe neningna hungom chuve, nentaksah aajaeh ynriimchuw, ichuwhmah nongtu tanii nentaksah yncheersahchuw, ichiisuwh ipuwngnii nongtanii, aajaeh nenbarungriir iruwh, huwthungnii aajaeh omna! Hava vakhae taniichaap nenuw manthiing sachuw ichiichu nemandangpa.

Chukhaenache ki ing neningna chongthen baziihdoh khang ningle, ynraar atu mee khaena mahva, vokheh-kho araar vasah mee khaena khom mahva, changvakonchu nengkhaena kenuw ing kengariimpeeh chuwchu Thangnang mik enna yndangnii khaenache chongthen havi kabaziihpa.

khaenache nenbarungriir inungaenache kenuw kenbarungriir chukho nungaesa, vokhehkho Taitas arotha iroh khaena chenkho athiseh ing kenrotha rohsa, yngkhaena ynchii imbe nenuw vakhae ing alaetha ijachu nenbasumpeehpa.

Amana laanglam ki ing nengkhaena aningna-che ruungnii ningve, kaning ynjaknii omah, changvakonchu kenuw ing neningna aangkhengna ichum ing ichong vaang ungkhe, Taitas taklina kenuw iruungniisah ung chukho ichum ynsuwhsa.

Vokhehkho nentaklina aningsiih omchu hungpirna, akhae-chuve ama ing nenuw vakhae ing chongriir ynjii ing omchuwchu aansiisa, amachuve nenuw ing atakchu nenchiisah vokhehkho ynchiim ing nenbariimsahpa.
Chukhaenache aangkhenglaangna nentaklina kaba-rung ngamnii om khaena karotha rohna.
Amachuve ijachaam aajaeh sungna enrotha irohpak inche enuw ing deensahmah khang ae nare, adeensah-mah ningna barungriir iruung thohche ipeehtahna hungpir sehsehnae.
Ki ing saarkhii kapeehsanah amachuve, enuw enchehsah inuwzii ing endeensah tanii inempak pinungka ichii ing empeehpa.
Enuw ing ynthiing ae ningnache ibomsahnii khaena keningna ynthamsahpae.
Havi kenuw ing kemanden chumahka, Thangnang ing amanden ajaarna enuw ing amaensana entaksah ing Aafhuw ningnache vokhehkho keningnache ympeehpae.
Chukhaenache havana nong i abasen Taitas ningnache inuumnii khaena, vokhehkho athurfhuw ningsiih nong havi aman-chinii inche atakchu kembasohsahva.
Chutahnache nenuw ing thacha nache, ichongnii nache, ynghuwnii nache, bariimsah nache, vokhehkho kentaklina neningsiih om, hava vakhaene iruungchuw vaang atungsiih nachehkho hungruungruw.
Ki ing chonghak kapeehmah vachuw, changvakonchu mee areh aeng ibomsah engadikchu kamandangniiva, ki ing neningsiihchu aajaehmeh man-thiingne ichiichu ka-enniiva.
Nenuw ing Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tungsiihchu nemanghuwsa; amachuve Aafhuw ing savang khangnare, Aafhuw asara inche nenuwchu savang basuwnii khaena ama ing nengkhaenache sara ynsuwhsa.
Ki ing kamandensah chuve ajaenkum nenbasen amakha atarae nemanchi inche nengkhaena sakseh vaata. Nenuw vatahchuw maensa ing tukenta ichiijaeh mahka, tunungka nenchii ing nentuchu.
Changvakonchu tunungka ichii nemanden om vaangkhe, nenuw ing nemandensah tanii chaap nemanchinii inche, nentu nong chukho atarae manchiruw.
Nenuw ing pinungka tatanuwve, nendeensah inuwzii ing nenpeehchu Thangnang ing iraang vaata, nendeen sahmah inuwzii ing mahnii.
Ki ing mee reentaang aechu jabasumnii khaena amanche nening nache peehriknii khaena kariirmahva.
Changvakonchu aanchimnii khaenava, enuw aanem aengkho nenvaehnii nache ymbom aenii ing, apha havane enuw aanem ing envaehnii nache nenbom inche sakna; amatah nache aanchimnii khaena vatah.
Havi jinge ichii ing ynziih vasahva, “Inem amangkong mee inche ynchiikho bariimah, amanche topohpang amankong mee inchenkho vaehmahdeh.”
Taitas ningna kithoh aanghak ing nenuwchu ibomsahnii barungriir eepeeh Thangnang ningnache manpahsa taruw.
Aningna ken-thamsahchu atatak ing ynrupeeh pangmahka, ataksah ingkho ynriimsahpak vakhaka siningka ichii ing neningting ivasiva.
Vokhehkho Taitas atakthoh ynruw ing isa chong nong tunii khaena ruwrthiing vakhae kaarna ynjasuwhpak unae havi kenuw ing kenvechiirva.

Havipang mahka atak i ruwrthiing vakhae ing iteerka vokhehkho pham thinka, kenuw thoh ynruw ing Aafhuw alaar isa khaena ningsiih nong havi ituhaknii ing vokhehkho bom nungka ichiichu mandang nungka kenchii khaenava.
Kenuw ing itufhuw nong kentuna aaruunghak kikthuur havi khaene achuw yngkheh ing kenuwchu ymmanraar niimah ing havi kemansirva.
Akhaechuve Aafhuw mik en nachenpang mahnaka, mee ae mik en nakho nong aangkheng asaknii khaena kenuw ing maensa ing vakhar kentu.

Amanche nong aanem nache, apha aanem nache ynriimne ynriimmah ichii khaena apha aajaeh ibuwrsa ungka, neningna inempak abarungriir ireep ing thacha om khaenache, atak i enuw thohne neningting kenvebathenva.
Taitas khaena chembe, atak i kaanruwfhuw meeva, vokhehkho nengkhaena kithoh nong kentuhak meeva; amanche unae ae enuw ichuve Khrista alaar isa ruwrthiing ae chong aareen mee chupae.
Chukhaeanche itheng ruwrthiing ae maane nentaklina ningsiih om vokhehkho nengkhaena kenruungniichu imandangpeehruw.
Atii ynthiing ae ningna nentu nong khaenakhe neningna ivebaziih ikanii omah.

ibomnii khaena nenbarungriir iruwhchu ki ing kamanghuwsa, amanche ki ing Mesidonia ae ningna ruungnii ingka kariir, “Akhaia aeng ajaenkum basenka ibomnii khaena thoraang emanchipa.” Nenuw nenbarungriir iruwhdeh inge mee aanem aechu nengathohsahpa.
Changvakonchu nengkhaena kenruungniichu aruwh thangsii aansuwhniimah ing, ki ing kariirvasah vaangkhe nenthoraang aomnii khaena, kauw kanae aechu kajebathenva.
Kithoh ynruw ing Mesidonia mee ae ing enthenglae nenuw ing thoraang hengommah tanuwve, icheep ing ithacha khaene kenuwkho nenuwkho laanglam ningjak iphakho arusa.

Chukhaenache kauw kanae ae, kenuw ing mamaenna neningting kenvasi raenkhe, nenuw ing ahaarpa kikthuur pivakenta nenchii-kha manerrudeh inche piningka ichii nenthoraangchu achichirnii khaenache, maensa ing ynthang ing sakvaata ta ingka kamandensahva.
Ki ing havi kariirnah, ituum avor mee inche ituum ruwpvaata amanche inem avor mee inche inemhak ruwp-vaata.
Mee aangkheng amaner ing changmahka ipipham isuwhva taru ing ataksah ing amanden inuwzii ing pirasiing; yngkhaena ynchii imbe rotharoh ing ipeehchu Thangnang ing aning amansiihnah.
Vokhehkho aangkhenglaangna apha omba khaena ivaeh omrudeh ing isa nong tunii nentaklina aomnii ing, Thangnang ing nentaklina atungsiih amanemchehsa.
Ynziihvasa ing jinge ariirsa,
“Ama ing barungriir iruungpak ing apeehpa,
ama ing sara naeriing mee ae ningnache apeehpa,
Meeningsiih ataklina omchu ichen naerudeh ing anasiirna omna.”
Amanche amuw avor mee ningnache amuw vokhehkho isahfhuwchu ympeeh Aafhuw inche amuwchu ipikho ipivaata, inemkho imanempeeh vaata, amanche nenuw ing meeningsiih nendeen aanlachu ihemannempeeh vaata.
Manerrudeh ing nenpeeh inche nenuwchu aangkhenglaangna savang ibasuw vaata, amana chembe kenuw kenjaar nache mee aenche Thangnang manpah vaatae.
Nongruw havi khaene ynthiing aechu envaehniimah khaenapang mahva, Thangnang ympah niikho ahenthisehseh niiva.
Nong havi nemandang ajaarna, Khrista isa chong manjiichuwka nemanthang re eningna vokhehkho mee vakhaena barungriir iruungpak ing piningka ichii ing nenpeeh khaenache enuw ing Thangnang emanpahsa,
amanche nentaklina Thangnang tungsiih iruungpak ing om khaena enuw ing nenuwchu imandensa aeka nengkhaena enthamsahva.
Ariirfhuwchah ing Thangnang kikthuur khaena Aafhuw chu manpahsataruw.

Ki ing nenuw thoh kaonglae nengkaarna ynjuursah ing, changvakonchu yngonghakmah raen-che neningting kabarungriir iruwh ing kamandensahchuw Pol ki ing, Khrista barungriir idim vokhehkho iduwr ajaarna kathamsahnahchuw.

Kenuwchu hakchaang manden inuwzii ing isipae ita aeka emanden mee topoh ae taklina, thona mandang kata ta ingka kamanreep thoh ynruw ing thonachu kaningna aomlaenche, kamandangniimah ing neningna kariirsahnah.
Kenuw hakchaang manden inuwzii ing sikhang nungre, hakchaang manden inuwzii ing laar tukmah ung.
Kenlaar tuknii laangchem chuve hakchaang tanii mahva, changvakonchu ipirpak bang phanii ing abakhiichehnii Thangnang ningna laar chehnii ruwrengchu omna,
aangkheng vokhehkho Thangnang losing jeehnii aeka iruungsah ae yngkaangpak nong aangkhengchu kenuw ing namaang ungka, barungriir aangkhengchu Khrista chongriir ynjii phaniipha ing kenhenreensa.
Vokhehkho nentaklina om chongriir ynjiinii barungriir amakha mapung ahenpharaenche, chongriir ynjiimah aangkhengchu ponti pinii kenthoraang omna.

Nenuw ing nemaana om peeh chupang nengennah. Achuw mee yngkheh ing Khrista meeping tanaka ataksah pangchu ynthacha sanave, ataksah ing athar vakhar turasiing, ama ing Khrista mee ynsuwh vaang, kenuw chukhompung.
Kenuw ing kentu kenrine ruungniisakhang nungkho, nenuwchu iseemnii khaena Aafhuw ing aatuaricheh ympiva, nenuwchu aansehnii khaena mahva, ki utaraenkho ningjak phamahning.
Kabaziih vasah ae chongthen ingkhe nenuwchu kamanchiihnii vachuwvaang nemandenniimah ing havi kariirva.
Enuw ing enriirnah, ama achongthen ynziih vakhae i rikna vokhehkho pirna, changvakonchu atak ynvae inchembe suurna, vokhehkho achongriir i yntanga khommahva.
Changchii mee aenche manghuw aerasii amachuve, kengongmah raenkho amanche nenuw thoh kengongtah nakho tuva kenchii chuve, kembaziih chongthen havi thoh yngkhehpang vatah.

Kenuw chuve achuw yngkheh ataksahpang ympahsah mee ae thohche ruwr yngkhae vokhehkho yndeengnii khaena thona omah ung, changvakonchu enuw chuve enareersahna yngkheh re yngkheh emanghuwchu uur aeka vokhehkho yndeengniisah ae; enuw ichuve ising mahpae.
Changvakonchu kenuw chuve nenuw phanii ing vaphanii Thangnang ing auur chumahnaka, lamrii aaraenjop ing kenuw ruungnii mahnung.
Akhaechuve ama lamrii inae sungnache nenuw ynvaevachuw khaka, kenuw ing lamriichu iraenru ing Khrista isa chongchu vereen ungka nening nache ivathengpung.
Kenuw ing arii aaraen ing reentaang ae nong nache ruungniimah ung; changvakonchu nenthachachu henthisehseh naka, kenuw ing nengkaar nache iruungpak nong itu phasava kenta ichii ing kemandensahnah.
Chukhaenache kenuw ing nenuw veraen nungchuwka isa chongchu tongnungka, vokhehkho mee reentaang ae nong ichivasah nache ruungnii samahnung.
Chang-vakonchu iruungsah ama inche Aafhuw khaenache ruungsarasii.
Ataksahpang ympahsah meechu rupeehmahnii, Aafhuw ing amanpah meechu rupeeh vaata.
Ki kapangniisah topoh aom-tahna, nenuw ing kataklina ikhaangpeeh kaadiksanah. Nenuw atatak ing ikhaangpeeh saruw,
Thangnang ing kallak vaang, kikho nengkhaena kallakping; nenuw i ynthiingjaeh rupanuw pasar yngkheh thoh rakhiinii khaena ki ing chongreep katu thoh aanghak vachuw, amachuve Khrista chuva.
Changvakonchu baruwr ingkhe Eve ningna amanchae khavaang, laanglam Khrista ningna nenbarungriir ingiir vasah nakhe vokhehkho ynthiing vasah tanii ymbathiih arusa ichii khaena ki ynchikning.
Neningna ivatheng mee ing kenuw ing kentongmah reentaang Jesu tongnave, changmahka nenuw ing nensiimahri reentaang isa chong ritanuwve, ama dernache nenuw ongvachuw!
Ki chuve Khrista chongthang ae kaarna masak inae yngkhehping vokhehkho yntuurmahdeh ing ichii kataksah ing yngkharning.
Changva-konchu ki ing ichong tahna ihaesamah iveer samah vakhang ningle ynghuwmah changchiimah dehping; changvakonchu aangkhenglaangna apha vakhaena kenuw ing havi neningna kemandangsahva.
Ki ing neningna ngareh ing Thang-nang isa chong katong inge, nenuw ahungruungnii khaenache kataksahchu ynsiingsah ingka ki isii katupe?
Ki ing nening nache nong tunii khaena reentaang ruwrthiing ae tanii ruthamen ri ingka enuwchu kasiihpe?

vokhehkho ki nenuw thoh onghak ingka kavaeh raenche, achuw yngkheh peeh rikniichu ki ynsuwhmahdeh ing; Mesidonia tanii itheng unae aenche kavaehnii aangkhengchu ympipeehsah ae; vokhehkho neningna peeh riknii omvachii tanii chaap kataksahna yndiisahping, vokhehkho kataksahna yndiisava kata.
Ichum Khrista chu kaningna om khaena, Akhaia paam nache karuungsahnii khaena eekhaam omahnii.
Ynchii khaenava? Ki ing nenuwchu kaning kamansiih mahchuw khaenava? Kaning kamansiih chuwchu Thangnang ing amanghuwsa.
Changvakonchu reentaang chongthang aeng enong tunache enruungniimah khaenache, ki ing katu karichu itukho tuvakata.
Hangchii mee ae ichuve ichummah chong areen, ichummah nong entu, Khrista chong-thang aethoh entaksah ing emanchim mee chupae.
Havi ingiknii mahva, amachuve umlae ingkho ataksahchu ireng vaarmee aethoh aanghaknii ing atuchehnah.

Chukhaenache ama anong atu mee aenche entaksahchu ichum ynthiing nong atuae thoh aanghakvaang takhang ae nare, amachu iruungpak chongmahva; engkhaena achiniideh chuve entaksah enongtu inuwzii ing vaata.
Ki ing athar kariirnah, achuw mee yngkhehpang ingkho kichu ipangva ichii ing irimah rasiing; changche ichii ing rinave, ki ingkho topoh karuungnii inche, ipang vaangche kichu eeraangsaruw.
Ki ing kariir chong havi Aafhuw ing amanden inuwzii ing ichong mahping, changvakonchu ipang ing iruungsahnii khaena, icheep ing kathacha ajaar inche ichongping.
Mee aanem ing hakchaang inuwzii ing iruungsah ae khaena, ki ingkho iruungsahping.
Nenuwve ising iveer vachuw khaka, ipang aechu rotharoh ing nenbajuum chehsa.

Achuw yngkheh ing nenuwchu suwh ibasuw nave, achuw yngkheh ing nenuwchu isuwr nave, achuw yngkheh ing nenuwchu chaangna imangu nave, achuw yngkheh ing ataksah ing ruungsa nave, achuw yngkheh ing nemaena eebeeng nave, nenuw ing changchii mee aechu nengahpeeh chehnah.
Kenuw ing suurnung kenchii vaang, kataksah ing ningjak ympisa ingka ichongping. Changvarap khangnare achuw yngkheh ing ynchii yngkhehna ruungniinave (ipang ing ichongping) kikho ruungniining.
Enuw Hebreeu chupae? Ki khomping. Enuw Isrel ae chupae? Ki khomping. Enuw Abraham tuti ae chupae? Ki khomping.

Enuw Khrista nongtu meenae chupae? (Ki kataksah ing ynveehvaang chongning) Enuwchu inempak ki ing kathisae; nongtu nakho inempak kathisae, kaeshumna ong inempak kathisae, rumor isahna masing naemah, ithii phanii ing phava kachii nemna.
Jehudi ae ningtanii rumorbuw somanriina yngkheh ita ing varungameh kaaraang.
Rumor ing kichu vathumchak manvarpae, athar rung ing yndeengpae, vathummeh ruwkuwng ikiichu kaantuwhfhuwpa, jaenkheh siimkheh chifhuw sungna ijachaam kapha.

Kasi katungnii aajaehna, chii iriim vokhehkho lamruw ae tanii ichiisuwh, kalipah khaena mee ae tanii ichiisuwh, reentaang mee ae tanii ichiisuwh, khuwruung sungna ichiisuwh, lamrakna ichiisuwh, chifhuw tanii ichiisuwh, ichummah mee ae kaarna ichiisuwh,

ipir ing nong itu vokhehkho ijachaam aajaeh kakhaang; ympehrudeh ing kakhaang nache, venchaam chiilaar nache, maaru itongchak nache, pharbuw isik kaarnache vokhehkho isingfhuw peen ivaeh nache ibusah ing.
Amanche reentaang riirrudeh ing, athiseh ing ruwrthiing aangkhenglaang khaena ningsa ithi ing anasiir kataklina iderka omna.
Achuw yngkheh suurnii nache kikho isuurmah pingkhang? Achuw yngkheh ijachaam nache kikho ama khaena mi isuwh ing kakhaangmah vakhang?
Ki ing ruungsa ningve, kavaehnii aanem khaenache ki ruungsava kata.
Aafhuw Jesu Thangnang kho ampa kho ynsuwh, ichen naemah ing manpah vaanchii Aafhuw inche, ki mare tumahdeh ing ichii ymmanghuwpeehsa.
Ki ing Damaskas na kaonglaenche, iruwng Aretas derna lipah aapuh inche kichu isuwrnii khaena khuwruungchu aarung mee asiih.
Changvakonchu bukaang nache katakchu ithin aeka bang ihuk nache ibabuw aeka iring kapha.
Ikaanii omahkhang nare, ki ing ruungsava kachiiting bukna; changvakonchu Aafhuw ing ympeeh ruvaam re amandang aanemchu ki ing riirsava kata.

Kumsuum ariimanrii aphapa, ki ing Khrista ningna yndii mee yngkheh kamanghuwsa (Hakchaang ynvaeva ynvaemahva ki manghuwmah ing, Thangnang ing amanghuwsa), hangchii mee havichu avomanthumnii thangbaen ipha inche vat ajekipa.
Amanche hangchii mee ichu ki ing kamanghuwsa amachuve, (Hakchaang ynvaeva ynvaemahva ki manghuwmah ing, Thangnang ing amanghuwsa) amachuve hava mee ichu Paradais tingche ajekipa,
amanche mee ing iriir thaangthaang niimah chong ama ing asiipa.
Hangchii mee ae khaena ki ruungniisava kata, changvakonchu kataksah khaena chembe kasuurnii mahnaka ruungniisamah dehning.

Ki ing iruungsah idik ningve, ki ipang ynsuwh mahning, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ki ichumchu chongva kata; changvakonchu achuw yngkheh mee ing imukhangnare, kaningtanii asii vakhangnare, athiseh ing kakhae nache manden vaata ta ingka ynjuursaning.

Vokhehkho kaningna amandang vakhae khaenache kaandingniimah khaena, kahakchaang nache iring ynsinnii yngkheh ympipa, havi katak-sah kaandingniimah inche, akhuning ing eeteenchu umlae vaarmee ynsuwhsa.
Havi khaene kaningtanii aampeennii inche ki ing Aafhuw ningnache vathumchak kaniihsahpa.

Amana Aafhuw inche kaningna ariir, “Katungsiihchu nakhaena ivaehmahdeh ing omna, akhaechuve karuwrengchu isuur mee taklinache amanpirniiva.” Chukhaenache Khrista ruwrengchu kataklina aomnii inche, athiseh ing kasuurnii vakhae nache rotharoh ing yndingniiva kata.

Ama khaenache ki ing kasuurnii chaap nache, ruming thinii chaap nache, ijanii chaap nache, ithipak ing kataklina entunii nache, ichir chaap nache kapensahnii ynsuwhsakna; akhaechuve kasuurnii nache karuwreng pirsehna.
Kataksah ing ipang ymbusing, nenuw ing kichu ipang ymbabupachuw; katak i yntangamah khangningle imanpahva nenchii raprapva, ki chuve Khrista chongthang ae kaarna yntuurlepmah ing.
Atatak ing chongthang nongchu yndangnii khaena, ingiknii vokhehkho laethochu nengkaarna katupa.
Katak i neningna peeh rikniimah ynsuwhniimah naka, reentaang ruwrthiing ae tanii nenuw nensuurnii ynchii omkhang? Hava ynraar khaene kichu ikuhpeehsaruw.

Enruw, ki ing neningna kavasinii khaena thoraang katu havi inge avomanthumnii aphapa, amanche ki neningna peehrikniichu ynsuwhsamah ing, havi kariirnii chuve neningtanii iphafhuwchu jongmah dehning kachiiniiva, changvakonchu nenuwchu kajong vachuw; akhaechuve siti ae inche amnuw ampa khaena lerchii ynghuwngpham suwhmah, amnuw ampa inche siti ae khaenache lerchii ynghuwngpham isuwhva.

Vokhehkho nenlaetha khaena ki ing kadeenchu aajaehmeh rotharoh ing tingva kate, amanche katakkho itingrap tingva kata. Ki ing nenuwchu hangjaehmeh kaning mansiih ningchuwve, ki ningsiih nache ivaeh reehping?
Changvakonchu havi irupeehruw, ki ing nenuwchu losing ing vokhehkho mare tuka ynsuwrva ichii ing amanden mee ynvaenachuw.
Ki ing neningna kavechiir achuw yngkheh ajaarnache neningtanii katuungsahnii kaphape?

Ki ing Taitas ithohsa ingka amathoh ynruw ing reentaang unae yngkhehchu kachiirpae. Taitas ing nening tanii ynchii yngkheh atuungsahnii aripe? Laetha yngkhehna inuw ing isihakmah muwkhang? Karkhiing yngkhehpangna ikhiinghaknii khaenamah vakhang?

Nenuw apha hangsenne kenuw ing nening nache yndiiniipung ichii ing nemandenva, Thangnang mik enna Khrista mee ynsuwh ing ichongpung. Changvakonchu nenuwchu iseemnii khaena aangkhenglaang hunginsuwhsa.

Ki ynchikning, amachuve laanglam ki ing kathengtahna, ki ing kamanden vaang nenuwchu kaphamah chuwkho arusa, vokhehkho nenuw ing nemanden vaang kikho nenuw ing iphamah arusa; ynnahnii, kallak, thirfhuwr siipak, ataksah khaenapang amanden, thaechii thaenam ichong, meenuw meemahting ichong, ynding, chong suwhnii ynchii yngkheh omkho arusa.
Athar ki ing kathenglae, ka Thangnang ing nentuwr maana kichu ymmanjuur lepkho arusa; amanche athar isii nong tureeh ae naka ki ichap kaphakho arusa ta ingka ynchiksaning.
Ki ing neningting vathengva kachii havi inge avomanthumnii vachiiva. Mee ynnii ynthum tanii nerna chong aangkheng saarkhii omvachiiva.

Amaenna isii atuvasah ae ningna vokhehkho reentaang ae vakhae nakho ki ing ajaenkhe kariirpa, ki ing avomaniina nenuw thoh kaonglaennii vaangkhe, atarae ongmahkhang ningkho, maen ing kariirnah athar vokheh vatheng ningve, enuwchu ki ing karpeehmah aening.
Khrista ing kabarungriir sungna ichong buwtinniichu nenuw ing nenjongnah; Aafhuw ing utaraenkho nening yntongting suurmahdeh, changvakonchu nenuw nengkaarna ruwrengchu pirjaehna.

Aafhuw chu isuurpak ing khros nache enthehpa, changvakonchu Thangnang ruwreng inche Aafhuw ing hangringsa. Inuwkho Aafhuw thohche suurhak manuw, changvakonchu Thangnang ruwreng inche inuwkho Aafhuw thohche hangringhak vataruw.

Nenuw thacha nache ong vachuw ongmah vachuw ichiichu nentaksah ing ynghuwsaruw, vokhehkho kharsaruw. Changmahka Jesu Khrista chu nenbarungriir sungna omah ichiichu nentaksah inche nemanghuwmah vakhang? Omahnave, nenuwchu ynrumah tahnava.
Chang-vakonchu kenuwchu ynrumah omah ichii nenuw ing manghuwva nenta ta ingka kamandensahnah.
Atarae nenuw ing ynchii tanga isamah nentuniimah ing kenuw ing Thangnang ting kenthamsahnah; havi kenuw ynruchu yndangnii mahka, ynrumah vakhangnare, nenuw inche isachu nentunii khaena chenva.
Kenuw ing ichumchu jeehnii nungka ynchii tangakho itu chehmahnung, changvakonchu ichum khaenache kentusahva.
Akhaechuve kenuw ing kensuur raenche nenuw ing ihungpir chuwchu kenuw atatak ing kenrotha rohna; nenuw nenghungsakniiseh khaena kenuw ing kenthamsahva.
Ynsehchirnii khaena mahka, ahen-seemnii khaena Aafhuw ing kaningna aatuaricheh ympipeehsah inuwzii ing, ki ing neningna kaonglaenche ithipak ing yntuniimahchuw ing, kaongmah raenche kavebaziihva.

Akuurchiimna kauw kanae ae, salaam kajetusahnachuw. Nenlam hemanchumruw, kariir i isiipeehruw, barungriir yngkhehpang ing ompeehruw, idae inche ipaar peehruw, amana chembe Thangnang ningsiih re idae inche nenuwchu eenruwfhuw vaata.
Yngkheh yngkheh ynthiing salaam ynturuw.
Khristen vakhae ing nenuwchu salaam ynjetusahnah ae.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tungsiih re Thangnang ningsiih vokhehkho anasiirna eenruwfhuw ynthiing laetha inche nenuw vakhaechu eenruwfhuw ynsuwhrasiing. Amen.
Mee ae tanii vokhehkho mee ae ajaar tanii mahdehva, changvakonchu Jesu Khrista re atakchu ithii tanii amanring Apa Thangnang tungsiihna chongthang ivi Pol ki ing,
vokhehkho havane ong ae kauw kanae aangkheng ing Galatia ruwrthiing neningna salaam kenjepeehsahnahchuw:
Apa Thangnang vokhehkho Jesu Khrista tanii tungsiih re idaechu neningna om ynsuwhrasiing.
Apa Thangnang ing amanden inuwzii ing laaruw paam apha ichamah tanii inuwchu ikarpeehnii khaena Jesu ataksahrap ing isii icher inuw yngkhaenache ympidehsa;
Apa Thangnang ningnache ichen naemah alaar isachu om ynsuwhrasiing. Amen.
Khrista tungsiih ing yngeen vasah nenuw ing, reentaang isa chong tingche nengaangheer tahnache ki inempak ngikning.
Atatak chuve reentaang isa chong omah, changva-konchu mee topoh ae ing nenuwchu imanja aeka vokhehkho isa chongchu manraarnii khaena entuvatah.
Chu-khaenache neningna isa chong kentong vasah taklinakhe, reentaang isa chong yngkheh nening nache kenuwrap ingkho changmahka thangbaen tanii vaarmee ing tongnave, ama siraap pharasiing.
Kenuw ing mamaenna kenriir vasah vaangkhe, ataraenkho athar kariirnareeh, achuw yngkheh ing nengaraang vasah taklina reentaang isa chong tongnave, ama siraap pharasiing.
Ataraene mee ing aru changmahka Thangnang ing aruchu kajongva? Changmahka meengae chiiniichu kajongva? Ki ing meengae chiinii ing katu vanave, Khrista meenae yngkheh ynsuwhmahva kachiiva.
Kauw kanae ae, ki ing neningna kamanthangsahnah, amachuve ki ing katong isa chong havi laaruw mee ae tanii mahva.
Akhaechuve laaruw mee ningtanii iraangmahdeh ing vokhehkho achuw yngkheh ingkho imanchuwmah, changvakonchu Jesu Khrista ing kaningna ymmandangpeeh ajaarnava.
Ajaenche Jehudi ae ing ening inuwzii ing ki isi ingchu nenuw ing nensiipa, amachuve Thangnang ruwrthiing ae taklina uurnii isamah ing kamanja ae vokhehkho amaangnii katu.
Ki ing kafhuw kapa ae purah nache kabarungriir manruwhdeh ingka, kalipah mee ae kaarna Jehudi aeng ening nache isi maensa yngkheh-ping.
reentaang mee ae ningna Jesu Khrista thaminchu itongnii khaena kaning nache asapa chu amandangpa. Ki ing achuw mee yngkheh ningnakho chong yntahpeehnii khaena simah ing,
changmahka Jerusalem na ong kamana chongthang ivi vasah ae ningtingkho simah ing; changvakon-chu Arabia ting si ingka athar hunganrireeh ingka Damaskas ting huungsing.
Amana kumthum aanuwna Jerusalem ting Pitar yntuwhnii khaena vasi ingka amathoh inii nisuum arii runga onghak ung.
Amana Khrista anaepa Jems mahna-ka reentaang chongthang achuw tikho mumah ing.
Ki ing neningna kavebaziih vakhae havi ichumva, Thangnang maekungna mee ynchae mee mah-ping.
Aanuwnache Sairia re Sisilia paam tingche sising.
Amana Khrista enthacha Jehudi ruwrthiing aenche kichu imanghuwmah ae.
Changvakonchu isi vasahna inuwchu ymmanja mee ingkhe, amamaang vasah thachachu atarae atakrap ing atongreehna ichii chupang ensiisah ae;
amana enuw ing kakhaena Thangnang chu emanpahsah.

Amanache kaningna amandang inuwzii ing sisa ingka eningnache reentaang mee ae kaarna isa chong katongchu kamanthang, changvakonchu laanglam ikanii mahna itaenrom ingkho arusa ta ingka enthang isa mee ae ningna ynruwh ing kariir.
Changvakonchu kaanruwfuw Taitas Grik mee vakhangnare, vinchiipnii khaena mansinteehmah ing;
changvakonchu Jesu Khrista ajaarna inuw ing ruwkuwrjoh ing ong ymphachu ynruwh ing aanbuwr itheng ichummah aenche kenuwchu suwh ynsuwh engadik.
Changvakonchu isa chong ichumchu neningna aomjaehnii khaena, kenuw ing apha topoh pangkho endernache ongmah ung.
Changvakonchu aapuhpung achii mee aechu achuwchuw vakhangnare, kaningna chembe ynchii khommahpae; Thangnang ing maesiing maeruung khaemah vokhehkho kaningna chembe aapuh ae inche ithimahdeh ae.
Changvakonchu rakheh yngtongting vinchiip ae khaena isa chong tongnii Pitar ningna amansir vaang, kaning nakho vinchiipmah ae khaena isa chongchu ymmansirpa ichii enuw ing muaeka
vinchiip ae khaena Khrista chongthang ivi Pitar ningna ajeer vaang, Aafhuw ing reentaang mee ae khaena ki chukho chongthang ing pham ynthinpa.

Kaningna ympeehchu chongthang abur ynsuwh ae enruming isi Jems, Pitar vokhehkho Johon ae inche emanghuw tahna, kenuw inge reentaang mee ae ting amanche enuw ing vinchiip ae ting isinii khaena kaning nakho, Barnabas ningnakho, enuw ing nong ituhakchu vamuw ichii buwtinnii ing salaam yntupae.
Enuw ing sara naeriing aechu bahirmah ae manuw enchii amachurap kikho itunii khaena kabarungriir iruwh.
Pitar ing Entiok na avathenglae, ama ing isii icher ting ibuw khaena karakuh.

Akhaechuve Jems ningtanii achuw tikho avathengmah rirae, ama ing reentaang mee ae thoh thaemin asahhakpa; changvakonchu enuw aechu envathengtah nache ama ing vinchiip aechu chiika, vokhehkho ynsiirka ympeennii atupa.
Jehudi reentaang aengkho amathoh ynruw ing isingpak vaang siaeka Barnabas chukho avekipae.

Amana ichum isa chong inuwzii ing simahsae ichii kamutah nache, ki ing emae kungna Pitar chu karakuhpa, “Natakcha Jehudi chiika Jehudi ae vaang siruchii ing, reentaang mee ae vaang sichiika ynchii khaena reentaang mee aechu Jehudi ae vaang siruw nachiiva?”
Atatak ing inuw chuve Jehudi chuvamuw, amanche isii icher enreen reentaang mee ae khamahmuw;

changvakonchu mee vakhae i vajeer chonghak nong atutahna ichum mahva, Jesu Khrista ithacha nache ichumpeh vamuw ichiichu manghuw manuwka, vajeer chonghak nongchu turu ing Jesu Khrista chu ithacha inche ymmanchumnii khaenache kenuw ingkho kenthachapa; akhae-chuve vajeer chonghak nong inche achuw tikho manchum chehmah.
Chukhaenache kenuw ing Khrista ajaarna ichumchu kenjong tahna, isii icher pung ichii phanungve, Khrista chu isii nong atuvakhang? Amachu ynsuwh mahdeh rasiing!
Ki ing karen vasah tuning kachiimahchu athar vokheh tureeh ningve, ki isamah itu meeping ichii kataksah ing kamandangpa.
Akhaechuve ki ing Thangnang ningna iringnii khaenache vajeer chonghak ajaarna vajeer chonghak nache thiksing.

Jesu Khrista thoh ynruw ing khros na kichu ynthik fhuwpa; atii iring kaphasah i ki mahping, changvakonchu Khrista ing kataklina aringtah nava, vokhehkho atarae iring kaphasah i kichu aning imansiihka aringkum ympideh Thangnang sapa kathacha ajaarnache iring sahping.
Ki ing Thangnang tungsiihchu manpaam mahdeh ing, akhaechuve vajeer chonghak inche ichum ynthiing ynsuwhcheh vanave, khrista chu ikaniimah dehsa.
Ipang Galatia ae, nemaekung narap Jesu Khrista enthehchu, achuw ing ichummahva taka isinsaka ymmanchaepae?
Ki ing neningna yngkhehpang manghuw ningka kachiinah, nenuw ing vajeer chonghak nongna ynthiing laethachu nenphava? changmahka siichuwka nenthacha tahnava?
Nenuw aajaehmeh ipang vachuw! Ynthiing laetha ing basen chuwka, atii nenghakchaang nong ing nemanchiva?
Ikaniimahna ijachaam aajaehmeh nenphava! Jinge tatanuwve ikanii omahdehsa.
Chukhaenache Aafhuw ing neningna ynthiing laetha ipika, nengkaarna laetho nong atu hava vakhae i vajeer chonghak nong taniiva changmahka isa chongchu nenthacha tahnava?
Chukhae-nache thacha mee aechu Abraham siti aepae ichii manghuwruw.

Amanche Thangnang ing reentaang mee aechu thacha jaarnache manchum vaatae ichii ynthiing thiimziih ing maen ing muka, Abraham ningna maen ing isa chong jeerka ariir, “Najaar nache jaat aangkhenglaang bor pivakata achii.”
Amachu vaniive thacha inche enuwchu Abraham thoh ynruw ing bor emphapa.
Vajeer chonghak nong atu vakhae siraap dernache ongpae, akhaechuve ynthiing thiimziih ing ariir, “Vajeer chonghak na ynziih vakhae amanjii chehmah mee chaap Thangnang siraap derna ongva.”
Chukhaenache Thangnang ningna vajeer chonghak inche achuw tikho manchum chehmah ichii i atatakva, akhaechuve ichum mee inche athacha nache ringvaata.
Chukhaenache vajeer chonghak chuve thacha chumahva; changva-konchu aangkhenglaang amanjiicheh mee inche vajeer chonghak jaarna ringvaata.

Khrista ing inuw vakhae changdenna siraap apha eensuwh peehka, inuwchu vajeer chonghak tanii siraapchu ymbaripeehpa; havi khaena ynziih vasahva amachuve, “Achuw yngkheh thingrina ynlahka ithii chaapchu siraap aphava.”
Jesu Khrista ajaarna Abraham borchu reentaang mee ae taklina ipeehnii khaenava, amana chembe inuw ing thacha jaarnache laetha chongreepchu iphasahnii khaenava.
