Kauw kanae ae, ki laaruw mee barungriir inuwzii ing ichongping: Laaruw mee chongiir vakhangnare amachu reepchaknave, achuw ingkho bakhiichehmah changmahka ama taklinache vemanchumhak mahchak.
Atii chongreepchu Abraham vokhehkho atuti ningna atuvatah; ama ing atuti ae ningna tamah, changvakonchu yngkhehpang ningna achiivatah, amachuve Khrista va.
Ki ing havi kariirnah, Thangnang ing Khrista jaarna maen ing amanreep vasah vajeer chonghakchu kum chamanrii songthum aanuwna chongiir inche chongreepchu bakhii chehmah.
Akhaechuve iphafhuwchu vajeer chonghak tanii vaniive, chongreep chumahva; changvakonchu Thangnang chongreep ajaarnache Abraham ningna apeehsahva.

Changchen vanave vajeer chonghakchu ynchiiva? Chongreep aphavasah tuti Khrista ing ajungtheng phanii ing isii icher om khaena ber abuva; amanche aanuwmpeeh mee yngkheh kik inche vaarmee ae jaarna aseemva.
Atii aanuwmpeeh mee yngkheh inche yngkhehpang khaena anuwm mahva, changvakonchu Thang-nang chuve yngkhehpang vatah.

Thangnang chongreep vakhaechu vajeer chonghak ajeehniiva chang? Changmahdehva, akhaechuve iringniichu vajeer chonghak ing apeehcheh vaniive, atatak ing vajeer chonghak ajaar ing ichum ynthiingchu suwhpeh vachiiva.
Changvakonchu Jesu Khrista ningna ithacha jaarna chongreepchu thacha ae ningna ipeehnii khaenache, ynthiing thiimziih inche aangkhenglaang isii ruwreng derna amangompa.
Changvakonchu thacha atheng-mah rirae, nuwting hemandang vachii thacha khaena inuwchu vajeer chonghak derna isiika ommuw.
Chukhaena thacha inche inuwchu ymmanchumnii khaena vajeer chonghak inche Khrista ning ipha ing ynghencheerpa.
Changvakonchu atii thachachu ahungsuwhtah nache vajeer chonghak dernache inuw ongmah samuw.
Jesu Khrista ningna nenthacha ajaarna nenuw Thangnang siti ynsuwh sachuw.
Amachuve Khrista ningna baptais atu mee vakhae ing peen ising vaangkhe Khrista chu ynsingpa.
Jehudi kho Grik kho naemah; nenuw vakhae i Khrista Jesu ningnache yngkhehpang vachuw.
Amanche nenuw Khrista mee ynsuwh tanuwve, Abraham tuti chuvachuw vokhehkho chongreep inuwzii ing lerchii ruw ikuum sitichu ynsuwh sachuw.
Atarae ki ing kariirnah, ruw kuumvachii inche anaepang raen-taang ama ing aafhuw ynsuwkhaang nare, suwhthoh aantheepnii yntanga omah.
Chukhaenache ampa ing aanii amanaechu aphamahri raentaang, ama aacheer ae vokhehkho rukuumtu ae dernache ongva.
Amavaangche inuw ynnaepang raenche laaruw mee ing athurfhuwva ichii ing amanden dernache iphuwpka omvamuw.
Changvakonchu aphachu ahenphadeh tahnache, Thangnang inche rupanuw ing vajeer chonghak dernache abaring asapa chu ajenchiirpa;
amachuve asapa inche vajeer chonghak derna ong aechu ahenbarinii khaenava, amana chembe inuw ing ijuhsah sitichu ymphanii khaenava.
Amanche nenuw chuve asitichu ynsuwh vachuw khaka, Thangnang ing asapa laethachu nenbarungriir sungna ajenbathenpa, amana laetha inche Aba, Apa! taka uungna.
Chukhaenache nenuw suwhchu ynsuwhmah sachuw changvakonchu asiti ynsuwh sachuw, amanche asitichu ynsuwh vatanuwve, Khrista jaarna Thangnang ing adeenchu ruw kuumvachii ynsuwh sachuw.
Isivasahana Thangnang mang-huwmah chuwka nenuw ing thangnang mah aechu rukuum nentu.

Changvakonchu atiichembe nenuw ing Thangnang chu nemanghuwpa vokhehkho Thangnang ingkho nenuwchu athiseh ing ymmanghuwpa, amachu ynsaangkhe nenuw ing isuurpak vokhehkho athurfhuwva ichii ing nemanden yntuurpak tingche athar vokheh ynrireeh vachuw? Ynchii khaena athar nenuw ing suwh ynsuwh nengadikva?
Nenuw ing inii tha apha hungvi hungvichu vokhehkho kumchu nengahnah.
Ki ing nengkhaena aruwh thangsii ing katu varammo ta ingka nengkhaena ynchikning!
Kauw kanae ae, kivaange hung-taruw ta ingka kathamsahnahchuw, akhaechuve kikho nenuw vaange hungtaning. Nenuw ing kaningna yntanga raarmah dehchuw.
Chang-vakonchu nenuw ing nemanghuwsa amachuve, kahakchaang kachehmah khaena amaensana neningna isa chongchu katongpa.

Changvakonchu kahakchaang kachehmah inche neningna iruungpak chaang ennii ynsuwhkhang nare, nenuw ing irathiih mahchuw vokhehkho irumah tumahchuw, changvakonchu Thang-nang avaarmee vaang amanche Jesu Khrista churap vaang nenuw ing kichu ynrisahchuw.
Chukhaenache nenrotha rohnii borchu ynchiiva? Neningna saarkhii katunah amachuve, chehtanuwve nenuw ing nemik ipher tanuwka kaningna pinungka tavanen-chii sapvara.
Amantah nache ichum kariir tahne nenuw ijeehniichu ynsuwhping chang?

Enuw ing nenuwchu embarungriir iruwh ing isa khaena ynjong mahpae, changvakonchu nenuw ing enuwchu barungriir iruwh ing ijong ae rasiing ichiinii khaenache, enuw ing nenuwchu kaningtanii yndahnii engadik vatah.
Changvakonchu nenuw ing kithoh yngonghak raenpang mahka apha vakhaena isa nongna barungriir iruwh ing ijongchu isava.
Kaning mansiih naepang ae, nentaklina Khrista maong nemangom mahri raentaang, nengkhaena siti baring vachii barungriir ijavaangkhe tikning.
Changvakonchu atarae ki ing nenuw thoh onghaknii vokhehkho kaaruur yntehnii khaena kamandensahva; akhaechuve nengkhaena ki jaaning.
Kaningna riirruw, vajeer chonghak derna ong aadik ae, nenuw vajeer chonghakchu nensiimah riva?
Havi ynziihka om vasahva amachuve, Abraham ing sapa ynniimeh adeen, yngkheh inche suwh rupanuw taniiva amanche yngkheh inche ruwkuwrjoh rupanuw taniiva.
Suwh rupanuw tanii chuve hakchaang inuwzii ing abaringva, changvakonchu ruwkuwr-joh rupanuw tanii chuve chongiir jaarna abaringva.
Havi inge ynghuwnii omna; akhaechuve rupanuw ynniimeh havi chongreep ynniimehva; yngkheh ing Sinai bung tanii suwh ing ongnii khaena siti abaring Hagar chuva,
amanche Hagar havi Arabia Lipahna om Sinai bungva, amanche atarae om i Jerusalem thoh aanghakva; akhaechuve Jerusalem i asiti aethoh ynruw ing suwh ing ongnae.
Changvakonchu chungtanii Jerusalem chuve ruwkuwrjoh rupanuw chuva, amachuve inuw vakhae anuwva.
Akhaechuve havi ynziih vasahva,
“Siti abaringmah, nang narotha manrohra;
Nae abaringmah changamnuw,
nang ynteenjaar ing uungla;
akhaechuve fhuwsar omnuw ikhuwm sanaennuw siti ae ing inem athisae.”
Kauw kanae ae, Isak vaangkhe inuw chuve chongiir siti vamuw.
Changvakonchu hakchaang inuwzii ing ynring mee inche laetha inuwzii ing abaring meechu ajeehnii vaangkhe ataraenkho tikna.
Changva-konchu ynthiing thiimziih ing ynchii ariirse? Suwh rupanuw re asapachu thurruw, akhaechuve suwh rupanuw asapa ing ruwkuwrjoh rupanuw sapa thoh utaraenkho iphafhuwchu phahakmahnii ae.
Chukhaenache kauw kanae ae, inuw chuve suwh rupa-nuw siti chumah vamuw, ruwkuwrjoh rupanuw sitichu vamuw.
Ruwkuwrjoh ympha khaena inuwchu Khrista ing vaesang ing ymbathenpa; chukhaenache icheepther ing ngiirruw, amanche suwh riingkor nache athar umahruw.
Rungaeruw, Pol ki ing neningna kariirnah amachuve, nenuw vinchiip mee unsywh tanuwve, Khrista chu neningna nentuungsah yntanga omahnii.
Amanche ki ing vinchiip mee vakhae ningna saarkhii kapeehnah amachuve, ama ing vajeer chonghak aangkheng amanjiichirnii khaena ler atuurva.
Vajeer chonghak ajaar ing ichumchirnii nentu nenuw chuve Khrista tanii ruw yngki ympehsa, vokhehkho nenuw atungsiih tanii jungtak sachuw.
Inuw chuve laetha jaarna thacha inche ichum ynthiing ningmandenchu ynghahva.
Jesu Khrista ningna chembe vinchiip kho vinchiipmah kho yntanga ikaanii omah; changvakonchu ningsiih ajaarna thacha ing nong itu ynchenva.
Nenuw isajaeh inche hungtaennachuw; ichumchu ijiiniimah khaena achuw ing nenuwchu yngkhaamva?
Batheem ichii ive nenuwchu ingeen Aafhuw tanii mahva.
Chor topohti ing apumchu amanruungnah.
Nenuw ing reentaang ting nenbarungriir mandenmah tanuw ta ingka Aafhuw thoh ynruw ing kabarungriir ngamna; changvakonchu nentaklina ijachaam ympeehchu achuwchuw vakhangnare, vajeer phasa vaata.
Kauw kanae ae, ki ing ataraenpha ing vinchiip khaena katongjaeh vana-ve, ynchii khaena ki ataraenpha ing ijachaam kaphava? Amachu vanave khros khaena ijanii omahsa.
Nenuw ijachaam ympeeh aechu vinchiip jaehpang mahka entak phanii ing manchiip ae nave, kangae chiirom vachiiva.
Kauw kanae ae, nenuwchu ruw-kuwrjohnii khaena yngeenpa, havana ruwkuwrjoh inge hakchaang nungaenii khaena tumahruw, changvakonchu ningsiih inche yngkheh re yngkheh rukuum ynturuw.
Akhaechuve vajeer chonghak aangkhenglaang chongsae yngkheh ing akuwm chirva amachuve, “Nang ing naveenchaang aechu nataksahrap vaang naning mansiihva nachiipae.”
Changvakonchu nenuw ing yngkheh re yngkheh ynsi tanuwka ynsa tanuwve, nenuw yngkheh ing yngkhehchu abasuwmniimah ing ynriimruw.
Changvakonchu ki ing kariirnah, ynthiing laetha jaarna siruw, amana chembe nenghakchaang ing aadikchu phamahnii.

Hakchaang ing aadik inche ynthiing laethachu ajeehniinah, amanche ynthiing laetha inche hakchaang ing aadikchu ajeehniinah; amachuve nenuw ing nengadik chaapchu nentuniimah ing ynniimeh havi inge yngkheh re yngkheh ynjeehnii aeka mae yntuwhnae.
Changvakonchu ynthiing laetha ing nenuwchu ipuhnave, nenuw vajeer chonghak dernache ongmah sachuw.
Atarae hakchaang ing atu nong yndangna amachuve hava vakhae iva: Reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah itu, ynthiingmah, atu ari isamah,
lae ruthaksii irum, mee aser, yngensiimah, mee ajeehnii, kallak om, barung isiipak, ataksah khaenapang amanden, barungriir yntinniimah, ichummah ing om;

sehmaner om, miktheh, juw ynruw, isamahna nungae, hangchii nong havi nunu ing atu mee chaap ing utaraenkho Thangnang lipah tungmahnii ae ichii maen ing kamanthang vasah vaangkhe, ataraenkho neningna athar kamanthangnah.
Changvakonchu ynthiing laetha aanla chuve, ningsiih, rotharoh, idae, apha iseeh ing ikhaangcheh, mee achaarpeeh, isa, thacha,
iduwrjaeh, ataksah yngahcheh chuva. Havi chungna ajeehnii vajeer chonghak yntanga omah.
Amanche Jesu Khrista mee ynsuwh ae inche hak-chaang ing amandenna barungriir iruwh re aadik chaapchu khros nache athehpa.
Inuw ing ynthiing laetha jaarna ringmanuwve, laetha ajaarnache isikho sisataruw.
Inuw yndingmah vaanchiiva, Yngkheh yngkheh thir ynfhuwrvaanchii mahva vokhehkho yngkheh yngkheh kallak omvaanchii mahva.
Kauw kanae ae, isii ting ibuw meechu nenuw ing suwr tanuwve, nenuwkho ymbatheem arusa tanuwna ynriimruw, amana changchii aechu laethacher mee aenche iduwrjaeh ing ivakipeeh ae rasiing.
Nenuw yngkheh ing yngkheh peehrik ymbomruw, vokhehkho jinge ichii ing Khrista vajeer chonghakchu areer basuwruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing atakcha yntangamah naka mee yngkhehping tanave, ataksah ynchaesahva.
Changvakonchu amee siir ing ama anongchu ensarasiing. Amanache saknave ama ing yndingsah phavaata, mee reentaang nongna yndingmah rasiing.
Akhaechuve amee siir ing apeehrikchu reensava chiiva.
Thangnang chong iteen aphasah mee inche aanchuw ningnache isasehchu pirasiing.
Nentaksah ynchaemahruw; Thangnang maniisah mahruw, akhae-chuve mee ing avorsah inuwzii ing ama ing ruwpsa vaata.
Ataksah hakchaang khaena avor mee inche hakchaang tanii imaangchu ruwpsa vaata; laetha khaena avor mee inche laetha tanii ichen naemah iringnii ruwpvaata.
Chukhaenache isa nong ynturae jamah manuw; akhaechuve jungsuurmah manuwve, apha ahungvi raenche inuw ing ruwpvataruw.
Chukhaenache inuw ing apha ymphasah raenche inuw ing mee vakhaena amanche athurfhuwseh ing thacha eengkuw ae taklinache isachu tusataruw.
Enruw kakikrap ing aajaeh iruung ziih ing neningna chongthen i kavebaziihva!
Hakchaang na yndangjoh aadik vakhae ing nenuwchu vinchiip mantuteeh kenta ynchii-paetah, havi khrista khros khaena ijachaam emphaniimah khaena vatah.
Akhaechuve vinchiip rap aengkho entaksah ing vajeer chonghak ngahmah ae; enuw ing hakchaang na changmahka enuw ing nenghakchaang nache enrungniisah khaena nentaklina vinchiip entuvatah.

Changvakonchu inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista khros khaenamah naka, ki karuungniimah ynsuwhrasiing, akhaechuve Aafhuw khros jaarna laaruw paam ing ka-ningna amanche ki ing laaruw paamna khros nache ithiiping.
Akhaechuve vinchiip re vinchiipmah yntanga khommahva, changvakonchu itharpeh mee ing ynseemchu vatah.
Amanche havana deenziih inuwzii ing isi vakhae ningnache idae vokhehkho ningchuwh amanche Isrel ae Thangnang taklinache om ynsuwhrasiing.
Atii basen naka achuw ingkho kichu imanjamah rasiing; akhaechuve Aafhuw Jesu khaena kataklina abuw inae kareensa.
Kauw kanae ae, inuw vakhae Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tungsiihchu nenlaetha thoh ynruwhakjaeh ynsuwhrasiing. Amen.
inuw Apa Thangnang re Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tanii tungsiih re idaechu om ynsuwhrasiing.
Thangnang vokhehkho inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ampachu inuw ing manpahsa taruw! Akhaechuve Khrista ajaarna ama ing thangbaen vakhae tanii laethacher bor inche inuwchu bor ympeehpa.
Thangnang ing laaruw paam aseemmah rirae, ama ing Khrista ajaarna inuw ing ynthiing vokhehkho miraar omahdeh ing amee eensuwhnii inche eeteer vasahva.
Thangnang ing inuw vakhaechu Jesu Khrista jaarna asiti ynsuwhnii khaenache amanreep vasahva. Havi ama apennii vokhehkho amanden chuva.
Inuw ing angakpah Thangnang atungsiih khaena vokhehkho asapa jaarna ngareh kikthuur ympeeh khaenache manpahsa taruw.
Khrista ing inuwchu isii tanii ikarpeehnii khaena aringkum ympidehsa, amanche atii inuw yntaklina isii icherchu akuhpa. Havi Thangnang atungsiih savang ajaarna chemba.
Ama ing ynning nache ivaeh omahdeh ing aangkhenglaang ising iveer vokhehkho amanghuwchu, ataksah ing amanden apennii inuwzii ing ithuwhpak ing amandenchu ynning nache amanthangpa,
amana chembe Thangnang ing puhvachii aphachu ahenpha raenche, Khrista jaarna thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paamna om chaap yngkhehpang ing omnaka,
Thangnang ing ajesir inuwzii ing apha ichiinache thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paamna om ynseem peehchaap yngkhehpang ing omnaka Khrista inche arusae ynsuwhnii khaenava.
Thangnang ing asir vokhehkho amanreep inuwzii ing aangkhenglaang hemanchichirka amanche abasenlimna amanden vasah inuwzii ing inuw vakhaechu Khrista ajaarnache amee ynsuwhnii khaena yngateerpa,
amana chembe Khrista ningna amaensana ningmanden ymmangom inuw ing Thangnang alaar isachu ympahnii khaenava.

Nenuwkho ichum chongjeer nensiithoh Thangnang mee ynsuwh sachuw, isa chong inche manlaenpeeh neningna ajereenpa, amanche Khrista ningna nenthachapa; amakhaena Thangnang ing ynthiing laetha ajaarna nentaklina chongreep ahakchu anampa.
Laetha ingkho ymbarung amangamsa amachuve Thangnang ing amee ae ningna chongreep atuchu phavataruw. Thangnang alaar isachu inuw manpahsa taruw.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing Aafhuw Jesu ningna nenthacha vokhehkho Thangnang amee vakhaechu nening nemansiih kasiitahna,
nengkhaena Thangnang ympahchu manchenmah ing. Kathamsahrae nenuw vakhaechu kaansiisahnahchuw,
amathoh ynruw ing Jesu Khrista chu neningna yndang-naka nemanghuwnii ing Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ampa Thangnang alaar isa inche ising iveernii laetha ipisana,
nenbarungriir mik veersana nenuw-chu yngkhaena yngeenva ichii chukho manghuw tanuwka ynthiing mee ae khaena iphafhuw ompak rotharohnii lerchiichu nenphanii khaena,
vokhehkho atucheh aricheh inuwzii ing athacha ae ningna uurnii isamah ing inempak ipir ruwreng omna ichii chukho nemanghuwnii ing,
ama ruwreng inche Khrista chu ithii tanii manringka thangbaen paam nache Thangnang tachangna mangongka,
lipah aapuh ruwreng amanche aacheh vakhae taklina vokhehkho laaruw paamna ataraennii amanche hungvi vachiina,
ruming chaap aderna mangomchirka,
ama asha aruwrthiing aongnii aafhuwchu abasuwpa.
laaruw paam mee aeng ensinii minvaen aafhuw ruwreng ing, chongriir ynjiimah sitiae ningnache ataraensiim nong atu vaange nenuw isichuw.

Inuw vakhae ikho hak-chaang vokhehkho barungriir ing aadik nache nong tumuka ajaenche ipaarmuw, vokhehkho reentaang mee aeng ipaar ae thohche aanghak ing Thangnang barung siknii siti ynsuwh vasah vamuw.
Changvakonchu Thangnang in-chembe, ningsiihna savangak vakhaka, Aafhuw inche inuwchu athiseh ing aning ymmansiihpa.
Chukhaenache isii icher ing ynthik raenche, inuwchu Khrista thohche atungsiih ajaar inche ymmanringpa.
Khrista aningsiih ichen naemah lerchiichu hungvivachii suwnthar suwnthar nache amandangnii khaena,
Thangnang ing Khrista thohche imanring hakka, thangbaen aphamsiirna inuwchu Jesu thohche ymmangong hakpa.
Akhaechuve nenthacha ajaar inche atungsiih ing yngkarva; havi nenuw nening tanii mahva, Thangnang kikthuur chuva;
chukhaenache achuw ingkho yndingniimah rasii, nongtu ing mahva.
Thangnang ing amaensana asir vasah isa nongtu nache isinii khaenache, Jesu ningna ynseem vasah Khrista kikseemchu vachuw.
Nenuw yndenruw, ajaenche hakchaangna reentaang mee ynsuwh chuwka, kik ing ynseem vinchiip mee ita aeka enriir, changvakonchu vinchiipmah nenuw chuve

changlaenche nenuw Khrista tanii asikchuw. Isrel lipah sitiae tanii asikvachuw vokhehkho chongngiir inuwzii ing mee lipah siti ynsuwh chuwka ningmanden omah vokhehkho laaruw paamna Thangnang ynvaemah mee ynsuwhchuw.
Changvakonchu atiive Jesu Khrista ningna yndah ing ajae ongchuw nenuwchu Khrista sii inche ymmaneengpa.
Aafhuw chuve inuw vakhae idae phanii chuva, asae ynniimeh isuwhchu yngkhehpang basuwka arik chim-bangna laedenpeenchu abakhiipa.
Thangnang inche hakchaang taklina asae ynniimeh isuwhchu ithar mee yngkhehpang ing manguurnii khaena aajeehniichu khros na thehka idae lamchu aseempa.
Khrista ing khros na ithii inche ynniimehchu yngkhehpangnii khaena aajeehniichu amamaangpa; amanche khros ajaar inche yngkhehpang basuwka laaruw mee vakhaechu Thangnang ting ahenbaripa.
Chutahnache Khrista ing juwngka yndah ing ong neningna chenkho, ynneengna ong neningna chenkho, idae isa chongchu amanthangpa.
Havi Khrista ajaar nache Jehudi vokhehkho reentaang mee ae, inuw vakhae inche laetha yngkhehpang ing apa ningnache ihuungchu ynchehva.
Chukhaenache nenuw reentaang mee ae, marpah mee vokhehkho, lamkhii mee ymsuwhmah sachuw, atii chembe nenuw ynthiing aethoh Thangnang eengkuwchu ynsuwh sachuw.
Jesu Khrista inche athur-fhuwrungchu ynsuwhka, nenuw inche chongthang ae vokhehkho jaephar ae eenphambur taklinache ingiirchu ynsuwhsachuw.
Aafhuw inche eenphamburchu manchumhakka vokhehkho Thangnang ynthiing een aansuwhnii khaenache amangiirpa.
Aafhuw ningnache nenuw chukho laetha ajaarna Thangnang ongnii ynsuwhnii khaena ynseemhakpa.
Jesu Khrista khaena kaeshum sungna ong Pol ki ing, reentaang mee ae nengkhaena Thangnang ting kathamsahnah.
Nenuw ing nensiipa amachuve Thangnang tungsiihna nenuw nensaknii khaena havana nong i kaningna ympipa.
Thangnang ing asir ithuwhpakchu ynghuwnii khaena kaningna amandangpa. Havi khaene itomsak ing kabaziihpa,
nenuw amachu paatanuwve, nenuw ing Khrista khaena ithuwhpak kamanghuwchu manghuwva nenta.
Havana ithuwhpak chong i atiive laetha jaarna ynthiing chongthang ae vokhehkho jaephar ae ningna amandang vaang, reentaang laaruw mee siti ae ningnache mansiimah;

Amachuve isa chong ajaar inche Jesu Khrista ningna om chongreepchu ruw ikuum ynsuwhhaknii inche, hakchaang yngkhehpang ynsuwhhak-nii vokhehkho borchu iphahaknii khaenache reentaang mee ae chukho ynvaesae.
Thangnang ningtanii ruwreng inche Aafhuw nong tunii kaningna ympeeh vasah kikthuur inuwzii ing, Thangnang isa chong khaena meenae ynsuwhsing.
Isiing vakhae kaarna isiingseh kaningna havana tungsiih i ympeehpa, amana chembe ijong ynchehmah Khrista lerchiichu reentaang mee ae ningna tongningka,
vokhehkho peeh aangkhenglaang aseem Thangnang ing asir inuwzii ing suwnthar aajaehna thuurjaehka om ithuwhpak chongsaechu mee vakhae ing imunii inche,
thangbaen aphamsiirna ong aafhuw ae ningna, ruwreng ipir ae ningna, Thangnang ningtanii aziih aajaeh losingchu, atarae ruwrthiing ae ajaarnache ynghuwchehnii khaenava.
Havi inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ing asir suwnthar hungvi hungvina thoraang atu inuwjii ingva.
Inuw ing Aafhuw ningna ynthacha ajaar inche thona om ing vokhehkho barungriir ingam ing hungruwhchu aningtanii ymphava.
Havi khaene ki nengkhaena ijachaam kakhaangva vokhehkho nenuw nenchang atakniimah ing kaniihsahva; hava aangkhenglaang i nenuw nengkanii khaenava.
Havi khaene kakheerkhuw mansinsa ingka apa ningnache kathamsahva,
thangbaenna vokhehkho laaruw paamna ong eengkuw chaap ing ichum rumingchu iphanii khaenache,
Thangnang lerchii tanii alaar isa laetha jaarna nenuwchu ruwreng ipinaka nenpirnii khaenache kaniihsahva,
vokhehkho thacha jaarna Khrista ing nenba-rungriir sungna ynringpeehnii khaena amanche Aafhuw alaar isachu neningna ipeehnii khaena, nenuw ningsiihna arajung ipae nache icheep ing omtanuwka,
ama aningsiih adung, avom, ingiir, ithuwh, ynchiiva ichiichu ynthiing ae thohche nenbarungriir ing ikhar nenchehnii khaena,
vokhehkho nemanghuw nakhe athiseh ing Khrista ningsiihchu manghuw tanuwka nenpirnii khaena, vokhehkho Thangnang ningna om vakhae isipchu nening nache ymmansip peehnii khaenache ki ing kathamsahva.
Inuw ymbarungriir sungna nong atu ruwreng inuwzii ing, iniihsahna changmahka ymmandensah vakhae taklina athiseh ing inempak nong yntupeehcheh aning nache,
ruwr-thiing nache vokhehkho Jesu Khrista ningnache ichi naemah ipha ing suwnthar aangkhengna alaar isa om ynsuwhrasiing. Amen
Aafhuw khaena kaeshumna ong Pol ki ing neningna kariirsahnah, amachuve nenuwchu yngeen inuwzii ing matik icha inche isipeehruw;
aangkhengna ynjuursah re iduwr thoh ynruw ing, apha iseehpak ing ikhaangcheh thoh ynruw ing ningsiih nache yngkheh ing yngkheh taklina khaanghak nuwna,
idae ing ipurnache vokhehkho laethana yngkhehpang ing omchu ingahnii inche barungriir iruwh ing itupeeh-ruw.
Nenuwchu ningmanden yngkhehpang nache yngeen vaang, hakchaang yngkheh vokhehkho laetha yngkheh omna,
Aafhuw yngkheh, thacha yngkheh, baptais itu yngkheh,
Thangnang vokhehkho laaruw mee vakhae apa yngkheh omna, amachuve aangkhenglaangna Aafhuw, aangkhenglaangna nong atu vokhehkho aangkhenglaangna omna.
Changvakonchu Khrista kikthuur-chu achaang manaeka inuw vakhae ynningnache atungsiihchu ympipa.
Chukhaenache jinge ariirsa,
“Aafhuw ing chungting akarlaenche,
ynsuwr aeka om aechu aruwpa vokhehkho laaruw mee ningnache kikthuurchu apeehpa.”
Atii Aafhuw ing chungting karsa ichii ichuve laaruw paam der itadeh-ting Aafhuw ing jungchumkho jungchumsa ichiimah naka ynchiiva chang?
Ijungchum Aafhuw ichuve aangkhenglaangna ongchirnii khaena thangbaen vakhae chungting ikarkho ikar Aafhuw churapva.
Amana Aafhuw ing areh aechu chongthang ing, areh inche jaephar ing, areh inche isa chong ijeermee ing, amanche areh aenche pastar ing vokhehkho aanchuw mee ynsuwhnii khaena kikthuur apeehpa,
ynthiing aechu ynghuwtahna envaeniimah khaena, nongtunii khaena, Khrista hakchaangchu seemnii khaena,
Thangnang sapa ynghuwna vokhehkho thacha tahna yngkhehpangnii ymphamahri raen-taang, mapung apha mee, Khrista vaang imin hungansuwhnii khaenava.
Amana chembe ihuung iva ing vokhehkho mare om ing ynchuwpeeh sii ing varaangka hungchi avechi laaruw mee ikaam barungriir inche, ichummah enlosing inche naepang aevaang tamah manuw,
changvakonchu ama changdenna ningsiih nache ichum ing chong manuwka, arusae ynsuwh Khrista ningnache aangkhenglaangna hungruungnii khaenava,

Aafhuw ningtanii ing hakchaang aangkheng ynjom vokhehkho yntuw ajaarnache ichachak ing ynjomka vokhehkho yntuwka asik asik rutum yngkheh yngkheh achaang nache nong entu inuwzii ing, ningsiih ajaarnache hakchaang aangkhengchu aseemnah.
Khrista rumingna ki ing kariirnah, amachuve reentaang mee aeng embarungriir ikaniimah ting empeeh vaang athar nenuw tamahruw.
Akhaechuve embarungriirna emang-huwmah re embarungriir ipir inche manghuwva enchiichu vemanthimka, enuw Thangnang ringkum tanii asik meechu ynsuwhsae;
vokhehkho embarungriir ipir lamher inche ipen naemah ing ynthiingmah vokhehkho ichuwhmah nong tunii nache entaksah ympisahsae.
Changvakonchu nenuw chuve Khrista khaenache hava vakhae i nentam mahva!
Nenuw ing Khrista khaena nensiivasah vokhehkho aningna ichumchu om vaangkhe ongtanuwve;
ajae nenuw ing mare om ing paarchuwka nengadik inuwzii ing imaangniiting nensinii nenvakhar aangkhengkha mantharruw.
Nenuw nenbarungriir sungna laetha omkha manthar nuwna,
amanche Thang-nang vaang ichii ichum ynthiing vokhehkho ynthiing ing aseem vasah ithar meechu nenuw ing niiruw.
Chukhaenache ichummah chaap bathen nuwna, nenuw nenveenchaang thohche ichum inche chongruw; akhaechuve inuw vakhae i hakchaang yngkhehpang vamuw.
Nenthir afhuwrlae isii nong tumahruw, vokhehkho nenthir ifhuwrchu inii bathak mahruw;
umlae ningna khamtong pimahdehruw.
Lam abaruwhchak ingkhe athar baruwh-mah rasii, ama changdenna akiksah ing adeennii khaena isa nongchu tusana vokhehkho sara naeriing aechu bomrasiing.
Nener nache isamah chong manchuwng mahruw changvakonchu ahenseemnii khaena isa chongsae chupang ichong peehruw, amana chembe aasii mee ae khaenache ikaanii ynsuwh vaata.
Thangnang ynthiing laethachu manjamahruw; akhaechuve ikarvachii aanii khaenache nenuwchu ahak ynnampa.
Chukhaenache ikhapak, mi ichuwng ing barungsii, thirfhuwr, fhuw itamchechor vokhehkho ithipak ing ichong thoh yngensiimah aangkhenglaang neningtanii suwhchir rasii.

Hava vakhae i changdenna nenuw yngkheh yngkheh ynchaarruw, nenbarungriir duungrasii, Thangnang ingkho Khrista ajaarnache isii yngkuhpeeh vaang, nenuwkho yngkheh ing yngkheh taklina nenraar omchu yngkuhpeehruw.
Nenuw chuve Thangnang siti vachuw khaka, ama vaang nengomnii ing itupeehruw.
Khrista ing aning imansiihka vokhehkho ataksahchu inuw yngkhaenache ning-siihnii barim ipifhuw ing ynsuwhka vokhehkho ympideh vaang, nenuw ningsiih nache siruw.
Changvakonchu nengkaarna ynthiing mee ae khaena matik ichavaang, naamak itu, ynthiingmah, ikaam, hava vakhae i nengkaarna aruming rapkho ipar omahrasii,
changpang mahka yntirsuwhpak nong, ipang chong, isamah ermanteeh, hava vakhae i itumah ing sakna, havi changdenna Thangnang chu manpahruw.
Havi nenuw ing nemanghuwsa amachuve, naamak itu, ynthiingmah nongtu changmahka ikaam (ichii chuve lae ruthaksii aning) mee achuwti ingkho Khrista re Thangnang lipah nache aphafhuw sup om omahnii.
Achuwti ingkho nenuwchu yntangamah chongla ing imanchaemah rasii; akhaechuve ama inche akhae ynsuwhka chongriir ynjiimah sitiae taklina Thangnang barungsii thengna.
Chukhaenache enuw ae thoh nenuw savuwchu phahak mahruw;
Ajaen chembe nenuw ynthimna ongvachuw, atiive nenuw Aafhuw ningnache ireng meechu sachuw. Chutahnache ireng mee vaang ringruw,
isapak, yndentahna ipir amanche ichum hava vakhae i ireng inche ahenreen aanlava.
Aafhuw apennii nongchu ynchiiva ichiichu tamnuwna siruw.
Amanche aanla omah ynthim nong thohkhe yntanga tuhakmahruw, ama changdenna nemiraarchu ireng tingche henbasuwruw.
Akhaechuve ynruwh ing entu enri nongchu iriir ening ynjakna.
Changvakonchu ahe-mandang aangkhengchu ireng inche ahemandangva, amanche ahemandang nong vakhaechu ireng chuva.
Ama khaenache jinge ariirsa,
“Ijaar nang ynterla;
vokhehkho ithii tanii hangiirla,
amanche Khrista ing nataklina aen vaata.”
Chukhaenache nenuw ynsaangkhe iringpung tanuwna ynriimruw. Ynchiitanga ynghuwmah mee ae vaang ringmahruw changvakonchu ising mee ae vaang taruw.
Apha mamaangmahruw, apha sakmah.
Chukhaenache nenuw pangmahruw, Thangnang ing amandenchu ynchiiva ichii manghuwruw.
Juw baruw mahruw, amane yngkuh ynnahnii omna; ama changdenna ynthiing laetha ing sipruw.
Nenuw yngkheh yngkheh ympahnii la ing, ynthiing la ing vokhehkho iseeng la inche ichong peehruw; nenbarungriir iruwh ing ympahnii la re ynthiing la ing Aafhuw ningtingche hemanpahruw.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ruming nache aangkhenglaang khaena apa Thangnang ningtingche apha om bakhaena hemanpahruw.
Khrista chu ijanuwna nenuw yngkheh ing yngkheh derna ongruw.
Rumee ae, Thangnang derna isi-vaang, nenfhuwsar ae dernache siruw.
Khrista ingkho ruwrthiing taklina arusae ynsuwh vaange, fhuwsar ingkho rumee taklinache arusaeva; vokhehkho ahakchaang inche ruwrthiing ikarpeehchu ynsuwhsa.
Chukhaenache ruwrthiing ing Khrista derna omvaange, rumee chaap aengkho nong aangkhengna enfhuwsar derna ongva chiipae.
Khrista ing atu havi aruwrthiingchu achongsae inche, chii inche chaam naka amanthiing aanuwnache Thangnang ningting apeehnii khaenache,
isapak ing, iseeng vokhehkho ibuwrmahdeh ing, buw areenmahdeh changmahka imaang omahdeh ing ruwrthiingchu ataksahrap ing ipeehnii khaenava.
Fhuwsar chaap aengkho enghak-chaang sahchu ening emansiih vaang, enrumee ae chukho ening mansiihva chiipae. Arumee aning amansiih mee chuve ataksah aning amansiih sahva.
Achuw ingkho ahakchaangchu batirmah, ama chang-denna ahakchaangchu iruwpak ing ajuhsahnah; amavaange Khrista ingkho aruwrthiingchu rukuum atupeehnah.
Chukhaenache inuw vakhae i Khrista hakchaang thoh yngkheh vamuw.
Ynziih ing ariir chuve, “Havi khaene pasar inche ampa re amnuw bathen naka, arumee thohche yngkhehpang ing omvaatae, amanche ynniimehchu yngkhehpang ing hungomvaatae.”
Havi ithuwhpak tanii iruwpak chongsaeva vokhehkho havi Khrista ruwrthiing thoh ruw ingki ing ichongping.
Changvakonchu neningna kariirnah, fhuwsar vakhae ing arumeechu ataksah aning amansiih vaang, aning mansiih rasii amanche rumee vakhae inchenkho afhuwsarchu ijarasiing.
Nennuw nenpa ijaaruw ichii i aren chongreep thoh ynruwhak chonghak chuva.
“Havi laaruw paamna ringkum iseehpak ing vokhehkho nungaepak ing nenpaarnii khaenava.”
Enuw ing ynrunii ae khaena eebuwr ae raenchenpang tumahruw, changvakonchu Khrista suwh nongtu vaang nenbarungriirna Thangnang ing amanden nongtu ing itupeehruw.
Mee ae ningna nentuvaang mahka, Aafhuw ningna nentu vaang, isa barungriir ireen ing nong turuw.
Suwh vakhangnare suwhmah vakhang-nare, mee vakhae ing isa nong yngkheh atutahna, ama ing Aafhuw ningtanii nongmen athar iraangva kata ichii manghuwsa rasiing.
Aafhuw ruwreng ipirpak thoh ynruw ing nenruwreng hemanpirruw.
Thangnang ing neningna ympeeh laar tukniichu iniipeehruw, ama inche Umlae losing isamahchu ngahchehva nenta.

Akhaechuve inuw ing mee aechu eenafhuw mahva, changvakonchu thangbaen aphamsiir nache isamah laetha ynsuwh ae taklina, aapuh ae, aachehpung achiiae, amanche ynthim laaruw paam aacheh ae taklina chenva.

Chukhaenache atii nenuw ing Thangnang laar tukniichu niiruw! Isamah iniichu athenglaenche, laarchu badaarchehva nenta; vokhehkho achinii ipha inche laarchu tukcheh tanuwka, nenuw ing ingiir chehva nenta.
Chukhaenache ichum inche nendiirriim chiimteeh nuwna, vokheh-kho ichum phukhumchu niinuwna ngiirruw,
amanche idae isa chongchu nengkhi nache niinuwna;
apha vakhaenache thacha phuchu chiruw, ama inche isamah mi ing ivachuwng envekhu isii aangkhengchu badaar tanuwka thehchehva nenta.
Vokhehkho Thangnang chongsae ynsuwh manlaenpeeh laar phukhum vokhehkho laetha laarchemchu bachuw therruw.
Aangkhenglaangna laetha nache iniihsah vokhehkho ithamsah thoh ynruw ing thamruw. Akuurchiimnii ipha inche ynthiing ae khaena ithamsah, ikhaangcheh ipirthoh ynruw ing,
vokhehkho ithuwhpak isa chongchu thir isapak ing itong kachehnii ing kakhae nakho ithampeehruw.
Hava isa chong khaene chongdenmee ynsuwh ingka siirruw runoh ing ynphuwp kapha ki ing thir isa ing chong ningka kamandang chehnii khaenache ithampeehruw.
Ama khaenache neningting atak i ki ing kavechiirva, ama ing kenuw ynsaangkhe ongnung ichiichu riirnaka nenbarungriir ithoh vaata.
Apa Thangnang vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ing nenuw vakhaechu idae vokhehkho ningsiih thoh ynruw thachachu ympi ynsuwh-rasiing.
Aafhuw Jesu ichuwr naemah ing aning amansiih vakhae ae ningnache Thangnang tungsiihchu om ynsuwhrasiing.
Neningna Apa Thangnang vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tungsiih re idaechu om ynsuwhra-siing.
Apha vakhaena nenuwchu mandensachuw ingka ka Thangnang chu nengkhaena kamanpahsahva;
vokhehkho apha vakhaena neng-khaena kathamsah raenche, karotha iroh ing kathamsahva.
Ki ing ynthiing nong kahentu iniina basenka atanii ipha ing nenuw ing ymbomjaeh sachuw.
Chukhaenache ki ing kathachanah amachuve, neningna isa nong abasen Thangnang inche, Jesu Khrista aaniichu aphamahri raentaangche areer ibasuwpeeh savaata.

Nenuw vakhae khaena kakhar havi kakhaena chenbe ichumva. Yngkhaena ynchii imbe apha vakhaena nenuw i kabarungriir sungna omjaeh nachuw, amanche atarae kaeshum sungna katak yngkhum ae vokhehkho isa chong khaena ngahther ingka icheep ing kamangiirne, nenuw vakhaekho kithoh sarup phahakfhuwchu vachuw.
Ki ing nenuw nengkhaena ithuwhpak ing kakhar havi Jesu Khrista barungriir taniiva ta-ingka ichum ing kariirne, Thangnang ing saarkhiina.
Amanche ichum ynghuwna vokhehkho ynthiing vajeer ing ningsiih ahenthichu ahungruungnii khaenache ki ing havi kariirsahva,
amana chembe nenuw ing isasehchu ynchiiva ichii iteercheh vanenta; vokhehkho Khrista aanii nache nenuw ynthiingmah vokhehkho ynraar nentuchaap nentaklina omahnii.
Nenuw nen-ringkumchu Jesu Khrista ajaarnache atatak angen isa hembasuw naka Thangnang alaar isa ympahniichu sipvaata.
Kaarang ae, nenuw vakhae ing manghuw tanuwka kachiichuve, kataklina isuwh chaap inge atatak ing isa chongchu ma sinii khaenache ynsuwhsa.
Havi inge kaeshumna korkhiing ing ynchar ae katak i Khrista meenaeva ichiichu iruwng sejaamna ong laarchang ae vokhehkho mee vakhae aenche emanghuwniisa.
Ki ing kaeshumna ong inge unae vakhae ing Aafhuw yndensehsehnii vokhehkho ama aanuwjiichu ynchik omrudeh ing isa jaerachu itongnii khaenava.
Achuw yngkheh chuve sehmaner om ing vokhehkho ynnahnii ing Khrista isa chongchu entongnah ae; changvakonchu reentaang areh aeng chembe ynthiing barungriir thoh ynruw ing entongsae.
Havi ningsiih inchemba, yngkhaena ynchii imbe isa chongchu ingahnii khaena Thangnang ing ympeehchu enuw ing emanghuwsa.
Achuw yngkheh ae chuve Khrista i ynthiing ing tongmah aeka, enrutumsah khaenapang manden aeka kaeshum sungna ong kichu manjaanii khaena entunah ae.
Chunuwcha ynchii khava chang! Ama khaena karotha rohsapnara, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ynchii ynchii vakhang nakho Khrista thaminchu entongsae. Karothakho manrohrap vakata,
yngkhaena ynchii imbe Jesu Khrista tanii laetha ajaar inche nenuw vakhae ing kathenna thamchuwka ymbomchuw inche taang isuwh phava kata.

Atatak ithuwh ing kamandennah amachuve, kanong i utaraenkho chenmahnii; changvakonchu apha vakhaena vokhehkho ataenkho kabarungriir ngamna amachuve, ringva kachii vakhang nakho, thikva kachii vakhang nakho khrista ruungniichu tuvakata.
Kaningna chembe Khrista khaena iring vokhehkho ithii inche katuungsahva.
Changvakonchu hakchaang khaena ringningve, amachuve kataksah khaena aanla omnii nongvatah. Amana chembe ki ing ynchiikha iteerva kachiiva riirchehmah ing.
Kamana ijiifhuw lam asae ynniimeh heom inge eechiipnah, amachuve hava ringkum i maningka amanche Khrista thoh iringchu kaadik haknah, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ama inche sahakna;
changvakonchu nenuw vakhae thenna iring inche athurfhuw yngkheh nareeh.
Havi ki ing icheep ing kamanghuwsa amachuve, nenuw nema asinii khaena vokhehkho thachana rotharoh nengomnii inche, ki nenuw vakhae thoh paarhakva kata,
amana chembe nenuw re ki vokheh onghak manuwka, nenringkumchu Khrista thohche yntuwhak naka kaningna inempak ruungniisava nenta.

Atii athurfhuw yngkheh chuve, nenuw nenringkumchu khrista isa chong khaena pangche matik icha ing paarruw, amana chembe ki ing nenuwchu imunii khaena thengkhang ningkho, thengmah khang ningkho, nenuw barungriir yngkhehpang ing isa chongchu thachanii khaena manpir tanuwka, vokhehkho thacha yngkhehpang nache ngiirnachuw ichiichu ki ing isiicheh phava kata.
Eejeehnii aechu chiimah aeruw, nenbarungriir manpir therruw amana chembe enuw duwrvaatae, changlaenche nenuw ing chehva nentae, yngkhaena ynchii imbe nentaklina maepahnii ympeehchu Thangnang va.
Akhaechuve khrista ningna yndenpang chumahka, ama akhaena ijachaam khaangnii chukho ympeehva.
Atii nenuw ing kithoh ynruw ing laar tukchehva nenta. Amachuve isi vasahna laar katuk nemu thohkhe yngkhehpang vatah; ataraenkho nenuw ing nensii laar churap katukjaeh tahsa.
Chukhaenache achuw yngkheh ing Khrista ningtanii ing barungriir abathae omnave, ningsiih ing barungriir amanungae, laethana yntinnii ruvachii, ichaarpeeh vokhehkho ningmanchuwh omnave,
nenuw vakhae neningsiih ynchim naka, barungriir yngkhehpang ing, laetha yngkheh ing barungriir ynchim nuwna karotha rohniichu mapung imamphapeehruw.
Nenuw sehmaner om nong vokhehkho sanaensah ruungnii nong tumahdehruw, ama changdenna barungriirna ynjuursah ing, ataksah ing kachungna mee areh ae inge isapae ichii ing manden rasiing;
changvakonchu mee vakhae ing ataksah khaena pangche mandenmah rasiing, mee areh ae khaenakho manden rasiing.
Jesu Khrista ningna om barungriir havi nening nakho omrasiing:
Khrista ing Thangnang masak reenkhang nakho, Thangnang thoh ynchimnii ama ing mandenmah,
ama changdenna ataksah ing rusaka athang isa vakhae bathen chirka, vokhehkho meenae maong rika laaruw mee vaang juwngsa.
Ama ing laaruw mee vaang jungindangka, ataksahchu ynjuursaka vokhehkho ithii phanii ing pangmahka khros nachenrap ithii phanii ing chongriir ynjii ynsuwhsa.
Chukhaenache ampa Thangnang inche atakchu ithohka chung, thang, sungna ruming chaap asapa Khrista ningnache apeehpa.
Amatah nache thangbaen vokhehkho laaruw paam sungna ong meechaap ing akheerkhuwh mansin naka Jesu rumingna thamsa vaatae.
Vokhehkho ampa Thangnang alaar isachu ner vakhae ing Jesu Khrista i Aafhuw chuva ta ae naka riirvaatae.
Amachu vanave kaarang ae, ajae nenuwthoh kaonglae kariir nemanjiikha athi ing, kaongmahrae nemanjii inche athurfhuwhakna. Manlaenpeeh phanii khaena ynchik ing vokhehkho ynchiim ing nong turuw.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe nenuw vakhae ing tuning rining nenchii vokhehkho ama ing amandenchu ynjii nenchehnii khaenache, Thangnang ing nentaklina nong tuka omna.
Chongsuwh basuwh omrudeh ing nong aangkheng turuw,

amachu inche ynraar mahdeh mee Thangnang siti ynsuwhcheh vanenta. Laaruw paam iruwm barungriir, isiicher mee changchii ing omahdehruw. Enuw changchii ae kaarna thangbaen ireng aesii ae vaang nenuw aenruw,
iringnii isa chong nentong raenkho changche tutanuwve, Khrista aanii nache nenjaarna iruung phasava kata, akhaechuve amachu inche ki ing katu kari nong vakhae paammahdeh ichii yndang vaata.
Kasii i Thangnang ningting chaatha ing ympivaang, nenthacha taklina chirningve karotha rohnaka amanche nenuw ingkho kithoh rotha irohfhuwva nenta.
Havi vaange nenuw vakhaekho nenrotha rohvaata, amanche ki chukho rotha irohfhuwva nenta.
Aafhuw ing amanden ynsuwhnave, neningna Timothi vechiir vakata, amana nenuw ing hentuva nenchii nong aajaeh inche kabarungriir mangam vaata.
Ki ing kamanden vakhae atu vokhehkho atatak ing nengkhaena akharchu ama vatah.
Achuw yngkheh chuve Jesu Khrista khaena mandenmahka, ataksah khaena pangche amanden omna.
Changvakonchu atak ing ynchii meeping ichii amandangchu nenuw ing nemanghuwsa-amachuve ampa re asapa vaang, ama re ki ing isa chong tongnii khaena nong kentuhaksa.
Amatah nache kathenna nong isa ing tuvaata ichii kamanghuw ing aru vakhae imaen ing neningting ivechiirnii khaena kamandennah.
Amathoh ynruw ing Aafhuw rumingna kamandensahnah amachuve, aru vakhae kikho neningting thengsava kata.
Runave unae Ipaphroditas i neningting ivechiirnii khaena kamandensa. Ama ing kathenna nong inempak atu vokhehkho kaningting chongla ireennii nong aajaeh atusa.
Nenuw vakhaechu imunii khaena ahahchehmah atak i nakna ichii nensiichu amanghuwtah nache abarungriir inempak jaana.
Atatak ing amave ithiivak ing ina rungvaangva. Changvakonchu Thangnang ing aningnapang mahka, kaning nakho aning imansiihka, ijaniipak phava kachii tanii yngkarpa.
Neningting atak i vechiir ningka kachiipakna, amana chembe nenuw ingkho atak i nemutahna athar rotharoh phavanenta vokhehkho kabarungriir jaanii vakhae chukho omahnii.
Aafhuw ruming nache rotharoh ing eebom meeva ichii manden nuwna hebariimruw. Hangchii mee ae i eningna isa ivaar ing ningsiih mandangruw,
akhaechuve nenuw vakhae ing itu nenchehmah Khrista nong aajaeh khaena ithiivak ing atu mee yngkhehva.

Akuurchiimna kaarang ae, Aafhuw thoh yntuwhakchuw khaena rotha manrohruw. Kavebaziih vasah taklina athar kanuumtah nakho aden ing vaechirpak ing kharpakmah ing, havi inge neningna acheepniiseh khaenava.
Ynriim ing enruw, ichamah uti aekha, mee sikenta ta aeka emandennah.

Enuw mahpae, vinchiip ympha vasah inuw vamuw, akhaechuve laetha ynthiing ajaarnache Thangnang rummuwka amanche Khrista Jesu thohche yntuwmuw khaena rotharoh ymphava. Inuw ing reentaang asikna ithacha tumahmuw.
Ki ing hakchaangna barungriir mangamnii kadeenkho arusa. Achuw yngkheh mee ing hakchaang nache barungriir mangamnii deennave, kataklina ikharniiseh thengna.
Kikho inii neeriih kapharae vinchiip katu. Katak i Hebreeu siina Isrel yngkheh ing Benjamin sungkhurna jungomping. Jehudi ae vajeer chonghak ingahtah nachembe, katak i Pharisi yngkhehping,
Ki ing kallak ingka ruwrthiingchu kamanang. Vajeer chonghak ynjii ing ichum ynthiing aphava ichiinache karaarnii omah.
Changvakonchu ama vakhaekha katuungsah niiva ichii ing karisahchu atii Khrista khaena chembe imaangnii vatah ichii ing karisahpa.

Amachupang mahka, amen iruwpak ki kaafhuw Jesu Khrista ynghuwnii khaenache, aangkhenglaang imaangniiva ta ingka rimahsing. Ama akhaena aangkhenglaang ikaniimahva kachiipa, amanache Khrista chu kaaniiva kata,
vokhehkho atak thohche yntuwva kata. Vajeer chonghak ynjiina ichum ynthiingchu kaningna atii omahsa. Thangnang ningtanii itheng thacha jaarna ichum ynthiingchu Khrista ithacha jaarna kaningna omsa.
Ki ing kaadiksah chuve Khrista chu manghuwnii re atak hangring ruwreng, vokhehkho ijachaam aphanache sarup aja amanche atak ithii khavaang hungchii chuva.
Changvanuwve katak i ithii tanii imanring vaata ichii barungriir kareensahsa.
Atii havi ki ing kaphasahpa changmahka mapung kaphapa kachiimahva, changvakonchu runave Jesu Khrista ing kichu ynsuwrsah khaena nongmenchu kaphanii inche katusahva.
Atatakva kaarang ae, ki kataksah ing atii saksing tachehmaang; changvakonchu itufhuw nong yngkheh chuve, isivasah chaap vakhaechu bahir ingka, maating heomchu iphanii inche tusa ingka,
Jesu Khrista ajaarna Thangnang ing chungting yngeen khaena iphafhuw nongmen phanii khaenache, manden thungnii tingche ki itaensahping.
Chukhaenache mapung ympha vasah inuw vakhae ing hangchii barungriir i siisataruw; amanche laanglam nenbarungriir sungna asik barungriir omnave, havikho Thangnang ing neningna imandangpeeh vaata.
Inuw ing ymphasah chupang bachuwther taruw.
Havi hangsenna kariir vasahva, ataenkho kemik richiipum ing kenuumnah, khrista ing khros na ithii ruming ynchohnii nong itu mee inempak omna.
Changchii mee aenche longkong ting bukvaatae, yngkhaena ynchii imbe enuw en thangnang chuve hakchaang ing amanden chuvatah.
Inuw chuve thangbaenna paarvaanchii mee vamuw, amanche thangbaen tanii jungchum vachii Eekarpeeh Aafhuw Jesu Khrista chu hahbrah ing ynghahsahnah.
Peeh aangkhenglaang aderna amangomcheh ruwreng jaarnache, Aafhuw ing inuw vakhae hakchaang isuur maangvachii ichu manteh naka, amanche ataksah ahakchaang vaang manguur vaata.

Amatah nache kaarang ae, inuw yntuwhcheh mahmuw i inempak kaning sikna, nentu nenri chaap nakhe inempak karotha rohna vokhehkho yngaeniining. Kaarang ae, apha vakhaena Aafhuw rumingna inehther ing ngiirruw.
Iuodia re Sintik, nenuw yngkheh re yngkheh Aafhuw rumingna ningsiih ympiruw ta ingka kathamsah nahchuw.

Kaanruwfhuw nenuwkho havana rupanuw ae i bomsa aeruw, yngkhaena ynchii imbe Klemen vokhehkho reentaang kaarang ae enruming Thangnang thiimbuwrna ynthin vasah ae inge isa chong kavorlae inempak ymbomsahpae.
Nenuw vakhae Aafhuw ruming nache ynchaar nuwna rotharohchu phasaruw ta ingka athar kariirsahnah!
Amee siirna isa barungriir mandang-ruw. Aafhuw chu athar jungthenglo achiinah.
Barungriir manjamahruw changvakonchu nemanden khaena Thangnang ting ympah thoh ynruw ing heniihruw.
Laaruw mee ing amanghuw aangkheng athiseh Thangnang tanii idae inche, Jesu Khrista jaarna nenbarungriir vokhehkho nenvakharchu ingahpeeh vaata.
Achiniina kaarang ae, ichum, isa barungriir, adongchang omah, iseeng, isapak, thang saknii, isa nong, ympahnii havi omnave, hava vakhae i nenbarungriirna kharruw.
Nenuw ing nentamsah, nenpha, nensii vokhehkho nemu aangkheng havi itupeehruw. Amanche idae ympeeh Thangnang ing nenuwchu eenruwfhuw vaata.
Nenuw ing athar vokheh ymbomsahchuw khaena Aafhuw ningna inempak karotha rohsakna. Nenuw ing kichu bomnung chuwka nenchii ichacheh mahchu kamanghuwsa.
Ki kavaehnii khaena ichong mahping; akhaechuve nemkhang nakho, tuumkhang nakho kapenniichu katamsahpa.
Ki ing omah nakho, omchir nakho iringniichu kamanghuwsa. Ven ynva vakhang nakho, venchaam vakhang nakho, ynriimjor vakhang nakho amanche kavaehnii vakhang nakho ithuwhpak ipensahniichu kamanghuwpa;
yngkhaena ynchii imbe kichu ruwreng ymmanpir Khrista ajaarnache aangkhenglaang katuchehsa.
Changkhangnare kajanii nache sarup nenja khaena inempak sakna.
Philipia nenuw ing nemanghuwsa, amachuve mamaenna Mesidonia bathen ingka isa chong itong kasirae nenuw mahnaka ruwrthiing achuw kho ipeehsah vokhehkho iphasahnii khaenache omah.
Thesalonika nache ibomsahnii kaadik chukho nenuw ing athar athar ynjebathen peehchuw.
Ki ing kikthuurchu kajongmahva, changvakonchu nengkhaena ahenthisehnii aanlachu kajongva.

Atatak ing aangkhenglaang kaphasa vokhehkho ivaeh omahdeh ing, neningtanii kikthuurchu barim ningsiihniipak Thangnang ing aru vokhehkho penniivachii chaatha ynsuwhvaang, Ipaphroditas tanii phasa ingka ivaeh omahsing.
Ka Thangnang inche kaaniivanenchii aangkheng Jesu Khrista ajaarna alaar isa om lerchiichu ipivaata.
Atii Thangnang vokhehkho apa ningnache ympah ynsuwhrasii.
Jesu Khrista ningna ipaar Thangnang mee vakhae neningna salaam katusahnahchuw. Kithoh nong katufhuw kaarang ae ingkho neningna salaam ynvetunah ae.
Hane Thangnang mee vakhae athurfhuw ing, iruwng sejaam eengkuw vakhae ingkho salaam ynvetunah ae.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tungsiih ing nenuwchu eenruwfuw ynsuwhraiing.
Thangnang ing amandenna Jesu Khrista achongthang ki ing vokhehkho unae Timothi thoh-
Kolosia na ong ynthiing ae vokhehkho thachafhuw om kauw kanae ae, inuw vakhae Apa Thangnang tanii tungsiih re idaechu neningna om ynsuwhrasii.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ampa Thangnang chu ympahthoh ynruw ing apha om bakhaena nengkhaena kenthamsahnah.
Akhaechuve Jesu Khrista ningna nenuw ing nenthacha, vokhehkho ynthiing mee vakhae taklina neningsiih omchu kenuw ing kensiipa.
Havi thangbaen nache nengkhaena ynsiihpeeh vasahchu nemanghuw khaenava; havi khaene ahaarpana nenuw ing isa chongchu nensiipa.
Hava isa chong i laaruw paamna aanla omka ihungruungchu, nenuw ing Thangnang ningsiih ichum nemanghuw inii nache basenka nening nakho omba.
Havi kenuwthoh nong kentuhak keningsiih Ipaphras ningtanii siichuwka nemanghuwkha vatah; atak i kenuw kenchangdenna thachafhuw om Khrista nong atu meeva.
Laetha jaarna ningsiih omchuwchu ama ing keningna amanthangpa.
Hava chong khaene kensii inii nache basenka nenuw ing laetha tanii ising iveer ing, vokhehkho nemanden vakhae nache Aafhuw nemanghuwnii khaenache kenuw ing nengkhaena ithamsah manchenmah ung.
Nenuw ing isa nong nentu vakhaena aanla omsana, Thangnang chu nemanghuw nache hungruungruw.
Rotha irohthoh ynruw ing ikhaangcheh nache apha iseehpak ing khaangnuwna, Aafhuw alaar isa ing aangkhenglaang nache nenuwchu imanpir sana,
ynthiing mee aeng phava enchii thenchu iphahaknii khaena ympicheh apa Thangnang chu manpahtaruw.
Apa Thangnang ing inuwchu ynthim ruwreng tanii ikarsaka, aningsiih inche asapa ongnii tingche inuw chukho ymmangongsahpa.
Inuw vakhaechu ikarpeehnii vokhehkho isii kuhpeehniichu asapa ningna ym-phapa.
Aafhuw chuve imu ynchehmah Thangnang thoh aanghakva. Peeh aangkhenglaang Thangnang ing aseemmah rirae atak i ombasahva.

Amachuve thangbaen nakho, laaruw paam nakho ymmucheh, vokheh-kho ymmuchehmah, iruwngpham ongnii changmahka aatuaricheh vokhehkho ruwreng ipirseh aangkheng Aafhuw Thangnang inche aseem chirva; amachupang mahka peeh aangkhenglaang Aafhuw ajaarna anong mandangnii khaena aseempa.
Aafhuw chuve aangkhenglaangna maensa ing heom vasahva, chutah-nache akiklina aangkheng omchirna.
Atak i ruwrthiing arusaeva, vokhehkho aangkhenglaang kaarna aren pham vika, aren ithiiae kaartanii ihangring Aafhuw chuva.
Chukhaenache ataklina isip ing aomnii khaenache
laaruw paam nakho amanche thangbaen nakho om aangkhengchu khros na ynta asii ajaar inche yngkhehpangnii khaena aanrunii atu inche Thangnang barungriir pennii ynsuwhsa.
Ajae nenuw chuve nenongtu chaap inche nenbarungriirna ijeehnii mee vokhehkho asik meechuw,
changvakonchu atiive Aafhuw ithii ajaar inche nenuwchu ynthiingjaeh ing, isamahna thang isimah ing vokhehkho miraar omahdeh ing Aafhuw maanache ipeehnii khaenache aanruniichu atupa;

nenuw ing nensii vasah, thangbaen derna om ynseem vasah aangkhengna yntong vasah, Pol ki ing anong katu isa chong nache ningmanden ymmangom tanii ynlaaprudeh ing, abur ineh ing vokhehkho icheep ing anasiir nache omtanuwve, hava vakhae i nenta ynsuwhvaata.
Atarae nengkhaena ijachaam kakhaang khaene karotha rohna, amanche ruwrthiing ynsuwh Aafhuw hakchaang khaena, kahakchaangna Khrista ijachaam ivaehchu amanchinii ing katuva,
Thangnang ing kaningna ymmansir inuwzii ing nengkhaena anongtu mee hunginsuwh ingka, Thangnang chongsaechu mapung ipha ing ynthangnii khaenache,
juk jukna vokhehkho suwnthar aajaeh hungpaarna ithuwhpak ing thuurjaehka omba changvakonchu atiive ynthiing amee ae ningnache amandangpa.
Chukhaenache Thangnang ing reentaang mee ae kaarna havana ithuwhpak chongsae alaar isa ichu ynchiiva ichiichu mandang ningka achiipa; amachuve nenuw nengkaarna nemanghuw ing nemanden Khrista chuva.
Chukhaenache kenuw ing mee vakhaechu Khrista ting aanla amangomnii ing, ising iveer inche mee vakhaechu ichahsa ae ungka, vokhehkho manchuw ungka, Aafhuw isa chongchu kemanthangsahva.
Havi khaene kabarungriir sungna ynthinchu ruwreng manpir ingka, Aafhuw nong inuwzii ing kama taarsa ingka kahentusahva.
Nenuw nengkhaena vokhehkho Lodesia na ong mee ae khaena amanche kichu ymmumahrideh ae khaena ipirpak ing nong katuchu kariirsahnah.
Amachuve enuw vakhae ing embarungriirna thir isa iphanii amanche ningsiihna yngkhehpang ing engongnii ing vokhehkho Thang-nang tanii Khrista ningna om ithuwhpak chongchu emanghuwnii khaenava.
Aafhuw ningna ising iveernii vokhehkho manghuwnii vaanchii lerchii aangkhenglaang omchirna.
Chukhaenache achuw yngkheh ing nenuwchu batheem chong ing ymbaruwhcheh niimah khaena havi kariirva.
Nengkaarna ki ongmah khang ningkho kalaetha chuve nenuw thohche ongna amanche Khrista ningna nenthacha icheep thoh ynruw ing yngkhehpang ing omchuw khaenakhe karotha rohna.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing Jesu Khrista chu Aafhuw va ichii ing nen-rivasah vaangkhe ama ing amanden nache siruw,
Aafhuw ningna ithuwh ing arajung manpae nuwna, nenringkum aningna mangiir nuwna, vokhehkho kamanchuw vasahchuw vaangkhe hemanpir nuwna Aafhuw ympahnii nache sipruw.
Khrista taniimahka changvakonchu laaruw paam ising iveer ing amanche purah chong vokhehkho yntangamah chong inche imanchae ae naka ynsuwrniimah aeng ynriimruw.
Aafhuw aningna Thangnang tanii aangkheng mapungpha ing omna,
vokhehkho aangkheng Aafhuw amanche ruwreng chungna ong aning nache nengong tahna mapungpha ringkumchu ympeehpa.
Khrista ningna nengongtah nache vinchiip meechu ynsuwh vachuw, amachuve Khrista tanii vinchiip inge hakchaang ing aadik tanii imanlaenka,
baptais nentutahna Khrista thoh ynruw ing yndimhak vachuw vokhehhko Khrista thoh nenthacha ajaar inche ithii amanring Thangnang ruwreng thoh ynruw ing hangring vachuw.
Ajaen chenbe vinchiip turuchuw ing isii icher inche ithiivasah vachuw, changvakonchu Thangnang ing Khrista thohche ymmanringpa; inuw vakhae yntaklina isii icher om chaapchu aning ymmansiih tahnache,
ynningna ichachehmah ynjeehnii ynjiih vajeer chonghakchu khros taklina jopi ing ynghenka Khrista ing ynripeehpa.
Aacheh vokhehkho ruwreng chaap vakhaechu chehchirka entaklina khros ing maepah aphachu Aafhuw ing amandangpa.
Hava vakhae ive hungsuwh vachii nong aruthaksii vatah; changvakonchu atatak chuve Khrista va.
Achuw tanga ingkho nenuwchu yntuurdehva nenchiiva, vaarmee aechu rumva nenchiiva, aman-che amumahna kamuva tanaka ynraar nache nenbarungriir mangamniimah rasii.
Hangchii mee inge hakchaang aangkhenglaang aanjomnii arusae amanche aantuwnii ahangruungnii Thangnang chu bachuw mahnii.
Khrista ningna laaruw paam ichamah vakhae thoh ithii vasah vachuw inche ynchii khaena laaruw paam mee vaang ipaarjaeh vachuw? Ynchii khaena vajeer chonghak derna omjaeh vachuw?
“Amakha bachuw mahruw, manten mahruw, parmahruw,
ichii chong ichuve laaruw paam barungriir ing aseem chong vatah, hava vakhae i maangchir vachii vatah.”
Hava vakhae i achung paamphuw nachembe ising iveer vaang takonchu vaarmee rumnii khaena vatah amanche ichummah chongva; vokhehkho hava vakhae ichuve ikanii yntanga omah chuva.
Khrista thoh hangringhak vasahchuw vakhaka Thangnang tachangna Khrista ongnii chungtaniichu jongruw.
Chungtanii khaenache nenbarungriir piruw, thangtanii laaruw paam khaenache pimahruw.
Akhae-chuve atii nenringkum i Khrista thoh Thangnang ningna ynthuurka omna.
Chukhaenache inuw vakhae ynringkumchu Aafhuw Khrista ing ajungindang raenche, nenuw vakhae chukho amathoh ynruwhak ing maepah ing yndangvanenta.
Chukhaenache nentaklina om laaruw paam barungriir chaapkha bathen chirruw; amachuve ichuwhmah nong, ynthiingmah, hakchaang ing aadik isamah amanche lae ruthaksii irum barungriir hava vakhae iva.
Hava vakhae khaene Thangnang barung sikniichu thengvaata.
Apha vokhehna chembe hava vakhae i neningna omka adernache isichuw.
Changvakonchu atiive hava vakhae i bathen chirruw: amachuve, barung isii, thirfhuwr, yngensiimah, sehmaner om vokhehkho ichong fhuwmah ichong hava vakhae i neningna omahrasii.
Yngkheh ing yngkheh taklina isamah chong chongmahruw, akhaechuve ajaennii baruw nong chaapkha nenlenchir vasahva,
atii Eeseem Aafhuw chu nemanghuw khaena ithar mee ynsuwh sachuw.

Atiive aden ing Grik naemahnii, Jehudi naemahnii, vinchiip aere vinchiipmah naemahnii, Reentaang mee vokhehkho Saithian mee, suwh re suwhmah mee tiimahnii, changvakonchu Khrista chuve aangkheng khaena rutumva, amanche aningna aangkheng yngkhehpang vatah.
vokhehkho yngkheh re yngkheh ynchaar nuwna, Aafhuw ing yngkuhpeeh vaang nenuw yngkuhpeehruw.
Hava vakhae chungne barungriir yngkhehpang ing amangomcheh vokhehkho afhuwpcheh ningsiih barungriirchu reenruw.
Yngkhehpang ing omnii khaena nenuwchu yngeen vasah Khrista tanii idaechu nentaklina omlasii. Havi khaene manpahruw.

Khrista chongsaechu nentaklina isa ing vokhehkho ynriimjor ing omsana ising iveer thoh ynruw ing yngkheh re yngkheh ynriirpeeh nuwna nen-barungriirna Thangnang ympahthoh ynruw ing ympahnii la, iseeng la vokhehkho ynthiing lachu tupohruw.
Amanche nentu nenri aangkhengna, nong vakhang nakho, chong ing vakhang nakho, aangkhenglaangna apa Thangnang chu Jesu jaarna nenbarungriirna ympahthoh ynruw ing turuw.
Fhuwsar vakhae nenrumee aechu nening mansiihruw, amanche entaklina ipirtuh ing omahruw.
Naepang ae, nenuw nempa chongriir manjiiruw, havi Aafhuw ing aadikchuva.
Ampa ae, nensiti ae taklina barung siknii tumahruw, amachu inche enuw duhvaatae.
Suwh ae, nenuw aangkhenglaangna nengafhuw ae chongchu manjiiruw, mee ing ymmunii khaena pangche nong tumahruw, changvakonchu Aafhuw nengajathoh ynruw ing nong turuw.
Nenong nentu nache mee taklina kentuva ichii mandenru ing Aafhuw ningna kentuva taruw,
Aafhuw ningtanii lerchii phava kenchiiva tanuwna rotharoh ing turuw; nentu nenri i Aafhuw Khrista anongchu nentuva.
Ynraar nong atumee inche ynraar nongmenchu phavaata, amanche havi khaene adongchang omahnii.
Barungriir iruwh ing henthamnuwna ympah barungriir thoh ngiirtherruw,
amanche kengkhaena Thangnang ing achong tongnii re Khrista tanii ithuwh chongchu kemandang chehnii lam imongnaka,
amachu isajaeh ing kentong chehnii khae-nakho ithampeeh saruw.
Apha mamaangmahruw amanche taang-tanii mee ae ningnache ising iveer ing siruw.
Apha omba khaena nenchongna ningsiih ynvaesana mee vakhae ningna ynsaang basangva kenchiiva ichii chukho manghuwruw.
Taikikus ing ki ynsaangkhe ongning ichiichu neningna riirvaata; atak i nong isajaeh ing atu kening mansiih Aafhuw khaena nong kentufhuwva.
Havi khaenarap vokhehkho kenuw ynsaangkhe ongnung ichiichu ne-manghuwnii khaena amanche nenrotha amanrohnii khaena ama i neningna kavechiirva,
vokhehkho keningsiih kengarang, nong isa ing atu mee Onesimas thohkho ynruwhaknae. Enuw inge havane isuwh chaap aangkheng riirvaatae.
Kithoh kaeshum na onghak Aristarkas ingkho Barnabas aunaefhuw Mark ingkho nenuwchu salaam yntusahnah, (ama akhaena kavebaziih vasah khava, thengnave ibathungpeeh saruw.)
Justus ruming areen Joshua ingkho nenuwchu salaam ynjetusahnah. Thangnang nong katufhuw kaarna enuw ae i vinchiip meepae, enuw inge kavaang inempak emanrum.
Jesu Khrista nong atu nemee Ipaphras ing nenuwchu salaam ynvetusah thoh ynruw ing nenuw vakhae ing Thangnang yndentahna mapung ipha meechu ynsuwhnii khaena apha omba khaena athamsahrae eensiisahnah.
Ama akhaena ki ipirpak ing ngiirsakning, amachuve nengkhaena vokhehkho Laodesia re Hirapolis na ong vakhae khaena ipirpak ing nong atusa.
Kaningsiih ithiim Luk re Demas ingkho salaam yntusahna ae.
Laodesia na ong kauw kanae vakhaena amanche sanuw Nimpha eenna ruwrthiing engka vakhae ningna kaningtanii salaam ipipeeh saruw.
Hava chongthen i nempa inuwna Laodesia na ong ae ningna paaruw amanche Laodesia ruwrthiing tanii chongthen chukho paaruw.
Arkipas ningna jinge taruw, “Aafhuw ningtanii naraang nongkha amanchinii ing tura.”
Hava salaam chong i Pol ki katakrap ing kabaziihva. Katak i ynphuwp ingka ongning ichii eensiipeehruw. Neningna Thangnang atungsiihchu om ynsuwhrasii.
Kenuw ing apha vakhaena nengkhaenache Thangnang chu manpahsa ungka vokhehkho apha vakhaena kenthamsah raenche nengkhaena kemanparsahnah.
Apa Thangnang maanache nenthacha nong re ningsiih om nenong vokhehkho inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ningna ningmanden icheep omchu kengaansiisahnah.
Thangnang ing aning ymmansiih kauw kanae ae, nenuw i ama ing eeteerchu kamanghuwsa;

akhaechuve kenuw ing neningna kemanchuwchuw isa chongkha chongsae pang kenjereen mahva, changvakonchu ruwreng re ynthiing laetha thoh, atatak ing kemanghuw thoh ynruw ing ithengpung; nenuw nengkaarna ynchii meepung ichii kentaksah ing kemandangkha nenuw ingkho nemanghuwsa.
Aafhuw re kenuwchu anu ynjii nenuw ynsuwh sachuw; amanche ijachaam inempak phakhang tanuwre, nenuw ing ynthiing laetha thohche isa chongchu nengaraangpa.
Chukhaenache nenuw inge Mesidonia na ong thacha mee aangkhengna aandangniichu hunginsuwh sachuw.

Akhaechuve Mesidonia vokhehkho Akhaia napangche neningtanii Aafhuw isa chongchu ensiimahva, changvakonchu Thangnang ningna nenthacha inche aphamsiirna aphachirpa; chukhaenache kenuw ing ichongbirnii yntanga omah.
Kenuw ing neningna kenvathenglae rukuum ynghentusahchuw khaenare, lae ruthaksii nenrum tanii ichum vokhehkho iring Thangnang ting nemae henbaheer chuwka nenrum,
ithii tanii ihangring thangbaen tanii asapa nenghah vokhehkho ikarpeeh nenpha khaena chong enriir.
Kauw kanae ae, kenuw ing neningna ivatheng ungkha, aruwh thangsiimah ichii nenuw ing nemang-huwsa;

changvakonchu isi vasahna Philipi nache ijachaam vokhehkho ningjak phasa khangnungle, nenuw ing nemanghuwsa amachuve kenuw ing Thangnang tanii thir isachu deen ungka ynrumah mee ompak khangnare nening nache Thangnang isa chongchu kemanthangpa.
Kenuw ing neningna kenriir i ynraar tanii, ynthiingmah tanii, changmahka ichummah tanii chumahva;
changvakonchu Thangnang ing irupeehka isa chong ymmansir vaang, kenuw ing mee ae barungriir manpennii khaena mahka, kenbarungriir chaang yngen Thangnang chu manpensa ungka ichongpung.
Nenuw ing nemang-huwsa amachuve, kenuw ing ympahsah chong inche vokhehkho kengadiksah inche kentu kenri utaraenkho ynsuwhmah ichiichu Thangnang ing saarkhiina;
amanche kenuw Khrista chongthang yngkheh ing kematik omkhang nare, meening tanii vakhang nakho, ympahchu kenjong mahva.
Changvakonchu amnuw ing asiti rukuum atupeeh vaangkhe, kenuw ing nengkaarna barungriir ynjuursahchu ynsuwhsung.

Nenuwchu kening kemansiihpak ing kemandensahchuw inge, neningna Thangnang isa chong itongpang mahka, kenlaetha rap ikho neningna ipeeh kemanden-sahva, akhaechuve nenuw i kening kemansiihpak ynsuwh sachuw.

Kauw kanae ae, nenuw ing kentu kenri vokhehkho ijachaam kengkhaangcheh nengaansiisa; kenuw ing achuw yngkhehkho peehrik areenniimah ing, siimjaen nong tu ungka, kenuw ing Thangnang isa chong neningna kentongsahpa.
Kenuw ing thacha om neningna aajaehmeh ynthiing ing, isa ichum ing vokhehkho isii icher omru ing isisah ung ichii nenuw ingkho amanche Thangnang ingkho saarkhiina;
Nenuw ing nemanghuw vasah kha-vatah, ampa ing asiti aechu rukuum atupeeh vaangkhe, kenuw ing nenuw vakhaechu kengathohsah vachuw amanche thona kempeehsah vachuw vokhehkho kenriirsahva,
Thangnang ing nenuwchu alipahna vokhehkho alaar isa ivaarna yngeen nache matik icha ing nensinii khaenava.

Chukhaenache kenuw ing anasiir nache Thangnang chu havi khaene kemanpahva. Nenuw ing keningtanii nensii Thangnang chong nenphakha, mee ae tanii chongva ichii mandenruwchuw ing thacha mee vakhae barungriirna Thangnang chongsae inche nong atuva ichii ing nenrikha atatak Thangnang chong chuva.

Kauw kanae ae, Judia paamna ong Jesu Khrista na ong ae Thangnang ruwrthiing aethoh aanghaksachuw: Akhaechuve enuw ing Jehudi ae tanii ijachaam emba-daarcheh vaangkhe, nenuw ingkho amathoh ynchim ing nenlipah mee ae tanii ijachaam nenbadaarpa.
Jehudi aenche Aafhuw Jesu chu-kho amanche Thangnang jaephar ae chukho enthehpa, kenuwkho ynthurpae amana Thangnang chukho manpenmah dehsae vokhehkho mee vakhaechu areh aphuwting emansipa;

havipang mahka reentaang mee ae ningnakho ikarpeehnii chong itongkho parden entupa; havi inge entaklina anasiir nache isii icher ing sipsa; chutah nache entaklina Thangnang barung isiichu akuurchiimnii nache emphapa.

Changvakonchu kauw kanae ae, barungriir najaeh mahka, hak-chaangna apha topohpang khaena kenuw re nenuw ynsaesamuw, changvakonchu nenuw thoh yntuwhnii khaena inempak kemandensah thoh ynruw ing yntuwhniichu kensirsahpa.
Akhaechuve kenuw ing neningting vanuh vanuh vatheng nungka kenchiisahva, athurfhuwseh ing Pol kiping; changvakonchu kenuw ing vathengva kenchiichu umlae inche parden atupa.
Aafhuw Jesu ajuwng-laenche atuwr maanache kenuw ing kemandensah rotharoh changmahka ruungniiva kenchii phurchiichu ynchii vakhang? Nenuw chumah vachuw khang?
Nenuw chuve kemae pahnii vokhehkho kenrotha rohniichu vachuw.
amanche Khrista isa chong itong meenae ynsuwh unae Timothi chu nenthacha nache amangiirnii vokheh-kho ynthohnii khaena kenvechiirpa,
havi inge achuw ingkho ijachaam aajaeh inche imanlaapcheh mahnii ichii i kenlaepah ymbuwrnii chuva ichii nentaksah ing nemanghuwsa.
Havi khaene kakhaang chehmah tahnache, ki ing nenthachachu kamanghuw chehnii ing vokhehkho ymbatheem mee inche ibatheem naka kenongchu ikaniimah ynsuwhkho arusa ichii khaena ynchik ingka kavechiirva.
Akhaechuve kenuw ing nenuw thoh kengonglae ijachaam khaangvaan chiiva ta ungka amaensana kemanchuw pachuw; isuwhkho suwhsa ichii nenuw ingkho nemanghuwsa.
kauw kanae ae, ama khaenache nengkhaena ijachaam kempha aangkhengchu nenthacha ajaar inche kembarung ngamsa;
nenuw ing Aafhuw ningnache icheepjaeh ing ngiirtanuwve kenuw iringpung.
Thangnang maanache nengkhaena kenrotha irohsah aangkheng khaena aningting athiseh ing kemanpahsahnah,
akhaechuve kenuw ing nemae kemusahnii vokhehkho nenthacha ivaehchu kemanpir chehnii ing, siimjaen naeru ing kenthamsahva.
Atiive apa Thangnang vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu inche neningting kenuw ivasinii khaena lamchu itahpeeh rasiing;
kenuw ing neningna kentu vaangkhe, Aafhuw ing neningna yngkheh ing yngkheh vokhehkho mee aangkhenglaangna ningsiih chu hemanthirasiing.
Aafhuw Jesu ing ynthiing mee ae aangkhenglaang thoh ynruw ing ajuwnglaenche, apa Thangnang maanache Aafhuw ing nenbarungriirchu ichum vokhehkho ynthiing inche amanpirpeeh rasiing.

Achiniina, kauw kanae ae, nenuw ing ynsaangkhe paarva nenchiiva vokhehkho Thangnang chu ynsaangkhe manpensava nenchiiva ichiichu kening tanii manghuw chuwka nensinii vaangkhe, nenuw nema itaar ahenthinii sehseh khaena Aafhuw Jesu rumingna kenuw ing kenthamsahnahchuw.
Aafhuw Jesu ajaarna siniiva nenchii kenriirpeeh chuwkha nemanghuwsa.
Thangnang ing amanden chuve haviva, nenuw manthiingva nenchiiva vokhehkho naamak tumahva nenchiiva;
nenuw vakhae ing nenrumeechu ynthiing ing vokhehkho ynjasah thoh ynruw ing irinii nemanghuwnii khaena,
Thangnang chu amanghuwmah mee ae vaang, hakchaang ing aadik khaenamah rasiing;

vokhehkho achuw tanga ingkho auw anae taklina havi khaene yngkuh siimah naka amanchaeniimah khaenava, kenuw ing neningna ajaenkhe kemik manveer ungka vokhehkho saarkhii kempeeh vaangkhe, aangkhenglaang havi khaene Ponti aapeeh chuve Aafhuw va.
Thangnang ing ynthiingniimah khaena yngeen mahva, ynthiingnii khaenava.
Chukhaenache achuw yngkheh ing havi arumah tahna mee aechu arumah changchii mahva changvakonchu neningna Thangnang ing ympeeh ynthiing laethachu arumahva.
Changvakonchu unae aechu ning mansiihnii khaena ynziih ikanii omah; akhaechuve yngkheh re yngkheh ningsiih omnii khaenache Thangnang ing nenuwchu ymmanchuwpa;
amanche atatak ing Mesidonia paam aangkhengna ong unae ae nening nemansiihchu thangsa. Changvakonchu apirnii sehseh khaenache kengathohsah nahreehchuw.
Neningna mamaenna kenriir vasah vaangkhe isajaeh ing nenpaarnii khaena mandenruw, nentaksah nongchu nengadiksah ingkhe tusaruw;
amana chembe nenuw ing thachamah mee ae mik barengna isajaeh ing sichehva nenta vokhehkho mee ningnache yndiimahdeh tanuw.
Changvakonchu kauw kanae ae, mee reentaang ae eningmanden omah vaangkhe, nenbarungriirna ajaniimah ing ithii ae khaenache nemanghuwmah idiksamah ung.
Akhaechuve Jesu ing thikka vokhehkho ihangringchu inuw ing thacha manuwve, ama vaangche Jesu ajaarna ithii ae chukho Thangnang ing Aafhuw thohche manring vaatae.
Havi khaene Aafhuw chongsae ajaar ing keningna ajeer inuwzii ing neningnache kenriirva, amachuve, Aafhuw ijuwng ipha ing iring inuw inche ithii ae taklina maensamah manuw.

Akhaechuve aphanache Aafhuw Jesu atakrap thangbaen tanii iruurthoh, aankaangseh vaarmee tanii iruurthoh vokhehkho Thangnang tumpeeh senruwr thoh ynruw ing jungtheng vaata, changlaenche Khrista chu thachaka ithii aenche maensa ing hangring vaatae;
aanuwnache iring inuw inche, ithii tanii ihangring ae thohche minvaenna Aafhuw chu yntuwhnii khaena ruwrduh kaarting ijekihak vaata; amanache Aafhuw thohche apha om bakhaena onghakva taruw.
Chukhaenache hava chong inge nenuw yngkheh yngkheh barungriir mangamniiruw.
Changvakonchu kauw kanae ae, aanii vokhehkho kumtha khaenache neningna kajebaziih tahna ikanii omah.
Akhaechuve Aafhuw aanii chuve jaenna lamruw itheng vaangkhe tavaata ichii isajaeh ing nemanghuwsa.

Jinge ichii ing daejaehna vokhehkho isii ikha suwhmahsa ta ae naka enuw ing engongraenche, rupanuw ing asiti abaring phana ina abasen vaangkhe, ynghuw ynghamah imaangnii ijachaamchu entaklinache thengvaata. Changlaenche enuw ing itaen supcheh chehmahnii ae.
Changvakonchu unae ae, lamruw ing itheng vaangkhe aaniichu nentaklina abukniimah ing ynthim nache ongmahruw.
Nenuw nengkheng ireng vokhehkho siim siti chuvachuw. Inuw chuve jaenkho ynthim takho mahvamuw.
Chukhaenache mee ae vaange jaarmah manuw; inuw hangsuw manuwka hahsataruw.
Ijaar aenche jaenna jaarnae amanche juw ynruw mee aenche jaenna baruwnae.
Changvakonchu inuw chuve siim mee ynsuwh vamuw khaka, thacha vokhehkho ningsiih barungphuchu niimanuwka vokhehkho ymmanden manlaenpeeh amachu khumsa manuwka ynriimsataruw.
Thangnang ing abarung siknii khaena ingateer mahva, changvakonchu Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajaar nache manlaenpeeh ymphanii khaena chenva.
Inuw ing ringkhang manuwre changmahka thikkhang manuwre, Khrista thohche inuw ipaarhaknii khaenache ama ing ynthikpeehpa.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing nentu vaange, yngkheh yngkheh rotha ynroh nuwna vokhehkho hung-ruungnii sehseh khaena ynseemruw.
Unae ae, nengkaarna nong atuae vokhehkho Aafhuw rumingna yncheer ae amanche eechah mee aechu isajaeh ing nemanghuwnii khaena kenriirsahnah,
amanche enongtu khaena iruwpak ing nening mansiih aeruw. Nenuw nenareerna idaejaeh ing ipaarpeehruw.

Unae ae, kenuw ing kengathohsah nahchuw, thaachah mee aechu ichah aeruw, barungriir isuur mee aechu rotha imanrohpeehsa aeruw amanche isuur aechu ibompeeh aeruw vokhehkho aangkhenglaang nache ikhaangpeeh saruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing yngkheh taklina ynraar nong atudoh tahna huw engaanriniimah ing sirruw, amanche anasiirna nentaksah vokhehkho mee aangkheng khaena isachu ynchiiva ichii jongruw.
Apha vakhaena nenrotha manrohruw,
ymperudeh inche thamruw,
vokhehkho nentu nenri aangkhenglaang khaena heman-pahruw, havi Thangnang ing Jesu Khrista ningna nengkhaena amanden chuva.
Ynthiing laethachu thehpak mahruw;
Thangnang chongjeerchu ikaanii mahva ichii ing rimahruw.
Nong aangkhenglaang ibuwrnuwna isachu bachuw therruw,
amanche isamah chaapchu dahruw.

Atii idae Thangnang inche nenuwchu imanthiingkiir rasiing; vokhehkho nenlaetha, nenthavae vokhehkho nenghakchaang aang-khengchu Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ing ajuwnglaenche nemiraar aomniimah ing icheer rasiing.
Nenuwchu yngeen Aafhuw chuve thachafhuwva, ama ing itukho tuvaata.
Unae ae, kengkhaena itham-peehruw.
Ynthiing salaam thoh ynruw ing ymbariimruw.
Aafhuw rumingna havana kachongthen i unae aangkheng ningna ipapeehnii khaena kamansirsah-nachuw.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tungsiih inche nenuwchu eenruwfhuw ynsuwhrasiing.
Apa Thangnang vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tungsiih re idaechu neningna om ynsuwhrasiing.
Apha vakhaena nengkhaena Thangnang ympahchu kenuw kenong churemva, akhaechuve nenuw nenthacha ivaeh omahdeh ing hung-ruungna, vokhehkho nengkhengna yngkheh ing yngkheh khaena ningsiih om ahenthisa.
Chukhaenache Thang-nang ruwrthiingna nenuw vakhae ing icheepchuw vokhehkho ijachaam chaapna nengkhaangcheh khaena kenuw ing nenuwchu kengaanpahnii vachuw.
Hava vakhae inge amandang chuve Thangnang vajeer i manthiingna vokhehkho nenuw ing ijachaam nenpha khaena hungindang chuve, nenuw ing Thangnang iruwng lipahchu ipha matik nenchanii khaenava.
Thangnang ing ichumchu tuvaata, ama ing nentaklina ijachaam ympeeh mee ae taklinache ijachaam pivaata,
vokhehkho ijachaam nenpha nenuwchu kenuw thohche ija basumnii ama ing ipivaata. Havi Aafhuw Jesu ing thangbaen tanii mi ichuwng thoh ynruw ing ipirpak avaarmee aethoh juwng naka,
Thangnang arumah vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu isa chongchu amanjiimah mee ae taklinache ijachaam pivaatae.
Enuw ing ichen naemah ing imaang nache ijachaam phavaatae vokhehkho Aafhuw alaar isa nache ong phamahnii ae.
Ama ing ajuwnglaenche amee vakhae re atakchu ijasaka athacha mee vakhae tanii ympah phavaata. Nenuwkho akaarnache ynvaeva nenta, akhaechuve nenuw ing kenriir isa chong nenthachapa.

Ama khaene ataniipha inge kenuw ing apha vakhaena nengkhaena kenthamva, havi inge Thangnang ing yngeen nache matik icha ing iringchu nenphaniiva vokhehkho isa khaena nemanden re thacha nongchu aruwreng nache areer nenbasuwchehnii khae-nava.
Amana chembe Aafhuw Jesu rumingchu nenuw vakhae ningtanii ympah phavaata amanche Thangnang tungsiih re Jesu Khrista ajaarnache nenuw ing aningtanii ympahchu phavanenta.
amachuve laetha ing vakhangnare, chong ing vakhangnare, kembaziih ing vakhangnare, Aafhuw aaniichu thengsa ichii khaenache nenbarungriir fhuwm bavaeniimah rasii.

Achuw tanga ingkho nenuwchu imanchaemah rasiing; akhaechuve yngkheh yngkheh laar yntuk ing maensa vaata, vokhehkho isii icher mee, imaangvasah ichamah inche aandangmahri raentaangche aniichu suwhmahrinii.
Ama mee inche irumfhuw lae chaap chukho rumah naka, ataksah ing aanchung sehping tavaata; amachupang mahka Thangnang eenna ongnaka Thangnang ping tavaata!
Ki ing nenuw thoh kaonglae havi khaena kariirkha nenuw nengaansii-mahva?
Vokhehkho ataksahrap aanii nache aandangnii khaenache, atarae aakhaamchu nenuw ing nemanghuwsa.
Akhaechuve vajeer chonghak amanziimah ingikniipak ingkhe ataraenkho nong atunah, changvakonchu ataraene aakhaam meechu aamphuwng mahri raentaang-che akhaamsah vatah.
Vajeer chonghak amanziimah ichamah meekha yndangvaata, changvakonchu Aafhuw Jesu ing ajuwnglaenche aahuwh inche seemnaka mamaang vaata.
Vajeer chonghak amanziimah thengvachii umlae anong chuve aangkhenglaang ruwreng, ichummah buwtinnii vokhehkho laetho,
amanche laethana ymmoh ae khaena ichummah mee manchaenii aangkhengchu ynruwfhuw vaata; enuw ing ikarpeeh phanii vokhehkho ichum ningsiihchu rimahsae,
vokhehkho ichummahchu thachanii khaena, Thangnang ing entaklina ipirpak ynraar barungriir ajenbathenpa,
chukhaenache ichumchu athachamah ae, ichummah nache nungae nungka enchii vakhaechu vajeer tuvaata.

Kauw kanae ae, nenuw nengkhaena apha vakhaenache Thangnang ympahchu kenongva, Thangnang ing nenuwchu aburna basenka laetha ajaarnache nemanthiingnii khaena vokhehkho ichumchu nenthacha inche ikarpeeh phanii khaena eeteerpa.
Havi khaene nenuw ing inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista alaar isachu iphanii khaenache, kenuw ing isa chong kemanchuwchuw ajaarnache yngeenpa.
Chuvanuwve kauw kanae ae, icheep inche ngiirruw, kenchongsae ing vakhangnare, kenchongthen ing vakhangnare, kemanchuw chuwkha icheep ing bachuw therruw.

Atiive inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ataksahrap ing vokhehkho inuw vakhae aning ymmansiih apa Thangnang ing ichen naemah rotharoh re ningmandenchu atungsiih ajaarna ympeeh inche nenbarungriir manpirnii rasiing,
vokhehkho isa nong re chongsae vakhae inche imancheepther rasiing.
Achiniidehna kauw kanae ae, Aafhuw chong isachu neningna vaangkhe, ithupak ing aanjarnii ing vokhehkho alaar isachu ahang-ruungnii sehseh ing ithampeeh saruw.
Amanche ichamah vokhehkho ichuwhmah mee ae tanii yngkarnii khaena ithampeeh saruw, akhaechuve mee vakhae ningna isa chongchu thachanii omkhom mahva.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw chuve thachafhuwva, ama ing nenruwreng imanpirpeeh vaata vokhehkho isamah tanii ingahpeeh vaata.
Kenuw ing kenriir vakhaechu nenuw ing nentusa vokhehkho hentuva nenta ta ungka neningna kenbarungriir kemangamsa.
Aafhuw ing neningna Thangnang ningsiihchu ynghuwniiseh khaena vokhehkho ikhaangchehnii Khrista ing ympeeh ingkhe maen eensapeeh ynsuwhrasiing.
Atii kauw kanae ae, nenuw vakhaechu Aafhuw Jesu Khrista rumingna chonghak kempeehnahchuw, amachuve thaachah mee ae vokhehkho kenriir chongchu amanziimah mee vakhae tanii nenuw asiksii ing tiingruw.
Nenuw ing kentu kenri vasah nakhe ynsaangkhe manjiiva kenchiiva ichii nentaksah ing nemanghuwsa; akhaechuve kenuw ing nenuw thoh kengonglae nongtu ringmahdeh ung.
Kenuw ing achuw yngkheh ningnakho ngareh ing isahfhuw samahdeh ung vokhehkho kenuw ing achuw mee yngkheh ningnache ija peehrik piniimah khaena siimjaen naeru inche ijachaam ikhaang thoh nong kentuva.
Havi kenuw ing iphanii ruwreng keningna omah changchii mahva, changvakonchu kentu kenri inge mee ing ynziinii khaena aandangnii ynsuwhpung.
Kenuw ing nenuw thoh kengonglae neningna hava chonghak vakhae i kempeeh vasah vachuw; achuw yngkheh ing ynriing ningka tamahnave isahkho samah rasiing.
Nengkaarna ynriing ningka achiimah ynlenjaehka vokhehkho isahpang sakata achii omna ichii chong kensiisa.
Changchii mee aechu idaejaeh ing ynriing ae sana sasa ae rasiing ichii khaena, kenuw ing Aafhuw Jesu Khrista rumingna chonghak kempeehchuw inge kengathohsah nahchuw.
Changvakonchu kauw kanae ae, nenuw isa nong itutahna jaanung tamahdehruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing kembaziih chongthen ne kenriirchu reehnave ama meechu buwtinruw amanche aning aanjaknii ing amathoh ynchaarhak mahruw.
Changvakonchu eejeehniiva ichii ing rimahruw, ama changdenna nauw nanae yngkheh vaang ichahruw.
Atiive idae Aafhuw inche apha vakhaena vokhehkho nenongtu chaapna idaechu ympeeh ynsuwhrasiing.
Havana kaningtanii salaam ynziih i Pol kakikrap ing kabaziihva amanche kachongthen vakhae aandangniiva.
Inuw vakhae Aafhuw Jesu Khrista atungsiih inche apha om vakhaena eenruwfhuw rasiing.
Eekarpeeh Thangnang vokhehkho ningmanden ing ymmandensah Jesu Khrista chonghak inuwzii ing chongthang Pol ki ing,
thacha tahna ichum kasiti: Tungsiih re ningsiih vokhehkho idaechu Apa Thangnang re Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tanii naning-nache om ynsuwhrasii.
Mesidonia ting kasipharae naningna kariir vaangkhe, Ephisia na reentaang ichummah thamin itong itheng aenche thamin entongniimah khaena Ephisia nakhe ongjaehra.

Amachuve mee ing amansa thamin ichinaemah tunanii thamin nache barungriir emanruwhniimah ing eningnache thamin tongpeeh aera. Changchii thamin inche ruwm ae naka thacha tanii, Thangnang ing amanden manghuwniiseh changdenna ichummah thamin tingche athiseh ing embarungriir piniivaatae.
Amanche ichummah thamin aanla chuve, ynthiing barungriir tanii amanghuw vasah nakhe achung paamphuw thacha ahenbasuwniinah;
havipang mahka mee vakhae barungriir aasiirting sika irifhuwmah thamin ting barungriir empeehnah.

Chukhaenache hangchii mee ae inge reentaang chong riirbasam riir aeka, amanche ynchii thamin kentongva, uting ikanii hungsuwh vaate ichii manghuwmah khang ae nare vajeer itupa ynsuwh nungka enchiinah.
Achuw yngkheh ing vajeer chonghakchu ichum ing manjiicheh nave sakna ichii ing ymmanghuwsa.

Inuw ing ymmanghuw chuve, ichum ing isi mee ae khaena vajeer chonghak aseem mahva, vajeer chonghak derna isimah re chongriir ynjiimah, Thangnang amandenmah, isii icher, ynthiingmah, isa amandenmah amnuw ampa atheh, vokhehkho miktheh ae,
ichuwhmah mee ae, naamak atu, miksuwr ae, mee amanchae, ichummah saarkhii vokhehkho ichum ynjiifhuwna isimah hava vakhae i khaenava.
Havi pangmahka kaningna ymmansir isa chong chuve Thangnang alaar isa tanii isa chongchu manthangnii khaenava.
Karuwreng ymmanpirpeeh Jesu Khrista vokhehkho inuw vakhae Aafhuw chu kamanpahsahnah, akhae-chuve anong itunii khaena Aafhuw ing kichu eeteerka pham ynthinsahpa.

Isi vasahna Aafhuw taklina ithipak ing ichong meeping vokhehkho jeehnii ingka ningjak kapeeh changvakonchu atii aningsiihchu kaphasahpa, amachuve changlaenche thachamah ingka manghuwru ing katu khaenava.
Amana Jesu Khrista ningna om thacha vokhehkho tungsiihchu Aafhuw ajaar inche kaningna athiseh ing ympeehsahpa.
Jesu Khrista inge, isii icher areen vakhae meechu ikarnii khaena laaruw paamne jungthengsa ichii chong i ithacha arupa vokhehkho iri chukho arupa. Amana isii icher ae kaarna ki inge aaruung chuping.
Changvakonchu ichen naemah iringnii Aafhuw chu thachanii khaena Jesu Khrista ing kataklina yngkhaangpeeh vakhaechu amandangnii khaena atungsiichu kaphasahpa.
Atii ichen naemah iruwng imaang omah, imu ynchehmah, yngkhehpang om ichen naemah Thangnang ningnache ichuwr naerudeh ing ynjasuwh vokhehkho ympahchu ynsuwhrasiing, Amen.

Kasiti Timothi, nakhaena ma-maenna Thangnang chong ynjeerchaap inuwzii ingkhe, havana chonghak i naningna kamansirnahchii. Hava chongzeer inge isapak ing laar natuknii khaena, thacha vokhehkho ichum ynraar yngnghuwnii naruw-thuwh nakhe thinnana tukniira,
achuw yngkheh mee ae chuve hava ruwthuwh i rumah aeka thacha tanii itiih emphapa.
Ama kaarnache Himanus re Alekjender ynvaenae, enuw ae ingkhe ithipak ing athar enchongniimah khaena umlae kamansirpae.
Amaensana, ki ing neningna kariirsahnah, amachuve iniih-peehruw, ithampeehruw, mee khaena ithamsah vokhehkho mee aangkheng khaena imanpahpeehruw,
iruwng ae khaena amanche aatuaricheh ae khaena isa ivaar ing vokhehkho idae ringkum ing Thangnang thoh ipaarnii khaenache aangkheng khaena Thangnang ting ithampeehruw.
Hava vakhae nong i inuw eekarpeeh Aafhuw Thangnang mik enna isapakva vokhehkho aruvasahva,
amachuve mee vakhaechu karpeeh ningka achii barungriir areen, ichum amanghuw, changchii aechu Aafhuw ing aadikva.
Akhaechuve Thangnang yngkheh omna; amanche Thangnang re mee ruwrakna yngkhehpang aansuwhnii khaena eenuwmpeeh yngkhehpang omna,
amachuve laaruw paam mee khaena ynjebathenpeeh Jesu Khrista chuva, apha ichachakna mee vakhae ikarpeeh phaniichu amandangva.
Havi khaene reentaang mee ae ningna kichu thacha vokhehkho ichumna isa chongjeer, amanche chongthangnii khaena aanchuw yngkheh ing ynthinva (kariir chong i ichumva, kamanchaemah vachuw).
Chukhaenache pasar ae ing barung isii, fhuwm ynvae omrudeh inche ynthiing kik ithoh aesana aphamsiirna ithamsahnii nong itu kaadiknah.

Havi vaange rupanuw engkho ningjak manghuw aesana embarungriirna ynriim ing, entaksah enganruwfhuw peendiir ing ynthong aesana, isa ing sam phen aesana, sana kikchii vokhehkho amen iruwpak rung changchii changdenna isasa ing ynthong ae rasiing.
Havi Thangnang amanden rupanuw ae khaena inempak isasehva.
Chukhaenache rupanuw ing ynjuursana fhuwdaejaeh ing rungae rasiing.
Changpangmahka pasar taklina rupanuw ing amanchuw i ki idikmah ing, vokhehkho ahuw mandaesana rungaerasiing.
Akhae-chuve Adam chu maensa ing seemka aanuwtingche Eve aseempehva;
vokhehkho Adam ningna abatheem mahva, rupanuw ningnache batheemka isii tingche ababuwva;
chang-vakonchu rupanuw ing thacha naka, ningsiih nache, ynthiing barungriir reencheh nave, rupanuw ing siti abaringna ikarpeehchu phavaata.
