Havana chongjeer i thacharuw, achuw yngkheh ing ruwrthiing sungna aapuh idiknave isa nongtuchu aadikva.
Chukhaenache ruwrthiing nong atu meechu, isamahna aruming ithangmah, rupanuw yngkhehpang fhuwsar, juw ainmah, abarungriir asuwrcheh, apha amanghuw, mee bariimnii amanghuw, mee amanchuw-cheh,
juw ynruwmah, meethoh ynnamah, abarungriir iduwr, idae, seerna ikaammah, jinge ichii mee inche tuvachiiva.
Ama a-eengkuw isajaeh ing apuhcheh vokhehkho asiti aeng achongriir amanjii meeva chiiva.
Achuw yngkheh ing a-eengkuw puhchehmah nave, ynsaangkhe Thangnang ruwrthiingchu puhcheh vachiiva?
Chukhaenache barungriir yntehpeh mee ing puhmah rasiing, akhaechuve eentheem athenglae badaar chehmah naka umlae chaangna uvaata.
Chukhaenache athang isa ing isi vokhehkho umlae chaangna umah amanche mee ing aadik mee ing puhva chiiva.
Amavaangche ruwrthiing sungna nongtu Dikan ae chukho isa mee vokhehkho barungriir iseeng meeva chiipae; enuw inche juwna barungriir iruwhmah, vokhehkho seerbaar nakho kaammah vachiipae.
Enuw ing ynthiing ruwthuwh vokhehkho ithuwhpak thachachu bachuwther vachiipae.
Amatah nache amaensana enuwchu enjap vaanchiipae, amanache isamahna enruming thangmah nave Dikan nongchu tuaerasii.
Havi vaange rupanuw ae ing ynriim vachiipae vokhehkho thaechii thaenam tuvachii mahpae, ama changdenna barungriir asuwrcheh vokhehkho aangkhenglaangna thachafhuw om ynsuwhva chiipae.
Dikan ae ing ensiti re engeengkuwchu isajaeh ing puh aesana rupanuw yngkhehpang fhuwsar mee ynsuwh aerasiing.
Akhaechuve ruwrthiing aapuh nong isajaeh ing atu mee ae chuve entaksah khaenakho isa pham emphava, vokhehkho Jesu Khrista ningna thacha taklinache embarungriir chukho ngamvaata.
Ki naningting ynlanghak ing ivatheng kamandensahnah;

laang-lam vathirdoh ningve Thangnang ynden eengkuw sungnache ynsaang-khe sivaanchiiva ichii nang ing namanghuwnii khaena naningna hava chongthen i kavebaziihva; Thangnang ynden eengkuw chuve iring Thangnang ruwrthiing mangiirnii vokhehkho ichum ingahnii chuva.
Chukhaenache Thangnang ing amandenchu ijongnii ruwpakna ichii i achuw ingkho dacheh mahnii:
“Aafhuw chu atak ing jungindangsa;
Laetha inche ichumva taka amandangpa,
vaarmee aengkho emupa;
suwnthar siti ae kaarnakho athamin yntongsa,
laaruw paam mee aangkheng ing athachapa,
vokhehkho alaar isa thohche thangbaen ting ajeripa.”
Isajaeh ing ynthiing laetha ing ajeer chuve, nuwting embarungriir ynthiingmah chong manjii aenaka vokhehkho umlae chongzeer lam jiiae naka enthacha tanii ynrivaatae;
Hangchii chong ive embarungriir ynthiingmah ichummah chong ichong mee aeng siir ynsajor vaang tongvaatae.
Enuw ing rakhii iniikho rumahnii ae, Thangnang ing aseem isahfhuw vakhae ympahthoh ynruw ing isah aruchirchu isah arumah aru manae vaatae.
Thangnang ing aseem peeh aangkhenglaang isachirva, amanche ithamsah thoh ynruw ing rimanuwve, rumahvachii yntanga omah;
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe Thangnang chongsae vokhehkho ithamsah ing amanthiingva.
Nang ing hava chongzeer vakhae i unae vakhaena tongpeeh ae taniive natak i Khrista khaena isa nongtu meechu vaanta, nang ing namanjiivasah isa chongzeer kha enuw chukho manchuw aera.
Aman-che ynthiingmah ikaniimah chong aekha varaammahra. Nataksah ing Thangnang yndenna nacheepnii ing tura.

Akhaechuve hakchaang khaena yntuchuve yngkaanii ompak mahva, changvakonchu Thangnang ynden nong khaena chembe ataraennii vokhehkho hungvivachii khaenakho iringnii chongreep om khaena aang-khenglaang khaena ikaniiva.
Hava chongzeer i thachafhuwva vokhehkho irifhuwva.

Havi khaene kenuw ing nongkho kentuva amanche kemaakho kentaarva, akhaechuve mee vakhae khaena, athurfhuw chuve thacha mee ae khaena, ikarpeeh Aafhuw Thangnang ningna kenuw ing ningmanden kemangomchu reepsung.
Havana chong vakhae i chonghak ing manchuw aera.
Natak i nae-pangva ichii ing achuw ingkho ijuummah rasii; changvakonchu nangchuve thacha mee ae khaena nachongna, nanong tuna, ningsiihna, thachana, ynthiingna, amandangnii ing tura.
Ki ing kavatheng mahri raentaang, mee kaarna ynthiing thiimziih ipaana, isa chong tongniina vokhehkho manchuwnii khaena barungriir manruwhdehra.
Upa vakhae aeng nataklina kik ithoh aeka bor ympeeh ae thohkhe ynruw ing Thangnang jaephar aeng naningna ympivasah ae, naningna om kikthuur kha thosii thosamah ing tumahra.
Mee vakhaena nanongtu nache naambaangniichu aandangnii ing, hava nongtu khaene ynrimla vokhehkho nataksah ympidehra.
Nataksah khaena vokhehkho mee manchuwnii tahna ynriimla. Havana nong i bachuwtherla, akhaechuve hava nong inge natakkho, nachong aasii mee ae chukho ikarpeeh phavaatae.
Upachu rukuhmahra changvakon-chu nangpa yngkheh ynsuwhvaang tura, naepang aechu nauw nanae aevaang tura,
rupanuw upa aechu nangnuw aevaang, rupanuw naepang aechu nasar najuwr aevaang manden nana barungriir ynthiingjaeh ing ithohsa aera.
Atatak ing muwkhuwnuw aechu ynjasuwh ing bariimsa aera.

Chang-vakonchu muwkhuwnuw inche asiti atuti omnave, amaensana enuw ing entaksah engeensungchu Thangnang emandennii ing tuae sana aanuwna emnuw empa khaena tuae nave, amachuva Thangnang mikna ichuw vokhehkho aru nongchu.
Asiti omahka asanaenpang ing ipaar atatak muwkhuwnuw ama inche Thangnang yndentahna ngiirka, siim jaen aangkhengna ithamsah tahna manpehmah.
Changvakonchu ataksah nungaeniipang atu muwkhuwnuw amachuve aringsen ing ithii vasahva.
Chukhaenache enuwchu enthang asikniimah ing, havana chonghak i eningna riirla.
Achuw yngkheh ing ataksahrap a-eengkuw khaena sirpeeh chehmah nave, thachachu ama ing rumahsa, amanche athachamah mee ae chungna athiseh ing isamahva.
Chukhaenache muwkhuwnuw yngkheh ing kum somruk aphamahri raentaang muwkhuwva ichii rumingna ynvaemah rasiing, ama chungna afhuwsar yngkhehpangna rakhii iniivasah vachiiva;

isa nong tutahna mee aeng aruming asuur mee vachiiva; ama ing asiti aechu isajaeh ing ahenjuh, khuwr itheng mee aechu ipeehnii amanghuw, ynthiing mee aechu engkhi achaampeeh, ijachaam mee aechu abom mee, isa nongtu chaapna aanuw jiinaka atucheh, changchii meechu muwkhuwnuwsa ichii ruming ikhiing arusa.
Changvakonchu naepang ing muwkhuwnuw ae chuve muwkhuw-nuwna manvaemahra, yngkhaena ynchii imbe enuw ensha ing rakhii niinungka enchii emanden inche Khrista ningtanii emae embaheernah.
Amachuve enuw ing amaensa enchongiirchu embakhiitah nache eningna vajeer omna.
Havipang mahka enuw ing eensung eensung ting ruwh aeka apha mamaangnii entunah ae; havi chungna thaechii thaenam chong aeka riirmahva enchii aajaehkho enriirnah, tumahva enchii aajaehkho entunah.

Chukhaenache ki ing kaadik chuve naepangpeh muwkhuwnuw aechu rakhii niireeh ae rasiing, siti deen ae rasiing, amanche eensungchu ibuwr ae rasiing, amachu vanave ynrumah mee aeng yntaklina isamah ing chongcheh mahnii ae.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe achuw yngkheh ae chuve umlae aanuw enjiipa.

Achuw yngkheh thacha rupanuw ing a-eengkuwna muwkhuwnuw ynvae-nave, ama ing bomrasiing; amanche ruwrthiingchu apeeh manrikmah rasiing, amachuvanve muwkhuwnuw tatak aechu ruwrthiing ing isajaeh ing bomcheh vaata.
Achuw yngkheh upa aenche aapuh yngkhehpung ichii ing isa ing nongchu tuae nave, athurfhuw ing isa thamin itongna vokhehkho mee manchuwtahna nong atu aechu aanemseh ing ynjasuwhpham suwhnae.
Ynthiing thiimziih ing ajeer chuve, “Gehu namanchanii siir-charchu anerku phuwpmah chakchii,” amavaangche, “Nongtu mee inche aruthamen phava chiiva.”
Mee ynnii, mee ynthum saarkhii chumah naka, upa yngkheh taklina miraar empeehchu rungaemahra.
Mee aengkho engaanchiknii khaena, isii atu diin diin upa aechu mee vakhae maana rukuh aera.
Thangnang re Jesu Khrista vokhehhko ynteer vasah vaarmee ae maana adongchang turudeh ing namanjiinii khaena havana ynjii-fhuw vakhae i kamansirsah nahchii.
Achuw yngkheh taklina nakik ithoh rungrung mahra, mee reentaang isii icher nongtuna vaanvae mahra; nataksah manthiingla.
Chii pang-kha inmahra, changvakonchu nangve ina diidii vachii khaka naven atumnii inche vomrip chii topohpoh manten chakla.
Mee areh ae isii chuve entaklina vajeernii aphamah rirae yndangna, amanche areh ing isii entu chuve yntuk ing yndangpehna.
Amachu vaangche isa nongtuchu yndangna, yndangmah khangnare ynthuurjaeh omah.
Thangnang ruming vokhehkho achongjeer taklina emaniisah niimah ing suwh vakhae ae ing engafhuw taklina isajaeh ing engajathoh ynruw ing nong tuae rasii,

vokhehkho athacha om aafhuw aechu unae vaangkhe manden ae sana, suwh aeng enthang mansikmah aerasii; changvakonchu isaseh ing rukuum tuae rasii. Akhaechuve thacha mee unae aechu enong inche abompae. Hava vakhae i manchuw aera vokhehkho tongla.
Achuw yngkheh ing inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista chongzeer thoh re Thang-nang yndennii chongzeer thohkho ynthiir ing manchuw nave,
changchii meechu yntangacha amanghuwmah yngae meeva. Mee thohpang chongna ynna ningka achii amanden meeva; Havi inge kallak, ynnahnii, ningjak apeeh, mee achingnii,
vokhehkho mee thoh chongna ynnajaeh, emanden isamah vokhehkho ichumchu eningna omah; enuw ing emanden chuve Thangnang ynden ive ikaniipang phanii vatah ichii emanden eningtanii hungsuwhruw.
Chumna, Thangnang ynden nache pensanave savang isuwh chuva.
Inuw ing laaruw paamne ynjereen yntanga omah, vokhehkho laaruw paam tanii ynchii tangakho reencheh vaanchii omah. Yntangakho reenchehmah manuw!
Changvakonchu isahfhuw re peendiirchu deen manuwve barungriir ngamnii chuva.

Changvakonchu savang fhuwraang suwhningka ichiiramthi mee ae chuve batheem niiting buknae, vokhehkho isii ikha ichamah barungriir chaangna unae; hangchii mee ae inge mee aechu imaangnii tingche aruwnah ae.
Seer yndikpak inge isamah chaap vakhae abasennii arajungva; havi aadik mee topoh chuve thacha tanii jungtaksae, amanche isii ing ynsin vaangkhe embarungriir kiika jaasae.
Changvakonchu Thangnang mee nakhaena chembe, isamah khaena chongzeer vakhaekha dahra, ichum ynthiingna, Thangnang mee yngkheh ing, yndenniina, ningsiihna ipirpak ing akhaangcheh iduwrjaeh ing omla.

Ichum thacha khaenache isa ing laar tukra; ichen naemah iringniichu bachuwra, ama khaene nangchu Aafhuw ing yngeenva. Chukhaenache nang ing Thangnang ing atu ari vakhae inge asaarkhiiva tachiika mee kaarna namandangpa.
Laaruw paamna peehchae chaap iringnii apeeh Thangnang rumingna vokhehkho pilaat maana isapak ing saarkhii napeeh Jesu Khrista rumingna, ki ing naningna kamanthang sahnahchii.
Chukhaenache nang ing chonghak vakhae i manjiinana, Aafhuw Jesu Khrista inche ajungthengmahri raentaang ngiirjaehra.

Aphachakchu ahenpharae ruwreng ipir Thangnang, Iruwng na Iruwng, Aafhuw na Aafhuw inche thangbaen tanii Khrista chu jemandang vaata, vokhehkho amapang vatah aningna ithii omah vokhehkho mee ing ynneeng achehmah irengnache ongna.
Ama i achuwti ingkho muchehmahri vokhehkho imukho chehmahnii. Aningnache ynjasuwh, ichen naemah ruwreng amanche lipah puhniichu omna, Amen.

Ataraennii laaruw paam meepaarna aadeen mee ae ningna riirpeeh aera, amachuve emba-rungriirna ingiirmah peehchae taklinache yndingniimah ae rasii, changvakonchu aangkhenglaang ympeehcheh Thangnang ningna pangche embarungriir mangam ae rasii.
Isa nong tuae rasiing, isa nong tunache savang aerasii, ipeehnii ihae ynsuwh ae rasii,
Amachu inche nuwtanii iphafhuw khaena enlerchu emangkongva amanche havi inge iringnii tatak ringkumchu embachuwva.
Timothi, naningna kamansirchii vakhae i ngahra; ynthiingmah chongna ynvaemah, ynthiir chongchu ising iveerniiva enchiikho ynvaena.
Hangchii i emanjiitahna enthacha chukho ynthiirsa.
Thangnang tungsiihchu nenuw vakhae ningna om ynsuwhrasii.
Jesu Khrista ningna om iringnii chongreepchu itongnii khaena, Thangnang ing amanden ajaarnache Jesu Khrista achongthang Pol ki ing,
kaning kamansiihpak kasiti Timothi naningna: Apa Thangnang tanii re inuw vakhae Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tanii tungsiih re ningchuwh vokhehkho idaechu omlasii.
Afhuw fhuwven aeng entuvaang, kavakhar ynthiingkiir ing manghuw ingka anong katu Thangnang chu siim jaen kathamsahrae yndenchii ingka anasiirna Thangnang chu kaman-pahsahva.
Rotharoh ing kasipnii khaena, namikrichii yntachu ynsiisa ingka, nangchu inempak muningka kachiisah vachii.
Nangpuw Lois re Eunis ae ningna om aren ynthiing nathacha amakha kaansiisa. Hava thacha i naningna omjaeh vaata ichii kamandensahnah.
Chukhaenache nataklina kakik kaathohrae, Thang-nang ing ympeeh kikthuur amakha manringjaehra ta ingka naningna kajeriirva.
Thangnang ing ympeeh laetha ive ynchiknii khaena mahva; changvakonchu laetha inche ruwreng, ningsiih vokhehkho yntaksah ynchah-sah chehniichu ajemansip niiva.

Aafhuw khaena saarkhii ipeeh naning manjakmahra; Khrista khaena kaeshumna ong kakhae nakho naning manjakmahra. Changvakonchu Thangnang ruwreng inuwzii ing isa chong itongnii khaena ijachaam ikhaangfhuwra.

Aafhuw inche inuwchu yngkarpa amanche ynthiing inche yngeenpa, yntaksah nongtu ing mahva, Aafhuw ing amanden inuwzii ing vokhehkho atungsiih inuwzii inche ajae tuna pharnungna basenka Jesu Khrista jaarna ympeeh vasahva.
Changvakonchu atiive eekarpeeh Aafhuw Jesu Khrista yndang ajaar inche ithiinii ruwrengchu amamaangpa amanche isa chong inche ithii omah iringniichu amandangpa.

chukhaenache havi khaene ki ing ijachaam kakhaangsah i kaning ynjak-mah, ki ing kathachachu achuwva ichii kamanghuwsa amanche Aafhuw ing kaningna ymmansir inii ipha inche ngiirchehva kata ta ingka kathachanah.
Jesu Khrista ningna om thacha re ningsiih, nang ing kaningna nasii ichumkha natak ing manjiira.
Naningna kamansirchii ichumkha yntaklina om ynthiing laetha ajaar inche ngahthella.
Philegus re Harmajenes ynvae ing, Asia na ong vakhae ing kaningtanii yngheersae ichii nang ing namang-huwsa.
Thangnang ing Onesiphora eengkuw aechu aning mansiihsa ae rasiing; akhaechuve ama ing kichu inempak ija ymbasumpeeh chakva,
ama ing Rom na avatungrae abarungriir iruwhdeh ing ijongsaka yntuwhsahpa.
Aafhuw ing ama Inii nache ningchuwh aphanii ing ama ing Ephisia na aajaehmeh nong atupa ichii nang ing isajaeh ing namanghuwsehva.
Kasiti, nakhaena chembe, nang ing Jesu Khrista tungsiih inche ipirther ynsuwhra.
Aanemna saarkhii om ajaarna kaning tanii nasii chong vakhaekha reentaang mee ae ningnakho manchuwcheh vachii ithacha aru meechu mansirla.
Jesu Khrista chongriir ynjii isapak laarchang mee yngkheh ynsuwhra.
Laarchang mee achuwti ingkho, laarchang ynsuwhnii khaena aruming ahechar meechu apennii khaenache simrii nongtuna vaanther nohmah.
Achuw yngkheh ing itaen yntaarnii nache ynjiifhuw vakhaechu manjii-chehmah nave nongmen phacheh mahnii.
Havi ruw itu mee inche anongtu aren aanlachu ataksah ing aphakha vatah.
“Ki ing ynchii kariirva ichii i nabarungriir sungna thinjaehra, Thangnang ing naningna losing ipivaata.”
Ki ing naningna isa chong katong inuwzii ing ithiiae kaartanii ihangring Devit tuti Jesu Khrista kha yndenjaehra.
Havi khaene ki ing itufhuwmah katu mee vaang ymphuwp ae phanii ing ija kakhaangva; changvakonchu Thangnang chongsae chuve ymphuwpmah.
Chukhaenache aateer vasah aechu ichen naemah alaar isa thohche Jesu Khrista ningna om iringnii lamchu iphanii khaena enuw khaenakho ki ing aangkhenglaangna ijachaam kakhaangva.
Havana kachongjeer i ichumva:
Inuw ing Aafhuw thohche thik-hak manuwve,
inuw ing Aafhuw thohche hangringhak vataruw.
iruwngthoh aanghak ing ipaarkho paarhak vataruw;
changvakonchu Aafhuw chu rumah manuwve,
Aafhuw ingkho irumahnii.
Yntaklina thachafhuw omahkhang nakho,
Aafhuw ningna chembe thachafhuw omjaehna;
akhaechuve Aafhuw ing ataksah ithachafhuwmah ynsuwhchehmah.
Namee aechu hava vakhae i imanthangpeeh aera amanche ynchii tangakho kaniimahva enchii ing chong enriirniimah khaena riirla.
Nang ing nacheh vakhae Thangnang ing ynrunii khaena nataksahrap ympidehra, nongtu meechu utaraenkho ningjak phanii omah, ichum chongchu isajaeh ing bachuwtherla.
Changpang mahka ikaniimah chongpang ichongkha bathenla; ama ingkhe Thangnang yndenniimah henthisehseh vaata,
vokhehkho enchong inche isamahting mamaang vaate; chukhaenache ama kaarnache Himanija re Philetus ynvaenae.
Enuw ing atiive hangringchu isuwh vasahva, atii chisa ta aeka ichum chong nache manreeh aeka achuw yngkheh mee ae ningna enriirtahna thacha tanii ynriaeka imaang sipjaehnae.

Changche takhangnare, Thangnang ningna icheep eenphambur chuve ynlaaprudeh ing omna; havi jinge ichii ing ynghakka omna: “Aafhuw ing amee vakhaechu amanghuwsa,” amana “Aafhuw ruming asuursah mee vakhae ing isamah nongtuchu bathenva chiiva.”
Iruungpak een nache sana rupa bukam jaekhi pangchu omahva, thing ingkho, pir ingkho ynseem omna; ama sungnache yngkheh chuve iruwpak ing ensichinniinah amanche yngkheh chuve iraena ensichinniinah.
Chu-khaenache achuw yngkheh ing havi tanii ynthiingcheh sanave, Aafhuw ing sichinnii vachii ikanii isa nongtunii khaena mee yngkhehchu ynsuwh vaata.
Ilerlaam barungriir amakha bathen nana amanche barungriir ynthiing ing Aafhuw ing a-een ae thohche ichum ynthiing, thacha, ningsiih vokhehkho idae aanuwchu jiira.
Ising iveermah, ipang ing ichong mee thohche nongtuhak rumah; hava ae inge ynnahnii ahenreennah ichii nang ing namanghuwsa.
Aafhuw meenae mee chuve meethoh hungana vaana tumahva chiiva, ama changdenna mee ningnache ningsiih omvachii, mee manchuwnii ihae, ikhaangcheh adeen,
amanche ynrumah mee aechu iduwrjaeh ing amanchumcheh mee vachiiva. Apha vokhehna Thangnang ing ichumchu emanghuwnii inche embarungriir ihuungchu irupeehkho arusa,
vokhehkho Umlae ing asuwr vasah kiktanii hunganjoh vaatae.
Achinii aphachu ahungvi raenche ithipak apha thengvaata ichii manghuwra.

Amachuve mee vakhae jinge hungtavaata, ataksahpang aning ynsiihsah, seer aadikpak, abarungriirna ynding, iruungchichuh, ithipak ing ichong mee ae, ampa amnuw chong areeh, mee ing atupeeh amanghuwmah, ynthiingmah,
ningsiih ataklina omah, yntuwhak arumah, mee iriirsah ipir, ichummah mee, ichiisuwhjaeh ing om, isachu abatir,
mee rensajaeh kata achii, ynriimmah, ataksah khaena iruungchichuh, Thangnang aning amansiih ithideh ing ahakchaang nungaeniipang aadik,
Thangnang yndenvaang taangnacha tuka, aruwrengchu aadikmah changchii mee ae tanii nang yngheerla.
Enuw hangchii mee aeng ynruwh ing eensung eensung ting ruwh aeka, isii peehrik areen rupanuw ihuung iva barungriir ing aruw ae;
ichumchu manchuw aekhang manuwre amanghuwchehmah ae, ipang rupanuw ae chupang asuwr mee omnae.
Jaanes re Jaambres ing Mosi enrumah raennii vaang, havana mee ae ingkho ichumchu rumahsae; enuw ae i thacha arumah imaang vasah meepae.
Chukhaenache enuw utaraenkho hungruungcheh mahnii ae, akhaechuve enuw ing emanden engkharchu tomsa, hava mee ynniimeh ae ningna isuwh vaange mee vakhae taklina chenkho yndang vaata.
Chukhaenache nang chuve ki ing kamanchuwchii nakhe, katu kari, kamanden, kathacha, apha iseeh ing kakhaangcheh, kaningsiih, kareepnii nache,

kanangnii vokhehkho ijachaam kakhaangchu nasiipa; amachuve Entiok na, Ikonia na, Rusta na, kataklina isuwh chaap kakhaangchu nang ing namanghuwsa; amanche hava vakhae tanii i Aafhuw inche yngkarsahpa.
Jesu Khrista ningna Thangnang ynden mee ynsuwh ningka achii amanden mee vakhae chuve ijachaamchu khaangvachiiva.
Changvakonchu ichamah mee ae vokhehkho aningae om mee ae inche manchae ae naka athisehseh ichamahchu hungom sehseh vaata.
Chukhaenache nang ing natam namanghuw nakhe thacha icheep ing ynlaaprudeh ing ongjaehra; nang ing achuw ae ningna natamva,
vokhehkho nanaepanglae basenka ynthiing ichumchu namanghuwva ichii nataksah ing namanghuwsa; Jesu Khrista ithacha ajaar ing ichum ynthiing inge iringnii lamtingche ynruwchehsa.
Ynthiing thiimziih chong vakhae Thangnang ihuwh taniiva amanche Thangnang nong atu mee vakhae khaena areersuwh ing machang aansuwhnii ing,
mee manchuwnii khaena, ynchahnii khaena, manchumnii khaena, amanche ichum ynthiing ing inringnii khaena inempak ikaniiva.
Iring aere ithii aechu vajeer tuvachii Thangnang re Jesu Khrista vokhehkho jungpaarvachii Iruwng rumingna kamansirsahnahchii.
Isa chongkha apha om omah naeru ing nong manpir nana mancheep aera, ichah aera vokhehkho ithohsa aera, inehther ing ikhaangthoh ynruw ing manchuw aera.
Enuw ing ichum ynchuwchu ikhaang chehmahva enchii inii hungom vaata; engadik inuwzii ing entaksah khaena manchuw vachii mee chongchu manjiiva enchii aphachu hungom vaata,
vokhehkho ichum tanii yngheer aenaka abur ichah thamin ting yngheer vaatae.
Chukhaenache nangve aangkhenglaangna nabarungriir suwrteehra, ijachaam badaar, isa thamin itong nongtura, nang ing natu nong nakhe areer basuwra.
Atiive ki kasha ympidehsing; kaangkaenii apha ahenphapa.
Ki ing isapak laarkukchu katukpa, kanongchu kamanchipa, thachachu kangahsahpa.

Atii ichum ynthiing khaena iphafhuw phurchiichu kakhaena ynsiihpeehpa, amachu ichum vajeer itupa Aafhuw inche kaningna ama inii nache ipivaata; havi kakhae napang mahva, Aafhuw ing jungindang vachii aning amansiih mee vakhae khaena khomva.
Kaningting ynlanghak ing ivaknii khaena achehnii vakhae ing tura.
Akhaechuve Demas ing ataraennii laaruw paam meepaar i aning amansiih khaenache ibathenka Thesalonika ting sisa; Kreskena ing Galatia ting sisa, Taitas ing Dalmatia ting sisa.
Luk pangchu kithoh ynruwhaknung. Nang ing Maak kha jongnana veruwra; nongtunii khaena atakkha inempak ikaniiva.
Taikikus chuve Ephisia ting kachiirpa,
Tros na ki ing Karpus ningna kamah isingfhuw peen re kathiimbuwr vakhaekha amanche athurfhuw ing shakoh thuungfhuw kha navathenglae vereenla.
Alekjender siir itu mee ingkhe kataklina inempak isamah atupa; ama anongtu inuwzii ing Aafhuw inche aningna ipipham isuwhchu pisavaata.
Nangkho ama khaena ynriimla, inuw ing ynjeer chong chaap parden tunii atunah.
Havi khaene ahaarpana kaangahsahnii chong kariir raenche achuwkho kaachangfhuw mee omah, changvakonchu enuw vakhae ing kichu ymbathen chirpae, havi entaklina isii ikha suwhmah rasii.

Changvakonchu ki ing isa thamin kajeer chaap vakhae i isajaeh ing achinii khaena vokhehkho mee reentaang vakhae aengkho chongjeer vakhae i ensiinii khaena Aafhuw ing kakuurna ingiir peehka ipirnii ruwreng ympeehpa; amanche ki ing ithii phava kachii taniikho yngkarpa.
Aafhuw inche isamah nongtu tanii chaap ikarpeeh naka thangbaen iruwng lipah ipha ing eenruwfhuw vaata. Aafhuw ningna ichen naemah ing ympah ynsuwhrasii, Amen.
Erosta ing Korinthia na ongsa, amanche Milita na Trophina nakka kamahpa.
Pharbuw ahungvi mahrirae avathengnii ing atupeehsara. Ubulus, Puden, Linus, Krodija vokhehkho unae chaap aangkhenglaang salaam kapeehsahnah ae,
Aafhuw ing nalaetha thoh eenruwfhuw rasiing. Thangnang tungsiihchu nenuw vakhae ningna om ynsuwhrasii.

Thangnang ameenae vokhehkho Jesu Khrista achongthang Pol ki ing, ichen naemah iringniichu ningmanden mangomsa ingka, Thangnang ing aateer ae enthacha khaena vokhehkho Thangnang emanden ichumchu icheep ing emanghuwnii khaena,
havana iringnii ringkum i ynchaenii omahdeh ing ajae tuna pharnungna basenka chongreep om vasahchu,
atii apha ichachak nache ama ing achongjeer nache amandangpa. Havi kaningna imansirka, amanche Thangnang chonghak inuwzii inche ki ing amachu katongva.
Apa Thangnang re inuw Eekar Jesu Khrista ningtanii tungsiih vokhehkho idaechu om ynsuwhrasiing.

Nang ing ivaeh chaapchu ningkuur maensa manae taniika iseemnii khaena vokhehkho khuwruung siirna ruwrthiing puhvachii upa aechu ki ing naningna kariir vaangkhe pham ithinnii khaenache Kret na kamahvachii:

Achuw yngkheh mee isamahna athang isimah, rupanuw yngkhehpang fhuwsar vokhehkho asiti aechu thachafhuw ing om amanche enthang isamah omah changmahka chongriir ynjiimah ing omah ae, changchii meechu pham thinva nachiiva.
Akhaechuve aapuh mee inche Thangnang changdenna rukuumtu mee vaang isamahna athang isimah, ataksah khaenapang amandenmah, abarung isiisiimah, juw ainmah, meethoh ynnamah, seerna ikaammah,
changvakonchu ipitahna isa mee, isachu aadik, abarungriir asuwrcheh, ichum, ynthiing, chongriir derna isi acheh mee,
amanche ichumchu amanchuwna mee ae barungriir ynthohsahnii, chong areeh mee aechu enraar yndangnii khaenache, ichum thachachu icheep ing bachuw vachiiva.
Akhaechuve mee derna sinungka enchiimah mee inem omnae, abur ichah chongpang ichong ae, vokhehkho emare om meepae, enuw ae chuve athurfhuw ing vinchiip ruwr aepae;

enuw aekha chongmah vachiipae, hangchii ae inge seer baarna engkaam tahnache mee ae ningna itongfhuwmah thamin tong aeka, eengkuwna inempak ningsiih hunganpimah hungomsa; chukhaenache enuw ing mee ynchuwnii ruwreng omah.
Enuw entaksah kaartanii laksii yngkheh ing jinge ichii ing ariirsa, “Kret mee ae chuve apha vakhaena emare tamna, isamah lampa shapae vokhehkho empeehbuwr iruung thaachah mee aepae.”
Havi ichumva. Chukhaenache enuw aekha ipirpak ing ichah aera, amachuvaang naka enuw ichum thacha nache ompeh vaatae,
akhaechuve enuw ing ichumchu reeh aeka, Jehudi ae tunanii thamin ting vokhehkho mee ae nerna embarungriir empeehpa.

Ynthiing ae ningnache peeh aangkhenglaang manthiing chirna; changvakonchu imaang ae vokhehkho enthacha omah ae ningnache ynthiing omah; akhaechuve enuw envakhar vokhehkho enrathuwhchu manthiing mahsa.

Enuw ing Thangnang kemanghuwsa ta aeka enriirnah, changvakonchu enongtu nachembe Aafhuw chu rumahsae; enuw chuve yntirsuwh, chongriir ynjiimah ae, vokhehkho isa nongtunii khaena ikanii omahdeh meepae.
Changvakonchu nang chuve ichum thachachu manchuwva nachiipae.
Amachuve upa chaap ing juw ainmah, barungriir idim, vokhehkho barungriir asuwrcheh, thachana, ningsiihna, ikhaangchehna ichum meechu ynsuwh ae rasii.
Havivange rupanuw upa aenche ynthiing ing omvachiipae, ichummah yngensiimahnii chongmah vachiipae vokhehkho vomrip chiina suwh ing ongvachii mahpae. Enuw ing isachu aanchuw mee ynsuwh ae naka,
rakhiiniipeh rupanuw ae inche etaksahsah enfhuwsar vokhehkho ensiti aechu ening emansiihnii ing,

barungriir asuwrcheh, ynthiing rupanuw, eengkuw paarnii amanghuw, isa rumee, enfhuwsarsah ae derna ong engaansuwhnii ing manchuw vachiipae. Amana chembe Thangnang chongsae taklina ithipak ing chongmahnii ae.
Havivaange rakhii iniipeh pasar chaap ing embarungriir ensuwrchehnii ing riirla.
Chukhaenache aangkheng-laangna nataksah ing isa nong tunache ynjiifhuw ing mandangla, namanchuw ae nakhe nabarungriir manthiingrasii, manruwtherla,
amanche nachongchu embasangniimah ing isa ing chongla, amana chembe ynrumah aechu ningjak phaniivaatae, vokhehkho nataklina isamah chong riirmahnii ae.
Suwh vakhae ing engafhuw derna ongva chiipae vokhehkho aangkhengna empennii tuvachiipae; enuw ing chong reehmahva chiipae,

vokhehkho baruk mahva chiipae changvakonchu anasiirna isa ing vokhehkho thachafhuw omnae ichiichu enuw ing mandangva chiipae, amana chembe aangkhenglaangna eekarpeeh Thangnang chongchu entu enri chaap inche mansak vaata.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe Thangnang ing laaruw mee vakhaechu ikarpeehnii khaena atungsiihchu amandangpa.

Thangnang irumah vokhehkho laaruw paam inungae yndikchu bathen manuwka, barungriir asuwrcheh, ichum ynthiing ing vokhehkho Thangnang ynden nache ataraennii laaruw paamne ipaarnii khaena tungsiih inge inuwchu ymmanchuwva.
Inuw ing rotharohniipak ningmanden inii vokhehkho ipirpak Thangnang re Eekarpeeh Aafhuw Jesu Khrista enlaar isa ing jungindangva enchiichu inuw ing ynghahsahva.
Chutahnache yntaklina isii icher omchaap tanii ikarnii khaena, vokhehkho inuwchu ynthiing amee ibasuwnaka amanche isa nong itunii khaenache, Aafhuw ing inuw yngkhaenache ataksahrap ympidehsa.
Hava chongsae i riirnana ithohsa aera amanche aatuaricheh aangkheng thoh ichah aera. Mee achuw ingkho nangchu ijuummah rasii.
Namee ae ing aapuh ae vokhehkho aatuaricheh ae derna ong ae naka, enchongriir emanjiinii ing, isa nong vakhae itunii khaena thoraang atu mee engaansuwhnii inche,
achuw mee yngkheh ningnakho isamah ing ichongmah, idae ing ipaar, barungriir iduwr, mee vakhaena ynjuursah mandangnii khaena riirpeeh aera.
Ajaen chembe inuwkho pangmuwka, chongriir ynjiimah, mee ynchae, barungriirna ihungsuwh vokhehkho reentaang aajaeh nungaenii suwh ing ongmuwka, yngkheh re yngkheh yngharmuw.
Changvakonchu inuw Eekar Thangnang ing ynchaarpeeh vokhehkho aningsiihchu jungindangka inuwchu ama ing yngkarpa.
Inuw ing yntu ynri ichum nong inchen mahva, changvakonchu aningsiih inche yngkarva, laetha ynthiing ajaarnache imantharka vokhehkho ynchaamsah inche ithar ringkum ympeehpa.
Eekarpeeh Jesu Khrista ajaarna Thangnang ing ynthiing laethachu ynriimjor ing yntaklina achirpa,
amatah nache atungsiih inche imanchumka inuw ing ichen naemah ringkumchu ningmanden ymmangom khaenache ruw ikuumchu ynsuwhnii khaenava.
Havi ichum chongva.

Hava vakhae khaene Thangnang athacha mee ae ing isa nong itutahna embarungriir emanruwhnii inche, nang ing icheepther ing iriirpeehchu kaadiknah. Hava vakhae i isava vokhehkho mee vakhae khaena ikaniiva.
Changvakonchu ipang chong ing ynsang, ajaennii thamin ajong ae, ynnahnii, vajeer chonghak khaena ynnahnii isuwh, hava vakhae i bathenla; akhaechuve hava vakhae ive ikanii omah vokhehkho abariiva.
Asiksik suwhnii atu mee aechu vokheh vanii rukuh nana aanuwtingche rimahra.
Changchii meechu abarungriir ichummahva vokhehkho ataklina isiicher om inche araarchu amandangniisa ichii manghuwra.
Vajeer ihae Zenas re Apolo enuwchu ynchiikho envaehniimah ing barungriir iruwhpak ing vethaksa aera.
Vokhehkho inuwtanii mee aenche ikanii omah engaansuwh niimah khaenache, isa nongchu tunana enuw ing nanuchu manjiinii ae rasiing.
Kithoh onghak vakhae ingkho nangchu salaam ynvepeehnah ae, amana thacha tahna ening ymmansiih ae chukho salaam piaera. Ningsiih ajaar inche nenuw vakhaechu eenruwfhuwrasii.
Jesu Khrista khaena kaeshum sungna ong Pol ki ing unae Timothi thoh ing-
Kaningsiih nong katufhuw Philimon,
ynsarnuw Aphia amanche laarchang Arkkipa vokhehkho na-een sungna ruwrthiing nengkafhuw mee vakhae ningna chongthen i kavebaziih sahnah:
Apa Thangnang vokhehkho Jesu Khrista tanii tungsiihchu neningna om ynsuwhrasii.
Nenuw vakhaechu mandensachuw ingka apha om bakhaena ithamsah thoh ynruw ing Thangnang kaman-pahsahnah.
Nenuw ing Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ningna vokhehkho ynthiing mee ae taklina neningsiih vokhehkho nenthacha omchu kensiisahpa.
Chukhaenache nenthacha ing Khrista chu ynghuwniiseh khaena nong ynjarnii sehseh rasiing ta ingka kathamsahnah.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe naningsiih tanii ki ing rotharoh inempak kaphasahpa! Akhaechuve kaarang, nang najaarna ynthiing mee vakhae embarungriir rotharoh athisehnah.
Nang ing tuvanachii nong khaena ipirpak ing riirning ta ing konchu,
Khrista khaena kaeshum sungna ong lipah changden Pol ki ing ningsiih thoh ynruw ing,
Onesimas rutumna ampa yngkheh vaang kathamsahnahchii.
Atak i ajaenbe naningna ikaniimah mee vakonchu atiive kaning nakho ikanii mee yngkheh ynsuwhsa.
Atiive iruwpak ing ama i naningting kavebathennah.
Isa chong khaena kaeshum sungna ong kithoh nachangdenna onghak nungka rukuum itunaka takhang ningkho
nang ing narumahchu tuning tamah ing. Chukhaenache isajaeh ing itupeeh savaanta kamandensahnah.
Apha mongteh khaena naningtanii Onesimas itaen i atiive apha om bakhaena nangthoh nong tunii khaenava;
Atii atak i ynningna chembe suwhchu ynsuwhmahsa, Khrista rumingna athar vokheh ningsiihniipak mee yngkhehchu nang ki ynningna ynsuwhsa.
Chukhaenache nang ing kichu naarang yngkheh ing imanden sanana amakho kivaang ihebariim peehsara.
Isi vasahna laanglam naningna raardoh khangnakho, seer baarna yntuur omkhang nakho ki ing manseengsava kata;
hava chong i Pol katakrap ing kabaziihva; seerbaar yntuur omnave ki ing singvakata-nang ing ki isuursava nachii chuve riirmahtah manuw.
Haviva kaarang Aafhuw nong khaena yngkheh re yngkheh ymbomchu: Jesu Khrista rumingna karotha rohnii itupeehra ta ingka kathamsahnahchii.
Ama i nachongriir derna isajaeh ing isinii khaena vokhehkho kaveriir chungna nangkho asaknii vakhae ing itupeeh vanata ichii ing kamandensahnah.
Yngkheh chuve ki kavatungnii khaena ongnii ihesir peehsara; amanche nenuw ing kakhaena ynthampeeh tahnachuw ki thenglemva kata ichii ing kamandennah.
amanche kanong tufhuw ae Maak, Aristarkas, Demas vokhehkho Luk enuw aengkho ymmandensahnah ae.
Aafhuw Jesu Khrista tungsiih ajaar ing nenuw vakhae nenlaethachu ynruwfhuwrasii. Amen.
Ajaen chembe Thangnang ing apha vakhaena vokhehkho reentaang aajaeh ing fhuwven ae ningnache jaephar ae enjaarna ichong chakva,

changvakonchu ihungchipha inii nenchembe ama ing asapa jaarna ynningna chongsa. Ama ajaarnache Thangnang ing laaruw paam seemka, akuurchiim nache peeh aangkheng-laang aningna ynsirnii khaenache aateerpa.

Thangnang alaar isachu aningna chuwngna vokhehkho Thang-nang pingengche tana, achongsae ruwreng inche laaruw paam apuhsa. Laaruw mee isii vakhae kuhniichu atuchir aanuwnache, thangbaen paam nache aangkaangseh ruwreng Thang-nang achangbaen tachang nache ongsa.
Asapa chu vaarmee ae chungna iruungseh ruming Thangnang ing apeeh vaang, enuw ithi ing iruung-sehchu hunginsuwhsa.
Thangnang ing utaraenkho vaarmee ae achuw yngkheh ningna tamah,
“Nang kasapa vachii;
ataniine ki nangpa ynsuwhsing.”
Vokhehkho Thangnang ing vaarmee khaena riirmah,
“Ki ampa chuva kata,
vokhehkho atakchu kasapa vaata.”
Thangnang ing aren asapa laaruw paamna jenchiir vachii aphanache ariir,
“Thangnang vaarmee vakhae inche atakchu rumvaatae.”
Changvakonchu vaarmee khaena chembe Thangnang ing ariir,
“Thangnang ing avaarmee aechu siiraang amanguurpae,
amanche ameenae aechu mi ichuwh amanguurpae.”
Asapa khaena chembe Thangnang ing ariir,
“O Thangnang, naaruwng paamchu ichuwr naemah ing chitha paarvaata!
Namee ae taklinache ichum vajeer ing puhvanata.
Nang ing ichumchu naadiknah
amanche ynraarchu nabatirnah.
Ama khaenache Thangnang inche nangchu eeteerva vokhehkho ynjasuwhpak ing rotharohchu yngkaanghak ing naarang ae chungna naning nache ympiva.”
Ama ingkho ariir,
“Aafhuw, nang ing aburna basenka laaruw paam naseemva,
amanche nakiksah ing thangbaen naseemva.
Enuw chuve maangvaatae, nang chuve omjaeh vaanta;
enuw vakhae chuve peendiir vaang chiirchir vaatae.
Nang ing enuwchu rungopfhuw vaangkhe thepva natae,
vokhehkho peendiir vaang ynteh vaatae.
Changvakonchu nang chuve apha om bakhae ynreeh mahchii,
vokhehkho naringkumchu utaraenkho chenmah.”
Thangnang ing utaraenkho achuw yngkheh vaarmee ningna tamah,
“Katachangne ongla, nang ynjeehnii mee aechu
nakhi derna kasiih mahtaang.”
Chunuwcha vaarmee aechu ynchiipae? Enuw chuve Thangnang rukuumtu laetha chupae vokhehkho manlaenpeeh phavachii aechu rukuum tupeehnii khaena Thangnang ing ajenchiir chupae.
Chukhaenache inuw ing ynsii ichum changchiichu athiseh ing ringriijaeh vaanchiiva, changmah nave inuwchu ikivaata.
Afhuw fhuwven ae ningna vaarmee ae ing ichong aechu ichumva ichii yndangna, amanche achuw yngkheh ing amachu ajiimah changmahka amanjiimah inche iphapham ponti aphapae.

Changchii manlaenpeeh ting barungriir pimah manuwcha, ynsaangkhe ponti taniichu ynjuwhchehva tamuwkhang? Aafhuw ataksah ing havana manlaenpeeh i maen ing amanthangva, amachu aasii mee aenche ichumva ta aeka ynning nache emanreeppa.
Amathoh ynruw ing Thangnang ing eningnache laetho aajaeh vokhehkho ingiknii aajaeh atu ajaar ing saarkhii tuka amanche amanden inuwzii inche ynthiing laetha kikthuur vakhaechu asempa.
Inuw ing ynriir ithar laaruw paam jungtheng vachiichu ipuhnii khaena Thangnang ing vaarmee aechu mansirmah.
Ama changdenna ynthiing thiimziih denkhehna ariirsa,
“O Thangnang, nang ing namanden mee havi ynchiiva?
Changmahka nang ing rukuum natu mee jaeh vachiiva?
Nang ing apha mongteh khaena vaarmee derna namansiing hakpa;
amanche atakchu alaar isa re ynjasuwh phurchii namangkhumpa,
vokhehkho peeh aangkhenglaang taklinache aapuh nabasuwpa.”

Amana ariir chuve Thangnang ing mee seemka peeh aangkhenglaang taklina aapuh abasuw; havi inge aangkhenglaang akuwmchirsa. Changvakonchu ataraenbe peeh aangkhenglaang taklina aapuh mee chuve mumahmuw.

Changvakonchu inuw ing ymmu chuve Jesu tahna, atakchu amongteh khaena vaarmee ae derna mansiing hakka amanche Thangnang tungsiih jaarna laaruw mee changden nache ithii apha. Atiive alaar isa vokhehkho ynjasuwh phurchii akhumchu inuw ing ymmusa, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ijachaam ing ithii khaena chenva.

Havi inge chaana amachuve Thangnang ing seemka vokhehkho asiihjaeh peeh aangkheng inche, Jesu ing ijachaam apha ajaarnache atak mapung phanaka, ama alaar isachu iphapohnii khaenache siti sanae aajaehchu ahenruwnii khaena chenva.

Ama ing mee aechu isiicher chaap tanii amanthiingpa, amanche atak vokhehkho ynthiing apha ae thohche empa aanghakjaehsa. Amatahna chemba Jesu ing enuwchu kauw kanaepae ichii ningjaknii omah ing athachu.
Ama ing Thangnang ningna ariir,
“Natu nari vakhae chaap unae ae ningna tongva kata;
enuw meekong nache nangchu mampah vakachii.”
Ama ing ariir, “Ki kathachachu Thangnang ningna siiva kata.” Ama ing ariir reeh, “Thangnang ing ympeeh naepang ae thohche havane ongnung.”

Naepang aechu shabachii re sii tanii vakhaepae khaka, Jesu atakrap enuw thoh aanghakna vokhehkho laaruw mee barungriir kho areen haksae. Havana areen inge atak ithii ajaar inche ithii taklina ruwreng adeen Umlaechu mamaang naka,
ithii enchii khaena enring kumpung suwh ing ipaar aechu enruw manjaang vaata.
Havane ynthiingkiirna amachuve Aafhuw ing vaarmee aechu abommahva, changvakonchu Aafhuw ing Abraham tuti bahsuwm aechu abomva.

Ama khaenache Aafhuw ing mee ae isii chaapchu ikuhpeehnii inche, ama ing Thangnang nongtu tahna thachafhuw vokhehkho ningchuwh ing isip Aanchung Jaethiim aansuwhnii khaenache, atak i auw anae ae thohche aangkhengna aaghakjaeh vachii ting buksa.
Atii chembe isii ing abatheem aechu bomcheh vaata, akhaechuve atakrap isii ing batheemka ijachaam apha vasahva.
Chukhaenache thangbaen tungnii khaena Thangnang ing yngeen ynthiing kauw kanae ae, kenuw ing kenriir Chongthang re Aanchung Jaethiim Jesu Khrista havi khaene ikharpeehruw.
Mosi ing thachafhuw om yngkheh ing Thangnang eensungna rukuum atuvaang, ama ingkho Aanchung Jaethiim ing pham athin ampa ningnakho thachafhuw ing omba.
Changvakonchu asapa Jesu Khrista chuve Mosi chungna athiseh ing alaar isasehva, havi vaange een athi ing een aatu mee ing ympah aphava.
Een vakhae mee yngkheh ing atuva, changvakonchu peeh vakhae aatu chuve Thangnang vatah.
Mosi chuve Thangnang eensungna meenae atu thachafhuw yngkhehva, amanche Thangnang ing vaknuwting riirvachii vakhae khaena ichongva.

Changvakonchu Khrista chuve Thangnang eensung taklina amansir asapa thachafhuw yngkhehva. Inuw ing thona isa vokhehkho ningmandenchu achiniipha ing icheep ing bachuwther manuwve, inuw ama a-eenchu vamuw.
Chutahnache ynthiing laetha ing ariir chuve,
atanii nenuw ing Thangnang iruurchu siitanuwve,
paamfhuwna chaang aennii aerae arumah ae vaangkhe,
nenbarungriir manpir mahruw.
Amanche nenfhuwven ae inche kichu chaang yngenpae,
vokhehkho enuw ing kum somanrii sungna kanongtu emupae.
Chukhaenache ki ing ama suwnthar taklinache inempak nungaemah ingka kariir,
“Enuw apha om bakhaena embarungriir aasirting sina,
amanche enuw ing kalamchu manghuw mahsae.
Chukhaenache kabarung isii ing chongreep katu,
enuw ing utaraenkho kaja basumnii nache varuwhmahnii ae.”
Kauw kanae ae, ynriimruw, chang-mahnave achuw yngkheh ningna thacha omahnii isamah barungriir omnaka iring Thangnang tanii yngheer arusa.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh nenuwchu isii mare inche ymmanpirniimah khaenache, atarae inii aomraenne anasiirna yngkheh yngkheh ynthohsaruw.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe inuw ing aburna basenka icheep ing ymbarungriir ngamniichu achiniipha ing bachuwther manuwve, inuw Khrista thohche sarup iphahak chuvamuw.
Haviva ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirchu,
“Atanii nenuw ing Aafhuw iruurchu siitanuwve,
nenfhuw fhuwven aeng ataklina enrumah vaangkhe nenbarungriir manpirmahruw.”
Achuw aepae Thangnang iruurchu siiaeka arumah aechu? Mosi ing Ijeep tanii ahenruw ae khamah paekhang?
Achuw ae taklinache Thangnang ing kum somanrii sungna abarungriir inungaemah jaehchu? Paamfhuwna isii rang aeka ithii ae taklina khenmah vakhang?
Vokhehkho achongriir amanjiimah ae ningna aja basumnii nache ruwhmahnii ae tamah naka achuw ningna chongreep atuva?
Chukhaenache inuw ing ymmusa, amachuve enuw enthacha omah inche varuwhcheh mahsae.
Chukhaenache Thangnang jaba-sumnii nache ivaruwh phanii chongreep omkhang nare, nenuw achuw yngkheh ivaruwh phamah vachii ynvaekho om arusa tanuwna ynriimruw.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe enuw ing entong vaang ynning nakho isa chongchu yntongpeehpae; changvakonchu ensii chongchu kaaniimah ae, akhaechuve aasii aenche ithacha thoh ynruw ing iraang mahsae.

Thacha om inuw chuve jabasumnii nache ivaruwh ymphasa. Havi Thangnang ing ariir khajaeh vatah, kabarung asiklae chongreep katu, nong vakhae laaruw paam aan-seemna basenka chichirkhang nare, enuw ing kaja basumnii nache ivaruwh phamahnii ae.
Ama ing denkhehna inii nisarii khaena ariirsa, “Thangnang ing anong aangkheng manchichirka inii nisarii inii nache aja abasumpa.”
Hava nenkho vokheh chongna, “Enuw ing kaja basumnii nache ivaruwh phamahnii ae.”
Chukhaenache mee topoh chuve ivaruwh phavachii omnae, changvakonchu amaaensana asii ae chumahpae akahechuve enuw chongriir manjiimahsae,

Thangnang ing apha yngkheh amanaesa, ama aphachu atanii iva. Isivasah kum aajaehna Devit ajaarna chongka ynthiing thiimziihna ynthinna: “Atanii nenuw ing Thangnang aaruurchu siitanuwve nenbarungriir manpir mahruw.”
Joshua ing enuwchu Thangnang ing chongreep atu jabasumniichu piae nave, Thangnang ing athar vokheh inii khaenache chongmah vachiiva.
Amatah nache Thangnang mee ae khaena jabasumnii iniichu omna.
Thangnang jabasumnii nache ivaruwh vasah mee inche, Thangnang ing anong tanii aja abasum vaangkhe amakho anong tanii aja abasumpa.
Chukhaenache inuw ing yncheh vakhae jabasumniichu ymphanii ing tutaruw, amana chembe achuw yngkheh tanga ingkho chongriir ynjiimah ae buwtinnii tingche bukmah manuw.

Thangnang chongsae chuve iring vokhehkho ruwreng ipir amanche aha ynnii isuwm chemfhuw athi ing yngee, thavae re laetha aantuwnii vokhehkho aanjomnii riir iphaang asincheh vokhehkho ymmanden chaap amanghuwcheh chuva.
Thangnang ningna ithuurfhuw peeh yntanga omah, changvakonchu peeh aangkheng amik barengna asaena amanche ynrangchirna.
Thangnang sapa Jesu, thangbaen vakhae aphachir iruungpak Aanchung Jaethiim yngkhaena omna tasa manuwka aningna ynthacha omchu icheep ing bachuwther taruw.
Inuw ynsuurnii amanghuwmah aan-chung jaethiim yndeen changchii mahva, changvakonchu inuw vaang aangkhengna batheem aantuwhfhuw, changkhang nare isii omahdeh jaethiim yngkhaena omna.
Chukhaenache inuw thona om ing Thangnang iruwngpham ongnii ting huungsataruw amanche aningsiih phanii khaena ongtaruw vokhehkho tungsiihchu phamanuwka ynvaehnii nache ibomsa vaata.
Aanchung Jaethiim chaap vakhae amee tanii iteerka, enuw changdenna Thangnang ningna chaatha pinii vokhehkho isii khaena ipifhuw pinii khaenache pham athinva.
Ataksahkho asuurnii om khaena amanghuwmah ae vokhehkho araar mee ae thohche iduwrjaeh ing ikhaang chehva chiiva.
Amanche ataksahkho isuur khaena mee ae isii khaenapang kikthuur pivachii mahva, changvakonchu ataksah isii khaena khom vachiiva.
Achuw tanga ingkho ynjasuwh phamchu ataksah ing iraangmah, changvakonchu Aaron ningna Thangnang ing a-een vaangkhe amakho a-eenva.
Amavaange Khrista ingkho aanchung jaethiim ynsuwhnii khaena ataksah ympahmah, changvakonchu aningna ampa Thang-nang ing ariir,
“Nang i kasapa chuvachii;
atanii iniine nangchu kabaringvachii.”
Thangnang ing reentaang denkheh nakho ariirsa,
“Nang chuve Melkijedek inuwzii ing ichen naemah jaethiim ynsuwh sachii.”
Atakchu Thangnang sapa vakhangnare ijachaam akhaang inche chongriir ynjiinii atamsahpa.
Jesu ing ynthiingjaeh ynsuwhka achongriir amanjii vakhae khaenache ichen naemah manlaenpeeh phanii ynsuwhsa,
amanche Thangnang ing atakchu Melkijedek vaang aanchung jaethiim ruming apeehpa.
Kenuw ing havi khaena riirva kenchii inempak omna, changvakonchu nenuw ing nenrisiimah khaenache neningna iriirpeehnii ruwna.

Apha inuwzii ing nenuw chuve aanchuwmee hunginsuwhva nenchii inche, achuw yngkheh ing nenuwchu Thangnang chongjeer amaensana abasennii athurfhuwchu athar vokheh imanchuw vachii ing omna; nenuw ing ynchae peeh savanenchii changdenna shangkhom inpehva nenchii ing omnachuw.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe shangkhom ainjaeh mee vakhae ing ichum ynraar manghuw chehmah; akhaechuve ama naepang pehna.
Changvakonchu ynchae peeh chuve upa ae khaenava, enuw ing isamah isa engkhaechehsa.
Chukhaenache Khrista khaena chongburchu bathen manuwka, inuw ing areer suwhnii yntongting ma taartaruw, ithii nong chaap tanii barungriir ihuungnii, Thangnang yndennii,
baptais itu khaena ynchuwpeeh, rusae taklina kik ynthoh, ithii ihangring vokhehkho ichen naemah vajeer khaena athar abur mangiirsamah manuw.
Thangnang ing irupeeh nave havi inuw ing tusataruw.
Athar ynriirpeeh vasah, thangbaen tanii kikthuur aphavasah, ynthiing laetha ymphahak vasah,
Thangnang isa chongsae vokhehkho hungvivachii suwnthar ruwreng emanghuw vasah mee aeng isii ting embukreeh tahna,

enuwchu athar vokheh barungriir ihuungnii khaena yntharreehnii ruthaangthaang mahnii, yngkhaena ynchii imbe enuw ing Thangnang sapachu athar vokheh khros taklina theh aeka, Jesu chu yndang ing ningjak apeehpae.
Chungtanii khuw vanuh vanuh isuwrchu ain ae vokhehkho ruwbaar atuae khaena chimuw bajaang ynla ruwruwchu Thangnang tanii borva.
Changvakonchu iring re ichuwr hangmuwng nave, ama ruwruwchu ikanii omahsa, vokhehkho siraap phavachii ynneengsa, achiniideh chuve mi sungna ikaangchu vatah.
Changvakonchu kauw kanae ae, kenuw ing neningna jinge ichii ing chongkhang nungle, manlaenpeehchu phatanuwve nengkhaena isasehchu omchirna.
Thangnang chuve ichummah changchii mahva. Ama ing nenongtu vokhehkho akhaena nenuw ing ningsiih mandang chuwka ynthiing ae ningna nenbomchu bahirmahnii.
Nenuw amee siir ing achiniipha ing ningmandenchu areer suwhnii ing ikhaangcheh nache nenbarungriir iruwhchu nemandang kenuw ing kengadiksahnah.
Kenuw ing nenuwchu thaachah tanuwka tamah ung, changvakonchu thacha aeka ikhaang encheh ajaarna Thangnang ing chongreep atu empha enuw vaang tatanuwka kenchiiva.
Thangnang ing Abraham ningna chongreep aturae saarkhiina iparfhuw areen ruming iruwng omah khaena ataksah ruming parka saarkhii atu.
Ki ing chongreep katunah, naningna bor pivakachii amanche natuti bahsuwm manemva kata.
Jinge ichii ing Abraham inche hengkhaangka Thangnang chongreep aphapa.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe mee aeng enchungna iruungseh rumingchu par aeka saarkhii atunah ae, amanche acheepnii khaenache saarkhii entu inche enganahnii chaapna amanchiniinah ae.
Chukhaenache Thangnang abarungriir ynreeh arumahchu chongreep aphavasah ae ningna athiseh ing mandangning achii khaena asaarkhii inche amancheeppa.

Havanene ynreeh arumah vokhehkho Thangnang ningna ynchaenii omah ynniimeh i omna. Chutahnache ihungruwhnii ymphanii khaena itaenmuw inuw ing ymmaana heom ningmandenchu icheep ing ymbachuwnii khaena ipirpak thona isa ymphanii khaenava.
Inuw ing ymphasah ningmanden havi ynlaetha karnii ruwkuwng khawmnii thoh aanghakva, havirap inge atatak ing icheepchak vokhehkho thangbaen rumniieen ynsuwh sungtingche ivaruwh vamuw.
Jesu ing inuw vakhae khaena asung tingche maen ing varuwhka vokhehkho Melkijedek pham inuwzii ing ichuwr naemah ing aanchung jaethiim visa.
Salem iruwng vokhehkho aanchungseh Thangnang jaethiim Melkijedek inche Abraham ing iruwng aechu chehka ihunganrichu yntuwhfhuwka bor apeeh.
Abraham ing aphasah sarup suum sungna sarup yngkheh apeeh, amaensana arutho ymbaritahna ichum ynthiing iruwng achiiniiva vokhehkho Salem iruwng ichiichuve, “Idae iruwng” va.
Ampa amnuw ahungsuwhnii athamin ichah, ama ahungsuwhnii inii vokhehkho apaar ichiim omah, changvakonchu Aafhuw Thangnang sapa vaang ynsuwhka Melkijedek inge parden omrudeh ing jaethiim ynsuwhka om.

Melkijedek ichii mee i aajaemeh iruungva kharruw, Aafhuw Thangnang chongreep derna Isrel sungkhur sungna sapa mamuwr Abraham ing laartanii ahengkhuum peehchae vakhaena sarup suumna sarup yngkheh Melkijedek ningna apeehpa.
Jaethiim pham ivi Levi sapa aenche chongreep inuwzii ing mee aetanii peehchae vokhehkho Isrel aetanii suumna yngkhehchu iphanii chonghak aphapae.
Changvakonchu Melkijedek chuve Isrel ae sungkhur tanii mahkhang nare Abraham ing suumna yngkhehchu apeeh. Chukhaenache Melkijedek ing Abraham chu bor apeehva.
Iruungseh ing isiingchu bor apeehne achuw yngkheh ing afhuwnii dennii iriirnii omah.
Amanche thikva enchii mee aenche sarup suumna sarup yngkheh emphanah, changvakonchu ringna ichii asaarkhii om ama inche aphasa.
Jinge iriir arusa, sarup suumna sarup yngkheh apha Levi ataksahrap ingkho Abraham ajaarna sarup suumna sarup yngkheh apeehva.
Melkijedek ing Abraham aantuwhfhuwrae Levi ichuve ampa diirriimna ynthinpehva.

Levi sungkhur tanii ajaarna vokhehkho enuw enchonghak inche areer isuwh vanave, yngkhaenache Thangnang ing Aaron pham inuwzii ingmahka, Melkijedek pham inuwzii ing Khrista chu jaethiim ing ajebathenva?
Akhaechuve jaethiimchu yntehnave, vajeer chonghak chukho yntehmah rumahsa.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe reentaang sungkhur mee yngkheh tanii khaena chong havi ariirva. Reentaang sungkhur achuw mee yngkheh ingkho thiimkung nache nong tumah.
Akhaechuve nuwting Juda sungkhur tanii inuw Aafhuw Khrista ihungsuwhva ichii seengkiirna; Jaethiim khaena Mosi ing sungkhur khaena chongmahdeh.
Melkijedek thoh aanghak reentaang jaethiim yngkheh hungsuwh nave, ama inche athiseh ing seengsehna.
Aafhuw ichuve laaruw paam hakchaang ingmahva, changvakonchu ichen naemah iringnii ruwreng inuwzii ing jaethiim iviva.
Havane saarkhii apeehsa, “Nang chuve Melkijedek vaangkhe ichiim omah jaethiim chuvachii.”
Ajaennii chonghakchu suurka engkaniimah khaenache akakva.
Vajeer chonghak ing yntanga mapung mampha chehmah; chukhaenache athiseh ing isaseh ningmandenchu ynjenreen peehva, ama ajaarnache inuw ing Thangnang eeneengva.
Havi chongreep turu ing jaethiim manvimah.
Enuw chuve chongreep ynvaeru ing jaethiim ivipae. Changvakonchu Thangnang ing Aafhuw ningnache taka,
“Aafhuw ing chongreep atupa vokhehkho abarungriir manreeh mahdeh;
Nang chuve Melkijedek inuwzii ing ichiim omah jaethiim chuvachii.”
Jinge ichii ing Jesu chuve chongreep thoh ynruw ing jaethiim vokhehkho athiseh ing isa chongiir ynsuwhsa.
Amana jaethiim inempak omnae, akhaechuve henuumva enchiichu ithii ing akhaampa.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw chuve ichiim omah ing anuumjaeh khaena yntehmah vachii jaethiim phamchu visa.
Chukhae-nache Aafhuw ajaarna Thangnang avaneeng mee aechu Aafhuw ing ikarpeeh achehsa, Aafhuw chuve enuw engkhaena ithampeehnii khaena iringjaeh chuva.
Hangchii Aanchung Jaethiim ichuve inuw yngkhaena matik ichava, amachuve ynthiing, isamahna thang isimah, ynchohmahdeh, isiicher ae tanii yngkhaevasah vokhehkho thangbaen chungna yngkaangsehva.

Jaethiim aenche amaensana enuw entaksah isii khaena, aanuwnache mee ae khaena anasiirna chaatha empeehchu Aafhuw khaena chembe ikanii omahsa. Aafhuw ing vokhehpang ataksahchu aangkheng khaena chaatha ing ympisa.
Vajeer chonghak ing isuur mee aechu aanchung jaethiim pham athinpae, changvakonchu vajeer chonghak aanuwna itheng chongsae chongreep inche asapa chu ichiim omah mapungpha ing pham athinpa.
Atarae kenuw ing kenriir athurfhuw chuve haviva: Thang-baenna ynjasuwh iruwngpham ongnii tachangna ong Aanchung Jaethiim yndeensa,
laaruw mee ing atumah, Aafhuw ing amangiir ynthiing vokhehkho atatak rumniithaam nongpuhva.
Jaethiim vakhae kikthuur vokhehkho chaatha ipinii khaenache pham athinpae; ama khaenache jaethiim havi khaenakho ipeehfhuw ombachiiting buksa.
Aafhuw ing laaruw paamna ong vanave ama ing jaethiim vivachii mahva, akhaechuve vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing kikthuur chaap pivachii jaethiim omnae.

Enuw ae ichuve thangbaenna om peeh masak vokhehkho aruthaksii amachu rukuum atusah paetah; Mosi ing rumniithaam atuphana Thangnang ing aningna ariirpeeh khavaangkhe ichiivatah; Aafhuw ing aningna ariirchuve, “Naningna bungna kamansiisii vaangkhe peeh aangkhenglaang itunii khaena enla achii.”
Changvakonchu atiichembe Jesu ing isaseh nongtuniichu aphapa, amakhaenache isaseh chongreep inuwzii inche, isaseh chongiir nache Jesu ing eenuwmpeehchu ynsuwhsa.
Amaensa chongiir inche raarmah nave, avomaniinii khaena ynjongmah vachiiva.
Thangnang ing enraarchu tuwhka ariir,
“Enruw, aaniichu thengna taka Aafhuw ing ariirnah,
apha ichiinache Isrel eengkuw re Juda ae eengkuw thoh ynruw ing itharpeh chongiir seemva kata;
Ki ing Ijeep lipah tanii engkik bachuw ingka kehenruw ae inii nakhe empa emfhuw thoh ynruw ing kaseem chongiir vaangkhe tamahnii;
akhaechuve enuw ing kachongriir nache ongjaeh mahsae,
amatah nache ki ing enuwchu mandenmah aeng.”
Haviva Isrel eengkuw ae thoh chongiir seemva kachiichu,
Aafhuw ing taka, ki ing kavajeer chonghak vakhaechu embarungriir sungna thinva kata amanche embarungriir sungnakho baziih peehva katae;
ki enuw Thangnang ynsuwhva kata,
amanche enuw ing kamee ynsuwh vaatae.
Achuw tanga ingkho aveenchaangchu manchuw mahnii vokhehkho auwnae ningna tamahnii, “Aafhuw manghuwra,”
akhaechuve isiing iruung mee aangkheng ing imanghuw vaata,
Ki ing enchumniimah nache kaning manchuwhva katae,
vokhehkho entu enri isiicher amanche ynraar nong entu vakhae athar vokheh ynsiipeehmah aening.
Itharpeh chongiir khaena ariir-chuve, Thangnang ing amaensachu baruw amanguurpa. Atii hungseehka vokhehkho jungbaruw inche maang-vachii junganeengsa.
Amaensa chongiir nache ynthiing nongtufhuw re laaruw paam khaena ynthiing nongtufhuw om.
Havana rumniithaam asungnache ka asae ynniimeh om. Amaensana jaemi barengnii vokhehkho ynthiing tar asiihniichu ombaata; havichu ynthiing apham enchii.
Avomaniinii laedenpeen tuknungchu ynthiingna ynthiingseh enchii.

Amanache ningsiih sana barim ynthunii vokhehkho ataklina sana ing ynrom chongiir upu om, upu sungnache isahfhuw manna ithinnii sana bukam, adeen isuwm Aaron rumor vokhehkho chongiir ynziih rungpeeh om.

Ama taklinache enlaar isa cherubim embatha ynniimeh inche sana upuchu embaruw amachu ningchuwh ongnii apham enchii. Havana peeh vakhae khaene atarae kenuw ing adiing aneh phanii ing ichong chehmah ung.
Atii hava vakhae i achichirna jaethiim inche apha vakhaena amaensa rumniithaam sungnache varuwhka nong atu.
Changvakonchu avomaniinii ka sungting chembe jaethiim anumpang ing kumna vokhehpang ivaruwhchak vatah. Changvakonchu ataksah khaena vokhehkho mee aeng enraar khaena ipifhuw sii ynvaeru ing varuwhmah.
Laetha ynthiing ing havi ymmansiisa, amaensa rumniithaam amachu laedenpeen yndaarka aomlaenche, ynthiingna ynthiingseh apham tingche varuwhnii lam ymmong mahri.
Rumniithaam havi inge ataraennii khaena buwtinnii ynsuwhna. Havi inge buwtinnii om chuve kikthuur ipeeh vokhehkho chaatha ipeeh ichii inge arum mee ae ruwthuwh mapung mampha chehmah.
Enuw ing tuva enchii chuve isahnii innii vokhehkho entaksah ynchaamnii khaena reentaang aajaeh nong entunii vatah. Hava vakhae i yntehnii aphachu aphamahri raentaang tuva enchii chuva.
Changvakonchu kik ing ynseem-mah iruungseh vokhehkho mapung aphaseh rumniithaam thoh ynruw ing isa thengnii khaena Khrista ing Aanchung Jaethiim ing juwngsa.
Keer vokhehkho siirti sii thoh ingmahka, Aafhuw sii thohrap inche aangkheng khaena vokhehpang ynthiingseh apham nache varuwhka ichen naemah ikarpeeh ymphapa.
Siirchar re keer sii vokhehkho siirti ynla apuur ing ithik naka hakchaang ynthiingnii khaena manthiing nave,

ichen naemah laetha ajaarnache Thangnang ningna buw reenrudeh ing ataksahrap chaatha ing ympideh Khrista sii inche iring Thangnang rukuum itunii khaena, ithii nong tanii ichum ynraar ynghuwnii ruwthuwhchu ajaehmeh athi ing imanthiingpeeh vaate.

Havi khaene amaensa chongiir derna ong isiicher tanii ikarpeehnii khaena yngkheh ing ithii khaenache a-een vasah mee aeng iphapham isuwh ichen naemah chongreepchu iphanii khaenache, Aafhuw chuve ithar chongiirna eenuwmpeeh chuva.
Ithiinii omnii nache, aseem mee inche ithiipham suwhna.
Ithii asuwhtah nache ithiiniichu anehva, aseem meechu aring raentaang utaraenkho ruwreng omah.
Chukhae-nache amaensa chongiir nache sii ynvaeru ing nongruw ynsen rumah.

Vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing Mosi ing chonghak vakhae mee ae ningna ajeerraenche ama ing sii vokhehkho siir sii re keer siichu chiithoh, isen samuwr thoh, hisop abahchu chika thiimbuwr re mee vakhae taklinache ithikka ariir,
“Haviva sii ing chongiirchu hakka ynjiinii khaena chonghak ympichu.”
Aanuwnache aanghakjaeh ing rumniithaam re nongruw tunii peehchae chaapchu sii inche aathikpa.
Vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing peehchae vakhaechu sii inche amanthiing chirpa, sii ynta chumah naka isii kuhnii yntanga omah.
Thangbaenna om peeh aandangnii ynsuwh aechu hava ae inge manthiing vachii ing buksa, changvakonchu thangbaenna om peeh chuve hava vakhae itanii isaseh chaatha ipifhuw ruwhna.
Ichum aanru kik ing ynseem ynthiing apham nache Khrista ing varuwhmah, ama ing thangbaen nache varuwhka inuw ynchangden nache atarae Thangnang maana yndangna.
Aanchung Jaethiim aenche ynthiingseh apham nache akumsiir sii thoh ynruw ing ivaruwh ae. Changvakonchu Khrista chuve apha vakhaena ympisahnii khaena varuwhmah,

amachu vanave Aafhuw ing laaruwpaam abaselimna ijachaam khaangva chiiva. Changvakonchu atiive suwnthar ahungchiim phane Aafhuw ing ataksah rapchu chaatha ing ympisah ajaarna isiichu irennii khaena vokhehpang yndangsa.
Laaruw mee vakhae vokhehpang thikva taruw, changvakonchu aanuwnache vajeer ombaata.

Havi vaange Khrista ingkho mee aanem ing isii enrangchu iripeehnii khaena vokhehpang ataksah rapchu ipifhuw ing ympidehsa. Ama ing isiicher khaena mahka, Aafhuw chu ahahsah mee aechu ikarpeehnii khaena avomaniinii yndangvaata.

Vajeer chonghak chuve hungsuwh vachii isa peeh aruvaam vatah, peeh aruthaksii tatak chumah vakhaka, enuw ing akumsiir aanghakjaeh ing chaatha entu inche aaneeng mee aechu utaraenkho mapung mampha chehmah.
Thangnang arum mee ae isiicher taniichu manthiingrem naka, athar vokheh kenraar omahsa ichii manden ae nave chaatha ipichu manchen vachiipae.
Changvakonchu chaatha empisah vakhae inche akumsiir isiicher khaena engaansiiniinah.
Siirchar le keer sii ing isii utaraenkho iri supcheh chehmah.
Amachu khaenache Aafhuw ing laaruw paamna jungthengka ariir,
“Aafhuw nang ing chaatha ipeeh re ipeehfhuw ipeehchu idikmahchii,
changvakonchu nang ing kakhaena kahakchaang ynsirpeeh pachii.
Thiimkung na apum ing mi nache ynthuka ipeeh vokhehkho isii khaena chaatha ipeeh taklina penmahchii.
Amana ki ing kariir, enruw, thiimbuwr nakhe kakhaena ynziihna, Thangnang,
namanden itunii khaenache ki ijuwngping.”

Chaatha ipeeh vokhehkho ipeehfhuw ipeeh, apum ing mi ing ynthuka ipeeh, amanche isii khaena chaatha ipeeh hava vakhae i idikmahchii, vokhehkho penmahchii ichii nariirpa, hava vakhae ichuve vajeer chonghak inuwzii ing ympivatah.
Amana Aafhuw ing ariir, “Aafhuw nang ing namandenchu itunii khaena ki ijuwngping.” Ama ing avomaniiniichu iseemnii khaena amaensachu aripa.
Ymmanden inche inuwchu Jesu Khrista hakchaang ing aangkheng khaena ympideh ajaar nache manthiing samuw.
Jaethiim aenche anasiir isii arichehmah chaatha piaeka nong entu.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw inchembe ichiim omah ing isii kuhnii khaena vokhehpang chaatha ing ympika Thangnang kik tachang nache ongsa,
apha amana ing ataraenphane ajeehnii mee aechu akhibakhong derna asiihmahri raentaangche ahahjaehva.
Aafhuw ing ataksah vokhehpang chaatha ing apeeh inche ynthiing aphavasah mee aechu ichen naemah ing mapung amamphapa.
Ynthiing laetha ingkho ynningna saarkhii apisa. Amaensana ariir,
“Ama inii aanuwtingche ki ing enuw thohche seemva kachii chongiirchu haviva taka Aafhuw ing ariir:
Kavajeer chonghakchu embarungriir sungna thinva kata vokhehkho embarungriir sungnache baziih vakata.”
Aafhuw ing havi aanuwna ariir, “Ki ing enuw isiicher amanche entu enri enraar nong vakhaechu athar vokheh ynsiipeehmah aening.”
Atii hava vakhae i ikuhpeeh om khaenache, isiicher iripeehnii khaena ipeehfhuw omah.
Chukhaenache kauw kanae ae, Jesu sii ajaarna ynthiingseh nache thona isa ing ivaruwh ymphapa.
Laedenpeen ichii Aafhuw hakchaang ajaarna ithar lam, iringnii lam eemongpeehpa,
Thangnang een nache Aanchung Jaethiim yndeenpa.
Chukhaenache inuw ing barungriir iseeng vokhehkho thacha thohche, isamah ruwthuwh tanii ynthiing manuwka vokhehkho chii inche iseengjaeh ing ynchaam manuwka Thangnang ineengsa taruw.
Inuw ing ningmandenchu ynlaapmahdeh ing ynriirchu icheehpther ing bachuw sataruw, akhaechuve chongreep atu meechu thachafhuw remba.
Yngkheh ing yngkhehchu ningsiih omnii vokhehkho isa nong tunii khaenache kharsataruw.
Mee topoh aeng entu nunu vaang, inuw ing yntuwhpoh chakmuwchu bathen samah manuw, changvakonchu yngkheh re yngkheh ynthohsa taruw, nenuw ing Aafhuw aanii junganeengchu nemusa.
Inuw ing ichumchu ymmanghuw inuwnache ymmanghuw broh ing isii rangmanuwve isii khaena chaatha ipeeh tunii omah.
Changvakonchu vajeernii khaena vokhehkho Thangnang arumah aechu mamaangchir vachii ipirpak mi ichuwh omchu ihahchu vatah.
Mosi vajeer chonghak arimah meechu mee ynnii mee ynthum saarkhiina ningchuwh omru ing ithii aphapae.

Thangnang sapa akhi ing achanii, atakchu amanthiingpeeh chongiir siichu ynthiingmah peehva ichii ing amanden vokhehkho tungsiih laetha ningjak apeeh meechu aajaehmeh athi ing vajeer itu phavachiiva ichii ing nemandenva?
Inuw ing ymmanghuwsa, “Huw rivachiichu kiping, ki ing ipipham isuwh pivakata taka Aafhuw ing ariir.” Amanche athar vokheh Aafhuw ing amee aechu vajeer tuvaata.
Iring Thangnang kikna ibuwchu ichiisuwh pakva.
Nenuwchu ymmanreng aanuwna nenuw ing ijachaam yndaar thoh ipirpak ing yntuwhfhuw chuwka nengkhang mamaennii inii chaapkha ynsiiruw.
Apha vokhehna chembe irakuh aeka vokhehkho ijachaam ing nenuwchu kuurva ymbasuw ae, amanche apha vokheh nache ijachaam apha ae thohche sarup nenphahak ynsuwhchuw.

Nenuw ing kaeshum sungna ong ae thohche ijachaam nenbadaarhakpa, amanche nengkhaena isaseh vokhehkho chiimva chiimah peeh thangbaen nache omna ichii manghuw chuwka, nenpeeh ynsiih aechu rotharoh ing nenru.
Chukhaenache iruungpak nongmen phava nenchii khaena nenbarung ngamniichu renmahruw.
Thangnang ing amandenchu nenuw ing tutanuwka chongreepchu nenphanii inche ikhaang pirva nenchiiting bukna.
Ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirsa,
“Apha topoh ompheh naka,
jungtheng vachii Aafhuw inche jungtheng vaata;
ama jungthirmahnii.”
Ichum ynthiing aenche thacha jaarna ringvaatae,
changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing aanuw ynrinave,
ataklinache ki penmahning.
Changvakonchu inuw chuve enganuw ynriaeka ymmoh aevaang tamahmuw, ama changdenna thacha muwka ikarpeeh ymphapa.
Thacha ichii ichuve ningmanden peeh nache ireepva, amanche ymmumah peeh khaenache barungriir ipeeh chuva.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe thacha inche tunanii upa aenche entaksah khaena isa saarkhii em-phapa.
Thangnang chongsae inche laaruw paam aseempa, amatah nache ymmucheh peehchu ymmucheh peeh tanii ing ynseem mahva ichiichu thacha ajaarna ymmanghuwsa.

Thacha inche Abel ing Ken chungna isaseh ing Thangnang ningna chaatha apeeh; ama ajaarnache Thangnang ing akikthuur taklinache saarkhii pika ichum ynthiingva ichii ama ing saarkhii aphapa, amanche athacha ajaar inche ama ing thikkhang nare atanii phane chongna.

Thacha inche Inok ing ithii amumahnii ing atakchu ajeripa, amanche Thangnang ing atakchu ajeri khaena yntuwhmahsa; yngkhaena ynchii imbe atakchu ajerimah rirae Thangnang amanpensa ichii saarkhii aphapa.
Thacha ynvaeru ing Aafhuw manpenchehmah; yngkhaena ynchii imbe Thangnang aaneeng mee ing Thangnang omna vokhehkho Aafhuw ajongsah mee aeng nongmen ipeeh aafhuwva ichii ing thacha vachiipae.

Thacha inche Noah ing amumahri suwhvachii Thangnang ing ariirchu rungaeka, Thangnang achiisahpak ing thacha saka a-eengkuw ikarnii ing ruwkuwngfhuw yngkheh aseem; ama ajaar inche ama ing laaruw paam amanraarpa vokhehkho thacha inuwzii ing ichum ynthiing ruw ikuum Thangnang tanii aphapa.
Thacha inche Abraham ing Thangnang ing a-eentahna iphapham isuwh apham tingche isinii khaena ariirchu amanjjipa, amanche ama ing upha ing siva kachiiva ichii manghuwru inche isi.
Thacha inche ama ing apaammah vaang, chongreep paam nache marpah mee ynsuwhka chongreep amachurap ruw ikuum ynsuwhhak ae Isak vokhehkho Jakop thoh ynruw ing khurpeenthaam nache ongsa.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe ama ing eenphambur om Thangnang ing aseem khuwruung amachu khaenache ahahsahva.
Thacha inche Sara rap ingkho kumsing aaraen vasah venchinii ruwreng aphapa, yngkhaena ynchii imbe chongreep atupeeh Aafhuw amachu thachafhuwva taka aripa.

Chukhaenache Abraham ing ithii vasah vaang takhangnare, havana mee yngkheh tanii inge minvaen na aesii vaang mee masingna vokhehkho iteennii isamah chifhuw taangna om siihdiih vaang tuti bahsuwm hungomsa.
Enuw vakhae inge Thangnang chongreepchu phamahsae, changvakonchu laarkheh nache musa aeka vokhehkho bariimsa aeka amanche laaruw paamne marpah vokhehkho lamkhii meepung ta aeka thacha inche thiksae.
Jinge ichii ing enriir enuw inge empaamsah enjongva ichii ariirniipae.
Entak enghungsuwhnii empaamchu manden ae nave, amatingche athar ynriniichu enuw ing phasa vachiipae.

Changvakonchu atiichembe enuw ing isaseh eenphambur, ichiichuve thangbaen paamchu emandensahva. Chukhaenache enuw ing Thangnang chu ken Thangnang va enchiitahna iningjaknii omah, akhaechuve ama ing engkhaena khuwruung atupeehpae.
Abraham barungriir a-entah nache athacha inche Isak chu chaatha ing apeehpa. amanche chongreep vakhaechu rotharoh ing aphasah ama ing yngkhehpang adeen asapachu chaatha ing apeeh.
Thangnang ing ariir, “Isak jaarna chongreep katunah, nang ing tuti bahsuwm deenva nata.”
Thangnang ing ithii vasah taniikho ynring achehsa taka Abraham ing amanden; amatah nache Isak chu thikvachii tanii athar aphasahpa.
Thacha inche hungsuwh vachii om khaena Isak ing Jakop re Iso enuwchu bor apeehpae.
Thacha inche Jakop ing athik phana Josep sapa chaap aechu bor apeehpae; amanche athor nache yndiisaka Thangnang arumsah.
Thacha inche Josep ing aringkum ajungchiim phana Isrel siti aeng yngkaeva enchiichu mandensaka, atak aruw khaenache ynchii tuvachiipae ichiichu ariir.
Mosi omka thacha inche atakchu amnuw ampa aeng tha ynthum athuursahpae, yngkhaena ynchii imbe amasak isapakchu emupa; amanche enuw ing iruwng chonghakchu chiimahsae.
Thacha inche Mosi ing ahungruung tahna Pharo asanuw sapa ping ichii rumahsa,
apha topoh khaena isiicher nache rungaeva kachii changve, Thangnang mee ae thoh ijachaam iphahakchu ama ing aateerpa,
Ijeep lerchii ipha changchenve Khrista khaena ynrakuh kapha inche iruungpak lerchiiva ichii ing aripa; yngkhaena ynchii imbe ama ing nuwtanii nongmen iphafhuwchu aabuwrpa.
Thacha inche iruwng barungsiichu chiiru ing Ijeep abathenpa; akhaechuve imu ynchehmah Aafhuw chu ama ing amuvaang amanghuwpa.
Amaensa ynring aechu amamaang ama mee inche enuwchu aparniimah inche, thacha inche ama ing manlaennii vokhehkho sii ynthikpeehniichu aseempa.
Thacha inche enuw ing Isen Chifhuw ariknache ikang vaang engaraenpa; Ijeep mee aenche amachu manjiikenta enchiitahna Chifhuw inche enuwchu aruppae.
Thacha inche Jeriko bangchu inii nisarii enrakuwr aanuwna chimchirsa.
Thacha inche ichuwhmah Rahap ing chong aathak mee aechu idaejaeh ing abariimsah khaena, chongriir ynjiimah ae thohche imaangchu phamahsa.
Ki ing havi chungna ynchii riirva kachiiva? Akhaechuve Gidion, Barak, Semson, Jeptha, Devit, Samuel vokhehkho jaephar ae khaena chongva kachii kakhaena apha omah.
Enuw inge thacha ajaarna iruwng ipaar lipah vakhaechu achehpae, ichum ynthiing nong entupa, chongreep emphapa, nongsha bae chukho asiingpae,
mi ichuwh ruwreng athehpae, chem aha yngee tanii iring aphapae, isuur tanii hungpirsae, laartuk nakho enruwreng pirsae, meelipah laarchang aechu enthurpa.
Rupanuw aenche enthacha jaarna enguw enae aechu ithii tanii iring inche emphapa. Areh aenche athiseh ing isaseh hangring iphanii inche ynthenchu dasa aeka inangniichu emphapa.
Areh aenche ynniisahna vokhehkho rumor isahna, vokheh ynphuwp empha amanche kaeshum sungna chenkho ong empha.
Entakchu rung ing adeengpae, ynniimeh isuwh ing atenpae, abatheem-pae, chemfhuw ing athehpae; enuw ing keer re jao avin niiaeka hungsi vasi entu, enuw ing ijachaam pha aeka embadaar vokhehkho enang.
Enuw engkhaenache laaruw paam i matik chamahsa, paamkangna, bungna, rungkuwna vokhehkho khur sungna hungtaen vataen entupa.
Enuw enthacha ajaar inche engkheng havi khaene saarkhii phakhang ae nare, enuw ing Thangnang ing chongreep atuchu phamahsae,
yngkhaena ynchii imbe inuw ynvaeru ing mapung iphachu engaansuwhniimah inche, Thangnang ing inuw yngkhaena athiseh ing isachu asirpa.

Chukhaenache inuwchu hang-jaehmeh iruung ruwrduh vaange ichii ing irakuwrka saarkhii om khaena inuw ing irikpak vokhehkho iraecharii ing chaangna ymmangucheh isiichu rensa manuwka, inuw yngkhaena asiih tingche ikhaangsah thoh ynruw ing itaen yntaarnii tingche taensataruw,

amanche ynthacha abur abasem re achinii Jesu chu enmanuwka, ymmaana om itaen yntaarniichu ikhaang thoh ynruw ing taentaruw. Aafhuw ing amaana om rotharoh ama khaena ningjakchu thosapeehru ing khros nache ijacham khaangka, Thangnang iruwngpham ongnii tachang nache ongsa.
Nenuw nenlaetha changtak naka nenjaniimah ing Aafhuw ataksahrap taklina isiicher ae tanii ijeehnii akhaangchu kharsataruw.
Nenuw ing ataraen phane isiichu laar tukchuwka sii ynta phanii ing irumah tumahri-chuw.
Thangnang ing asiti ae vaang ynthohsahnii chongsae neningna ichongkha nenbahirva?
“Kasiti, Aafhuw ing eechahchu riithiih mahra,
vokhehkho ynrakuh raenche changtak mahra.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe Aafhuw ing aning amansiih meechu aachahnah,
amanche aru mee chaapchu ponti apeehnah.”
Nenuw ing eechahchu khaang tanuwve Thangnang ing asiti ae vaang yntuva; yngkhaena ynchii imbe ampa ing aachahmah siti achuw omkhang?
Changvakonchu eechahmah naka sarup iphahakchu ynsuwh tanuwve, nenuw asapa chumah vachuw, lamcha vachuw.
Inuwchu ymmanchum laaruw mee apa ae om, amanche inuw ing eejasah ae. Inuw ing aajaehmeh athi ing laetha apa ama dernache ongmanuwka ringmah manuw khang?
Enuw ing isava enchii inuwzii inche inii topoh khaena inuwchu eechah ae, changvakonchu inuw ing Aafhuw aningna ynthiingchu iphahak inche ynkanii khaena eechahva.
Ynchah ichii i anikungna chembe rotharoh omah, changvakonchu ijaniiva, changkhang nakho aanuwna chembe ama ajaarnache ynchuwsah apha mee aenche ichum ynthiing idae aanla enruwpnah.
Chukhaenache nabaen ikham vo-khehkho nakheerkhuw ipaang mahkha manpirla,
amanche nasinii lamchu manchiimla, amana chembe ibong khichu ynthiirmahnii, changvakonchu damnii vaata.
Mee vakhae thoh idae omnii turuw vokhehkho ynthiing inche ongruw, amachumah naka achuw ingkho Aafhuw mumahnii.
Thang-nang tungsiih tanii achuw yngkheh ing asuurniimah ing ynriimpak ing enruw, changmah nave ikhapak arajung hengkaap naka ijachaam basuw vaata vokhehkho ama inche mee aanem hungmaangnii vaata;
vokhehkho achuw yngkheh naamak atu changmahka iphapham omchu chara vokhehna ajuwr Iso vaangkhe imaang mee omahrasii.
Nenuw ing nemanghuwsa amachuve aanuwna ama ing bor phaningka achiiraenche atakchu rupeeh mahsa, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ama ing richii ynta ing jongsakhang nare, barungriir huungnii apham tuwhmahsa.
Nenuw ing ipar aru vokhehkho mi ichuwh bung nache yndup, ynthim, khuwsuwr siiraang nache,
vokhehkho tumpeeh ynling re yndang chong iruur nache thengmahchuw, ama iruurchu aasii aenche vokheh chong yntanga eningna iriirniimah ing enthamsah;
Bungchu lampa sha rap ingkho parnave rung ing deeng ae naka changmahka tharsae ing ideehva chiipae ichii chonghak amansir aechu enuw ing badaarcheh mahsae.
Ama amuchu aajaehmeh ichiisuwhva taka Mosi ing ariir, “Ki inempak ynchik ingka ynchiimsah ing.”
Changvakonchu nenuw chuve Zaion bung vokhehkho iring Thangnang khuwruung, thangbaen jerusalem, iteennii isamah vaarmee ae ruwr tingche,
mee aangkheng aangkongnii vokhehkho thangbaenna ruming ynchar vasah amaensa ruwrthiing nache, mee vakhae vajeer aatu Thangnang, mapung apha ynthiing mee ae laetha tingche,
ithar chongiirna eenuwmpeeh Jesu ningna vokhehkho Abel chungna isaseh ing ichong ynthik sii nache nenuw ihuungvachuw.

Aafhuw ichongchu nenuw ing irumah nentuniimah ing ynriimruw. Laaruw paamna ichong Aafhuw atakchu enuw ing enrumah tahna ynjuwhsah phamah ae nave, thangbaen tanii ichong Aafhuw ningtanii eengheer tahna aajaehmeh athi ing ynjuwhchehmah vaanchiiva,
Aafhuw aaruur ing laaruw paam aanuhpa, changvakonchu atiive chongreep tuka ariirnah, “Athar vokhehkho laaruw paam pangchu manuh mahning, thangbaen chukho manuhva kata.”
Athar vokheh atarae havi amandangsa amachuve ynseem peeh vakhae ynnuh vaata vokhehkho peenvaata, amana chembe ynnuh chehmah peehchu omjaeh vaata.
Chukhaenache ynnuh chehmah iruwngpaam ympha khaena inuw ing tungsiih deen manuwka ynjasuwh ing vokhehkho ichiisah thohche ynrupeehnii ing Thangnang chu rukuum tusataruw.
Thangnang chuve amanchuwm dehcheh miva.
Unae ningmansiih omchu ympehmah rasii.
Lamkhii mee aechu bariimsahnii bahir mahruw. Achuw yngkheh mee ing changche tuka ynghuw ynghamah ing vaarmee aechu abariimsahpae.
Kaeshum sungna ong mee aechu nenuw thoh aanghak chuwvaang ynden aeruw, ijachaam apha mee aechu nenuwkho hakchaang ipaar vachuw khaka yndenpeeh aeruw.

Rakhiinii ichii i mee aangkheng kaarna ynjasuwh vachiiva, vokhehkho ijaarniichu chohmah vachiiva, changvakonchu naamak vokhehkho reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah atu meechu Thangnang ing vajeer tuvaata.
Nenuw seer yndikpak ing omahruw, nendeensah taklinakhe pensaruw. Thangnang ing ariirnah, “Ki ing utaraenkho nangchu mamah ningchii vokhehkho bathenmah ningchii.”
Chukhaenache inuw ing thona isa ing tataruw,
“Aafhuw i ki eebom chuva, ki ynchik mahning,
achuw inche kaningna ynchii tuchehva chiiva?”
Nenuwchu eepuh ae, neningna Thangnang chongsae ynchongpeeh mee aechu ynden aeruw; amanche enringkum aanlachu kharnuwna enthacha aanuwchu jiiruw.
Jesu chuve ajaennii, atanii vokhehkho ichuwr naemah thoh aanghakjaeh ing omna.

Nenuw asiksik vokhehkho ynghuwmah ynchuwpeeh inche ichum lam tanii ikimah rasii. Barungriirchu Thangnang tungsiih ing ympirther inche isava, isahfhuw thaemin ingmahva, havi inuwzii ing isi mee aenche kaaniimahsae.
Inuw ing thiimkung yndeensa amanche chaatha ympichu rumnii-thaam rukuum aatu mee aenche isahchehnii ematik yntanga omah.
Aanchung Jaethiim inche deenkhaar siichu ynthiingpak apham nache isii kuhnii khaena vechika chaatha api; changvakonchu deenkhaar apum chuve ongnii taangting abathu-nah.
Chukhaenache Jesu ingkho ataksahrap asii ing mee aechu amanthiingnii khaenache khuwruung taangting ijachaam akhaangpa.
Chukhaenache inuw ing ningjak aphachu sarup risa manuwka ongnii taangtingche aningting ma taarsataruw.
Havane inuw ing ongjaehnii khuwruung deen mahmuw, changvakonchu thengvachii khuwruungchu inuw ing yngenva.
Chukhaenache Aafhuw ajaarna Thangnang ningna apha vakhaena ympahnii chaatha ipeehnii chuve, inuw ynner aanla inche arumingchu manpahsa taruw.
Isa nong itu re yngkheh yngkheh ymbom bahir mahruw, yngkhaena ynchii imbe hava hangchii chaatha ipi inge Thangnang ipenva.

Nenuw eepuh ae chongriir manjiiruw vokhehkho endernache ongruw; yngkhaena ynchii imbe entu enri khaena akhae pivachii ae vaang, enuw ing barungriir jaarudeh ing rotharoh thohche havi itunii inche nenlaetha khaenache ija akhaangpae; enuw ing rotharoh inche tuae rasii amanche barungriirna ja ae nave entuungsahnii omah.
Kengkhaena ithampeehruw, akhaechuve kenuw isa ruwthuwh kendeensa ta ungka kenbarung kemangamsa, akhaechuve apha omba khaena ichumchu tunungka kenchiinah.
Neningting ynlanghak ing itheng kaphasahnii inche nenuwchu athurfhuw ing kakhaena ithampeehruw kachiisahva.
Atii ichen naemah chongiir sii ajaarna Iruungpak Jaocheer inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ithii tanii amanring idae Thangnang inche,
Jesu Khrista ajaarna amik enna apenniichu ynningna nong tusana, amanden isa nong vakhae ituna mapung imanphapeeh rasii, aningnache ichuwr naemah ing ympah ynsuwhrasii. Amen.
Kauw kanae ae, ki ing nenuwchu kathamsahnahchuw, havana ynthoh-sah chong i ikhaangpeehruw, ki ing neningna chongsae topohpang inge kabaziihpa.
Nenuw ing manghuwruw amachuve unae Timothi ing kaeshum tanii jungsuwhsa, ama ing ynlang ing thengnave, amathoh ynruw ing nenuwchu yntuwhfhuwva kachuw.
Nenuw eepuh aere Thangnang mee aechu salaam tuaeruw. Itali mee aenche nenuwchu salaam ynjetu-sahnah ae.
Thangnang tungsiih inche nenuw vakhaechu eenruwfhuw ynsuwhrasii. Amen.
Kauw kanae ae, nenuw ing aajaeh chaang enniiting bukkhang tanuwre, rotharohnii pangchu mandenjaehruw,
akhaechuve chaang enchu nencheh inche ikhaangchehnii ahenbasuwnah.
Changvakonchu ikhaangcheh nongchu mapung phavachiiva, amana chembe nenuw mintanuwka vokhehkho mapungchu phatanuwka ivaeh omahdeh tanuw.
Chukhaenache nenuw achuw yngkheh losing vaehnave, aangkhengna ipeehnii ihae vokhehkho ynrakuhfhuw omah Thangnang ningtingche heniihsa rasiing; Aafhuw inche aningna jepivaata.

Changvakonchu nenuw ing nenniihsah raenche thachava nenchiiva vokhehkho nenbarungriirna fhuwm ynvaemah vachiiva; achuw yngkheh ing fhuwm bavae nave, siiraang ing hechi avechi chifhuw ifhuwrthoh aanghakva.
Chukhaenache barungriir ynnii ynthuw, atu ari chaapna ireepchehmah;
changchii mee inche Thangnang tanii ynchii ynchii vakhangnare phava kata ichii ing mandenmah rasii.
Achuw yngkheh sara meechu Thangnang ing aathohsah raenche rotharoh phavaata,
vokhehkho savang meechu Thangnang ing thangting ajenbathak raenche arotha manroh rasii. Akhaechuve savang mee chuve riipaar vaang chiirvachii vatah.
Inii ynsa inche deengka riiburchu chongsa amanche apaar chukho chuwrka yngentahna isapak chukho maangsa; amachuvaang savang mee chukho chiirvaata.
Batheem akhaangsah meechu bor aphava; akhaechuve isajaeh ing ingiircheh vakhaka, Thangnang ing aning amansiih ae khaena chongreep atu inuwzii ing iringnii phurchiichu ama ing phavaata.
Achuw ingkho batheem ting abuklae, “Ki i Thangnang ing ymbatheemva tamahrasii; Thangnang chu isamah inche batheemchehmah vokhehkho Aafhuw inche achuw tikho batheem mahchak.”
Changvakonchu mee vakhae i ataksah ing aadikpak nache runam nongtu inche abatheem sahva.
Chukhaenache aadikpak nong inche isamah isii icher abaringva; vokhehkho ama isii inche ahungnem tahnache ithiichu abaringva.
Kaningsiih kauw kanae ae, nenuw yngkheh yngkheh ynchaemahruw.
Isa kikthuur vakhae i Thangnang taniiva, vokhehkho ampa ningtanii ireng chuva. Aafhuw aningna chembe ynteh, ympeen ichii i aruvaam rapkho omah.
Ama ataksah ing amanden nache ichum inche ymbaringpa, chukhaenache ama ing aseem aren aalachu ynsuwhvataruw.

Kaningsiih kauw kanae ae, nenuw ing havi manghuwruw, amachuve mee vakhae ing singsii ing omva nenchiiva, changvakonchu asiitahna amanghuwsii, ichong tahna idim vokhehkho barung isiisiimah ynsuwhva nenchiiva;
barung isii ing Thangnang lam ichumchu anong tuchehmah,
chukhaenache ibuwr itii vokhehkho isamah aangkheng bathen nuwna nenlaetha karcheh vachii ynthiing chongsae ympeehchu isajaeh ing manjiiruw.
Chongsae anong itu mee ynsuwh-ruw amanche nentaksah ynchaesa nuwna aangae mee chupang ynsuwh mahruw.
Achuw mee yngkheh ing chong aangaepangchu ynsuwh naka nongchu tumah nave, ama meechu vaarthana amaepang amuthoh aanghakva;
yngkhaena ynchii imbe ataksah amae amuchu bahirka, ama ynchii meeping ichii ynsiimahsa.
Changvakonchu amanden ing vajeer chonghakchu anasiir ennaka vokhehkho abahir omru ing nong ing atumee inche isa phavaata.
Achuw yngkheh mee ing aner iriimru ing ataksah taklinache mare tunaka ichum lamna isi ynthiing ping ichii ing amanden mee chuve ikanii-mah dehva.

Dharmo ichii ive inuw vakhae apa Thangnang tanii ynthiing vokhehkho iseengjaeh lam chuva; amachuve, muwkhuwnuw aere ampa amnuw omah siti aechu rukuum itupeeh vokhehkho laaruw paamne yntak sahkho iseengjaeh ing ichumna isichuva.
Kauw kanae ae, Aafhuw Jesu Khrista alaar isa, aningna athacha mee vakhae ing mee taklina adongchang tumahrasii.
Nenuw ing meekong tunii nache sana kikchii niinaka amanche isapak peendiir niinaka vokhehkho baruw peendiir anii sara thohche varuwhak ae nave;

changlaenche nenuw ing peendiir isapak aniichu enchuwka, naningsiihna havana isapak ongniine ongpeehra, changvakonchu sara ningna chembe amanakhe ngiirjaeh tahra changmahka kangiirniine ongla tatanuwcha,
nenuw ing nensungsahna adongchang tuchuwka vokhehkho isamah ing nenbarungriirna vajeer tumah chuwkhang?
Kaningsiih kauw kanae ae, rungaeruw, thacha nache savang suwhnii ing vokhehkho Thangnang chu ning amansiih ae ningna iruwng lipah phanii khaenache sara aechu Thangnang ing aateermah paekhang?
Changvakonchu nenuw inchembe sara meechu thosapeeh mahchuw. Savang aenche nenuwchu ijuum aeka vajeer tuniiting ymmanruwh chakmah paekhang?
Changlaenche nenuw ing savang ae rumingchu ithipak ing nenriir chakmah vakhang?
