Ynthiing chongjeer inuwzii ing naveenchaangchu naning mansiihva nachiiva ichii iruungpak vajeer chong-hakchu mapung mampha tanuwve, atatak ing nenuw isa nongchu nentuva.
Changvakonchu nenuw ing adongchang nentu vanave isii itu mee vachuw, changpangmahka vajeer chonghakchu isamahting nenbabuw inche isiichu nentuva.
Chutahnache achuw yngkheh ing vajeer chonghakchu aangkheng kamanjiiva tanaka, denkhehna raarnave aangkhenglaang araar chirpa.

Chukhaenache Aafhuw ing ajeer chuve, “Reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah tumah vokhehkho mee thehmahra taka ariirsa.” Chukhaenache nang ing reentaang rumee fhuwsar taklina ichuwhmah tumahkhang taniire meechu thehtaniive, vajeer chong-hakchu ichummahva ichii meechu vachii.
Ruwkuwrjoh ympeeh vajeer chonghak inche vajeer tuvachii achuw yngkheh mee vaang chongla vokhehkho nong ing mandangla.
Changvakonchu ningsiih omah mee chuve avajeer nache ningsiih ynvaemahsa; akhaechuve ningsiih inche vajeerchu achehva.
Kauw kanae ae, achuw yngkheh ing kathacha omna tanaka nong ynvaemah nave, aningna ynchii kaaniivaate! Athacha inche karchehva takhang?
Nauw nanae yngkheh ing changmahka nasar najuwr yngkheh ing peen deensamah naka vokhehkho anasiirna isahfhuw avaehraenche,
nenuw achuw mee yngkheh ing, “Idaejaeh ing yngkaetahra vokhehkho navenkho bavarasii,” tanaka ama ing kaaniivachii chucha pimah nacha ynchii ikanii omva takhang!
Havi vaange thacha chukho nong ynvaemah nave, aringsen ing ithii chuva.

Changvakonchu mee yngkheh ing tavaata, “Nang chuve nathacha omna amanche ki chuve nong ing omna.” Chukhaenache nang nathacha nong taniichu asik ing kaningna imansiira, amanche ki ingkho nong ing kanongchu naningna mandang kata.
Nang ing Thangnang yngkhehpang vatah tachiika nathacha vakhaka, nathacha chuve sakna. Umlae aengkho thacha aeka enchii ing emuwr penna.
Chukhaenache ikanii omah mee, nong ynvaemah thacha chuve aanla omahva ichii i nang ing mandang naka nachiiva?
Inuw vakhae apa Abraham ing asapa Isakchu Thangnang ningting thiimkungna apeehtahna anong inche amanchummah vakhang?
Athacha inche nongthoh ynruw ing atuhakva,
amanche nong inche thachachu amandangpehna ichiichu nang ing namusa;
“Thangnang chu Abraham ing athachapa,
vokhehkho ichum ynthiing meeva ichii ing arupeehpa;
Chukhaenache Abraham chu Thangnang aarangva ichii khaena ynthiing thiimziih taniichu hungchumsa.”
Nong ing meechu amanchumpehva, thacha ompang ing mahva ichii nenuw ing nemusa.
Amavaange ichuwhmah rupanuw Rahaap ing ynruwh chong aathak mee aechu nong ing bomka reentaang lamting amansitahna aeche, anong inche atakchu amanchummah vakhang?
Chukhaenache laetha omah hak-chaangchu ithii vaang, nong ynvaemah thacha chuve ithiiva.
Kauw kanae ae, inuw yntaksah ing ipirpak vajeer phavataruw ichii manghuwsa manuwka, nenuw mee aanem ing aanchuw mee ynsuwh-mahruw.
Mee ymmanchuw tahna inuw vakhae khi mansiinii omna. Achuw yngkheh ing ariir chong nache khi mansiimah nave, ama meechu ichumpak meeva, amachuve ama ataksah ing aangkhengna ynriimsah acheh meeva.
Shakuurchu inuw ing ymmandenna ymmansichehnii ing anerkuchu naareeng vuwh ma-nuwve atakchu hembaheer vebaheer ynchehnah.
Ruwkuwng vakhaekho enruw, enuw aajaeh ruungkhang ae nare vokhehkho siiiraang inche tuwrkhang ae nakho, ruwkuwng aahuur mee inche amandenting aman-sichehnah.
Amavaange hakchaang na om bari ikho isiingpakva, changva-konchu iruungpak ing chongna.
Enruw isiingpak marip chiihti ing iruungpak paam ikaang achehsa. Chukhaenache bari ikho miva.

Inuw vakhae ynsha taklina om bari ive ynthiingmah omnii laaruw paam vaang ichiiva. Chukhaenache bari inge isakho ymmanchehnah amanche ynringkum ikho mi sungting ymbathuchehnah vokhehkho longkong tingkho ymbabuw chehnah.
Laaruw mee inge sha, vaati, aven ing yntor, chii sungna om laetha ipaar chaap ymbathaechehnah,
changvakonchu bari ive achuwti ingkho ymbathaechehmah ivaeh omah isamah ithiinii chuwr asungna omna;
hava inge Aafhuw vokhehkho apa Thangnang chu ymmanpahniinah, amanche Thangnang ing aseem mee aechu siraap ympeehniinah.
Inuw ynnerne ympah niikho, isamah phorkho hungsuwhna. Chukhaenache kauw kanae ae, jinge tamahvaan chiiva.
Chii hangfhuwrnii akhur yngkheh nache ithum chii re ar chii hangfhuwr chakkhang?
Kauw kanae ae, thachang aanla kaarna chor aanla changmahka vomrip bur nache thachang ynla chehva takhang?
Nenuw nengkaarna achuwva ising iveerchu? Ama mee inche alosing thoh iduwrjaeh ing anong isa vakhaechu mandangrasii.
Nenuw nenbarungriir sungna ichachehmah sehmaner om mee ynvae tanuwve ynding mahruw, amanche ichum taklinache ruungchichuh mahruw vokhehkho raarmah dehruw.
Havana losing i ynthiing chungtanii mahva changvakonchu havive laaruw paam tanii shava ae, isamah umlae ae tanii losingva.
Chukhaenache sehmaner aomnii apham nache ynnahnii, isamah ningjaknii nong aangkhenglaang omvaata.

Changva-konchu chungtanii losing chuve aren ynthiing chuva, idae aadik, idim, chongriirnii nungae, ningchuwh ing isip vokhehkho isa nongna aanla amangom, barungriir fhuwm ynvaemah, vokhehkho isachaang tuning tamah.
Chukhaenache ichum ynthiing aanla chuve idae apha ae taklina idaechu avorva.

Laar isuwh vokhehkho ynnahnii isuwh vakhae i utanii thengka nenuw nengkaarna isuwhva? Nening-tanii isuwh churmah vakhang? Amachuve, nenuw nentaksahna nemanden om ingkhe ynnahnii nensung-sahna isuwhmah vakhang?
Nenuw ing nemandennah, changvakonchu deencheh mahchuw; chutahnache mee nenthehnah. Nenuw kaamnachuw changvakonchu ipha chehmahchuw, akhaechuve nenuw ing havi khaene henthammah sachuw.
Nenuw ing neniihnah changvakonchu phacheh mahchuw, akhaechuve ikenii kuurva khaena ynraar ing neniihpa.

Thacha fhuwmah mee ae! Laaruw paam thoh ynchaarhak inge Thangnang thoh yngharniiva ichii i nemanghuw mahva! Achuw mee yngkheh ing laaruw paam i aarang ynsuwh naka tanave, ataksahrap Thangnang ajeeehnii mee chuva.
Ynthiing thiimziihna jinge ariirsa, “Aafhuw ing ynningna ongii khaena aseem laetha aningsiih ing aruwmjaehchu nenuw ing ikaniimahva ichii ing nemandenva?”
Changvakonchu Aafhuw inchembe tungsiihchu inempak ympeehsa; chutahnache jinge ariirsa, “Thangnang ing ynding mee aechu rupeehmah, changvakonchu ynjuursah ae ningnache tungsiihchu apeehnah.”
Chukhaenache Thangnang derna ongruw, eentheem umlaechu chehruw amana chembe neningtanii taen-vaata.
Thangnang chu ineengruw amanche ama ingkho nenuwchu eeneeng vaata. Isii icher mee ae nengkik manseengruw vokhehkho barungriir ynniimeh ynthuw nenuw nenbarungriir manthiing rasiing.
Ijachaam apha ningchuwhniichu ynsuwhruw, bakhikruw vokhehkho chapruw. Nemanii ynjakha ichapting manguurruw.
Nenuw nentaksah ingkhe Aafhuw maana ynjuursa ing ongruw, amanache ama ing nenuwchu imanruung vaata.

Kauw kanae ae, nenuw yngkheh ing yngkheh taklina isamah ing chongmahruw. Nenuw achuw yngkheh ing auw anae taklina vajeer tunave Thangnang chonghak taklina ama ichongsahva, vokhehkho chonghakchu vajeer atuva. Chukhaenache nang ing vajeer chonghak i vajeer tutaniive, vajeer chonghak amanjii meemah vachii, changvakonchu vajeer itu mee vachii.
Ikarpeehkho acheh re ymmaangkho acheh vajeer chonghak eepeeh yngkhehpang omna. Chutah-nache nauw nanaechu vajeer itu nang achuwvachii?
“Atanii changmahka atuknuw inuw ing khuwruung tingse simanuwka amanche kumkheh ongmanuwka vokhehkho seerbaar taartaruw ichii mee ae, atarae aphane huungruw;
yngkhaena ynchii imbe atuknuw ynchii suwhvaate ichii nenuw manghuw mahchuw. Nenringkum i ynchiiva? Nenuw i apha mongteh pangna rudaechii bukka aanuwting omahchak khajaeh vatahchuw.”
Havana nemanden changdenne nenuw ing jinge ichii ing nenriir inche sakvaata, “Aafhuw ing amanden ynsuwhnave, inuw ing ringmanuwka hava vakhae i tuvataruw.”
Changvakonchu ataraenbe nenuw ing ynding chuwka ruungchichuh nachuw. Havana nengandingnii i sakmah.
Chukhaenache isachu ynchiiva ichii manghuwka isa atuchehmah meechu akhaena chembe isiiva.
O savang ae! Atarae aphane huungruw, nentaklina ijachaam ningchuwhnii thengvachii khaena chapruw vokhehkho nening mandong-saruw.
Nenler nenchiikha chuwmsa amanche nenpeendiir khakho arungi ing asahpa.

Nensana re seerkha jorhing vaksa amanche jorhing iva inche nentaklina asaarkhii ynsuwh vaata, vokhehkho ama inche mi ikaang vaang nenuwchu isavata. Amachuve nenuw ing achinii inii khaena lerchii nemanghuwngpa.
Enruw, nenuw ing neeh ae chuwka ruthamen piva nenchiichu manchae ae chuwka areh nenseeh ingkhe uungna; changpang mahka shaang aavuwh aeng uung aechu Aafhuw laarchang aeng ensiipa.
Nenuw ing laaruw paamna inungaepak ing paarchuwka vokhehkho nungaesachuw; nentaksah ing ynthehsava nenchii khaenache nenbarungriir kha nemamar sahpa.
Ichum meechu nenuw ing nemanraarpa, nenthehpa; enuw ing nenuwchu irumah tumahsae.

Havi khaene kauw kanae ae, Aafhuw ing ajungthengmah raentaang hehahruw. Enruw, laaruw paamne amen iruwpak chimuw bajaang khaena ynlang ing vokhehkho yntuk ing khuw asuwrmahri raentaang ruwbaar itu mee inche ahahjaehnah.
Nenuw vakhae ingkho hahjaehruw vokhehkho nenbarungriir mancheep jaehruw, Aafhuw jungtheng vachiichu ynneengsa.
Kauw kanae ae, yngkheh re yngkheh vajeer tunii khaena ynriirsa mahruw; enruw tuvachii Aafhuw inche eenkhaar kungna ngiirna.
Kauw kanae ae, Aafhuw rumingna ichong ae jaephar mee aeng ijachaam empha amanche engkhaang ae i buwtinnii ing risataruw.

Enruw, ikhaang acheh mee aechu bor aphapae. Jop ing ikhaang achehchu nenuw ing nensiipa vokhehkho Aafhuw ing akuurchiimna asirpeeh chukho nensiipa. Aafhuw chuve ningchuwh vokhehkho ningsiih barungriir ing isipva.
Nenuw nengkaarna achuw yngkheh ijachaam apha omvachuw? Ama thamsa rasiing. Achuw yngkheh arotha irohva? Ama ing ympahnii la turasiing.
Nenuw nengkaarna achuw yngkheh ina omva? Ama ing ruwrthiing upa aechu eenrasii, enuw inche Aafhuw rumingna inachu thou itaeh ae sana thampeeh ae rasiing;
thacha thamsah inche inachu karpeeh vaata, vokhehkho Aafhuw ing atakchu mandam vaata; amana isii tunave amachukho kuhpeeh vaata.

Chukhaenache ina chuwchu adamnii khaena, isii icher nentaklina omchu yngkheh yngkheh ynriirnuwna amanche yngkheh ing yngkheh khaena Thangnang tingche thamruw. Ichum mee ing athamsah chuve nong ituna inempak ruwreng pirna.
Elija i inuwthoh aanghak mee vatah, changvakonchu ama ing alaetha iruwhdeh ing khuw asuwrniimah khaena athamsah tahnache kumthum tharuk laaruw paamne khuw suwrmahsa.
Athar vokheh ama ing athamsah tahnache thangbaen tanii khuw suwrsa vokhehkho laaruw paamna aanlachu hunganlasa.
Kauw kanae ae, nenuw nengkaarna achuw yngkheh ing ichum tanii arehting sinaka achuw yngkheh inche ama meechu henbaricheh nave,
areh aphuw lamting isi isii icher meechu alaetha ithii tanii ikarpeeh phavaata vokhehkho isii icher aajaehchu baruwpeeh vaata ichii manghuwrasii.
Jesu Khrista, chongthang Pitar ki ing-Pontus na, Galatia na, Kappadosia na, Asia na, vokhehkho Bithinia na ynjarnong chuwka lamkhii ing ong ae,
Apa Thangnang ing amandenna eeteerka vokhehkho asii inche imanthiingka, Jesu Khrista chongriir ynjiinii khaena alaetha inche ymmanthiing:
Neningnache tungsiih re idaechu hungnemseseh ynsuwhrasii.

Inuw ing Jesu Khrista ampa Thangnang chu manpahtaruw. Akhaechuve aningsiih iruungpak inche Jesu Khrista ithii tanii ihangring ajaarna ithar ringkumchu ympeehpa. Havi inge iringnii ningmandenchu ymmangompa.

Chukhaenache Thangnang ing amee ae khaena asiih lerchiichu iphanii inche maating yngensahva. Ama ing thangbaen nache maangmahvachii, jungthukmah-vachii vokhehkho chuwrmahvachii nengkhaena ynsiihpeehpa.
achiphana mandangnii khaena thoraang atuvasah Manlaenpeehchu nenthacha ajaarna nenuwchu yngahpeehpa.
Atarae apha amongpangtine reentaang aajaeh ing nentaklina imansin naka ija vakhang tanuwre, ama khaena nenrotha manrohruw.

Mi ing mansehtuhkhang manuwre maangvachii sana ithi ing amen iruwpak ynthiing nenthacha ingkhe Jesu Khrista chu aandanglaenche ympah, ynjasuwh vokhehkho alaar isa nenphanii inche nenuwchu chaang yngenniiva.
Imu nenphamah Aafhuw chu nenuw ing nening nemansiihsa; vokhehkho atarae nenuw ing Aafhuw chu nemumahrap ingkho nenthachasa, amanche ariirnii isamah ing vokhehkho rotharoh thohche nenrotha nemanrohsa,
Nenthacha aphor inche nenlaetha karnii manlaenpeehchu nenphapa.
Thangnang ing nenuwchu ipivachii manlaenpeeh kikthuur khaene jaephar aenche ynriimpak ing jongneh aeka vokhehkho itohneh aeka enuw ing enjeerpa.

Khrista ing ijachaam khaangnaka vokhehkho nuwting alaar isa phavachiichu, embarungriir sungna om Khrista laetha inche maen ing saarkhii pika ajeerchu utaraenche suwhva chiiva ichii khaena enuw ing enjong ae.

Thangnang ing havana jaephar ae ningne amandang chuve enongtuchu entaksah khaenamahva changvakonchu nengkhaenava, thangbaen tanii ynthiing laetha ajenbathen ajaarna isa chong aatong mee aenche havi khaena nening nache emanthangpa. Havi khaene vaarmee aengkho manghuwcheh nungka enchiinah.
Chukhaenache nenvakhar diiriim-chu chiimther nuwna, nenbarungriir suwrruw; amanche Jesu Khrista ing ajungindanglaenche neningna ipivachii tungsiih nache ningmanden aangkhengchu mangomjaehruw.
Chongriir ynjii naepang ae vaang, nenuw ajae mamaenna nemanghuw mahrae isamah nemanden thohkhe aanghak ing omahruw,
changva-kocnhu nenuwchu yngeen Thangnang ing ynthiing vaang, nentu nenri aangkheng nache manthiingruw.
Jinge ynziihsa: “Nenuw manthiing-ruw, Ki ynthiingping.”
Amanche mee vakhae anongtu inuwzii ing adongchang omru ing vajeer atuchu nenuw ing apa tatanuwka nengeen vanave, laaruw paamna nenring raenne akhaena ynchik ing ringruw.
Nenuw ing nemanghuwsa amachuve nenfhuw nenpa tanii ihungom ikaanii omadeh ing iring ae eningtanii ynkarpa, amachu maangvachii sana vokhehkho rupa ing mahva,
changvakonchu ynthiingjaeh changmahka buw areenmahdeh jaoti vaangche ichii amen iruwpak Khrista sii ynchenva.
Atak i laaruw paam aanseemmah rirae basenka Thangnang ing aateer vasahva, changvakonchu nengkhae-nache achipha iniine amandangpehva.
Ithii tanii manringka alaar isa apeeh ama ajaarnache Thangnang ningna nebarungriirchu nemangamva, amatah nache nenthacha vokhehkho ningmandenchu Thangnang ningnache omba.
Atii nenguw nenae aechu ynthiing ing nening nemansiihnii khaenache ichumchu manjiinuwna nenlaethachu nentaksah ing manthiing nuwna, barungriir iruwh ing yngkheh yngkheh ningsiih omruw.
Akhaechuve iring vokhehkho ichen naemah Thangnang chongsae ajaarna maangvachii amuw ingmahka, maangmahvachii inche nenuwchu athar ymbaringpa.
Ynthiing thiimziih ing jinge ariirsa,
“Mee vakhae hakchaang ichuve fuwrthoh aanghak vatah,
vokhehkho enlaar isa vakhae ikho riipaar thoh aanghak vatah.
Fuwr inche chongna amanche rii inche chuwrna,
changvakonchu Thangnang chongsae chuve ichuwr naemah ing omjaehna.”
Haviva neningna isa chong yntongchu.
Chukhaenache isamah chaap, mare om, isachaang itu, kallak om vokhehkho thaechii thaenam chong aangkheng bathenchir nuwna,
naeduung ijungompeh vaangkhe, ynthiingtatak chongsae shangkhomchu idiktherruw, amana chembe nenuw hungruung tanuwka,
Aafhuw i tungsiih ihaeva ichiichu atatak ing manghuwva nenta.
Mee ae ing atatak ing enrupeehmah changvakonchu Thangnang inchembe aateer vasah amen iruwpak iring rung aningtingche nenuw ihuungvachuw.
Jesu Khrista ajaarnache Thangnang ningna irupeehvachii ing laethacher chaathachu ipinii khaena, ynthiing jaethiim pham vinii khaena, nenuw nentaksahchu iring rung ae vaang, laetha eenchu nemangiirva.
Chukhaenache ynthiing thiimziih nakho ynthinna,
“Enruw ki ing Zaion nache athurfhuwrungchu,
ynteer vasah amen iruwpak kasiihsa,
aningna athacha meechu utaraenkho ningjak phamahnii ae.”
Chukhaenache athacha nening nache rung havi amen iruwpakva;
changvakonchu chongriir ynjiimah ae ningna chembe,
“Een itu aeng enrimah rungchu athurfhuwrungchu hunginsuwhsa,”
Vokhehkho reentaang yngkhehna jinge ariirsa,
“Haviva mee ae khi mansiinii,
vokhehkho engaanruumnii rungchu.”
Enuw ing chongriir emanjiimah tahnache chongsae nache engkhi emansiiniipa; havikho engkhaena chembe enlaepah ynsuwhsa.
Apha vokhehna chembe nenuw Thangnang meemah vachuw, changvakonchu atiive nenuw ameechu ynsuwh sachuw; aningsiih phamahchuw changvakonchu atiive aningsiihchu nenphapa.
Kaningsiih kaarang ae, laetha taklina laar atuk hakchaang ing aadik tanii ingahnii khaena lamkhii mee vokhehkho marpah mee aevaang kathamsahnahchuw.
Reentaang mee ae kaarna nenong mansakruw, amana chembe enuw ing nentaklina isamah atu meepae ichii ing enchonglae, nenongtu isachu muae naka Thangnang manpahnii vaatae.
Aafhuw khaenache laaruw mee ing jiivachii chongjeer vakhae derna ongruw, iruwng ing aangkaangseh vakhaeka aderna ongruw,
vokhehkho lipah aapuh vakhangnare, isamah atu mee ae miraar ipeehnii khaena vokhehkho isa nong atu mee aechu ympahnii khaena Aafhuw ing enuwchu ajenchiirpae.
Akhaechuve haviva Thangnang ing amandenchu, isa nong nentu inche amanghuwmah iveermah aechu enghuw mandaenii rasii.
Ruwkuwrjoh mee vaang nenuw paarruw amanche ruwkuwrjoh inche isamahchu mangkhumnii mahruw; changvakonchu Thangnang suwhvaang paarruw.
Mee vakhae ijaaruw, unae ae vakhaechu nening mansiihruw, Thangnang chu chiiruw amanche iruwng chukho ijaaruw.
Meenae ae, nengafhuw aechu nengajathoh ynruw ing abarungriir isa vokhehkho iduwr ningna chenpang mahka, abarungriir ithi derna chenkho ongruw.
Akhaechuve Thangnang ting abarungriir manruwh naka ichum atu khaena ijachaam aphachu khaangcheh nave ympahfhuwva.
Akhaechuve nenuw ing isii nenrang tahna rumor nensahchu ynchii ympahfhuw omkhang! Changvakonchu nenuw ing isa nentutahna ijachaam badaar tanuwve, Thangnang maanache ympahfhuw vachuw.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe havi ipha inge nenuwchu yngeenpa, nenuw ing Khrista akhiknuwchu aanuw ijiinii khaena neningna buwtinnii imapeehka, Aafhuw ing nengkhaenache ijachaam yngkhaangpeehpa.
Aafhuw chuve isii tumahdeh, amanche aner nakho ichummah chong yntangakho siimah-muw.
Ataklina ningjak pikhang ae nakho, ama ing huw verimah; ama ing ijachaam apharae mee manchiihmah, changvakonchu ichum ynthiing ing vajeer atu Thangnang ningnache atakchu ynsirsah.

Inuw ing isii icher ing thikmuwka ommuwchu ichum ynthiing ing ynringnii khaenache, Aafhuw ataksahrap ahakchaang nache thing taklina inuw vakhae isii icherchu ynreenpeehpa. Ama ing rumor asahnii abuw inche nenuwchu ymmandampa.
Nenuw chuve jao aeng enjiinii lam emamoh vaang ichii vasah vachuw, changvakonchu atiive nenuw nenlaetha aacheer vokhehkho eengahpeeh Aafhuw ningtingche hunganrisachuw.
Enuw ing nenongtuchu aajaehmeh ynthiingva vokhehkho ynjasuwhva ichiichu muvaatae.
Nenuw nensakniichu taangna ynthongchuw sam iphen, sana sanak nenten vokhehkho isapak peendiir ingkhe ynsuwhmah rasii.
Changvakonchu mik barengna amen iruwpak maangmah vachii iduwrjaeh re isa ivaar laetha yndangchehmah barungriir inche nensakniichu ynsuwhrasii.
Chukhaenache isivasahna ynthiing rupanuw aenche eningmandenchu Thangnang ningna siiaeka enfhuwsarsah dernache isiae inche emasak saknii ing entu.
Havi vaange Sara ing Abraham chu aafhuw taka achongriir amanjii. Nenuw atii ichiifhuw omchu chiiru ing ichumchu tutanuwve, nenuw ama asanuwchu vachuw.
Akuurchiimna, nenuw nengkheng barungriir yngkhehpang, yngkheh yngkheh ningsiih, unae ningsiih vaang, mee achaarpeeh vokhehkho ynjuursah ing omruw.
Isamah khaena isamah ing barimahruw, ithipak ing eesaetahna ithipak ing vesaereeh mahruw, ama changdenna bor piruw, akhaechuve nenuw ing bor nenphanii khaenache havi khaena yngeenva.
Ynthiing thiimziih ing ariirchuve,
“Nungae ringkum aning amansiih vokhehkho isa iniichu muningka achii mee inche,
isamah tangmah ichong vokhehkho ichummah chong iriir manchenrasii.
Ama ing isamah nongtu tanii hunganrisana amanche ichumchu turasiing;
ama ing idaechu jongsana atuwhnii ing turasiing.
Akhaechuve Aafhuw ing ichum ynthiing ae taklina aabuwrnah vokhehkho enthamsah nache arungaepeehnah;
changvakonchu isamah atu mee chuve rupeehmah.”
Nenuw isachu tunungka nenchii raenche nentaklina isamah tuvachiichu achuwva?
Changvakonchu nenuw ing ichum khaena ijachaam khaang tanuwve bor nenphava. Enuwchu chiimah aeruw vokhehkho jamahruw.

Changvakonchu nenbarungriir sungna Khrista chu ynthiing Aafhuwva tanuwna ruruw. Apha vakhaena neningna om ningmandenchu riirruw ta ae naka ynsii ae raenche ynsangnii khaena thoraang tujaehruw, chang-vakonchu iduwrjaeh ing vokhehkho ynjasah thoh ynruw ing turuw;
Vokhehkho nenruwthuwhchu manthiing rasiing, amana chembe Khrista aanuwjii yngkheh ing isa nenongtu nache isamah ing chong ae naka ningjak ympiae raenche ningjak phasa vaate.
Thangnang ing havi amandenchu vanave, nenuw ing isamah nentutahna ijachaam nengkhaang changve, isa nentutahna ijachaam nengkhaang inche saksehna.

Thangnang ningtingche nenuwchu ihenruwnii khaenache ichummah ae changdenna Khrista ing isii icher khaena vokhehpang ynthikpeehpa; atakchu hakchaang nache thiksa, changvakonchu laetha nache aman-ringpa,
amanche alaetha iring inche sika kaeshum sungna ong laetha ae ningnache ama ing avatongpa.

Ajae Noah aaniina ruwkuwngchu aturaenche, Thangnang ing iseehpak ing khaangka ahah ae raenche laetha aenche chongriir manjiimah ae; ruwkuwng sungnache mee topohpang ae, amachuve mee eeriih rikchu chii inche akarpae,

chii inche amachu vaangche baptais yntu inche atii nenuwchu yngkarpa. Havi hakchaangna imang ynrinii khaena mahva changvakonchu Jesu Khrista ihangring ajaarnache, Thangnang yntongting isa barungriir om ajong-niiva.
Aafhuw chuve thangbaen ting karka, vaarmee aekho, ruwreng om vokhehkho aatuaricheh aekho aangkhenglaang aderna amangompa.

Khrista ing hakchaangna ijachaam akhaang vakhaka, nenuwkho amathoh aanghak ing nenbarungriirchu ama ing amanden thoh aanghakjaeh ing manpirruw; akhaechuve hakchaangna ijachaam akhaang vasah mee inche isiichu abathen chehnah.
Atii basen naka nenringkumchu laaruw mee ing amanden nache ringru ing, Thangnang ing amanden nache iringnii khaena chenva.

Akhaechuve ichuwhmah nong, hakchaang ing aadik, juw ynruw, ichuwhmahna inungae, juw in yntaarnii, vokhehkho umlae ruthaksii irum, hava vakhae i reentaang mee aeng entu enrina nenuw ing isivasahna nentukha atii manchenruw ynsuwhsa.
Havana nong vakhaene nenuw ing enuwthoh ynruw ing ichuwhmah nongnache ynvae ynreen vakhae nenbathen tahnache, enuw ing ruwriimnii ing manden aeka ithipak ing chongnae.
Changvakonchu iring ae vokhehkho ithii aechu vajeer tunii khaena thoraang atu Aafhuw ningnache entaksah ing akhaechu pisavaatae.
Chukhaena chenva ithii aechu laaruw mee hakchaang inuwzii ing vajeer yntu vakhangnare, laetha nache enuwkho Thangnang iring vaang iringnii khaena ening nakho isa chongchu yntongva.
Aangkhenglaang chiimchirvachii apha ynneengsa, chukhaenache nenuw nenbarungriir suwrnuwna vokhehkho ithamnii khaena ynriimruw.
Aangkhenglaangna athurfhuwseh chuve nenuw yngkheh yngkheh ningsiih omnii khaenache barungriir manruwhruw, akhaechuve ningsiih inche isii aajaehchu abaruw chehsa.
Yngkheh yngkheh ynriirsah omru ing mee vakhaechu bariimsahnii turuw.
Mee yngkheh khehna isa rukuumtu yngkhheh ynsuwhnii inche asiksik Thangnang kikthuurchu, Thangnang tanii isaseh kikthuur apha khaena reentaang areh ae saknii khaenache nongtunii vachiiva.

Achuw yngkheh mee ing chongnave, Thangnang chong vaang jeerrasiing; achuw yngkheh mee ing nongchu tunave, Thangnang ing apeeh ruwreng thoh ynruw ing turasiing; ama inche aangkhengna Thangnang chu Jesu Khrista ajaarna ympahnii khaenava. Aafhuw ningnache ichen naemah alaar isa vokhehkho ruwreng omna. Amen.
Kaningsiih kaarang ae, nenuwchu chaang ennii khaena nentaklina ijachaampak itheng nakhe, laanglam ruwriimniipak neningna isuwh varam tanuwna ngikmahruw.
Changvakonchu Khrista alaar isachu aandanglaenche athiseh ing nungaepak inche nenrotha rohnii khaenache, Khrista ijachaamchu sarup phahaknii khaena nenrotha manrohruw.
Nenuwchu Khrista khaena ningjak ipiae nave bor nenphava; akhaechuve alaar isa laetha vokhehkho Thangnang laetha inche nentaklina ongva.
Changvakonchu nenuw achuw ingkho miktheh, lamruw, isamah atu, changmahka reentaang tanii mee chongriirna ynvae thaangthaang mee ynsuwhka ijachaam akhaang vaangkhe tamahruw.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh inche Khristen yngkheh ynsuwh ing ijachaamchu khaangnave aning manjakmah rasiing, changvakonchu ama khaenache ama ing Thangnang manpah rasii.
Thangnang eengkuw sungnache vajeer tunii aphachu ynneengsa, amachu ynning nache maensa ing basen nave, Thangnang isa chong amanjiimah ae ningnache achiimniichu ynchii ynsuwhvaate?
Akhaechuve
“Ichum ynthiing aechu iruwpak ing karpeeh ae nave;
Thangnang yndenmah ae vokhehkho isii icher mee aechu ynchii ynsuwh vaatae?”
Chukhaenache Thangnang ing amandenna ijachaam akhaang ae inche ichum tuae sana vokhehkho enlaethachu thachafhuw Aaseem Aafhuw ningnache mansir ae rasii.
Khrista ing ijachaam apha saarkhii ipeehjaeh mahka yn-dangvachii alaar isachu karutum ynvae upa yngkheh ynsuwh ki ing, ruwrthiing sungna upa ae nenuwchu kathohsahnahchuw.
Neningna ymmansir jao ruwrkheh aekha itumah arumah vaang taru ing, tuningka ichiipak ing icheerpeeh aeruw, kaaniiva nenchiipang ing tumahruw changvakonchu atatak ing tuningka ichii ing itupeehruw,
neningna icheernii khaena ymmansir entakli-nakhe aafhuw vaang taru ing, enuw ing nenu manjiiva enchii yngkheh ynsuwhruw.
Amana aanchung jaocheer ing ajungindanglaenche nenuw ing chuwrmah vachii alaar isa phurchiichu phavanenta.

Amavaangche naepang ae nenuw upa ae dernache siruw. Amanche nenuw nengkheng yngkheh ing yng-kheh taklina ynjuursah thoh ynruw ing rukuum ynturuw, akhaechuve, “Thangnang ing ynding aechu rumah, changvakonchu ynjuursah ae ningnache tungsiihchu apeehnah.”
Chukhaenache aacheh Thangnang kik dernache nentaksah ynjuursaruw, amana chembe apha acharaenche ama ing nenuwchu eethoh vaata.
Nenjanii aangkheng aningna verenruw, akhaechuve ama ing nengkhaena ymmandenpeehnah.
Ynriimjaehruw, hahjaehruw. Nenuwchu eejeehnii Umlae inche nongsha vaang ynlenka achuw yng-khehchu isahnii khaena ajongnah.
Nenuw nenthacha mancheep nuwna atakchu rumahruw, akhaechuve havi vaange laaruw paamne nenguw nenae ae inchenkho maesa engaantuwhfhuw vasahva ichii nenuw ing manghuwruw.

Nenuw ing apha topoh khaena ijachaam nenpha aanuwnache, ichen naemah Khrista alaar isa khaena nenuwchu yngeen, tungsiih aangkheng Aafhuw Thangnang atakrap inche imanthiing vaata, imanehther vaata vokhehkho imanpir vaata.
Aningnache ichi naemah ruwreng aangkheng om ynsuwhrasii. Amen.
Yngkheh yngkheh ningsiih ibeeng yntum nuwna salaam ynturuw.
Khrista ningna ong nening nache idaechu omrasii.

Jesu Khrista, meenae vokhehkho chongthang ynsuwh Simon Pitar ki ing, inuw yngkhaena Thangnang vokhehkho eekarpeeh ynsuwh Jesu Khrista ichum nache kenuwthoh ynruw ing amen iruwpak thacha aanghak ing ymphahak ae ningna:
Thangnang re inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista nemanghuw khaena tungsiih vokhehkho idaechu neningna henthisehseh rasiing.
Thangnang ruwreng inche Aafhuw atakshrap alaar isa re isa inche inuwchu yngeen atakchu ymmanghuw ajaarna iringnii vokhehkho Thangnang yndennii aangkheng ynning nache ympipa.

Aafhuw ing ynning nache athiseh iruungpak vokhehkho amen iruwpak chongreep vakhaechu ympisahpa, amatah nache hava vakhae ajaarne nenuw ing hakchaang inuwzii ing nemanden laaruw paamna om imaang tanii ihangring phatanuwka, Thangnang ta ynsuwh iphahakniichu nengaansuwhnii khaenava.
Havi khaena rapche nenuw ing nentu nenri chaapna nencheh vakhae nenthacha taklinache isachu vemangomruw, isa nache yng-huwnii;
vokhehkho ynghuwnii nache nentaksah yngahchehnii; yngahchehnii nache ikhaangchehnii; ikhaangcheh-nii nache Thangnang yndennii;
Thangnang yndennii nache unaethoh ningsiihhaknii; amana unaethoh ningsiihhaknii nache ningsiihchu mangomruw.
Hava vakhae i nening nache vaehmahdeh nave, inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista chu icheep ing ynghuwnii khaena hava vakhae inge nenuwchu nenchehmah vokhehkho aanla omahchu ibasuwmahnii.
Aangkhenglaang havi aningna omah mee chuve, aningna om baruw isiicher amanthiingchu bahirka, ynneengna om amuchehmah mikchu vaang tasa.
Ama khaenache kauw kanae ae, nenuwchu yngeen vokhehkho eeteerchu acheepnii ing athiseh ing idiktherruw, nenuw ing havi jinge tutanuwve utaraenkho nengkhi mansiimah tanuw;
vokhehkho Aafhuw Jesu Khrista alipah nache ivaruwhnii nengkhaenache ynriimjor ing ipivaata.
Chukhaenache nenuw vakhae ing manghuw tanuwka neningna om ichum nache icheep ing omkhang tanuwre, havi khaene neningna apha om bakhaena manthangva kata.
Ki ing khurpeenthaam sungne kaong raentaang nenuwchu ynthangpeeh chumna ichii ing kamandenva.
Akhaechuve inuw vakhae Jesu Khrista ing kaningna ynjeerpeeh inuwzii ing, khurpeenthaam havi bathenva kachii aphachu hunganeeng hak haksa ichii kamanghuwsa.
Amana kathik aanuwting apha vakhaena nenuw ing hava vakhae i nengaansiinii khaena kacheh vakhae tusava kata.

Akhaechuve kenuw ing inuw vakhae Aafhuw Jesu Khrista aruwreng ipir vokhehkho atak ijungthengchu neningna kemanthang laenkhe hungsa vemansa tumah ung, changvakonchu Aafhuw aruungniichu kemikrap ing kemusah mee chupung.

Jesu ing ampa Thangnang ningtanii athang isa vokhehkho alaar isachu apha khaenache, iruungpak alaar isa ampa senruwr ing ajeriir, “Havi kaning kamansiihpak kasapa chuva, ataklina ki inempak pensakning.”
Vokhehkho kenuw ing Aafhuw thohche ynthiing bungna kengonglaenche, hava senruwr i thangbaen tanii kenuw ing kensiiva.

Amatah nache keningna om Thangnang tanii chongsaechu athiseh ing icheep sehsehva; hava chongne nenuw ing khuw avaarmahri raentaang vokhehkho nenbarungriirna ireng ziing aesiichu ahungsuwh mahtaang, ynthim aruwvaena jaemi ireng nache nenbarungriir nemanruwh vaangkhe nenuw isajaeh ing turuw.
Ynthiing thimziih ing ajeerchaap vakhae i barungriir tanii ihungsuwh yntanga omah ichiichu amaensana manghuwruw.
Thangnang chongjeer i mee ningtanii ihungsuwh changchii mahva, changvakonchu ynthiing laetha ing ataklina ongvaangka amanchongpehva.

Ichummah jaephar aenche mee kaarna hungsuwhsae, havi vaange nengkaarna ynraar ing aanchuw mee ae hunganphuwng vaatae. Enuw ing mee maangnii vachii ichummah thamin henreen vaatae, amanche akarpeeh ae Aafhuw chu rumah ae naka manghuw mangharu ing entaksah maangnii vachii henreensa vaatae.
Vokhehkho ichuwh thaemah enlamchu mee aanem inche jiinaka, enuw ing entu enri inche ichum lam taklina mee ae ing ithipak ing chongvaatae.
Enuw engkaraam inche ynraar chong inche ijuwrfhuw peehvaang nenuw isichinnii vaatae; ichiichuve ajae enuwchu imaangnii ting ababuw meekha katarmah vokhehkho jaarmah.
Akhaechuve vaarmee ae ing isii enrangtahna Thangnang ing enuwchu karpeehmah aeka vajeernii khaena asiih aechu longkong ynthim khurting siiae nave,

vokhehkho baruw laaruw paamchu karpeehru ing, Aafhuw ing Thangnang emanghuwmah aeng laaruw paamna empaarlae chii iruungpak ing amanriim raenche, ichum chong ariir Noah chu reentaang mee sarii thoh ynruw ing siihjaeh nave;

changpang mahka Sodom vokhehkho Gomora khuwruung ynniimehchu rungvuwh auur ing mamaang naka manraar nave, vokhehkho Thangnang emanghuwmah ae taklina hungsuwhvachii aman-dangniichu enuw ynsuwhpae nave;
vokhehkho ichamah entu enri ing inempak amanja ae ichum ynthiing Lot chu karpeeh nave,
(amachuve ichum ynthiing mee inche engkaarna ipaar emu, ensiirae, anasiir ichum ynthiing alaethachu chongriir ynjiimah nong inche ajeehnii ae),

amatah nache Aafhuw inche ijachaam aajaeh ing amansin ae Thangnang ynden aechu ikarpeehnii amanghuwpa vokhehkho ichamah aechu vajeer aanii khaenache ynsaangkhe ijachaam phanii nache siiva kachiipae ichiichu amanghuwpa,
athurfhuwseh ing ensa ing aadik inuw ajiiae vokhehkho Thangnang ruwreng arathiih ae khaenache ynsuwhsa.
Hava ynraar ing aanchuw mee ae inge thona isa ing vokhekho ynding ing enlaar isa om ae taklinache ithipak ing ichong chiimahsae.
Vokhehkho vaarmee aerap ingkho entu enrichehnii ruwreng ipir deen ae khangnare, Aafhuw maanache entaklina ithipak ing chongmah ae.

Changvakonchu hangchii mee ae inge, mee suwrnii, amamaangnii khaena abasenraennii ing sha ae vaang jungom vasah envakhar omah hungsi vasi ae vaang emanghuwmah khaenache, vokhehkho ithipak ing ichong ae khaenache enuw sha ae vaang maangvaatae.

Jinge ichii ing ichum ynthiingmah entu aphor inche ynraaarchu emphanah ae; siimna kaethok aeka ike aechu nungaenii kuurvava ichii ing ariae inche nenuw thoh nensahpoh nenginpoh raenche emare om ing kaethoknae; enuw ae i ibuwr ikah vokhehkho ymmak meepae.

Enuw ae i emik barengna rupanuw taklina ichuwhmah ing sipna, amanche emik bareng inche isii arangchu chenmah, enuw ing abarungriir ingiirmah mee aechu abatheemnah ae; enuw i embarungriir ikaamniichu om vasahva. Chukhaenache enuw ichuve isamah siraap apha siti chupae.
Enuw ing ichum lamchu bathen aeka, Bior sapa Balaam alamchu jiiaeka aasiirting sisae; Balaam ing ynraar nong atu menchu enuw ingkho engadikpa,
changvakonchu ama ing atusah arisah isii khaenache ynrakuh aphapa; Achong isuwhmah sha Lola ing mee iruur ing hangchongka jaephar ynveeh nongchu akhaampa.
Enuw ae i chii ikang chiirum vokhehkho sii ivaraang ing araenchak ruwrduhpae; engkhaenache ymthimna ymthimdehchu asiihpa.
Ikanii omahvachii ynding ing chong aeka, enuw ing ichummahna ipaar mee ae tanii ihungpaarpeh aechu, hakchaang ing aadik peeh inche abatheemnah ae.
Enuw ing mee aechu ruwkuwrjoh phanii khaena chongreep tupeeh aeka, entak chuve maangvachii suwhchu ynsuwhsae; akhaechuve achuw yngkhehchu achehcheh ama mee inche achiirkhi abasuwnah.

Amachuve enuw ing eekarpeeh Aafhuw Khrista chu emanghuw ajaarna laaruw paamna isamah chaap nongtanii iring empha aanuwting, isamah nongnache athar vokheh tiih ae nave, engkhaena akuurchiimnii matachu amaensa nakha ithi ing sakmahnii.
Yngkhaena ynchii imbe ichum lamchu enuw ing manghuw aeka, eningna ympivasah ynthiing chonghak tanii yngheer aekha ithi ing enuw ing emanghuwmah rideh inche engkhaena sakseh vachiiva.
Ichum chongthram ing ajeerchu eningna hungsuwhsa amachuve, “Uti ing asoh vasah vokheh vaanrireehka avasahnah,” amanche “Ynchaampeh vasah voh ing athar vokheh inuungting vaanbuwr reehna.”
Kaningsiih ae, hava inge atii ki ing neningna avomaniinii kabaziih chongthenva. Hava aaniimehne ki ing nenuwchu manthangniichuw ingka ynthiing nenbarungriirchu kathohsahva;
ynthiing jaephar aeng ajae enjeervasah chong khare nenchongthang ae jaarna eekarpeeh Aafhuw chonghak amakha nenuw ing nengaansiinii khaenava.
Havi amaensana manghuwruw amachuve, achiniipha inii nache ymmaniisah aengkhe entaksahrap ing engadik inuwchu jiiae naka, ymmaniisah aethoh ynruw ing theng ae naka tavaatae,
“Aafhuw ing jungtheng vakata taka chongreep atuchu ukhova chang? Afhuw apuw aeng enthik raennii inii tha peehchae ynseem vasah aangkheng ynlaaprudeh ing omjaehtah kachang.”
Havi ajae basenka Thangnang chonghak ajaarna thangbaen re laaruw ynseemchu havana mee aenge emanghuwbroh ing runungka tamahsae.
Laaruw i chii tanii ing hungomka vokhehkho chii ajaarnache omba, amanche chii riimka baruw laaruw paam amamaangchu chii yngenva.

Changvakonchu thangbaen vakhae vokhehkho ataraennii laaruw paam om i Thangnang chongsae khajaeh ingkhe mi ing bathunii khaena asiihjaehva, enuw i vajeer iniichu aphamahri raentaang vokhehkho Thangnang yndenmah ae amamaangnii khaenache aseehjaehpa.
Chukhaenache kaningsiih ae, hava chong i nenuw bahirmahruw, akhaechuve Aafhuw ningna inii nikheh i kum lising yngkheh thoh aanghakva, vokhehkho kum lising yngkheh i inii nikheh pangthoh aanghakva.

Aafhuw i achongreep tapna ta aeka mee topoh aeng emanden vaangkhe, Aafhuw chuve achongreep nache itapmahva nengkhaena iseeh ing yngkhaangpeeh vatah; Aafhuw ama ing achuwkho maangnaka tamahdeh, changvakonchu mee aangkheng barungriir ihuungchu aadikva.

Changvakonchu Aafhuw aanii chuve lamruw vaangkhe ynghuw ynghamah ing thengvaata; ama inii nache minvaen ing ahuwruwsa ipirpak ing baring naka maangvaata, amanache amen iruwpak peehchae vakhaechu mi ynsa inche deeng naka chuwmchir vaata, changlaenche laaruw paam vokhehkho asungna om nongtu chaap mi ing bathuchir vaata.

Peeh aangkhenglaang jinge ichii ing chuwmchir vachii khaenache, Thangnang aanii thengvachii aphachu hahnuwna vokhehkho barungriir iruwh ing idiknuwna, nenuw ynthiing ing paarruw. Thangnang yndenchu mahnaka nenuw ynchii mee ynsuwhva nenchiiva!
Ama inii nache minvaenchu mi ing kaangnaka chuwmvaata, vokhehkho amen iruwpak peeh vakhae mi ynsa ing kaangnaka chuwmdeh vaata.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw achongreep inuwzii ing ichum ing ipaar, ithar thangbaen vokhehkho itharpeh laaruw paam amachu ynghahjaehva.
Kaningsiih ae, havi khaene nenuw ing nenghahjaeh vakhaka, Aafhuw mik enna ynthiing ing vokhehkho isamahna thang isimah ing amanche Thangnang thohche idae ing ipaarniichu turuw.

Vokhehkho Aafhuw ing manlahka yngkhaangpeehchu manlaenpeeh phanii khaenava ichii ing riruw. Inuw vakhae ing ning ymmansiih Pol ingkho, ataklina ajepeeh losing inuwzii ing neningna abaziih khajaeh vatah. Ama athiimziih aangkhenglaang nakho hava chong khaene ama ing ynjeerpeeh khajaeh vatah.

Ama sungne chong topoh chuve ynghuwnii ruwpakna; amachu ihaesingmah aeng vokhehkho barungriirna ingiirmah aeng reentaang thiimziih ynthiing chukho henbreh avebreh ae vaangkhe, entaksahrap imaangnii ipha ing henbreh avebrehnah ae.
Chukhaenache kaningsiih ae, hava chong khaene maensa ing manghuw nuwna, ichamah ae emiraar ing ivakuwm ae naka nencheepnii nakhe isamahting athar ibuwkho arusa tanuwna nentiihniimah ing ynriimruw.

Tungsiih vokhehkho inuw Aafhuw kho eekarpeeh Aafhuw kho ynsuwh Jesu Khrista ynghuwtah nache hungruungruw. Aafhuw ningnache alaar isachu ataraenkho ichen naemah ipha ingkho omjaehchu ynsuwhrasiing. Amen.
Iringnii chongsae inche aandanglae kenuw ing kemupa, chukhaenache keningna amandang apa Thangnang thoh omhak ichen naemah ringkum khaenache asaarkhii ynsuwh ungka neningna kenriirva.
Kenuw ing kemu vokhehkho kensiichu nening nakho kemanthangva, amana chembe kenuw ing ampa vokhehkho asapa Jesu Khrista thoh kempurnii nache nenuwkho ynvaeva nenta.
Havana kenbaziih inge kenbarung ngamniichu ynsuwh vaata.
Kenuw ing Aafhuw tanii isa chong siiungka neningna kemanthang chongchu haviva; Thangnang chuve irengva, Aafhuw ningnache ynthimchu omahdeh.
Chunuwnave, inuw vakhae Aafhuw thohche iringnii ymphahakva tamanuwka ynthim tingche simanuwve, inuw i ynchong vokhehkho yntu ynrina mee ymmanchaeva.
Changvakonchu Aafhuw ing irengna omvaang inuwkho irengnache ongmanuwve, inuw yngkheh yngkheh barungriir ynneeng samuw vokhehkho Jesu Khrista sii inche aangkheng ymmanthiingpa.
Changvakonchu ynningna isii omahdehsa tamanuwve, yntaksah ynchaesah vamuw amanche ichumchu yntaklina omahsa.
Yntaklina isii icherchu Thangnang ningna riirsa manuwve, ama achongreep omvasah inuwzii ing inuw vakhaechu ikuhpeeh vaata amanche yntu ynrina ynraar vakhae chukho imanthiingpeeh vaata.
Inuw ing isii tumahmuw tamanuwve, apa Thangnang chu ymmanchaeva vokhehkho yntaklina ynthiing chongchu omahsa.

Kaning mansiih naepang ae, nenuw vakhae isii nentuniimah khaenache ki ing neningna hava vakhae i kabaziihva. Achuw yngkheh ing isii tunave, apa Thangnang ningna inuw yngkhaena eenuwmpeeh Jesu Khrista omna.
Changpang mahka yntaklina isiicher vakhaechu Aafhuw Jesu Khrista jaarna yngkuhva vokhehkho inuw yngkhaenapang khommahva, changvakonchu mee vakhae isiicher chukhomva.
Inuw ing Aafhuw chonghak vakhae manjii manuwve, Aafhuw chu inuw ing ymmanghuwva.
Achuw yngkheh ing Aafhuw chu kamanghuwsa tanaka achonghakchu manjiimah nave, changchii meechu ynchaenii chong ing ichongva vokhehkho aningna ichum omahva.
Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing Aafhuw chongchu manjiinave, Aafhuw chu atatak ing aning amansiih mee yngkheh chuva. Chukhaenache Thangnang thoh onghakmuw ichiichu iseengjaeh ing ymmanghuwsa.
Achuw mee yngkheh ing Thangnang thoh onghakping tanave, Jesu Khrista ing atu arichaap manjiiva chiiva.

Changvakonchu ki ing neningna atarae kajebaziih chonghak i tharna, akhaechuve hava ichum i Khrista ningna vokhehkho neningna yndangna. Yngkhaena Ynchii imbe ynthimchu aaraenpa amanche ichum ireng inche aenpa.
Achuw yngkheh ing irengna ongning tanaka auwnaechu batir nave, ama meechu ataraenpha ynthim nache ongjaehna.
Achuw mee yngkheh ing auw anaechu aning mansiih nave, ivaar nache ongva, mee isiiting mambuknii vachii aningna yntanga omah.
Changvakonchu auw anaechu batir nave, ynthim nache ongjaehna; ama mee inche uting isiping ichii manghuwru ing ynthim nache sina, yngkhaena ynchii imbe ynthim inche amamupa.
Kasitiae, ki ing neningna kabaziihnah, akhaechuve Khrista ajaarnache nentaklina isii vakhaechu akuhchirpa.
Ampa vakhae neningna kabaziihnah, akhaechuve abasenlimna heom vasahva ichii nenuw ing nemanghuwsa. Suwnthar naepang ae neningna kajebaziihnah, akhaechuve isiichu nenuw ing nenchehpa.

Kasiti ae neningna kajebaziihnah, yngkhaena ynchii imbe apa ichiichu nenuw ing nemanghuwsa. Ampa vakhae neningna kajebaziihnah, nenuw ing abasenlimna heom vasahva ichii nemanghuwsa. Suwnthar naepang ae neningna kajebaziihnah, amachuve nenuw pirther nachuw; amanche neningna Thangnang chongchu omna, vokhehkho isiichu nenchehpa.
Laaruw paam vokhehkho laaruw paamna om peehchae vakhae i nening mansiih mahruw. Laaruw paam i nening mansiih tanuwve, apa Thang-nang chu nening mansiihmah sachuw.

Laaruw paamna om aangkhenglaang ynsha ing eedik isii icher, laaruw mee ing amu vokhehkho aadik vakhae, mee ing aangaenii laaruw paamna om vakhae i apa Thangnang ningtanii mahdehva; hava vakhae ichuve laaruw paam tanii vatah.
Laaruw paam vokhehkho asungna om mee ing aadik vakhae i achiimnii apha naena; changvakonchu Thangnang ing amanden amanjii mee vakhae chuve ichen naemah ing ringvaata.

Kasiti ae achiniichu junganeengsa! Khrista arumah meechu thengvaata ichii i neningna maen ing ynthang vasahva; atiive Khrista arumah inempak hungindangsae, havi inge achiniichu ynneengsa ichii ymmang-huwsa.

Hava mee ae i inuw yngkaar tanii mee mahpae, chukhaenache inuwchu ymbathenpae; enuw ae i yngkaar taniipae vanave yngkaarna ongvachiipae. Amatah nache ymbathen ae inge inuw yngkaar tanii mahpae ichii iseengjaeh ing yndangnii khaena ymbathenpae.
Changvakonchu nenuw chuve laetha ynthiing ing ymmansip vasahva, chutahnache nenuw vakhae ing ichumchu nemanghuwsa.

Chukhae-nache neningna kajebaziih i nenuw ing ichumchu nemanghuwmah khaena mahva; changvakonchu nenuw ing nemanghuw vasah khaena chenva, vokhehkho ynchae ichii ive utaraenkho ichum tanii mahva ichii nemanghuwsa.
Changmanuwve, mee ynchae ichii i achuw chuva? Jesu i eekarpeeh chumahva tanaka ariirchu Khrista arumah mee chuva-ama ing ampa vokhehkho asapa chu rumahsa.
Achuw yngkheh ing asapa chu rumahnave ampa chukho arumahva, achuw yngkheh ing asapa chu runave ampa chukho aruva.
Chukhaenache nensii vasahchu neningna omjaeh rasii. Nenuw ing abasenlimna nensii vasahchu nening-na omjaeh nave, nenuwkho apha omba khaena asapa re ampa ningnache omjaehva nenta.
Havirem iva Khrista ing yngkhaena chongreep atuvasah ichen naemah ringkumchu.
Havana kajebaziih i nenuwchu manchae kenchuw ynchiiae khaenava.

Changvakonchu nengkhaena chembe Khrista ing ynthiing laetha inche ymmansip vasahva. Havana laetha i neningna aomraentaang, nenuwchu ynchuwnii ompakmah. Laetha inche aangkhenglaang ymmanchuwpa, ama ing ymmanchuwchu ichumva, ichummah chumahva. Laetha ing ymmanchuwchu manjiiruw amanche Khrista thohche yngkhehpang ing omjaehruw.
Kasiti ae, apha om bakhaena ama thohche ynneengjaehruw, ama ajungtheng iniina aandanglaenche thona isa ing ynsipnii khaena amanche ynning ynjak ing ymmae ithuur ymphaniimah khaena chenva.
Khrista ichuve ichum ynthiing chuva ichii i nemanghuwsa; atiive nenuw manghuwruw amachuve, ichum atu mee aechu Thangnang siti chupae.

Kauw kanae ae, atiive inuw Thangnang siti samuw, changvakonchu ynchii ynsuwhvataruw ichii chuve manghuwkiir mahmuw. Khrista inche aandanglaenche inuw i ama vaang tavataruw, akhaechuve atakchu iseengjaeh ing muvataruw.
Achuw yngkheh ing Khrista ningna ningmanden mangom nave Khrista ing ynthiing vaang atak manthiing vaata.
Achuw yngkheh ing Thangnang vajeer chonghakchu bakhii nave isii miraarchu aningna omna. Akhaechuve vajeer chonghak yngkhii ichuve isiiva.
Khrista ijungtheng i isii kuhnii khaenava vokhehkho aningna isii yntangakho omah ichii i nemanghuwsa.
Chukhaenache achuw mee yngkheh ing Khrista thoh ongjaeh nave, ama ing athar vokheh isii tumahnii; changvakonchu isiichu tunave Thangnang chu mumahsa vokhehkho manghuwmahsa.
Kasiti ae, achuw ingkho nenuwchu imanchaemah rasiing, Khrista ing ichum ynthiing vaang inge achuw yngkheh ing ichumchu tutanuwve ichum ynthiing meechu vachuw.
Achuw yngkheh ing isiichu tujaehnave ama umlae meesa, akhaechuve abasenlimna umlae chuve isii atuva. Umlae ing atu ari chaapchu mamaangnii khaena Thangnang sapa i ijuwngva.
Achuw yngkheh inche isii tujaeh-mah nave Thangnang siti chusa, akhaechuve Thangnang taklina omchu aningnakho omsa; amanche Thangnang chu ampa vakhaka isiichu tumahsa.
Havi inge Thangnang sitiae re Umlae siti aantheepniichu iseengkiir ing amandangsa. Achuw yngkheh ing ichumchu tumahnaka vokhehkho auw anaechu aning mansiihmah nave Thangnang siti chumahsa.

Inuw Ken khavaang tamah vaan-chiiva; amave umlae meeva, amatah nache anaepa Abel athehva. Ken ing yngkhaena amachu athehva? Akhaechuve Ken ing atu ari chaapchu ynraarka, anaepa Abel ing atu ari chaapchu achumtah nachenva.
Kauw kanae ae, laaruw paam mee aeng ibatir khang ae nakho ngikmahruw.
Ithii bathen muwka iring tingche huungsamuw ichii inuw ing ymmanghuwsa, amachuve unae aechu ynning ymmmansiih tahnava. Achuw yngkheh ing aning mansiih chehmah nave ithii ruwreng dernache ongjaehna.
Achuw yngkheh ing auw anaechu batir nave ama meechu mikthehva, miktheh khaena chembe ichen naemah ringkum omahsa ichii i nemanghuwsa.
Havi inge ningsiih i ynchiiva ichiichu ymmanghuwsa amachuve, Khrista ing inuw yngkhaena aringkum ympidehsa. Chukhaenache inuwkho unae khaena ynringkum i pivaan chiiva.
Savangpa yngkheh ing auwnae ing adeen samahchu munaka, engkhaena abarungriir imongmah nave, ynsaangkhe Thangnang kaning kamansiihva tachehvate?
Kasiti ae, ningsiih ichii ive chong ymbuwh muwka ichonghak chumahva; nong ing yndang ichum ningsiih chuva chiiva.
Havi inge ichum tanii vamuw ichii manghuw vaanchiiva; amanche Thangnang ningna barungriir mangam vaanchiiva.
Ruwthuwhna ihungsuwh ing imanraar nave, Thangnang chuve ruwthuwh ruwreng chungna mangkaangsehna vokheh-kho aangkhengna amanghuw chirsa ichii inuw ing ymmanghuwsa.
Chu-tahnache kauw kanae ae, ruwthuwhna ihungsuwh ing imanraarmah nave, Thangnang maekungna thona isa yndeensa.
Aningna ynniihsah vakhae ymphasa, akhaechuve achonghak ymmanjii vokhehkho apensannii yntutah nachenva.
Ama achonghak chuve Jesu Khrista ningna ynden vokhehkho Khrista chonghak ing ariir yngkheh re yngkheh ningsiih omva nenchiiva ichii ynjiicheh chuva.

Achuw yngkheh ing Thangnang chonghakchu manjiinave, Thangnang thohche yngkhehpang ing onghaksa. Thangnang ing laetha ynthiing ynningna ynjepeeh khaenache, Thangnang re inuwchu yngkhehpang ing omsamuw ichii ymmanghuwsa.

Kauw kanae ae, laetha ynthiing kaningna omna achii mee chaap thacha mahruw, changvakonchu eningna om laethachu Thangnang ningtaniiva ningtanii mahva ichiichu nenuw ing ibuwrnehruw. Akhaechuve ichummah jaephar aajaeh ing apham aangkhenglaangna sisae.
Jinge ichii ing Thangnang ningtanii laethachu nenuw ing manghuw chehva nenta: Achuw yngkheh mee ing Jesu Khrista ing hakchaang inuwzii ing juwngsa taka aru laetha chaapchu Thang-nang taniiva.

Changvakonchu achuw yngkheh ing havana Jesu Khrista akhae i manghuwmah nave, Thangnang ningtanii ynthiing laetha aningna omah mee chuva. Aningna om laetha chuve Khrista arumah mee ningtaniiva. Hangchii i thengvaata ichiichu nenuw ing nemanghuw vasahva, atii laaruw paamne thengka omsa.
Changvakonchu kasitiae nenuwve Thangnang tavachuw, vokhehkho ichummah jaephar aechu nencheh vasahva, chutahnache neningna om ynthiing laetha i laaruw paam tanii athiseh ing ipirsehva.
Ichummah jaephar ae inge laaruw paam ta khaenapang ichong paetah, vokhehkho laaruw paam ing arungaechu yng-khaenava ynchii imbe enuw laaruw paam ta engaansuwhtah nava.

Changvakonchu inuw chuve Thang-nang tavamuw. Achuw yngkheh ing Thangnang manghuw nave kenuw ing kenriirchu arungaenah; achuw yngkheh Thangnang tamah vanave kenuw ing kenriirchu rungaemahnii ae. Jinge ichii ing ichum laetha vokhehkho ichummah laetha ruwrakna aantheepniichu inuw ing manghuwcheh vataruw.

Kauw kanae ae, yngkheh re yngkheh ningsiih ympitaruw, akhaechuve ningsiih i Thangnang ningtaniiva. Achuw yngkheh ing meechu aning mansiih nave Thangnang siti chuva vokhehkho Thangnang amanghuw mee chuva.
Achuw yngkheh ing mee aning mansiih chehmah nave Thangnang chu amanghuw mahva, akhaechuve Thangnang chuve ningsiihva.
Amanche Thangnang ing inuwchu aning ymmansiih khaena asapa yngkhehpangchu laaruw paamna ynjebathenpeehpa, akhaechuve inuw vakhae ing ama ajaarna iringnii ringkumchu phanii khaena chenva.
Haviva ningsiihchu: Thangnang chu inuw ing ynning ymmansiih tahna mahva, changvakonchu ama ing aning imansiihka inuwchu isii tanii ikuhpeeh phanii khaenache asapa chu ajenbathenpa.
Kauw kanae ae, jinge ichii ing Thangnang ing inuwchu aning ymmansiih vakhaka, inuw yngkheh re yngkheh ningsiih ympivaan chiiva.
Achuw ingkho Thangnang chu mumahri, changvakonchu yngkheh yngkheh ningsiih ympi manuwve, Thangnang thohche inuw yntuwhak vamuw, vokhehkho ynning nache aningsiihchu manthiingsa.
Inuw vakhae i Thangnang thoh yngkhehpang ing om manuw vokhehkho Thangnang i inuwthoh yngkhehpang ing omna ichiichu iseengkiir ing ymmanghuwsa. Akhae-chuve alaethachu ynning nache ympeehpa.
Apa Thangnang ing laaruw paam ikarpeehnii khaena asapa ajebathenchu inuw ing ymmusa vokhehkho reentaang ae ningnakho ynjeersa.
Achuw yngkheh ing Jesu i Thangnang sitiva tanaka riirnave, ama meechu Thangnang thoh yntuw ing ongna vokhehkho Thangnang ingkho amathoh onghakna.
Thang-nang ningsiih ynningna om havi inuw yntaksah ing ymmanghuwsa vokhehkho ynthachasa.
Thangnang i ningsiihva, achuw yngkheh ing ningsiih nache paar-nave, Thangnang thoh yntuw ing paarna vokhehkho Thangnang inche amathohche yntuw ing paarna.

Ynningna ningsiihchu mapung amanphapa, akhaechuve vajeer inii nache inuw ing thona yndeennii khaenava; vokhehkho inuw ing deenvataruw akhaechuve laaruw paamna yngringkum i Khrista thohche aanghaksamuw.
Ningsiih ing ynchik omah; ichum ningsiih ing ynchik om aangkheng athurchirva. Chunave achuw mee yngkheh ing ynchik nave aningna ichum ningsiihchu aommah tahnava, ynchik inche vajeernii vaata.
Inuw ing Thangnang ynning ymmansiih i ama ing amaensana aning ymmansiih tahnava.

Achuw yngkheh ing Thangnang chu kaning kamansiihva tanaka, auwnae batir nave aningna ichum omahsa. Akhaechuve amik ing amu auw anaechu aning mansiih chehmah nave, amumah Thangnang chu aning mansiih chehmahnii.
Thangnang ing chonghak ympeehchu haviva: Thangnang aning amansiih mee inche auwnae chukho aning mansiih vachiiva.
Jesu chu Eekarpeehva ichii ing athacha mee chaapchu Thangnang sitiva; vokhehkho achuw mee yngkheh ing ampachu aning mansiih nave asiti chukho aning amansiihva.
Jinge ichii ing inuw ing Thangnang siti aechu ynning ymmansiihsa ichii ymmanghuwsa: amachuve Thangnang aning amansiih vokhehkho achonghak vakhae amanjii iva.
Thangnang chu aning amansiih ichii ichuve achonghak ynjii chuva vokhehkho achonghakchu inuw yngkhaena iruwpak mahva,
akhaechuve Thangnang siti chaap ing laaruw paam achehnah vokhehkho inuw ynthacha inche laaruw paam ymbathiih chehva.
Achuwva laaruw paam achehchehchu? Jesu i Thangnang sapava taka athacha meepang inche achehcheh vatah.

Chii vokhehkho sii thoh ynruw ing ijuwngchu Jesu Khrista va; chiipang thohchen mahva changvakonchu chii re sii thohche ijuwngva. Amanche laetha rap inche havi chumna taka saarkhii apeehsa, akhaechuve laetha ichuve ichumva.
Saarkhii ynthummeh omna:
Ynthiing laetha, chii vokhehkho sii ipae; hava ynthummeh ae inge ynchimchak ing saarkhii apeehsae.
Inuw ing mee ningtanii saarkhii ynthachanah, changvakonchu Thang-nang saarkhii chuve iruungsehva. Amanche Thangnang ing asapa khaena saarkhiichu apeehpa.

Chukhaenache Thangnang sapa ningna athacha mee inche havana saarkhii i abarungriirna omna, changvakonchu Thangnang athachamah mee chuve ataksahchu mare om ababuwnah; akhaechuve Thangnang ing asapa khaena saarkhii pika ariirchu thacha mahsa.
Saarkhiichu haviva: Thangnang ing ichen naemah iringnii ympeehpa, havana iringnii ichuve asapa ningna omna.
Asapa aru mee inche iringnii aphapa; achuw yngkheh asapa arumah inche iringnii phamahsa.
Thangnang sapa rumingna athacha nenuw vakhae ningna ichen naemah iringniichu omna ichii ynghuwnii khaena ki ing neningna kajebaziihva.
Haviva Thangnang ningna barung ngamniichu: Ama ing amanden inuwzii ing inuw ing niihsa manuwve ynsiipeehnah.
Chukhaenache inuw ing aningna yngheniih chaapchu asiisa ichii manghuw manuwve, inuw ing aningna yngheniih vakhaechu kaphapa ichii ymmanghuwsa.

Achuw yngkheh ing auwnae ing isii atu munave, akhaenache ama ing thampeeh rasiing amanche Thangnang ing iringnii ringkumchu pivaata. Havi kariirnii chuve ithii phaniimah isii omna ichiichu kariirniiva. Ithii phanii isii chukho omna. Amachu havi khaene thamruw kachiimahva.
Ichummah nongchaap isiiva, amanche ithii phaniimah isii omna.
Thangnang ningna ong mee vakhae ing isii tujaehmah ichii inuw ing ymmanghuwsa; Thangnang ningna ong mee inche ataksah rukuum yntusana, amanche isamah ing atakchu vaparchehmah.
Inuw i Thangnang tanii vamuw, vokhehkho laaruw paam aangkheng i isamah dernache ongna ichii ymmanghuwsa.

Thangnang sapa ing juwngka ynningna ynghuwnii ympeehpa ichii ikho inuw ing ymmanghuwsa, atak ichuve ichum Thangnang chuva. Inuw vakhae i asapa thoh yntuw ing ichum Thangnang thohche ongmanuw. Havi ichum Thangnang chuva vokhehkho ichen naemah ringkum chuva.
Kaning mansiih kasitiae, ichummah lae ruthaksii tanii yndah ing ongruw.

Ynteer vasah sanuw vokhehkho asiti ae ningna, upa yngkheh ynsuwh ing kabaziih sahva. ki ing nenuwchu atatak ichum ing kaning kamansiih-vachuw, vokhehkho kipang ingmahka ichumchu amanghuw vakhae aeng khomba;
keningna apha om vakhaena vokhehkho keningna ichen naeru ing omjaeh vachii ichum khaena chenva.
Apa Thangnang tanii vokhehhko asapa Jesu Khrista ningtanii, tungsiih, ningchuwh vokhehkho idaechu ympeeh ynsuwhrasiing; hava ae i ichum vokhehkho ningsiih inche yntachu ynsuwhrasiing.
Nasiti topoh ae ing Thangnang ing ariir chonghak ichum nache isiae kaantuwhfhuw tahna inempak karotha rohna.
Ataraene, ki ing sanuw naningna ithar chonghak kajebaziih mahva changvakonchu aburna yndeenvasah, yngkheh re yngkheh ningsiih om vaanchiiva ichii khavatah.
Haviva ningsiihchu: Thangnang chonghak chaapchu manjii manuwka paarvaan chiiva. Aburna nasii vaangkhe, nenuw vakhae ningsiih inche paarva nenchiiva.
Jesu Khrista inche hakchaang ing jungthengsa ichii arumah mee inempak laaruw paamne thengsae. Enuw vakhaechu ichummah chupae, vokhehkho khrista arumah chupae.
Chukhaenache nenuw ing nentu nenrichu maangrudeh ing isajaeh ing nongmen ynriimjor ing nenphanii khaena nentaksah ynriimsaruw.
Achuw mee yngkheh ing Khrista ing amanchuw nache iraen naka siniimah nave aningna Thangnang chu omahsa; achuw yngkheh ing amanchuw nache sijaehnave, Thangnang vokhehkho asapa chu aningna omna.
Achuw yngkheh ing naningna thengnaka havana chongjeer i henreenmah nave, na-eensung manruwh mahra vokhehkho bariim mahra.
Achuw yngkheh ing amachu bariim nave, isamah avereenchu savuw emphahakpa.

Naningna ynziihfhuw inempak omna, changvakonchu chepaang vokhehkho mukchii ing baziih ningka tamah ing. Rotharohchu athisehnii khaena nangchu yntuwhfhuw ningchiika thamin jaera tonghak manuwka ichii khaenava.
Ynteer vasah nanaenuw asiti ae ing salaam ynjetusahnah ae.
Kaan-chaarfhuw kaarang nang ing nasha nungae iphanii khaenakho amanche natu narina nungae iphanii khaena kathamsahnah amanche laethana nungaenachii ichii kamanghuwsa.
Nang ing ichumna isichii vokhehkho ichumna namandenchu unae ae ing enriir kasiitahna inempak karotha rohna.
Kasiti ae ing ichumna sinae ichii chong kasiitahna ama chungna rotharohnii reentaang omah.
Kaanchaarfhuw nang ing unae aechu reentaang mee ae khangnare natupeeh naripeeh ae khaenache inempak sakna.
Enuw ing ruwrthiing sungna nang ing eningna ningsiih namandang khaena entongsa. Enuw ing lamkhii ensirae bompeeh ae taniive, amachu Thangnang ing amandenrem chuva.
Khrista nong khaena enuw ing thacha omah mee ae tanii ibomsah pharu aeng lamkhii isi meepae.
Chukhaenache enuw thohne ichumna nong ituhaknii khaena enuwchu inuw ing bom vaanchiipae.
Ki ing ruwrthiing ae ningna chong topoh kabaziihsa; changvakonchu enuw khaena iruwng viningka achii Diotrephes ing inuwchu irumah.

Chukhaenache ki ing thengcheh ningve, ama ing yntaklina atu ari nongchaap, vokhehkho isamah chong ariir chaapchu mandang peehchir vakata. Isamah chongpang inche penmahka, ama ing auwnae vakhae chukho bariimmahsa. Amanache auwnae bariim ningka achii mee ae chukho ruwrthiing tanii athurnah.
Kaanchaarfhuw, isamahchu manjiimahra changvakonchu isachu manjiira. Achuw mee yngkheh ing isachu tunave amachu Thangnang taniiva. Isamah atu mee inche Thangnang chu mumahri.
Mee vakhae ing isapak inche Demetrius taklina saarkhiichu emandangsa. Kenuw ingkho asaarkhiichu kemandangnah vokhehkho saarkhii i ichumva ichii nang ingkho namanghuwsa.
Ki ing inempak baziih saningka kachiinah, changvakonchu pen re mukchii ing baziih ningka tasamah ing.
Nangchu ithupak ing yntuwh-fhuw ningchiika vokhehkho thamin jaera tonghak manuwka ichii ing kamandenpa.
Naningna idaechu omrasiing. Naarang vakhae ing naningna salaam ynjetusahnah ae. Nang ingkho naarang aechu nasalaam jepisa aera.
Ningchuwh, idae vokhehkho ningsiihchu hungnemsehseh ynsuwhrasii.

Kaningsiih ae, ki ing inuw vakhae khaena ynsuwh manlaenpeeh chong khaena ithupak ing ynziihnii khaena kamandensahrae, ynthiing ae ningna vokhehpangna ympeeh vasah thacha ama khaenache barungriir iruwh ing ma itaarnii khaena omrasii ichiichu, ki ing neningna ynziihmah rumahsa.

Akhaechuve achuw yngkheh mee aechu ynruwhjaeh ing taensae; vajeer havi khaene ajae tunana engkhaena maen ing ynziihka om vasahva. Enuw chuve Thangnang yndenmah, apa Thangnang atungsiihchu arehting abaheer ae, inuw yngafhuw yngkhehpang om Aafhuw Jesu Khrista chu arumah meepae.

Nenuw ing chongjeer aangkheng vokhehpangna manghuwkhang tanuwre, ki ing nenuwchu manthang-reeh ningchuwka kachiinah, amachuve, Thangnang ing Misor lipah tanii mee aechu karpeehka aanuwting athachamah meechu ama-maangpa;

amanche entaksahrap ing emandenchu manjiichehmah aeka, entaksahrap empaarnii embathen vaarmee aechu Aafhuw ing iruungpak iniina vajeer tunii khaena ynthim sungnache ichen naemah ing phuwp aeka asiihpae.

Amavaangche Sodom vokhehkho Gomora amanache aveenna om khuwruungchu hava ae thohne entu enri aanghak ing naamak atuae vokhehkho reentaang hakchaang inuwzii ing isi aechu ichen naemah mi sungna ponti pha aeka akhaangteeh aechu amandeengnii khaena amandangva.
Havithoh aanghak ing havi vakhae i enuw enrumang isii inche hakchaang amanchohnah ae, amanche aatuaricheh aechu rumah ae, vokhehkho laarnii iruung ae ningna ichamah ing chongsae;

changvakonchu aaruungseh vaarmee Maikel ing Umlae thoh ynrumah aeka Mosi hakchaang khaena ner ing engaansanglae, ithipak ing ichong khaena ataklina vajeer tuniichu thona deenmahsa, changvakonchu Aafhuw ing atakchu ichah rasiing taka ariirpa.
Changvakonchu enuw inche emanghuwmah peehchae taklina ithipak ing ichong ae, vokhehkho barungriir ynthinmah sha ae vaangche, enuw ing nunu ing emanghuwsah ajaar inche enuwchu amamaangpae.
Ening nache ijaniisapa! Akhaechuve enuw ing Ken lam sitahting sisae, ruthamen phanii khaena Bilijaam miraar tingche enuw taensae, amanche Kora chong enreehtah nache enuwchu amamaangpae.

Havi vakhae ichuve ningsiih thaemin nensahnii chaap nache, nenuwthoh nensah nenginhak ibuwr ikah chupae, ynchik omru ing entaksahchu ynthahsah chupae; enuw i siiraang ing araencheh chii ynvaemah ruwrduh chupae, aanla omah, voniimeh ithiivasah, arajung ipha ing ymphervasah pharbuw tha berva thing chupae.

Enuw entaksah ningjakniichu chifhuw apor vaangkhe emanfhuwrchu chifhuw chii ithipak ing ynnoh khavatah; hunganseen vaanseen aesii chupae, enuw engkhaenache ithuwhpak ynthim yndupchu ichen naemah ing ynseehsa.
Adam laennii ing tuti avosariinii Inok ing hava mee ae khaenakho Thangnang tanii chong ariir, “Enruw, Thangnang tanii ynthiing ae lising lising thoh ynruw ing Aafhuw ing juwngsa.

Aangkhenglaang taklina vajeer tunii khaena, vokhehkho Thangnang yndenmah vakhae, Thang-nang mandenru ing entu enrichaap khaena, Thangnang yndenniimah nong vakhae, Thangnang yndenniimah lamting amangheh vokhehkho Thangnang yndenmah isii icher ae inche Aafhuw taklina ithipak ing ichong ae aangkheng miraar peehnii khaena Aafhuw ing jungthengsa.”
Hava mee ae i thaesii thaenam ichong ynsuwh naemah mee chupae. Enuw ing emandensah nache sinae, amanche engkanii phanii khaena meemae en aeka enerna ynding ing chongnae.
Changvakonchu kaningsiih ae, inuw vakhae Aafhuw Jesu Khrista chongthang aeng mamaenna enriir-vasah chongchu nenuw ing eensiipeeh saruw,
“Achiphana enuw ing Thangnang yndenmah ichuwhmah ing ike ae inuwzii ing ynniisahnii hungom vaata ta aeka enuw ing neningna enriir vasahva.
Enuw ae chuve naamak atu mee, entu enrina lampana ong sha ae vaang om ae, laetha ynthiing aphamah meepae.”
Changvakonchu kaningsiih ae, athiseh ing ynthiing nenthacha taklina nenuw ynseemsa nuwna vokhehkho laetha ynthiing ajaarnache thamsa nuwna,
ichen naemah iringnii khaena nenuw ing inuw Aafhuw Jesu Khrista aningchuwh nenghahsahrae, Thangnang ningsiih nache nentaksahchu yngahsaruw.
Vokhehkho barungriirna fhuwm ynvae achuw yngkheh mee taklinache neningchuwh mandangruw;
hak-chaangna ikhaen peendiir churap ymbatir vaangkhe mee ae taklina ichiisuwh ing mukhang tanuwre, enuwchu mi sungtanii jekiae nuwna karsa aeruw.
Atiive khi mansiiniimah ing nenuwchu yngahpeeh, vokhehkho athiseh ing rotharoh nache ynraar omah ing Aafhuw alaar isa maanache nenuwchu ymmangiircheh,
inuw Eekarpeeh Aafhuw yngkhehpang Thangnang ningnache Aafhuw Jesu Khrista ajaarna alaar isa, ynjasuwh, aacheh vokhehkho ruwrengchu atarae vokhehkho ichen naemah phanii ing om ynsuwhrasiing, Amen.

Jesu Khrista ningtanii amandang i Thangnang ing ithupak ing hungsuwh vachiichu ameenae ae ningna amansiinii khaenache aningna apeehva; amanche havi ynghuwnii khaenache avaarmee chu ameenae Johon ningna ajenbathenpa.
Amana hava vakhae i kamu taka Johon ing mee vakhae ningnache ariir. Amachuve Thangnang ing ajeer chongsae re Jesu Khrista ing ichumva taka amandang vakhae chuva.
Havane ynthin ynthiing chongsae vakhae i aapa, aarungae vokhehkho amanjii mee vakhaechu nungae ringkum aphachupae. Akhaechuve hava vakhae i hungsuwhchir vachii apha ynneeng tangsa.
Ataniinii, ajaenniinii vokhehkho hungvivachiina amanche Aafhuw iruwngpham ongnii maana ong ae laetha sarii tanii tungsiih re idaechu neningna omrasiing,
amanche thachafhuw om saarkhii, ithii tanii hangring aren vokhehkho laaruw paam iruwng ae aapuh Jesu Khrista tanii chukho omrasiing.
Inuw vakhaechu aning ymmansiih vokhehkho isii tanii asii inche yngkar,
amanche Thangnang rukuum tunii khaena inuwchu iruwng lipah jaethiim ymbasuw aningnache alaar isa vokhehkho aanchung ruwreng omrasiing. Amen.

Nengarang Johon ki nenuw thoh thangbaen iruwngpaam khaena ijachaam akhaang nong nentufhuwhak ing, Thangnang alaar isa mandangnii vokhehkho Jesu ing ajemandang ynthiing chongsae vakhaechu katongtah nache chiirikpaamna om Patmos ichii nache yngkhum ingka ongping.
Aafhuw aanii nikhehna laetha ynthiingna kaonglae tumpeeh ynling varaang ichii ipirpak iruur yngkheh ing ariir katuknungna kasii,
“Nasii chaap i thiimbuwrna baziih nana Asia sungna om ruwrthiing sarii ae ningna, amachuve Ephisia, Smilna, Pargamum, Thijataria, Sardis, Phildelphia amanche Lodisia eningtinge bathenla taka ariir.”
Achuw senruwrva ta ingka kavaanlehtah nache, jaemi ynrengnii asae sarii om kamupa.
Jaemi ynrengnii ruwrak nache Mee Sapa pingeng ichii apeendiir inche akhi ajupha vokhehkho ynchiimnii sana inche abarungna abadaar yngkheh kamu.
amanche asamchu samuwr vokhehkho ruwbuwr ivaarvaang ipuur, amikchu mi ichuwhvaang ichiisuwhpak,
akhichu yntaeh vasah ynleen siirsiir pingeng ichiivaang vokhehkho aaruurchu suwr rusavaang ipir,
akik tachang ing aesii sarii achi, abae tanii chem yngee asae ynnii itheng. Amaechu siimchim inii vaang ynleen.
Atakchu kamu tahnache akhi basuwrna ivatiihsah ing. Changlaenche akik tachang inche kataklina siika ariir, “Ynchik mahra, ki aren chuping vokhehkho achinii chuping.
Ki iring chuping! Ajae ithii ing, changvakonchu atii ring ingka ichen naemah ing paarning; vokhehkho ithii re longkong longtingchu kachipa.
Atii ynchii isuwhva, amanche ynchii hungsuwh vachiiva ichii namu vakhae i baziihra.
Kakik tachangna namu ichiisuwh aesii sarii re jaemi ynrengnii sarii ae chuve: Aesii sarii inge ruwrthiing sarii rukuum itu vaarmee chupae amana jaemi ynrengnii sarii inge ruwrthiing sarii chupae.”
Ephisia na om ruwrthiing vaarmee ningna baziih: Akik tachangna aesii sarii chika, sana sarii jaemi ynrengnii kaarna isi aningtanii chongthen chuva.

“Nanongtu vakhae ipirpak ing nahentu nahenri amanche ijachaam nabadaar vakhae kamanghuwsa. Isamah nongtu aechu nabadaar chehmah, chongthang mah ae barukna chongthang pung achii aechu nang ing chaang en ae chiika chummahsae ichii natuwhkha kamanghuwsa.
Nang ing nakhaangcheh, kakhaena nabarungriir tiirudehing ijachaam aajaeh nabadaarsa vokhehekho jamahchii.
Changvakonchu ataklina kamanraarniichii omna amachuve, nang ing amaensa raennii ningsiih kha nabathenpa.
Aajaehmeh ipha ing nang itiivachii ichii kharla! Ajae abasenpeh raennii namanden vaangkhe ithupak ing nabarungriir huungla, changmahnave naningna thengningka jaemi ynrengniikha amin peenva kata.
Changlaenche Nikolitans aeng entu enrichaap kabatir vaang, nenuw ingkho enuw ae i nenbatirsa.”

Ijachaam inempak napha ing vokhehkho sara naeriing ing omnachii-atatak chuve nang savang nachii ichii kamanghuwsa! Nataklina Jehudi mah aenche Jehudi pung ta aeka engabu aenche isamah ing ichong aechu kamanghuwsa; enuw aekha umlae mee ynsuwh ruwrpae.

Ijachaam aajaeh henphava nachii khaenache nabarungriir manjamahra. Rungaera! Ichamah umlae ingkhe nabarungriirchu ennii khaena nisuummeh sungna achuw yngkheh chuve kaeshum ting ithin naka jaavanenta. Amachu ithiinii vakhangnare khaangther nana imandenteehra, amana chembe ki ing iringnii phurchii pivakachii.”
Pargamum ruwrthiing rukuum itu vaarmee ningna baziih: “Havi yngeepak chem asaeniimeh adeen tanii chongthenva.

Nang una paarnachii ichii kamanghuwsa, amana-khe Seitaan iruwngpham ongnii omna; amanche nang ing karuming icheep ing nabachuwther vokhehkho Seitaan apaarnii nakhe nengkuurna kasaarkhii ynsuwh thachafhuw om Antipas athehrae nang ing kaningna ynthacha chiikha bathenmahchii.
Changvakonchu nataklina topoh chuve kamanraar nahchii: Balaam ing Balak manchuwka Isrel siti aechu lae ting empeeh isahfhuwchu isahnii khaena, ichuwhmah naamak itunii lamting amansiae.
Amavaang ichii ing nengkaarna Nikolitans ae enu ynjii mee omnachuw.
Atarae nang nabarungriir ithupak ing huungla! Changmahnave entaklina thengningka kabaetanii chem inge laar tukvakata.”

“Achuw yngkheh isii laarchu acheh mee ningnache ynthuurjaehka om isahfhuw mannachu pivakata vokheh-kho achuw ingkho amanghuwmah aaraang mee chupang ing manghuw vachii ivaar rung taklina itharpeh ruming ynziihchu pivakata.”
Thiatira ruwrthiing rukuum itu vaarmee ningna baziih:
“Thangnang sapa amikna mi ichuwh pingeng ichii amanche akhi ynleenpak siir pingeng ichii Thangnang sapa tanii chongthenva.
Nanongtu, naningsiih, nong natu, thacha, ikhaang nacheh, natu chaapkha kamanghuwsa. Abasenpeh raenniikha ithi ing atarae natu nari chaapkha kamanghuwsa.

Changvakonchu nataklina kaman-raar nahchii amachuve: Jezebel ing jaephar ping taka Isrel siti chaap aechu ichuwhmah itunii vokhehkho lae ruthaksii ting empeeh sha isahnii ting abatheem aanuwzii aechu ataraen phana na enjaehnah.
Ama rupanuw kha abarungriir ihuung kahahva changvakonchu ama ing ynthiing mahchu ynthen adapa.
Rungaera, ama rupanuw i ajaarnii manak vakata amanche amathoh naamak entutanii barungriir huungmah aenave, enuw chukho manak vakata;

amanche aanuwzii chaap vakhae thehva katae. Amanache ki i vakhar chaap vokhehkho barungriir chaap aatoh yngkhehva ichii ruwrthiing chaap ing imanghuw vaata, vokhehkho nentu nenri nong ing iphaphamchu pivakachuw.”
Changvakonchu Thiatira na ong isii tuning achiimah changchii nuchu manjii ningka achiimah, umlae barungriir avakharmah nenuw vakhae taklina chembe ija peehrikchu mandermah ningchuw.
Changvakonchu kajuwngmahri raentaang, neningna omkha icheep ing bachuwtherruw.
Isii laar acheh vokhehkho achimahri raentaang kanongruw atujaeh ningna, “Paam ipuhnii ruwrengchu pivakata;
ama ing siir rumor chinaka paam puhvaata vokhehkho pir bukam vaang bakhiicheh vaata.
Kapa ningtanii ruwreng kapha vaang, ki ingkho aningna ziing aesii tangbangchu pivakata.”
“Ynthiing laetha ing ruwrthiing-na ariir i aana ipaar chaap ing siirasiing!”
Sardis ruwrthiing rukuum itu vaarmee ningna baziih:
“Thangnang tanii ynthiing laetha amanche aesii sarii adeen ningtanii chongsaeva. Nang ing natu nongkha kamanghuwsa amachuve, naruming i iring ruming reenkhang taniikho ithii vachii!
Nang ynternana vokhehkho thikvachii ing om aekha manpirla, akhaechuve Thangnang maana nanongkha mapung aphava ichii ing tuwhmahsing.

Ajae abasempehrae isa chongsae naraang vokhehkho nasii vakhaekha yndenla; amanche nabarungriirna thinjaeh nana athar barungriir huungla. Hane athar hungantermah taniive ynruwvaang thengva kata, changlaenche naningna thengva kachii aphachu nang ing manghuwmah tanii.
Sardis ne nenuw topoh chuve ataraenpha barungriir itiimah omnachuw. Enuw mee ae chuve kithoh ivaarjaeh peen singhakva kenta, akhaechuve ynteer aruchupae.
Isii laar acheh meechu ivaar peen mansing vakata, amanche ringkum thiimbuwrna ynthin arumingchu manpur mahning. Kapa vokhehkho vaarmee ae maana kameepae taningka yndang ing riirva kata.
Ynthiing Laetha ing ruwrthiingna ariir i aana ipaar chaap ing siisaruw.”
Philadelphia ruwrthiing rukuum itu vaarmee ningna baziih:
“Devit tuti tanii ing longting chika aamongchu achuwngkho akamchehmah amanche ama ing akamchu achuw ingkho aamong chehmah ynthiing vokhehkho ichum ningtanii chongsaeva.
Natu nari vakhaekha kamanghuwsa. Enla, Achuw ingkho imong chehmah vachii eenkhaar barang ingka kasiihsa. Nang naruwreng topoh omna, amanche kachong nangahsa vokhehkho karuming i siidamahchii.

Enla, umlae ruwrkheh ae entakcha Jehudimah aeka Jehudi pung enchii mee emare om changchii aechu henruw ae ningka nakhi bakhongna irum vaatae amanche ki ing kaning kamansiihsachii ichiichu enuw ing manghuw vaatae.
Kajaera i isajaeh ing nangah khaena laaruw mee vakhaechu chaang ennii aphanache ki ing nangchu badaarpeehva kachii.
Ki ithupak ing juwngva kata. Achuw ingkho naphurchiichu ariniimah ing icheepther ing bachuw jaehra.

Isii laar acheh meechu kapa Thangnang sejaam uchu mansuwh vakata. Amatanii utaraenkho suwhmahnii akhaechuve ataklina kapa Thangnang ruming re kapa Thangnang paam ruming baziih vakata amachuve, thangbaen paam kapa Thangnang tanii ijungtheng ithar Jerusalem re ithar karuming chuva.
Ynthiing laetha ing ruwrthiingna ariir i aana ipaar chaap ing siisaruw.”
Lodisia ruwrthiing rukuum itu vaarmee ningna baziih:
“Thachafhuw om, ichum saarkhii, Thangnang ing aseem aren chongsaeva.
Nanong vakhae kamanghuwsa. Nang idaekho daemahchii, amanche ynsakho basak mahchii. Ajaenkho natak i changchen jaehtah siingnata.
Amatah nache natak i idaekho idaemah, ynsakho ynsamah vachii khaka natak i bathen vakachii.
Savang ning, kadeen chirsa, kataklina ivaeh omah ing nachiinah changvakonchu laethana chembe natak i ijachaam vokhehkho ningchuwhnii, sara, mikchu vokhehkho asae ing omnachii.

Amatah nache naningna kariirpeeh nahchii amachuve, kaningna ynthiingjaeh sana iriira amanache savang fhuwraang suwhvaanta, peenkho iriinana ningjaknii asae ing omchiikha mangkhumla vokhehkho richii barim isa iriinana namik aekha inuwrla amanache ynthiingkiir ing muvaanta.
Kaning kamansiih chuve kaasaenah. Kariirpeehchii i manernana isii tanii hunganrisara.

Enruw, ki ing eenkhaar kungna ngiir ingka kaachumnah, achuw yngkheh ing kasenruwr i siinaka eenkhaarchu barang nave, aningna varuwh ningka amathoh sahakva kata amanche ama ing kithoh isahhak phavaata.
Isii laar acheh meechu kaaruwngpham ongnii nache kabuumna mangongva kata. Yngkhaena ynchii imbe katak kho isii laarchu cheh ingka kapa ongnii iruwngpham ongniina ongning.”
“Ynthiing laetha ing ruwrthiingna ariir i aana ipaar chaap ing siisaruw.”
Havi aanuwna paamkhuw kathiir-tahnache thangbaen eenkhaar ynrang kamupa. Changlaen siimche kichu yngeen tumpeeh iruur yngkheh kasii, “Hanganseenra! Havi aanuwna suwhrem vachii yngkheh mansii kachii.”
Changlaen siimche laetha ing ynruwpa. Amanache thangbaen iruwngpaam nache mee yngkheh heongsa.
Amachu isapak ing ynreen amanche iruwngpham ongniichu tungnusapa ing aruwkuwr.
Amana iruwngpham ongniichu, iruwngpham ongnii somnii ariimanrii ing aahir. Ama iruwngpham ae nache upa yngkhehter ing ivaarjaeh ing ynthong aeka sana phurchiichu engkhum.
Ariktanii iruwngpham ongniichu tenlungpa ruwsa vokhehkho mi vaang inempak ireng, amanche iruwngpham maensok nache Thangnang laetha sarii, mi asae sarii ichuwh.
Iruwngpham ongnii maensokchu chifhuw ynreen vaang, rudaechii ynthiingkiir vaang ichii ing om.
Iruwngpham arakiing manriina iring laetha manriimeh ae ing emaensok re entuknung nache mik inempak ipaar ing ruwkuwrka ingiir ae.
Iring laetha ahaarpachu nongsha pingeng ichii, avomaniiniichu siirchar pingeng ichii, avomanthumnii amaechu mee pingeng taka amanche avomanriinii inche ynjaap mamuw pingeng ichii.
Amana iring laetha manrii aechu embatha isuwm vokhehkho entakchu emik sung taang om ipaar aenche siim jaen naeruung hava la i entu:
“Ynthiingpak, ynthiingpak, ynthiingpak,
ajaenkho, ataraenkho amanche hungvivachii nakho,
aacheh Aafhuw Thangnang va.”
Iring laetha manrii aenche iruwng-pham ongnii nache ong ynjasuwhpak vokhehkho alaar isa ichen naemah ing ipaarchu la tuaeka emanpah.
Upa somnii ariimanrii aenche iruwngpham ongnii taklina ong amaensok nache vakhup aeka arum ae vokhehkho emphurchiichu iruwngpham ongnii maanache vesii aeka jinge ichii ing la ing emanpahsah ae,
“Kengaafhuw vokhehkho Thangnang!
Laaruw paamna om vakhae i nang ing naseemva,
namanden inche ynseempeeh tahnachii ympahfhuw rarap nachii.”
Iruwngpham ongniina ong akik tachang nache ynjuwr thiim-buwrchu ynziih ing ruwkuwrka vokhehkho ahak sarii ing ahakchu kamu.
Amana ipirpak vaarmee ing uungka amanthangchu kasii, “Ynjuwr thiimbuwrchu achuw ing barangcheh vaata amanche ahak aechu achuw ing bakhiicheh vaata?”
Thangbaen tanii, laaruw paam tanii amanche kuurdong tanii achuwti ingkho ynjuwr thiimbuwrchu barangcheh mahnii vokhehkho paacheh mahnii.
Ynjuwr thiimbuwrchu abarangcheh vokhehkho aapacheh omah khaena ichap ing.
Amana upa kaarna yngkheh ing kaningna ariir, “Chapmah! Enla, Juda sungkhur tanii nongsha Devit tuti tanii yngkheh ing achehpa amachuve ynjuwr thiimbuwr re ahak sarii aechu aamongpa.”

Iring laetha aere upa ae ongnii ruwrak nache ithii tanii hangring Jaotichu ingiir kamu. Atakchu Thangnang tanii laetha sarii ae, mik sarii vokhehkho rakii sarii paarna. Atakchu laaruw paamna ajenchiir vasahva.
Ama ing vakka iruwngpham ongniina ong akik tachang tanii ynjuwr thiimbuwrchu averi.

Amana ynjuwr thiimbuwrchu ama ing averiraenche iring laetha manrii aere upa somnii ariimanrii aechu Jao tingche vatiih pohsae. Amana enuw ing seemruwr re ynthiing aeng Thangnang enthamrae enchichak richii barim isa ynthufhuwchu yngkhehter achiae.
Amana enuw ing ithar la entu,
“Ynjuwr thiimbuwr re ahak nabarangcheh i matik icharap vachii.
Natak itheh aeka Thangnang khaena nasii ynta inche laaruw paam mee vakhaechu naatenpa.
Amana athar vokheh paamkhuw kathiirtah nache vaarmee inempak ae ing iruwngpham ongniina iring laetha manrii amanche upa aechu ihir aeka ingiir ae,
amana uung aeka la entu:
“Ithii vasah hangring Jaoti inempak aanrusa,
ama ing hae, lerchii, iveernii, vokhehkho ruwreng,
ympahsahnii aaraang i atatak ing aanrufhuwsa.”
Amana thangbaen tanii, laaruw paam tanii, kuurdong tanii, chifhuw tanii vokhehkho reentaang aajaeh tanii laetha aeng la entuchu kasii,
“Iruwngpham ongniina ongre Jaotichu ympahfhuwva,
vokhehkho ynjasuwh, alaar isa vokhehkho achehchir inche,
ichen naemah ing ynruwfhuw rasiing.”
Amana iring laetha manriimeh aeng “Amen!” ta aeka abasang ae, vokheh-kho upa aenche khup aeka arum ae.
Jaoti inche ahak sarii kaarna yngkheh abarangchu kamupa amanche iring laetha manriimeh aeng khuw ynrii iruur vaang huungla enchiichu kasii.
Amana paamkhuw kathiirtah nache sakuur ivaar yngkheh kamu. Ataklina ong mee yngkheh inche thar rupher chika vokhehhkho phurchii khumka laar chehnii khaena ituk isi.
Amana avomaniinii ahakchu abaranglae avomaniinii iring laetha ing huung achiichu kasii.

Changlaenche reentaang isen sakuur yngkhehchu hungsuwh kamu. Ataklina ongchu laaruw paamna laar ajenbasuwnii amanche mee aeng yngkheh re yngkheh engaanthehnii ruwrengchu aningna apeehpa. Ama khaena iruungpak laarchem yngkhehchu apeehreehpa.
Avomanthumnii ahakchu abaranglae avomanthumnii iring laetha ing huung achiichu kasiipa. Enruw, amana yndup sakuur yngkheh taklina ong inche akikna meil uurnii achi kamu.

Iring laetha manrii enruvae nache senruwr pingeng ichii ing ariir kasii. “Nikheh ruthamen gehu topoh, amana nikheh ruthamen khaena chimuw bajaang vaata. Changvakonchu richii barim khare vomrip chiikha mamaang mahra.”
Amana Jaoti inche avomanriinii ahakchu abarangpa; vokhehkho avomanriinii iring laetha inche huung achii senruwrchu kasii.

Amana idaangsip sakuur yngkheh kamu. Ama sakuur aveongnii arumingchu ithiiva amanche kuurdong aeng aanuw enghenjii; Eningnache laaruw paam mee aechu chem thar ing, venchaam ing, ina ing vokhehkho saklaang aenche enthehnii khaena ruwrengchu apeehpae.
Amana avorunganii ahakchu abaranglae Thangnang chongsae ijeerna vokhehkho asaarkhii ipeehna entheh laetha aechu thiimkung derna kamu ae.
Enuw inche senruwr ipirpak ing enriir, “Aacheh Aafhuw! Ynthiing vokhehkho Ichum! Kenuwchu yntheh ae laaruw mee taklina vajeer tuvanachii aasen ivaehva?”
Enuwchu peen ivaar pika topoh ihah phehruw achiipa. Laaruw paamna iring engarang aechu ichiirdeh ing entheh suwmahri raentang ihahruw taka abasang ae.
Khuwsii vaanlehka apaam aapum aanuh raenche thachang aanla iminmah ibuw vaangkhe, minvaen aesii aechu laruwna jungbuksae.
Minvaenchu ynjuwr thiimbuwr vaangkhe ynjuwrka yngkhum pangsa amana bung re chiirikpaam aenche ama ama apham tingche ympeensae.

Laaruw paam iruwng ae, aruming isi mee ae, laarchang aaruung ae, savang ae, ruwreng ipir ae vokhehkho mee aangkheng amanche suwh ae, ruwkuwrjoh mee ae, bung tingche taen aeka rungkuw nache ynthuursae.
Enuw ing bung chaapna vokhehkho rungkuw chaapna, “keningting jungbuk nuwna iruwngpham ongniina ong re Jaoti barungsii mik bareng tanii ithuursaruw enchii!
Changchii iruungpak barungsii inii nache achuw ing diinaka ngiircheh vaate?”

Havi aanuwna vaarmee manrii ae ing laaruw paam arakiingna ingiir aechu kamupa. Amatah nache laaruw paam ariikiing manrii tanii khuwsii vaanlehchu embadaar tahnache siiraang ing laaruw paam chifhuw, amanche saangthing ae taklina yntanga sukcheh mahsa.

Amana inii hangsuwh tanii reentaang vaarmee yngkheh ing iring Thangnang ahakchu chika hangkar kamu. Ama vaarmee inche laaruw paam re chifhuw amamaangcheh ruwreng ideen vaarmee manrii aechu iruur ipirpak ing a-een.
Amana ariir, “Embachirna apa Thangnang meenaepae ichii anghakmahri raentaang laaruw paam, chifhuw vokhehkho saangthing aekha mamaang mahra.
Amana Isrel siti ae sungkhur vakhae tanii ahakchu amasing 144,000 (laak yngkheh lising somanrii ariimanrii) chaknae taka ariirchu kasiipa.”
Amachuve Juda sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii, Ruben jaat tanii lising suum ariinii, Gad sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii,
Asher sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii, Naptali sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii, Manaseh sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii,
Simion sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii, Levi sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii, Isakar sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii,
Zebulun sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii, Josep sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii, Benjamin sungkhur tanii lising suum ariinii ae ipae.

Enla, havi aanuwna apaam siirtanii, jaati siirtanii, chong yntinmah siisii tanii mee inempak aenche ivaarjaeh peen ing ynthong aeka engkik nache inubur bah chiaeka iruwngpham ongnii re Jaoti maanache ingiir ae.
Amanache enuw ing iruur ipirpak ing uung aeka, “Iruwngpham ongniina ong apa Thangnang re Jaoti inche yngkarsahpa enchii.”
