Iruwngpham ongniichu vaarmee vakhae ing, upa vakhae ing, vokhehkho iring laetha manrii thoh aenche vaangkuwr ing ngiirsae. Amana iruwngpham ongnii tingche vakhup aeka Thangnang chu rumsa aeka enriir,
“Amen! ympah, alaar isa, ising, ympahfhuw, ynjasuwh, ruwreng, vokhehkho aachehchu ichen naemah ing Thangnang ningna omchu ynsuwhrasiing! Amen!”
Upa ae kaarna yngkheh inche kaningna ynsii, “Peen ivaarjaeh ing ynthong ae i achuw aepae vokhehkho utanii ithengpae?”
Amatah nache Thangnang iruwngpham ongniina ong aeka siim jaen naeru ing rumniieen nache rukuum atupae. Iruwngpham ongniina ong inche enuwchu ajaar inche badaarpeeh vaatae.
Enuwchu utaraenkho venchaam chiilaar phamahnii ae, inii ynsa ingkho deengmahnii ae,
yngkhaena ynchii imbe iruwngpham ongnii kuurna ong Jaoti inche cheer vaatae, amana iringnii chiitaang ifhuwr tingche ruwvaatae vokhehkho Thangnang ing emik rachii yntachu nuwrpeeh vaatae.”
Jaoti inche avosariinii ahakchu abaranglae thangbaen nache apha chimbang vakhae daerengsa.
Aanuwnache vaarmee sarii aeng Thangnang maana ingiir aechu kamu amana tumpeeh sariichu eningnache apeehpae.

Amana reentaang vaarmee yngkheh ing barim ningsiihnii ynthunii sana kam yngkhehchu chika thiimkung nache ngiirsa. Aningna-che iruwngpham ongnii maana om thiimkung ting ynthiing aeng enthamchu ipirniiseh khaenache aningna richii barim isachu ajepeehpa.
Thangnang maana ingiir vaarmee kiktanii richii barim isa mikhuwhchu ynthiing ae ing enthamsah thohche hungsuwhsa.
Amana vaarmee inche sana kamchu thiimkung tanii mi ing mansipka laaruw paam ting ajerenpa; amana khuw ynrii ruwsa iruur, tenlungpa chem ynleh vokhehkho linglaang itheng suwhsa.
Amana vaarmee sarii aenche tumpeeh sarii itumnii khaena ynthongsae.

Ahaarpa vaarmee inche atumpeehchu atumpa, amana sii ynvae iriir re michu jungbukka laaruw paam ynthummeh nache yngkhehchu kaangsa, saangthing chaap ynthum nache yngkhehchu kaangsa, vokhehkho fhuwr chaap kaangchirsa.
Avomaniinii vaarmee inche atumpeehchu atumpa, amana mi ichuwh ing iruungpak bung yngkhehchu chifhuw ting ajedeengpa.
Amana chifhuw ynthummehchu yngkheh chuve sii auurpa. Chifhuw sungna ynthin iring laetha aechu ynthum sungna yngkheh ithii ae, amana ruwkuwng ynthum sungna yngkhehchu ikii.
Avomanthumnii vaarmee inche atumpeehchu atumpa. Amana ipirpak ing aenjor aesii yngkheh thangbaen tanii jungbukka iva re chiitaang ynthummeh nache yngkheh taklina buksa.
Ama aesii aruming chuve ikha va. Chii chaapchu ynthum sungna yngkheh chuve khaksa, ama ikha chii ain mee aechu inempak ithii ae.

Avomanriinii vaarmee inche atumpeehchu atumpa. Amana inii, tha, amanche aesii aechu maangsae. Amatah nache ynthum sungna yngkheh inche aencheh mahsa. Siimna inii ing ynthum sungna yngkheh inche basak mahsa, vokhehkho jaen nache aesii aere thachu ynthum sungna yngkheh inche rengmahsa.

Amana kahengen tahnache mamuw vaati yngkheh ing thangbaen rikna ynjaapka ipirpak senruwr ing ariir, “Ijaniisapa, ijaniisapa, laaruw paamna ipaar mee ae khaena ijaniisapa, akhaechuve reentaang vaarmee ynthum ae tanii tumpeeh abaring raenche ynchii tasa vaatae!”
Avorunganii vaarmee inche atumpeehchu atumpa. Amana thangbaen tanii aesii yngkheh laaruw paamna jungbukka idong naemah khur longtingchu aningna apeehpa.
Idong naemah khurchu abarang tahnache mi ichuwhtanii mikhuwh hangthengka amikhuwh inche inii vokhehhko paam aangkhengchu amanthim dehpa.
Amana mikhuwh tanii khaeruwng inempak aechu laaruw paamna thengsae. Amanche eningnache rungmanchiih ing areen haechu apeehpae.
Ening nache laaruw paam fhuwr er ing imuwng vakhae vokhehkho saangthing aechu mamaang mahruw changvakonchu embachirna Thangnang ing ahak omah mee ae chuve mamaangruw taka ariirpa.
Tha runga sungna enuwchu ijachaam ipeeh arupa. Ama ijachaamchu ithehnii ingmahva, changvakonchu rungmanchiih hae ing ajeenvaang ijachaam ipeehnii khaenava.
Changlaenche mee aeng thiknung nge tavaatae changvakonchu ithiichu tuwhmahnii ae, enuw ing thiknungka tavaatae changvakonchu ithii inche eningtanii taenvaata.
Khaeruwng aechu yngen tahna laar ituk isi pingeng ichii ae, amanche enrusaechu sana phurchii ing yngkhum pingeng ichii ae.
Ensamchu rupanuw sam pingeng tikna amana enghachu nongsha ha pingeng ichii ae.
Siir barungphu pingeng ichii eniisa, sakuur aeng laar envatuklae enghuwrusa omvaang embathachu ahuwrusa om.
Rungmanchiih pingeng ichii enrumee suwmna amana ajeen mee aechu tha runga vakhae nakvachii hae om.
Enuwkho aapuh ae iruwng omna. Ama iruwngchu idong naemah khur aapuh vaarmee yngkhehva, aruming chuve Hebreeu ing Abaddon amana Grik ing Apolion achiiva.
Ahaarpa ijaanii chuve aaraenpa amana enruw, ijanii asae ynnii thengvachii omna.
Amana avosariinii vaarmee ing atumpeehchu atumpa. Amanche Thangnang maana arakiing manrii sana thiimkung tanii iruurchu kasiipa.
Amana tumpeeh ichi ingkho vaarmee kuruk aeting ariir, “Iruungpak Iuphrates iva kuurna ynphuwp vaarmee manrii aekha bathenruw.”
Amatah nache vaarmee kuruk aenche vaarmee manrii aechu embathenpa. Akhaechuve kum, tha, apha ichichak nache laaruw mee aampum manriina ynthum ae ithehnii khaena enuwchu yngkhumpae.
Amana sakuur laarchang aechu million chanii chakpae ichii kaningna ariirpa.

Haviva karuvaamna kamu sakuur aechu. Aongnii ae barungphu-chu mi vokhehkho yndupsip ing idaangpae. Sakuur rusae aechu nongsha rusae pingeng ichii ae amana embaena mikhuwh vokhehkho idaang ing hungsuwh.
Amanche sakuur ae baetanii ihangsuwh mikhuwh vokheh-kho idaang aenche laaruw paam mee ae manriina ynthumchu atheh ae.
Akhaechuve sakuur haechu embaena vokhehkho enrumi chaapna omsa. Enuw enrumichu arusae om baruwr vaang tiknae, amanche amachu mee ynsuhnii khaenache ensichinniipa.

Amu chehmah, asii chehmah vokhehkho isi achehmah sana, siir, rung amanche thingrung irum vakhae aechu havana riirae mangkhiing inge athehmah ae laaruw mee areh aenche havi enrum taniichu hungangheer mahsae.
Havijaeh mahka mee entheh, mee emanchae, ichuwhmah naamak changmahka mee lerchii embaruwh taniichu hungangheer mahsae.

Aanuwnache reentaang vaarmee yngkheh ing thangbaen tanii ijuwng kamupa. Amana arusaechu tungnusapa ing aruwkuwr amanche amaechu inii vaang ichii re akhi nache mi ichuwh uchu vaang ichii inche ruwrduh kaarna junganjaapsa.
Akik nache ynlang vasah ynjuwr thiimbuwr isiing yngkhehchu achi. Amana akhi tachang inche chifhuwna vokhehkho atari tanii akhi inche taangna chuwngsa,
amana nongsha ing ymphuwh vaangche ipirpak inche uungsa. Vokhehkho auung tahnache tenlungpa sarii aenche ynteenpak ing embasangpa.

Amana tenlungpa sarii aechu enchong raenche ki ing ynziih kabasenpa. Changvakonchu thangbaen tanii senruwr yngkhehchu kasii, “Tenlungpa sarii aeng enriirkha nabarungriir sungna yndenjaehra; baziih mahra.”
Aanuwnache chifhuwna vokhehkho taangna ingiir vaarmee inche thangbaen ting akik tachang ithohka
thangbaen, laaruw, chifhuw vokhehkho asungna om vakhae aaseem ichen naemah Thang-nang arumingchu vaarmee inche parka saarkhii aripa, “Atiive thirmahnii!
Changvakonchu avosariinii vaarmee inche atumpeehchu atum raenche ajae ameenae jaephar ae ningna amanthang vasah inuwzii ingkhe anongchu hentuvaata.”
Aanuwnache thangbaen tanii kasii senruwr yngkheh inche kaningna ariir, “Chifhuwna vokhehkho taangna ingiir vaarmee kikna ynlangka om ynjuwr thimbuwrchu vaknana varira.”
Amana vaarmee ningna ynjuwr thiimbuwr isiingchu kaniihcha ama ing kaningna ariir, “Jeri nana sara; naven sungna inempak khak vaata, changvakonchu nabae nave khiniing vaang thumpak vaata.”
Amana vaarmee akik tanii isiing ynjuwr thiimbuwrchu veri ingka kasahpa, changvakonchu kabaduwr nuwtingche kaven sungnache khakpohsa.
Aanuwtingche kaningna ariirpa, “Athar vokheh Thangnang isa chong i mee vakhae khaena vokhehkho jaati vakhae khaena amanche chong omchaap ae khaena vokhehkho iruwng aajaeh ae khaenache vatongla.”
Khaap uurnii thor pingeng ichii yngkheh kaningna ipika ariir, “Hangiir nana Thangnang rumniieen re thiimkung kha vauurla, amanche rumniieenna arum mee aekha teen aera.

Changvakonchu vaapa ngiirnii taangtanii chaap uurmahra; amakha mara; ama aekha reentaang mee aeting ympivasahva, enuw ing ynthiing khuwruung i inii nisommanrii ariinii sungna bavae ae naka chiiniirii vachiipae.
Kasaarkhii ipeehnii khaena mee ynniimeh jenchiir vakata, amanche enuw ing inii lising yngkheh chanii somruk sungna kajaera tongvaatae.”
Enuw ensaarkhii ynniimeh chuve oleep thing re jaemi ynniimeh iva amanche ataraene laaruw paam Aafhuw maensokna ngiirnae.
Achuw yngkheh ing enuwchu mansuh nave embae tanii mi hangchuwh naka basuwm vaatae; Achuw yngkheh ing entaklina mansuh kata achii vakhaechu thehvaatae.

Minvaen yndaarnii ruwreng endeensa, amachuve enuw ing isa chong enjeer raenche khuwchu suwrmahnii, enuw ing yndenruw manden ae nave chiichu sii abasuwnii, laaruw paam manvar ae naka ina pungnii changchii ruwrengchu endeensa.
Amana ithii aechu eng Aafhuw enthehnii Sodom re Ijeep lam sungnache yntor vaatae.
Inii nithum abarii sungna laaruw mee vakhae ing ibuwr vaatae amana idimkho rumahnii ae.

Amana ithii ae mee ynniimeh khaene laaruw paam mee chaap ing enrotha rohnaka yngkheh yngkheh kikthuur ympiae naka kuurva tuvaatae, akhaechuve havana jaephar ynniimeh ae inge inempak laaruw mee ningna ijachaam enjenreen tahnava.
Changvakonchu inii nithum aanuwting Thangnang ihuwhchu eningna ruwhnaka hangring vataereeh, changlae mee vakhae ing inempak entakchu chiivaatae.
Jaephar ynnii aenche thangbaen tanii senruwr ing hava tingnge hangkarruw achiichu ensii. Amana aarumah mee aenche engenlae ruwrduh kaarna thangbaen phanii ing ynjaapsae.

Changlaen siimche ipirpak linglaang thengsa amanche khuwruung suumchu jungtiihka mee lising sarii ithii ae amana areh aenche entu enrina ynraar chaap ikuhnii khaena thangbaen Thangnang chu enthamsah ae.
Avomaniinii ijaniichu ynlaensa: Enruw, avomanthumnii ijaniichu theng ynthongna.

Amana avosariinii vaarmee inche atumpeehchu atumtah nache thangbaen tanii iruur aajaeh ing jinge ariirchu kasiipa, “Laaruw paam taklina ipuhnii ruwrengchu Aafhuw vokhehkho Eekarpeeh ningnache, ichen naemah ing ipaar ynsuwhrasiing.”
Thangnang maekungna iruwngpham ongniina ong upa ae somnii arii manrii aenche Thangnang chu rum aeka
jinge emampah ae,
“Kemanpah sahnahchii Aacheh Aafhuw Thangnang!
Nang chuve ataraennii amanche ajaennii vachii,
atiive naruwreng richiika ipaar nabasenpa!
Thangnang yndenmah mee aenche enthir fhuwrsa,
changvakonchu naepang upa naeru ing ynthiing ae,
nangchu ynchiisah ae,
nameenae ae vokhehkho jaephar aechu enongmen ipeehnii amanche laaruw paam aamaang aechu mamaangnii khaena aphachu ahenphapa!”
Aanuwnache minvaenna ichiisuwh yngkheh itheng. Amachuve rupanuw yngkhehchu inii ing ynthongka, akhi dernache tha ing amanche arusae nache aesii suum ariiniichu phurchii ing akhumpa.
Atakchu mikniika asiti abaring phana ikhaang achehmah ing ichap.
Athar reentaang buwtinni yngkheh thangbaenna yndangsa enruw, ichiisuwhpak tangkhonglae yngkheh arusae sarii, arakii ing suummeh amana arakiichu siir phurchii yngkhehter ing yngkhum.
Arumi ing thangbaen tanii aesii kaarna aruwr ynthummeh ruwka laaruw paam ting ajeren. Naeduung abaringthong maensokna ngiirka jungomvachii naeduungchu isiihnii khaena ahah.
Rupanuw inche naeduung pasarti yngkhehchu abaringpa, ama naeduung inche siir rumor chinaka paam puhvachiiva changvakonchu naeduungchu siihka Thangnang aaruwngpaam tingche aruwpa.
Rupa-nuwchu akhaena Thangnang ing ongnii aseem paamfhuw tingche sisa amana rupanuwchu inii lising yngkheh chanii somruk cheerpeeh vachii vatah.
Atiive thangbaen nache Maikel re avaarmee aeng tangkhonglae re alaarchang ae taklina nam aeka laar entuk.
Amachu enchehtah nache tangkhonglae re alaarchang aechu thangbaen nache engongnii omahsa.
Umlae vokhehkho ajaennii baruwr ipirpak tangkhonglae laaruw paam ajeehnii amachu taangting arenpa vo-khehkho atakchu laaruw paam tingche avaarmee ae thohche ajerenpa.

Aanuwdeh nache thangbaen tanii ipirpak iruur yngkheh ing ariir kasii, “Atiive apa Thangnang ing laarchu chehka mee vakhae akarniichu tuvaata. Ama khaena ajaera ajeer vakhae ing laaruw paamna theng ae naka mee cheervaatae. Akhaechuve umlae inche Thangnang kuurna ongcheh mahsa vokhehkho mee vakhae isii lamting manjiicheh mahsa. Ama khaena umlaechu thangbaen tanii thangting ajerenpa.
Jaoti sii vokhehhko ynthiing barungriir jaarna umlaechu enthehpa akhaechuve emanden khaena ithiikho enchehpa.
Atiive rotha manrohruw, O thangbaenna ong ae. Changvakonchu laruw re chifhuw khaena chenbe ijaniisapa! Umlae inche thirfhuwr ing apha topoh sungna hentuvachii omna.”
Tangkhonglae inche laruw ting ynrenpa ichiichu amanghuwtah nache naeduung abaring rupanuwchu ipaanii khaena vaksa.

Changvakonchu rupanuwchu ipirpak mamuw batha ynniimeh inche lamlahpak paamfhuw tingche baruwr ningtanii ynjaapnii khaenache apeehpa. Amana kumthum abarii cheerpeeh ae naka tangkhonglae ing utaenkho vatukchehmahnii.
Rupanuwchu chikriim ing ataennii khaena baruwr inche abae tanii chii avesohpa.
Changvakonchu rupanuwchu ikarnii khaena laruw ing hungsuwhka chii chaapchu abaduwr chirpa.
Rupanuw taklinache tangkhonglae ing abarung sikka atuti bahsuwm ae vokhehkho Thangnang chonghak angah ae amanche Jesu khaena saarkhii ireep ae taklinache laar atukpa.
Amana tangkhonglae inche chifhuw ataang nache ngiirsa.
Himfhuw pingeng ichii saklaang yngkheh kamu akhichu ivom khika amana abae inche nongsha pingeng ichii. Aningnache tangkhonglae hae, iruwngpham ongnii vokhehkho aatuaricheh aangkheng amansirpa.
Arusae yngkhehchu asuh ing om changvakonchu idam. Amana mee vakhae ing ingik ae thoh ynruw ing aanuw enjii.

Mee aeng tangkhonglaechu enrum, ama vaang saklaang tingkho aacheh ruwrengchu apeehtah nache mee aeng hava saklaang ikho jinge enrum ae, “Saklaang havi pingeng ichii achuw omne vokhehkho ataklina achuw ing inafhuwcheh vachiiva?”
Saklaangchu ningharnii vokhehkho ynchaenii chong apeeh amanche tha somanrii ariimanrii yncheh jaarniikho ruwreng apeehpa.
Abae mangaangka Thangnang taklina vokhehkho thangbaenna ongchaap ruming parka iraang.
Amana athar ynthiing ae taklina laar tuknaka chehnii vachii aningna apipa, amanche jaati chaap, chong vokhehkho lipah vakhae taklina ruwreng apeehpa.
Laaruw paam mee vakhae ing rumvaatae; laaruw paam anseemmah rirae Jaoti thiimbuwr iringniina ruming ynziih mee vakhae mahnaka, reentaang vakhae inchembe atakchu rumvaatae.
“Aana ipaar chaap inche siisa rasiing!
Ynsuwrvachii chaapchu ynsuwrvaatae; chem ing ynthehvachii chaapchu chem ing thehvaatae. Havi Thangnang ynden ynthiing aenche ikhaangcheh re thacha omvachiipae achiiniiva.”
Reentaang saklaang yngkheh chuve laruw tanii hungsuwh kamupa. Atakchu Jaoti vaang arakii ynniimeh suwmka tangkhonglae vaang ichong.
Ahaarpa tangkhonglae kuurna aruwreng chaapchu abaraknii amana laaruw mee chaapchu ahaarpa saklaang asuh idamchu amanrumpae.
Mee aeng muva enchiina mi seemka thangbaen tanii laruwting ymbuknii iruungpak laetho amandang.
Saklaang kuurnache itu aruvakhae laetho inche laaruw mee vakhae aasiirting amansiae, chem ing suhka ihangring kha aruthaksii ynseem naka irumnii khaena ariirpa.
Ahaarpa saklaang ruthaksiichu ihuwh thinnii khaena avomaniinii saklaang inche arupa. Amana chembe saklaang ruthaksii inche chongcheh naka arummah chaap aechu thehvaata.
Saklaang inche isiing, iruung, savang, sara, suwh ae, ruwkuwrjoh ae, amanche mee vakhae chaap engkik tachangna changmahka embachirna buwtinnii amantuae.
Havana buwtinnii i omah mee achuw ingkho peeh ynrii vokhehkho ijuwr chehmahnii ae; ama chuve saklaang ruming changmahka aruming masing chuva.
Havane losing suwhnii omna. Amanghuw mee inche sha masingchu teenrasii akhaechuve havi mee yngkheh masingva; amana amasing chuve 666 va.
amanche chii ruwsa vokhehkho tenlungpa ruwsa pingeng ichii thangbaen tanii iruur yngkheh kasii, ama senruwrchu seemruwr huwrusa itam iruur pingeng tasa
vokhehkho iruwngpham ongnii maanache iring laetha re upa aenche ithar la entu. Enuw vakhae i ikarpeeh aphachupae.

Enuw vakhae i ichuwhmah naamak changchiina yntanga omah ynthiing chupae. Enuw ing Jaoti ing asiniitah vakhaenache aanuwchu ajiiae. Enuw ae i ikarpeeh aphavasah ae Thangnang vokhehkho Jaoti ningting ympivachii ae aren chupae.
Enuw i emare omah vokhehkho ibuwrmahdeh meepae.
Aanuwna thangbaen rikna reen-taang vaarmee yngkheh ing laaruw mee vakhaena ichen naemah isa thamin atongchu kamu
Ama inche ariir, “Thangnang chiiruw vokhehkho alaar isachu manpahruw, akhaechuve vajeer tuphachu ahenphapa, thang-baen, laaruw paam vokhehkho chiitaang ifhuwr aseem Thangnang chu rumruw.”
Avomanthumnii reentaang vaar-mee ing henjiika senruwr ipirpak ing ariir, Achuw yngkheh ing saklaang vokhehkho aruthaksiichu rumnaka abachirna vokhehkho akikna buwtinnii phanave;
ama mee inche Thangnang barungsii juwchu invaata. Amana ynthiing vaarmee aere Jaoti maensok nache ijachaam ing mi sungna kaangvaatae.
Enuw engkaangnii mikhuwhchu ichen naemah ing khukjaeh vaata. Saklaang vokhehkho aruthaksii arum ae amanche buwtinnii ruming aaraang ae khaenache siim jaen ija basumnii omahnii.
Havi Thangnang amee ynthiing aenche khaangva chiipae; enuw ing Thangnang chonghakchu manjiiva chiipae vokhehkho Jesu Khrista ningna thachachu mangomjaeh vachiipae achiiniiva.

Aanuwnache thangbaen tanii iruur ing kaningna ariir kasii, havi baziihra: “Atarae basenka Aafhuw nongtuna ithii aechu bor aphapae.” Chumna taka ynthiing laetha inche abasang, “Enuw ing ipirpak nong entu ajaar inche nungaepak ing ija basum vaatae, akhaechuve enongtu inche enuwthoh ynruwhak jaehna.”
Aanuwnache paamkhuw kathiir tahnache ruwrduh ivaar kaarna mee reentaang yngkheh kamu; amachuve arusaena sana phurchii vokhehkho akikna chemki yngeepak achi.
Rumniieen tanii reentaang vaarmee yngkheh ing uungka ruwrduh kaarna ong ningnache ariirpa, “Aphachu ahenphapa imin chaapkha chemki ing aehra, akhaechuve laaruw paamna ikuumfhuw chaap hungmin chirsa.”
Aanuwnache vokheh ruwrduh kaarna ong inche achemki chika laaruw paamna imin chimuw bajaang chaapchu aruwppa.
Amana thangbaen rumniieen tanii reentaang vaarmee yngkheh inche hungsuwhka ama ingkho chemki ing aehnii khaena ynthongsa.

Amana mi chuwhnii ruwreng adeen thiimkung tanii reentaang vaarmee yngkheh ing hungsuwhka yngeepak chemki achi tingche uungka ariir, “Nachemki yngeepak amakha chira amanche laaruw paamna vomrip aekha khuum aera, akhaechuve vomrip aekha minsae.”
Chukhaenache vaarmee inche laaruw paamna chemki irehka vomrip aanlachu aehka Thangnang barungsii vomrip chaniinii nache arenpa.
Amana vomrip aanlachu khuwruung taangting achaniipae amanche ijungsuwhchu sii ing bariimka adung meil chanii vokhehkho ithuwh ing khaap runga taang ruwngsa.

Ki ing thangbaenna iruung-pak vokhehkho ruwriimniipak reentaang yngkheh achiniideh ichiichuve, adongniideh riirae mang-khiing sarii engaanruwfhuw vaarmee sarii aechu kamupae, akhaechuve eningnache Thangnang barungsiichu adongnii chakva.

Amana mi ynvae vaartha pingeng ichii chifhuw vokhehkho saklaang masak amanche aruming masingchu acheh mee aenche, Thangnang tumpeehchu engkikna chiaeka vaartha pingeng ichii chifhuw nache ingiir aechu kamupa.
Amana enuw ing Thangnang meenae Mosi la vokhehkho Jaoti lachu jinge entu,
“Nanongtu vakhae i aajaehmeh iruungva vokhehkho ruwriimniiva,
O Aacheh Aafhuw Thangnang!
Ibuwr mahdeh re ichum vakhaechu nalamva,
O ichiim omah Iruwng!
O Aafhuw achuw ing narumingchu chiimahva chiiva?
Vokhehkho manpahmah vachii vakhang?
Nangpang tahchii ynthiing. Mee vakhae ing naningting thengnaka irum vaata,
akhaechuve navajeer vakhaechu namandangpa.”
Havi aanuwnache thangbaenna om rumniieen ynrangka, asungnache Thangnang ongnii rumniithaam kamu,
amanche rumniieen tanii riirae mangkhiing aanruwfhuw vaarmee sarii ae ing iseengjaeh peendiir ing ynthong aeka vokhehkho endiiriimna ynchiimnii sana ingkho ynchiim aeka hungsuwhsae.
Amana iring laetha ipaar yngkheh inche vaarmee sarii ae nache ichinaemah iring Thangnang achiniikak ing barungsii ing isip sana kamfhuwchu ajepeehpae.

Rumniieenchu Thangnang tanii alaar isa re aruwreng mikhuwh inche sipchaksa, amana achuw ingkho vaarmee sarii aeng riirae mangkhiingchu enghenchi suwmahri raentaangche rumniieen sungtingche varuwhcheh mahsa.
Rumniieen tanii ipirpak iruur yngkheh inche vaarmee sarii ae ningnache havi ariir kasiipa, “Sinuwna Thangnang barungsii kamfhuw sarii amakha laaruw paamna jungriibehruw.”
Ahaarpa vaarmee inche sika akamfhuwchu laaruw paam nache ajungriipa; vokhehkho saklaang buw-tinnii om amanche amasakchu arum mee ae taklina yntirsuwh vokhehkho isamah ipaenchu ymphuwngsa.
Avomaniinii vaarmee inche akamfhuwchu chifhuw nache ariipa, amanche amachu ithii ae sii vaangche tasa, vokhehkho chifhuwna om iring laetha chaap aechu thiksae.
Avomanthumnii vaarmee inche akamfhuwchu iva aangkhengna vokhehkho chiitaang ifhuwr chaapna ariitahnache sii auurpa.
Amanche chii vakhae vaarmee inche havi ariir ki ing kasiipa, “O ataraennii vokhehkho isi vasahna ynthiing Aafhuw navajeer vakhae chaap ichum chirva!
Akhaechuve mee aenche ynthiing aere jaephar aechu sii emanfhuwrpa, amatah nache siichu infhuw inche napeehpae. Havi enuw ing iphapham isuwh rarapva!”
Aanuwnache thiimkung tanii iruur ki ing kasiipa, “Aacheh Aafhuw Thangnang! Navajeer vakhae i ichumva vokhehkho ynthiing chirva!”
Avomanriinii vaarmee inche akamfhuwchu inii taklinache ariipa, amanche inii ynsa inche mee ae taklina adeengchu arupa.
Amatah nache mee aechu ichiisuwhpak ing ynsa inche kaangsae, vokhehkho riirae mangkhiing taklina ruwreng adeen Thangnang arumingchu siraap piaeka, vokhehkho embarungriir huungmah aeka manpah mahsae.
Avorunganii vaarmee inche akamfhuwchu saklaang aongnii nache ariipa, amatah nache aaruwng paamchu amanthimpohpa; amanche enuw abuw ina aenche embari engiihpa
vokhehkho enuw ing abuw ina ae khaena thangbaen Thangnang chu siraap empipa, amanche isamah enongtanii embarungriir huungmahsae.
Avakruknii vaarmee inche akamfhuwchu iruungpak Iupharetis iva nache ariipa, amanche iniisuwhtah tanii itheng iruwng ae khaena lam ipeehnii khaenache chiichu amangkangpa.
Aanuwnache ynthiingmah laetha ynthummeh uchoh vaang ichii kamupa. Enuw ae i ruurfhuw baetanii, tangkhonglae baetanii vokhehkho ichummah jaephar ae baetanii vakhae ihungsuwhpae.
Enuw ae i laetho aatu umlae laetha aepae. Enuw ynthum laetha ae inge Aacheh Thangnang iruungpak aanii thachu laar tuknii khaenache, laaruw paam iruwng vakhae ningting siaeka amangkongpae.
Laetha aenche Hebreeu chongna Armageddon ichii apham nache iruwng vakhaechu ipurpak ing ahenruwpae.
Avosariinii vaarmee inche siiraang tingche akamfhuwchu ariipa, amanche rumniieen sungna iruwngpham ongnii tanii ipirpak iruur yngkheh inche ariir, Havinge chichaksa!
Amana tenlungpa ynleh vokhehkho khuw ynrii huwruwsapohsa, amanche mee ing laaruw paamna apaallae isuwhmah rideh ipirpak linglaang thengsa; havi aangkhenglaangna make ithipak linglaang chusa!

Amatah nache iruungpak khuwruungchu arii ynthummeh ing yngkhaesa, amanche paam aangkhenglaang khuwruung chaapchu maangchirsa. chutahnache iruungpak Bebilon chu Thangnang barungsii adongniideh inche juw innii kamchu ipinii khaena Aafhuw ing aansiipa.
Amana chiirikpaam ymmumahsa amanche bung vakhaechu omahchirsa;

kilo songa vak irik ipirpak iriir, minvaen tanii mee ae taklinache jungbuksa, amanche mee ae ing riirae mangkhiing suwhnii iriir ibuw khaenache Thangnang taklina ithipak ing chongsae; akhaechuve ipirpak riirae mangkhiing tahna chemva.
Kamfhuw sarii adeen vaarmee sarii sungna yngkheh inche kaningna vakka ariir, “Huungla, ichuwhmahna athang isipak iva inempakna ong ama inche vajeer phavachiichu ki ing mansii kachii.
Laaruw paamna iruwng chaap aeng rupanuw thohne naamak nongchu entuhakpa, vokhehkho laaruw paam mee aechu naamak juw inche baruwsae.”

Amana rupanuw inche isentuh mare om peen singka, sana ing, amen iruw rung ing amanche mukta ing ynthong; vokhehkho akikna yntirsuwh ing isip, amachuve naamak nong iseengmah peeh ing isip sana kam achi.
Abachir nache ithuwhpak chong, iruungpak Babilon, ichuwhmah rupanuw vokhehkho laaruw paamna yntirsuwh peeh amnuwva ichii ing ynziih ruming om.
Amanche ynthiing vokhehkho Jesu khaena atheh ae saarkhii sii inche ynruw rupanuw amachu ki ing kamupa.
Ki ing atakchu kamutah nache ariirfhuw chahdeh ing karuw riimsa.
Amana vaarmee inche kaningna ariir, “Nang ynchii khaena naruw iriimva? Ki ing naningna rupanuw re saklaang ing enreen arusae sarii, arumi sarii om chong ithuwhpakchu riirpeeh kachii.

Nang ing saklaang namukha atii ongmahsa, ama kurdong tanii hungsuwh ynthongna, amanche imaangnii tingche ama ing sina. Amana laaruw paam abasen-limna iringnii thiimbuwrna enruming ynziihmah laaruw paamna ipaar aenche saklaangchu ynsaangkhe ichiivakho ta ae naka, vokhehkho ithengchu emuraenche inempak enruw riimvaata.”
“Havane losing suwhnii omna. Arusae sarii khachuve rupanuw inche aongnii bung sarii chuva;
amanche arusae aekha chuve iruwng sariipae; rungameh ae chuve buksae, yngkheh chuve omna, reentaang ae chuve thengmahri ae; amanche ama ing thengnaka apha topoh ongvachii ing omna.
Amana iring vasah chang-vakonchu iringrihmah saklaang ataksah rapchu avairiihnii iruwngva, vokhehkho avosariinii taniiva, ama ing imaangnii tingche sina.”
“Nang ing namu vasah arakii suum om aekha iruwng lipah ataraen phapha aphamahri iruwng suum chuva; changvakonchu enuw ing iruwng ae vaang saklaang thohche apha yngkheh khaenapang ruwreng phavaatae.
Enuw inge barungriir yngkhehpang ing omsae amanche enghae vokhehkho enruwrengchu saklaang ningtingche empeehpa.

Enuw ing Jaoti taklinache laar tukvaatae, changvakonchu Jaoti inche a-een vasah ae, aateer vasah ae vokhehkho thachafhuw aanuwzii ae thohche ynchangnaka enuwchu chehvaata, akhaechuve ama i Aafhuw na Aafhuw va amanche iruwng vakhaena iruwng va.”
Amana vaarmee inchenkho kaningna ariir, ichuwhmah rupanuw ing chii omchaap taklina ong nang ing namu ae i mee ae, jaati ae, suwnthar siti ae vokhehkho chong chaap ae chupae.

Nang ing arakii om suummeh re saklaang namu ae inge ichuwhmah rupanuw i batirvaatae; enuw ing adeensah vakhaechu ripeehchir ae naka aruwhnaen ing mavaatae; enuw ing ashachu savaatae vokhehkho mi sungna chenkho bathu vaatae.
Thangnang chongjeer chaapchu asuwhchir mahri raentaang ama ing amandenchu itunii khaenache barungriir yngkhehpangnii vokhehkho saklaang ningnache iruwngpaam pinii khaenache embarungriirna athinpa.
“Nang ing namu rupanuw i laaruw paam iruwng vakhae taklina ipaar iruungpak khuwruung chuva.”
Havi aanuwdehna iruungpak ruwreng adeen amanche aningtanii isaseh ireng thohche ynruw ing, thangbaen tanii vaarmee inche laaruw paamna ijuwngchu kamupa.

Ama ing ipirpak senruwr inche va-uungsa: “Sanuwchu tiihsa! Ipirpak Babilon chu tiihsa! Atiive umlae ae ongniichu ynsuwhsa, ynthiingmah laetha chaap ae vokhehkho ynthiingmah ae, yntirsuwhpak vaati ae ongniichu ynsuwhsa;

akhaechuve ynthiingmah vakhae ajuw inche mee vakhaechu baruwpohsa, vokhehkho laaruw paam iruwng vakhae inche naamak entuhakpa, amana laaruw paamna lerchii itaar ae inchenkho ama inungae ajaar inche savangchu hungsuwhsae.”
Havi aanuwnache thangbaen tanii senruwr yngkheh ing ariir kasii,
“Kamee ae, nenuw sanuw kha aningtanii hungsuwhruw,
changmahnave ataklina isii omnakhe,
vokhehkho vajeer phavachii nakho ynvaeva nenta!”
Isii arang ingkhe thangbaen phanii ing hanganjaapsa,
vokhehkho Thangnang ing ichuwhmah anongtu vakhaechu aansiichirpa.
Ama ing ympeeh vaangkhe aningna chenkho piruw,
amanche anong inuwzii ingkhe aningna manthuw nuwna piruw;
ama ing amanvaenohnii kam nakhe arutum manthuw nuwna manvaenohruw.
Aajaehmeh ataksahchu ympahva vokhehkho ikeva,
havithoh ynchimchak ing ijachaam ijaniichu aningnache piruw.
Asanaensah ing ariirnah:
Hane ki iruwngnuw ing ongning,
ki muwkhuwnuw mahping,
ki ing ijachaamchu utaraenkho manghuw mahning!
Havi khaenache inii nikheh pangna ataklina riirae mangkhiing,
vokhehkho venchaam chiilaar ama ing phavaata.
Mi ing kaangvaata, akhaechuve ataklina vajeer atu i Aacheh Aafhuw Thangnang va.
Amana rupanuw thohne naamak ituna ikaam ae laaruw paam iruwng chaap aeng ikaang mikhuwhchu emuraenche uung aenaka chappeh vaatae.

Enuw ingkho laarkhehting ngiirvaatae, akhaechuve sanuw ijachaam nache ynvaeva enchii ynchik aenaka tavaatae, “Ijaniisapa! Ijaniisapa! Nangve iruungpak khuwruung vachii, nangve ipirpak khuwruung vachii, O Babilon! Apha mongtehpang sungna nataklina vajeer thengsa!”
Lerchii itaar laaruw mee aenche akhaena chap aeka ajapeehpae, akhaechuve mee achuw ingkho ijuwrfhuw peehchu athar vokheh iriipeeh mahsae,

achuw ingkho ensana, rupa, amen iruwpak rung ae, vokhehkho amen iruw ynreenrung, isa isa peen, isen re hikok machu peen, la, amanche isen peen; amen iruwpak thing chaap amanche busae ha tanii ing ynseem peehchae vokhehkho pithrae, siir re ynnaarjaeh rung;
amanche Sinnamon, maromaram, ynthufhuw barim isa, mir ichii maro, vokhehkho ningsiihnii richiibarim; vomrip vokhehkho thou, jaam re gehu, siirdaar re jao, sikuur re sikuur gari, suwh chupae.

Amana lerchii itaar mee aenche sanuw ningnache enriir, “Nang ing naadik peeh vakhaekha naningtanii taensae, vokhehkho isa isa peehchae chaap aekha omah chirsae, amanche atii vokheh utaraenkho tuwhmah ae tanii!”
Havana rupanuw ajaar inche lerchii itaar aenche savang fhuwraang suwhkhang ae nare, ataklina isuwh ijachaamchu chiiae naka yndahpak inche ngiir aenaka chapvaatae amanche jaapeeh ae naka tavaatae,
“Ijaniisapa! Ijaniisapa! Ynnaarjaeh peen, hikok isen machu, isenjor, amanche sana ing, rupa ing, vokhehkho amen iruw ynreenrung ing ynthong iruungpak khuwruung havi ichu!
Apha mongtehpang sungna lerchii vakhae ichu paamchirsa.”
Ruwkuwng vakhae aaruung aere asungna ong mee chaap ae, aahuur ae amanche chifhuwna ong aeka enringnii entaar vakhae ae ing yndahpak ing ngiir aeka,
vokhehkho sanuw ikaang mikhuwhchu emutahnache chapsae, “Havana iruungpak khuwruung thohne aanghak reentaang omahrideh!”

Amana enuw ing pirkhuwh inche ymbuk aeka chapsae, vokhehkho jaasa aeka enriir, “Ijaniisapa, ijanii-sapa, iruungpak khuwruungchu sanuw ichuva! Chifhuwna ong ruwkuwng adeen mee aangkheng ing amen iruwpak alerchii jaarna savang fhuwraang isuwh ymphamah vakhangni! Apha mongtehpang sungna ama maangchirsa!
Sanuw takline nenrotha manroh-ruw, O thangbaen, O ynthiing ae vokhehkho chongthang ae amanche jaephar ae, akhaechuve ama ing nentaklina atu ari khaenakhe Thang-nang ing ataklina vajeer atupa!”

Aanuwnache iruungpak vaarmee inche rungshum vaang ichii rungchu jechuwmka chifhuw tingche renka ariir, Havi vaange iruungpak khuwruung Babilon chukho ithipak ing renvaata, amanche atii utaraenkho vokheh yntuwhmahnii;

amanche taamfhuw iruur vokhehkho mee ae iruur isa chaap, baasi vokhehkho tumpeeh iruur, hava vakhae chaap i naning tanii atii vokheh ynsiimahnii! Nongtufhuw om taklina atusii arisii achuwkho athar vokheh utaraenkho yntuwhmahnii; amanche rungshum yntak huwruwsa athar vokheh utaraenkho ynsiimahnii;

amanche jaemi irengchu nataklina utaraenkho ynrengmahnii; rakhii iniikho utaraenkho omahnii. Laaruw paamna nalerchii itaar i ahae ompakna, vokhehkho ichummah nalaetho inche laaruw paam mee chaapchu namanchaepa!
Babilon taklina vajeer atupa; akhaechuve jaephar aere ynthiing ae vokhehkho laaruw paamna atheh vakhae ae siichu khuwruung nache yntuwhsa.
Havi aanuwna thangbaen tanii mee inempak iruur ing ynteenka ariirvaang hava chong i kasiipa, “Halleluja! Manlaenpeeh, alaar isa vokhehkho ruwrengchu Thangnang ningna omna.”

Akhae-chuve Aafhuw avajeer vakhae chuve ichumva vokhehkho ichum ynthiing chuva; Aafhuw ing laaruw paamchu ichuwhmah ing amamaang sanuwchu ataklina vajeer atupa, vokhehkho Aafhuw meenae aechu atheh khaena ataklina Aafhuw inche huw aripa.
Chutahnache athar vokheh enuw ing uungsaereeh, “Halleluja! iruungpak khuwruung amamaang mikhuwhchu ichenmahdeh ing hangkhukna!”
Upa ae somnii ariimanrii re laetha ipaar manrii aenche vatiih aeka iruwngpham ongnii nache ong Thangnang chu rum aeka enriir, “Amen! Halleluja!”
Amana iruwngpham ongnii tanii iruur yngkheh ing ariir, “Thangnang meenae ae, Aafhuw chu ijaaka arum iruung isiing vakhae ae, inuw vakhae Thangnang chu manpahruw.”
Amana mee inem iruur vaangche chii inempak vokhehkho ipirpak bicheeh huwruwsa pingeng ichii ing havi ki ing kasiipa, Halleluja! Akhaechuve Aachehchir Aafhuw Thangnang inche paarsa.
Inuw ing rotha manroh manuwka athiseh ing nungae sataruw; inuw ing Aafhuw chu manpah vaanchiiva, akhaechuve Jaoti rakhiinii aphachu ahenphapa, amanche sanuw inchenkho ynthongsa.
Amana ynreenjerjer, iseeng, ynnaarjaeh limon peen iniinii khaenache aningna apeehpa; akhaechuve ynnaarjaeh limon peen chuve ynthiing ae ichum ynthiing nong chuva.

Amana vaarmee ing kaningna ariir, “Havi baziihra: Jaoti rakhiinii nache imaar a-een mee aechu aajaehmeh bor aphapae.” Vaarmee inche havikho ariir pareeh, “Hava vakhae i ichumpak Thangnang chong chuva.”

Amana atakchu irumnii khaena ki ing amaensok nache ivakhupsah ing. Changlae ama ing kaningna ariir, “Amakha tumahra! Ki i nang vaang vokhehkho Jesu saarkhiichu apeeh ae unae aethoh meenae ynsuwhhak yngkhehping; Thangnang chu rumla. Akhaechuve Jesu asaarkhii ipeeh chuve Thangnang chongsae amanthang chehnii laethava.”
Aanuwnache ki ing thangbaen ynrangchu kamupa, amanche sakuur ivaar chukho omsa. Amana aongnii mee chuve thachafhuw re ichumva, ama inche ichum ynthiing ing vajeer tuka laar atukpa.
Amana Aafhuw mikna mi ichuwh marip ireng vokhehkho arusae taklina iruwng phurchii ae, Aafhuw mahnaka reentaang achuw tanga ing amanghuwmah ynziih vasah rumingchu om.
Amanche sii ing ynthik vasah Aafhuw ing asing peen vokhehkho arumingchu Thangnang chongsae iva achii.
Amana thang-baen laarchang aenche ivaar, iseeng, ynnaarjaeh limon peen niika sakuur ivaar taklinache ong Aafhuw chu aanuw enjiipa.

Amanche jaati vakhaechu ithehnii khaenache Aafhuw baetanii yngeepak laangchem ahensohpa; changvakonchu Aafhuw ing enuwchu siir rumor inche ngahpeeh vaatae, amana Aafhuw ing Aachehchir Thangnang barungsii vomrip chii chaniinii nache achanii.
Aafhuw peenna vokhehkho adiirriim nache iruwngna iruwng amanche Aafhuwna Aafhuw taka ynziih vasah ruming yngkhiingchu om.
Aanuwnache vaarmee yngkheh inche inii taklina ingiirchu ki ing kamupa; amanche minvaen rikna ama ing ynjaap vaati aangkhengna ipirpak inche va-uungsa, Thangnang imaarne thengruw.
Nenuw ing iruwng ae ensha, aapuh ae ensha, aatuaricheh ae ensha, sakuur ae taklina aongnii ae ensha, ruwkuwrjoh ae, isiing iruung meenae aekho, mee vakhae ae enshachu isahnii khaena yngkongruw.
Sakuur taklina ong Aafhuw vokhehkho alaarchang ae taklina laar tukvachii ae saklaang vokhehkho laaruw paam iruwng chaap ae ing ipurpak ing yngkong aechu ki ing kamupa.

Amanche saklaang thohche ynruw ing aanuwzii ichummah jaephar buwtinnii iraangka mee aechu laetho tuka amanchae vokhehkho aruthaksiichu amanrum thohche akhumpae. Hava ynniimeh ae ichu enringsen ing mi ichuwhjaeh khursung tingche ajerenpae.
Amanche areh vakhae ae chuve sakuur aongnii Aafhuw abaetanii ahensoh vasah laangchem inche atheh chirpae; vokhehkho vaati aenche enshachu encheh vakhae ensahpa.
Vaarmee ing idong naemah ithuwhpak kuurdong longting re ipirpak siirruw runoh akikna chika ijungchumchu ki ing kamupa.
Ama inche tuna raennii baruwr, umlae kho amanche saitaan kho ynsuwh saklaangchu suwrka, kum lising yngkheh khaena aphuwppa,

amana vaarmee inche umlaechu mee vakhae athar amanchaeniimah inche kum lising yngkheh chakchu achimahri raentaangche kuurdong tingche jenbabukka akhumpangpa. Aanuwnache apha mongtehpang khaena bajohva tareeh.

Amana ki ing iruwngpham ongnii inempakchu kamupa, ama taklina ong aechu eningna vajeer tunii ruwreng apeeh vasah meepae. Amanche Thangnang chong khaena vokhehkho Jesu khaena saarkhii empeeh tahna enrusae iten apha mee ae vokhehkho saklaangchu changmahka aruthaksii-chu arummah ae amanche embachirna changmahka engkikna buwtinnii aaraangmah laetha aechu kamupae. Enuw ing hangring aeka kum lising yngkheh Khrista thohche paarhaksae.
Ithii arehchaap ae chuve kum lising yngkheh aantuwmahri raentaangche hangring mahrisae. Havi ahaarpa hangring chuva.
Ahaarpa hangringna ynvae mee chuve alaepah isava vokhehkho bor aphava! Entaklina avomanii ithii inche chehmahnii ae; amanche enuw ing Khrista thohche kum lising yngkheh paarhak vaatae.
Kum lising yngkhehchu ahungchi-chak aanuwtingche, umlaechu kaeshum tanii bajoh vaata

amana hungsuwh naka arakiing manriina ong laaruw mee chaap manchae vaata, amachuve, Gok re Magok va. Umlae inche laar khaena mantuwhpoh vaatae, enuw inem ae chuve chifhuwna siih masing ynghuw chehmah thohkhe aanghak vaata.
Enuw ing laaruw paam nache ynjarnong aenaka Thangnang mee ynthiing aere Thangnang ing aning amansiihpak khuwruungchu ihir vaatae; changvakonchu thangbaen tanii mi jungbuk naka mamaangchir vaatae,
vokhehkho saklaang re ichuwhmah jaephar engongnii ichen naemah mi re ynsajaeh nache mee amanchae umlae atakchu babuk vaata, amanche siim jaen ichen naemahdeh ing ijachaam phavaatae.
Aanuwnache inempak ivaar iruwngpham ongnii nache Thangnang ong kamupa. Laaruw paam vokhehkho thangbaen aaniimehchu vokheh pangna omahchirka athar vokheh ymmumahsa.

Amana ki ing ithii chaap ae, iruung isiing naeru ing iruwngpham ongnii maanache ingiir ae vokhehkho thiimbuwr chaapchu ymmong kamupa. Amana reentaang areh thiimbuwr chukho ymmongsa, amachuve iringnii thiimbuwrva. Amanache ithii ae chaapchu enuw ing entu nong inuwzii ing thiimbuwr chaapna ynziih vasah inuwzii inche vajeer atupa.
Aanuwna chenkho chifhuw inche ithii aechu abathenpae, vokhehkho ithii re kuurdong inchenkho asungna ithii chaap aechu abathenpae. Amana enuw enongtu inuwzii inche vajeerchu atupa.
Amanche ithii re kuurdong aechu mi sungtingche arenpae. Havi avomaniinii ithii chuva.
Amana iringnii thiimbuwr nache aruming ynziih yntuwhmah vakhae aechu mi sungtingche arenpae.

Amana iruwngpham ongnii tanii iruur ipirpak yngkheh ing havi ariir kasiipa, “Enla, Thangnang ongnii eenchu mee aethoh ynruwhakna, Aafhuw ama inche enuw thohche onghak vaata, amanche enuw ing Aafhuw mee ynsuwh vaatae, vokhehkho Aafhuw Thangnang atakrap enuw thohche ynruwhakjaeh naka empa Thangnang chu ynsuwh vaata.
Ama ing emik richii yntachu nuwrpeeh vaatae. Amanache ithii omahnii, ijachaam, ichap ichuw changmahka athar ina omahnii, akhaechuve baruw vakhae chaap omahchirsa.”

Amana iruwngpham ongniina ong yngkheh inche ariir, “Enla, peeh aangkheng kamanthar chirpa.” Ama ingkho kaningna ariir, “Havi baziihra, akhaechuve havana chongsae vakhae i ichumva vokhehhko thachafhuw remva.”
Amana kaningna ariir, “Atii kipchirsa! Ki i Alpha vokhehkho Omega chuping, aren vokhehkho adongnii chuping. Achii iraar ningna-che iringnii chiitaang chiichu amen ichah ing pivakata.
Achehcheh mee inche havana lerchii i phasa vaata, amanche ki ing akhaena Thangnang vakata vokhehkho kasiti vaata.

Changvakonchu ynchik mee ae, thacha omah ae, ithuw vasah ae, miktheh ae, lamchat isamah, disuur ae, ruthaksii arum ae, amanche mare omchaap ae engkhaena chembe ichen naemah ing ichuwhjaeh mi sungting vokhehkho ynsajaeh, avomaniinii ithii tingche bukvaatae.”
Aanuwnache adongniideh riirae mangkhiing ing isip kamfhuw achi vaarmee sarii tanii yngkheh ing chong ibuwhka ariir, “Huungla, rakhii niivachii Jaoti rumee ki ing mansii kachii.”
Amana vaarmee inche laetha jaarna iruungpak bung tingche ynruwpa, amana Thangnang ningtanii ynthiing khuwruung Jerusalem thangbaen tanii ijungchum kaningna ymmansii inche
Thangnang alaar isa ing atufhuwchah ing ataklinache aenka, amen iruwpak rung ynthiingkiir ing yndang vaangche tasa.
Amanache iruungpak yngkaang bang suwngkung suum ariinii omsa, vokhehkho suwngkung siirnache vaarmee suum ariinii om amanche Isrel siti sungkhur ruming suum ariinii kho ataklinache ynziih sapsa;
Iniisuwhtah tingche suwngkung asae ynthum om, Ikang tingche suwngkung asae ynthum, Irip tingche suwngkung asae ynthum om, amana Taetah ting chenkho suwngkung asae ynthum om.
Amana khuwruung bangchu abur suum ariinii omsa, amanche ataklinache Jaoti chongthang ae suum ariinii rumingchu ynthaangsiir ing ynthasiirsa.
Amana kaningna ichong inche khuwruung suwngkung chaap vokhehkho abang chaapchu amantinii sana thor achipa.

Khuwruungchu arakiing manrii isuwh ing om, amachu aphuw adung ynchimchak inche omsa, amana vaarmee inche khuwruungchu athor inche amantipa; amachu aphuw adung vokhehkho yngkaang aangkheng ynchim chakchak ing lising yngkheh charunga chakva.
Amana vaarmee inchenkho ama ing asichinnii laaruw mee khaap ing somanrii arii manrii kiubits (amachuve 216 isuw ing yngkaangva) amantipa.
Abangchu ynthiingkiir ing yndang inche ynseemka amanche khuwruung inche ynthiingkiir vaartha vaang ichii iseengjaeh sana ing ynseemka omsa.
Khuwruung abang abur vakhaechu amen iruwpak rung reentaang aajaeh inche isapak ing ynseemsa; amaensa nache jaspar, avomanii re amanthumnii nache Saphir, amanriinii nache Emerot,

arunganii nache oniks, avakruknii nache karnelien, asariinii nache krusolit, airiihnii nache berir, aikuwnii nache topaaj, asuumnii nache kristopharas, asuum arii yngkheh nache jasin, asuum ariinii nache amethis, hava vakhae rung inge yngiirsa.
Amanche suwngkung suum ariinii chaap nache amen iruwpak rung suumariinii omsae, asuwngkung siirchu amen iruwpak ing ynseemsa, amanche khuwruung lamchu vaartha vaang ichii iseeng sana inche ynseemsa.
Amana khuwruung nache rumnii-een om mumahsing, akhaechuve rumniieenchu Aacheh Aafhuw Thangnang re Jaoti ynsuwhsae.
Khuwruung nache inii tha ing aenvachii ikanii omahsa. Yngkhaena ynchii imbe Thangnang alaar isa inche rengka amanche jaemichu Jaoti ynsuwhsa.
Amana laaruw paam mee vakhae inche ireng nache hunsi vasi tuvaatae; vokhehkho iruwng chaap aenche enlerchii alaar isachu henreen vaatae,
amanche suwngkung chaapchu anasiirna ynrang naka omvaata amanche jaen ivi ichii amanache omahdehnii;
jaati mee vakhae ing enruwreng isa ivaar vokhehkho ynjasuwhpak henreen vaatae.

Changvakonchu asung tingche ynthiingmah amanche yntirsuwh ningjaknii nong atuae achuw yngkheh changmahka mare ing ichong ae varuwhcheh mahnii ae, changvakonchu iringnii thiimbuwrna aruming ynziih vakhae ae inche khuwruung nache hungruwh vaatae.
Khuwruung lam arikchimbang nache Thangnang vokhehkho Jaoti iruwngpham ongnii tanii hung-suwh aechu iseeng ing yndangkiir ynreen iringnii chii iva yngkheh vaarmee ing kaningna ymmansiipa.
Amana iva taang paangkheh paangkheh tingche aanla asiksik ing ynla iringnii thingburchu om, ama aanlachu atha siir nache ynlasa; amana thingbur ana inche laaruw mee vakhae ina damniichu ynsuwhsa.
Ama khuwruung nache Thangnang siraap ynchiikho omahnii, changvakonchu Thangnang vokhehkho Jaoti iruwngpham ongniichu amanache omvaata, amana ameenae chaap aenche atakchu rumvaatae;
enuw ing amaechu muvaatae, vokhehkho arumingchu embachir nache yntha vaata.
Amanache jaen ichii atii vokheh omahnii, Aafhuw Thangnang inche engkhaena irengchu ynsuwh naka amanche enuw ing ichen naemah inche paarvaatae.

Vaarmee inche kaningna ariir, “Hava vakhae chong i ichumva vokhehkho thachafhuwva, jaephar ae ningna alaetha apeeh Thangnang inche avaarmeechu ameenae ae ningna ithupak ing suwhvachii vakhaechu mansiinii khaena ajenbathenpa,
amanche enruw, ki ithupak ing juwngva kata.” Hava thimmbuwr sungne jaephar ae chongriir vakhae i amanjii meechu alaepah isapakva.
Johon ki ing hava vakhae i kasii vasah vokhehkho kamu vasahchir chuva. ki ing kasiirae vokhehkho kamu raenche, kichu ymmansii vaarmee akhi maanache vakhupsa ingka karumpa;

changvakonchu kaningna ama ing ariir, “Amakha nang ing tumahva nachiiva! Ki chuve nangthoh, Thangnang jaephar nauw nanae aethoh, vokhehkho hava thiimbuwr chongriir vakhae amanjii aethoh meenae ynsuwhhak yngkhehping. Thangnang chu rumla.”
Amana vaarmee inche kaningna ariir, “Hava thiimbuwrne amanthang vakhae chong havi thuur nana siimahra, yngkhaena ynchii imbe aphachu hunganeeng tangsa.

Isamah atu mee aenche isamahchu tujaehrasii, amanche ynthiingmah mee inche changche manthiing mahjaeh rasii, amanche ichum ynthiing inche ichumchu turasii, ki i achinii re abasennii vokhehkho adongnii chuping.”
“Enruw, ki ithupak ing jungtheng ynthongning! Ama ama anongtu inuwzii ing kaningtanii nongmen ipifhuw chaap jenreen vakata.
Ki i Alpha vokhehkho Omega chuping, aren vokhehkho achinii, abasennii vokhehkho adongnii chuping.”
Ynthiingkiir ing apeenchu achaam achuw yngkheh meechu bor aphava, enuw ing iringnii thingbur aanlachu isah phavaatae amanche khuwruung suwngkung sungtingche ivaruwh phavaatae.
Taangna chaap ae chuve utiae vokhehkho disuur meepae, naamak itu aepae vokhehkho mikthehpae, ruthaksii arum meepae, amanche ynraar nong ituae chaap chupae.
“Jesu ki ing ruwrthiing mee ae chaap khaena neningna havana vakhae i saarkhii ipeehnii inche kavaarmee kajenchiirva. Ki chuve Devit tuti tanii junginlaar ireng ziing aesii tangbang chuping.”

Laetha ingkho amanche rakhii iniinuw inchenkho ariir, “Huungla! Amanche aasii mee inchenkho huungla tarasii. Vokhehkho achii iraar ama inche thengrasiing, iringnii chiichu amanden mee inche amen ichah ing ngareh inche risarasiing.”

Havana thiimbuwr inge amanthang vakhae i aasii mee chaapna saarkhii kapeehnah: Achuw yngkheh mee ing chongriir takline ber bunaka manthi nave, Thangnang ing aningna havana thiimbuwr sungne ynziihka om riirae mangkhiingchu vehapvaata,

amanche achuw yngkheh mee ing havana thiimbuwr inge amanthang chongjeer vakhae tanii rinave, Thangnang ing iringnii thingbur vokhehkho ynthiing khuwruung tanii, vokhehkho thiimbuwr sungna ynziihka om vasahna arutumchu ripeeh vaata.
Hava vakhae khaena saarkhii apeeh Aafhuw ing ariirnah, “Atatak ing ichumva! Ki ithupak ing juwngva kata.” Juwnglo, Aafhuw Jesu!
Aafhuw Jesu tungsiihchu ynthiing mee aethoh ynruwhakjaeh ynsuwhrasii. Amen.
